1.content: First, choose your heroine or villainess!
1.title: Choose your Heroine!

111.content: Would you rather have someone else like Catwoman?
111.title: Supergirl

choices: She immediately starts looking for the scientist
She forgets about him and begins to protect the city in a kind manner
The ray gun has affected her mind making her evil
1112.content: One day the mighty Girl Of Steel was flying through Metropolis looking for signs of troubles knowing that she was on her one for once because Superman was with the Justice League Of America and she spotted a crazed rogue scientist named Dr. Sputnik who was using a deadly ray gun to melt all of Metropolis' city bank vaults so he could get away with millions she flew right in front of him "Hold pal no one's leaving with that money now put it back unless you want to end up in the hospital for a few weeks you really don't want to see me upset so I'm letting you off with a warning!" but the mad scientist laughed coldly "No Supergirl it's you who will be sorry once I zap you ith my gun!" he fired at her but because of her high invulnerability she simply laughed "Is that all you got because it actually tickles!" then it really started to tickle her as Supergirl began laughing and squirming around "Hey Haaaaaa cut it out! That's really starting to tickle Heeeee! Come on quit it!" as she giggled and squirmed constantly Dr. Sputnik noticed something else was happening to her the Girl Of Steel was getting bigger he in jaw dropping shock glared up as she grew higher and higher taller than the biggest buildings in the city until she was nearly 100 feet tall with still a slight smile on her face the scientist didn't want to try and tick her off at this size knowing for a fact what would happen so he quickly deactivated his machine setting it for self destruct and quickly fled the scene just as she looked in his direction unfortunately Supergirl didn't notice him leaving at all "Hmmm" she thought "It seems I'm now a 100 foot Girl Of Steel what shall I do now?" she ponders
1112.title: Supergirl

choices: No stay with Wonder Woman's growing pains
112.content: Or shall we have an interesting adventure with one of her villains Giganta?
112.title: Giganta?

choices: It's irradicated the evilness in Giganta
1121.content:
In this Giganta is wearing her modern costume. This is a one piece costume that covers her body except her head and neck.

In the city there was another showdown between Wonder Woman and one of her main villains Giganta. Wonder Woman needed to end the fight fast because Giganta was causing much damage to the city.
"When will you learn Giganta?" asked Wonder Woman. "You've fought me numerous times and you've never won."
"Well I'll just keep trying until I do," replied Giganta.
But then Wonder Woman gave Giganta a thunderous upper cut that knocked the giantess over. But she landed on a building and her head hit one of the sharp parts of the roof. For a moment Wonder Woman thought she had killed the villainess. She saw the former giantess shrink back down to her normal size.
Wonder Woman flew down to her and picked her up. She noticed blood coming out of Giganta's head. If Wonder Woman was a heartless person she would have left the villainess there to die. But she didn't kill unless she had no choice.
Wonder Woman then began to fly towards the nearest hospital. Everyone was surprised to see her there with Giganta of all people.

What has the head injury done to Giganta?
1121.title: Giganta's head injury

11212.content:
"What happened?" asked one of the Doctors.
"Giganta's had head trauma you need to help her," replied Wonder Woman.
"We'll do everything we can."
Giganta was then taken away to a room and her head was examined they could tell that she had server damage and so they took her in for a CAT scan. Part of her brain had been damaged and Wonder Woman was worried that she'd become a vegetable or something like that.
But hours later Giganta woke up. She was surprised to find herself in the hospital. She looked around and saw the Doctors and Wonder Woman was there.
"W-where am I?" asked Giganta.
"You're in the hospital," replied one of the Doctors. "You've taken a knock to the head."
"Oh my God. All those people."
"What are you talking about?"
"All those people I've harmed."
A tear came out of Giganta's eye. At first Wonder Woman thought that her enemy was faking it. But then she could tell that Giganta was being sincere."
11212.title: Brain Damage

112121.content:
"Err Doctor what's wrong with Giganta?" asked Wonder Woman. "The Giganta I know has no remorse for what she's done or the people she's hurt."
"Well it seems that the head trauma has altered her personality," replied the Doctor. "Se seems to have lost the desire to be evil and thus gained a conscience."
"So this is an all new Giganta that could benefit people?"
"Possibly yes."
Wonder Woman then went to Giganta. She held her hand and looked into the eyes of her former foe.
"Wonder Woman is that you?" asked Giganta.
"Yes Doris it's me," replied Wonder Woman. "How do you feel?"
"I feel rotten. How could I have done all those terrible things?"
"You were a different person back then."
"Wonder Woman I need redemption for what I've done."
"When you're healthy I'll help you feel better about yourself. I'll help you get back on the right track."
"Thank you Wonder Woman God Bless you."
Wonder Woman felt a tear run down her face.

How long will Giganta be in the hospital?
112121.title: A new Giganta

1121211.content:
Giganta stayed in the hospital for a few days. But she was soon discharged. But now she was turning good she didn't have anywhere to go. There was no way the legion of Doom would take her back now. But then she saw Wonder Woman in the sky.
"Hey Wonder Woman down here!" shouted Giganta. She had been noticed and Wonder Woman flew down to her.
"Are you alright Giganta?" asked Wonder Woman.
"I need somewhere to stay. Lex and Joker won't let me back in the Legion of Doom."
"Well I'm just dealing with something right now." She then began to think for a moment. "Maybe you could give me a hand."
"You want me to help you?"
"Sure you'll be a big help literally."
"Ok I'll help you."
"Good but for now it's best that I carry you. If the city saw you at giant sized they'd think you were attacking again."
"That's fair."
1121211.title: no where to go

11212111.content:
Using her Amazon strength Wonder Woman picked up the almost normal sized Giganta. She then began to fly her towards where the danger was. There was a helicopter hanging over a building edge. There were people still inside and they couldn't get out.
"Ok Giganta I need your help with this one," said Wonder Woman. "Can you grow until you’re tall enough to reach the top of the building?"
"Yeah sure," replied Giganta. She was then put on the ground and she used her powers to increase her size until she was tall enough to reach the top of the building. "Now what?"
"Hold the helicopter while I get everyone out."
"Ok."
Giganta then held the helicopter. Wonder Woman flew to it and she opened the door. The people inside were terrified because their life was in the hands of Giganta. they didn't know that she was nice.
"Don't worry you're safe," said Wonder Woman.
She started to take each person out. When everyone was out she gave Giganta the signal and she put the helicopter on the building.

How will people react?
11212111.title: Giganta's frist save

112121111.content:
Everyone looked at Giganta and they ran away screaming. This upset the now gentle giantess. Wonder Woman went to the face of her Ex-foe. She saw her shed another tear.
"Wonder Woman I saved them yet they're afraid of me," said Giganta.
"Well they're still used to the old you who destroyed cities and hurt people," replied Wonder Woman.
"How long until they know I'm good?"
"I admit it'll take a while. But if you continue on your path to goodness then you will find redemption."
"Thanks Wonder Woman."
Giganta then shrank to her normal size and she went to a safe house set up by the Justice League. They believed that some villains would see the errors of their ways and turn good. Although this didn't happen too often it would be perfect for Giganta.
She had her own room since she mainly lived at the Legion of Doom headquarters. There was food there and some entertainment. But there were councilors for her. If she had any questions she could simply go to them.
112121111.title: New place to stay

1121211111.content:
It seemed that Giganta would be at this place for a while. She was allowed to leave but she wasn't allowed to grow in case it would spook anyone. The only time she was allowed to grow was if it was an emergency.
Thankfully not many people recognised the brilliant doctor. She use to remember how she would take comfort in her work. But with that gone she had nothing to do hardly. She use to have fun destroying buildings and harming people. But those days were over now.
One day she was allowed a chemistry set and she started to mix around with it. She began to create things that would benefit people instead of harming them. But eventually it was time to see her councilor. She had a woman who was a little on the short side but very beautiful. She had to look up at Giganta she was easily 6'6 without using her powers.
"Ok Doris how are you feeling today?" asked the Councilor.
"A little bored," replied Giganta. "I'm not allowed a lot of things here."
"Well it's a safety procedure. Why don't you go and watch a film or something?"
"There's no films I wanna watch."
"Come on I'm sure there's one."

Is there a film Giganta wants to see?
1121211111.title: Councilling

11212111111.content:
"Well there is one I was thinking about seeing," said Giganta.
"Which one?" replied The Councilor.
"It's called Where the Wind Blows. It looks pretty good."
"Go and see it if you want. I'll even find out the times at the local movies."
"Thank you."
A little later Giganta went to the movies to watch Where the Wind Blows. She was a little nervous and she hoped that no one would recognise her when she wasn't at giant size.
She sat at the back of the theater where no one would be able to see her. She wanted to keep a low profile until her name had been cleared and she was deemed a hero instead of a villain.
She enjoyed the film and there were parts that made her shed a tear. But she wanted to enjoy the movie with someone else instead of being on her own. She gave out a sigh and just left the theater when the movie was over.
Giganta walked back towards the safe house. But then she heard someone behind her saying "Stop Thief." She turned around saw a man wearing a blue baseball cap running towards her.
11212111111.title: The Movies

choices: One of the Legion of Doom comes looking for her
112121111111.content:
Giganta then grabbed the man by his collar and lifted him into the air. She looked at him and he looked back. There was fear in her eyes. He was only normal height and his feet were a good 8 inches above the ground.
"Please put me down," said the Thief.
"Oh I will went he police arrive," replied Giganta.
Eventually the shop keeper appeared and confirmed that he was the thief. the shopkeeper then called the police and they were there within minutes. They took the man into custody and they interviewed Giganta.
After all that Giganta went back to the safe house where she met her counsellor again. This time they really needed to talk.
"So Doris how was the movie?" asked her Councillor.
"It was good but on the way back I stopped a thief," replied Giganta.
"Good for you, you're showing progress."
"Yeah the old me would have either let him go or grabbed him and took the money."
"Well thankfully you're no longer the old you. You can help people in society and you will be classed as a hero."

What happens next?
112121111111.title: Another meeting

1121211111111.content:
Meanwhile back at the Legion of Doom headquarters there is a meeting there. But Giganta’s seat was empty. In fact the meeting was about her and her recent activities. This wasn’t going to their liking.
“My fellow team mates,” said Lex Luthor. “We are ere today to decide what to do with our former member Giganta. Our research has shown that she has suffered from an incurable head trauma. She has foolishly turned to the Justice League.”
“What do we do with her?” asked Poison Ivy.
“We send one of us to liberate her and bring her back here. We have the technology to cure her and bring her back to our side.”
“Why bother with her?”
“She’s one of our most power members. She could put your powers to shame if she wanted to.”
“You don’t have to put it like that.”
“But for this we’ll be sending the Riddler. As long as he doesn’t wear his Riddler costume he’ll be able to get there without much notice.”
“Finally some fun,” said Riddler. “I’ve been waiting to get at the Justice league and especially old Batsy.”
1121211111111.title: Legion of Doom

11212111111111.content:
The next morning Giganta woke up feeling a little weird. it wasn't that weird really. Just the dislike of getting out of bed early. But today was going to be special for her. Like with prisoners coming out of prison the Justice League was helping her integrate back into society. They had gotten her a job and today was going to be her first day.
She had a job at a shop for big and tall women. She seemed ideal for the job since tall women felt more comfortable with women who had the same problems as them. She was just an assistant that would put the clothes up and help customers find the clothes they wanted.
At first she was kept to herself. But eventually a customer came to her. This woman was normal height but she was definitely obese. She had come here because no where else had clothes in her size. Giganta tried to smile down at her.
"Can I help you?" asked Giganta.
"Yes I was just wondering where the Summer wear was," replied the woman.
"It's just a few isles down. Do you want me to show you?"
"Yes please."
Giganta then led the woman to the summer wear section of the shop.

When will Riddler strike?
11212111111111.title: Giganta's job

112121111111111.content:
Eventually the Riddler went into the shop. He disguised himself so that Giganta didn't recognise him. He saw her towering above everyone else so he went up to her. She looked down and smiled at him.
"Can I help you?" asked Giganta.
"Yes it's my wife's birthday soon and I wanted to get her a dress," replied the Riddler. "Her height makes it difficult to get clothes."
"Well how tall is she?"
"About your height actually."
"Well there aren't many clothes in my size. But we have a few that might help."
"Thank you very much."
Giganta then led the Riddler to the section where the dresses were in her size. She got one out for him.
"This is one of our finer dresses," said Giganta.
"Hmm looks nice. If you don't mind could you try it on for me? If it's a good fit for you then it'll fit my wife."
"Ok sir."
She then walked to the changing rooms and he had a huge grin on his face.
112121111111111.title: Riddler posing as a man

1121211111111111.content:
Giganta put the dress on and it fitted her well. She gave herself a smile in the mirror and she did a little pose.
"This dress seems to fit," said Giganta.
"Great then it'll fit my wife," replied the Riddler.
"Do you want it boxed and gift wrapped?"
"No thank you."
He then got a gas grenade out of his pocket. He threw it into the changing room and he put on a gas mask. Giganta could feel the gas going up her noise and she began to cough.
Eventually she fell unconscious on the ground. Then the Riddler came in and looked over her.
"You're right that dress does fit you well," said the Riddler. "Oh well a shame I don't have a wife."
He then picked up her body. It was extremely difficult for him because of her weight but he was able to manage.
"Now there's some certain people who want to see you. And believe me they don't want to be disappointed."

Where does Giganta wake up?
1121211111111111.title: Gassed

11212111111111112.content:
When Giganta woke up she seemed to be on some sort of operating table. She saw some of the Legion of Doom looking at her. She tried to get out of her bonds but she didn’t have the strength.
“What the hell are you guys doing?” asked Giganta.
“Well you’re an extremely valuable asset to us Dr Zuel,” replied Lex Luthor. “We can’t simply let you go.”
“No I’m happy being the way I am.”
“But we’re not. Those Doctors couldn’t repair the damage done to your brain. But we can. Soon you’ll be the same old Giganta who helped us to take over the World.”
“NO!"
She then used her last ounce of energy to rapid increase the size of her body. She broke out of her restraints. Some of the Legion of Doom members tried to restrain her but she had already grown too big.
Soon she grew out of the roof and ran away. But there were several villains in hot pursuit. But eventually she reached a part of the jungle (That's where the headquarters were). There was a thick layer of trees and she shrank to her smallest size so she could escape.
11212111111111112.title: Escaping the Legion of Doom

112121111111111121.content:
The now 6'6 Giganta was hiding in the jungle. She hoped that she could elude the Legion of Doom until she got to safety. She wished that Wonder Woman had given her something so they could contact her with.
"Typical the one time I need Wonder Woman and she's nowhere to be found," thought Giganta. "Ok she's only one person she can't be everywhere at once."
Giganta then started to go north. But she would always keep her head down in case anyone saw her. She would wait for an hour or so and then grow so she could make more ground quickly.
Eventually the hour past and Giganta thought it best to grow now and she went up through the trees. She then began to walk away. She hoped that no one had seen her.
She kept walking until she reached the coast line. There was a small town there and everyone was afraid of her. She quickly shrank down so she didn't cause anymore panic.
"Please don't panic I need your help," said Giganta. "I need to contact the Justice League."
The townspeople looked at themselves.

What do they do?
112121111111111121.title: Got away

1121211111111111211.content:
The townspeople figured that she wasn't a threat if she had come begging for help from them. They directed her to a phone and she called the Justice League Headquarters.
"Hello you have reached the justice League Headquarters how may I help you?" said a Voice.
"I need to talk to Wonder Woman it's Giganta," she replied.
"I'm sorry but she isn't here right now."
"Then someone like Superman, Batman or even the Flash would help."
"One moment please."
The phone played some music for a moment. But then it was picked up by the Flash.
"Hello the Flash here," he said.
"Great Flash its Giganta."
"Hey there Doris."
"Look I've been kidnapped by the Legion of Doom. But I've escaped and now stuck here."
"Wait a minute I'll trace the call."
1121211111111111211.title: Call the Justice Leage

11212111111111112111.content:
Giganta waited there for a few seconds but then she was teleported into Justice League headquarters. She looked around a little in confusion. She saw some of the other heroes here.
"Err what just happened?" asked Giganta.
Just then the Flash came up in front of her. "That is the beautiful thing called teleporting," replied the Flash. "Are you aright?"
"Yeah I'm fine. But am I safe here?"
"Yeah you couldn't imagine a safer place to stay. This place is full of super powered beings dedicated to Good."
"Wish I could be one of them."
"Oh you will one day. You're already well on your way. Now fancy some coco?"
"No thanks. But what about my job? They'll probably fire me when I get back."
"Don't worry they'll understand. We'll explain things to them."
"Thanks."
Giganta went and sat down in one of the sitting rooms. There were some nice comfortable chairs. She could have slept on it but she didn't feel that tired. She just watched the TV.

What's on?
11212111111111112111.title: HQ

112121111111111121112.content:
The news was on and Giganta watched the new plans that President Bush had for the country. She also watched about the troops in Iraq. Like everyone else she wanted them to come back.
Then Huntress came in. She sat down near Giganta and she looked at her a little.
“Hey wait you’re Giganta,” she said.
“Yeah that’s me,” replied Giganta.
“I heard you turned good but I could never believe it until now.”
“I know it’s hard to believe. But after my head trauma I gained a conscience. The Doctor’s say I have some brain damage.”
“Well I hope you get better.”
“I don’t want to be cured. If I do I’ll go back to hurting people again. And I don’t want that to happen.”
“I understand where you’re coming from.” Then a report came up about a bank robbery where the thieves had more fire power then the police. This made Huntress smile. “Looks like something’s happening. Do you want to come and help?”
“Yeah sure it’s another step to redemption.”
The two women went to the teleporter and they teleported away.
112121111111111121112.title: The news

1121211111111111211121.content:
They reappeared just outside the bank. The thieves were just trying to run out with some hostages. They the saw the two heroines standing in front of them.
"Oh crap!" shouted one of the Thieves.
"You're not going anywhere," said Huntress.
The men the produced their weapons. They went to fire at Huntress but Giganta quickly increased her size and put her huge hand in front of Huntress to protect her.
"Thanks Big G," said Huntress.
"You're welcome," replied Giganta.
Then with her free hand Giganta knocked the thieves over. She moved hr hand and Huntress began to shoot webbed arrows at them. When they hit the men were trapped in energy nets and the police came in closer.
"That was quick," said Huntress. She then looked at Giganta. "You know Big G we make a pretty good team."
"We should do this more often," replied Giganta.
"Then shall we partner?"
"Partner?"
"You got it Huntress and Giganta an unbeatable duo."

What happens next?
1121211111111111211121.title: Success

11212111111111112111211.content:
Then the pair teleported back to HQ. Giganta wasn't sure what had just happened. She saw Huntress smiling at her.
"So that's it?" asked Giganta.
"Yep another crime stopped," replied Huntress. "Now the world is safer."
"A little safer."
"Yes might only be a little safer. But a little safer is better then a little more dangerous."
"Well I guess you're right."
"Do you want to have a little celebration?"
Giganta and Huntress then went to get a drink. Unfortunately no alcohol was allowed in HQ so they just went for sodas. But it wasn't the drink that mattered it was the fact they were celebrating together their victory.
"So what's the so called light side like?" asked Huntress.
"Well I admit the evil side is simpler," replied Giganta. "But it wasn't the right side to go."
"I hear you."
"I'm glad I'm not evil anymore. And I hope to God my brain injury doesn't heal. I can't go back there."
11212111111111112111211.title: Celebration

112121111111111121112111.content:
As the next few days went by Giganta worked alongside Huntress in their never ending battle against evil and petty thieves. Some of them they'd show no mercy to. But some who were fairly young and doing only minor crimes they would let them off with a warning.
She was also doing a good job at the Big and Tall for women shop. She was getting along well with some of the customers and this made her manager very happy. She was even given a coupon to get some clothes for herself from the shop.
Giganta brought herself a nice red dress that was just her size. It would be great for going out in. But unfortunately she didn't have a date or anything like that.
But the Legion of Doom still were after her. They had seen her working alongside Huntress so they knew that their task was going to a little more difficult then last time. But they were getting themselves better prepared this time.
A little later Giganta was just leaving work and going back to her safe house. She was getting happier by the day and the councillors also saw this. She had even made some things with the other villains who were turning good. She was becoming a good role model for some of the others.
But outside the Legion of Doom were closing in. They had cloaking devises so not to be seen.

What happens?
112121111111111121112111.title: Continue

1121211111111111211121112.content:
Bombs were planted on the front of the safe house. No one inside expected anything until all hell broke loose. There was a big explosion and some of the staff and former villains were killed instantly. A few survived but they were injured.
Giganta was amongst these survivors. Although one of her arms were broke she still tried to help. She grew in size and picked up the survivors. But then she felt pains in her legs. She was being fired at by tranquillizers.
She then ran as fats as she could but the tranquillizers were starting to affect. She was able to get to a hospital before she finally collapsed. When she did collapse she shrank back down to her normal size. She was old cold but the Doctors took her in to be treated.
When she awoke she saw Wonder Woman looking at her. She felt like she was i the same position as last time.
"Déjà vous," said Giganta.
"But this time you're here as a hero instead of a villain," replied Wonder Woman. "You saved all those people."
"But so many died."
"You did all you could do. That was good enough."
1121211111111111211121112.title: Giganta escapes

11212111111111112111211121.content:
"Where are the Legion of Doom?" asked Giganta.
"Most of them escaped but we were able to catch one of them," replied Wonder Woman.
"Which one?"
"Unfortunately I'm not allowed to say. But we'll get answers from him and we'll bring the murderers to justice."
"I'll help."
Giganta then went to get out of bed but she was in pain. The Doctors helped her back into her bed.
"Don't move your body was pretty beaten up in the explosion," said Wonder Woman. "You're not going anywhere."
"But I want to help."
"You can when you're fully recovered."
"But that'll take too long."
"Sorry Doctor's orders."
Wonder Woman then left as the Doctors tended to Giganta. They gave her some pain killers but she was upset that she couldn't help out the Justice League in finding the Legion of Doom.

What does she do?
11212111111111112111211121.title: Recovering

112121111111111121112111212.content:
Giganta felt helpless in her hospital bed. She even cried a little but she saw Huntress coming near her. She had come to see her injured friend.
"Hey Big G," said Huntress.
"Hi Huntress," replied Giganta.
"How are you feeling?"
"Helpless. I want to help the Justice League find the Legion of Doom. But I'm stuck in this bed."
"Well that's where I come in."
"What?"
She then put her hand on Giganta and they teleported away. They were back in H.Q and Giganta didn't know what was happening. She was still lying down but not in the bed anymore. She tried to stand up but it caused her great pain.
"Why can't I be immune to pain like Superman?" asked Giganta.
"Dumb luck I guess," replied Huntress. Now let's see where do we start?"
"How about their base in the swamps?"
"A little too obvious but it's a good place to start."
The pair then teleport away again. But this time their goal was to find the Legion of Doom.
112121111111111121112111212.title: Her partner comes

1121211111111111211121112121.content:
The two heroines appeared just outside the Legion of Doom headquarters. It looked empty but they knew that looks were deceiving. Giganta grew to a colossal size and she ripped the roof off. She was still very angry with them. But she looked inside and saw nothing.
"What do you see Big G?" asked Huntress.
"Nothing this place is completely empty," replied Giganta. She then slammed the roof back down. "
"Calm down we'll find them."
"I hope you're right. Murders like that can't be allowed to walk around."
"That's our job. To put criminals behind bars. Giganta where else would the Legion of Doom go?"
"I'm not sure."
"Come on think. When the Justice League was searching for the Legion of Doom you must have had another secret hiding place somewhere."
"Well there is one."
"Where's that?"
"It's in..."
1121211111111111211121112121.title: Nothing

11212111111111112111211121212.content:
"The city," said Giganta.
"Why would they have one in the city?" replied Huntress. "The Justice League would have been on top of them in moments."
"Well it's reverse physiology. The city would be the last place they'd expect to find the Legion of Doom."
"Very clever."
"But where in the city is it?"
"I'm not sure. We would always go through an underground passage and I never saw the outside building."
"Wait you said that there was a secret entrance?"
"Yeah."
"Then just use that. And if there's security then we'll be able to deal with them."
Giganta and Huntress then teleported back to H.Q and then they teleported to where the underground passage was. Giganta typed in the code on a keypad on the ground and the door opened.
"After you Big G," said Huntress.
"No after you," replied Giganta.
11212111111111112111211121212.title: Secret Passage

112121111111111121112111212121.content:
The two super heroines go into the secret passage together. There were cameras but Giganta knew that there were some blind spots. She was as small as she could get but she towered above Huntress.
"So how do we get past them?" asked Huntress.
"Follow my lead exactly," replied Giganta. "One false move and we'll be captured."
Giganta then carefully walked towards the camera. She had her back to the wall and she seemed to be like some sort of spy. Huntress followed her and they did everything exactly right.
Eventually they came to a door that said Danger. Giganta went through it and Huntress followed. There was a ladder and they both climbed up it.
"This place is like a maze," said Huntress.
"Then you're lucky I know my way around here," replied Giganta.
"Score one for you Big G."
Then they heard something. They ducked for cover and they took a look who was coming. It was the Riddler and Giganta wanted revenge for what he ahd done to her at the shop.
"Take it easy Big G."

What does Giganta do?
112121111111111121112111212121.title: Inside

1121211111111111211121112121212.content:
Giganta watched as Riddler just walked past her. The old her would have taken the opportunity to hurt him or even kill him. But the new her let him go. It would blow their cover and they would lose the element of surprise.
"Ok where do we strike?" asked Huntress.
"There's a room that controls almost everything in the complex," replied Giganta. "If we can get there we can drive them out."
"Good but where is it?"
"That's the problem. It's on the other side of the complex. The only way through is by a busy corridor. It'll be almost impossible to get through that without being seen."
"I was thinking. You know that you can grow."
"Yes."
"Well have you ever tried shrinking?"
"No I didn't. The evil me didn't think there was any point. You couldn't hurt people if you were 3 inches tall."

"It worked I can shrink," said Giganta.
"Good Big G," replied Huntress. "Or should I say Little G."

"Sorry Doris."

"Because we went on a date a while ago. He was a sweet man but I was told that Wonder Woman had made him set me up. I thought he was wired and I kinda lost my temper. I tore the roof off of the restaurant and I tried to kill them both. I feel stupid about it now" (See All New Atom #17).

Giganta then began to run towards the control room. She made sure that she couldn't be seen by any of the cameras. But it was still getting hard to get use to seeing everything at giant size. She was use to living in a world full of tiny people. For once she was the tiny person.
When she reached the control room she saw one of the minor members of the Legion of Doom at the controls. She quickly grew behind him and she picked him up and slammed his head on the ceiling. This knocked him out and she went towards the controls. She remembered how to work them and she began to shut everything down.
Meanwhile in the Corridor Huntress saw that everything was shutting down. She knew that Giganta had gotten to the controls. But then she began to hear the Legion of Doom. She would probably be able to take one of them out. But not all at once. There were too many eve for her to handle.
"Come on Big G hurry up," thought Huntress.
Back in the Control Room Giganta was able to call both the authorities and the Justice League. She gave them their exact location and they were on their way. But then she heard that Huntress was in trouble outside. She went outside to help her friend in need. But she saw what she was up against.

"What do we do then Big G?" asked Huntress. "There's n way we can beat these."
"I have an idea," replied Giganta. She then grabbed her friend by the waist. "Going up."
Giganta then began to grow even bigger. She grew right through the roof and she wanted to grow big enough to make the entire place come down. She made sure that Huntress was safe and not in any danger.
The Legion of Doom were struggling to escape. She of them were being hit by fall bricks. But the longer they stayed here the more chance they had of being crushed.
Giganta was able to see the police coming and the Justice League was teleporting to them. But she eventually stopped growing at around 200 feet. This wasn't her maximum size but it was big enough.

What happens?

A little later Giganta and Huntress was in the Justice League Headquarters. They were being given honours for bravery. This made them feel proud. It was even Wonder Woman who were giving them the medals.
"On behalf of the Justice League I present to you Giganta and Huntress the medals of Bravery," said Wonder Woman. "You showed true courage in the face of impossible odds. We are honoured for you both being Justice Leaguers."
"You mean?" replied Giganta.
"Yes Doris you're officially a member of the Justice League of America."
This was probably the proudest day of her life. After all of her efforts she had finally gotten the redemption that she had been after. She shed a tear and gave her former nemesis a hug.
"Thank you of everything."

1122221.content: It was a quiet night. Or so it seemed. Wonder Woman leaned up against the dusty arm of a gargoyle on a rooftop overlooking the Gotham Natural History Museum. They had heard rumors that Intergang was going to try and steal the Rosetta Stone. Batman skulked about in the Shadow's nearby. The two had been arguing about relationships for what seemed like hours. "No? No dating for the Batman...might cut into your brooding time." Batman said nothing. There was a prolonged awkward silence before he finally responded. "One, dating on the team always leads to disaster. Two, you're a princess from a society of immortal warriors and I'm a rich kid with issues, a lot of issues. And Three, if my enemies knew I had someone special they'd stop at nothing till they got to me through her." Wonder Woman had heard enough. She crushed the gargoyle's head with her bare hand. "Next..." she seethed coldly. Suddenly they were interrupted by an alarm. A pair of red lights on the museum began to flash violently. The two heroes wasted no time. Wonder Woman drifted down to the alley between the museum and the adjacent building with Batman close behind her. However, when they landed only a slim, darkly dressed woman in a ski mask stood at the side door, crowbar in hand. "Just a common thief?" Wonder Woman said with disbelief as she made eye contact with the criminal. "What happened to Intergang? I guess J'onn got a bad tip" she went on. "It happens" Batman replied, "I'll take that crowbar". The thief's eyes quickly flickered with a sort of arcane mischief. She tossed the crowbar at Batman but it suddenly morphed into a vicious viper midair. Batman quickly tossed it aside. "That trick always went over big in Egypt" the thief cooed. There was a bright flash of yellow light. The seemingly normal thief was gone, now before them stood a green clad woman with dark hair. A sort of mystical aura emanated from her. "Circe!" Wonder Woman cried, "Be careful she's..." Batman cut in, "yeah I know, I've read the Odyssey". The two heroes lept at her. In the ensuing struggle Circe let loose ray after ray of mystical energy. Wonder Woman deflected them with her bracelets, while Batman simply dodged them. As the two closed in around her, out of nowhere a shockwave sent both back. They tumbled to the ground, weakened by the sorceress's vile magic. "I promised to leave your mother alone, little princess, but nobody said anything about you. Rest assured, after I get done with you, Hippolyta won't want you for a daughter, and your pointy-eared boyfriend here won't want you for anything." A strange green flame erupted from her hands as she began to chant another wicked hex. Before either hero could react the spell shot out of her arms and struck Wonder Woman square in the chest. She flew back and hit the brick wall behind her. Batman threw three batarangs at the witch, but just as they were about to hit their mark she disappeared in a puff of smoke. Batman wheeled around on his heels, "Diana are you..." he paused. His jaw dropped. Before him was Wonder Woman, slumped over unconscious but her body was expanding. Her legs stretched out, her torso grew up into the sky. Her mottled shadow quickly spread out over Batman.

112222122.content: Batman had left, and Wonder Woman was left all alone in the city. Below her, tiny civilians gathered around to catch a glimpse of the titanic amazon. She slowly rocked up onto her feet, causing the ground to shake violently. The crowd began to panic and quickly dissipated as Wonder Woman's massive shadow fell over them. She dusted off her legs and surveyed her surroundings. Gotham's buildings looked like little cardboard boxes now. The cars were like toys, and the little people running around her more like bugs. She took a few steps, passing a few blocks. She then knelt down over another nearby building and caught site of the iceberg lounge. Minuscule patrons were exiting into the foggy streets below her. (http://worldsfinestonline.com/WF/jlu/epi...) When they caught site of the towering woman they too fled in terror. "Hmph..." Wonder Woman grunted. It was clear it wasn't a good idea to linger in the city any further. "Diana, are you there? Can you hear me?" J'onn's voice said as Wonder Woman's earpiece crackled to life. "Yeah I'm fine..." she boomed back. "I need to get out of Gotham, people are panicking, and I'm too big, have you found Circe?" There was some static but the Martian's voice finally returned. "Not yet shhhhhh I-shhhh don't go sshhhhh" before it finally cut out. Wonder Woman rolled her eyes and took to the sky. She flew over the city skyline to a clear spot just outside of town near an old suburb. Some unsuspecting pedestrians caught a glimpse of the massive heroine as she soared overhead. When she touched down, the quiet neighborhood lit up. Slowly, dozens of curious onlookers filed out of their homes to discover the source of all the tremors. They stared up in awe as the towering beauty knelt down to address them. "Its ok everyone, I'm not gonna hurt you, return to your homes, I will just be here a little while longer." Her voice echoed out, causing many to clap their hands over their eyes to shield themselves from her pounding voice. The giantess sighed and took a seat. As she leaned back she felt something fragile crumble underneath her hand.

11222212211.content: Though she searched and searched the night sky, Wonder Woman saw no sign of her comrades. Her eyes dropped down to the earth below her. Everything was so tiny compared to her. The houses only came up to her ankles, and the little people looked almost like ants. Aside from a few crater-like footprints and a rather large depression left after she sat down, the little suburb looked relatively peaceful. That is until she caught site of the smoke. A large, billowing cloud of black fumes had started up nearby. Turning around, she saw a house ablaze with bright yellow flames. Around it were piles of debris and smoldering rubble no doubt caused by her destructive movements. Startled, and feeling a bit guilty, Wonder Woman quickly knelt down to see if she could help. With one hand she tore the building's roof off. After tossing it aside she leaned in closer to the fire to see if she could spot anyone trapped inside. Though the smoke wafted up into her face she simply waved it away with one of her gigantic hands. Sure enough, huddled in the center of the burning house was a young man no older than 20. Seeing that he was trapped she quickly reached two of her fingers down and gently pinched them around his body. The adolescent looked up in horror as the giantess lifted him up into the air. His body shook with coughing fits and fearful tremors. Wonder Woman set the boy down in the center of her palm before leveling it with her face. "Are you all right little one? Is anyone else in there?" At first he didn't respond, but after some time he managed to muster up the will the speak, "no, I, they all fled, I was too afraid to come out, then the building caught fire...I...you saved me...I could've died!" he cried out weakly. Wonder Woman gave him a sly smile. "Its ok, you're safe now..."

The beams did not stray either, they remained fixed on her for a while. It would seem someone wanted to get her attention. Diana was a little annoyed by the sudden interruption but felt compelled to see what was going on. She began to drift back down toward the ground. When she finally touched down, flattening a few abandoned cars beneath her boots, she saw that skyscraper was none other than Wayne Tower. Two men, both in black suits waited on top of the roof with several large spotlights. Wonder Woman looked down at them, for the tower only came up to her stomach.
"What is this?" she boomed.

11223.title: TV Lynda Carter version

choices: She reaches down and tears the roof off. (Gentle)
112231.content:
The ground shook vigorously. The sun beat down like with the heat of hellfire. This was it. Along the course rocky slope leading up to the mountain-top facility, jacked stones served as vantage points from which Wonder Woman could glimpse her target. Not six hours earlier Steve Trevor had disappeared in that building whilst investigating for IADC. For weeks they had been monitoring it, mostly because it was the supposed hide-out of long time criminal Dr. Stephen Ingstrom, a brilliant but trouble scientist who had been experimenting with alternative nuclear energy. Just last year he claimed to that he had perfected the blueprints to a new nuclear weapon, that would harness pure radioactive energy which could be focused almost like a laser. The tests were uncertain, and many other scientists claimed it was preposterous. The politicians meanwhile demanded that the plans be destroyed, fearing such weapons would be too devastating and unconventional. The poor doctor went mad and fled the night the US Government ordered his arrest. Now, they had found him. Any second now he was going to release his weapon upon the world, no doubt focused on those who opposed him. Wonder Woman's mission was clear, she would disable the weapon, save agent Trevor, and apprehend Dr. Ingstrom at any cost.

Meanwhile inside the facility...
Dr. Ingstrom was a frail man, with thin layers of greasy hair covering his misshapen head. As he paced about his body shook with anticipation and anger. Not far from where he stood, Agent Trevor sat strapped into a chair, his face bloodied from the beatings delivered by Ingstrom's goons. "Now Mr. Trevor, you and the rest of the world will see the value of my work!" cackled the doctor. Steve shook and tugged at bindings restraining him. "You'll never get away with this Ingstrom, mark my words..." The doctor simply laughed. "Ahh my good man, but I already have..." He flipped a few switches, pulled a dozen levers and a suddenly a large chrome machine whirred to life. Like a telescope its muzzle was pointed out at angle, prepped to release a beam of highly concentrated energy. It began to glow yellow, heralding doom for whoever was unfortunate enough to be in its way.

Outside, Wonder Woman saw the beam charging up from the roof. Knowing that she was too late she quickly flew up to the facilities roof and jumped in front of the beam hoping to prevent any damage it may do to innocent people (http://www.wonderland-site.com/pix/photo...). The energy coursed through her veins and outward into her extreminities. As more radiation pumped into her body she felt her power grow. The strength inside of her began to increase exponentially. It was then she realized it wasn't just her strength but her size too. After a matter of minutes she stood hundreds of feet tall with the facility at her feet like a small shoe box.
112231.title: By a science experiment or nuclear energy

1122312.content: Something fundamental changed in Wonder Woman's head. It was as if everything leading up to this moment was winding up a series of chords in her brain and then all of sudden they just snapped. Looking down at her now massive form she suddenly grew angry. She forgot her earlier mission and lifted up her enormous red boot and held it aloft over the facility below. Then, after a brief moment of complete silence, she brought it down on the roof. A defeaning crash and cloud of dust were sent out as her heel easily crushed everything below it. She brought her foot down again, and again, and again, until nothing but a smoldering pile of rubble remained. Yet, even with the building destroyed she still felt angry. She turned her attention to a small neighborhood in the distance in the shadow of a few lone mountains. With a few lumbering steps she stepped off the small plateau and began heading towards the cluster of houses. In a few massive strides she stood over the tiny suburb, her long shadow casting out over the tiny citizen below causing them to whip up into a panic. Tiny cars whizzed about, whilst little people scurried into their homes. Wonder Woman looked down at them all (http://www.wonderland-site.com/pix/photo...). She lifted her right foot and brought it down on top of the nearest home, flattening it immediately. Tiny screams echoed out from all over. She knelt down. Her hulking form caused the earth to shake violently, causing the ground to crack underneath her. A little red car pulled out of a nearby drive way and tried to speed away. Wonder Woman reached down picked it up with two fingers. The horn blared as she brought it up closer to her face. She could hardly see the tiny people inside, shaking about in terror. She tossed it aside and began to look about further.
1122312.title: She stomps on the building (Hostile)

11223121.content:
What should she see next but a minuscule yellow bus, trying desperately to push past a row of vehicles on the street to her left. She lowered her right hand to stabilize herself, smashing two homes in the process. With her left hand she reached out plucked the bus off the street with two fingers, lifting it up into the air like it was nothing at all. Again she brought closer to her face for a better look. Dozens of horrified scream echoed out from the bus's interior. Wonder Woman's eye caught sight of the helpless victims inside.
"Awww how cute..." she thundered, causing the bus's unfortunate inhabitants to scream even louder. "All you little children in there! What ever shall I do with you?"
Wonder Woman thought for a moment, all the while observing the tiny yellow vehicle held between her fingers. She gave it a little shake, causing her hapless victims to whip up into an even greater frenzy. Their cries will pure terror. Whatever she decided would be their fate. After a while she came up with an idea.
"Well I'm awfully hungry, being this big seems really work up an appetite. So here's what I'll do"
Wonder Woman clenched the other end of the bus with her other hands snapped it in two. Then, she gingerly lifted one half up over her head until it was just above her mouth. She shook gently, allowing all the terrified children to tumble down into her mouth where she swallowed them whole. Once satisfied she tossed the fragment aside and looked down at her remaining victims.
"Hmm, that wasn't very much, I could hardly taste you tiny little morsels. Hmph, well I'm sure I can find a better use for you later." At that she moved second half of the bus toward her chest. She slipped it in between her gargantuan breasts and said: "Now I'll keep the rest of you down there, careful, would want you to get lost now." she concluded with a slight laugh. Satisfied with her conquest she stood back up to her titanic height and looked around once more.
"I can do better than just a little neighborhood, where's that- Ah there we go!" she said cheerfully as she spotted the city on the horizon. With a few careless steps she advanced toward the sprawling metropolis, flattening cars, houses, and people along the way. Only a path of utter carnage and destruction were left in her wake as she moved onward. From a distance the citizen of city grew panicked when the saw the massive woman coming toward them. Their doom was at hand.
