"Great how am I suppose to get up there?" thought Patsy. "Maybe if there was a way to get it knocked onto its side I could get the belt and make myself big again."
She then began to think of a way to get the back onto its side. But she would have luck on her side. She saw someone accidentally knock the back over. It feel in her direction but thankfully she was able to dive out of the way so that she didn't get squashed by it. She was relieved of this.
"Now that my bag's down here I can get the belt."
Patsy then carefully climbed into her bag and she went to the belt. She was happy to see it again and she went to the button that made her large. She tried to push it. But she was way too small to have the strength.
"You've gotta be shitting me," thought Patsy. "After all that and I'm too small to even push the button. This date could get any worse."
Just then she felt the bag get picked up. She didn't know who had done it she just hoped that it would help somehow.

Who has picked up her bag?
11411121212121.title: Way too small

114111212121212.content:
Her bag had been stolen by a thief who thought that he could get some money out of it. He didn’t know there was a tiny sized Patsy in there. He wanted to just get anything valuable and just throw the bag away.
Inside the bag Patsy was still trying to push the button. But she was using everything she had to push it but she was still too weak. She would need another miracle to help her right now.
The Thief then tipped the bag up and this made the belt fall onto her and luckily it was on the button that made her bigger. It pressed onto her and she felt herself getting bigger.
Patsy stopped growing at about 4 inches but that was a giant leap for her. She saw that the Thief had stolen her bag. She began to think of a fun way to get revenge on him.
She was now big enough to push the buttons without any help. But she was still too small to push them both together.
“Maybe this guy wants to see just how much of a big girl I really am,” said Patsy to herself. “This should be fun.”
She then pressed the button again and she began to grow. She smiled with every inch that she grew.
"Here I come."
114111212121212.title: A thief

1141112121212121.content:
The Thief noticed that the bag was getting heavier. He tried to put it out of his mind until he saw a naked Patsy come out. This scared him as she reached normal size. He looked at her in horror.
“It’s not nice stealing purses,” said Patsy. “Especially mine. She then kicked him in the face and this knocked him out. She saw an old piece of cloth on the ground. It was dry and she picked it up and wrapped it around her body. It acted like a toga and it seemed to fit nicely on her body. “That’s him out of the way. But I need to get some decent clothes on before I go back to the restaurant.”
Patsy then walked back to her apartment. She unlocked the door with her keys and she went to put some clothes on. She remembered to put her costume in her bag in case of anything. But she didn’t think anything would happen. She had to be more careful when going into her bag. She didn’t want to accidentally activate the belt again and become tiny. Or she might become a giant.
She calmly got a taxi to the restaurant but when she got there she saw that it was empty. She went inside and picked up the clothes that she had shrunk out of about half an hour ago. It seemed like a ghost town.
“I wonder where everyone’s gone,” she thought. “Well I can’t find out but my alter ego can.” She then went down an alley and got changed into Hellcat.

Is it really trouble?
1141112121212121.title: Normal size?

11411121212121211.content:
Hellcat began to look around for anything. When she went into the restaurant she didn't find any visible clues. So she had to resort to shrinking to find any evidence. She was lucky to find something on the floor. Normally it would have been invisible to the naked eye. But she was able to see it as plain as day.
Hellcat picked it up and started to look at it. It seemed to be some sort of charcoal and she was a little curious with it's reason for being there.
"What is this doing here?" she thought. "Hopefully it's a clue to where everyone's gone. I hope they're alright."
She then pressed both buttons on her belt and she grew back to her normal size. But when she did she noticed something on the wall. It was definitely new since it hadn't been there when she looked last.
She walked towards it and began to read what is said. But it was in some sort of foreign language. She wrote it down so that she could translate it later.
"I need to get back to my apartment," she thought. "I can go on the internet and translate this little sentence."
Hellcat then walked outside and went to signal a taxi. But then she smiled and looked at her belt.
11411121212121211.title: Searching for Clues

114111212121212111.content:
"This thing can save me some money instead of getting a taxi," thought Hellcat. She pressed the right button and she watched the world around her shrink. She climbed up higher and when she took her finger off the button she was 60 feet tall. This was twice as big as she ever had gotten before. "Wow I'm huge. Now I know how Yellowjacket feels when he grows. I wonder how big this thing can make me."
But she knew that she didn't have time to stand and ponder. She had to go and study this clue that she had found. She had to be careful where she was putting her foot. It was busy and spaces to put her feet were few and far between. But eventually she got to her apartment. But she had attracted a lot of attention and people had followed her around.
Hellcat had to resort to shrinking so small that no one could see her. She did this and everyone wondered how she did it.
But in the cracks of the pavement Hellcat was there and she was safe from anyone trying to get to her. She gave out a sigh.
"I'll probably be seeing that on the front page of the Bugle tomorrow."
When everyone was gone she pressed both buttons and she grew back up to her normal size.
"Now to see what this is."

Is it important?
114111212121212111.title: Getting to the apartment

1141112121212121111.content:
Hellcat was getting all different kinds of results from the sample she had got. This interested her a little. She put it through on her computer and she checked the only other place where this could be found. It was in the New York Zoo.
"Looks like I've got a lead," said Hellcat. "Who ever is taken all of those people is definitely there." She then tried to think of a plan to get inside. "I can't go in super-sized or else I'll get noticed almost instantly. Looks like Tiny Hellcat's going to come into play again."
Hellcat then took her costume off and she put some regular clothes on. She put her costume and size changing belt in her bag and she went outside and she signaled a taxi. one eventually came to her and she got in.
"Where to?" asked the Driver.
"Take me a block away from the Zoo," replied patsy.
"Yes ma'am."
The driver then began to drive towards the zoo. She eventually got there and she paid the driver. She then went into an alley and got changed into her Hellcat costume. She walked close to the entrance and she shrank to a few inches tall so that she could get in undetected.
1141112121212121111.title: The Zoo

11411121212121211111.content:
Everything looked gigantic from Hellcat's point of view. But she could have fun later. Now she had to get through undetected. But before she started she saw two men carrying a large box. She quickly hid herself behind a bush before they saw her. She could hear them talking about something but she couldn't tell what.
Hellcat also figured that whatever was happening here they had some part to it. Before they walked away she shrank herself even more and hitched a ride. Thankfully no one had noticed her get on. But now her height was in millimetres so she could barely be seen. But she could still see everything around her.
Eventually they went to this underground part of the zoo. Hellcat could still see everything. There were some cages and beds with unconscious people on them. She recognised one of them as the man she went on her date with.
"Have you got it?" said a Voice.
"Yeah we got it," replied the Man who Hellcat had hitched a ride from. "But what do you need it for?"
"That's none of your business. Here's the money now leave."
"Yeah whatever."
Hellcat realised that he was about to leave so she jumped off onto the ground.

What does she do now?
11411121212121211111.title: Inside

114111212121212111111.content:
Hellcat considered trying to free the hostages. But to do that would reveal her location. For now it would be a bad idea since she didn’t know exactly what she was going up against.
She just followed the person she saw talking to the Delivery guy. This person was a woman and Hellcat had to run to keep up with her. But thanks to her size she wasn’t making any noise.
Eventually the woman put the box on a table. Hellcat had to use the grapple hook in her suit to get up to the top of the table without needed to change size. The box seemed to contain some chemicals. What kind of chemicals was anyone’s guess. But they were sure going to be bad news.
“Great they’re all here,” said the Woman. “The plan is almost ready.” Just then a distorted voice came onto the radio. “The Master.
“Is everything here?” asked the Master.
“Yes everything is here.”
“How many test subjects are there?”
“We have enough sir.”
“Excellent.”
114111212121212111111.title: Chemicals

1141112121212121111111.content:
Hellcat to listen into the conversation. She became more and more convinced that the hostages needed to be set free. She saw a control panel on the other side of the room which controlled what happened in the cells.
"I need to get over there," thought Hellcat. "But at this size it'll take me a while. But I dare not make myself any bigger until the time is right."
She then carefully climbed down the table leg and onto the bottom of the floor. She then ran as fast as she could towards the control panel. But when she got there she saw that it was connected to wall and there was no way she would be able to climb up it. The only option she had was to make herself bigger.
Hellcat then checked to see whether the coast was clear ad then she pressed the right button and she began to grow. She didn't grow up to normal size, just tall enough to reach the control panels. This was roughly about 3 feet tall.
She then pushed the release button and all of the cell doors opened. Everyone ran out as fast as they could. Some guards tried to stop them but they were overwhelmed by the sheer number of prisoners.
Hellcat quickly shrank back down so not to be detected. But her first objective was complete. Now she just had to find out who was behind all of this.

Does she get captured?
1141112121212121111111.title: Freeing the Prisoners

11411121212121211111111.content:
Hellcat was just about run away until she was picked p by one of the guards. At first she thought about making herself normal or even super sized. But if she was captured it could be to her advantage.
"What are you doing?" asked the Guard.
"What does it look like?" replied Hellcat.
"You're going to get it for this."
The Guard took her away just like she wanted. This meant that she would be able to get to their leader without even looking for her. But she was eventually put into a test tube so that she couldn't escape. She could easily but she decided not to for now.
Eventually the woman she had seen earlier came in. She wasn't too happy and she picked up the test tube with Hellcat in it. She brought it up to eye level.
"You really know how to piss me off don't you," said the Woman.
"Just call it a talent," replied Hellcat.
"I wouldn't make a joke of it if I was you. You're tiny and I could crush you like the bug you are."
"Are you going to do anything or are you just going to talk?"
"You will die for what you've done."
11411121212121211111111.title: Captured

114111212121212111111111.content:
"Before you kill me I just want to show you something," said Hellcat. "You see this new belt if I push this button I shrink." She then pressed it and she shrank slightly. "But you should really see what happens when I push this button. She then pushed the right button and she began to grow rapidly. She exploded out of the test tube and landed on the ground. She continued to grow while she had her finger on the right button. She stopped when her head hit the ceiling at Ten feet tall. She grabbed the woman around the neck and she brought her up to her level. "Who's the small one now?"
"Please don't hurt me," begged the Woman.
"Why shouldn't I you were about to hurt me and all of those other people. Give me one good reason."
"I have the information you want."
"Tell me or else I'll destroy everything you've worked for and don't try anything because believe me I can get a lot bigger then this."
"Ok my name is Doctor Pam Westcroft."
"What are you doing here?"
"I have orders to perfect the new batch of Super soldier serum."
"The serum that create Captain America?"

What happens next?
114111212121212111111111.title: Questioning

1141112121212121111111112.content:
“Yes that one,” said Doctor Westcroft.
“Who do you work for?” replied Hellcat. Pam said nothing. “Don’t make me have to repeat myself.”
“FREEZE!” shouted a voice.
Hellcat then looked and she saw several heavily armed men. She dropped Pam and looked at them.
“She’s a size changer!” shouted Doctor Westcroft. “Take the belt away from her and she’s powerless.”
Hellcat knew that if they were unarmed she would have been able them all out easily. But they were armed and they would have shot her before she had time to push any of the buttons. For now she had to admit defeat.
One of the soldiers went behind her and took her belt off her. She was now stuck at this size. The belt was given to Doctor Westcroft. She smiled at it.
“We could use this,” said Doctor Westcroft. “Take her to the cells. I think we just found our next test subject.”
The soldiers then took her away to the cells. She tried to find an opening but she couldn’t see one that wouldn’t get her killed.
1141112121212121111111112.title: Hellcat is Prisoner

11411121212121211111111121.content:
Hellcat was put in a cell where the ceiling was way too low for her. It was seven feet high and she was over ten foot. She could only sit down in there and wait for her captors to make the next move.
She kept a watchful eye on what was happening around her. She saw the guard with the keys. But she had no way of getting to him. The bars were electrified so she couldn't touch them without gewtting herself killed and that wouldn't help things.
"I need to get out of here but how?" thought hellcat. "If I do get out I'm too big to simply sneak out and they would just shoot me. I'll have to go when the time is right."
She sat and waited. But eventually a guard came to the bars. He was followed by three armed guards so if she tried anything she would almost instantly be shot and killed.
"Come on," said the Guard.
"Where are you taking me this time?" replied Hellcat. "The moon maybe?"
"No somewhere more down to Earth."
She then stood up as much as she could and she followed the guards. The armed guards didn't take their eyes off her. Not only to make sure she didn't escape but also because they were attracted to her.
"Men," she said to herself.

Where is she being taken to?
11411121212121211111111121.title: The Moon?

114111212121212111111111212.content:
Hellcat was taken to a very large room. She saw all kinds of needles and beds. He guessed that she was where they would perform tests on poor people and animals. This sickened her deeply.
But she was forced to lie on one of these beds. It was way too small for her but she got strapped down. She used all of her strength to try and break free but it was nothing. But then she saw a scientist coming up t her with a serum in his hand.
“Welcome Hellcat,” he said. “Since you released all of our test subjects we saw you as a perfect replacement.”
“If you’re going to do it make it quick. I can’t stand slow injections.”
“I must say there’s a high chance that this might kill you. But that’s what superheroes are there for. To be killed.”
He then stuck the syringe into Hellcat’s arm and she could feel it taking effect. She felt like her muscles were trying to pop out of her skin. Everyone backed away as they heard the mini giantess in pain. But then they saw her rip out of the restraints.
He muscles added some texture and it looked like she did working out most of the time. They weren’t over the top huge. Just that it looked like she was very fit.
She stood up and she had gained a good foot and she was pissed off to the max.
114111212121212111111111212.title: Injection

choices: More guards come with bigger guns
Hellcat Makes her way to the lab
1141112121212121111111112121.content:
Hellcat began to walk towards them. The scientists told the soldiers to fire at her. But the bullets simply bounced off her new body. She gave them an evil smile.
"Thanks to you I'm bulletproof," said Hellcat. But neo you're going to see what a pissed of Hellcat can do."
She then picked them up as if they were nothing and she threw them to one side. This caused them serious injury but it didn't kill them.
She thought about getting pout. But she needed the belt back. Without it she wouldn't be able to return to her normal size. But she didn't have any idea where it was. But she saw that one of the guards were still conscious. She picked him up and pinned him to the wall.
"Where's my belt?" asked Hellcat.
"In your drawer?" replied the Guard.
"I'm not in the mood for jokes." She then banged him on the wall again. "Tell me."
"It was taken up to the main lab to see if they could recreate it. Please let me go I just became a Dad."
"Then I hope your child doesn't grow up to be anything like you!"
She then knocked him unconscious.

What happens?
1141112121212121111111112121.title: Enhanced

11411121212121211111111121212.content:
Hellcat started to go towards the main lab. She knew that more guards would be here soon and equipped with explosives. She knew that she was bulletproof but not grenade proof.
She heard all the alarms go off and this told her that everyone knew she had escaped. She knew that she didn't have much time before the belt would leave the building.
She eventually saw a single guard but she knocked him out before he could react. He was standing in front of a sign that pointed to where the lab was.
Hellcat went up the stairs. This was difficult for her at her height but she was still able to do it. But when she got onto the top she saw Doctor Westcroft just packing her things away. She stared at Hellcat in fear.
"I think you have something that belongs to me," aid Hellcat.
"Please don't hurt me," replied Doctor Westcroft. "Look at yourself because of me you're stronger then ever."
"But you're still a crook and you were willing to sacrifice countless lives to get what you wanted."
"Please I was just following orders."
"Not an excuse."
11411121212121211111111121212.title: Way to the lab

choices: Hellcat shows what happens when you piss her off
114111212121212111111111212121.content:
Hellcat then saw her belt on the table. It was still big enough to fit her. She put Professor Westcroft on the ground and she walked over to it. She put it back on and she looked at the good Doctor.
"Please I'm begging you," said professor Westcroft.
"You're lucky," replied hellcat. "I'm giving all of your men a 30 second head start. but then I'm bringing the house down."
Professor Westcroft then got up and ran. But when the 30 seconds were up Hellcat pressed the button on the right side of the belt. This caused her to grow. But her head was already pressing against the ceiling. But she kept going.
Professor Westcroft and the soldiers were outside trying to make their getaway. But then they felt the ground shaking violently. It began to crack.
"What's going on?" asked a Soldier.
"Oh my God," replied Professor Westcroft.
Just then they saw Hellcat's head come out of the ground. She was huge and she was still growing. The complex was completely destroyed as hellcat grew even bigger. She stared down at the soldiers.
"What are you ants looking at?" she asked.

What happens?
114111212121212111111111212121.title: Bursting out

1141112121212121111111112121211.content:
The soldiers looked at Hellcat in fear. They began to run away but then the zoo was surrounded by police vehicles. Hellcat slowly got out of the destroyed complex and she stood at her full height. She was easily 400 feet tall. This was the biggest she had ever gotten.
The Police soon arrested the guards and Professor Westcroft. Not needing to be big anymore hellcat pushed both buttons and she shrank. But she stopped at over 6 feet tall. She figured that the serum had also boosted her natural height. She pressed the left button until she was back down to her normal size.
She saw the police combing the area so she stayed out of sight. She didn't shrink herself unless she really needed to. But people were a little suspicious with how a 400 foot tall woman wearing blue and yellow tights simply disappear.
But when Hellcat got to a private area away from the zoo she took her costume off and she put her normal clothes back on. She walked out of the alley and she signaled a taxi to take her back home.
When she got there Patsy went inside and lay on her bed. So many things had happened in one night. She was given new powers, had to stop an evil organization and she was nearly stolen.
1141112121212121111111112121211.title: What's done is done

11411121212121211111111121212111.content:
Over the next few weeks Hellcat became the city’s new super sized superheroine. No crime was too big or too small. She used her size changing belt to great effect. But the new super soldier enhancements made her almost invulnerable.
But she was balancing her social life with her hero life. Thankfully the belt made her normal height instead of being a little over 6 feet due to the super soldier serum enhancing her natural height.
One day Patsy was just in the bank. She was making a small withdrawal from her account. But then heard the doors slam open and a few armed men came into bank. They fired their guns into the air.
“This is a stick up!” shouted One of the armed men. “Everyone get on the ground now!” Everyone got to the ground. “Stay there and no one gets hurt.”
Patsy was able to get into a blind spot where no one could see her. She got changed into her Hellcat costume and then used the belt to shrink in size.
“Now that’s one problem down,” said Hellcat. Now lets finish this.”
She then went towards one of the thieves. She made sure to grow at the right time to catch them off guard. She grew up to about ten feet and she attacked with speed and grace to take them all out before they could react.

Are they down and out?
11411121212121211111111121212111.title: Weeks

114111212121212111111111212121111.content:
The thieves were down and out. They werne't moving but they were still breathing. Although Hellcat was a bad ass she didn't like killing people no matter who they've harmed. She then saw the press come towards the door.
"Here's my cue to disappear," she said.
She then shrank so small that no one could see her. She then began to run towards the spot where she was before. She took off her costume and put her normal cothes back on. She pretended to be in fear when the media came to her. A reporter went to her and began to help her up.
"Are they gone?" she asked.
"Don't worry you're safe now," replied the Reporter.
She gave them an interview of what she saw happen. She pretended to be in shock and they even aired it on the news that evening. She sat down at home and watched it. She giggled a little at herself.
"Who would have thought i would be such a great actress," she said. "If I wasn't a heroine then I'd porbably go to Hollywood."
She then saw something on the news that caught her eye. It was something that was unusual.
114111212121212111111111212121111.title: Out

1141112121212121111111112121211111.content:
"We have reports of people claiming to see strange lights in the sky," said a reporter. "A dozen different people from a twenty mile radious have claimed to have seen these lights. Most people think of them as simply bright stars. But these people think otherwise."
Patsy then switched off the Tv and went to her fridge. Unfortunately she didn't have much food left becuase she was doing her food shopping the next day. But she did find herself a candy bar.
"This won't fill me up," saiud Patsy. "But i know one way that you will." She then got her size changing belt and she shrunk herself out of her clothes. She stopped at an inch and she saw the huge candy bar. "Now this is better."
She then began to eat the candy bar. She knew that it wouldn't do her thighs any good but she thought she could treat herself for once. It was delicious and she thought about making herself even smaller so that it could last even longer.
Butthen she heard the doorbell ring. She stopped eating the candy bar and she used the belt to make her normal size again. Then she put on her clothes and went to the door. She saw that it was a mailman.
"Package for a Miss Patsy Walker," he said.
"That's me."

What is it?
1141112121212121111111112121211111.title: Big candy bar

11411121212121211111111121212111111.content:
Patsy then sighned for it and the mailman left. She wondered what it was because she ahdn't ordered anything. She put it on the table and she sat down. It was a square package and she opened it.
She was surprised to see that it was some kind of strange box with writing all over it. She didn't know who it was off and she sure what to do next.
"What the hell is this?" she asked herself. She tried to open it but she didn't seem to have the strength. "This is a tough nut to crack."
In the end she had to use her size changing belt to increase her size. She could only grow up to 15 feet so that she didn't burst out of the apartment. But she still tried with all of her strength to open it. But it still wouldn't work.
"Crap I still can't open it."
She then reduced her size back to normal. But she looked at the writing on the box. At first she thought it was chinese. But when she looked at it a little closer she could tell that it wasn't chinese.
A few minutes later Patsy went to her computer and began to research the language on the box. She was having a hard time finding out what it was. But then she found the language on the net.
11411121212121211111111121212111111.title: Box

114111212121212111111111212121111111.content:
Patsy found out that it was Hebrew. She still didn’t have any idea what it said but she knew someone who did. There was a friend of hers that lived a few doors down from her. He was a Rabi and he would surely be able to open it.
A little later she went to his house. She knocked on the door and he came. He was happy to see her.
“Patsy so nice of you to come,” he said.
“Hello Rabi,” replied Patsy.
“What can I do for you?”
“There’s something I need you to translate for me.”
A minute later we see the pair in the study. The Rabi was looking at the writings on the box. He was curious.
“Where did you get this?” asked the Rabi.
“It came through the mail,” replied Patsy.
“Who was it from?”
“I don’t know there was no return address or anything. What does it say?”
“It says open me and everything will be granted.”
“I’ve tried to open it. But it’s impossible.”

How do they open it?
114111212121212111111111212121111111.title: Rabi

1141112121212121111111112121211111112.content:
“Maybe there’s another way,” said the Rabi.
“What do you mean?” replied Patsy.
“Maybe if I said the writing out loud.” He began to clear his voice. “Open me and everything will be granted.” They waited for a moment but nothing seemed to happen. “Ok that didn’t work.”
“Try saying it in Hebrew.”
“Well it’s the best idea so far.”
He said it again but this time in Hebrew. This time the box began to shake a little. The pair took a step back from it and they waited for anything to happen. They saw it open and they slowly walked forward.
“Is that it?” asked Patsy.
“Looks like it,” replied the Rabi.
They took a few more steps and they looked inside. They were surprised with what they could see.
“What is it?” asked the Rabi.
“Looks like a doll,” replied Patsy.
She then picked it out.
1141112121212121111111112121211111112.title: Open

11411121212121211111111121212111111121.content:
She then looked at the doll and she was a little suspicious of it. But then she felt a weird feeling throughout her body. She then went into a blurr and the next thing she knew she could see herself but she looked huge.
Also Patsy couldn't move and she saw what seemed to be a doll's leg. She guessed that her mind had been transferred into the doll. But that meant that someone was now in control of her body.
The Rabi hadn't noticed what had happened to patsy. He just thought that she was just looking at the doll. But he tried to snap her out of it.
"Are you alright?" asked the Rabi.
It took a few seconds for her to respond. "Yeah I'm fine," she replied. She seemed to have a strange new accent.
"I've never heard you talk that way before."
"Well it's something new." She then put the doll back into the box. "I must go now."
"Do you want a drink before you go."
"No thank you."
"Suit yourself."
Then she left and the Rabi was surprised that she left the box.

What does he do with it?
11411121212121211111111121212111111121.title: Continue

114111212121212111111111212121111111212.content:
The Rabi figured that Patsy would eventually remember that she had forgotten her box and come back. So he just put it on the table and he sat down and waited for her.
But outside the being that was in control of Patsy's body was jumping around in excitement. This was something that patsy would probably never do.
"I'm free," she said. "I'm free." She then saw a puddle and she looked at herself. "I'm in a beautiful body. I can't believe that I'm actually free."
She then looked into the purse of patsy. There she was amzed to see the Hellcat costume and the size changing belt. She picked it out and took a look out them.
"I wonder what these are."
She then went into an alley and she got changed into the costume and she put the belt on. She felt a little funny wearing them.
"This girl msut have been insane. Who would walk around in clothes like these? Could drive a person insane." She then looked at the belt. "I wonder what this does."
She then pressed the button on ehr left and she shrank rapidly. Within seconds she couldn't see the sky anymore. But when she took her finger off the button she saw a lot of microbes around her.
"What are these?"
114111212121212111111111212121111111212.title: Hijacked

1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.content:
She then began to see some of them begin to get closer to her. She began to panic a little.
"This thing made me shrink," she said. "Now let's see if I can grow?"
She then pushed the right button and she shot up. She went out of trange from the microbes in seconds and she kept going up and up and up. She reached normal size in seconds but she went beyond it. When she finally took her finger off the button she was head and shoulders taller then the buildings around her.
"I'm gigantic," she said. "This is the most powerful body on the planet." She then thoguht a little. "Do I become Alsi the Destroyer or Alsi the Protector." Hmm decisions decisions." She then sat down on a smaller building. "I wonder how big this thing can make me."
She stood up again and pushed the right button. She then shot up again. She increased her size ten fold and sh took her finger off the button again.
"Now I'm even bigger. This is fun."
She also decided which was more fun. Being a destroyer or protector. She stomped on an abandoned building. But she also saved someone from falling to a horrible death. She found that both were intesting.
"This is a predicament."

What does she choose?
1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.title: Decisions

1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.content:
But before she could make her decision she then heard something in the air. She looked over and saw a building was on fire. She acted almost immediately and she ran towards it. She crushed a few parked cars but thankfully they had superhero insurance.
When she reached it she heard a few people screaming in terror. She then put her hand in the building and she grabbed as many as she could.
“Come on Alsi you can do it,” she thought. “You can be the protector for now.”
She then put the people she found on the ground. They were attended to by the paramedics.
But then a huge flame came at Hellcat. She was able to get out of the way but she felt the intense heat. This burned her a little. But it was nothing her body couldn’t cope with. She just went looking for survivors.
“There’s gotta be more in here I’m sure of it.”
But then part of the building began to collapse. She saw people in the way so she grabbed the falling debris before it hit them.
“Get out of here.”
As they ran she felt another piece of debris hit her head and she fell down onto the ground. But soon the entire building fell onto her.
1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.title: Fire

1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.content:
Meanwhile the Rabi thought that Patsy wasn’t coming back. So he got up and went to where she lived. He knocked the door and waited for her to answer. But he was a little surprised to get no answer.
“Guess she’s not home,” he thought to himself. He then began to write a note and he put it on the door. “She’ll read this when she gets back.”
He then went back to his house and he put on the TV. There was a news report about Hellcat’s rescue. But no there were scenes of her unconscious. He was extremely interested in report.
“Witnesses say that Hellcat came out of almost nowhere and she saved the people in the building,” said The Reporter. “Unfortunately she couldn’t save herself and the building has fallen directly onto her. She is receiving medical attention as we speak. Back to you Tom.”
The Rabi thought he recognised Hellcat. But he just put it into the back of his mind. He was having to conduct a wedding soon and he still had some preparation. He was going to be busy for a while.
“Well hopefully Patsy will be back soon.”
He then continued to prepare himself.

What happens to Hellcat’s body?
1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.title: Note

1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.content:
It took a few minutes for Hellcat to wake up from the rubble. She slowly picked herself up onto her feet and several reporters were trying to get an interview from her. But she didn't understand what was happening.
Back at the Rabbi’s house he was just preparing for the wedding. But then he heard the box begin to bang. He went over to it and he heard someone screaming for help. He cautiously went over to it and he opened it to his amazement he saw the doll in there except she was walking and talking.
"What are you?" he asked.
"Please don't be scared," replied Patsy. "It's me Patsy."
"W-what happened to you?"
"Seems that when I touched this doll it somehow transferred my mind into this body. But another mind went into mine."
"Let me help you out."
"Don't touch me." She then backed away from his hand. "If you touch me then your mind will come to this doll and I would be in your body."
"Thanks for the warning."
"Has Hellcat been doing anything?"
1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.title: Walking doll

1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.content:
"Why would you want to know about that?" asked the Rabi.
"I'm just wondering," replied Patsy.
"Well she just saved a loud of people from a burning building."
"I really need to ask you a huge favour. But you must keep a secret."
"Is it a terrible secret?"
"Not in particular but a very important one."
"What's that?"
"I'm Hellcat."
"What? Are you serious?"
"Yes I am Hellcat. Former members of both the Defenders and the Avengers. As you can see recently I got myself a size changing belt."
"Ok let me ask you one question. Who else has been in the Defenders besides you?" He didn't think she'd get this one.
"Hulk, Beast, Valkyrie, Iceman, Angel, Doctor Strang and there's been others." She saw the Rabi Gobsmacked. "Is that alright?"
"Yeah that's what I needed to know."
"Will you help me?"

Will he?
1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.title: Secret revealed

1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.content:
"Ok I'll help," said the Rabi. "But what do I do?"
"You have to get me to my body," replied Patsy. "Get me there in the box so I don't accidentally swap bodies with you."
"Anything you say."
"Any idea where my body is?"
"Well right now it's as tall as a building. Shouldn't be too hard to find."
"Good because all I want is my old body back."
The Rabi then got into his car with the box and he drove away from his house. he put on the radio to see if he could find any sign of Patsy's body. But after several mintues there was nothing.
"She's gone," said the Rabi.
"I don't think so," replied Patsy. "She must have shrunk down somewhere." But just then she began to feel the boxs shake. Then the entire car shook. "What the hell is that?" They then see a giant foot come down just in front of the car. "We've found her."
"But she's still on the move."
"Then follow her."
"As you wish."
1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.title: Search

1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.content:
The Rabi began to follow the giant sized Hellcat. But she was making good ground. Each step was taking her further and further away from the car. Patsy was panicking but she noticed something else. She was struggling to move a little. She figured that in a matter of hours she would be as still and lifeless as a real doll.
“Hurry I don’t know how much longer I have left,” said Patsy.
“This is very difficult,” replied the Rabi. “I’m already going over the speed limit. I hope there aren’t any police around.”
“The last thing we want is to be pulled over.” Just then they began to hear sirens behind them. At first they thought it was a police car. But instead it was an ambulance. They gave out a sigh of relief.
“That was a close one.”
“My body is getting away.”
“Not for long.”
He then put his foot on the pedal and they went faster. But that was when Hellcat noticed that she was being followed.
“What do they want?” she asked. But she just turned around and she picked up some fast speed.

What happens?
1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.title: There she is

1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.content:
The car was too slow to catch up with Hellcat. She easily got away and Patsy screamed in frustration. The Rabi was also frustrated. He was hoping that he would be able to get Patsy back into her body before the wedding. But then he had to turn around. This confused Patsy.
“Where are you going?” asked Patsy.
“I need to go and do the wedding,” replied the Rabi.
“But what about my body?”
“Right now she hasn’t killed anyone. She’s saved people. She’s not an immediate danger. But I’ll get you back to her when the wedding is finished.”
“By then I’ll be like a doll.”
“Don’t worry I’ll keep my word.”
They soon got to where the wedding was being held. It was at a house with a very large garden. There were many chairs that were for the guests.
“Right on time,” he said.
Patsy was still in her box and she sat in there. She wasn’t too happy but the wedding wouldn’t really take that long.
“I hate being a doll,” she said.
1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.title: Lost her

1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.content:
But as time went on Patsy felt her body becoming stiffer and stiffer. She was barely moving and she was having problems talking. Someone even knocked her box and she fell over. But she had gotten to the stage where she couldn't get herself back up. She shed a tear and just lay there waiting for the Rabi to come.
Meanwhile not too far away hellcat had shrunk herself abck to normal size. She was still having a bit of a high after being gigantic and helping people.
"That was great," she said to herself. "I wonder what else this body can do." She then outstretched her arm and a rope shot out from the suit. "Wow I have a rope." She then looked at her hands. The gloves gave her some claws. "And I have claws. This body is a jackpot."
But then she saw a movie poster. She was a little unsure what it meant but she just looked at it.
"What the heck is a movie?" she thought to herself.
She saw that she seemed to be outside a cinema or something liek that. She was still clueless to what was going on around her. She saw people were queing up to go inside and watch a film.
"A ine?"

Who do we stay with?
1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.title: Movies

1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.content:
Meanwhile the wedding had just finished and Patsy was still in her box. She was unable to move and she was just waiting for the Rabi to return. Thankfully he was in there for too long. He came back out to her and he opened the box.
"Patsy are you alright?" asked the Rabi.
"I'm fine except I can't move," replied Patsy."
"Let me help you up."
"Don't touch me. Remember what happens?"
"Oh yeah."
He then rocked the box until it made Patsy sit up ont the side. "Thanks for that."
"You're welcome but where coudl your body be?"
"I don't know."
"It could be anywhere. I've looked on news reports and she's not in them."
"Must mean she's either shrunk to normal size or shrunk below that."
"How small can that belt make you?"
"I'm not sure but I think the possiblilities were endless. I think the belt could have made some subatomic."
"Oh my."
1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.title: Where is she?

1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.content:
"If she shrinks to that size I'll never get my body back," said Patsy.
"I doubt she will," replied the Rabi. "What would be the point?"
"I don't know. She's spent time being big. Maybe she wants to know what it's like being really small."
"I'll keep an ear out for any news reports."
"Thanks." But in an hour I don't think I'll even be able to talk."
"Let's hope it doesn't get that far."
But meawhile Hellcat was just coming out of the cinema. She had never seen a moving image like that before and she was marvelling over it. She was jumping in excitement. Some people were even passing by her.
"It's like she's never seen a movie before," said one guy.
"That's superheroes for you," replied another guy.
But Hellcat ignored them. She was still jumping around in excitement. She was on some kind of high.
"That ws amazing. I want to do it again."
But whne she tried to go abck in the movies were just closing for a while. This disappointed her.

What does she do?
1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.title: Just like the movies

1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.content:
Although Hellcat wasn’t too happy about not being in the movies she just walked away. She just walked along the streets and she saw the Rabbi’s car go past. Patsy was inside and she had seen her.
“There she was,” said Patsy.
“What?” replied the Rabi.
“She was just there. Turn the car around.”
“Ok.”
He then turned the car around and he soon saw Hellcat. He pulled car right in front of her. She was in a state of panic.
“You,” said Hellcat.
Just then the Rabi picked up the box and threw the doll at her. She screamed out and something happened. But at the end of it all Hellcat just stood there.
“Is it you under there?” asked the Rabi.
“Yeah it’s me,” replied Patsy. “But now what do we do with this trouble maker?”
“Please don’t hurt me?” replied the Doll.
“Why not you took my body?”
“I didn’t mean to do it?”
1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.title: Found her

1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.content:
“I was trapped in that body for centuries,” said the Doll.
“That’s not my problem,” replied Patsy.
“But it was torture in there. Please I didn’t mean any harm. I just wanted to move about like a normal person.”
Patsy couldn’t help but sympathise her. She didn’t hold her but she put the box right next to her.
“I know what it’s like to be in there,” said Patsy. “But I know someone who can help you. He’s a friend of mine.”
“Will he cure me?”
“I believe he can in a sense.”
“Thank you.”
A few minutes later we see Patsy at the lab of Reed Richards. He was going through a few things and he was a little suspicious about the doll.
“So you’re telling me she’s alive?” asked Reed.
“Yes,” replied Patsy.
“And you want me to do what?”
“Give her a body.”

Will he?
1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.title: Reed Richards

1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.content:
"Well the best I can do is a robot body," said Reed. "I could create a carbon based body but that would just be unethical."
"Ok," replied Hellcat. "But don't touch her. If you do your mind will be transfered into the doll and she would have your body."
"Thanks for the warning."
"Did you have any robot bodies left?"
"I think I have a few left. But when her mind is transfered into the robot body I can add my own compound around her body that has the same properties as human flesh."
"Meaning I can make her loo human."
"That's great."
Reed then found out the best body. It was average szie and there was no weapons on it. He just put it into a chamber. Hellcat brought the box to where the Doll had to be placed. Thankfully the doll walked out and went to where she was suppose to be.
"Are you ready for this?" asked Hellcat.
"Yeah I'm ready," replied the Doll.
"Time to get you a new body."
Then the machine started up.
1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.title: Spare parts

1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.content:
The machine became very loud. Hellcat was a little unsure what to do. But the light coming from the machine was blinding. She covered her eyes so not to go blind. But it was pretty hard to do.
But a minute later the machine went down. She saw the a robot figure walk out of the chamber. She looked at it and went up to it.
"Is that you in there?" she asked.
"This body feels a little weird," replied the Robot.
"Great it worked."
"I can move and everything. And I don't have to feel guilty about taking some one elses body."
Then Reed went up to them. He was happy to see tht the proceedure had been a success.
"Looks like I was right," said Reed.
"I can alk around in the street now?" replied the Robot.
"Not quite you can't go walking around like that. I'll have something that'll help you. It'll make you look human."
"Thank you."

Will it work?
1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.title: Success

1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.content:
Over the next few minutes Reed covered the robot with a layer of the compound. It took a few minutes to set. But it looked like she was naked. She had all the appropriate features. But Reed was a gentleman and he gave her some of Sue's old clothes. They were roughly the same size.
But Reed gave her hair, eyes, lips and little characteristics. He chose to make her a brunnette.
When everything was finished both he and Hellcat took a long look at her. She looked human.
"So how do I look?" asked the Robot.
"You look human," replied Hellcat.
"Great but I need a name first."
"Did you have any in mind?"
"Well I did like the name Alice."
"Then that's what we'll call you Alice."
"This is too good to be true. I'm cured and no one else has to suffer. Too bad I'm a robot now."
"Well it was better then being that doll."
1141112121212121111111112121211111112121.title: Looks human

choices: The pair are able to tackle the crooks
11421.content:
It was an average day for Barbara Gordon aka Batgirl. She was still in college and she was doing well in her course. She had been out with Batman regularly fighting crime. She thought things were looking up for her.
One night Batman and Batgirl reported to trouble at a research lab near the Gotham Docks. They looked at it from a building. But from what they could see nothing seemed to be happening.
“You think it’s another dead-end?” asked Batgirl.
“I doubt it,” replied Batman.
“Come on there’s nothing happening.”
Just then they heard a glass shattering. Then there was a small explosion that blasted the door open.
“You were saying?” said Batman.
“So sue me.”
They then went into action. They could see some robbers coming out with several different canisters. They could see the heroes coming and they became afraid. They even fired at them.
“Pathetic,” said Batgirl.

What happens?
11421.title: Barbara Gordon

114212.content:
Batman and Batgirl began to knock out the thieves. Although the thieves had some fighting skills they were nothing compared to the crime fighting duo. They easily defeated the pair.
“High Five Batman,” said Batgirl. He just looked at her. “Ok maybe next time.” Just then she saw the police come. “Gotham’s finest are here.”
“As the cops began to arrest the crooks some scientists came out of the building to take the case back in. They opened it and they were relieved to see that the contents remained undamaged. Batman and Batgirl went over to them.
“Is it safe?” asked Batman.
“Yes thanks to you,” replied the Scientist. “Who would have known what would happen if this formula got into the wrong hands.”
“What is it?”
“Come inside we’ll show you.”
The scientists then went inside and Batman and batgirl followed. Inside they saw some animals but they were giant sized. They even saw one shrink back down to normal size. But others were still huge.
“What is all this?” asked Batgirl.
114212.title: Easy

1142121.content:
"This is where we do our experiments," said a Scientist. "We're achieving more then we could have imagined."
"And what are you trying to achieve?" replied Batman.
"Well we're able to increase the mass of a subject."
"With what?"
"With what's in the case. It can increase a subject's mass by more then ten fold. But ther'es a little something to that."
"What is it?"
"When any subject has three doses its large forever. We havne't been able to shrink them."
"Have you experimented on any people?"
"We find it unwise to test it on humans."
"Because if it was tested on a human they would grow and probably try to take the city. No wonder they wanted it."
"Yes if it were to fall into the wrong hands things might go very bad in the city. But there is one revalation in the serum."
"What's that?
1142121.title: Growth serum

11421211.content:
“Just think what would happen if I had some of that,” said Batgirl. “No crook would ever overlook me.”
“I would advise against that,” replied the Scientist. “Who knows what it can do. It might make you the perfect human. But it could also turn into a mindless monster bent on the destruction of the entire city.”
“Wow you watch too much Sci-Fi films.”
“Sorry.”
“Anyway we best be going now,” said Batman. “Make sure you keep that formula safe. Make sure it doesn’t get into the wrong hands.”
“Will do.”
The pair then left the lab. The bat mobile wasn’t too far away from them so they just got back in and sped away. Batgirl was thinking a little.
“Hey Bruce what would happen if one of our rogues did get that formula?” asked Batgirl. “I think it would be bad.”
“More then you can imagine. Imagine a giant sized Joker or Riddler roaming the streets of Gotham. It’s more then any of us can handle.”
“You always have me.”
11421211.title: It doesn't work on males

choices: The pair get back to the Batcave
114212111.content:
"I sis notice one thing about the animals they were testing on," said Batman. "Seems that they were all females."
"Females?" replied Batgirl.
"It’s either the scientist don't like male animals. Or its that the serum only works on females."
"I'd be guessing the second thought."
"Which means that some of our more dangerous villains can't use it to their benefits at all."
"So we'll be fine?"
"No we still have others like Poison Ivy and Harley Quinn. I'd really like to see it in action."
"The formula?"
"Yes I'd like to see how it works."
"I could with a little bit of it. I could stand to gain a few more inches. Then I can get my modelling career off the ground."
"Now’s not the time for joking Barbara."
"Fine."

What happens?
114212111.title: Now's not the time

1142121111.content:
The scientists were just about to lock up. They made sure that there were plenty of guards around this time. But the moment they left one guard felt something underneath him. At first he thought it was nothing. But when he looked down he could see vines coming out of the ground. He went to move away but they had grabbed his foot. He was soon dragged down to the ground and wrapped up.
Just then he saw Poison Ivy about to walk past. He went to get his gun out of his pocket but he couldn’t reach it. When he looked again Poison Ivy was right in front of him. He blew him some of her dust and he was knocked out.
“Sleep little man,” she said.
She then walked into the lab. Two guards saw her and pointed their guns at her. But she easily used her powers to wrap vines around them. She just kept walking as if they were nothing at all.
“When will they learn?”
Then she went into the main lab. The animals were there and they were roaring at her. But she just ignored them and went to a safe. She used her powerful vines to open the safe and she could see the growth serum.
“Bingo.”
1142121111.title: Poison Ivy

11421211111.content:
Meanwhile in the Batmobile it had picked up the distress call from the lab. Batman instantly turned the batmobile around and he started on his way back to the lab. he was curious.
"Wait didn't we just stop a robbery there?" asked Batgirl.
"Seems it's been hit again," replied Batman.
"Wow the bat guys normally wait until they hit again."
"Apparently they couldn't wait."
They eventually reached the lab. The first thing they could see was all the guards wrapped in vines. They instantly knew that it was Poison Ivy.
"She's been here," said Batman.
"Ok I think this is bad," replied Batgirl.
"Yes now the formula can be used against Gotham."
"Which way did she go?"
"Not sure. But I can find out."
He then got a scope from his utility belt and he used it to look at the ground. he began to pick out to pick out Poison Ivy's footprints.
"Got them."

Where is she?
11421211111.title: Call back

114212111111.content:
"We'll see where she is now," said Batgirl.
"We better be quick," replied Batman. "She can use that formula anytime to increase her size. If that happens her powers also increase."
"Which means we'll be in big trouble."
"Right."
The pair then got into the Batmobile and they began to follow the footprints. They eventually came to an abandoned warehouse on the Gotham docks. They both got out of the Batmobile and went closer to the warehouse. They were both very quiet so that they didn't alert anyone to their location.
Inside through a glass they could see Poison Ivy with the formula. Batgirl waqs the first to see her and she could also see that she was about to drink it.
"Crap," said Batgirl.
"Barbara no!" replied Batman.
Batgirl then came throught the glass and tackled Poison Ivy so that she didn't get the serum. But the serum poured on the both of them. They both felt their bodies began to shiver.
"This can't be good," said Batgirl.
114212111111.title: Tracking down Poison Ivy

choices: So that she could destroy Batman
1142121111111.content:
Batgirl then saw that Poison Ivy was beginning to grow. She took a step back as she saw her rival grow.
"You're even more stupid then I thought," said Poison Ivy. "You've made me invincible." She laughed as she grew taller.
But Batgirl even felt herself grow. She seemed to be growing slower the Poison Ivy who was already as tal as the warehouse. But Batgirl knew that there was going to be a supersized brawl between the two.
In seconds the pair burst out of the warehouse. Batman had to get away so he didn't get injured by any of the warehouse wreckage. But could see the pair still growing. he was amazed to see the growth serum in action.
Both girls eventualyl stopped at a little over 60 feet tall. Batgirl was a little shorter then Poison Ivy but only by a couple of feet. Ivy seemed to be pleased with her new found size. She looked at Batgirl.
"Not even you could stop me from achieving my goal," said Posion Ivy. "And I'm only half way there."
"What?" replied Batgirl.
"You thought I became big just to make myself stronger?"

Why did she become big?
1142121111111.title: Super sized

11421211111112.content:
"What?" asked Batgirl.
"You see I think Gotham would look so much better as a green jungle instead of the concrete jungle it is now," replied Poison. Ivy. "Now that I'm big I'm powerful enough to turn Gotham into the idealist Jungle I want it to be."
"But people will be killed."
"Oh well. Think of all that jungle people have killed over the years. Now its payback for them."
"I can't let you do that."
"Then you will die!"
Poison Ivy then used her vines to wrap around Batgirl. This made things difficult for her and she tried to break free. But the hold was a little too great. In the end Batgirl used one of her baterangs to break free.
With her freedom Batgirl gave Poison Ivy a thunderous kick. This caught her by surprise and she took a few steps back.
"Looks like I've underestimated you," said Poison Ivy.
"You're not the first," replied Batgirl.
"I'll soon change that."
11421211111112.title: Turning Gotham into a Jungle

114212111111121.content:
Poison Ivy then clicked her fingers and a few Gotham buildings. But she was still concentrating on Batgirl. Both giantesses were close to going into an all out brawl that could destroy the city.
But in a quick move Poison Ivy blew some spores into Bat-Girl’s face. At first nothing happened but then Batgirl felt her body becoming heavier. She dropped down to her hands and knees and began to wheeze.
“What did you do to me?” asked Batgirl.
“Just some spores,” replied Poison Ivy. “Kills men instantly but women it’s a lot slower. But the end effect is the same.”
Batgirl tried to pick herself up but Poison Ivy began to beat her down. She was laughing while she did this.
“This is why normal people shouldn’t fight people with powers,” said Poison Ivy. “The ones with powers always win.”
“No that’s not true,” replied Batgirl. “I can still beat the crap out of you any day of the week.” She then spat at her.
“Oh you’re in for it now.”
Poison Ivy then used some vines to wrap Batgirl up.

Is this it for Batgirl?
114212111111121.title: Ivy gets an upperhand

1142121111111211.content: Posion ivy used the vines to incapactiate batgirl
1142121111111211.title: Yes

1142121111111212.content:
Batgril could see Poison Ivy walking away. She knew that if she didn't do something fast Ivy would destroy Gotham. She felt helpless but then she remembered about her father and everyone else she cared about in Gotham. She would be killing them if she sat there and did nothing.
Batgirl slowly began to pick herself up. Batmanw as amazed himself. he had never seen anyone stand up after Ivy's spores had done that to them. But he began to come up with an idea. he quickly got back into the Batmobile and went back to the Batcave. he wasn't hiding. In fact he was going to help.
As Batgirl got herself up to her feet Poison Ivy turned around and saw her. She was shocked.
"That's impossible," said Poison Ivy.
"Looks like you're wrong," replied Batgirl.
"No matter this means I can kill you myself."
"Don't bet on it sister."
Poison Ivy then shot giant sized thorns from her hands. A few of them went into Batgirl in non-lethal areas. But she was able to dodge the rest of them. It was becoming an uphill struggle.
1142121111111212.title: On her feet

11421211111112121.content:
As Batgirl pulled some of the thorns out of her body she was throwing them back at Ivy. but she was able to kill them before they even touched her. Batgirl knew that she would do this but it was for a distraction more then anything. With Ivy occupided Batgirl gave her a thunderous uppercut. This set Ivy fliying off her feet and she landed on the ground hard. She didn't expect this to happen.
"You can't have this much strength left," said Poison Ivy.
"Oh you'll be surprised," replied Batgirl.
"So will you."
Poison Ivy then went into her pocket and got out a serum. Batgirl could tell that it was the growth serum.
"No," said Batgirl.
"Yep I take one drink of thios and I'll grow more powerful then you," replied Poison Ivy. "Well bottoms up."
Poison Ivy went to drink the serum but Batgirl tried to stop her. She was pulling her hand away from the serum. But Poison Ivy used a vine to knock Batgirl away. She then began to drink the serum.
"Now you're dead."

Which way will Poison Ivy go?
11421211111112121.title: Second serum

114212111111121212.content:
Poison Ivy could feel the serum going through her body. She expected to get taller. But instead it looked like Batgril was growing. She was confused at first and then she looked at everything around her. It was also growing. She realised that she wasn't growing but shrinking.
"Oh my God," said Poison Ivy as she dwindled.
"Looks like you drank the wrong serum," replied Batgirl.
"No it was the right one I swear."
But Poison Ivy was still getting smaller. Within seconds she was 10 feet tall and Batgirl picked her up. A few seconds later she was normal size. But the shrinking didn't stop. Ivy was still getting smaller.
"I shouldn't be this small," said Ivy.
"Well I can't say this isn't what you deserved," replied Batgril.
"But I'm still getting smaller."
Batgirl watched as Ivy continued to shrink. She went from seemingly being doll sized to being an inch tall. She was getting too small for Batgirl to see and a few seconds later she had disappeared.
"Wow."
114212111111121212.title: Incredible shrinking Poison Ivy

1142121111111212121.content:
Batgirl was amazed to see that Poison Ivy had gone from giant to micro sized. She looked at her hand but she could see no sign of the villainess. She was a little saddened by this but there was no other way.
Just then the Batmobile came to her. She waited for Batman to come out and he looked up at her.
“Where’s Poison Ivy?” said Batman.
“I don’t know she shrank onto my hand,” replied Batgirl.
“Let me guess she drank another dose of the growth serum.”
“Yes but how did you know?”
“I got some more notes from the lab. A second dose of the growth serum while being gigantic leads to infinite shrinking.”
“So she won’t stop?”
“No.”
“So how do I get smaller?”
“You have to wait until the serum wears off.”
“How long does that take?”
“It can depend.”

How long will Batgirl have to wait to shrink?
1142121111111212121.title: End of the battle

11421211111112121211.content:
“On what?” asked Batgirl.
“On how large the dose was,” replied Batman. “I think its best you come back to the Bat Cave for me keep an eye on you.”
“Can I still fit in there?”
“Not standing up.”
“I mean through the entrance.”
“Yes you’re not that big.”
“Thanks that makes me feel better.” There was some sarcasm in her voice when she said this. She gave out a sigh.
“Now follow me.”
Batman then got back into the Batmobile and he drove away. Batgirl ran after him. But she was always thinking about Ivy. She didn’t know if she was still alive somewhere on her hand.
She seemed to be gaining on the Batmobile a little so she slowed down so that she could keep a safe distance between them. But she noticed something else. They weren’t going the normal way to the Bat Cave.
“Where are we going?” she asked.
11421211111112121211.title: To the Bat Cave

114212111111121212111.content:
"To the Bat Cave," said Batman.
"But this is the wrong way," replied Batgirl.
"It isn't. Its just a longer route. And there's high hills so that people don't see you. I don't particularly want people to find out where the Bat Cave is."
"Fine just give me some warning next time."
"You're a big girl now you can take a little hike."
"Very funny."
Eventually the pair got to the Bat Cave. The secret door opened and the Batmobile went through. But Batgirl had to get on her hands and knees and she had to crawl throuhg the entrance and down the tunnel. She eventually came to the end and Batman was just getting out of the Batmobile.
"What now?" asked Batgirl. She took off her mask.
"Simple we wait for the serum to wear off," replied Batman.
"How long shoudl it take?"
"Sine this is your first dose it shouldn't last very long. I think you'll be normal in the morning."
"What do I do in the meantime?"
114212111111121212111.title: Get inside

1142121111111212121111.content:
"Well you could get some sleep," said Batman. "You're probably tired after fighting Poison Ivy."
"You know now that you mention it I am feeling tired," replied Batgirl. "Got anything I can use for a pillow."
"I can find something."
A few minutes later Alfred came down with what seemed to be a spare mattress. He was struggling to bring it down so Bruce gave him a hand. They took it down to Barbara and she put her head down on it.
"How does it feel?" asked Bruce.
"A little small but it'll do."
"Good now I'll see you in the morning."
"Fine."
Batman and Alfred then left the Bat Cave leaving Barbara there. She was trying to shut her mind off growing and the shrinking of Poison ivy. She was a little worried that she would wake up amongst molecules or germs.
It took her a good hour to go to sleep. When this happened it seemed all of her worries were washed away.
1142121111111212121111.title: Sleep

choices: Yeah let's go with that one.

choices: Betty becomes the gigantic Red Hulk
Attack of the 50 Foot Betty Ross
114311.content: So what ends up happening to Ms. Betty Ross? Does she wind up as a equal gigantic,gamma fueled green giantess or is she like everyone else on this list grown to a titanic size by mysterious forces?
114311.title: Yay for Betty

114312.content:
Dr Bruce Banner had been on the run from the military for years. His life had been a living hell since the gamma radiation infected his cells and making him become the Hulk the strongest being on the planet. he would become a creature of pure rage and power. No one had ever truly defeated the Hulk.
But he was lonely with his wife Betty dead he was more alone then ever. He would just go through his life trying to keep the Hulk inside.
Bruce was on an empty road. It was a blistering hot day and he was trying to hitch hike a ride. But people were just driving past him. But eventually an old white car pulled over. In there was a young woman.
The woman looked pretty short and she had long red hair. She was wearing sun glasses so Bruce couldn't see her eyes. She wore a white t-shirt and some fingerless leather gloves. She wore blue jeans and he could see a leather jacket on the back seat. She smiled at him and he saw her perfect white teeth.
"Do you need a lift?" she asked.
"Yes thank you," replied Bruce.
"Hop in."
Bruce then got into the car and she drove off.

Where do they go?
114312.title: Bruce Banner aka the Hulk

1143122.content:
“Well there’s a nice little town not too far from here,” said the Woman.
“Ok take me there,” replied Bruce.
“My name’s Daniel.” He had to lie to her because he thought that she wouldn’t let him ride in her car if she knew that he was the Hulk.
“I once knew a guy named Daniel.” She chuckled a little. “He was a great guy.”
“If you don’t mind me asking what happened to him?”
“He moved away a few years back. I haven’t seen him since. Well my name is Carol.”
Bruce giggled a little. “Funny I know another woman named Carol.”
“I feel sorry for her. Who would want to be called Carol?”
Eventually the pair came to the small town. Carol pulled up just in front of a café. She got out and so did Bruce.
“Hey Daniel do you want some coffee?” asked Carol.
“I better not,” replied Bruce.
“Don’t worry it’s my treat.”
“Ok because you insisted.”
The pair then walked into the café. There wqas as nice stable right next to a window with a great view.
1143122.title: Carol

11431221.content:
A waiter came up to their table. It was a man and he had a small notepad with him and a pen. He smiled at the both of them.
“Hello my name is Robert,” he said. “And I’ll be your waiter today. Is there anything you would like?”
“Yes I would like a Latte,” replied Carol.
“I’ll just have an ordinary coffee,” added Bruce.
“Coming right up,” said Robert.
He then went away and Carol and Bruce began to talk to each other a little more. They seemed to be a little happy together.
“So what do you do?” asked Carol.
“What do you mean?” replied Bruce.
“Oh you know Dan. What’s your job?”
“Oh that.” He began to think a little. He couldn’t tell her the truth. “I worked for the Postal service.”
“In what the offices or the actually posting?”
“I was in the office. What do you do?”
“I’m an in-training hair stylist.”

What happens next?
11431221.title: Latte and Coffee

114312212.content:
Just then the pair saw a gang come into the cafe. The staff looked nervous when they came in. Bruce could tell that there was going to be trouble. he wanted to leave before anything happened.
"I think its best that we left," said Bruce.
"I think you're right," replied Carol.
They went up to leave but one of the gang members grabbed onto Bruce. He tried to contain the Hulk within himself.
"Just where do you think you're going?" asked the Gang Member.
"I'm leaving," replied Bruce.
"Yeah you can leave with us."
The gang member took him outside and Carol followed to make sure that he was safe. The Gang member then grabbing him around the collar. He was starting to lose his grip on the Hulk.
"You're making me angry," said Bruce.
"Oh am I?" replied the Gang Member. "Go on you asked for it."
Just then everyone saw Bruce's eyes turn green. The Gang Member then let go as Bruce began to bust out of his clothes. He was turning green in the process.

1143122121.content:
The gang member was scared now. He just watched as the once scrawny man was turning into a green muscle monster. But when the process was complete the Hulk grabbed the Gang member.
"You try to hurt puny Banner!" shouted the Hulk. ""You make Hulk angry. Hulk smash you."
"Hulk no," replied Carol.
Hulk then turned around to her. He saw her and at first he thought that she was Betty. "Betty?"
"No I'm not Betty. Remember I'm Carol. We just had coffee together."
"You Hulk's friend?"
"Yes Hulk I'm your friend. Please calm down. You're going to give yourself away. You don't want the military coming after you again."
"Military try to blow up Hulk."
"I know they did. Now just put him down and let's go."
"He makes Hulk angry."
"But you don't need to hurt him. He below you. He doesn't even deserve your slightest attention."

What does Hulk do?
1143122121.title: Hulk angry

11431221212.content:
Hulk then dropped the gang member and then he ran for his life. Hulk just looked at him and then he looked over to Carol. She tried to smile at him. But she had some fear of him as well. She knew that the Hulk could level a city.
"Doesn't that make you feel better?" asked Carol.
"Hulk feel calm," replied Hulk.
Then she saw him begin to revert back into plain old Bruce Banner. He fell to the ground when the transformation was complete and she helped him back up to his feet. He seemed to be out of breath.
"C-Carol," said Bruce.
"Yeah I'm here," replied Carol. "Bruce."
"I'm sorry I had to lie to you. But if I told you that I was the Hulk you'd have left me out there."
"No I would have still taken you. Just make sure you didn't get angry."
"But I need your help one last time."
"What is it?"
"My lab isn't too far from here. I'm closer then ever before to finding myself a cure for the Hulk."
11431221212.title: Calm

114312212121.content:
“Ok I’ll get you there,” said Carol. “But you owe me one.”
They both then went to Carol’s car and she drove away from the café. Bruce gave her directions to his lab. It was quite far away. But when they got there Carol saw a small hut. She looked at it a little.
“This is it?” asked Carol.
“I know it isn’t much but it might be just what I need,” replied Bruce.
They both went inside and Carol saw the machine that would hopefully cure the Hulk. It was a chair with a few lasers around it. There was also a lever on the wall which seemed to power it.
“Carol I’ll need you to pull this lever when I’m ready,” said Bruce. “It’ll power the machine and I’ll be cured.”
“Is it dangerous?”
“No you’ll be perfectly safe.”
“I hope so.”
Bruce then sat typed a few things on his computer by the machine and he seemed to be happy with it. He then sat down on the chair.
“Pull the lever.”

Will anything happen?
114312212121.title: The cure?

1143122121211.content:
Carol did what she was told and she pulled the lever. The machine then began to start up and Bruce seemed to be happy with what was happening.
“It’s working,” said Bruce.
But then the machine began to overload. There were gamma bolts flying around everywhere. Carol tried to dodge them but one of them eventually one of them hit her. She fell onto the ground unconscious.
“Carol!” shouted Bruce.
He then got out of the chair and pulled the lever. The machine shut down and eh went over to Carol. She was knocked out but she was also alive. He took her over to his bed and he gave her some medical supplies.
She eventually woke up and she was a little confused with where she was. She looked and saw Bruce.
“W-what happened?” asked Carol.
“Don’t worry you’re safe now,” replied Bruce.
“Bruce is that you.”
“Yes I’m here.”
“Did it work?”

11431221212111.content:
"I don't think so," said Bruce. "I can still feel him inside me. But my first concernis you. How do you feel?"
"A little light headed but other then that I'm fine," replied Carol.
"That's good I really didn't want to see you get hurt."
"Banner we know you're in there come out with your hands up!" shouted a voice from outside. He then looked outside through the window and he saw the national guard. he knew that they ahd been following him.
"Who is it?" asked Carol.
"It's the military," replied Bruce. "We have to get out of here."
But then the door was opened and some soldiers came in. They were heavily armoured and they had high tech weapons.
Bruce was trying to contain the Hulk. But until he was hit by a gun he couldn't contain him any longer.
He began to grow his muscles and he was soon the Hulk. he roared out and this caused some fear within the soldiers.
But no one noticed what was happening to Carol. her body was ahking violently. Her clothes were starting to rip.

What happens?

Carol runs away with the Hulk

Hulk was about to crush the building. He threw the soldiers out of the house and he jumped out to the tanks. They all opened fire on him but the bullets simply bounced off his body.
But still no one had noticed Carol. She stood up from where she was and she looked at her clothes. They were getting tighter as she was growing bigger. She couldn't believe what was happening.
She could feel her clothes getting close to ripping point. She tried to stay inside but then her clothes all ripped off her body and she shot up into the air. She still looked normal except she was getting bigger by the second.
She stopped growing at 50 feet and most of the soldiers had noticed her. She went down and picked up the Hulk. At first he was angry and he tried to break her grip.

She then began to run as fast as her legs could carry her. The military fired at her but the bullets were bouncing off her skin. She tried to outrun them but then she saw helicopters above her. She knew what was about to happen to her next. She felt a missile hit her and it hurt her.
But then the Hulk jumped out of her hands and he went towards one of the helicopters. he punched it and it started to go down. The pilot was able to get out in time. But then one missile hit Hulk and he fell to the ground. But he simple got up and roared.

The pilot looked at Carol. He had fear in his eyes as she glared at him while he could feel the helicopter being slowly crushed.

“Err Carol I think the first thing we should do is get you some clothes,” said Bruce. “You don’t want to be arrested for indecent exposure.”

Thankfully there was an old house not too far away. Somebody had put some washing out to dry. Carol quickly took one of the sheets and wrapped it around her body. It fitted perfectly.
“Ok that’s one problem solved,” said Carol. “But why the hell did I just grow like that and then shrink back to normal?”

"What the hell do we do now?" asked Carol.

The pair then began to travel on the roads. They hitch hiked rides and in one car the driver were a little suspicious.
"You're lucky I don't give rides to many half naked people," said the Driver.

The pair eventually reached another small town. They were dropped off there and Bruce took Carol to a certain bar. The bar tender looked at him a little.
"Sorry no shirt, no shoes no service," said the Bar tender.

Who is this friend?

Don't worry it's me Adam," replied Bruce.

He then saw Carol. "And you've got yourself a lady friend here."

"Some of it might be a little tricky. But I should be able to get it for you."

The pair got up and walked away.

What happens outside?

“Can we trust him?” asked Carol. “I know he seems to be a nice guy but I’ve known people look and seem nice but they’re evil inside.”

Eventually they had gotten back outside. But they saw that the military had also been there. It seemed that anywhere Bruce went the military wouldn’t be too far behind him. He held up his hands.
“I surrender.”

“Just do whatever they say.”
Carol also put her hands up. A soldier came behind her and he went to cuff her. But he wasn’t being too gentle to her. She was in some pain and he was only making it worse. She screamed a little.

“Or else you’ll do what?”

Bruce then began to turn green as he began his transformation.

When his transformation was complete the Hulk started to destroy the army vehicles that blocked his way. But Carol noticed that her toga was getting tight again. They then began to fire at Carol. Her skin was thick enough to deflect most of the bullets. But the explosive weaponry was really starting to hurt her. She tried to hide the pain but it was very difficult.
“Giant girl try to protect Hulk,” said Hulk “Hulk now protect Giant girl.” He then lifted up a vehicle. “Leave giant girl alone.”
He then threw it at the soldiers.

What does he do?

Carol just stared at Hulk. She could see him attacking the soldiers. Their weapons were no use against him. But he was causing a lot of damage. She couldn't bear to watch it anymore and she picked up the Hulk.

But just then some rockets hit Carol. This gave her great pain and she fell to the ground. This made Hulk angrier. No one noticed Carol have a growth spurt.
"YOU ATTACK GIANT GIRL!" shouted Hulk. "HULK WILL MAKE YOU PAY!"
He then grabbed to ground beneath him and he lifted it up over his head and he threw it at the soldier ho had fired on Carol. It soon flattened him and the Hulk stood victorious. "No one can defeat Hulk."
114312212121111212111111.title: You're better then them

The Hulk began to violently attack the soldiers. He was extremely angry because of what they had done to Carol. But she was slowly getting herself back up. She still felt some pain. But she saw that her body was healing over the wounds that she had just received. In a matter of seconds they were gone.
"Wow healing factor," she thought. "Maybe being super sized isn't so bad." She then heard an explosion. "Oh my God I've gotta get to the Hulk."
The Hulk was causing a lot of damage. All the weapons that were used against him were having little effect. They were like pea shooters to him.

He then smashed his fists into the ground making an earthquake. He was causing more destruction then ever before. But then he heard footsteps he turned around and saw Carol standing there.
"Hulk," said Carol.
"Giant girl alright?" replied Hulk.
