"Yes and I'm very thankful."

What does she do next?

Carol then raised the Hulk up to her lips and he gave her a kiss. She liked it but the Hulk didn't really like it that much.

Carol then began to walk away. She grabbed a cloth to wrap around her body so she didn't have to be edited in any photos. She ran as fast as she could.But the Hulk was getting impatient.

Just then then Hulk jumped out of her hands and onto the ground. He then picked up her foot and she fell. He then went to her back and picked her up above his head. Carol was truly amazed.

He then jumped away. Even carrying her he was still jumping very far. he would land hard on his feet sometimes but he was alright afterwards.
Eventually they got to a part of the desert where the army hadn't followed them. Hulk stopped here to rest a little and there was even a lake. Carol took a huge gulp of water and she also relaxed.

"HULK DON'T LIKE PUNY BANNER!"
This had caught Carol by surprise. She didn't expect him to respond so angrily to Bruce. She thought it reminded him of his weaker self.
"Ok then maybe I can't talk to him."

Do the military come?

"Hulk won't let giant girl talk to puny Banner," said the Hulk.
"Maybe not but we have a problem Hulk," replied Carol. "We need to get certain things that aren't here."

Just then the Hulk reverted back into Bruce banner. Carol was happy to see this. But then she felt herself shrink back down to normal size. She shrank right out of the toga that she was wearing. She used some of it to wrap it around her body. She blushed a little at Bruce.
1143122121211112121111111112.title: Food problem

11431221212111121211111111121.content:
"Sorry I'm a little under dressed," said Carol.
"Don't worry I'm not exactly rapped up fort he winter myself," replied Bruce. He then began to think a little. "Carol when did you grow?"
"A while back remember."
"I know all that I mean when did you actually grow in the sense of when anything else happen?
"Well I did grow when you became the Hulk twice."
"And when did you shrink to normal?"
"Whenever you turned back into human."
"Seeing a pattern?"
"Oh my God." She realised what it was.
"Yes I believe that the Hulk and your growth spurts are linked. Whenever I transform into the Hulk you become a giant. The angrier the Hulk gets the bigger and more powerful you do. But when I become me again you shrink back down to your normal size."
"Near normal."
"What?"
"I think I maybe an inch or two taller then I normally am."

What do they do now?
11431221212111121211111111121.title: Link

114312212121111212111111111211.content:
They compared and Carol was an inch taller then she normally was. Bruce was still taller then her but he did notice the difference.
"Yes you are taller then normal," said Bruce.
"What do we do now?" replied Carol.
"Well there's my never ending quest to find a cure. But for now I really need a drink." he then took a few sips from the lake. "That's nice water."
"I had a drink when I was a giant. I'm not that thirsty now."
"Your loss."
He then took a few more gulps of water before finally stopping. He sat down for a moment. He looked over to Carol who was still wearing her toga. It was almost all on the ground and she held up a small piece to cover herself.
"Wouldn't it be great if there were clothes that changed size with me?" asked Carol.
"Well quite a lot of superheroes have them. Stature has a costume that changes size with her."
"Where is she?"
"On the East Coast."
"Any others?"
114312212121111212111111111211.title: Drink up

1143122121211112121111111112111.content:
"Well there's Wasp but she's on the East coast," said Bruce.
"Any size changing women who live on the West coast?" replied Carol.
"I don't think so."
"Crap."
"Maybe I could create something. But For now I don't have any clothes made out of unstable molecules."
"Great. Also how do we get back to civilization?"
"Well we can always hitch hike again." He then began to think a little. "Where exactly do you live?"
"In an apartment near Las Vegas why?"
"Well we could go there. But you picked me up a long way away from Vegas."
"I just went on a little road trip. Can't blame a gal for that can you?"
"I guess not. But maybe we can get to Vegas."
"Yeah but which way is it?"
"Got a Road map?"
"It's in my other over sized toga."
"Very funny."

Do they go?
1143122121211112121111111112111.title: Vegas?

11431221212111121211111111121111.content:
In the end Carol had to rip off a piece of the cloth and she wrapped it around her body. By now she was a little use to wearing some kind of toga. Bruce found it a little humorous.
“You know it suits you wearing a toga,” said Bruce. “Are you sure you’re not an ancient Greek?”
“Shut up,” replied Carol.
They walked towards a road. They soon hitch hiked a ride. It was a van and there was an over weight man behind the wheel. He wore glasses and he laughed a little at the both of them.
“Where are you from Caesar’s Palace?” he asked.
“That’s exactly where we’re from,” replied Caro. “We really need a ride there before we’re fired.”
“Ok hop in.”
The pair got into the van and he drove off. They sat with their backs to the side of the van.
“You work in a Casino?” asked Bruce.
“Well how else will I get my money?” replied Carol.
"Maybe you could go into sciene."
"Sorry I didn't pay any attention in class."
11431221212111121211111111121111.title: Palace

11432.content: How about Scarlett from G.I. Joe?
11432.title: Scarlett

114321.content:
In a secret Cobra location Destro was in his lab. He was waiting for the Cobra Commander to come. He had sent someone to get him and he was waiting to show him his latest creation.
Eventually Cobra Commander came into the lab. He was wearing the blue hood instead of the metal face mask and he didn't seem to be too happy.
"Do you realise what time it is?" asked Cobra Commander. "I was sleeping. This better be good."
"In deed it will by my Commander," replied Destro. He then held out his hand and there was a small vine plant on it. It seemed to be moving a little. "Behold the destruction of G. I. Joe."
"That's brilliant. Oh how will G.I. Joe be able to withstand the attack of a measly weed!" He then became angry. "You've wasted my time."
"But wait there's more." He then got a bottle off of his table and put a tiny drop onto the plant. It rapidly grew off his hand and it soon became monster size. Destro was happy with it. "I give to you a vine that is particularly programmed to take out G.I Joe and protect Cobra. And with my new growth formula I can have vines a mile long destroying them."
"Excellent soon G.I. Joe will be no more and the world will belong to Cobra."
114321.title: Prologue

1143211.content:
The next morning at G.I. Joe Headquarters Scarlett in the gym brushing up on her martial art skills. She had been a black belt since she was fifteen and was probably one of the best female fighters in the world right now.
Duke was also in there doing a bit of weight lifting. He was doing pretty well and he was talking to Scarlett.
"How long has it been since Cobra last struck?" asked Scarlett.
"It's been weeks," replied Duke.
"I know it's good that they've kept quiet but part of me wants them to attack or something so we can get some action."
"I know what you mean. Sometimes I just get bored sitting around here doing absolutely nothing."
"But maybe Cobra is planning something."
"Don't doubt it."
Just then the alarms began to go off. This meant that Cobra was striking and Duke put his weights down.
"There's our action," said Duke.
"It's about time," replied Scarlett.

Where are Cobra?
1143211.title: Scarlett's work out

11432112.content:
Many members of G.I. Joe were already in the command office. They were looking at the screen and they saw Cobra attacking a city. general hawk was looking at the Joes and he wasn't too happy.
"Seems that Cobra have decided to take their frustration out of New York," said General Hawk.
"But it seems like a senseless attack," replied Duke.
"I know so use extreme caution. Cobra might be up to something. Duke I want you to take the Joes and deal with them."
"Yes sir."
"YO JOE!" shouted the Joes.
They then went out and each got into jet plans. They went in pairs and Scarlett shared hers with Duke.
"So another standard stop Cobra day," said Scarlett.
"I hope it's that easy." he then got onto his radio. "Are you high flying Road Block?"
"Up and running Duke," replied Road Block through the radio.
"Good lets take Cobra out."
"YO JOE!" they all shouted.
11432112.title: Cobra attack a city

114321121.content:
The Joes eventually got to the city and they saw what seemed to be Cobra Agents just destroying everything in sight. They soon saw the Joes arriving. Destro was leading the Cobra Agents.
"Remember our orders," said Destro.
As the Joes came in closer Destro took a small plant from his pocket and gave it a drop of the growth formula. It soon grew to monsterous proportions and it began to grab the Joes' jets from the sky.
"What the hell is that?" asked Scarlett.
"Seems to be the new Cobra weapon," replied Duke.
As the Jets were being pulled to the ground some of the Joe's were able to get out and parachute down. A few were still in their jets and couldn't get out. They were at the mercy of the vine.
When on the ground most of the Joes were captured by the plant and only Scarlett was left. She thought that Destro was somehow controlling them and she began to run towards him.
He didn't notice her until she kicked him and he went flying. But he accidentally dropped the growth formula and it went onto Scarlett's hand.

Does she grow?
114321121.title: Exposure

1143211212.content:
At first nothing seemed to happen and Destro started to make a retreat with the other members of Cobra.
"RETREAT!" shouted Destro.
But now Scarlett had to deal with the killer plants. But there wasn't much she could do. She needed a weapon. But then she saw something that got her thinking. She could see Snake Eye's jet and the thrusts were facing the plant itself.
"Snake Eyes put your thrusts on," said Scarlett. "It's our only chance."
Snake Eyes then put the thrusts on and the plant set on fire. It screamed out and let go of the other Joes.
The firs soon spread and it began disintigrate the plant and eventually it became nothing again. Everyone cheered for Scarlett.
"Way d'go Scarlett," said Road Block.
"It was nothing really," replied Scarlett.
"How did you get Cobra to retreat all by yourself?"
"Well that's what worries me. I only kicked Destro and they retreated."
"Sounds like Cobra have become cowards."
"I doubt that."
1143211212.title: Fire

11432112121.content:
A little later at the G.I. Joe headquarters. Scarlett was back in the training room. She was working out a lot. Some of the male members of G.I. Joe looked at her in amazement. They had never seen anyone work out that hard before.
"Wow slow down girl you gonna give yourself a heart attack," said Shipwreck.
"Sorry I can't," replied Scarlett. "Since that fight with Cobra I just feel so energetic. I'll probably tire out in a little while."
"Ok that your choice."
Scarlett stayed trianing for a few hours. But eventually it was night and she a little tired from the constant exercises. She put on her night clothes and climbed into bed. She didn't notice her body go through any changes.
The next morning she was woken up by her alarm clock. She switched it off and she sat up on her bed. She didn't notice anything wrong even though her clothes were now tight. She was too tired to notice.
But then she stood up and went to the bathroom. But when she tried to go through the door her head hit the door frame. She gave out a little ouch.
"Who lowered this door frame?" asked Scarleet. She then looked at herself and everything around her. "The door frame didn't get lower. I got higher."

What does she do?
11432112121.title: It begins

114321121211.content:
Scarlett didn’t know what to do now. She pinched herself to see if she was dreaming. But she felt the pain and she realised that it wasn’t a dream. This was all real. She just stood there in amazement.
“Ok so this isn’t a dream,” she thought to herself. “But how could this happen to me. I haven’t been in the labs for weeks.” She then began to think a little. “It must be something to do with Cobra. But what do I do now? I have to tell the other Joes.”
Meanwhile in the Cobra Headquarters the Cobra Commander was looking over at the results of the attack. He seemed to be pleased.
“Looks like the test went well Cobra Commander,” said Destro.
“Excellent Destro,” replied Cobra Commander. “It went a lot better then I expected. The Joes will be defenceless against several of these at ten times the size.”
“There was one minor incident Commander.”
“What was that?” His voice was stern and angry.
“A drop of the growth formula was exposed to Scarlett.”
“What? So she’s going to be a giant?”
“Very likely but the effects might be different on humans.”
“In a good way or a bad way?”
114321121211.title: Reporting

1143211212111.content:
An hour later in the G.I. Joe headquarters Scarlett was being examined in the medical lab. There were a few other Joes there seeing what was happening. A medic was doing some health tests on her. Right now she was sitting down on a chair
“So is there anything wrong?” asked Scarlett.
“Well as far as I can find your body isn’t in any physical pain at all,” said the Medic. “Your reflexes and strength have been increased.”
“So what are you saying?” She then stood up to her full height. She was a little over 7 feet tall now.
“I’m saying that your body is perfectly healthy. It’s just that you’re growing.”
“Ok that’s some good news.”
“Hey Scarlett ever considered having a basketball career?” asked Mutt. He then laughed a little much to her annoyance.”
“Now’s not the time to be joking around. Just how big will I get?”
“Well I’m not sure,” replied the Medic. “But your body shows no signs of stopping any time soon.”
“That makes me feel a whole lot better.” She said this in a sarcastic voice. Just then she began to hear something.

What does she hear?
1143211212111.title: Examination

11432112121111.content:
"What is it Scarlett?" asked Duke.
"I hear helicopters," replied Scarlett.
"But there's no one on any mission."
"But that can only mean."
Just then the alarms went off. This meant that there was a cobra attack. The Joes had go into action.
"Everyone defend the base," said Duke.
"YO JOE!" shouted everyone.
They then went to defend the base. But there were only two helicopters. Destro was in one of them with two of the vines. When he was just over the base he put the growth formula on them and then threw them to the ground. They instantly grew to monster size and bigger.
"We've got those vines again," said Shipwreck.
"Stop talking and start firing," replied Road Block.
But nothing seemed to be slowing down the vines. They were growing in every direction grabbing Joes on the way.
"What now?
11432112121111.title: Cobra Strikes

114321121211111.content:
"Now we run," said Road Block.
The Joes then began to retreeat but they were grabbed by the plant. They screamed in terror as they were helpless. It seemed that Cobra had done something right for once.
But in the medical lab Scarlett could still hear everything that was happening up there. She was worried.
"What happening up there?" asked the Medic.
"We're losing," replied Scarlett. "I can hear everything."
"How can you do that?"
"I don't know. It's just since I've been growing. I can see a lot better and I can smell everyone. They all had a unique smell."
"Seems that your growth has increased your five senses."
Scarlett then stood up. Her head was only a few inches below the ceiling. But she went to leave the lab. "I have to help them."
"But you'll be killed."
"Rather that then let my friends die because I sat and did nothing."
She then bent down to get through the door way and she walked up to where the fight was being held.

Will she help in anyway?
114321121211111.title: Retreat

1143211212111111.content:
But the first thing she saw was the vine. It was huge and had many of the Joes in it's grasp. She still couldn't get over the size of it.
"Looks like an over grown plant needs an over grown Joe to deal with it," she said. "YO JOE!"
She then picked up a flame thrower from one of the other Joe's. It seemed a little smaller to her now but she used it on the vine. It was hurt but it didn't stop it. If anything it only got angrier.
"Ok not exactly a bright idea," said Scarlett.
It went to grab her but she was able to jump out of the way. She was amazed to see how high she could jump. She had gotten to the roof of one of the buildings.
"Wait I couldn't have jumped that high," said Scarlett. "That's at least 30 feet high." She then focused on the vine. "Oh yeah back to you." But then she felt a little weird. She felt her body stretch a little but it only lasted for a few seconds. "Guess I just gained an extra inch."
But then the vine grabbed her and tried to squeeze her. But she was using all of her strength to stop it's iron like grip.
"Ok this isn't good."
1143211212111111.title: Enhancements

11432112121111111.content:
The next morning Jane was the first to wake up. At first she couldn’t remember what had happened the previous day. She saw that she was still in the arms of Katherine. She tried to get out but her grip was too strong. But her struggling did wake her up. She slowly opened her eyes and she saw her tiny friend.
“Are you alright?” asked Katherine.
“You wouldn’t mind letting me go would you?” replied Jane.
“Yeah sure.”
Katherine then released her grip on her friend and she liked being free. But then she felt Katherine begin to sit up. She almost fell off the bed but Katherine was able to save her from falling.
“Easy there little guy,” said Katherine.
“Thanks for the save Big K,” replied Jane.
“You’re welcome Little J.”
Katherine then put Jane on the ground and she returned to her normal size. The process only took a few seconds.
“Back to being big.”
“That’s small to me.”

What happens next?
11432112121111111.title: Morning

choices: Her height is causing a problem
114321121211111111.content:
Sorry that last chapter was a mistake. This is the real chapter.

Scarlett was running out of options. She knew that if she didn’t do something fast all of the Joes would be killed. She began to think about what she could do. But then she felt a shiver run down her spine. She felt the icy cold wind go past her. But then she noticed something about the vine. It seemed to be slowing down.
“It doesn’t like the cold,” said Scarlett.
She then saw a pack full of liquid nitrogen just on the ground. She jumped down to the ground and she picked it up. She sprayed it at the vine and then began to freeze. It began to drop the Joes and it eventually was completely froze over. She tapped on it and it soon cracked and fell apart.
“Game set and match.”
The other Joes slowly got back to their feet. They were feeling the cold wind and the cold from the vine. But they were thankful to be free.
“Hey we’re free,” said Mutt.
“But what happened?” replied Road Block.
“Scarlett is what happened,” added Duke.
Scarlett was just trying to rest a little. The fight had sapped the energy right out of her. She panted for air.

What's wrong?
114321121211111111.title: Cold

1143211212111111112.content:
“Are you alright Scarlett?” asked Duke.
“Yeah I’m fine,” replied Scarlett. “It’s just that fighting a giant vine can really sap the energy right out of a girl.”
“You get some rest you deserve it.”
A little later Scarlett was in the canteen eating some food. But she was eating a lot more then she normally did. She guessed that this was due to her size. But eventually Cover Girl sat down on the same table.
“Are you alright Scarlett?” asked Cover Girl.
“Yeah I’m fine,” replied Scarlett. She then heard some cracking. “But I don’t think this chair can take my weight for much longer.”
“I think there are stronger chairs around here somewhere.”
Scarlett then rose out of her chair. Cover Girl couldn’t help but stare as Scarlett rose higher and higher. But eventually her head hit the ceiling. She rubbed it a little and she felt some pain.
“I’ll have to get use to low ceilings,” said Scarlett.
“Did that hurt?” replied Cover Girl.
“A little.”
1143211212111111112.title: Head hits the ceiling literally

11432112121111111121.content:
"Do you want some ice for that?" asked Cover Girl.
"No I'll be fine," replied carlett. "I just hope I haven't caused any damage there." She looked at the ceiling and it was still the same. "Thank God for that."
Scarlett then got herself a stronger chair and she sat down on it to eat her lunch. Cover Girl was still with her.
"So watched any good DVDs lately?" asked Cover Girl.
"Well Road Block did let me borrow his Star Wars Episode I DVD," replied Scarlett. "But I didn't really like it that much. I'm not much of a Star Wars fan."
"Me neither but I've heard the original three are pretty good."
"I wouldn't mind getting the Shawshank Redemption. I saw that movie a few years ago and it was really good."
"I've got that if you want to borrow it?"
"That would be nice thank you."
After lunch Cover Girl gave Scarlett the DVD. Again Scarlett hit her head on the ceiling. But now she was going to get use to it.
Eventually she went to her room and she put the DVD into her player. But she couldn't really push the buttons. Her fingers were too big.

What does she do?
11432112121111111121.title: DVD

114321121211111111211.content:
It took Scarlett several minutes to be able to et the DVD working. She was thankful for this and she sat on her bed. But she began to hear the springs go so she stood up. She was careful of the ceiling this time. She raised up enough for her head to be just a little below.
In the end Scarlett began to watch the movie. As it went through she loved every minute of it. Althoguh there weren't any women in the film there was still a lot of heart in the film. She shed a tear once or twice.
Meanwhile at Cobra Headquarters the Cobra Commander was going bad at Destro. He was banging his fists on the table and curisng.
"What the hell happened?" asked Cobra Commander. "You said that your vines were invincible."
"It seems that G.I.Joe has discovered their weakness," replied Destro.
"Then get rid of this weakness."
"It is not that easy."
"Are you refusing a direct order?"
"Of course not my Commander. But the video link also picked up something else." He then played it and they saw Scarlett in action.
114321121211111111211.title: Managed it

1143211212111111112111.content:
"Very interesting," said the Cobra Commander.
"She might be a problem," replied Destro.
"Indeed we need to find a way to keep her out of the picture. Destro send in a spy to G.I Joe."
"Yes my Commander."
A few hours later back at the G.I. Joe headquarters Scarlett had finished watching her film. But by then she had gained an extra six inches. It seemed that she was growing faster then before. This got her down a little.
"Great I must be 8 and a half feet tall right now," said Scarlett. "When will this end?” She then began to think a little. "But on a plus side I am the tallest woman who ever lived. Too bad Guinness isn't here."
But now it was late and all of the action today had made the mini giantess very tired. She tried to lie down on her bed but she was too heavy for it. In the end she had to sleep on the floor. She put her quilt over herself and she put her head on her pillow. She hoped that this was all a terrible dream. But she knew deep down that this was al real. She couldn't do anything about it.
"Well things can't get any worse."

Do they?
1143211212111111112111.title: World's tallest woman

11432112121111111121111.content:
The next morning Scarlett woke up a little later then usual. She was still a little groggy and she began to pick herself up. But before she really started to stand up her head hit the ceiling. This brought her to her senses. She looked down at her body and saw that she was at least 10 feet tall now.
“I wasn’t this tall when I went to bed,” she said. “I can’t grow by this much? This is impossible. I shouldn’t even be able to move around at this size.”
A little later Scarlett was receiving even more medical attention. But she was still surprisingly energetic for someone of her size.
“You are a truly amazing person Scarlett,” said the Medic. “Not only are you still moving around at your size but you seem to be enhancing.”
“Enhancing?”
“Yes everything about you seems to be improving.”
“Improving how?”
“Well your senses seem to be getting more enhanced. Your strength is almost super human and your reflexes are like Spider-Man.”
“Please compare me to someone who’s real.”
“How about Hulk Hogan?”
11432112121111111121111.title: Even taller

114321121211111111211111.content:
“Now is really not the time for jokes,” said Scarlett. She wasn’t very happy with these and combined with her growth put her in a bad mood.
“Sorry I couldn’t help myself,” replied the Medic.
“Well it isn’t really helping.”
“But sometimes a good joke and a laugh can stop a guy from going insane. I’ve seen it from time to time.”
“Try telling that top the Joker.”
“He’s not real.”
“But I bet there are guys around who are similar to him.” He then began to write down some results.
“So how fast am I growing?”
“Well you gained a little under an extra 100 percent to your height in a little over 30 hours. This could be bad.”
“So how big will I be by next week?”
“If it’s by proportion then you’re looking at a few hundred feet. But by actually height gained you may get to about 30 feet.”
“Either one I don’t like.”

What does she do?
114321121211111111211111.title: Joking

1143211212111111112111112.content:
"Anyway I think we could do with a few more tests on you," said the Medic. Are you prepared to stay here for a while."
"If it cures me I'll do anything," replied Scarlett. She then lay down on two four beds. She wasn't just taller she was bigger. So that meant she needd a bed that was twice as long and twice as wide. She tried to put everything into the back of her mind. But then the Medic gave her a book. "What's this?"
"A book. People are normally suppose to read it."
"Very funny."
Scarlett then looked at the book. It was Jurassic Park and this came as some surprise. She thought that it was only a movie but it was a book as well. She opened it and looked at the beginning. But she didn't have any difficulty reading it. She expected the words to look smaller.
"Hey I can still read," said Scarlett.
"Your sight is increasing along with your body," replied the Medic.
"Well that's at least one thing good." She then felt her arm sting a little. "Ouch what the hell was that?"
"A blood test."
1143211212111111112111112.title: Book

11432112121111111121111121.content:
"Next time warn me," said Scarlett.
"Alright don't get too mad at me," replied the Medic. "Do you know how many Joes I get who don't like needles."
"I'm not one of them."
"That's good. The last thing I need is you passing out on me."
"Please you know I'm not like that."
"Right while I check this do you want to do anything?"
"Well I can read more of this book and do some exercise."
"You do whatever makes you feel better."
Scarlett then got up and took the book with her. She struggled to get through some of the doors and she went outside. She put a book mark to where she had finished reading her book.
She saw the assult cause and she thought it was a good place to let off some steam. But she was a little worried that the equipment wouldn't take her weight.
"Well here goes nothing," said Scarlett.
She then began to run through the course. She seemed to be a lot faster then before and she was going through it in record time.

Will she screw up?
11432112121111111121111121.title: Course

114321121211111111211111212.content:
Scarlett eventually reached the end of the course. He was surprised with just how fast she had done everything. She panted a little and then she saw Duke coming towards her. At this current moment she was sitting down.
"You alright Scarlett," said Duke.
"I wish people would stop asking me if I'm fine." She then saw the look on Duke's face. "Sorry I've had a long morning."
"Don't worry about it."
Scarlett then stood up to her full height. Duke took a step back as he looked up and up at her. He didn't know what to say.
"You're the second person who's done that to me today."
"Sorry."
"Well if I saw someone who was more then twice their normal height then I probably would have done the same."
"Do you want to go to the canteen and get soemthing to eat maybe?"
"Well I haven't eaten all day. Alright then."
"I would ask you to hold my had but I've got difficulties reaching it."
"No more tall jokes."
114321121211111111211111212.title: Duke

1143211212111111112111112121.content:
A little later Scarlett was in the canteen again. She had to sit on the floor because she was too heavy for the chairs. But sitting down did make her feel that she was eating at the table like normal.
“Well this is a little unusual,” said Scarlett.
“Why?” replied Duke.
“Well I’m not sitting on a chair and I feel like I’m sitting at this table normal. Let’s just hope I stop sometime soon or else I won’t be able to fit in the rooms.”
“I’m sure the pen pushers in the labs can solve the problems.”
“I hope they do. I’m getting bigger by the hour.”
When they got some food Scarlett was eating a lot of food. She needed it because her growth was burning ff a lot of calories. But in proportion to her body size she wasn’t eating too much.
“Wow we should enter you in an eating contest,” said Duke. “You’d win hands down.” He then laughed a little.
“Normally right now I hate jokes about me. But now I don’t seem to care. They’re not really bothering me anymore.”
“Sorry.”

What happens?
1143211212111111112111112121.title: Food for the giant

11432112121111111121111121211.content:
Just then another alarm went off. Scarlett could hear it ringing in her ears. The sound was unbearable and she covered her eyes.
“Why does Cobra have to attack now?” asked Scarlett.
“That isn’t the Cobra attack alarm,” replied Duke.
“It’s not?”
“No it’s the fire alarm.”
“Great time for a drill.” She said this with a lot of sarcasm in her voice. “Guess we better follow procedure.”
The pair then started to make their way outside. But Scarlett had a tough time getting outside. But she had some difficulties getting through the door. But on the way she caught a scent in her nose.
The scent was that of smoke. It didn’t smell like smoke from a cigarette. It seemed to be from a real fire.
“This isn’t a drill it’s a real fire,” said Scarlett.
“Where is it?” replied Duke.
“I’m not sure.”
“We better look. Other Joes might be in trouble.”
11432112121111111121111121211.title: Fire

114321121211111111211111212111.content:
The pair then went towards where the smoke was coming from. They saw that it was one of the training rooms. Scarlett could see that one of the Joes was on the ground unconscious.
"There's someone in here," said Scarlett.
"Then we'll have to rescue him," replied Duke.
"I'll go in."
"Are you sure?"
"I don't have time to argue. I'll go."
Scarlett then went inside. her enhanced sight was enabling her to see through the smoke. But she couldn't breathe and she had to get out fast before anything happened to her.
She found the Joe by some equipment. She quickly picked him up and got out of the area. He was carried to safe place and Scarlett began to perform CPR. This was when she noticed that it was Mutt.
"Come on breathe!"
The next thing she knew Mutt was coughing. This made her happier and he slowly opened his eyes.

What does he say?
114321121211111111211111212111.title: Saved

1143211212111111112111112121112.content:
"Are you an angel?" asked Mutt. He was a little dazed after his whole experience. Scarlett was the first person he saw.
"No I'm not an angel," replied Scarlett.
"Well you're the next best thing."
But a few seconds later some of the Joes came with a hose pipe and they began to put the fire out. But Scarlett and Duke took Mutt to the medi lab to get some medical attention. he seemed to be alright.
"Scarlett you saved his life," said Duke.
"It was nothing really," replied Scarlett.
"No you really deserve some recognition. Not everyone could do what you just did. Congradulations."
"Thanks."
"You're welcome." Duke then picked his walkie talkie from his pocket and he radioed to one of the Joes. "This is Duke I want a full investigation into the cause of that fire. I want it done asap."
"Yes sir," replied a Voice.
"Good."
1143211212111111112111112121112.title: Angel

11432112121111111121111121211121.content:
As the days went by Scarlett grew bigger and bigger. A week after the exposure she now stood over 50 feet in height. She was too big to stay inside. She was now permanently an outside girl.
Food wasn't much of a problem for her. Her body had developed a strang energy absorber. She could eat a normal sized meal and it would sustain her for an entire day. She was also absorbing solar radiation to keep her energy high.
But she also wasn't finished growing. The signs of growth were still there and stronger then ever.This worried her and all of the others.
But G.I Joe was able to give her a large tent to sleep in. But everyone knew that it would only be temporary before she grew out of that like everything else. But thankfully her G.I.Joe Uniform had grown with her.
Despite her changes Scarlett still did everything she tried to do normally. She still attended raining and breifings.
Scarlett would normally sit just out of the window and she would look and hear everything that was happening.
Right now there was a meeting about Cobra. They were on the move again but they were trying to see what they were up to.

Will Scarlett be involved?
11432112121111111121111121211121.title: 50 foot Scarlett

114321121211111111211111212111211.content:
"Maybe they're finally quitting," said Shipwreck.
"Everyone knows that Cobra don't give up easily," replied Flint.
"Well we can all hope."
"Well if there was no Cobra the Government wouldn't need us. So in a sense we need Cobra so we can operate. But if Cobra are no more then the world will finally be safe and if G.I Joe being disbanded is the price then so be it."
"What's Cobra up to now?" asked Scarlett. She was keeping her voice down. She had a few incidents when her voice was too high.
"I'm not sure. They've never tried anything like this before. They're trying to steal the World's supply of oil. But there's something strange about it. Take a look for youselves ladies and gentlemen."
He then pressed play on a vcr and security footage of a refinery showed that the oil was being sucked up through the ground.
"Now if that isn't Cobra I don't know what it is," said Flint.
"Why that way?" replied Cover Girl.
"I'm not sure."
"They're cowards."
114321121211111111211111212111211.title: Oil

1143211212111111112111112121112111.content:
Meanwhile at Cobra Headquarters the Cobra Commander was having a meeting with some of the Cobra members. These included Destro, the Baroness, Zartan, Mind Bender and Storm Shadow. They were sitting on what seemed to be a company office type table. The Cobra Commander was wearing his metal face mask.
“Ladies and Gentlemen we are here today because we will finally eradicate G. I Joe,” said the Cobra Commander.
“You’ve said that dozens of times Cobra Commander,” replied Zartan. “What will make this attempt any different?”
“I find your lack of faith disturbing Zartan. This time we are prepared for anything that they throw at us.”
“Even Scarlett?” replied Storm Shadow.
“Especially that over grown bitch.” He then looked at Destro. “Destro what is Scarlett’s estimated height?”
“About 50 feet by now my Commander,” replied Destro.
“Alright.” He then looked at Mind Bender. “Mind Bender is the weapon ready?”
“Yes Cobra Commander it is at operational level,” replied Mind Bender. “It is online and ready to go.”

What is this weapon?
1143211212111111112111112121112111.title: Cobra Meeting

11432112121111111121111121211121112.content:
"Excellent," said the Cobra Commander. "That is more then enough to crush G I Joe once and for all."
"What do you plan on doing Cobra Commander?" asked the Baroness.
"Lets just say by the end of the day G I Joe will be no more. Then the next day we will rule the world."
A few hours later Cobra attacked a Nuclear power plant. This isntantly went over to G I Joe. They began to mobilize so that they could dfend it. But by the entrance she Scarlett was about to leave but Flint stopped her.
"Scarlett I'm afraid you'll have to stay here," said Flint.
"Yes sir," replied Scarlett. "But why?"
"We need you here in case Cobra strike here. Plus you can be our ace up our sleeve if we need you."
"Its not because you don't trust me around a nuclear reactor?"
"The world would rather trust you then Cobra."
"Ok Flint."
"Good now listen out for any distress signals."
"As you command."
11432112121111111121111121211121112.title: Mystery weapon

114321121211111111211111212111211121.content:
Although Scarlett didn't really like staying at the Headquarters but she didn't want to argue with her superior officer. She stayed at the base with some of the other Joes. She tried to do things to entertain herself.
But at the Nuclear power plant the Cobra agents could see that G. I. Joe was coming. Destro was watching them through some binoculors. He smield when he saw them come closer.
"Good old predicatable G. I. Joe," said Destro. "Baronesss give the signal to the Cobra Commander."
The Baroness then fired a signal into the air. The forces of G. I Joe had just reached the Nuclear plant. But they were being extrmely cautious. they didn't want to start a nuclear meltdown. It could kill millions.
But then they saw something come from the sky. It seemed to be a giant humanoid type robot. It was armed with cannons and machine. In the head of it the Cobra Commander was at the controls.
"Today G. I Joe dies!" he shouted.
He then began to fire at them. The troops of G. I. Joe had to find cover or else they would be killed.

What happens?
114321121211111111211111212111211121.title: Robot

1143211212111111112111112121112111211.content:
"We can't fight against that," said Shipwreck.
"You're right we can't," replied Flint. He then got onto his radio and tried to radio back to HQ.
"What are you doing?"
"Call for the only Joe who can help us."
At Headquarters Scarlett was sitting down and trying to relax. But she was worried about the other Joes. She then could hear Flint's voice in her ear. She put her finger to it so she could communicate.
"Scarlett here," she said.
"Scarlett we need you here ASAP," replied Flint.
"What's happening?"
"Cobra has a new weapon. We're pinned down."
"I'll be right there."
Scarlett then sttod up and began to run towards where the Joes were. She had to be fast. Joes were likely to be killed.
But when she got there she was surprised to see the giant robot. But it made things that little bit more exciting.
1143211212111111112111112121112111211.title: ASAP

11432112121111111121111121211121112111.content:
Scarlett quickly got to the power plant. But the first thing she saw was the Giant Robot. She could also see the Cobra Commander at the controls. She could hear him laughing at her.
“So it’s the super sized Joe,” said the Cobra Commander. “Even you with your strength can’t defeat this Scarlett.”
“For now I’m not going to try and defeat you,” replied Scarlett.
“Then you will die.”
He then began to fire the cannons at her. But she was dodging out of the way. But she needed to get the Robot out of the civilized area and into somewhere more rural so that no one would be hurt.
She grabbed the leg of the robot and she began to swing it around. When her momentum was at maximum she let go and the robot went flying for miles. Scarlett ran after him but he used rockets to stabilize himself.
“You’ll have to do better then that,” said the Cobra Commander.
“You’re right I do,” replied Scarlett. “But now that there’s no people around I can finally kick your ass.”
“Crap.”

Who will win?
11432112121111111121111121211121112111.title: Rural

114321121211111111211111212111211121111.content:
Scarlett began to use her superior fighting skills on the giant robot. But not much seemed to be denting it.
“You’re attempts are laughable at best,” said the Cobra Commander.
“I’m not beaten yet,” replied Scarlett. “As long as I’m still breathing you will never win no matter what.”
“I would like the correct you there my dear.”
He then fired a missile at her and it hit her right in her chest. The explosion made her step back a little and she could feel the pain. She could also hear the Cobra Commander laughing his head off.
“Is that all you have?”
“Not by a long shop.”
“Good I wanted to make your death even longer.”
He went to punch her but Scarlett caught the fist. She began to squeeze with everything she had. It eventually began to shatter.
“No this can’t be,” said the Cobra Commander.
“Yes I can.”
She then ripped off the arm.
114321121211111111211111212111211121111.title: Fight

1143211212111111112111112121112111211111.content:
The Cobra Commander was in complete shock. He didn't think that she would be able to do that. The Robot took a few steps back.
"No do you realise just how much this thing costs?" asked the Cobra Commander. He was trying to get away.
"A lifetime behind bars," replied Scarlett.
She then ripped off the other arm and then took off the head. She kicked the robo over and she held the head in her hands. She took a closer look to see if the Cobra Commander was still in there.
"Looks liek you're all washed up," said Scarlett.
"That's what you think," replied the Cobra Commander.
The head then released a gas and Scarlett coughd in it. The Cobra Commander then used the seat ejection to eject himself from the head and he made his escape. Scarlett couldn't do anything about it.
When the smoke cleared away she could tell that he wasn't there. This disappointed her a little.
"You've gotten away this time but next time he won't be so lucky," she said. She then made her way to the other Joes.

Who far forward do we go?
1143211212111111112111112121112111211111.title: Victory

114322.content: How about the American Dream from Marvel's M2 universe?
114322.title: American Dream?

choices: Shut up man and get on with the Story!
1143221.content:
Ok most of you probably don't know what the Marvel M2 universe is. Well I'll tell you what it is.
Basically in the clone saga of the Spider-Man some years back Mary Jane had a miscarriage. But there was an issue of the series What if? that asked What if the child had survived.
This is the beginning of the M2 universe. In this universe most of the heroes have somewhat retired and their chidlren have taken over their roles. Here's a few key heroes.

Spider-Girl. The daughter of the retired Spider-Man and Mary Jane Watson. She has all the powers of Spider-Man.

Avengers-Next. The next generation of the Avengers. Key characters involve American Dream (Daughter of Sharon Carter agent of S.H.I.E.L.D), J2 (Son of the Juggernaut), Mainframe (Creation of Iron-Man), Bluestreak, Stinger (Alternate version of Cassie Lang), Kevin Masterson (Son of Thunderstrike).

Uncanny X-People- A future verson of the X-Men. Members include Cyclops, Wolverine, Angry Eagle, Push, Spanner, Torque, Wild Thing (Daughter of Wolverine), Simian.

Fantasic Five. They still ahve the original four members (Mr. Fantastic, Invisible Woman, Human Torch and the Thing). But it also has Psi Lord (Franklin Richards grown up) and Ms Fantasic.

If you want to know more look these guys up on Wikipedia, comicvine and the marvel database.
1143221.title: Introduction of the Marvel M2 universe

11432211.content:
It was an average day at the Avengers mansion. Shannon Carter aka The American Dream was doing her civilian job. She was the tour guide at the Avengers Mansion. Right now it was her only source of income since being a costume crime fighter didn’t exactly pay the bills.
Shannon had some Japanese tourists and they were taking pictures of almost everything that they saw.
“We are now entering the Avengers sitting room,” said Shannon. “When the Avengers aren’t stopping evil or training they come here to have a rest and have a chat.” She then pointed to a chair in particular. “This chair belonged to Thor the Norse God of Thunder. This proves that even Gods need to rest from time to time.”
They spent a few minutes in this room. A couple of the tourists sat in Thor’s seat and someone else took a picture of them.
But then an alarm went off. The tourists began to panic a little but Shannon was able to keep things calm.
“I’m afraid that’ll have to conclude the tour,” said Shannon. “The Avengers are being called into action.”
She began to lead the tourists away. No one knew that she was the American Dream.

What's the problem?
11432211.title: Shannon Carter

114322112.content:
When Shannon was sure that all the tourists were safe and out of the mansion she got changed into her American Dream costume. She also grabbed her Captain America shield and she went to the sub basement where some of the other avengers were. These included Bluestreak, J2, Stinger and Mainframe. They were looking at a map on the big screen of the Avengers computer.
“Where’s everyone else?” asked the American Dream.
“They’re not here,” replied Stinger. “A few of them are on leave and I believe Kevin is visiting family.”
“Great so what’s the situation?”
“The Revengers are attacking again. This time it’s at a science block at the local university.” She then paused a little. “But there’s not much use there. They are working on a teleporter but that’s about it.”
“I say we go there and kick Revenger butt,” added J2.
“Ok but we better make it fast I’ve got some British tourists coming in an hour,” replied the American Dream. “But we can’t risk anyone getting hurt.”
The Avengers went in their Quinjet to the university. The American Dream was thinking why the Revengers would want a teleporter that didn’t work.
114322112.title: The Revengers

1143221121.content:
As the Quinjet landed by the university they could already see a large hole in its side. The Avengers knew that the Revengers had made it to get inside. It would also prove to be their entry point.
They simple walked through the hole in the wall and they could see a lot of destruction. The American dream was being cautious. But Bluestreak just ran in at an extremely fast pace. None of the other Avengers had hardly any time to react.
“Wait Bluestreak,” said the American Dream. But it was too late she was already gone. The Avengers picked up the pace and in seconds they saw the Revengers. These included the Red Queen (Daughter of Giant-Man and the Wasp), Ion Man and a large man that they had never encountered before.
“Crap it’s the Avengers,” said the Mystery man.
“Keep them occupied,” replied the Red Queen.
Ion Man then went to blast the Avengers. But the American Dream used her shield to block the blast. She then looked towards the other Avengers.
“Stinger get Bluestreak to safety,” she said. “The rest of you make sure Revengers don’t escape.” This sent the Avengers into action. But she was still wary. She knew that the Red Queen always had a trick up her sleeve.

What happens to the American Dream?
1143221121.title: Contact

11432211211.content:
J2 went head to head with the mystery man and mainframe dealt with Ion Man. The red Queen went to get away. The American Dream didn’t want to let that happen so she gave chase to her enemy.
The red Queen looked back and saw the American dream following her. She began to act a little panicky. But it was all an act.
“That glorified Gymnast is following me,” thought the Red Queen. “Perfect everything is going to plan.”
Eventually the Red Queen stopped fleeing and turned around. She then used her zappers to try and take out the American Dream. But all the blasts were being deflected away by her shield.
“Is that really the best you can do?” asked the American Dream.
“Evidently not,” replied the Red Queen.
The Red Queen then flew closer to the American Dream. She knew that she didn’t stand a chance against her in hand to hand combat but she didn’t do it to fight her like this. She had something else in mind.
“Now you’re mine,” said the Red Queen.
She then flew straight at the American Dream.
11432211211.title: Alone with the red Queen

114322112111.content:
The American Dream went to dodge out of the way of the Red Queen. But when she did the red Queen shot a needle at her and it went into her neck. The American Dream felt some pain and she quickly pulled it out.
“Revengers retreat!” shouted the Red Queen.
The Revengers began to retreat. But the needle from the Red Queen had made the American Dream temporarily dazed. She couldn’t chase after them and the Revengers were soon out of the university.
A few hours later the American Dream and Bluestreak were in the infirmary being seen by one of the Avengers doctors. The American Dream had been a little groggy but now she seemed to be fine. Bluestreak had also recovered a little. But her gut still hurt her a little. But she was noticing something strange about her friend. And she was the type to say it out loud and not bottle it up (If it wasn’t anything too bad).
“Dream you look tall,” said Bluestreak.
“Well I have been 6’2 since I was 14,” replied the American Dream. “My aunt told me to be proud of every inch of my height.”
“No I mean you look taller then normal. From looking at you right now I would have said you were either 6’4 or 6’5.”

Does she take any consideration on this?
114322112111.title: Sting of the Queen

1143221121111.content:
"Are you sure about that?" asked the American Dream.
"Yeah I'm sure of it," replied Bluestreak.
"I've known never to doubt you when it comes to things like this. So if you don't mind could you measure me?"
"Well they had a measuring board for our physical check ups."
"Yeah we can use that."
Both the American dream and Bluestreak went to the board to measure her. The American Dream took off her boots because it gave her an extra half an inch in height. But Bluestreak was surprised at the results. She thought that she was only going crazy but she could see that it was real.
"So how tall am I?" asked the American Dream.
"From the board it says that you're 6'4 and a half," replied Bluestreak. She even climbed up a small step and put a mark just over the top of the American Dream's head. She was still in some disbelief. But the facts were still there.
"Wow I am over 6'4."
"Maybe you had a natural growth spurt."
"Two and a half inches in a day is not natural."
1143221121111.title: The American Dream is taller

11432211211111.content:
"Then what is it?" asked the American Dream. "But I definitely have my suspicions." She got a syringe and took her own blood sample."
"What are you going to do with that?" replied Bluestreak.
"Send it to the two people who know more about size changing then anyone else." She then began to walk away.
A few minutes later Stinger and her father Scott Lang looking at the American Dream's blood sample. She was there hereself eagerly awaiting the results of the test. She was a little nervous. This was one of the few times in her life that she had actually been nervous about something.
"Just like you thought," said Scott Lang. "Your sudden growth spurt is not natural. There is a large amount of Pym particles in your blood."
"Great does that mean its causing me to grow?" replied the American Dream. "Or is it stopping?"
"I doubt its going to stop. If anything it looks like its just started. But these Pym particles seem different."
"In what way?"
"They look to be modified."

What does this mean?
11432211211111.title: Sample

114322112111111.content:
“It’s a lot different to the Pym particles we use,” continued Stinger. “If we used our Pym particles on you it wouldn’t work.”
“You can do it,” replied the American Dream. “You shrunk me once before.” (See Last Planet Standing #5)
“That was different. But I warn you there is a limit to how big you can become until your body can’t support your weight anymore.”
“What’s the limit?”
“Our best estimates round it off at about 150 feet.”
“So I still have some way to go? How long do I have?”
“We’re not sure. We need to wait and see how fast you’re growing. It might take weeks or it might take hours we’re not sure.”
“Well when it comes to things like this there’re no two people I trust most. I know you’ll give me answers when you get them.”
“We’ll work around the clock.”
“Thank you.”
The American Dream walked away. But then she looked up at a clock and realised that it was almost time for the next tour.
114322112111111.title: They can't shrink her

1143221121111111.content:
A few minutes later the American Dream was in her room trying to her civilian clothes on. But they were too small for her. She was having to squeeze them on as best as she could. She was having her breathing restricted.
“Come on,” she said.
She eventually got them on. But she felt a little bad. The clothes were extremely tight on her and if she took a deep breath she thought that they would rip off her. But she just had to put it into the back of her mind.
Shannon went to the entrance of the mansion where the British tourists. They had been waiting a few minutes for her to arrive.
“I’m sorry about the wait,” said Shannon. If you have you tickets then we will officially begin the tour.”
The tourists then gave her the tickets. But while she was doing this she felt her clothes get a little tighter. She hoped that it was just her imagination. But deep down she knew that she had grown at least another inch. She tried not to make a fuss of it and she just got on with the tour.
“Ok to start off with we have the main entrance,” said Shannon. “Obviously this is the main way to get in and out of the building.”

Will anything happen during the tour?
1143221121111111.title: Tight clothes

11432211211111111.content:
The tour seemed to go without a hitch. Although Shannon's clothes were a little tight she made sure that she didn't make any fuss of it. She hoped no one would notice that she was four inches taller then normal.
Eventually they came to a room with potraits of different Avengers. But each of these Avengers had been killed in action. She always got a little emotional when she came into this room. But she was able to suck it up.
"Here you have the pictures of fallen Avengers," said Shannon. "This shows that the Avengers' war on crime does have its casulties."
But then she felt a pian in her stomach. It didn't seem like much at first. But the pain got worse by the moment. She felt like she was going to keel over. But she was still stand up as best as she could.
"Sorry ladies and gentlemen but I need to go to the rest room," said Shannon. "Its an emergancy."
She then pratically ran towards the rest room. her stomach was still in pain and she could feel her clothes getting even tigher.
"Not now," she thougt.
Then she heard something rip.
11432211211111111.title: Still growing

114322112111111111.content:
"No please," said Shannon.
She then felt her clothes rip off her. She was having a growth spurt and it happened fast. She saw the world around her shrink. But it stopped when her head hit the ceiling. This caused her some pain.
But then Bluestreak in her civilian clothes. She then saw the now Amazon Shannon standing there with only her bra and panties on. She jumped at first but she was able to calm herself down.
"Shannon?" asked Blue.
"Blue thank God you're here," replied Shannon.
"What happened to you?"
"I grew again."
"What are you going to do?"
"You're going to do me a favour if you don't mind. I've showed you how to give a tour of the mansion."
"Yes but..."
"Good I need you to keep those tourists going. With them distracted I can go to my room and get changed into something decent."

Can Blue do this?
114322112111111111.title: Amazon Shannon

1143221121111111111.content:
Blue eventually left the Ladies’ room but she did her business first. But she went over to the British tourists and they were surprised to see her. She tried to give them a smile before explaining why she was there.
“I’m sorry Miss Carter can not continue the tour with you today,” said Blue. She could hear a sigh from the tourists. “But don’t worry she has appointed me to finish off where she left off.”
As Blue took the tourists away the 8 foot tall Shannon came out of the Ladies’ room. She quickly walked to her room. But she made sure that she wasn’t seen. But the moment she got there she got her costume out. Since it was made from unstable molecules it still fit her expanded body. But for now she didn’t put her mask on since she was staying in her room.
But then Shannon picked up her phone and went to dial the number for Stinger. But her fingers were too big to press any of the buttons. It took her a few attempts to dial in the number. She then heard it ring.
“This is Dr Lang here,” said Stinger.
“Stinger thank God,” replied Shannon. “I’ve got a big problem.”
“Let me guess you’ve had another growth spurt?”
1143221121111111111.title: Getting to Shannon's room

11432211211111111111.content:
“Yes but how did you know?” asked Shannon.
“Well first off your voice is louder then usual and you’re doing that unintentionally,” replied Stinger. “And I know you give me time to do things unless it’s an emergency. Plus I had a hunch.”
“Wow you’re good.”
“How tall are you now?”
“I’m not sure but if I stand up straight my head touches the ceiling. I’m guessing that’s pretty tall.”
“Well the height of the average ceiling is around 8 feet high so I’m guessing that’s how tall you are now.”
“Can you do anything to help me?”
“Well my father and I are still working on it. The only thing I can recommend now is that you go either outside or in another room with a higher ceiling.”
“I could work out in the gym.”
“Yes you do that. But keep a cell phone with you. I’ll call you if I’ve made any progress in stopping your growth.”
“Thank you Cassie.”

What happens?
11432211211111111111.title: Calling Stinger

114322112111111111112.content:
Shannon gave out a sigh. She went to stand back up but her head hit the ceiling again. She rubbed it with some pain. But she also picked up her mask. She didn’t want to walk down the hallways without it while there was a tour on.
But Shannon did find some difficulties leaving her room. She was a lot taller then the door frame and she had to bend down to get through it. She popped out the other side and she put her mask on.
But no sooner had she left she saw a man there. He took a picture of her and he seemed to be happy. He was also Japanese.
“The American Dream?” he asked. “You look a lot shorter on TV.” He then took another picture of her.
“What are you doing here without the tour group?” replied the American Dream. She crossed her arms.
“Well I kinda got lost. It’s only just begun as well.”
“I’ll take you back to the tour group. But don’t wonder off again. Although this place may not seem it it can be very dangerous.”
“Yes ma’am.”
“Now guessing from you time here I think I know where the group is.”
114322112111111111112.title: Shannon is spotted

1143221121111111111121.content:
The American Dream then began to walk down the hallway with the tourist behind her. She made sure that he didn't wonder off anywhere. She was also thinking about where his group could be.
She eventually heard Blue talking and she knew that she had found the Tour group. But when she came into sight the entire group looked up at her in amazement. One even took a picture of her.
"Err Dream?" asked Blue.
"Sorry to interrupt I was just bringing back one of the group members," replied the American Dream. "Seems that he wondered off."
"American Dream?" said a little voice.
The American dream then looked down and saw a little Girl right by her feet. She looked cute and she couldn't help but squat down to her She smiled at the little girl and the girl was curious.
"Why hello there," said the American Dream.
"You're very tall you must drink a lot of milk," replied the Little Girl. Her parents then went to grab her.
"It's alright."

Will the American Dream stop for very long?
1143221121111111111121.title: Bringing him back

11432211211111111111212.content:
"You look a lot shorter on the TV," said the little Girl.
"Well right now I have a growing problem," replied the American Dream. "But I already have experts working on my condition?"
"Will you be as big as Godzilla?"
"Not that big but I'll probably get close." The American Dream then stod up to her full height. "Anyway I've gotta go. Enjoy the rest of your tour."
The American Dream then walked away. The tourists then waved goodbye to her as she walked. But eventually she got to the gym. The ceiling was a lot higher here and she felt a lot more comfortable.
For now she wanted to do a little weight training. She lifted the weights that she used to lift. But they seemed to be lighter. She decided to put a few more weights on. Her strength might have been enhanced but it was still nothing compared to that of J2 so she couldn't use his weights.
"Hopefully this'll take my mind off the matters had hand," she thought. "Nothing a little exercise can't help."
But then she began to hear an alarm. She gave out a sigh but she knew that she was being called into action.
11432211211111111111212.title: Doesn't stay very long

114322112111111111112121.content:
The American Dream went through her training exercises in the hopes of taking her mind off what was happening to her. But she didn’t notice just how heavy the weights were. But she was working up a sweat.
But just before she went to rest for a moment J2 came in. He was read to do some weight training. But he saw that the American Dream was already doing some. He looked up at her.
“Hey Dream,” said J2.
“Hi J2,” replied the American Dream.
“Bluestreak told me that you were bigger. But I didn’t expect you to be this much bigger. You’re even taller then me.”
“When we’re in our normal states I am taller then you.”
“Don’t have to remind me.”
“Sorry.”
“Don’t worry about it. But right now I want to see if I can bench press more then the Hulk on his best day.”
“Good luck with that.”
“I’ve so much strength that I don’t need luck.”

What does she do?
114322112111111111112121.title: gym

1143221121111111111121212.content:
The American Dream decided to test her agility while J2 did his weight training. She wanted to see if her increased size made her anymore or less agile. She hoped that it didn’t do anything to it.
In a special room disks flew out at her. She began to use her agility to dodge each of the disks. To her relief her size hadn’t made her any less agile then she normally was. But she could feel her stomach rumbling. She didn’t realise just how hungry she was at this moment in time. With the excitement she had forgotten that she hadn’t eaten anything in a while.
“Well a girl’s gotta eat,” thought the American Dream.
She soon made her way to the cafeteria. There were one or two of the Avengers already in there eating. They almost dropped their food when they saw her come in. Some of them nearly choked.
She didn’t take much notice of them and she just went to counter and she looked at some of the food. She licked her lips.
“W-what would you like?” asked the woman behind the counter.
“Yes I’d like the day’s special please,” replied the American dream. She then felt her stomach rumble. “Make that two.”
1143221121111111111121212.title: Still very agile

choices: Stay here with the American Dream
What's going on at Revengers HQ
11432211211111111111212121.content:
"Fine," said the Woman behin the counter.
The woman then dished up two of the Day's specials for the American Dream. She thanked her and then walked to a table. They all looked a lot smaller now that she was a little over 8 feet tall.
American Dream eventually sat down on a chair and began to eat her lunch. She couldn't put her legs under the table fully. She was used to this anyway since she was natural 6'2. But now she couldn't put her legs under even more.
"Note to self," she thought. "Buy some bigger tables."
But then she began to hear something crack a little. It seemed small at first but then it became louder. At first she thought that something important was cracking. She looked towards the wall and she saw that it was still perfectly normal. She gave out a sigh of relief.
But no sooner had she done this the chair that she was sitting on broke. She quickly fell to the ground. It caused her some pain and her food had gone all over her. Everyone stared at her.
One random person even went over to her to see if he could help her up to her feet. But she was able to do this herself.

Where do we go?
11432211211111111111212121.title: Lunch

114322112111111111112121212.content:
Meanwhile at the Headquarters of the Revengers the Red Queen was looking at a test tube with a red liquid in it. She was smiling to herself. But then the mysterious man from before came in. He was a little nervous being around the Red Queen. He knew how dangerous she was.
"What's that stuff?" asked the Man.
"This Golem is Pym Particles?" replied the Red Queen.
"What particles?"
"Pym Particles. They were created by my father. They're what gave him and my mother their size changing powers. And this batch is what I put into the American Dream. I can just see it in the headlines now. American Dream crushes half of the city."
"You want to make her big? But won't that make her more powerful?"
"Temporarily yes but after a certain amount of time she grow too large and her body won't be able to support her." She then held up a test tube with a blue liquid. "And this is her cure. Sort of."
"What's that?"
"Pym particles that'll make her shrink. But I've modified it. Whoever drinks this batch will shrink infinitely."
114322112111111111112121212.title: Meanwhile...

choices: No let's go back to the Avengers
1143221121111111111121212121.content:
“So?” asked Golem.
“So when the American Dream gets too big she’ll die. But her dead body will keep growing and growing,” replied the Red Queen. “If she doesn’t want to see the human race crushed beneath her rotting carcass she drink this and be so small that an atom is the size of a planet.”
“But will she take it?”
“Of course she would. She’d do anything to help people. Even if it means ceasing to exist. She’s so predictable.”
“When will she grow too big?”
“In a few days give or take. I can hardly wait to see the looks on the faces of the people when they see their hero destroying everything they hold dear to them. And besides with her out of the way the Avengers will be easy picking.”
“The Avengers are pretty tough?”
“But without a leader they’d go in circles. Then we will destroy them just like they destroyed my parents.”
“They’re not all that bad.”
"What?"

Do we stay here?
1143221121111111111121212121.title: So

11432211211111111111212121212.content:
A little while later at the Avengers Mansion the Avengers were being called to another event. It was rare that they'd get two big events like this in one day. It was getting close to evening.
"Don't these guys ever get tired?" asked J2.
"Crime doesn't rest," replied the American Dream.
"Can't it rest a little?"
"Unfortunately no. If crime did take breaks then I'd go on vacation from time to time." She tried to make it sound like a joke. But then she looked towards Mainframe. "Where's the disturbance?"
"In Times Square," replied Mainframe.
"Great ok let's see if we can end this fast."
The Avengers then went towards the Quinhjet. When they got inside the American Dream was having some difficulties getting into the co-pilot's seat. The legs were long for her anyway. But now that they were even longer so she couldn't fit in. She eventually had to admit defeat.
"Does anyone else want to co-pilot?" asked the American Dream.
"Me," replied Bluestreak.
11432211211111111111212121212.title: Another situation

114322112111111111112121212121.content:
Bluestreak quickly went to the front of the Quinjet. She sat down in the co-pilot seat while the American Dream went into the passenger seat. Although the seat was still a little too small for her she had a lot more leg room.
“You did pass your test right?” asked J2.
“Yep in record time,” replied Bluestreak.
The Quinjet then took off and it went quickly towards the Times Square. It was going extremely fast but compared to Bluestreak it was going very slowly. She wanted it to speed up a little.
“Can’t this thing go any faster?” she asked.
“I think this is fast enough,” replied the American Dream.
“There’s no such thing as fast enough.”
“For now there is.”
Eventually they saw Times Square. For them it couldn’t come soon enough and they came down to land. Everyone was glad to be off except Bluestreak. She enjoyed piloting the Quinjet.
“Let’s do that again,” said Bluestreak.
“No.”

What will happen to the American Dream?
114322112111111111112121212121.title: Speed up

1143221121111111111121212121212.content:
From what they could see the Hulk was smashing everything in sight. The Avengers had no idea that it was him that was causing the disturbance. They all knew that they had to deal with him fast.
"Avengers finish him fast," said the American Dream. "The longer he's here the more damage he can do."
The Avengers then began to go toe to toe with the Hulk. J2 was the only member of the Avengers who could withstand the Hulk in raw power wise. But the Avengers were helping him as best as they could.
"Come on Banner I'd thought you'd be better," said J2.
Just then the Hulk punched him and he went flying. The American Dream watched this and she gulped a little.
"There goes our biggest hitter," said the American Dream.
But then she felt a shiver run down her spine. She also felt stretchy and she realised what was going to happen. She saw the world around her shrink once more. The Avengers and the Hulk stopped fighting when they saw her grow. She tripled her height util she was 24 feet tall.
"Crap."
1143221121111111111121212121212.title: Next spurt

11432211211111111111212121212121.content:
The American Dream took a quick look at her body and of the surrounding areas. She couldn't believe what she was seeing. But then she looked at the Hulk and her mind went straight back to him. Her top priority was to make sure he didn't hurt anyone else. She held onto her shiled. But when she looked at it it seemed to be a lot smaller then she remembered.
"Guess my shield doesn't grow with me," said the American Dream. She looked at the Hulk again. "Now Doctor Banner either surrender or I'll have to stop you myself." She had a stern look.
"Hulk smash giant girl," replied the Hulk.
"Ok I tried to be nice."
She then went to grab the Hulk but he punched her in her chin. She went flying to the ground and her jaw was hurting.
"Guess I'm not as strong as I thought." She then looked over to the Avengers. A few of them were still in disbelief. "We need to use teamwork. He's stronger then us all but with our combined might we can stop him."
"Right Dream," said Bluestrak.
The Avengers began to regroup.

Can they stop the Hulk?
11432211211111111111212121212121.title: Not as strong as she though

114322112111111111112121212121211.content:
“Avengers we’re going to need strategy for this,” said the American Dream. “We can’t beat him this way.”
“What’s the plan?” replied Bluestreak.
“You have to go and get J2 back. We need him for this. The rest of us will play hit and run until you two come back. It might not hurt him that much but it’ll tire him out pretty quickly.” She then smiled a little.
“Got it Big Dream.”
Bluestreak then ran at the speed of sound towards where J2 had landed. But for now the Avengers had to deal with their Hulk problem. The American Dream was still a little off with her size. But she had to put this behind her for the sake of everyone in the city. She gave out a sigh.
“Avengers attack!” she commanded.
The remaining Avengers then quickly attacked the Hulk. He tired to attack back but the Avengers had already retreated. But then the American Dream lifted him up with all her strength and slammed him to the ground. She knew that this wouldn’t defeat him. This was just to waste a little time.
“Come on Bluestreak.”
114322112111111111112121212121211.title: Teamwork

1143221121111111111121212121212111.content:
Meanwhile not toof ar away Bluestreak had just gotten to J2. He was a little dazed after the punch from the Hulk. He was just getting to his feet when Bluestreak got to him. She isntantly tried to help him up.
"Blue what's happening?" asked J2.
"Well we're getting our butts kicked by the Hulk," replied Bluestrak. "And Dream had another growth spurt."
"Another one?"
"Yep she's a whole lot bigger then before. But right now we need to get back to the fight before the Hulk kills the Avengers."
"Right I'll meet you there."
He then jumped high into the air. Bluestrak just used her speed to get back to the fight. She could see the American Dream trying to keep the Hulk at bay. but it wasn't working. The other Avengers were still using hit and run tactics.
"Blue you're back," said the American Dream.
"I found J2," replied Bluestreak.
"Where is he?"
"Oh he's coming."

Will the Avengers hold out?
1143221121111111111121212121212111.title: Found him

11432211211111111111212121212121111.content:
Just then J2 landed on the ground right next to the Hulk. He punched him and the Hulk went flying a little. But all it did was make Hulk angrier. He was getting stronger and the Avengers could see that it wasn’t working.
“What now Dream?” asked J2.
“Obviously fighting him isn’t the answer,” replied the American Dream. ”There’s only one thing we can do.”
“And what’s that?”
“Calm him down.”
“How do we do that?”
“First we stop fighting him. And then we try to talk to him. Anything that can make him feel calmer.”
“Will it work?”
“It has to.”
The American Dream then walked up to the Hulk. He was ready to attack but the American Dream stood her ground.
“Hulk smash Giant Girl,” he said.
“No I only want to talk,” replied the American Dream.
11432211211111111111212121212121111.title: New plan

114322112111111111112121212121211111.content:
“Talk?” asked the Hulk.
“Yes I just want to talk to you,” replied the American Dream. “I don’t want to fight you anymore. It’s pointless. You’re too strong for us.”
“Hulk strongest there is!”
“I know that now. But maybe talking to you is the best thing for you instead of trying to bash your head in.”
From a short distance away Bluestreak and J2 were watching what was happening. They weren’t sure what to do.
“What is she doing?” asked J2.
“She’s using her head,” replied Bluestreak. “She’s trying the calm down the Hulk. Probably the only way we can beat him.”
Back with the Hulk he seemed to be calming down a little and the American Dream put her hand on his shoulder. She gave him a little smile in hopes that this would calm him even further.
“See its better to talk then to fight,” said the American Dream.
“But Hulk like to smash.”
“But smashing isn’t always the answer.”

Is this enough to calm him?
114322112111111111112121212121211111.title: Talk

1143221121111111111121212121212111111.content:
“It’s not?” asked the Hulk.
“Yeah talking can also help solve problems,” replied the American Dream. “It’s a lot better then fighting.”
“No one try to hurt Hulk?”
“See that’s one good thing about talking. No one will try and hurt you. See you’ve already found an upside.”
The American Dream could see that the Hulk’s eyes were turning brown like they should be. She knew that she had to do something to finish all this off. She didn’t want to use violence this time.
“Come here Hulk,” she said. She then began to hug the Hulk. It was a little strange for her but she was able to cope.
“What Giant Girl doing?” asked Hulk.
“Giving you a hug. It makes people feel better. Do you feel any better now?” She then smiled at him.
“Hulk feel better.”
The Hulk then began to revert back to Bruce banner. The American Dream could feel him shrinking in her arms.
1143221121111111111121212121212111111.title: Finish him off in a good way

11432211211111111111212121212121111111.content:
When the process was completed the American Dream let go and Bruce looked up to her. He was surprised to see her at that size. He wasn’t sure about what he was going to say to her.
“Dream you’re…” said Bruce.
“Taller yes,” replied the American Dream.
“But how?”
“I think I have the Red Queen to thank for that.”
“Oh right. But right now I need to ask you and the Avengers a big favour. You need to put me somewhere where I can’t break out and become the Hulk. The transformations are too unpredictable.”
“Ok we’ll do what we can.”
An hour later Bruce was in a specially made cell that was made out of Admantium the strongest metal known to man. Even the Hulk would have problems getting out of this cell block.
The American Dream was there and she was inspecting the cell. Everything seemed to be fine.
“Thank you,” said Bruce.

What happens next?
11432211211111111111212121212121111111.title: Caged up

114322112111111111112121212121211111112.content:
“This cell seems to be strong,” said Bruce. “Good the stronger it is the longer it’ll take the Hulk to break out.”
“We use this on our toughest villains,” replied the American Dream. “No one has ever escaped from it.” She then felt her phone buzzing in her pocket. “Excuse me a moment please.” She picked out her phone. But now it seemed to be too small to sue properly. Her fingers were too big to push a single button. As a last resort she passed the phone down to Bruce Banner. “You wouldn’t mind answering it and then putting it on loudspeaker for me please?”
“Sure.”
Bruce then pressed the pick up call button and then he put it on loudspeaker. He held the phone towards the American Dream.
“Hey Shannon I’ve made a breakthrough,” said Stinger.
“Great you can shrink me?” replied the American Dream.
“No but I can give you the next best thing. I’ve developed a chip with special Pym particles in it that can stop your growth.”
“Great that is the next best thing.”
“I want you to come to my lab ASAP.”
“I’ll see you there.”
114322112111111111112121212121211111112.title: Breakthrough

1143221121111111111121212121212111111121.content:
A few minutes later the American Dream was in Cassie’s lab. But she was amazed to see just how big the American Dream had gotten. She could only just about get into the actual lab.
“I didn’t expect you to be this big,” said Cassie.
“Well unfortunately I am,” replied the American Dream.
“You’re growing faster then I predicted.” She then picked up the chip off the table. She then shrank herself and grew some wings. Then she flew up to spot between the American Dream’s shoulder and neck. She then put the chip there. “Ok I’ve put the chip in.” She then flew to the ground and grew back up.
“What now?”
“Now unfortunately you’ll have to wait until I’ve created the actual cure. But for now you cans till be an Avenger.”
“Even though I can’t fit in the Quinjet?”
“Well you can help more people now.”
“Well some I can some I can’t. If someone is falling then I can help. But if it’s inside a building I’m useless.”
“Just try and think of the upsides.”

Will American Dream find anything to cheer herself up?
1143221121111111111121212121212111111121.title: Stopped

1143221121111111111121212121212111111121.content:
The next morning the American dream woke up in a large room. She had been forced to sleep in hangar like room. She was too big to fit into the Avenger’s mansion. She was a little depressed about this.
“Well guess I better get breakfast,” said the American Dream.
But then Jarvis came in with a trolley full of food. He looked up at the American Dream and he gave her a little smile.
“Good morning Miss Carter,” said Jarvis.
“Morning Jarvis,” replied the American Dream.
“I’ve made your favourite.”
“Thank you.”
