He then began to pass her the food and she ate it quickly. It didn’t take her too long to eat the entire thing.
“That was delicious thank you,” said the American Dream.
“You’re welcome,” replied Jarvis. “By the way did you want me to cancel your appearance at the fund raiser today?”
“What?” She then remembered about the fund raiser she was suppose to go to. “No don’t cancel it.”
1143221121111111111121212121212111111121.title: Next day

1143221121111111111121212121212111111121.content:
“Maybe I should take you back home,” said the Woman. “You must be missed there a whole lot.”
“Coo,” replied Lucky.
“Or I could just leave you here for a few minutes. I’m sure that they won’t mind that.” She then stroked his head. “And I guess you’re hungry.”
“Coo.”
“I’ll get you a little something.”
She then went into the back area to one of the trees that was growing there. She picked a few leaves and brought them to Lucky. He began to eat them up quickly. But then he heard the bell of the door ringing.
“Hide.”
She then hid Lucky and she needed to make sure that he wouldn’t move from where he was. She didn’t want anyone finding him.
The Woman quickly went to her front counter and she saw a man walk in. She tried to put on a smile.
“Can I help you?” asked the Woman.
“I believe you can,” replied the Man. He then passed her a bag. “Fill it up.”

What will Lucky do?
1143221121111111111121212121212111111121.title: Sho[

1143221121111111111121212121212111111121.content:
Sorry wrong chapter. Here's the real one.

“I didn’t think you’d miss it at the Orphanage,” said Jarvis. “I’ll call them to say that you’re still coming.”
“Are you going to tell them about my condition?” replied the American Dream. “I think they’d like to know.”
“I will do. But for now you just relax let me worry about all this.”
“Ok.”
A few hours later at the local orphanage the American Dream was saying hi to all the orphans. She could feel for them since she was an orphan at their age herself. She still didn’t forget the car crash that took her parents away from her and temporarily crippled her. But she tired to put it into the back of her mind.
“Wow you’re very tall,” said a little Girl.
“I know I am,” replied the American Dream. “I normally am tall but no where near this tall.” She smiled a little.
“You must drink a lot of milk.”
“I sure do. And if you want to grow up big and strong you really should do the same. Don’t forget that the healthier the happier you are.”
“Ok.”

Will anything happen?
1143221121111111111121212121212111111121.title: The Orphanage

1143221121111111111121212121212111111121.content:
The American Dream was enjoying her time at the orphanage. Everything was going great until she could hear something. Off a low building a man was about to fall. It was right across the street from the orphanage and she had to spring into action. She looked at the orphans for a moment.
“Be back in a minute,” said the American Dream.
She then quickly ran over towards the man. He was just about to lose his grip and fall. But she was able to catch him. He seemed to be shook up. He looked up at her and he couldn’t see her that well.
“Are you an angel?” he asked.
“No,” replied the American Dream. “But right now I’m the next best thing.” She smiled as she put him on the ground.
“Thank you.”
“You’re welcome. But right now there’s somewhere else I need to be.” She then waved as she walked away. She eventually got back to the orphanage and the orphans were happy to see her. “I’m back.”
The children cheered and this made the American Dream feel happy. Despite her change they still saw her as a hero.”
1143221121111111111121212121212111111121.title: Helping hand

1143221121111111111121212121212111111121.content:
The American Dream had a little bit more time with the Orphans. But then she saw a small balloon hover straight in her face. She also could hear one of the orphans crying and she grabbed the string of the balloon. She brought it down to him and she gave him a little smile.
“Is this your balloon?” asked the American Dream.
“Yes,” replied the Boy.
“Well here you go.”
“Thank you Miss Dream.”
She then gave him the balloon and he was happy again. She then stood back up to her full height. Then she realised what time it was and she looked back to the orphans. She had to go now.
“Sorry guys but I’ve got to go,” said the American Dream.
“Will you come again?” replied an Orphan.
“Sure I will. And remember good things happen to good people.”
The American Dream then began to walk away. But she was being spied on by a fly camera. This camera was being fed back to the Revengers. The Red Queen was no where near happy with what was happening.

What does the Red Queen do?
1143221121111111111121212121212111111121.title: leaving

1143221121111111111121212121212111111121.content:
The Red Queen was furious with what she was seeing. The American Dream had stayed at that size. She wanted her to be even bigger.
“Why isn’t she bigger?” asked the Red Queen. “She should be three times bigger by now.” She crossed her arms.
“Maybe the serum isn’t so powerful,” replied Ion Man.
“No my serum was perfect. Stinger must have come up with something to stop the growth. But surprisingly she hasn’t come up with anything to shrink her. We maybe able to use this as our advantage.”
“But how?”
“I’m not sure but I’ll think of something.”
“And your plans always fail.”
“My plans are brilliant. The heroes are just lucky that’s all. That’s all it is dumb luck.” She sighed a little.
“Maybe I should think of something.”
“No I’m the leader I come up with the plans.”
“Fine.”
“And I think I have one.”
1143221121111111111121212121212111111121.title: Ranting

1143221121111111111121212121212111111121.content:
As the Red Queen planned the American Dream was oblivious to what was happening. She just went to the Avengers Mansion and she went back into the storage area since she was too big to fit anywhere else.
She sat there for what seemed to be an hour. She wanted to do some exercises but there wasn’t that much room for her to do this. All she could do was sit there and wait for Stinger to come up with a cure.
“Come on Stinger,” she said to herself.
“Hey,” replied a Voice.
The American Dream looked down and saw Spider-Girl. She didn’t expect to see her so she was a little surprised.
“What are you doing here?” asked the American Dream.
“Well I heard about what had happened to you so I came to see if you were alright,” replied Spider-Girl.
“I’m as fine as I can be.” She then sighed.
“Come on turn that frown upside down.”
“I wish I could do that.”
“Come on there’s something to be happy about. I heard about how you saved that guy from falling earlier.”

Will the American Dream feel happier?
1143221121111111111121212121212111111121.title: Spider-Girl

1143221121111111111121212121212111111121.content:
“Come on I know you can find good things out of bad situations,” said Spider-Girl. “Just look at what happened to you.”
“My growth?” replied the American Dream.
“No you were crippled but that didn’t stop you. Look at you now. I got my abilities from birth. But you had to train all your life to get where you are. I don’t think I could have done that.”
American Dream began to smile a little. She could see what Spider-Girl was saying and she was right.
“You’re right May,” said the American Dream. “I can’t be depressed over this. I need to find something good to do with my size.”
“That’s more like it.”
“But what could I do?”
“Be an early warning for rain.”
“May!”
“Just kidding.”
“But I could use my height to really good effect by being able climb buildings. But I guess you do that anyway.”
1143221121111111111121212121212111111121.title: Talking sensation

1143221121111111111121212121212111111121.content:
“It is fun,” said Spider-Girl.
“Unfortunately unlike you I’d probably cause some property damage,” replied the American Dream.
“You should be fine.”
Just then the alarms began to go off. Jarvis quickly went to both women. He was very worried and he looked up at the American Dream.
“What’s wrong Jarvis?” asked the American Dream.
“The Revengers are at it again,” replied Jarvis.
“What are the Avengers doing about it?” replied the American Dream.
“Nothing they’re preoccupied with a natural disaster in Mexico. They can’t get back here in time.”
“Then there’s only one thing we can do?” She then looked at Spider-Girl. “Are you ready for action?”
“Oh yes,” replied Spider-Girl.
“Then we’ll just have to deal with them ourselves.”
“Now that’s what I’m talking about.”
“Where are they?”
1143221121111111111121212121212111111121.title: Danger calls

1143221121111111111121212121212111111121.content:
“They’re attacking a cruise ship just off the coast,” said Jarvis. “It might be difficult for you to get to them?”
“What kind of cruise ship?” replied Spider-Girl.
“One that many of the worlds richest are on.”
“You think they’re trying to rob them all?”
“Maybe,” replied the American Dream. “But stealing money isn’t something that the Revengers do. Normally they just steal parts for their latest plan to destroy the Avengers. But right now they’re acting like common crooks.”
“I suggest you be weary when you go,” said Jarvis.
“Ok,” replied Spider-Girl. “But how do we get there?”
“I believe I have the answer.”
A few minutes later Spider-Girl and the American Dream were on their way. But they were on a very small cargo boat. The American Dream was hidden below deck and Spider-Girl was in her civilian clothes.
“You alright down there Dream?” asked May.
“I’m as fine as I can be,” replied the American Dream. “But this cargo hold has way too many rats.”
1143221121111111111121212121212111111121.title: Revengers attack a cruise ship

1143221121111111111121212121212111111121.content:
“I just hope this works,” said the American Dream.
“Oh it will,” replied May.
“You do know how to steer this thing right?”
“How hard can it be?”
May then walked away and went to the ship’s controls. She took a look at them and thought it looked simple. She pulled a lever and the ship began to go full speed straight forward. She had to quickly slow it down.
“Ok maybe this isn’t going to be as easy as I thought it was going to be,” said May. “But I can learn. I hope.”
She was able to get some control on the ship and it steadily went to the cruise ship. She could hear people screaming in terror and it made her sick to her stomach. The American Dream could also hear what was happening.
“How far are we?” asked the American Dream.
“We’re almost there,” replied May.
“Good.”
As the ship got closer the Revengers didn’t notice them. They were too busy getting as much loot as they could.

Will the pair get on board?
1143221121111111111121212121212111111121.title: Sneaking in

1143221121111111111121212121212111111121.content:
When the ship got to the ferry they tried to keep it in a blind spot so that the Revengers couldn’t see them. For now it seemed to be working. But now the pair had to worry about actually getting onto the ship.
May had already gotten changed into her Spider-Girl costume. She was getting ready to climb up the ship. But first she let the American Dream out of the cargo hold and she dived into the water.
“What’s the plan?” asked Spider-Girl.
“First we get onto the ship,” replied the American Dream. “You can just use your powers to climb up the hull.”
“What about you?”
“I’ll find my own way in.”
“Ok good luck.”
“And to you.”
Spider-Girl then began to climb up the hull while the American Dream dived under the water. She had trained herself to hold her breath for very long periods of time. She eventually found an anchor.
“Bingo,” she said.
1143221121111111111121212121212111111121.title: Parting ways

1143221121111111111121212121212111111121.content:
Meanwhile on the ship the Revengers were getting as much as they could. They were putting it into sacks and putting them to one side. But Ion-man seemed to be getting a little impatient with the Red Queen.
“What’s the point of all this?” asked Ion-Man. “It won’t help us crush the Avengers.” He crossed his arms.
“Believe me this’ll help us,” replied the Red Queen.
They then saw some webbing go into Ion-man’s face. The Red Queen then saw Spider-Girl and she kicked her very hard. The Red Queen seemingly went flying but she was able to stabilize herself.
“Here is your friendly neighbourhood Spider-Girl,” said Spider-Girl. “And introducing her partner the stunning American Dream.”
The American Dream then came up. She had climbed the anchor to the cruise deck. Thankfully the ship was still stable even with her increase in size. But the Red Queen just smiled.
“NOW!” she shouted.
Ion-Man then began to fire something at the American Dream. It seemed to be harmless but it was more then harmless.

What will it do?
1143221121111111111121212121212111111121.title: NOW!

1143221121111111111121212121212111111121.content:
“Is that all you have?” asked the American Dream.
“Yep,” replied Ion-Man.
“Then you’re not going to be a problem.”
But then she heard something short circuit. She looked on her shoulder and saw that that the chip keeping her from growing anymore had blown a fuse. She soon realised what was about to happen.
“No!” shouted the American Dream.
She knew that if she didn’t get off the ship she would grow so big that it would overturn and kill almost everyone on board. Spider-Girl saw that the American Dream was about to grow again.
“Dream?” asked Spider-Girl.
“You have to stop them,” replied the American Dream.
She then ran to the side and she jumped overboard and landed in the water. No sooner had she landed in there her body exploded with growth. It was a lot scarier then her other growth spurts.
But then she felt her feet touch the ocean floor and she began to go up until she reached the surface.
1143221121111111111121212121212111111121.title: Short circuit

choices: The American Dream catches Red Queen
The Red Queen falls into the water

The American Dream continued to grow past the surface of the ocean. She could breathe again and her feet were solidly on the seabed. She could see the world shrink around her.
“When will this stop?” she asked.
As she got bigger she could feel her body straining a little. But she hoped it would stop soon. She couldn’t imagine herself getting any bigger then she already was. But she still grew taller.
But eventually she stopped growing at over 150 feet tall. She looked at her body and she was speechless at first. But the Red Queen didn’t seem to be too happy with what had just happened. She was angry at best.
“You should be dead now,” said the Red Queen. “No one can survive being that tall. You should be in unimaginable pain.”
“I should be,” replied the American Dream. She then quickly grabbed the Red Queen and brought her up to her level. “But I’m not.”
“Put me down you overgrown bitch.”
“Gladly.”
She then put her over the water and dropped her.

She then pointed her fist towards the American Dream. But the American Dream could see that something bad was about to happen. She quickly knocked the Red Queen with a single flick of her finger.
“Not so fast,” said the American Dream.
She then looked onto the ship and she could see that Spider-Girl had successfully captured Ion-Man.
“Nice Job Spider-Girl,” said the American Dream.
“And you’re large and in charge,” replied Spider-Girl.
“Please don’t remind me.”
“Well we better get back to land.”
“Is everyone on the ship alright?”
“As far as I know yes.”

1152.content:
We start our tale in Queens New York. In a World where Spider-man, The X-Men, the Fantastic Four and the Ultimates. In Midtown High School we go to room 154. This is where the students would go to get bored out of their skulls with Math. That's right Math. The mot boring subject in the World. Plus today they had the most boring teacher on the planet teaching this class. This teacher is Dr Evans. But the main two students we'll focus on is 15 year old Peter Parker aka Spider-man. And his girlfriend Mary Jane Watson.
"Ok Class," said Dr Evans. "Can anyone tell me what the squared root of 25 times 100 plus 1 is?"
"Psst," whispered Mary Jane to Peter. "This is like so boring."
"Is there something you would like to share with the class?" asked Dr Evans.
"No Dr Evans."
"Good now pay attention this will be on the test."
"How much longer is there?" whispered Peter.
"45 minutes."
"What we still have ages left." But secretly he was gonna take Mary Jane out for a surprise date.
Eventually what felt like an eternity the Math class ended. It was time for the students to go home. But not for our young heroes. Peter took Mary Jane to the roof of a building near a Technology lab. He had bought her up there to watch the sunset.
"Isn't this romantic?" asked Mary Jane.
"Yeah that's why I bought you up here," replied Peter.
Then there was a sound of an alarm from the lab.
"You should go."
Peter started to get his Spider-Man costume on. In a few seconds he was nearly fully costumed. All he had to do was put on his mask. Just before he did he kissed Mary Jane.
"Stay here," said Peter.
He then web slinged to the lab. There just leaving was a pair of masked thieves. They were carrying expensive equipment including an experimental matter expander ray.
"Hey it's the guys who's gonna get their butt kicked by your Friendly Neighbourhood Spider-Man," said Spidetr-Man.
"Oh no it's web head," said one of the thugs. "Let's get outta here."
The two thugs run off in seperate directions. One of them goes towards the city. But the other one with the matter expander ray ran in the direction of Mary Jane. Spider-Man chased the one which was heading to the city.
Meanwhile Mary Jane had gotten herself off the roof and back down on the ground. Then suddenly she saw the thug.
"Hey what are you doing?" she asked.
The thug was completely taken by surprise. He dropped the matter expander and ran away. But then suddenly the matter expander started to turn on. Then suddenly a green ray hit Mary Jane and she falls to the ground.
1152.title: Ultimate Spider-Man

11522.content:
Spider-man had seen what had happened. He gave up his pursuit of the the their and rushed to her side.
"MJ are you alright?" asked Spider-man. He helped her to her feet.
"Yeah I'm fine," replied Mary Jane. "I just feel a little tingly."
"That's great I thought you were hurt."
"No in fact I feel great. I feel like I can run a marathon."
"I think it's best to take you home. But first I need to return this first."
Spider-man picks up the matter expander and goes back to the lab. While he was doing that MJ looked at her hands. Then a jolt of electricity jolted from on finger to the next. She was freaked out by this. Eventually Spider-man returned. But she didn't want to tell him.
He took her back home. When he left she went straight to bed and went almost instantly to sleep.
The next day she was in her history class. Peter was sitting at the desk next to her. Her teacher was talking about history.
"Okay class Nicolas II was the Tsar of Russia," said the Teacher. "What year was he forced to abdicate?"
Mary Jane was really taking any notice. She saw two people holding hands. It was obvious they were in love.
"Argh isn't that sweet," thought Mary Jane. Then sh felt weird. She looks at her hands. The electricity was jumping like wild fire. Also her hands looked like they were getting bigger. Then she noticed her legs were getting longer. She soon realised she was growing.

What does she do?

What happens next?

But she was then worried about what was happening to her. What had caused her to grow? And how did she shrink back? And why was she still an inch taller than usual?
She decided to go back to class. Her teacher was probably wondering where she was.

When they got there Spider-man found one of the scientists.

"Why what's happening to her?"

Spider-man brings Mary Jane to the scientist. At first when he saw her he thought there was nothing wrong with her.
"She seems normal to me."

He takes Mary Jane into a lab where they had specialised equipment. he layed her on an x-ray machine.

"How many growth spurts have you had?"

11522221111.content:
"Right," said the Scientist. "I've found the answer."
Mary Jane and Spider-Man look at him anxiously.
"What is it?" asked Mary Jane. "Am I turning into a giant monster?"
"Well yes and no."
"What do you mean yes and no?"
"I have discovered that your body absorbs emotions."
"Yes it's starting to make sense. But why did I attack Spider-Man the second time I grew."
"When your body absorbs positive emotions. Like love, courage or happiness for example. You feel great you become the nicest person who's ever lived. But when you absorb negative emotions like anger, hate or jealousy for example. You become destructive you build up with rage."
"How come I'm two inches taller than I was this morning?"
"When you shrink back to normal size your body can't fully go back to normal size. For example if you grew another ten times and you shrank back ten times you would end up a foot taller than you were before this whole growing stuff ever occurred."
"Is there a way to cure me?"
"I'm sorry it's beyond science. All I can say is to tell people not to show any emotions towards you. And if they do start practicing your slam dunk."

It was Nick Fury.he had come to pick up Mary Jane and take her to the S.H.I.E.L.D headquarters.

MJ goes with Nick to the S.H.I.E.L.D car just outside her house. Just before she got in she shrank down to almost normal. Now she was a good 5'9 when she was previously about 5'4 before this whole incident happened.
Anyway she was taken to S.H.I.E.L.D headquarters. She taken inside and she saw just how big the place was. It looked bigger on the inside. She saw several people and they were all either agents or scientists.

Which member of the Ultimates will she meet first?

She then saw Tony Stark on his phone. She ran over to meet him. When she came he finished his phone call.

Tony took Mary Jane to a bar room where the other Ultimates were. There was Captain America, Thor, Wasp, Quicksilver, The Scarlet Witch and Hawkeye. They were all having a drink. None of them had noticed her yet.

Mary Jane sat down with the Ultimates. they were careful not to show any emotion towards her. They didn't want her to start growing now would they?

What'll happen next?

"Ok listen up people with got an emergency down town," said Fury. "Several high power mutants are reeking havoc in Manhattan. So far we have Identified two out of the four mutants as Juggernaut and the Vanisher. We have yet to know about the other mutants but they are potentially dangerous. This mission requires only four members of the Ultimates. They will be Captain America, Iron Man, the Scarlet Witch and mar Jane."

The Ultimates stood up and left. But just before Mary Jane left Nick wanted to see her in front of the monitor.

She still had her civilian clothes on. "Well yes."

"Fantastic."
"Now I've gotta go I've got a helicopter to catch."

they they reached the ground the Ultimates showed Mary Jane a lot more positive emotions and she grew to 60 feet tall. Now she was ready for whatever these mutants were gonna throw at her.

As spidey was makeing his daley rounds he went to central park, as he landed on a sofe hill."i don't rember being on any wird hills."SPIDEY-POO?"boomed a voice.

"oh, well i thought i would just what the sunrise,but now i can watch it with you MJ."Spidey said. as he was saying this, He didnt notice that Mj was getting bigger!!!
she was...

It was only when Mary Jane growth sped up when they both noticed that she grew. She stood up and she saw herself go higher than all the buildings in New York. When she stopped growing she was 2,007 feet tall. She looked at herself and she saw a tiny Spider-Man in her hand.
"Wow I've never been this big before," said Mary Jane. "But I feel so good." She saw Spider-Man talking but she couldn't hear what he was saying. "What I can't hear you." She then raises him to her huge ear. "There you go."

"Don't worry. You'll just have to be a little more careful. But for now I've gotta stand here until I shrink. I can't start walking anywhere there's too many people at risk."
Mary Jane stood still for an hour until she felt herself shrinking. Spider-Man web slinged out of her hand and she kept shrinking until she was 6'3. Spider-Man went back to his tall girlfriend.
"MJ do you want to go on a date or something?" asked Spider-Man.

A few days later in the prison for Super Power beings we see Liz Allen under some machines. These machines were keeping her asleep. S.H.I.E.L.D knew that if she was to wake up she'd use her powers to free herself. And if she got free this would cause damage and other more dangerous inmates would escape.
The prison guards were all highly trained agents. But there was a double agent. Like her predecessor she was called the Black Widow. But this one was blond and not a red head like the other. She had orders form her leader to break out Liz Allen. She knew that she was probably the most powerful person on the planet. It was through luck that she was defeated last time.
The Black Widow made her way to the cell that housed Liz and she unlocked it. She put on some hi tech gloves that made Liz levitate. If her body felt any impact she would grow. Black Widow had to be extremely careful. She also had made sure that no one was around. She had spiked the coffee of the guards with King Cobra Venom.
She was able to get Liz out of the machine and she levitate her to a ship that was waiting for them. The ship flew away with both Liz and the Black Widow.
1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.title: Liz Allen escapes

choices: On a mission with the Ultimates
1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.content:
When Liz woke up she found herself floating in a room. There were plenty of other people in this room. They were all super powered but the one that seemed to be in charge was Doctor Doom. Liz had recognised him from the Papers about Latvaria.
"Argh you're awake," said Doctor Doom. "I was hoping that Black Widow's work hadn't been disappointing."
"You're Doom," replied Liz.
"Good at least I won't have to introduce myself. You're probably wondering what happened to you."
"Yeah last thing I remember I was in a helicopter in some glue then nothing."
"S.H.I.E.L.D put you in suspended animation. Your powers were too risky to keep you awake. Your power to increase your size when your body feels any kind of impact. You would have been unstoppable until that Mary Jane Watson girl caught you by sheer luck."
"Yeah I remember she got me captured."
"I guess you hate her?"
"Yeah I hate the bitch. But what is this place?"
"Imagine us as the anti-Ultimates. And you will make a powerful member. Do you agree? Do you want revenge of Mary Jane Watson?"
"Yes I do."

Where is Mary Jane?
1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.title: Anti-Ultimates

1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.content:
Mary Jane was currently on a mission in the Amazon Rainforest with a few of the other Ultimates. These included Captain America, Wasp and Thor.
There was a flood and they were saving the people who had been swept away. Mary Jane was 50 feet tall and was able to easily take them out of the water. Their happiness of being free of the water made her even bigger.
Eventually everyone was out of the water and they all celebrated on a victory. But they still had a slight problem.
Mary Jane was 80 feet tall and she wouldn't shrink down to normal for another few hours. But S.H.I.E.L.D had an idea. They got several helicopters and transported her back to America like they did with Giant-Man.
When they touched down she shrank down to her normal size plus an inch. She was happy to be normal again. She took off her goggles and she saw that they left a mark on her face.
Everyone tried not laugh. But if they did this would make her grow again and they had only just gotten her small.
After a small celebration Mary Jane went back to her home. But something was very odd.
1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.title: Trouble in the Amazon

1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.content:
Mary Jane found that her house was seemingly empty. Her Mother should have been home from work an hour ago but there was no sign of her. She looked into the kitchen but there wasn't any note to say where she had gone. Her mother always left as note if she had to go out for any unexpected reason.
There was no sign of false entry so Kidnapping seemed to be out of the question. But she still contacted Peter.
He came around within minutes. During that time she called her Mother's cell phone but there was no answer. She became increasingly worried.
When Peter got there she gave him a big hug. He knew that he had to be careful with her emotions while he was with her. If he showed any negative emotions she would go on an almost unstoppable rampage. If he showed her positive emotions then she would grow right out of her house and that was the last thing he wanted.
"What's wrong MJ?" asked Peter.
"My Mom's gone missing," replied Mary Jane. "She's not here and she's not answering her cell phone."
"Maybe she's just in a place where there's no signal."
"I hope so."

What happens next?
1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.title: Missing Mom

1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.content:
On the TV the news came on about a Bank Robbery. The robbers had high tech weapons and the Police didn't stand a chance. They knew that this was a job for Spider-Man and the new and improved Mary Jane.
They both got changed into their costumes and they went outside. Peter kissed his girlfriend and she soaked up the positive emotion like a sponge. She grew to 50 feet tall. He web slinged up to her shoulder.
"Ok MJ to the Bank," said Spider-Man.
"Yes sir," replied Mary Jane.
She began to walk towards the Bank. When they began to get close news helicopters started to circle around her head. This annoyed her a little but eventually they got to the bank.
The Robbers were still inside and they didn't know that they were there. Spiderman went inside and he confronted the robbers.
"Hey it's that wall crawling creep," said one Robber.
"Blow him to dust!" shouted another Robber.
They began to open fire at him but he was able to dodge them all easily. He was driving them outside and right into the waiting hands of the 50 foot Mary Jane.
1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.title: Trouble at the Bank
