Mary Jane picked up both the Robbers with each hand and they dropped the money. One shot her in the face but she barely felt anything.
"Put me down you over grown freak!" shouted One Robber.
"No at least not until New York's finest gets here," replied Mary Jane.
Spider-Man ran outside of the bank and looked up at his giantess of a girlfriend. He smiled at her.
"Great job MJ," he said.
"You're welcome Spidey." Then they heard sirens and they knew what was coming. "Oh here they come guys."
When the police reached them she passed them the thieves and then she picked up Spider-Man and they walked away.
When Mary Jane got close to her house her growth ran out and she shrank down to another inch above her previous height. Now she was easily tall enough to play centre in Basketball.
"That was great Peter," said Mary Jane. "We should really partner up like that again in the future. It's a lot less stressful than any Ultimates Mission."
"I know what you mean but now let's see if your mom's back."

Is she?
1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.title: That was fun

1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.content:
The pair got into the house but Mary Jane's mother was still missing. She panicked a little.
"Oh my God she's still not back," said Mary Jane. "Something's definitely wrong."
"Ok just calm down MJ," replied Peter. "Where would your mom go?"
"I don't know a friend's maybe or buying something for dinner."
"First off we know that she's not stuck in traffic since we know that the roads are clear. Second find your mom's address book and call her friends to see if they know where she is."
Mary Jane ran upstairs to get her mom's address book. She couldn't believe how low the doors seemed now but this didn't stop her. She found the address and she started to call all of her friends.
But to her horror no one knew where she had gone. This made her worry a little more. She went back downstairs to Peter.
"Peter no one knows where she is," she said.
"We can't call the Police yet she hasn't been gone long enough," replied Peter.
"Oh God what's happened to her. I just hope she' alright."
"I think that she's going to be fine MJ."
1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.title: Still nothing

1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.content:
Meanwhile in Latvaria we see MJ's mother waking up in a cell. She panics until she sees Liz Allen and a look of relief comes onto her face.
"Oh thank God Liz," she said. "Please tell me where I am."
"Why should I tell you?" replied Liz.
"Because you're one of MJ's friends?"
"Correction former friend. Not after what she did to me in New York. But now I know how to activate my powers."
"Oh God."
"Yes all I need is my body to feel some sort of impact. Even just a click of a finger." Liz clicks her fingers and she doubles in size. "And I become huge. Unlike you Mary Jane who has some difficulty sometimes."
"Please let me out."
"So sorry I can't do that. Doom would be angry at me. Besides I like seeing you all small and afraid."
Liz walks away and goes to Doctor Doom. He is looking at his big screen.
"The prisoner is awake and afraid."
"Good Liz," replied Doctor Doom. "The Chameleon is in place."
1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.title: Latvaria

1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.content:
Meanwhile back at MJ's house the Chameleon was about to enter the house. He had disguised himself as Mary Jane's mother and he hid a gun in his back pocket. He had been fully updated about Mary Jane's powers and he learned to stop his emotions.
When he entered marry Jane ran up to him and hugged him.
"Mom you're back," she said. She then stopped hugging her. "Where were you?"
"I was just out doing some shopping," replied the Chameleon disguised as Mrs Watson.
MJ noticed that she didn't have anything. "But you bought nothing back."
"I couldn't find what I needed."
Peter's spider sense was going crazy and it was coming from MJ Mom. he couldn't figure out why though. She had never set off his spider sense before so why did it now?
"I heard you stopped a bank robbery earlier," said the Chameleon. "Are you alright?"
"Yeah I'm fine you don't have to worry about me."
Peter noticed MJ's mom going into her pocket for something. He noticed a gun and he used his agility to grab it from her hand.

What does Mary Jane do?
1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.title: The Chameleon

1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.content:
Mary Jane then quickly went in front of her mother to defend her from Peter.
"Peter what the hell are you doing?" asked Mary Jane.
"MJ that's not your mom."
"How could you say such a thing?"
"Would your mother carry a gun?"
MJ looked at the gun. It was high tech and she had seen S.H.I.E.L.D agents carry a similar weapon. She looked at her mother.
"Mom?"
"I was given it by Nick Fury," replied MJ's Mom. "He said it was in case anything happened to me."
Mary Jane was buying the story until she noticed that her mother was sweating a little. If she was telling the truth then she wouldn't be sweating.
She grabbed the Chameleon changed to his true appearance. He grabbed a small grenade from his pocket and he through it to the ground. It was a smoke grenade and the room filled with smoke. Mary Jane dropped him and he made his escape.
When the smoke cleared the Chameleon was gone. Peter stood by his basketball player sized girlfriend and now she was even more worried. Her mother was in dire trouble.
1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.title: Revealed

1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.content:
Mary Jane got her cell phone and dialed Nick Fury. It rung for about a minute and she almost lost hope that he would pick up. But eventually she heard his voice.
"Hello," he said.
"General Fury?" replied Mary Jane.
"Speaking."
"It's Mar Jane. Some guy disguised as my Mom tried to kill me and Spider-Man. He's gone now but my Mom's gone as well."
"I'll send agents to you to get some evidence. For now that's all I can do."
"Thanks Fury."
She put the phone down and she and Peter waited for the agents to come.
It took only ten minutes for them to come and they had all the equipment that they needed. Peter and Mary Jane were told that it was best for them to leave.
They had no choice but to agree. So they went to the mall to get some milkshakes. Mary Jane was still very worried about her mother. Peter tried to comfort her but she was still very upset.

Do the agents find anything?
1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.title: Finding evidence

1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.content:
The pair even went shopping a little. But in Mary Jane's favourite shop they didn't have clothes her size. This upset her even more but Peter was able to take her to a shop for people of unusual sizes. They were able to find some clothes that fit her but they were a little expensive. She still paid and they left.
When they got back to the house the agents were still there. They had sprayed the floor for footprints. They found Peter's and Mary Jane's to be normal. But the Chameleon's was very unusual. They glowed ready with the spray.
The agents insisted that it was best that they didn't come back for a few days and so Mary Jane went to stay around Peter's. Aunt May couldn't believe how much MJ had grown since she last saw her. But she knew that she was one of the Ultimates now.
Aunt May was saddened to hear about the disappearance of Mary Jane's mother. But MJ tried to put it into the back of her mind and she kept thinking that the agents would find something that would lead them somewhere.
Mary Jane had a spare bed and a chair for her long legs and she slept in the front room. But she couldn't speak all she could think about was her poor mother.
1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.title: New evidence

1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.content:
Meanwhile back in Latvaria Doctor Doom wasn't too happy with what had happened with the Chameleon. But for him it was only a minor setback.
"The Chameleon sucks," said Liz.
"He is the best at what he does," replied Doctor Doom. "But unfortunately he wasn't good enough for that job."
"I could have killed them both easily."
"You tried once a failed girl. But this isn't destroying our plans. Get me the Red Skull."
One of the henchmen began to type away at the computer and the Red Skull appeared on the huge monitor.
"Oh Doctor Doom how nice to see you again," he said in a German accent.
"The plan to assassinate Mary Jane has failed," replied Doctor Doom.
"Such a shame. Were you able to break out Liz Allen?"
Liz then walked closer to the screen and the Red Skull was happy.
"Good looks like our partnership wasn't in vein after all," said the Red Skull.
"Believe me soon the world will be ours. You get to personally kill Captain America and I get Reed Richards."
1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.title: Red Skull

choices: Mary Jane picks up some negative emotions
1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.content:
The next day in Queens we see Mary Jane waking up. She didn't sleep very well that night due to worry. But she got up and got washed and changed into some clean clothes.
She went to the kitchen and saw that Peter and Aunt May were already awake. They had been making some breakfast and they had made some for her. They knew that they couldn't show any emotions to her because of her powers.
"Did you have a nice sleep?" asked Aunt May.
"Not really no I'm still worried about my mom," replied Mary Jane.
"Well we've made you pancakes. Hopefully that'll cheer you up a little."
"Thank you."
Mary Jane sat down at the table and she began to eat the pancakes that were in front of her. They were delicious and she ate the whole thing.
"Delicious," said Mary Jane. "Thank you very much."
"You're welcome MJ," replied Aunt May. "Now you two better hurry or else you'll miss the bus."
Peter and Mary Jane get their bags and then they go to the school bus to get to school. Now everyone looked at her like she was a freak.

What happens at school?
1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.title: Next morning

1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.content:
"Peter I don't fit in here anymore," whispered Mary Jane.
"Don't worry MJ just ignore them," replied Peter.
Mary Jane couldn't simply ignore the staring faces. She just sat down at her desk and she just wanted to learn like everyone else.
The teacher talked about geography and she found this a little boring like any normal teenager would. Then MJ noticed two teen boys having an argument with each other. They were getting angry and she could feel herself growing. And her mind was becoming twisted due to the negative emotions.
Eventually she bursts out of her desk and stands up. Her head hit the ceiling and she gave everyone an evil smile.
"Run little people," she said.
"Everyone ran in fear and the fear made her even bigger. Peter was the only on that didn't run away from her. He just watched his girlfriend grow right through the roof. She went up higher and higher as everyone's negative emotions went to her like honey to a bee. She was reaching 200 feet tall and she was as mad as ever. Right now was brown trouser time for the citizens of Queens.
1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.title: MJ the angry giantess

1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.content:
Peter was able to change his costume in the chaos. He knew that he needed to stop her fast before she got to any more people. She would feed on their negative emotions and she'd get even bigger. But he couldn't quite think of a good idea to stop her.
He went to a building right next to where Mary Jane was. He was able to get her attention.
"Hey you!" shouted Spider-Man. Mary Jane looked at him. "Yeah I'm talking to you, you overgrown freak. That outfit makes you look fat."
"That insult will be your last!" shouted Mary Jane.
Spider-Man then webslinged off the building and swung away. he noticed that unlike when she absorbed positive emotions her intelligence seemed to have decreased. He was hoping to use this as an advantage.
He continued to travel away from Mary Jane but she chased after him and she was gaining on him. He needed to come up with a plan fast.
He saw the ocean and he began to hatch a plan. He went towards the ocean. He went to jump in and Mary Jane followed him. But he was able to land on the top of her head. This was probably the most dangerous place to be on the planet right now.
"Hey MJ I'm up here."
"I'll squash you like a bug."

Will his plan work?
1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.title: Spder-Man to stop a giantess?

1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.content:
Mary Jane went to punch Spider-Man. But when her fist came down he jumped out of the way and she accidentally hit herself in the head. She punched herself with such force that she fell unconscious. This was just what Spider-Man was hoping.
Mary Jane lay unconscious in the water. Luckily her face wasn't in the water and she could still breathe. Spider-Man waited for her to shrink back down to a more manageable size.
When she did shrink he went back into the water and grabbed her. He then webslinged to the Headquarters of the Ultimates.
When Mary Jane woke up she saw herself in a bed surrounded by doctors. She also saw Nick Fury by her bed. She felt her head and she was in some pain.
"What happened?" she asked. "The last thing I remember is being in class."
"Well young lady Spider-Man told me that you absorbed some negative emotions," replied Nick Fury. "And you went on a rampage."
"Oh God did I kill anyone?"
"Thankfully no. But you caused quite a lot of damage."
"And why does my head hurt?"
"Well you knocked yourself out."
1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.title: Rampage stopped

1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.content:
"What how did I do that?" asked Mary Jane.
"Well Spider-Man landed on your head and you kinda punched yourself," replied Nick Fury. "Do you remember anything?"
"Not really no. When I've absorbed negative energy like that my memory is a blank."
"Hmm very interesting."
Meanwhile in Latvaria Doctor Doom and the Masters of Evil were watching the news broadcasts about Mary Jane's rampage. Doctor Doom was pleased with what he was seeing.
"Seems that we could use Mary Jane instead of destroying her," said Doctor Doom. "She might even make Liz obsolete."
"Hey I'm still more powerful that her," interrupted Liz. "She needs other people to activate her power." She then clicks her fingers and she grows to 20 feet. "I only need myself."
"I admit you are one of the most powerful allies I have. But with the both of you together than you will be an unstoppable destructive force. And with the added strengths of the Masters of Evil they will stand no chance against us.

Where do we go now?
1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.title: Use for Mary Jane

1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.content:
Back in New York Mary Jane had recovered. Her head was still a little sore but she was gonna be fine in a few hours. She still felt guilty about what had happened and it was decided that it was best for her not to go back to school. At least while she had these powers.
Instead she was moved into a room which had been designed to her liking. It was just like her normal room but she was still worried about her mother. S.H.I.E.L.D hadn't discovered any new evidence. She began to lose hope of finding her alive.
We see Nick Fury in his office. He is looking at some records when the phone rang. He picked it up.
"Hello?" said Nick Fury.
"Hello I need to see Mary Jane as soon as possible," said a Female voice.
"Who is this?"
"That doesn't matter. The fate of the world depends on it."
"Who are you damnit."
"Tell her to meet me in Times Square. Fail to do so would seal the fate of the world."
The phone went dead and Nick Fury couldn't do anything about it. They couldn't trace the call and they had no choice but to agree.
1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.title: The call

choices: A woman who can help Mary Jane with her powers
1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.content:
Nick Fury walked to Mary Jane's room. She was just reading a magazine when he came in. She saw the seriousness in his eye and she knew that something was wrong.
"I just had a phone call from a woman," said Nick Fury. "She wants to meet you in Times Square."
"And you expect me to just go?"
"No I don't." That's why when you do I'll send undercover agents for your protection."
"Can you also send something to restrain me incase anything happens?"
"Sure."
A little later we see Mary Jane walking in Times Square. There are many people walking around and some of them were undervcover agents. Nick Fury himself was watching from some way away.
Mary Jane saw a woman in a rain coat, hat and sun glasses the classic disguise look. The woman walked up to her.
"Are you Mary Jane Watson?" she asked.
"Yeah that's me," replied MJ.

Who is this woman?
1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.title: Meeting the woman

1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.content:
"Who are you?" asked Mary Jane.
"Oh I'm just an old friend," replied the Woman. She then clicked her fingers and she began to grow. She outgrew her disguise but her clothes underneath still grew with her. When she stopped clicking her fingers she was 200 feet tall.
"Liz?"
"The very same."
Then all the S.H.I.E.L.D agents came out and they started to fire at Liz. But the impacts from the bullets only made her bigger.
"Silly little people the more you try to fight me the bigger and more powerful I become."
Liz then grabbed Mary Jane before she could absorb any emotions. She has a small batch of knockout gas in her pocket and she uses it on Mary Jane. She falls unconscious.
To the horror of the agents Liz walked away and they couldn't do anything about it. It was through luck last time that Mary Jane beat Liz. But now there was no chance.
Liz walked out into the sea and she keeps walking. At a certain distance from the coast there was a ship to pick them up.
1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.title: Liz strikes

1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.content:
There were some of the Masters of Evil on the ship. They included Shocker, Bullseye and Radioactive Man. Liz gave them Mary Jane and she just smiled at them.
"Oh the boss will be happy about this," said Bullseye.
"Good job Liz," replied Radioactive Man. "But now we just need to get back to Latvaria before she wakes up."
"I know a quicker way," replied Liz.
She then clicked her fingers until she was several miles tall she past a few clouds on the way yup and then she looked down at the ship. She picked it up and it seemed tiny to her. She could put it on the tip of her finger.
"Ok guys next stop Latvaria. And whatever you do don't wake up MJ."
Liz then began to walk across the sea. Her size made each stroll a few miles. She was going faster than any plane and she would be in Latvaria in no time.
The villains on the ship made sure that she was going the right way. It was very easy to lose your way on the ocean. And if that happened they could go anywhere by mistake.
But Liz's steps were sending tidal waves to the coast of any nearby country and people were being killed.

What happens?
1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.title: Liz is miles tall

1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.content:
Liz's walk didn't take too long. She was near Latvaria in no time but she had to walk inland to get there. She crushed many people along the way and she didn't care. She just found it humorous but she did need to clean off the dead bodies off her shoe.
Mary Jane had woken up several times but each time she woke up she would be put back to sleep by one of the villains. They laughed at her and they couldn't stop thinking about how helpless she was and how easy it would be to simply kill her. But Doctor Doom had given them orders to bring her back alive and unharmed. They didn't want to get him angry.
The moment Liz got to Castle Doom she put the ship on the ground and she then shrank back to her almost normal size. She laughed a little as they took Mary Jane into the Castle.
When Mary Jane woke up she was in a cell. She saw her mother and she went over to her. She helped her up.
"Mom are you alright?" asked Mary Jane.
"No I'm not," replied MJ's Mom. "They want to kill you."
"Oh that idea went down the drain a while ago," said a voice.
Mary Jane turned around and saw Doom staring at her.
1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.title: Castle Doom

choices: I'll join you under one condition
1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.content:
"Doom let me out now," demanded Mary Jane.
"Or else what little girl?" asked Doom.
"Hey I'm still bigger than you. And I can get bigger."
"I know that all too well my child. Now you have a visitor." THen Liz Allen walked forwards. She was over 7 feet tall and she had an evil smile on her face. "One more thing while you're in the cell your powers don't work. Now I'll see you in five minutes."
He then walks away leaving Mary Jane and her mother in the cell with Liz outside. Liz had a few ideas in mind.
"Well it wasn't too long ago I was in a cell," said Liz. "Now its you."
"Please Liz release me. I'm your friend."
"Oh you were my friend before you stopped me in the city."
"You were hurting innocent people."
"Oh like you did yesterday?"
"That was different. I had fed off some negative emotions and it made me grow in the wrong way."
"That's the you that I like. Think about it together we could rule this world as Goddesses. Their suffering alone would be enough to make you invincible."

What does Mary Jane say?
1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.title: Liz and Mary Jane again

1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.content:
"No way Liz," said Mary Jane. "We have powers to help people. We shouldn't be using them just for our own greed. I thought you were my friend but I guess I was wrong."
"I thought you'd say something like that," replied Liz. She then pressed a button on the back wall. At first nothing seemed to happen but Liz just smiled.
"What did you do?"
"Well now your powers are working. And now I'm going to show how much hatred I have towards you."
Mary Jane began to feel Liz's hate. It was making her body swell up and her mind was turning evil. This was exactly what Liz wanted. She smiled when she reached 10 feet tall.
"Ok MJ now you can come out," said Liz. "But first tell me will you help me now?"
"Yes I will," replied Mary Jane.
"And why would you help me?"
"Because I want to become a Goddess."
Liz smiled and she opened the cell door. Mary Jane went to leave but her mother held onto her leg. Mary Jane kicked her mother off and she left the cell.
"Now let's meet the man in charge."
1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.title: No way

choices: Mary Jane is able to come to her senses
1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.content:
Liz then led Mary Jane to the control room. She had an evil smile on her face as she approached Doctor Doom. He was sitting on a throne and drinking a glass of wine. He was happy to see the girls. He quickly drunk his glass and he looked at them.
“Looks like everything went to plan,” said Doctor Doom. “Perfect everything is coming to place.”
“Err Doctor D I was just wondering,” said Liz.
“Yes my dear.”
“Can Mary Jane and I go out and destroy some city it’s been boring since I got back.”
“Very well.” Then a map of America appeared in front of her. This was thanks to one of Dooms Machines. “Chose where.”
Liz looked at the map for a minute and she saw the perfect place. “There.” She pointed on the map to LA.”
“Why there my dear?”
“Well it is the second most populated city in America. Besides I always wanted to go to LA. The lights and glamour of Hollywood.”
“Very well I’ll get a ship to take you there. But don’t get yourself captured or else you’ll screw up our plans.”

What happens in LA?
1152222111112112111122111211112121122112.title: Pick a place

choices: She attacks a dockyard and destroys ships
12.content:
The Enchantress looke into a fountain, and used her goddess abilities to perciecve the world around her. She was once an Asgardian goddess, but had been kicked out of Asgard by Odin for disobediance. Her love for Thor had obsessed her for millennia, but now, she had come to a decision.

"I will make myself a threat to these humans, and Thor will challenge me to protect them! Only then, will I have conquered Thor's heart!"

With that, the Enchantress began to grow. Fifteen feet, twenty-five feet, fifty feet. Would this be enough? Not for the Enchantress! As she continued to grow, she went on a rampage that would be sure to lure the Avengers into battle!
12.title: The enchantress

121.content:
Enchantress begins her attack on New York City, at 300 foot tall the people of New York were running for their lives. "Run you pathic humans I want the Avengers here!" She was demanding Thor to show up and help the humans.

Several buildings falls as Enchantress stomps around the Manhattan area.

"Thor!" she says in a demanding voice, get here now or I will destroy this entire city laughing evily. Will Thor arrive or not?

You decide wheather Thor and The Avengers will show up now or later.
121.title: Attack on New York

1212.content:
Much to her chagrin, however, it is not the Asgardian Avenger who arrives first. It is, instead, the Amazing Spider-man!

He is dangling from the bottom of a police helicopter, to which he attached one of his webs.

"Away with you, wall-crawler!" shouts the Enchantress: "It is not you with whom I wish to speak."

"Aw, come on," quips Spidey, trying to stall for time while waiting for the Avengers to make their move.

"What's Goldilocks have that I don't? After all; don't good things come in SMALL packages?"

The Enchantress smiles maliciously: "Dost thou really think so? Let us see."

And, at that moment, the webslinger's famed "spider-sense" starts tingling! Alas, the Enchantress' giant right hand proves to fast for him. Whereupon, she proceeds to...
1212.title: YAY!  AN EVEN SIX HUNDRED!

choices: She goes off to have her way with him.
She stuffs him down her cleavage, and resumes looking for Thor.
12121.content:
The Asgardian giantess immediately popped the webslinger into her mouth, fully intending to swallow him!

But, while Spidey might have been too slow to avoid her version of "the boarding house reach," he could still react fast enough to avoid being devoured. Even as her tongue slid him towards the fateful drop-off point, he raised his web-shooters and...

THWIP! THWIP!

Spidey held on to those twin strands of webbing for dear life. Especially, when the movements of that giant tongue became faster and more violent.

"Whoa! Whoa! Whoa! I guess...she's getting...impatient!"

This was true. And, finally, the Enchantress just gave up and spit him back out. But, what was she going to try next?
12121.title: "I KNOW A  LADY WHO SWALLOWED A SPIDER..."

121212.content:
"BAH!" shouts the blonde Asgardian giantess: "Thou hast distracted me long enough. I shall put thee where I can deal with thee, later."

Whereupon, the Enchantress stuffs Spidey down her cleavage!

"Now to resume my search for Thor," she mutters with satisfaction.

The seismic vibrations caused by her humongous strides travel all the way up through her body. Causing the webslinger to veritably bounce back and forth, from one wall of his (highly unusual) prison to the other!

"I've got to time these vibrations, right," Spidey thinks to himself: "Use their power to aid the upward momentum of my climb out."

Yet, no sooner does he try to implement this plan, than he suddenly finds himself being squeezed by the simultaneous closing in of his prison walls! Nor is this unfortunate coincidence. Because the squeezing together occurs precisely with each gigantic step the Enchantress takes.

"She must be---unh!--able to read---unh!!---my mind---UNH!---somehow," Spidey thinks to himself.

"But, of course, puny one!" the Enchantress telepathically chortles: "Thy thoughts are an open book to me, so long as thou and my skin are in constant contact. Thus, I have thee in the one prison no man can escape from! Even if such a man foolishly wanted to."

Ten agonizing minutes later...
121212.title: BOSOM BUDDY

choices: Destroy planes as they try to land
Destroy planes as they try to take off
122.content:
The Enchantress was hundreds of feet tall. With the swipe of her feet, telephone poles that only reached to the height of her ankles were ripped out of the ground and tossed like kindling.

As she stepped on the black asphalt road beneath her feet, the vulnerable road gave way beneath her immense weight and fractured into thousands of cracks. Cars that were parked on the sides of the road were squashed like toys, or aluminum cans.

Soon, a target came into view. An airport! The Enchantress could see planes taking off and landing. She knew this would get the attention of the Avengers, and of her beloved Thor.
122.title: Target in view

choices: She tries to talk with Thor
123.content:
She began to walk to the docks of Japan. As soon as she walked into the city people screamed of terror. Anything that was in her way she destroyed it. Armies began to attack her.

"Hahahahaha, you puny humans cannot beat me"! she yelled.

Jets began to fire at her. By using her magic powers she destroyed all of the jets with one hand. Tanks began to fire at her. Like the jets they were no match for her. One by one she stepped on the tanks as if they were insects.

Next came the helicopters. They shot out nets to try to stop her. They failed to do that as well. She was able to break free of the nets then she destroyed them.

"This is wasting my time!" she thought. She ran at full speed to get to the docks. She finally made it and stopped. People saw the giantess and began to try to get away. They were too slow to get away.

Enchantress grabbed hold of two ships and threw them like they were toys. Then she got hit by something powerful able to knock her to the ground. She looked up and saw it was her enemy. Thor saw that she was almost taller than a skyscraper. Thor was about an inch tall to Enchantress.

"There you are, Thor!" she yelled.
123.title: The begin of the attack

13.content:
The police surrounded a building that was being held up by armed gunmen. Doctor Sivana was rumoured to be behind it. When Mary Batson heard about it on a radio, she went to a secluded location, and said the word:

"Shazam!"

And she was transformed into mighty Mary Marvel! Mary flew up into the air, and traveled toward the downtown area where the hold-up was in progress. When she landed in front of the business, armed gunmen opened fire on her with machine guns, but the bullets just bounced harmlessly off her.

Mary grabbed the machine guns from the suspects, and twisted them up into useless gobs of metal, and tossed them aside. "Sivana, I know you're behind this!" she said, and a large door slid open to reveal doctor Sivana sitting in a chair behind a large ray-gun cannon.

"Your problems are just beginning!" Sivana told her, and fired at her with the ray-gun cannon. Instantly, Mary Marvel began to grow. She was soon breaking through the ceiling, until she stood about 30 feet high. Sivana fired at her again, and she grew again, until her head broke through the roof of the two-story building she had been standing inside of. Mary was so large now, that when she tried to step away from the building, she crushed the whole section of the building facing the street.

Mary was at least 70 feet tall now. When she peeked through the hole in the roof to see if Sivana was all right, he fired the ray-gun cannon at her a third time, causing her to grow to a height of 200 feet!
13.title: Mighty Mary Marvel

131.content:
Sivana blasted Mary Marvel with the ray again and she grew to a colossal 600 feet tall. Even Mary couldn't believe how big she was. She was also very confused.
"Why have you made me big?" asked Mary. "You've only made me harder to defeat."
"On the contrary Mary Marvel," replied Sivana. "Your problems will keep getting bigger and bigger. Now if you excuse me I must be going."
"Oh no you're not."
When Mary Marvel tried to grab Sivana she fell over and she fell on top of the building. Luckily for Sivana he had escaped through a small passage. But the ray was destroyed. She quickly got her self back up.
"Oh I can't believe I just did that." She took a step backwards and she stepped on a parked car destroying it. She saw the owner only a few feet away. He was shouting at the top of his lungs at her. "Oh sorry about that." Then she saw her feet were creating huge footprints in the concrete floor. "I've gotta get outta here before I cause any damage."

Is she able to get out of the city without causing any damage?
131.title: Amazing Colossal Mary Marvel

choices: She sees a small grocery store
She heads to a fancy restaurant
She finds a fast food joint
1311.content: The giantic Mary Marvel somehow managed to make it all the way through the town without damaging anything or especially hurting anyone as she got ready to find where Dr. Sivana was hiding she felt her stomach growl the sound of it softly to her was causing massive tremors on the ground as people tried to maintain their balance Mary looked down slightly embrassed "Oh my sorry! I guess all of a sudden I'm really hungry now what kind of food besides living things can a 600 foot superheroine eat?" she pondered
1311.title: Yes

choices: Yes makes her grow even more
No but does give her indigestion
13111.content: Fortunately for Mary Marvel there happened to be a nearby grocery store not far from her left boot "Oh thank goodness!" she said happily trying to quell her rumbling stomach roaring like a ferocious beast while the whole of Fawcett City and its population shook "Sorry!" she said again to them looking down concerned before bending down to the beyond frighten employees of the store looking up with fear at the titanic teenager in red "I'm really sorry about causing this mayhem and destruction but if you can please give me a little of your food I will leave peacefully okay?" quivering the people agree granting her a huge buffet of endless meat,veggies and everything else little does she realize that Dr. Sivana had been carefully tracking her location and whereabouts preparing for her demise he placed a remote control hydrogen bomb to blow the giantess Marvel to oblivion and there is no doubt that Mary just ate Sivana's secret weapon does it affect her at all?
13111.title: She sees a small grocery store

choices: Unleash a monster on the city
Force the Justice League to fight the giantess Mary
131112.content: As soon as Mary munches down on the endless buffet of tiny grocery food the hydrogen bomb activates with Dr. Sivana a few miles away watching through a video screen snickering "That's right Mary Marvel your demise is about to occur in 3..2..1.." then he hits the switch and back in Fawcett City Mary is feeling the effects of her sudden stomachache "Ohh my stomach..it's rumbling like crazy like I'm about to..." then BOOOOOOM! watching merrily through the video screen Sivana grinned "Success! That's one Marvel Family member down for the count! Now for the rest of them starting with the Big Red Chees- What the!"he stared blankly at the screen at the full giant form of Mary still there unaffected just looking a little dazed and confused the people around her huge yellow boots are equally confused to why the bomb didn't blow her to oblivion "Buurp!" Mary let out a low but loud earth shaking burp a few store windows and a few people off their feet "Ohh my Excuse me! Sorry everyone about that!" she blushed brightly while covering her mouth with a hand.. far away at his secret lair Sivana was fuming with rage "Blast it! I can't even destroy one gigantic annoying teenaged girl time for Plan B!" with that he prepared to
131112.title: No but does give her indigestion

choices: She found something that might help
13113.content:
She carefully steps around until she notices one of her favorite fast food restaurants. Mary licked her lips when she saw the sign and walked over to it. She was so focused, she didn't see the car in front of her and smashed it completely. When she got to the building, she sat down and spread her legs out on the sides. She pulled the roof off and took a look. She didn't see anyone inside which made her smile.

"Since no one is here, I'm sure the owner won't mind me taking some food to eat." Mary said and started to grab food. She grabbed everything she could and dropped it on her awaiting tongue. She loved filling her black hole up. She was so focused on eating, she didn't see the poor woman she grabbed. Mary brought her up to her mouth and dropped her in her mouth. The lady screamed as she was tossed around like a piece of candy.

After a minute, Mary realized she was tasting something different. Normally that wouldn't be bad, but this was a special circumstance. She spit out her catch into her hand and almost jumped out of her skin when she saw the woman. They lady shivered and coughed, unable to calm down. She looked up at Mary afraid.

"I'm sorry, I thought you were food. Here, let me set you down." Mary said and put the girl onto the grass next to her. As soon as the lady got the chance, she ran out of there as fast as she could. The giantess shrugged and continued to eat. She finished up and stood to her full height. Though she was still hungry, she would be alright for now. She continued to walk, unsure of where her enemy might be. She continued walking until…
13113.title: That's one way to get food from a restaurant

1312.content:
"I can just fly away from here," said Mary Marvel. She tries to fly but she couldn't. She was jumping up and down trying to take off. But every time she landed back on the ground it caused a small earthquake. "Ok this isn't getting me no where. It looks like I'll have to walk. Now I've gotta be careful."
She started to walk out of the city. But she tripped over telephone wires and came crashing to Earth. When she got back up the wire was wrapped around her legs.
"What I would give to be able to fly."
She was able to unwrap the wire. But when she turned around to walk again she walked straight into a building with a lightning rod. The rod went straight into her chest. Although she was invulnerable it still hurt. The pain made her walk backwards and she went into another building. It became damaged but it didn't collapse. People were screaming and running away.
"This isn't my day." Then she accidentally steps on another empty car. "Why do they have to make everything so small?"
1312.title: Accidental destruction

13121.content:
Meanwhile in the Mayor's office. He and several other city officials were looking at Mary Marvel from their window. They were powerless to do anything.
"What are we gonna do?" asked one Official.
"I don't know," replied the Mayor. "They city has never faced a threat on this scale."
"Why don't we call in the national guard?"
"Their weapons wouldn't be able to hurt her at normal size never mind that size." Then there is a knock on the door. "Come in."
The door opens and Dr Sivana. He had a huge smile on his face.
"So I see you have a little problem," said Sivana.
"What do you want?"
"Well you have no options have you?"
"Well no."
"But I have a machine. A giant robot that rivals her size and strength. It's fully operational. And I'll be more than happy to destroy her for you for a small fee."
"How much do you want?"
"Ten billion dollars."
"What no we won't give you it."
"It's either you hand over the money or Mary Marvel will destroy your city."
"Ok ten billion it is."
Dr Sivana then starts to walk out of the door. "Pleasure doing business with you."
13121.title: Mayor and Sivana

131211.content:
Meanwhile in the city Mary Marvel was still trying to get out of the city. But anything she tried made more harm than helping.
"I just hope no one's hurt," said Mary Marvel. After a few minutes she had almost given up. But then she saw something huge in the city. It was Sivana's giant robot. He was right it was the same size as her. It had a humanoid appearance but it was all metal. Mary Marvel was able to see a man in the robot's eye. She recognised him as Dr Sivana. "Sivana I knew you would show your dirty face sooner or later."
"You guessed right," replied Sivana through the Robot. "Now you have reached the final chapter in your life Mary Marvel."
Then Mary Marvel notices a shop next to her foot.

What type of shop was it?
131211.title: Giant Robot

1312111.content:
Mary Marvel could tell there were a lot of kids hiding inside with their parents. She had to be really careful because of that. The robot came after her and swung its fist. The giantess dodged and fought back, kicking it in the side. Mary started to stumble and quickly acted to get her balance back. The shop was right between her legs now, she needed to move away. Mary stepped to the side and walked away from it, keeping her attention on the robot.

"Nowhere to run, nowhere to hide." Sivana said. The robot charged at her, smacking Mary head on. Though she tried to stop it, the metal monster pushed her downtown. Mary's feet was damaging the road as she tried to stop moving. With all of her force, she pushed the robot back as hard as she could. Though it seemed most of her powers didn't work, she had incredible strength.

The robot charged, but this time she was prepared. The giantess hero dodged and struck up into the air, hitting the robot in the jaw. The robot flew and landed on its back.

"Why you!" Sivana said. The robot got up and…
1312111.title: Battle of the titans

choices: She's still got something in her
1312112.content:
The shop was a betting shop. It was starting to get packed with people. They weren't hiding from Mary Marvel. They were betting on the who would win in the fight. The odds were 10/1 for Mary Marvel winning. 5/1 for Dr Sivanna's Giant Robot winning and a 7/1 chance of neither of them winning and the city would be destroyed.
Anyway Mary Marvel and the Giant Robot sized each other up. Mary Marvel was slightly taller but really she didn't like that one bit.
"Prepare for your demise Mary Marvel," said Sivana.
"You won't beat me," replied Mary Marvel.
And with that the robot punched her and she went flying to the ground. The odds changed. MM 20/1 DSGR 3/1. She quickly got up and punched him back. MM 15/1 DSGR 6/1.
The fight continues for a few more minute. Each time one of them attacked the other the odds changed. But eventually Dr Sivana's Giant Robot hit Mary Marvel so hard she went flying into a building.

What will happen to Mary Marvel?
1312112.title: Betting

choices: You're a heroine. And you don't kill
I'm the only one who can make you small again
13121121.content:
Dr Sivana started to celebrate. Then the Robot felt the ground starting to shake. Fear struck him like a train. He then saw Mary Marvel almost explode back to her feet. She was angry. Not just a little angry but probably the angriest anyone had ever been.
"This is impossible you should be dead," said Sivana through his giant Robot.
"No Sivana I'm still alive," replied Mary Marvel. "And now you're gonna see just how powerful I really am."
The Robot goes to punch her. But she grabs the arm and breaks it off. She then throws it to the grounds. Then Mary Marvel went from behind and grabbed the Robot. Then she began to fly again. She carried the Robot up in the air. until she was about a mile up.
"SHAZAM!" she shouted. When she did her huge bolt of lightning hit the Robot. "SHAZAM!" Another hit it. "SHAZAM!" With this lightning bolt the Robot deactivated. She then ripped it's head off and threw the body across the horizon to the sea. She looks at the robot's eyes and see's Sivana.
"Please don't hurt me," begged Sivana.
"Give me one good reason why I shouldn't," replied Mary Marvel.
"Well...
13121121.title: Mary Marvel wins

131211212.content:
"I'm the only one who can make you small again," said Dr Sivana. "And if you kill me you'll be a 600 foot giant for the rest of your miserable life."
"I hate to say it but you have a point," replied Mary Marvel. "But don't thing you're off the hook. You're going to jail Sivana."
"But how you can't get into the city without destroying everything."
"On the contrary I have my flying ability back I can hover above the ground."
"Oh crap."
"Oh yes indeed."
Mary Marvel flies back near the ground. She then hands Sivana over to the authorities. She then flies to a rural area. There she sits by a lake.
"Maybe I shouldn't have given him to the police. No if I didn't he would have gone and ran away again. I'm so confused." Then an idea popped into her head. It's a long shot but I've got nothing to loose." She stands up to her full height. "SHAZAM!" A lightning bolt hits her. She turns back into Mary Batson. But also she was her normal size. "Hey it worked. I'm small again. Now lets try one more time. SHAZAM!" A bolt of Lightning hit her and she became Mary Marvel again. But she was still gigantic. "Looks like I'm only big when I'm Mary Marvel."
131211212.title: Small again in a sense

1312112121.content:
"Now how do I get back home without becoming Mary Marvel again?" thought Mary.
She walked to the nearest bus stop. She catches the bus back into the city. She gets off and goes back home. When she did she sat down and put on the TV. The news was on and she didn't like what she saw.
"Today Mary Marvel somehow grew to a colossal size," said the Anchorman. "She destroyed parts of the city causing billions of dollars worth of damage. The authorities on the look out for her but she has seemingly disappeared into thin air. We will keep you updated when we get more information."
he switched off the T.V and just sat there. She had a funny feeling in the pit of my stomach.
"Being Mary Marvel is only hurting people. I can't save anyone when I can barely see them. I'm not gonna be Mary Marvel any more. Just plain old Mary Batson. Then everyone will be safe from me."

Does she stop being Mary Marvel forever?
1312112121.title: Mary Marvel no more

13121121212.content:
Almost two months past since Mary Batson last became Mary marvel. She didn't need to become her anymore (as yet). But all things must come to an end.
Mary again was in her room watching the T.V. She was watching her soaps. But then a news report came on.
"We interrupt this programme for an urgent news bulletin. The Grant skyscraper has come on fire. People are still trapped on some of the highest floors. And Captain marvel is busy dealing with a situation off planet. Mary Marvel hasn't been seen in months. Who will save these people."
Mary then turned off the T.V now she had a decision. She could either stay out of it and hope someone else would come along and save them which was highly doubtful. Or she could become the 600 foot Mary Marvel and save them from certain death. She swallowed her pride and went outside. In a clear space.
"Ok Mary you can do this," she thought. Then she made herself ready. "SHAZAM!" A bolt of lightning hit her. She then transformed into her alter ego Mary Marvel. She grew to over 600 feet tall. "Wow I'm a little bigger than I was before." Then she sees the burning building a few miles away. "No time to think about that. I've gotta save those people before its too late."
13121121212.title: Mary Marvel again

131211212121.content:
Mary then flew up into the air. She figured that it would be safer for everyone rather than walking. She flew up about 2,000 feet. but in comparison to her size this wasn't very high. Then she flew to the building.
AT the building the fire fighters were fighting a loosing battle against the fire. They were fearing that everyone inside would die a horrible death. Then a huge shadow fell over them. When they looked up they saw Mary Marvel above them. She saw a spot where she could land right next to the building.
"Holy crap its Mary Marvel!" shouted a Fireman.
"Don't worry I'm here to help," she replied.
She then started to blow the fire out. When patches of it were gone she would grab anyone inside and put them on the ground. When she did this paramedics would take them away.
Mary was careful not to blow too hard in case she hurt anyone. The people inside were terrified of her but she still helped them.
After a few minutes she had gotten everyone out of the building. But it was close to collapsing. Everyone moved out of the way and watched as the building crumbled down.

What does Mary Marvel do now?"
131211212121.title: Saving the people from a burning building

1312112121211.content:
"Ok people I don't want any trouble," said Mary Marvel. "I'll just be going now."
Then to her surprise everyone started to cheer. They were all happy that she had saved their lives.
"Stay," shouted a random person.
"Err ok." She then bends down and several newspaper photographers started to take pictures of her. "Ok I'll stay here a little while."
Then several reports came up to her.
"Mary Marvel how did you get so big?" asked a reporter.
"It was Dr Sivana. He used some giant ray gun to turn me into this."
"Where have you been for the past few months?" asked another reporter.
"I thought everybody hated me. I accidentally destroyed part of the city."
"Are you gigantic all the time?" asked another reporter.
"I'm only gigantic when I'm Mary Marvel. When I'm my normal self I'm normal sized." She then stands up. Several photographers were able to get pictures of her rear end. "Ok now i do need to go."
She flies off away from the city. While she was flying to a safe place to change back she had a smile on her face.
1312112121211.title: Interviewed

13121121212111.content:
When Mary Marvel was flying over the countryside she saw something happening on the ground. There seemed to be a rowing boat having trouble in the river. She quickly flew down and picked it out of the water. She saw two people in the boat.
"You guys have to be more careful," she said. Then she noticed that they were only lifeless dummies. "What's going on?"
Then she felt a tingle sensation run through her entire body. She then fell over unconscious causing a small earthquake.
She had been shot by some sort of super stun gun. It was fired by a man who had been fishing. Mary Marvel hadn't noticed him. He then stood up and went over to her huge face.
"It's true the camera takes off a few feet," said the man. "Or my large dear are you still growing? Oh yeah you can't say anything."
The man then kicked her face. But even if she was normal size she wouldn't have felt it. He then began to talk into his wristwatch.
"Base this is Red Herring base this is Red Hearing," he said. "The target is down I repeat the target is down."

Will Mary Marvel wake up in time?
13121121212111.title: Knocked out

131211212121112.content:
Soon several people surrounded her but Mary Marvel was still out of it. One of the villains had a teleporting device and he used it on the huge super heroine and she disappeared into thin air.
A little later on we see her in a huge lab. It had normal size equipment in it but it had a 500 foot ceiling and was a mile across. Mary Marvel lay in the centre of the lab and scientists were examining her. They couldn't get any needles through her almost indestructible skin. So they could only do a physical check up. They were amazed by the results.
Mary Marvel was still growing. She was growing a foot every minute while she was Mary Marvel. But she still didn't show any signs of waking up.
The lab belonged to a secret society who planned on World Domination. And now they had the most powerful being on the planet. They knew Elasti-Girl of the Doom patrol could grow several times larger than her but Mary Marvel’s super abilities would make short work of her.
But they had one problem. How were they gonna get the brain washing device into her skull if they couldn't even get through her skin?

When des she wake up?
131211212121112.title: Evil lab

1312112121211121.content:
An hour after all the tests Mary marvel began to wake up. She felt her head spinning and she was a little bigger. But she couldn't move. Her arms and legs felt like lead.
But then she sat up uncontrollable. She then turned her head and saw a man in an expensive business suit.
"Well it's sleeping beauty," he said. "Finally she's awake."
"Where am I?" replied Mary Marvel. "And why can't I move?"
"Well you have a little chip in your head. We had to get it into your brain through your nose. And now Mary Marvel you will kill every super being on the planet."
"Somehow I don't think I'll be doing that."
"Just wait and see. Clap your hands." Then she uncontrollable clapped her hands. "You see you do what I want you to. Now slap yourself in the face." Then she slapped herself."
"Hey stop that."
"Now go and kill every super being both good and evil out there. So that the world is ours for the taking."
Mary Marvel then began to fly out of the building. She tried to stop herself but she couldn't.
1312112121211121.title: Controlled

13121121212111211.content:
Mary Marvel's first destination was the mighty city of Metropolis. She cried all the way there. She knew her first target was Super-Man. She really didn't want to hurt anyone. But she was being controlled and couldn't help it.
When she got to Metropolis she saw all the busy people in the streets she saw the fear in their eyes. Then she raised her mega sized foot.
"People get away from me," she said. "Run for your life."
Then her foot came down destroying part of the road. The shock caused a small earthquake that smashed all the windows in the area.
When she looked up she saw Super-Man flying towards her. He stopped in front of her.
"What are you doing Mary?" asked Super-Man.
"I can't help it," replied Mary Marvel. "I’m being controlled. There's some chip in my brain." Then she punched and he went flying into the air. "Sorry."
She then uncontrollable flew up to Super-Man. When she reached him she punched him to the ground. She went to do a flying stomp. He just about got out of the way when her foot came down.
When he looked up to her he could see the sorrow in her eyes. She was telling the truth.

What happens?
13121121212111211.title: First target Super-Man

131211212121112112.content:
Mary Marvel with as little control as she still had over her body she slightly slowed down the pace her foot was falling to the ground. This gave Super-Man just enough time to get away to safety. He flew away at lightning speed and he was gone.
The leader could see everything that was happening. He was a little disappointed that Super-Man had gotten away. But there was always a next time.
"Send her to Gotham City next," said the leader. "There's plenty of targets there."
Mary Marvel then found herself uncontrollable flying up. At a certain height she began to fly away from Metropolis and towards Gotham city. She dreaded the thought of what she was gonna do when she got there so she just closed her eyes and hoped for the best.
When she got there she landed on the ground. She stomped her foot a few times causing earthquakes so to attract Batman and Robin.
It took a few seconds but they came and saw the huge Mary Marvel. They had seen her that size on TV but never in real life. Yet again she pleaded them to run away. But Bat-Man was a lot more suspicious than Super-Man was.
131211212121112112.title: To Gotham

1312112121211121121.content:
"Is that really Mary Marvel?" asked Robin.
"No Mary Marvel wouldn't hurt people," replied Batman. "Now take her down."
Batman and Robin both start to figure a way of dealing with her. Mary Marvel could feel her body about to attack the heroes. She couldn't stop herself.
"Please I'm begging you I am Mary Marvel," she said. "I'm being controlled so get away from now before you get hurt."
Batman began to think a little. A giant cyborg wouldn't give them a chance to escape. And he could hear sincerity in her voice.
"Stand down Robin," said Batman.
"We need to get out of here and we need to make sure that this place is evacuated."
They both get to work. Mary Marvel was relieved that they believed her but she felt her attacking a building with people inside it. Yet again she couldn't stop herself.
"Get everybody out now!"
She began to attack the buildings. She figured that she was doing this because her controllers were doing it out of spite.

Will anyone get killed?
1312112121211121121.title: Get away from me

13121121212111211211.content: She began to have hope as another crumbling building building was evactuated. But then she suddenly looked down at a man staring up at her panties and she reached down, shrieking when she realized how cruel what she was about to do was. She was about to give him a "much better view". She lay on her back and brought him close, pulled forward her waist band and dropped him into her dark abyss.
13121121212111211211.title: Make her stop

13121121212111211212.content:
Batman and Robin frantically tried to get the people out of the buildings but Mary marvel attacked them also. Robin was appointed the task of evacuating everyone as Batman was left to fight against the colossal Mary Marvel.
She began to cry as she went to punch him. Each time she tried to do it he dodged it. But he was getting tired and she wasn't losing any of her energy.
Batman was nearly completely tired until he saw the entire Justice League come to his aid. They were all reluctant to fight Mary Marvel but fight her they did. They were able to get the upper hand on her.
The men controlling her decided it was best to retreat for now. A dead Mary Marvel would be useless to them.
She flew away from Gotham leaving the Justice League to pick up their wounded and to ensure that the people were safe.
Mary Marvel flew back to the base where she had been taken to. She just wanted to be free but they wouldn't let her be free. She cried but there was nothing to comfort her.
"A rather failed mission," said the Leader. "Oh well looks like we just need to add a few enhancements."
13121121212111211212.title: No one died

131211212121112112121.content:
Meanwhile at Justice League Headquarters every member was there discussing about what they were gonna do with Mary Marvel. They knew that she was under control by a different being but they didn't want to destroy her. That's of course if they could destroy her. She was almost invincible and she was still slowly growing.
"Ok people we can't kill Mary Marvel," said Super-Man. "She is as much as a victim as everyone else."
"Then what do we do we can't let her stay out there," replied Green Arrow. "Innocent and our lives are all in danger."
"Maybe what we should do is not stop her but to slow her down," suggested Martian Manhunt. "What ever is controlling her I can phase out of her head."
"Ok now we're getting somewhere. But we need the most powerful members to attack her."
"I know they'll be some casualties like there were last time," said Super-Man. "But whoever's controlling her is probably making her more enhanced so that she can kill us all."
The Justice League started to come out with a plan of action that would either save Mary Marvel or kill them all. It was a must win situation.

Will it work?
131211212121112112121.title: The Justice League plan

1312112121211121121211.content:
Mary Marvel woke up after a few hours of falling asleep. She felt a little different and she sat up. She noticed that she was outside and her head hurt even more.
"Where am I?" she thought. She felt her head throbbing.
"Hello Mary Marvel," said a Voice in her head.
"Who said that?"
"We added a little something so we can speak with you. We also added a few enhancements. You're now bigger stronger and let's just say you're now invincible."
"Why can't you people just leave me alone?" She then came up with an idea to help herself. She thought that changing back into Mary Batson would stop her rampage.
She went to say Shazam but she couldn't remember the word. She was now very worried.
"Oh yes one more thing we did. We erased the word from your memory so you can't even change back to human."
"I hate you."
"Most people do my dear."
Just then there was a stray of light and the entire roster of the Justice League appeared.
1312112121211121121211.title: Enhancements

choices: Mary Marvel changes back to human
13121121212111211212111.content:
"Mary Marvel we're here to help you," said Super-Man. "If you can fight the mind control."
"I can't it's too strong," replied Mary Marvel. She then lifted up her fist. "Please stop me."
She slammed her fist into the ground. The heroes were able to jump out of the way. But the others began to attack her. They knew they had to do minimal amount of damage to her but they had to hit her really hard just so she felt a little something.
Martian Manhunt tried to get to her face but she would always punch him away. The enhancements made her strong enough to move a planet. Her height was now 670 feet tall and she was still growing.
Eventually the heroes were able to do some damage to her and Martian Manhunt was able to phase the device from her head and she fell to the ground.
Super-Man carefully approached her and he put her hand on her cheek.
"Mary you're free," said Super-Man.
She was crying her heart out. "But I did so much damage," she said. "I nearly killed everyone I held dear to me."
"But you're nightmare is over and that's all that counts."

What happens next?
13121121212111211212111.title: No more mind control

131211212121112112121111.content:
"Shazam!" shouted Mary Marvel. Then a bolt of lightning hit her and she transformed back to the normal sized Mary Batson. She then got to her feet and she cried.
Super-Man went over to her and hugged her. But she cried even more.
"Don't worry Mary you're free," said Super-Man.
"But I almost killed a lot of people. I can't forgive myself for that. The public's gonna hate me again."
"Don't worry the Justice league will sort everything out. But for now I think you need some rest."
Super-Man held onto Mary and eh began to fly up into the air and he flew to Mary's city. he took her to her home and he flew away.
Mary went to her mirror and looked at herself. She looked at her body and she was hoping that there wasn't any trace of the mind control left. She just hoped that she wouldn't be under that kind of control ever again.
She went into her bathroom and got changed for bed. She went over to her bed and lay in it. It took her several hours to go to sleep. She couldn't stop thinking about what ahd happened.
131211212121112112121111.title: Aftermath

1312112121211121121211111.content:
The next morning we see Mary walking down the street towards the mall. She needed to pick up a few things but she walked past a paper shop. She saw that all the newspapers had her on the front cover and about what she had done under the mind control.
She picked up a copy of a newspaper and she looked through it. It showed pictures of her in Metropolis and Gotham. They detailed her as an evil and unstoppable force. She was heartbroken to see the comments about her and she dropped the paper.
She began to run back to her home until she heard a cry for help. She saw a lorry hanging over a bridge and the driver was still inside. She wanted to just get away and let herself think. But she knew that she couldn't just leave the driver.
Mary looked around to see if anyone was watching her. Thankfully no one was. She whispered the word SHAZAM. Then a lightning bolt hit her and she became the 630 foot Mary Marvel.
At first everyone was afraid of her and they began to run away. She tried to put their screams in the back of her mind and she flew to the bridge so that no damage was made.

Will she be able to save the man?
1312112121211121121211111.title: The next day

13121121212111211212111111.content:
Mary Marvel then began to fly towards the bridge. With her size and strength it only took her a few seconds and she was able to grab the truck before it fell out. Everyone started talking when they saw her but she tried to keep them out of her mind.
She was able to put the truck in a safe place and she then landed to try and confront the people. At first they thought that she was about to attack them but she just stood still and looked at them.
"People I can explain my behaviour over the past couple of days," said Mary Marvel. "I was kidnapped and brainwashed to be a killing machine. Thankfully I didn't kill anyone and can you please find it in your hearts to forgive me." She shed a tear. "I would really appreciate it."
Mary Marvel then flew away over the horizon leaving the people to decide whether she was telling the truth or was she just a really good actress. They needed time to decide.
She continued to fly over the horizon. She just wanted to have a little carefree flight. She flew higher than any of the planes could so she was out of their way. She looked down and saw the towns and cities. She couldn't believe that she almost destroyed all of it.
13121121212111211212111111.title: Saving the day

131211212121112112121111111.content:
Mary Marvel was nearing a coast line when she saw what seemed to be a huge tidal wave coming towards the coast. She knew that even at her size she couldn't stop the tidal wave.
Instead she just flew near the ground and she picked up everyone she could see and hear. She picked them up form the streets, sea and the beach. There were many people and she didn't have much time to do it.
She eventually got everyone and she didn't have a second to spare. The wave hit the coast and it did a lot of damage. But if it wasn't for Mary marvel many people would have been hurt or worse.
When the wave had gone back down she put the people back on the ground. They cheered for her a little and this made her feel happy. But she didn't want to stick around and so she flew off again. This time she wanted to get back to her apartment to get some rest. She hoped that the people had forgiven her after what she had done under the influence of someone else. She knew that it wouldn't be easy and two rescues wouldn't make it alright.
When she got back to her city she said the magic word SHAZAM! and she transformed back into the normal Mary Batson.

Will the people ever forgive her?
131211212121112112121111111.title: Place to be people to save

1312112121211121121211111111.content:
Over the next couple of weeks Mary Marvel saved more and more people. But one thing she noticed was that she was still growing. 14211.content:
Jubilee was sitting around in the lounge room of the X-mansion, feeling bored and frustrated. She continued flicking through the channels. She was bored because there seemed to be nothing to do, and all the others were out on yet another mission that she had to stay behind on.

Jubilee pouted. She was frustrated because she was tired of being left behind all the time. She wanted to make a difference out there, and to prove herself.

“I hate being left behind all the time. I’m sick of everyone thinking I’m so weak!” Jubilee said aloud.
She thought for a few moments.

“Man, no wonder I get left behind, all I can do is shoot fireworks, how useless is that?” She continued, shooting a few sparks off to vent her frustration ”If only my powers weren’t so weak…”

Jubilee read through a newspaper that had been left in the room. It seemed dull to her until she found one article of interest to her. It seemed a team of scientists were doing some sort of research into mutants, and had apparently found a way to enhance a mutant’s powers and were looking for volunteers to test the procedure!

Jubilee’s heart leapt for joy as she read this and she jotted the details of the lab down. “Oh boy! Finally I won’t be left out all the time!”

She snuck out of the mansion and raced down to the lab. Surprisingly she was the first volunteer they had (maybe this was because the article had warned that there was a big risk and they weren’t sure if it was safe, but Jubilee skimmed over that part, reading the article in haste). Jubilee hurriedly filled in the forms she was given, without really bothering to read them, then walked over to the machine they were to use.

“Now, Miss before we begin I should warn you that this hasn’t been fully tested and…”

Jubilee cut him off with a casual wave of her hand, “Yeah, yeah, lets just get this done”.

Jubilee went into a large booth, and had some wires attached to her.

“Ready?” One of the scientists asked

“Yeah, just hurry up already!”.

The machine was started, and took a few minutes to get going, but eventually whirled to life, and rattled loudly. Jubilee felt a strong current of energy flow through her, it was a little painful, but felt energizing.

One of the scientists looked down at a counter on the machine.

“Uh-oh is that supposed to happen?” A scientist said.
14211.title: Left behind... again

Then to everyone’s shock, she starts growing!
Jubilee looked down.
“Hey whats happening to me?”
“Turn it off its going out of control!” A scientist yells.
The staff in the room suddenly frantically struggle to turn off the machine.
142111.title: Side effects

1421112.author_name: Just here for the poke story
1421112.content:
Although they flip every switch they can, the machine keeps running! Even when they pull the plug it keeps going!
Jubilee looks down at the room that seems to be shrinking before her
“Ahhhh! The machine is making me grow! Turn it off turn it off!” She says as her head approaches the ceiling
“We can’t!”
“What?!” Jubilee yells, her voice sounding louder, a mix of panic and anger. She was in pain, not enough to yell, but noticeable. Not only that but She grew faster, and her head bursts through the roof. She wipes, the debris off her head and sits down. Jubilee trys to pull the wires off, but even with her increased strength they don’t seem to budge. Somehow the wires have attached themselves to Jubilee in a unbreakable grip! Ever times she trys, she gets a sting and is forced to withdraw her hand.
“Help me!” Jubilee yelled, waving her arms in panic. She must have been at least 20 feet!
They finally managed to shut off the machine, and the wires that were attached to her fell off. The pain disappeared. But Jubilee was still growing!
With a final sudden spurt, Jubilee shot up growing faster still! The rush was dizzying and terrifying at the same time.
“Why am I still growing?!” She complained.
She looked around.
“Man everything sure seems small.”
Jubilee suddenly heard a crunch and she looked down. Jubilee had just crushed a large part of the machine. Fortunately everyone in the room had moved away from Jubilee, although their were still a few frightened individuals who backed away but watched with shock and fear.
“Opps”.
Jubilee stopped growing and looked down. Everything seemed so much smaller, and she must have been over 50ft!

"Oh how stupid of me my name is Brian."
"Ryan?"
"No Brian."
"I'm sorry I'm Jubilee."
"From the X-Men?"
"Yes how did you know."
"I hear news. How did you get so big?"
"Well it's a long story."
She tells Brian about the lab and the army. He takes in the information and replies.
"Now that don't very often."
"What am I gonna do?"
"Go home to your friends. They'll figure something out."
"Your right."
She stands up with Brian on her shoulder.
"What are you doing?" he asked.
"I'm going back to the X-Mansion. And you're coming with me."

"Cool I always wanted to see what the X-Men do when they're not fighting Magneto," replied Brian.
Jubilee walks to the X-Mansion. it was a few miles away. But for her it only took her a few minutes.
When they got there the other X-Men couldn't believe their eyes.
"Jesus Christ Jube what happened to you?" asked Wolverine.
"Isn't it obvious," replied Jubilee.
Wolverine sees Brian on Jubilee's shoulder.
"Who's that guy?"
"Him he's my new fried Brian."
She takes Brian off her shoulder and puts him on the floor next to Wolverine.
"Alright, nice day isn't it," said Brian.
Wolverine turns back to Jubilee.
"Where do ya find this guy?"
"He found me."

choices: The X-Men fight and get their butt kicked
142111211221112.content:
Jubilee hears a helicoptor in the background. She turns her head and sees that it's a milatary helicoptor. Then she saw several tanks below it.
"Oh crap they're back."
"Who?" asked Wolverine.
"The army."
"They're back in black," replied Brian.
"No time for music. I'll call the other X-Men. Jubilee try not to do anything stupid."
Wolverine goes into the mansion and gets all the available X-Men. These were Cyclops, Rogue, Storm and Nightcrawler.
Jubilee had ran away again. She still took Brian with her since he was the only person who could cheer her up at this moment in time.
The X-Men got ready to fight the military.

But what happens next?
142111211221112.title: Military

1421112112211122.author_name: Just here for the poke story
1421112112211122.content:
Jubilee ran for a little bit. As she ran, she could hear the sound of her friends fighting.
She stopped to listen better. It was hard to make out what was going on, with all the gun shots in the background.
She wondered if she should keep running, like she was supposed to, or if she should stop to listen. She thought for a moment.
1421112112211122.title: Run away!.... agian?

14211121122111221.author_name: Just here for the poke story
14211121122111221.content:
Jubilee stood still.
"Why did you stop?" Brian asked
"Shhh." Jubilee replied "I'm trying to listen".
Jubilee stood for a bit. She heard the sounds of friends fighting and using their powers, as well as the army. It sounded like a tough fight, and the X-men were giving it their all. But they were heavily out numbered, and their opponents heaviley armed. She soon heard her companions cry out in pain. She tensed up.
"Whats wrong?" Brian asked, not being able to hear from as fair away as the giant Jubilee could.
"I have to go back! My friends are in trouble"
"Ok but be careful."
Jubilee nodded, and ran back. It was a fair distance away, but at her size she covered it in no time.
When she arrived she saw the X-men wounded and on the ground.
She placed Brian down, and stepped out from behind a building.
"LEAVE MY FRIENDS ALONE!" She yelled, firing a group of sparks into the ground, knocking a tank back and making a huge hole in the ground.
"Jubilee... what are you doing here?" Wolverine asked
"Saving you guys, duh"
She stepped in front of them and spread her arms out. The army fired on her. hitting her with everything they had, several times.
But Jubilee was unharmed. Then she felt funny.
"W-whats happening?" She saw the ground moving away and realised she was growing "Oh no not agian! Woahhhhh!".
She doubled in size, growing to a 1000 feet! Now she was HUGE. She was bigger than most skycrappers, and most other buildings came below her knees! Part of her felt worried about her height, but looking down at the toy sized army, she allowed herself a confident smile.
The army hesitated at the sight of the towering girl.
"LEAVE. NOW"
She shot some massive sparks just in front of them, creating a smoking crater. They fled.
Jubilee knelt down to the X-men. All of them together wouldn't fill the palm of her hand
"Are you alright?" She said in a soft but amplified voice.
The X-men were still dazed, except Wolverine, who had recovered because of his healing factor.
"Jubilee, why didn't you run?"
"I could tell you guys were in trouble"
The other X-men struggled for words. Finally Nightcrawler spoke.
"WHAT HAPPENED TO YOU?!"
"Errm..." Now Jubilee struggled to find the words.
She explained what happened.
"So I just wanted to be stronger so i could go out on more missons and stuff" She said sadly
"What are we going to do with you?" Wolverine groaned.
"We'll have to tell Professor Xavier, maybe he can can think of something".
Jubilee sat outside the X-mansion (which she was considerbly larger than, even siting down) and sighed.
(Guess I am stronger now, what am I going to do now?)
14211121122111221.title: Jubilee IS the reinforcements

The machine rattled a little, then powered down.
The door opened and Jubilee excitedly ran out.
“Lets see what I can do now!” She said, not noticing the disappointed looks on the lab staff’s faces.
She fired some sparks into the air. They came out the same as always. She fired at a wall. Same as always.
“Hey what happened?”
“I’m sorry the procedure failed. We’ll have to find out whats missing. Thank you for your time”
“Yeah whatever” Jubilee said, lowering her head dejectedly.
“Well that was a waste of time.”
Jubilee left for the X-mansion, feeling no different to how she had been before.
Unknown to Jubilee and the scientists, the machine had worked in a strange way, as she would soon find out

Somewhat fast (hitting her head of the ceiling) or very fast (bursting out of the room

142112211.content:
She wondered about this, when her head bumped against the ceiling.
“Offffftt” Jubile grunted. She rubbed her head and looked down, at the diminished kitchen.
“Oh no, whats happening to me?”.
To make matters, she could feel herself still growing and that feeling she had seemed to become much stronger.
She bent down, as she started to expand faster.
(Oh boy this is looking bad) She thought, trying her hardest not to panic. Her head almost reached the ceiling again, so she lowered herself further (Now think Jubilee, what should I do?).
Jubilee scrambled towards the door, though it was somewhat awkward because of the increasingly cramped conditions. She was near the door, when she tripped over a large(though not to her) table.
(Oh no, not now!)
Jubilee picked herself up and continued her scramble, having grown so much that she had to almost crawl.
But when Jubilee reached the door her worst fears were confirmed.
(I’m too big to get out the room! What am I going to do?!) She thought, biting her nails.
142112211.title: Growing  quicker

142112212.author_name: Just here for the poke story
choices: She stays and waits, hoping she doesn't grow much more
142112212.content:
Jubilee sat and thought.
Suddenly she felt a much stronger feeling and a tremendous surge of energy. Then her body started trembling violently.
(Whats happening to me?).
Then Jubilee grew rapidly. Within seconds the normally diminutive girl filled the kitchen
(Oh no! I’m turning into a giant!)
Seconds later Jubilee burst through the ceiling, and was still rapidly expanding.
She shook the wreckage off her and stared in bewilderment as she grew larger and large. She heard a crunch as she crushed much of the furniture around me.
“Opps. Hope I don’t have to pay for that”
Jubilee stood up, in an attempt to avoid wrecking the room below her.
Seconds later her head neared the roof of the X-mansion.
(Please no… please no..) Jubilee willed, closing her eyes and crossing her fingers.
But it was in vain. Her head and shoulders burst out of the X-mansion. She opened her eyes and screamed.
“I’m huge!” She boomed.
Jubilee wondered if she should step outside in case she wrecks the entire mansion or wait.
Jubilee was wedged in, and by trying to get out she could do tremendous damage. It would probably be best to wait for someone to come. On the other hand, if no one was around and she kept growing who knows what would happen?
142112212.title: Jubilee grows quickly

Jubilee sighed.
When Jubilee got of the Mansion she heard another crunch, and looked down to find that she had crushed part of the Mansion's sercurity system.
"I'm such a clutz like this" Jubilee complained.
(Man I'm breaking everything, the Professor is going to kill me. What would they do with me like this? Maybe I should get away from here before I cause any more damage)
Now she wondered if she should stay around or get away before she caused any further damage
