142221111.content:
The time period of this is Uncanny X-Men issue 193 and 211. Kitty's costume is the classic blue costume but for those who don't know what it looks like here it is.
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Image:Shado...

We begin our story in the X-Mansion. Kitty was barely 14 years old and she is wearing her casual clothes. She was sitting in the Library studying about computers. Then she notices that there are two children standing right next to her, a boy and a girl. Kitty nearly falls off her chair. Then she sees Professor Xavier rolling towards her with a woman and a teenage boy.
"Hello Kitty how are you today?" asked Professor X.
"Fine," replied Kitty.
"This is Toby. He's a potential new student. I will show him and his mother around the mansion. But you will need to look after his younger brother and sister."
"Why me?"
"Unfortunately no one else is available. There will be extra credit in this for you."
"Ok I'll do it."
"Thank you Kitty." The Professor goes off with Toby and his mother. Now Kitty had two young children to entertain. "Ok what do you guys wanna do?"
"We wanna story," said the Little Girl.
"Yeah a good one," replied the Boy.
"Ok a story," said Kitty. She thought for a moment. "Here's one. There was a young Princess called Kitty and she lived in..."
142221111.title: Kitty's storybook

1422211111.content:
A far away land. She was peaceful and very kind. But she too oftenly lost her temper and this got her into trouble. One day it cost her more trouble than ever.
Princess Kitty was in her garden. She wore the blue x-costume. She was watering her flowers and plants. Then she saw a woman with red hair and wearing all black with a gold phoenix on her chest. She carried a basket with her. She walks up to Kitty.
"Hello Princess may I interest you in anything?" asked the Woman.
"No thank you," replied Kitty.
Then the woman purposely knocks over one of Kitty's favourite flower pots.
"Opps."
"Hey you did that on purpose."
"So what are you gonna do about it?"
Kitty started to get mad, really mad. "If you think you're gonna get away with this you've got another thing coming." Then the woman clicked her fingers. "NOW GET OUT OF MY GARDEN WITCH!"
Then Kitty felt a tingly feeling in her entire body. She then saw that the woman seemingly grow smaller. But then she realised that she was getting bigger."

How big does she grow?
1422211111.title: Cursed in the garden

14222111111.content:
Kitty grew until she was 9 feet tall. She towered over the woman.
"What did you just do to me?" asked Kitty.
"Simply you've been cursed princess," replied the Woman. "Whenever you loose that temper of yours you'll grow. But each spurt will be bigger than the last."
"Who are you?"
Then a giant bird made out of fire appeared around her. "I am the Dark Phoenix. And you will live in misery."
Then she disappeared leaving Kitty standing there. Then a small purple dragon flew over to her and landed on her shoulder. She stroked his head.
"Hey there Lockhead. I've just got a big problem now." He looked strangely at her. "I know I've grown but now you must help me fiond the cure."
Just then someone else appeared. She looked like the Dark Phoenix execpt this one was wearing a green suit.
"Dark Phoenix?" asked Kitty.
"No," replied the Woman. "I am just the regular Phoenix. I see that my other self has cursed you."
"Can you undo it?"
"No I can not. I'm sorry to say but you'll never be fully cured from the curse. But there is a way to be able to shrink yourself."
"How do I do that?"

Will Phoenix tell Kitty?
14222111111.title: Temper lost that's when growth occurs

142221111112.author_name: Just here for the poke story
choices: Kitty trys to find a way to break the curse
142221111112.content:
"I will not tell you yet bu-"
"No! Tell me" Kitty yelled, stomping her foot tell me now
"It is not yet time" Phoeniex said in a calm voice.
Kitty stomped her foot agian, this time in front of Phoeniex, but Phoeniex merely turned into her firey form, rose into the air, and disappeared in a flash of sparks.
Kitty could see her surrondings shrinking agian, and she realised what was happening.
"I guess that was a bad idea..."
Kitty grew till she was 30 feet, and accidently knocked over another flower pot while she was growing.
She sat down and put her face to her hands.
"*sigh* I guess their was a better way of handling it"
Suddenly Phoeniex's voice spoke in Kitty's mind.
"Control your temper, that is the key, do so and you shall find the way"
Kitty looekd round trying to search for the source of the voice
"Please!" she called out earnestly "Please tell me how I can break the curse!"
"When the time is right" And Kitty felt the voice left her head.
She frowned.
142221111112.title: Opps, error of judgment

1422211111122.content:
Kitty then stood up. She was tired of sitting around and doing nothing about her problem.
"Well I'm not gonna break this stupid curse by sitting here all day Lockhead," said Kitty. "I'm gonna go out there and find my own way of breaking the curse." Lockhead gave her a sign of approval. But by now he seemed even smaller to her. "Now lets go on an adventure."
Kitty then began to walk out of the garden. She had to bend down to get under the arches. When she walked past the trees she noticed how short they seemed now. This gave her all the more reason to find a cure.
While she was walking through the village by her castle everyone screamed in fear when they saw her. This made her feel low. The villagers loved her but now she just scared them.
"Its alright I'm only passing through."
When she got out of the village she found herself in a field filled with huge boulders. Each one was up to her knee. This was about 8'4 high. Each one looked like they weighed tonnes.
Then she notices a man standing next a boulder. She watched his skin turn into metal. Then he punched the boulder. It crumbled and he rubbed his hands in glee.

What does Kitty do?
1422211111122.title: Find my own way to break the curse

choices: Start searching in the golden fields
14222111111221.content:
Kitty walks over to the metal man. She wasn't sure what she was going to say or what he would do. At first he didn't see her. She slowly walks to him.
"Err hi," she said.
He turned around and saw her. He stepped back a little. "Lenin's Ghost a giantess!" he shouted in a thick Russian accent.
"Sorry I scared you."
"It's alright you just took me by surprise."
"My name is Princess Kitty and this is my pet Dragon Lockhead."
"You're a princess?"
"Yes I have been cursed by the evil Dark Phoenix. Now when I loose my temper I grow. You must help me find a way to break this curse."
"For someone with such kindness and beauty I agree to join you."
"Thank you." She bends over and gives him a little kiss. Then she stands back up straight. "Why are you made out of metal."
"I once found the diamonds of Metillia and gave me the ability to convert my flesh into organic steel."
"What is your name?"
"They call me Colossus."
"Colossus I have another problem. I don't know where to start looking for the cure."

What do they do?
14222111111221.title: Lenin's Ghost a giantess

142221111112212.content:
"Well I think it's a little too late to start searching now," said Colossus. "There's an inn about a mile away. We can stay there for the night and begin searching tomorrow."
"But I'll be too big to fit in there," replied Kitty.
"Do not worry I know the landlord he'll give you somewhere to sleep."
"Ok we'll do that. Which direction is it?"
"That way." Colossus pointed to a certain direction. Then he reverted his skin to normal. "Now lets go."
Then Kitty picked him up. "It's best I carry you. We'll get there faster and we won't get split up." She then puts him on her shoulder opposite to Lockhead.
Lockhead then flew off Kitty's shoulder and then went to Colossus. He then floated just above him.
"What is your dragon doing?" asked Colossus.
"Don't worry about him," replied Kitty. "He's just checking you out."
Then she began to walk in the direction of the inn. For a normal person it would have taken them half an hour to reach the inn. But for the 30 foot Kitty it only took five minutes. Lockhead was starting to like Colossus but he was still a little unsure about him.
When they did get to the inn Kitty put Colossus on the ground and he went inside to talk to the landlord.

Is there anywhere for Kitty to sleep?
142221111112212.title: To the inn

1422211111122121.content:
A few minutes later Colossus comes out of the inn. Kitty is waiting for his answer.
"Well?" she said.
"There is somewhere for you to sleep," replied Colossus.
"Great where?"
"In a barn. But unfortunately my money has been stolen."
"Have you told him I'm a princess?"
"Yes but he didn't care. But he says there is one way of paying."
"What's that?"
A man who looks just like Wolverine walks out of the inn. "This is Al Coholic. All he can say is drink."
"DRINK!" shouted Al.
"Yes Al. If you can teach him to say anything else than drink you can sleep in the barn for free."
"Ok I'll try but I prefer to do it inside the barn. it's getting dark."
"That should be fine."
Kitty sees the barn behind the inn. She picks both Colossus and Al in each hand and goes over to the barn. it was small and the only way she could get in was by crawling in and sitting up.

Will she be able to teach Al any new sentences?
1422211111122121.title: Al Coholic

14222111111221212.content:
Colossus had written a random sentence on a chalkboard. It said "That would be an Ecumenical matter." It was only Kitty, Lockhead and Al in the barn. Kitty found it uncomfortable, even sitting down her head was hitting the ceiling. Lockhead was still on her shoulder and Al sat on a seat in front of the chalkboard. But she was ready to begin. She pointed to the word "That."
"Ok Al," said Kitty. "I'm gonna teach you how to say a sentence that makes some sense. That."
"DRINK!"
"That."
"DRINK!"
"That."
"DRINK!"
Kitty was becoming annoyed. "Come on Al I know you can do it. That."
"TH-TH-TH-TH-TH-THAT!"
"Yes you got it." She points to the word "Would". "Would."
"W-W-W-W-W-W-DRINK!"
Kitty blew a fuse. "HOW HARD CAN IT BE TO SAY WOULD!" Then she felt a shiver run down her spine. "Oh no not again." Her body began to expand again. In a second her head was through the ceiling but still she grew. Lockhead flew off her shoulder and flew for safety. Al grabbed him and ran out of the barn. A second after he got out Kitty's body bursted out of the barn completely destroying it. She watched herself grow larger and larger. She stopped at 120 feet tall. "Maybe I should take an anger management class."
14222111111221212.title: That would be an Ecumenical matter

choices: A man who can fire laseers from his eyes
A little blue guy who could teleport
142221111112212121.content:
Colossus stared up at the now 120 foot tall Kitty. He realised that she must have lost her temper while trying to teach Al new words. Lockhead flew back up to her. He went to her eye level so that she could see him.
"Hey Lockhead," said Kitty. "Looks like my problem got a whole lot bigger."
Then they see the landlord walking to them. He was not too happy.
"What the hell have you done to my barn?" he shouted.
"I'm sorry , when I get back to my normal size I'll pay for a new barn for you."
"I don't care. Get the hell out of here!" Kitty picked up Colossus and then stood up. "And take Al with you."
"DRINK!" shouted Al.
"Shut up."
She picked up Al and rested them both in her hand Then lockhead flew into her hand and sat between Colossus and Al.
Kitty herself wanted to get out of here as soon as she could. She didn't want to get into a situation where she was likely to loose her temper and have another growth spurt.

What kind of creature does she meet next?
142221111112212121.title: Leaving the Inn

1422211111122121212.content:
Kitty walked for miles. She felt strange being so big. She had just gotten used to being 30 feet tall nevermind 120. Now everything looked really small.. She would also make sure that Lockhead, Colossus and Al were safe in her hand. After several hours of walking she began to get tired.
"I think it's best if we sleep here for the night," said Kitty. No one really was willing to argue with her. they all knew what would happen if she lost her temper.
Kitty was still nice. She let the others sleep in her hand so that they would still be warm. When she lay down the ground was cold and there was a breeze. It took her a while but she went to sleep.
Next day when she woke up she had forgotten she was huge. She had a shock when she saw how small everything looked. She soon remembered everything.
"Then it wasn't a dream," she thought. then she remembered about the others. When she looked at her hand they were gone. She began to panic but she then saw them coming towards her. They had food with them.
But then Kitty saw a little blue man. He was about 2 and a half feet tall and looked a little like a stuffed toy. He then teleported to her shoulder. This gave a little bit of a scare.
"Who are you?" she asked.
"I'm Bamf," he replied.
1422211111122121212.title: Bamf

14222111111221212121.content:
"What?" replied Kitty. Then Bamf teleported again. He ended up holding onto one of Kitty's hairs that was in front of her face. "What are you?"
"I'm a Nightcrawler," replied Bamf. Then he looked down and saw Colossus, Lockhead and Al trying to get up to him. "Excuse me a moment please."
He then teleports back down to Kitty's large foot. She didn't want to move in case she accidentally stepped on someone.
"A Demon," said Colossus.
"No merely a Nightcrawler. I assure you I come in peace."
Then Kitty decided she had had enough. She bent down picked all four of them up. She was getting angry. But she was trying not to loose her temper.
"Ok stop for a minute," she said. Her voice was almost deafening. "Now Bamf why are you here?"
"Oh I saw you a few miles away and I came to see what exactly you were. Plus I wanted a little bit of fun."
Then an idea popped ito Kitty's head. "So you like fun?"
"Oh yeah I live off it."
"Well how would you like to go on an adventure where anything could happen?"
"Keep going?"
"There's a horrible witch who needs to be beaten. Plus think of the places we'll go. Doesn't that sound fun?"
"Fun?"
"Yes Bamf fun."

Will he go with them?
14222111111221212121.title: Bamf likes fun

142221111112212121211.content:
"Yes I want an adventure," said Bamf.
"Good," replied Kitty. She then sits down. "Now lets get something to eat before we starve to death."
She puts everyone back on the ground. Colossus, Lockhead and Al went back into the forests to bring back some food. Bamf just continued teleporting all around Kitty's body. She was slightly annoyed but she tried everything to keep her cool.
After everyone had something to eat they continued on their search for the Dark Phoenix. Al had eaten a lot of grapes that they had use for making wine so he was still drunk. They still didn't know where exactly to go but still trying to look was better than not looking at all.
"I have a suggestion," said Bamf. "We're one big team so i think we should have a team name."
"What did you have in mind?" asked Colossus.
"I was thinking about the name D Generation X."
"Yeah that sounds good."
"DRINK!" shouted Al.
"No we are not calling ourselves D Generation X. It just sounds weird."

Where do they next?
142221111112212121211.title: D Generation X

1422211111122121212111.content:
Kitty kept walking until she was near a small town. It seemed a little weird. To her she could hear the people talking funny. She saw their horse and carriages on the left side of the road.
"Where are we?" asked Kitty.
"Give me a minute," replied Colossus. he then looks around. "We're in Angleland."
"I heard of this place. I've heard they're a little weird."

"Well you're lucky that you shrank down to your previous height and you weren't taller like last time."
"I know I know. It's just so difficult."
"As the weeks progress I can see you getting better. But for this week you're still a long way. I'm afraid this'll be it for this week."
They both stand up. Kitty still towered above the 5'11 teacher. "Well thank you for your efforts."
"But it's not me who has to make the effort. It is you Princess. Now I'll see you same time next week."
The teacher then left the palace. Kitty had a walk around and saw Colossus doing a painting in the gardens. She went over to him.
"Hello Kitty," he said. "How was your lesson?"
"Not too good I'm afraid," replied Kitty.
"Do not worry yourself you will get there sooner or later."

A little later that night it was the royal ball. This was an annual event where Kitty would invite people to come and dance. This time she wasn’t too particularly looking forward to it. She couldn't get any flat shoes so she had to wear heels. This would add an additional four inches to her already 7'2 body. She didn't want to seem like an over grown freak to he people.
D Generation X was invited and it was difficult for them to give Al a bath. But they were able to get ready in time. They all wore tuxedoes and bow ties.
Along the night Kitty just sat in her seat. She didn't want to stand up because she would tower above everyone. Eventually Colossus went to her.

he held her hand and Kitty stood up to her full height. She towered above him but he just smiled forcing her to do the same.

Eventually she got used to her new bigger feet and she began to dance normally. Everyone watched as the Princess danced with the man she loved. Although they were both in a height class of their own they still seemed as normal as any other couple.
But then a normal of armoured men came smashing through the doors. They seemed to be armed to the teeth and D Generation X prepared themselves. Colossus shifted to his armour form and Al popped out his claws. But Kitty was getting very angry. These guys were ruining the ball.

Most of the guests were scared stiff. But Princess Kitty walked right in front of them.
"You dare ruin this ball," she said.

Kitty's body then began to grow again. She grew until she was 11 feet tall and now D Generation X was ready.

The guards draw out their swords. But D Generation X attacked them head on. The ball guests ran for cover and they were a little scared of Kitty.
Limey made the swords explode and the rest did their jobs. After they were defeated Kitty had the decision to either execute them or spare their lives. Although she was still angry she still had the biggest heart in the world (Not the organ but the fact that she cares).
She picks one of them up and stares at him square in the eyes.

She then drops the soldier and they all run away. The guests began to come out of hiding. They were still a little uneasy with Kitty's size so she kissed Colossus and shrank down to 7'3. She was a little taller then before but not much.
When she did shrink everyone lost their nervousness and clapped for D Generation X's victory. The ball continued as if nothing had happened but Kitty still felt the funny feeling in the pit of her stomach.

In the Kingdom of Genosha we see King Eric sitting on his throne. He was eating his food when one of the soldiers that had attacked last night came into his throne room.
"How did your little demonstration go?" asked King Eric.
"Not too good your highness. The Princess of America refused and she used her powers and her friends to defeat us easily."
"WHAT!?" Every metal object in the room began to shake violently. "You couldn't even complete a simple task."
"But your highness it wasn't our fault. Princess Kitty became a giant."
"A giant? Hmm then the rumours are true. It would be foolish to have a straight attack on her. If she became as big as the rumours say then she could defeat my army. Her friends are a force to me reckoned with also."

"Don't take me for a fool. A strong leader attacks neither body nor mind."

"The heart of their enemy."

Kitty goes to the throne room

"Your drink your highness," said the Maid.
Kitty takes cup of juice and drinks it. Then she puts it back.

What happens next?

The trigger was seeing a soldier poking the Queen with his spear.

Kitty couldn't take any risks. She couldn't bear to loose her parents. So she began to calm down.

Will Kitty accept?

Outside they receive a map from one of King Erik's messengers. It showed them the route of their journey and how long it was going to be. They figured that it would take two days to reach the mountain, two days to climb it. One day to climb down and two more days to walk back.

What does Kitty do?

For added protection Kitty wrapped some of her hair around her friends so if they fell they could just hold on.

What happens on the way?

But then Al slipped through Kitty's hair and off her shoulder. She noticed this and tried to grab him but he fell too fast.
"No!" shouted Kitty.

Kitty then continued to climb the mountain. But the higher she got the thinner the air. She started to feel a little light headed. She had felt like this when she was 16 kilometres tall. But back then she didn't stay that size for long but now she was there until she got what she needed.
But when she got to the top she found that it was surprisingly warm. It was the same temperature as it was on the ground and she could breathe very easily up here.

Now Kitty had to use her brains rather than her size to help her in this situation. She began to notice a pattern in the Mistress of the Element's attacks. She thought that she would be able to get to the crystal.

Will she reach the crystal?

To be cured of the curse. But then you won't be able to save your parents. It can only grant it once and once it's out of your possession the curse will be back."

Kitty still felt a little uneasy. She had gotten used to her old height and now she was back to her original. She had to look up at Colossus, Al and Limey. But she knew that this wouldn't last long.

After a few days D Generation X returned to King Erik's castle. The guard ahd been informed to let them pass. The guards also told D Generation X where the King was and they went to him.

What happens next?

Will they get Kitty angry?
1422211111122121212111222111121122112212.title: We'll be ready for him

D Generation X took The King and Queen of America back to their palace. They were both a little shaken but they were fine. Kitty was just glad to have them back.
But over the next few days word came about King Erik’s progress in taking over the Kingdoms. One by one they were falling like dominoes and it was getting close to the Kingdom of America. But the Americans didn’t have too many soldiers. King Erik was recruiting them from the Kingdoms he conquered. His army was growing with every victory.
We see Kitty upstairs in her room. She was lying on her bed and thinking about what was happening. She blamed herself for letting him have the M’Krann go into the hands of King Erik.
But then she could smell brimstone. She soon realised that Bamf had teleported himself inside her room. She then saw him hanging over her head.
“Hello Kitty,” he said. “Beautiful day. Let’s pick some flowers.”
“Not today Bamf,” replied Kitty. “I’m not in the mood.”
“Oh.” He the teleported onto her leg. “What’s wrong. You’re not your usual happy self.”

Lockheed flew into Kitty’s room. He then landed next to Bamf and Kitty. This made her smile a little. Bamf was even able to make Kitty feel a little better.
“Well if King Erik does come here we can take him,” said Bamf. “D Generation X will beat him and in record time. Besides there was nothing else you could do.”

But the hug was interrupted by one of the messengers. He obviously had a message for Kitty.

“A message from the far reaches of your Kingdom.”

What is the message about?
