“Your Highness King Erik had taken over the Kingdom of Mexicarno,” said the Messenger.
“Why didn’t they contact us for help?” asked Kitty in shock.
“The attack was so swift that they didn’t have time to send out a distress call.”
“What does my father command?”
“It is a matter of what you command. He has left the power of the army in your hands.”
Kitty was a little confused with why the King had done this but she didn’t complain. She just put a serious look on her face. “Gather every soldier possible and we must defend ourselves.”
“But it would take weeks to build an army big enough to pose any threat to King Erik.”
“Then for now get the ones in the local area. We attack his army and it’ll give us time to build a bigger army.”
“Yes your majesty.”
The Messenger then went away and Kitty turned her attention back to Bamf and Lockheed. They looked up at her and they tried to smile a little.
“Why did you do that?” asked Bamf.
“Believe me I have a cunning plan,” replied Kitty.

Will she get the army together?
1422211111122121212111222111121122112212.title: leader of the army

1422211111122121212111222111121122112212.content:
A little later we see Kitty looking at the troops she had. They were all men and they had swords and shields with them. They were between 5’8 and 6’5 tall. But they all looked like children to Kitty. The rest of D Generation X was in the army.
“Ok we’re in a time of great peril,” said Kitty. “The evil King Erik is taking over land that is not his and he is slaughtering innocent people in the process. I have faced him more than once and he is a powerful villain. But what makes him most dangerous is the army he wields. I know we’re out numbered but there is a small creek where they would have to go be thinned out. We attack them there at their weakest. And all will know that 300 Americans gave their last breath to defend it.”
The men then roared in anticipation. Kitty smiled at them. Then she was approached by another soldier. He had a huge sword and shield with him and he could barely carry it. This was obviously for Kitty and he gave it to her. He lifted them with ease and she smiled at him.
“Thank you brave warrior.”
“You’re welcome Princess,” replied the Man.
The army then started to march towards where Kitty had instructed them. They were chanting along and they eventually got there.
1422211111122121212111222111121122112212.title: 300 Americans

1422211111122121212111222111121122112212.content:
Eventually the American army got to small creek where Kitty instructed them. She was on the front line and so was the rest of D Generation X. But the army saw the armies belonging to King Erik. They gulped a little when they saw the numbers.
"This is it," said Kitty. "If we survive this we will go down in history. Now just make sure you don't get yourself killed and defeat any opponent who dares to face you."
Then the army of King Erik started to run towards the Americans. They stood their ground and some of the men were a little afraid. But that was normal for a battle like this.
"Stand your ground!" shouted Kitty.
Then the army of King Erik and the Americans clashed. They pushed at each other. Limey suffered a slash wound to his arm. But then he used his powers to make a small explosion in front of the main soldiers. This gave the Americans an upper hand and they began to fight back.
Colossus shifted into a metal form to protect his friends. Al popped his claws out and started to attack any enemy in sight. Bamf was teleporting around slashing them and then disappearing. Kitty was their main target but she was defending herself.

Who will win?
1422211111122121212111222111121122112212.title: The battle

1422211111122121212111222111121122112212.content:
"Americans attack!" shouted Kitty.
Then the American army started to push back at the invading army. They were able to kill off a few of them. Al was slashing people from left to right. He was killing the most out of them. Kitty did feel some sympathy for the soldiers. Most of them didn't want to fight but the evil King Erik made them. Each one of them had families. This was really getting to her.
"Americans fight to wound I repeat fight to wound."
The Americans then changed their tactics from killing the body to attacking the arms and legs. They didn't want to defy the princess and they felt some right in her judgement.
The armies of King Erik were being wounded badly. They were targeting the legs and they could hardly walk let alone fight. Most of the soldiers fled but King Erik remained.
"Stand and fight cowards!" shouted King Erik. "They will fall."
"Looks like your army ahs deserted you," replied Kitty. "Now surrender."
"Never. Thanks to you I'm a force to be reckoned with."
Hen used his magnetic powers to lift all the weapons.
1422211111122121212111222111121122112212.title: American victory for now

1422211111122121212111222111121122112212.content:
King Erik used the metal worn by the American soldiers to push them back. He also stripped Kitty of her armour and weapons. There was only her and King Erik left on the battle field.
"You really think you have a chancre against me?" asked King Erik. "I was more powerful then you normally. But with the M'Krann crystal I am Omnipotent."
"Do you want to put that to the test?" asked Kitty. She was extremely angry that King Erik had caused everyone so much harm and now he was hurting her friends. This made her lose her temper and she grew to 30 feet tall. "Try taking me on now."
"Your change in size will prove nothing against the Master of Magnetism."
He then used many of the metal object and he threw them at Kitty. She was able to roll out of the way and she was getting closer to King Erik.
But Metal was being wrapped around her and she couldn't stay standing. King Erik was slowly pushing her back. She kept thinking about the people who would suffer if she lost. This made her grow again and this time she was 150 feet.
"The more you threaten me and my friends the bigger I get," said Kitty. "Now prepare to be defeated."
"Not likely Princess."

Who will win?
1422211111122121212111222111121122112212.title: The battle of the centruy

1422211111122121212111222111121122112212.content:
Kitty was now more of a match for King Erik. But she had to get the M'Krann crystal away from him. Although he was still quite powerful without it he would have been weaker.
"I need to get that crystal," thought Kitty. "That's the only way I can beat this Megalomaniac."
King Erik continued to throw metal objects at her. They were hitting her quite hard and they were causing her some injury. But this was just making her more angry. And it was making her grow bigger and bigger.
Eventually Princess Kitty was over 600 feet tall. King Erik was like an ant to her and the metal objects were less effective then they use to be.
"Stay away from me you over-grown freak of nature," said King Erik.
"Insults get you nowhere," replied Kitty. She then picked him up and took the M'Krann crystal. This made his power level go down.
"I'm not finished yet."
"You are for today."
She then slammed the evil King to the ground hard enough to knock him out but not kill him.
1422211111122121212111222111121122112212.title: King slam

1422211111122121212111222111121122112212.content:
Just then the sky went cloudy. Then there was thunder and lightning. Kitty found it odd that it came all of a sudden. Then she saw a familiar figure flying towards her. It was the Mistress of the Elements. She flew down onto Kitty’s huge hand.
"Well done princess you have defeated the single biggest threat to this land," said the Mistress of the Elements. "But now I need the M'Krann crystal back."
"Sure have it," replied Kitty. She then gave the Mistress of the Elements the M'Krann crystal. "Please put it somewhere where no evil can ever obtain it's power."
"Don't worry Princess it is as good as hidden."
Kitty then watched the Mistress of the Elements fly away and then she bent down and picked up evil king Erik. She then looked at her surviving troops.
"Ok guys let's go home."
The troops cheered and they went back to their wives and children.
The rest of D Generation X went back to the palace. There they were given a heroes welcome.
For the next few years everything was peaceful in the world. Although Kitty still had the curse she could learn to live with it now. She even married her sweetheart Colossus.

Will this story continue?
1422211111122121212111222111121122112212.title: Ending?

1422211111122121212111222111121122112212.content:
And everyone in the Kingdom lived happily ever after. The End.
Now we're back in the room with Kitty and the children. Professor X was also there with their mother.
"Wow that was a great story," said the little Girl.
"Tell us another one," replied the Boy.
"Maybe next time," said Kitty. "You guys have to go now."
The kids looked disappointed at her. "But you're the best story teller ever."
"I'll think of a really good one when you come back."
"Ok Kitty," said the Children.
They then went with their mother and older brother out of the mansion. This left just Kitty and Professor X.
"Hmm you seem to have really caught their imagination Kitty," said Professor X. "Thanks for keeping them occupied."
"My pleasure Professor. Besides I was thinking when mutants become accepted in the world I might become a Children's book writer."
"I'm almost sure you will Kitty. Now dinner is at 5. I'll see you then."
"See you later Professor."
Professor X then rolled away in his chair and Kitty sat down at her computer and continued her work. But she couldn't stop thinking about the story. She just smiled.
1422211111122121212111222111121122112212.title: happily ever after

1422211112.content:
Outter space on a far away Planet. This planet was unique to the others. Although everyone looked human they were all 150 feet tall. They had a just King and Queen. But it was the Princess Kitty who truly gave the planet meaning. She loved all living things from the tallest of trees to the tiniest of ants. She was by far the gentlest of them all.
But one day a disaster occurred. Scientist had spotted a meteor coming towards her home planet. Unfortunately there was only one space ship and everyone wanted the Princess to live. At first she refused but she was forced to do it eventually.
This ship was the size of a normal ship. But just before she went on it she was exposed to a shrinking gas that reduced her to the size of a normal girl.
Princess Kitty was then loaded into the rocket and she fired off into outta space. Although it would take her years to get to a planet that she could breathe in she was put into suspended animation during the journey. But on the way the meteor hit the planet and it was completely destroyed killing everyone on it.
Many years past and eventually Princess Kitty landed on a planet with a breathable atmosphere. She came out of the rocket and she stood up she was still normal size.
1422211112.title: Planet of giants

14222111121.content:
Kitty was on some sort of Jungle planet. She was slowly regaining her former size. But it would take time. She also knew a side affect of the gas would make the person bigger then they were before. But the difference varied from person to person.
The first thing Kitty wanted to do was get some help. Her rocket her a universal translator so she could understand the natives and they would understand her. But she cried first at the thought of her people and planet being killed. But that was at least twenty years ago. If she had been in the ship normal she would be in her mid 30s by now. But because of suspended animation she was still as young as when she left.
By now Kitty had risen to 6'6 feet tall and she went into the jungle. She had a laser dagger in her pocket in case anything happened.
But then she saw a man who was made of metal. He was climbing up a tree to get some food. Kitty looked up at him and was thinking about what to say. He seemed cute and she blushed a little.
"Err good sir," said Kitty. "I need your help."
The man then looked down at her.

Will he help her?
14222111121.title: On a new planet

142221111211.content:
"Can I help you?" he asked in a thick Russian accent.
"Yes I need help," replied Kitty. She then gained an extra two inches. The man looked at her.
"You just grew taller right in front of me. But that is impossible."
"I know I'm a giant."
"But the giants are extinct. Their planet blew up years ago."
"Please don't remind me. I miss them terrible." She then shed a tear.
"Please accept my dearest apologies. I did not mean to upset you. But why are you so much smaller then the other giants?"
"Well the rocket they put me in was normal sized. So they had to shrink me and I'm slowly gaining my size back. But there is a side effect. I'm going to be taller then I was before."
"How much taller?"
"I don't know it ranges from person to person."
"How can I help you anyway Miss?"
"Princess Kitty."
"Then I shall introduce myself. I am Colossus."
142221111211.title: Colossus

1422211112111.content:
Kitty was now roughly 6 feet tall and she was happy that she was getting her old size back. But she dreaded to think how much bigger she'd be when she stopped. But she was happy that now she had Colossus helping her.
"Princess Kitty I know a town not too far from here," said Colossus. "It'll have your needs for now."
"Please call me Kitty," replied Kitty. "It makes me feel normal."
"As you wish."
"And I'd like to go to this town of yours. How far is it?"
"About 10 miles. But I have something that'll help."
Colossus then led Kitty to a hover vehicle. He got in and Kitty got into the passenger seat. She adjusted the seat to comfort her now longer legs. They then travelled to the town. It looked like a place for the lowest of the low. She didn't really approve of it but she accepted that her options were limited.
"I am sorry about this place Kitty," said Colossus. "But I have a friend I would like you to meet."
"Ok who is your friend?"
"He's a pilot."

Who is this friend?
1422211112111.title: The help of Colossus

14222111121112.content:
The pair then go to a bar. It was full of low lives and Kitty was repulsed. She tried not to be shallow. She eventually saw a man who looked just like Nightcrawler sitting there having a drink. When he saw Colossus they hugged each other in friendship and then they sat down.
“Ah Colossus long time no see,” he said.
“And it is nice to see you again Kurt,” replied Colossus.
“And who is this beautiful woman with you?” He then kissed Kitty’s hand and this made her blush a little. “Let me introduce myself my name Kurt Wagner captain of the Emerald Hawk."
"My name is Kitty Pryde Princess of the giants," replied Kitty.
"But the giants died years ago."
"Well I've been in suspended animation."
"And you're so small. I thought giants would be a lot bigger."
"I'm still growing. Do you have a place where I could fit when I reach full size?"
"I think there's enough room in the cargo bay."
"That should be great."
"Is there anywhere you wanted to go in particular?"
14222111121112.title: Kurt Wagner Captain of the Emerald Hawk

142221111211121.content:
"Well our planet did have an Allegiances with Topeka," said Kitty. "Hopefully they can help me."
"That's a long way your majesty," replied Kurt.
"Please take me I'm begging you I have no where else to go." Then she had a small growth spurt.
"Ok I can never turn down someone with a pretty face. And someone who can stomp me in the next few days."
Kitty then gave Kurt a hug. But then a short man came to them. Kurt smiled when he came.
"Ah Logan you're back."
"Yeah I was bored so I came to see if you wanted me to help you flying that rust bucket."
"Well you're just in luck. I was about to take Princess Kitty to Topeka."
"So this hell hole has royalty in it."
Kitty then stood up to greet him. But she realised just how tall she was. She was well into the 7 foot region and she towered above Logan.
"Wow you're a big one."
"And I'm only going to get bigger," replied Kitty.


What happens next?
142221111211121.title: Topeka

1422211112111211.content:
Just then a bounty hunter comes he had his gun and he pointed them at the three of them. They raised their arms into the air and he began talking in an alien language. Thankfully they understood him.
"I don't want any trouble," said the Bounty Hunter. "I'm just here for Captain Wagner."
"Please I promise that I'll have the money by next week," replied Kurt.
"Dukes has given you enough time to pay. now he wants your head."
Then with his tail Kurt was able to grab the gun and point it at the bounty hunter. He raised his arms while Kitty and Colossus put theirs down.
"Now we have a little problem here," said Kurt. "But it can easily be resolved. You want to live and I want to get out of here. I think we can strike a deal."
"Very well but don't think you've gotten away from me this easily Captain Wagner."
The three of them then walked away towards the Emerald Hawk. Kitty couldn't believe what was happening. But when she went on the ship she banged her head on the doorway. She was still getting use to being taller then normal. (Well when she was big on her home planet everything seemed normal).
Kurt went to the control and began to take off. But then the ship was being fired at by bounty hunters.
1422211112111211.title: Bounty Hunter

choices: There was a major event in history happen there
14222111121112111.content:
"Ok guys hang on tight this might be a bumpy ride," said Kurt. He then began to take off. It was really bumpy and everyone was strapped it. The hull was receiving some damage from the shots of the bounty hunters. "Almost there."
Then the ship fully took off and within seconds it left the atmosphere of the planet. They all gave a sigh of relief. But Kitty really had to undo her seat beat. She felt like she couldn't breathe.
"Well there we go Princess," said Kurt. "We're on our way to Topeka."
"Good," replied Kitty. "I just hope I don't grow too fast." Sudden a siren went off within the ship. Kitty was a little confused. "I hope that means I'm the one millionth passenger."
"Unfortunately it's not. Unfortunately the hull took too much damage. We need to land on a planet and make emergency repairs."
"What's the nearest one to here?"
"Let me check." He then went to a screen and typed in a few thins. He eventually came up with a planet. "This one seems to have normal gravity and a breathable atmosphere."
"What's it called?"
"Ronin."
"I've think I've heard of this place."

What's special about it?
14222111121112111.title: Blast off

142221111211121112.content:
"Well there was a great battle there," said Colossus. "It happened many centuries ago."
Kurt eventually landed on a sustainable planet. Kitty was the first to get off and she stretched her legs. She was so relieved to get out but she knew that the worst of that was yet to come. Kurt began fix the ship while Colossus held it up so he could reach certain parts.
“Is there anything you want me to do?” asked Kitty.
“No just take a walk around,” replied Kurt. “Get a little exercise Mein Freud.”
“Hey are you saying I’m lazy?”
“Of course not I wouldn’t say such a thing. I meant was that we’ll probably be on the ship for a while. So run around here while you’ve got open space.”
“Ok I’ll see you later.”
Kitty then walked away. She grew another few inches and she looked up at the trees. There were some beautiful flowers on them and her latest growth spurt meant that she could reach them easily. She picked one of them and sniffed it. It smelled like heaven and she gave out a sigh.
“That’s some nice flowers,” said Kitty. But then she heard something in the bushes. She turned around and looked. “Who’s there?” There was no reply. “Come o out I’m stronger then I look.”
142221111211121112.title: Landed

1422211112111211121.content:
Eventually a small purple dragon came out of the bushes. At first she was afraid but it just landed on her shoulder and cuddled itself around her head. She couldn't help but think that it was cute.
"Oh aren't you the cutest little thing I've ever seen," said Kitty. She gently stroked the Dragon's head. "You comfy there?"
But just then the dragon flew off her shoulder and went away. When this happened Kitty had another growth spurt. She was getting close to 10 feet tall. But she was sad to see it go.
But then the dragon came back. But this time he had a beautiful flower in its mouth. Kitty put out her hands and the dragon put it on her hand.
"Oh that's nice," said Kitty. She then stroked its head. "Do you want to stay with me?" The dragon responded positively. "Good let me show you my friends."
Kitty then walked back to the Emerald Hawk. Kurt and Colossus saw how much taller Kitty was. They could truly see that she was becoming the giant that she once was. But they were surprised to see her with a dragon.
"What's that?" asked Kurt.
"It's my new friend Lockheed," replied Kitty.

Will Kurt allow Lockheed onto the ship?
1422211112111211121.title: Lockheed

14222111121112111212.content:
"Can we keep him?" asked Kitty.
"No you can not," replied Kurt.
"Oh why?"
"We don't know if it carries any diseases or if it's dangerous. He may look cute but he might also be a homicidal maniac."
"We don't know that he's loving and gentle."
"My decision stands princess."
Kitty was a little upset and she looked at Lockheed. She didn't want to let him go and he didn't want to leave her. She just began to think of a little plan that would help them both out.
"Lockheed do I'm going to smuggle you onto the ship," said Kitty. "But you have to promise not to move or make a sound aright." Lockheed then put his hand on his chest and raised his hand. "Good."
Then kitty realised something. it seemed that Lockheed had understood her. She was a little puzzled but she wanted to take him onto the ship first. But it would be a little tricky for her. But she had another growth spurt that made her roughly 20 feet tall. She stuffed Lockheed down her chest.
14222111121112111212.title: Sneak in

142221111211121112121.content:
By now Kitty was way too big to fit into the cockpit so she had to go into the cargo bay. It was really big and spacious for the still mini giantess. But for now no one knew that she had hidden Lockheed away.
""Are you sure you'll be comfortable in here?" asked Kurt.
"Yeah I’m comfy," replied Kitty. "Besides this is the only place in the ship where I can actually sit down and relax."
"Ok we'll just take off then we'll talk a little more."
Kurt and Colossus left and kitty quickly got Lockheed out of his hiding place. She rested him in her hands and she smiled at him.
"That was close," said Kitty. But what ever you do make sure they don't find you. Do you understand?" Lockheed then responded positively. "Good now lets see if Kurt left me some food in here."
Kitty then cracked open one of the crates and she found food in there. She began to eat it and she gave some of it to her companion Lockheed. She still thought that he was the cutest thing she had ever seen.
"Ok now remember what happens when Kurt and Colossus come in." Lockheed flew back into his hiding place. "Good boy."

Will they find out soon?
142221111211121112121.title: Fun with Lockheed

1422211112111211121211.content:
The Emerald Hawk went flying through the empty vacuum of space. Captain Kurt was just keying in the directions to their destination. He admitted that it would take a while to get there.
In the cargo bay Kitty was having fun with Lockheed. He was flying around and she was calling his name. Whenever she did Lockheed would fly back to her. He would always be rewarded with a little cuddle. She was even teaching him some tricks. She was amazed to see how fast he was learning them.
Eventually Captain Kurt and Colossus came down to see her. They saw her playing with Lockheed and they smiled at them. At first they were angry but they knew that they couldn't really do much about it.
“Hi guys,” said Kitty.
“Good afternoon Princess,” replied Colossus. “We can see that you’re having fun with your little dragon.”
“He’s cute. Look what he can do.” She then put Lockheed on the ground. “Now roll over.” Lockheed then rolled over. “Good now shake Colossus’s hand.”
Lockheed then turned to Colossus. He squatted down and Lockheed shook his hand.
“Very impressive Kitty,” said Captain Kurt. “What else can he do?”
“He can do a lot of things.”
1422211112111211121211.title: Found out

choices: In orbit of a large planet
14222111121112111212111.content:
“Kitty you do know that you disobeyed my orders by bringing your pet dragon,” said Kurt. “You could have endangered us.”
“I know what I’m doing,” replied Kitty. “If he was dangerous I wouldn’t have let him on. But look at him isn’t he the cutest little thing you’ve ever seen?”
“I know but don’t disobey my orders again.”
“Ok I’ll try not to.”
“Good now would you like something to eat?”
“Got anything that doesn’t have any meat in it.”
“Yeah I’ll see what I’ve got.”
A little later we see Kitty eating some food. Lockheed was also eating the food and she was constantly giggling at him and patting him on his head.
“Good Lockheed,” said Kitty.
Meanwhile in the cockpit Kurt was going over the fuel gage. It was getting low and he was getting concerned.
“We don’t have enough fuel to get us all of the way,” he said.
“What do we do?” replied Colossus.
“We’ll have to stop off at a station. There’s one not too far away from here. We can get there easily.”

Where is this station?
14222111121112111212111.title: Disobey

142221111211121112121112.content:
The Space Station was orbiting a small planet. Captain Kurt landed there to get much needed supplies and fuel. But it was going to be a while so everyone looked around a little. Kitty stayed with Lockheed.
She began to look around shops. She was too big to go into any of them. But she was attracting some attention. Everyone looked at her and she stared blankly at them. She was unsure what to say.
"A giant," said one alien.
"She's a little small to be a giant," replied someone else.
"But aren't giants suppose to be extinct?"
"Well obliviously not."
Kitty didn't like the unwanted attention and she just walked away. But she didn't notice a low sign underneath her. She tripped over it and she fell onto the ground. Lockheed was able to fly up a little to protect himself but Kitty had some injuries. But she was able to stand back up.
"That hurt," she said.
But then she saw something in a shop window. She began to get closer to it to take a look.
142221111211121112121112.title: Shopping

1422211112111211121211121.content:
Eventually Kitty came to a fast food restaurant. She was too big to fit into the building normally. But she saw a little drive through to the side. This made her come up with an idea.
She went around to the drive in and the alien in the window simply looked up at her. He was in some fear.
“C-can I help you?” asked he asked.
“Yes I would like Twenty veggie Burger meals all with diet coke,” replied Kitty. “And wha6t would you like Lockheed?” he then pointed to something on the board. “And a tang Burger with water.”
“Ok that’ll be 300 credits.”
Kitty paid the money and she had to wait a few minutes for the food to be ready. She had to sit in an open space while they made her meals. When they came out they gave them to her and she thanked them.
“There you go Lockheed,” said Kitty. She gave him his burger and water. “Now the rest is mine.”
She began to eat all the burgers and fries. She also drank her diet coke quite fast. This gave her some gas. She accidentally burped.
“Excuse me.”

What happen next?
1422211112111211121211121.title: Fast food

14222111121112111212111212.content:
Kitty blushed a little but then she felt the strange feeling throughout her entire body. She knew what was going to happen next. But before she had a chance to react her body shot up again. Everyone was amazed to see her grow. She grew until she was 55 feet tall. Everyone looked like dolls to her. This scared her a little. But Lockheed flew onto her hand and this made her feel a little better.
"I had another growth spurt," said Kitty. "I'll be back up to my old size in no time. But I remember Daddy saying I'll become bigger then that."
She shed a tear because of this. But the tear landed on someone and it made him a little wet.
"Hey!" he shouted.
"Oh sorry," replied Kitty.
She began to walk back to the ship. But she was having to be really careful where she was stepping. She didn't want to accidentally kill anyone. That was the last thing she wanted to do.
"I hope we finish here soon. I just want to get out of here. People are staring at me and I don't like it."
Eventually she came back to the ship. But there were others there.
14222111121112111212111212.title: Even Bigger

choices: Kurt and Colossus come to her
142221111211121112121112121.content:
When she got back to the ship she was relieved that she had gotten there safely. She aw people staring at her. She didn't like this but as a princess she was use to people looking at her all the time.
She was glad to see Kurt and Colossus return. She picked them both up and they were amazed by her size.
"Princess you are bigger," said Colossus.
"I know and I'm still growing," replied Kitty.
"Hopefully we'll be able to get to our destination before you grow too big for the ship."
"I hope that doesn't happen."
Kitty then got herself onto the ship and she was in the cargo hold again. Lockheed flew onto her knee and he was rewarded with a little stroke. He even got a little cuddle from the gentle giantess.
But she then felt the ship begin to take off. She tried to get herself into a safe and comfortable position. But she did keep Lockheed safe from any harm.
When they had taken off she relaxed a little and she let Lockheed go. He flew around a little again.
"We're off again."

What happens next?
142221111211121112121112121.title: Taking off

1422211112111211121211121211.content:
Kitty lay in the cargo hold. She was a little bored but Lockheed was keeping her company. She would play with him a little. But then she began to hear something coming from one of the crates. He was a little curious.
“Is someone there?” she asked. She got no answer so she started to investigate. She heard a noise coming from a specific crate. She grabbed onto it and she picked it up. She was surprised to see a rather hairy man. He seemed to be afraid and she gently picked him up.
“It’s alright I’m not going to hurt you,” said Kitty.
“You’re a…,” he replied.
“Giant yes I know. A little small but I’m still growing.” She then had a small growth spurt. “See I’m a growing girl.”
“But that’s impossible.”
“A wonder that we call technology. What’s your name?”
“Logan.”
“My name is princess Kitty.” Lockheed then flew onto her hand. “And this is my trusted ally Lockheed.”
“Err hi.”
1422211112111211121211121211.title: Logan

choices: They talk for a little while
14222111121112111212111212111.content:
Kitty giggled a little. "You're cute," she said. "But what exactly are you doing on this ship?"
"I needed a lift," replied Logan.
"Well you could have asked instead of just jumping on like that."
"There wasn't any point. You wouldn't have let me on."
"I would have. Unlike most people in the galaxy I’m actually nice to people and other living things."
"Ok I'm sorry."
"Well you should be if I was still in my kingdom I would have ordered your immediate execution."
"What?"
She then giggled a little. "Only kidding. In my Kingdom there's no death penalty." She then sighed a little. "There's nothing left of my kingdom."
"So you're the last of the great giants?"
"Yep and I'll probably the biggest one ever."
"What why?"
"You know that technology I told you about? Well it's going to make me bigger then before."

What happens next?
14222111121112111212111212111.title: Needed a lift

142221111211121112121112121112.content:
Just then Kurt walked in. He had come to see how Kitty was getting on. But he was shocked to see that she had a man in her hands. He began to think that she had brought another one on board.
"Kitty did you bring this gentleman on here?" asked Kurt.
"No I came here on my own accord," replied Logan. "You're lucky that your friend here is really nice. Most other people would have thrown me out."
"So you're a stowaway?"
"Yes I am a stowaway. I needed to get out of there and fast."
"Nothing to do with the law right?"
"Of course not."
"Why do I find that hard to believe?"
"How about this. If I can work on this ship you let me become part of your crew."
"What do you think Kitty?"
"I think we should," replied Kitty.
"Ok then you're part of the crew. But don't expect it to be easy."
"I won't," replied Logan.
"Good and now for your first job. Wash Lockheed."
142221111211121112121112121112.title: Koin the crew

1422211112111211121211121211121.content:
Lockheed then began to fly away. But kitty gently grabbed him. He struggled a little but Kitty was trying to calm him down. Kurt and Colossus laughed as they went back to the bridge.
"Why me?" asked Logan.
"Don't worry I'll help," replied Kitty. "He'll be calmer if I'm here for him."
"Ok but where's the water and everything?"
"Just over there."
Logan looked and he saw a brush, soap, bowl and a hot water source. He put some soap in th water while it was going into the bowl and he took it to the centre of the cargo hold where Kitty was. She still had Lockheed with her.
"Are you ready?" asked Kitty.
"Yeah sure," replied Logan.
Kitty then dipped Lockheed into the water. He didn't really like the water but when he was in it made him feel relaxed. He even rolled around a little in the water. Kitty found this cute.
"Oh look how cute he is," said Kitty.
"Yeah he's pretty cute," replied Logan.

Will anything happen?
1422211112111211121211121211121.title: Clean up Lockheed

14222111121112111212111212111211.content:
It took a little while but Logan was able to wash Lockheed. He wasn’t too happy about it but Kitty was making him feel calmer. If she wasn’t here he probably would have breathed fire on him.
“There you go Lockheed,” said Kitty. “Don’t you feel better after that bath?” He didn’t really respond. “But now you’re all clean you get some more hugs off me.” This was enough to give him a smile.”
She then gently hugged the little dragon. He enjoyed it and he didn’t want it to end. But then something began to spook him.
“What is it?” asked Kitty. She then looked around a little but she couldn’t see anything. “I can’t see anything.”
“I can’t either but I can smell it,” replied Logan.
“What is it?”
“I’m not sure but I’m sure that we’re not alone.” He then drew out his claws. Kitty was amazed to see them.
“Y-you have claws?”
“Strongest metal in the known universe.”
“Adamantium?”
14222111121112111212111212111211.title: Yes

142221111211121112121112121112111.content:
"Clever girl," said Logan. But then they sniff a little more. "Something's definitely here. I can smell it."
"Where is it?" replied Kitty.
"Just over there. Don't say anything."
He then quietly began to walk towards a crate. He could definitely smell something coming from here. He couldn't quite tell what it was though.
But then he sliced the crate open with his claws and the crate came open. kitty took a look inside to see what it was.
Just then she felt her someone pinch her nose. She gave a little ouch and then she sw someone jump out of the box. he seemed to be incredible agile.
"I've been in htere for so long," he said.
"You dare do that to me," replied Kitty.
"Wow a big girl with an equally big temper. "He then watched he grow a little more. her head was only a few feet away from the ceiling. "And getting bigger all the time I can see." He then laughed a little.
"You're insane."
"I know you are but what am I?"

What is he?
142221111211121112121112121112111.title: Honk

1422211112111211121211121211121111.content:
Kitty tried to catch him. But he simple rolled out of the way of her giant hands. he was making it look too easy.
"Oh you maybe big," said the Prankster. "But you're as slow as hell." he then laughed a little. "When you get tall enough you can help me up a mountain."
This made Kitty mad. "How dare you mock me," replied Kitty. "I am a princess of an extinct race of giants."
"They can't be extinct if you're here."
But before he could do anything he was caught by Logan. He got out his claws and got them close to the Prankster's chest. He started to panic a little.
"Hey I was only having a bit of fun," said the prankster.
"Well your days of having fun are over," replied Logan.
"Don't kill him," said Kitty.
"You saw what he did to you."
"But he won't die. By laws of this area of space this Prankster has offended me and so must serve me for the rest of his natural life."
"How did you know that?"
"Education."
1422211112111211121211121211121111.title: The prankster

14222111121112111212111212111211111.content:
"But I can't do that," said the Prankster.
"If you do not agree with this then you'll have to write to the giant council and see what they say," replied Kitty. "But since they're no longer around it seems that you're stuck with me."
"Is there any other way I can be free?"
"I can set you free myself."
"Do it then I've got to go to the bathroom in like five hours."
"No I'm not releasing you. In fact I might need someone."
"Kitty," said Captain Kurt through a speaker. "Cameras indicate another stowaway. Have you found him?"
"Yeah I've got him here," replied Kitty.
"You need to take him back to where ever he came from."
"I can't he's got a debt to me he has to stay with me."
"Kitty this is my ship."
"And this is the universal law. If he leaves without me giving him his freedom then he could get executed."
"Then free him."

Will she?
14222111121112111212111212111211111.title: Life debt

142221111211121112121112121112111112.content:
"No for now he can be useful to me and you," said Kitty.
"What do you mean?" replied Kurt.
"Think about it you've got an extra crew member to help you maintain this large ship. He will work for you."
"Will I?" replied the prankster.
"Yes you will."
"Since you put it like that he will be in some sue," replied Kurt. "If you work for Kitty I will reward you with shelter food and anything else you need."
"What more can a man ask for?" said the prankster.
"Great now we have to take a slight detour. A friend of mine has requested our help on a far away planet."
"What's the problem?" replied Kitty.
"I don't know but it's an emergancy."
"Ok we'll go if we need to."
"That's fine."
"Just before you go can I just give you all a little hug?" She then picked up everyone i the room and gave them a big hug.
142221111211121112121112121112111112.title: Useful

1422211112111211121211121211121111121.content:
After the hug Kurt, Colosuss and Logan went into the control room. They began to steer the ship towards where they wanted to go. But it was quite hard and the controls on the ship were complex.
"How do ou turn this thing?" asked Logan.
"You've got to push thirteen different buttons for that," replied Kurt. "You've got to do it in sequence."
"I'll never be able to do that."
"Then let me."
Ine the cargo bay Kitty was playing a little with Lockheed. She would gently stroke him and he would fly around a little.
"He's cute isn't he?" said the Prankster.
"Yep he's the cutest little dragon in the entire galaxy," replied Kitty. "I could just hug him to bits."
"He'd look good on the wall."
"You're not shooting him."
"No I mean he'd look good if he had his own little shelf on a wall."
"That doesn't sound too bad."

Where is the distrss call from?
1422211112111211121211121211121111121.title: Responding

14222111121112111212111212111211111212.content:
The ship began to head towards a small water planet. This was where Kurt had gotten th distress signal from and he was eager to get there. Instead of going down to Kitty he radioed her from the bridge.
"I'm sorry princess but we need to make one more stop," said Kurt.
"What's wrong?" replied Kitty.
"I have a friend who's in trouble. He really needs us."
"Ok then go. Where is it?"
"It's on Retaw. It's a water based planet. I hope you can swim."
"Been doing it since I was five."
"Then you have nothing to worry about."
The ship began to get closer to the planet and he was able to find a settlement to land. He did this very carefully and he was glad that he was able to do this.
"Welcome to Retaw," said Kurt.
Kitty then took a look out of the window. It looked a little like they were out in the middle of the ocean.
"This place looks pretty cool."
"Cool indeed."
14222111121112111212111212111211111212.title: Retaw

142221111211121112121112121112111112121.content:
"Ok the ship has a large raft we can use," said Kurt. "But for Kitty it'll be a problem. She's way too big."
"Let's just hope she can swim," replied Colossus.
A few minutes later Kitty was told the news about she wasnt' too particularly keen on it. At first she refused.
"I really don't want to swim," said Kitty.
"But you're too big for the raft," replied Kurt.
"I know. But I didn't particularly like swimming."
"Can you swim?"
"Yes but."
"Then you have nothing to be worried about."
"Ok I'll do it." But I'm not going in wearing this."
"I'm sure you'll foind something else."
Kitty then looked through the ship's cargo looking for something to wear instead of her normal clothes. She eventually found something that was perfect.
"This looks ideal."
She then put it on.

What wasit?
142221111211121112121112121112111112121.title: Swim

1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.content:
Kitty had found some clothes. She wrapped them around her body and they seemed to fit perfectly. She looked at herself in a mirror and she looked like a model. She even smiled a little at herself.
"If there was a photographer here he would so make me a model," said Kitty. She posed a little more.
But after that Kitty wa let out of the Emerald Hawk and she dived into the water. It was surprising warm and she enjoyed it. But then she saw Captian Kurt on a raft with Colossus and the others.
"You're not too cold in there are you?" asked Kurt.
"No this water is lovely and warm," replied Kitty.
"That's good. We wouldn't want you to freeze to death."
"Now where exactly is your friend?"
"A few miles to the south."
"Ok I think you should lead the way."
"Got you."
They then got some ores out and began to stroke their way south. But it would take them a long time.
1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.title: Warm water for a giant Kitty

1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.content:
The rowing was slow and Kitty was getting a little impatient. But while she was in the water Kitty grew a little more. She also noticed something else. She was tall enough to put her feet on the bottom of the sea floor.
"Hey I can walk on this now," said Kitty.
"Maybe that'll be faster," replied Captain Kurt.
"Ok hold on tight."
She then picked them up out of the water. She was now easily 250 feet tall. The water only came up to her shoulders.
Captain Kurt pointed her towards where his friend was. She was making good time for them. But then she gained an extra 50 feet making her 300 feet tall. This was worrying her a little.
"Wow I'm a little bigger then I normally am," said Kitty. "And I seem to be growing faster and faster."
"If you get too big you won't fit in the ship," replied Colossus.
"Let's just hope I've stopped."
Eventually they came up to a small island. Kitty hadn't grown anymore but the island was teaming with life.

Will she grow again?
1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.title: Growing faster

1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.content:
Thankfully for now Kitty had stopped growing. But she hadn't gone unnoticed by the inhabitants. Some began to fire at her with cannons. At her size cannons wouldn't do much damage but nough of them would and she began to dodge them.
"As the Princess of the Giants I demand that you cease fire!" shouted Kitty. Her voice was booming and many of them stopped firing. "Now that's a lot better. We come in peace."
"My friend said he would be here somewhere," said Captain Kurt.
"Where?"
"I'm not sure."
But then Kitty saw someone right in front of her eye. At first she thought it was an insect but then she noticed it was a woman flying right in front of her. She looked just like Storm and it seemed that she had similar powers.
"So you're a giant," she said. "I thought you guys were shorter and extinct?"
"I'm the last one and I'm still growing," replied Kitty. "I take it you're Captain Kurt's friend are you?"
"That's me."
She then flew down to the raft.

What do the pair do?
1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.title: Cease fire

1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.content:
Captian Kurt and Strom gave each other a hug. They were like old friends who hadn't seen each other for a long time.
"Kurt it's a pleasure to see you after all this time," said Storm.
"And I have missed you too," replied Kurt. "But what is your problem here. I don't think Kitty liked being fired at."
"I apologise for the islanders' rash behaviou but we have a problem here. One that could destroy us all."
"What is it?"
"I can't tell you here. We need to go somewhere where we can be alone." She tried to think a little. "Maybe in open sea."
"Alright. Kitty if you wuldn't mind."
"Not at all," replied Kitty.
Kitty then picked up the raft again and she walked away from the island. Eventually she reached open seas and the sea floor was almost too deep for her to stand on. But she put the raft down.
"So what's the problem?" asked Kurt.
"It's been stolen," replied Storm.
1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.title: Old friends

1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.content:
"You don't mean it do you?" asked Kurt.
"Yes it's gone," replied Storm.
"I hate to but in or anything but what's been stolen?" asked Kitty. She thought it sounded serious.
"The power source to the generators," said Storm. "It's the only thing keeping this planet warm. Without it everyone will freeze do death within days."
"Who took it?"
"Toad."
"What's a toad?"
"He's a thief here. He's probably going to sell it for a profit somewhere."
"And commit Genocide?"
"Most of us will be able to leave in rocks. But others won't be so lucky. I'm afraid if we don't get it back this planet will be a frozen wasteland again."
"Don't worry we'll get it back."
"You will?"
"Yeah sure we will."
"Thank you?"

Where is Toad
1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.title: Power soruce

1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.content:
“I wish you good luck in your search,” said Ororo.
“Aren’t you coming with us?” replied Kitty.
“Sadly I can not. I’m the only person who is keeping order here. If I were to leave then there would be anarchy everywhere.”
“Well I guess this is goodbye for now.”
“I bid you good luck on your search.”
Ororo gave them all the information that she had and the crew returned to the Emerald Hawk. They then flew off into space but all of the crew were in the cargo hold trying to decide what to do next.
“Where do we start?” asked Logan.
“I say that we start in the Malay system,” replied Kurt. “Chances are that’s where its been taken.”
“But isn’t that a little far?” asked Kitty.
“Normally yes but not for this baby.”
“How long will it take?”
“A day maybe less.”
“Then we better get started.”
1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.title: The chase

1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.content:
The Emerald Hawk began its long journey towards the Malay system. Kitty was a little bored in the cargo hold and she needed some kind of entertainment. She felt like she was going to go nuts.
"Prankster," she called out.She had to wait a minute for him to come.
"Yes your highness," replied Prankster.
"You wouldn't mind entertaining me a little. I'm really bored down here." She tried to smile. "There's a reward in it for you."
"What is it?"
"You'll find out soon enough."
The Prankster tried a few jokes but they didn't make Kitty laugh. he even threw a pie and Lockheed and this angered her.
"Don't be so cruel to him," said Kitty. She then began to wipe the pie off of Lockheed's face. "Are you alright?"
"I'm sorry."
"You better be when I told you to entertain me I didn't mean you to throw pies at my friends."
"You're not going to kill me?"

What does Kitty do?
1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.title: Entertain me

1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.content:
"No I don't kill people," said Kitty. "But I don't let people do that to my friends either." She then picked him up. "Now what can I do to you?"
"Let me go?" replied the Prankster.
"Not yet. Maybe you could do me a favour."
"Sure anything. I can shave those long legs of yours. Or maybe pluck those thick eyebrows of yours."
"Stop while you're ahead."
"Sorry.
"Ok now I want you to put a whoopie cushion on the chair of Logan. He'll sit on it and it'll sound like he's broken wind."
"Oh so you have a little prankster in you."
"Maybe."
"Consider it done princess."
"Thank you."
He the went away and he was giggling a little. He did have a whoopie cushion in his pocket and he had been waiting for the ideal time to use it on someone. It seemed Logan was his man.
1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.title: Do me a favour

1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.content:
Logan himself was sitting on a chair reading a magazine. Prankster could see what he had to do. he even had a camera with him so that Kitty could see from where she was. She was getting ready.
But then logan got up from the chair to go to the toilet. This was when Prankster put the cushion on the chair. He then waited for him to come back. He soon went away and Logan came back and went to sit on the chir.
Just when he did he heard a loud noise like someone had broken wind. He became very annoyed as Prankster laughed.
Kitty had seen what had happened in the cargo hold and it made her giggle. She giggled for a minute until she felt the shiver run down her spine. Then she grew until her head hit the ceiling. She was sitting down at the time.
"Ouch," she said.
When she stopped she could no longer sit up in the cargo hod. She had to practically lie down.
"Can this get any worse?"
Just then she could feel the ship rocking a little. It made her feel sick and she almost hurled.

What is it?
1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.title: Kitty laughs

1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.content:
Kitty was still giggling at this little joke. But then she felt the shiver run down her spine. She soon realized what was coming next.
“Oh no,” she said.
Just then she began to grow again. She grew and her head hit the ceiling. She rubbed her head and she was having to curl up a little. But when she stopped she couldn’t sit down properly in the cargo hold. She was forced to have to lie down a little so that she could stay in there.
“I’m even bigger.” She now took up most of the cargo hold. One more spurt and she wouldn’t be able to fit onto the ship anymore.
But then Kitty noticed something outside. There seemed to be other ships out there. They were banging along the Emerald Hawk. She felt every hit and then she could hear Captain Kurt's voice.
"Kitty we're under attack," said Kurt.
"What do we do?" replied Kitty.
"Simple we counter attack."
"Does this thing have weapons?"
"Yes."
1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.title: Ships and growth

1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.content:
"Then fire," said Kitty.
Everyone who was able to go to the guns and they began to fire them at the ships. The ships had markings on them that indicated that they were part of a group of pirates that terrorised this area of space. Kitty could only see through a window. She felt helpless since she was too big to be able fire any of the guns.
But Lockheed was there to keep her company. She stroked his head and gave him a little smile.
"Good boy," she said.
But then the ship was hit. It rocked and it made Kitty hit her head on the ceiling. She rubbed it a little with her hand.
Meanwhile everyone else was trying to get the pirates to leave. Kurt was at the controls and everyone else was using the cannons. But it didn't seem to be working for them. The pirates came in closer.
"There are too many of them," said Colossus.
"Less talking more firing," replied Logan.
"Yes Comrade."
They kept firing at the ships.

Will the pirates leave?
1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.title: Pirates

1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.content:
The Emerald Hawk was outnumbered and the pirates began to close in. Kitty felt helpless as they came in closer and closer towards them. If she was normal sized she could help. But she wasn’t and all she could do was sit in the cargo hold and stroke Lockheed.
“Don’t worry we’ll be alright,” said Kitty.
But at the guns Captain Kurt was extremely worried. He had never had to fend off so many ships at one time. He felt one hit along the ship and he knew that they’d be in trouble. But he had an idea.
“Kitty,” he said through the communicator.
“Yes,” replied Kitty.
“Expect trespassers to enter the ship. If any of them run into you deal with them quickly. Use any means necessary.”
“I’m not going to kill them.”
“I know you won’t.”
“Good.”
“Incoming.”
The ship rocked a little.
1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.title: Last resort

1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.content:
As the pirates got close to the Emerald Hawk they began to go to the air locks. They were able to get themselves hooked up to them and they began to enter the ship. Hey figured that all the valuable items were. But they didn’t know that they were in for a big surprise named Kitty.
They were able to blast the doors open and they went inside. But the first couple of pirates found themselves grabbed by a huge hand. They were then brought up to Kitty’s level and she wasn’t too happy with them.
“Pirates aka the scum of the universe,” said Kitty.
“A g-g-g-g-g,” replied the Pirate.
“Giant?”
“Yes.”
“At least you know who I am and you know how much damage I can do. Let me remind you that I could squash you and your entire crew like the bugs you are. All you need do to make sure that doesn’t happen is leave. But if I hear that you’ve robbed anyone else since this little meeting I will personally hunt you down. And chances are by then I’ll be even larger. Understood?”
“Yes ma’am.”

Is this all she does?
1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.title: Pirates confront a giant Kitty

1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.content:
As all the pirates left empty handed Captain Kurt went back down to the Cargo bay where Kitty was. She was sitting there seemingly waiting for him. He seemed to be happy with her.
“I don’t know what you did but you got rid of those damn pirates,” said Kurt. “I would give you a hug but I can’t reach you.”
“But I can reach you,” replied Kitty. She then quickly picked him up and gave him a little hug. She then put him back on the ground. “There you go.”
“You really are a gentle giant.”
“Those pirates don’t think so. I had to scare them away so they didn’t take anything. I like people to think I’m gentle. But I sometimes feel bad when I have to scare them like that. It just isn’t me.”
“You did what you had to do. Did you harm any of them?”
“Mentally yes physically no.”
“There you go. You have nothing to worry about.”
Lockheed then flew off Kitty’s hand and he landed on Kurt’s shoulder. This made her giggle a little.
“Oh he likes you,” she said.
1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.title: Still gentle

1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.content:
"You know he's kind of cute," said Kurt.
"I thought you'd say that," replied Kitty. She then stroked Lockheed's head with her finger. "You're a very good dragon." Lockheed then began to coo a little. "Yes you are oh yes you are."
"Now that we don't have any pirates left we can concentrated on finding our thief. It's the only way to save all of those people."
"Right. And if you don't mind we could all play a game in here."
"There's not a lot of room for you to run around."
"I know. But I mean a board game. I'm sure I can still play one of those. If you don't mind me playing."
"Yeah why not. We have a while before we get to our destination. I can always put the ship on Auto-pilot."
"Thank you."
A few minutes later everyone on the ship was in the cargo bay. There was a board on the ground and each character had some dice. The counters were holograms and moved to the dice roll.
"Who's first?" asked Colossus.
1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.title: Game?

1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.content:
Everyone looked at Lockheed and he picked up the dice and rolled it. He began to move his counter to the number he had rolled. Everyone was a little amazed to see him do that. They didn't think he was that smart.
"That is one smart dragon," said Logan.
"What do you expect from the cutest thing in the universe," replied Kitty. She then gave him a little stroke on the head.
"Now its my turn."
As the game went on everyone seemed to be having fun. Kitty had some difficulties seeing her dice and moving her counter since she was so big. But the others helped her out as best as they could.
"I'm winning," said Captain Kurt.
"Not for long," replied Colossus.
"If I don't win then I'm dropping you all off."
"What?"
"Just kidding."
"Don't kid around like that."
"Hey it’s only a joke."
1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.title: Game

1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.content:
As the game went on everyone was enjoying themselves. Although they knew that they were going to have a tough time in the near future at least for now they could relax and enjoy themselves.
Eventually Kitty landed on a space that told her to draw a card. She took one but the writing was too small for her. She couldn’t read it so she passed it down to Colossus and she smiled.
“Colossus you wouldn’t mind just reading this out for me?” asked Kitty. “The writing is a little too small for me to read.”
“It would be my pleasure Katya.” He then began to look at the card. “You are giving up the game. Sit down somewhere and suck your thumb.”
“What?”
“I am only kidding. It’s a question card for some points. What is the difference between a Huntingal and a Hemingal?”
“Let me think.”
“Twenty seconds.”
“Huntingals have bigger ears.”
“Correct.”

Will they finish their game?
1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.title: Card problem

1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.content:
"That was close," said Kitty.
As the game got on Kitty seemed to be winning. But she noticed something when everyone had such low points at the end of the game. No one had really tried to beat her and she felt a little bad.
"Did you guys let me win?" asked Kitty.
"No no no no," replied everyone.
"Be honest."
"No no no."
"Ok yes," replied the Jester.
"I might have nottakena few points when I could have," said Captain Kurt. "But Colossus did the same."
"Why did you do that?" asked Kitty.
"Well yourlarge and you're a princess. We didn't know if you were a soar loser or not and I was afraid in caseyou..."
"I wouldn't have hurt you guys. If i lsot fair and square I wouldn't have complained or anything."
"Really?"
1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.title: Did you guys let me win?

1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.content:
"Sure I need to be a fair person don't I?" asked Kitty.
"I guess so," replied Captain Kurt.
"Sure or I might have torn you limb from limb."
"What?"
Kitty then giggled "Only kidding."
"Don't scare me like that."
Just then a green light began to go off. kitty and a few of the others were becoming a little worried about it.
"Is it danger?" asked Kitty.
"No," replied Captain Kurt. "It just means we're getting close to our destination." he then cleared his throat. "I've gotta go and steer the ship."
Kurt then went up to the bridge. He could see the planet where Toad was suppose to be. He was using his scanners to see where he was. it didn't give him an exact location. It only gave them a rough area.
The ship slowly came into land on the planet. The planet itself was one big desert. It was very warm here so he had to make sure that he had plenty of water so not to get dehidrated.

Will everyone come?
1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.title: Landing

1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.content:
When the ship was landed Captain Kurt returned to the cargo bay and eveyrone was still in there. They were all waiting to get out and have a walk around outside. But Kurt had one more plan.
"Ok I want everyon except Kitty and Lockheed off this ship," said Kurt. "We need to find this Toad character."
"Hey why can't I leave?" replied Kitty.
"Two reasons. Number 1 if the locals saw you they'd panic and we want to keep a low profile."
"What's the second reason?"
"This planet has a lot of Bandits who would rob this ship in a heartbeat. I just want you to make sure nothing gets stolen."
"Fine."
"Good now we'll contact you if we need you."
"Ok."
"We'll see you later."
"Can you bring me something nice back?"
"Sure."
1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.title: Kitty stays here

1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.content:
Kitty was a little annoyed that she couldn’t leave the ship. But she knew that if she got any bigger she would have no choice. But she could understand why she had to stay. If she went outside everyone would freak out over her. She hated scaring people unintentionally.
But Lockheed was still with her and this made her feel happier. She stroked his head a little and he cooed at her.
“I’ll always have you won’t I?” asked Kitty. She then stroked him again. “Because you’re so adorable.”
Meanwhile outside the others were trying to find Toad. But it was going to be difficult. They did have a tracking device. But toad seemed to be a couple of miles away from where they were.
“We need to get him and fast,” said Kurt.
“But he’s miles away,” replied Colossus.
“Then we need transport.”
“But from where?”
“There’s bound to be something around here.”
He then looked around and he spotted something.

Will they find anything?
1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.title: Cute

1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.content:
“Over there,” said Kurt. He then pointed to what seemed to be a public transport vehicle. He rubbed his hands. “That’s how we get there.”
“Do we have any money?” replied Colossus.
“Well I have a bit. But coming to think about it I don’t have too much with me. Maybe only enough for a couple of us.”
“Let’s just hope that it’s cheap.”
They then went towards the vehicle. There was already an alien standing there. He seemed to be waiting. But then the group came to him. He didn’t take much notice of them both.
“Sir,” said Kurt.
“Yep?” replied the Alien.
“We were wondering if you could take us to this location?” He then took out a device and it pointed towards where Toad was.
“Maybe but it’ll cost you.”
“I don’t have too much money.”
“How much do you have?”
“Let me see.”
1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.title: Found something

1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.content:
Everyone was going through their pockets seeing if they could find anything that resembled money. They were able to get out everything they could. But they didn’t seem to have much.
“We have four credits and a couple taxes,” said Kurt.
“That won’t get you far,” replied the Alien.
“How far can it get us?”
“Half way.”
“That’ll do.”
“Good then get in.”
Everyone then got into the vehicle. It was a little small but since it was their only way they had to put up with it.
“A little small,” said Colossus.
“Got any better way of getting there?” replied Kurt.
“No.”
“Then we’ll have to settle with this.”
The vehicle then began to move and the men groaned a little. It seemed to be quite slow as well.

Who do we stay with?
1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.title: Only option

1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.content:
Meanwhile in the ship kitty was a little bored. She was also uncomfortable and she felt a little cramped up. Lockheed was trying to make her fell comfortable. But it didn’t seem to do all that good for her.
“I need to get out,” said Kitty.
“Why not?” replied the Prankster.
“Because I’ll scare everyone.”
“But if you do that won’t that distract everyone away from our friends getting to Toad? Heck it might even help.”
“You do have a point there.”
“Go for it Princess.”
“Ok you’ve convinced me.”
The Prankster then opened the cargo doors and Kitty climbed out. She was relieved to be able to stand up to her full height. She gave out a bit of a sigh but then she looked down at everyone. They seemed to be afraid.
“Hi,” she said.
But this caused some panic and they began to run away from her. She was a little annoyed. But this is what she expected.
1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.title: With kitty and Lockheed

choices: Near where the men are going
1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.content:
“Well since there’s not much to do around here I think we should see if anything fun is happening anywhere else,” said Kitty.
“Coo,” replied Lockheed.
“Yeah you’d like that.”
But then she felt a little pain in her back. She turned around and saw someone with a smoking blaster. She began to get angry.
“You dare fire at me!” she shouted.
“Crap,” replied the Man.
“You attack royalty? You stupid little man.”
She then took a step towards him and he began to run as fast as his legs could carry him. Kitty decided not to keep going.
“Well he was very rude,” said Kitty.
“Coo,” replied Lockheed.
“But we can still have fun.”
“Coo.”
“Yeah but in a good way.”
“Coo.”

Where do they go?
1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.title: You dare fire!

1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.content:
Kitty looked up and saw a small area that seemed to be open. She smiled a little and she looked back to Lockheed. She seemed to have a plan.
"I think I know where we can get a little excitement," said Kitty.
"Coo," replied Lockheed.
“Now don’t wonder off.”
Kitty then began to walk towards the area that she had seen. She didn’t realise that the men weren’t too far away from where they were. They could see what she was doing and Kurt didn’t seem to be too happy.
“What is she doing?” asked Captain Kurt.
“Looks like killing time,” replied Colossus.
“I told her to stay in the ship.”
“Well you can’t tell her to do everything.”
“I know but she might scare Toad away from us. Then Ororo’s world will be destroyed for sure.”
“I don’t think you have to worry about that.”
But with Kitty she seemed to be enjoying the fresh air. It was a lot better then being stuck on the ship.
1422211112111211121211121211121111121211.title: Bloody teenagers

1422212.content: So you don't like that one. Such a shame. Well nevermind. Would you like Ultimate or Evolution?
1422212.title: Ultimate or Evolution?

14222121.content:
In the X-Mansion in Westchester (where ever the hell that is) in the ultimate universe we start our amazing tale in the room of the X-Woman named Kitty Pryde but code-named Shadowcat.
Wait I've done that wrong. I can't be bothered to re do it so we'll have to stick with this crap.
Anyway Kitty was in her room looking in the mirror. She had seen all these magazines all the models with perfect bodies and stuff like that. And she was wondering why didn't she be like that.
"Why can't I be like those models?" thought Kitty. "My boobs are too small my ass is the right shape and hell I'm way too short. What'll spidey think. He'd prefer someone like Natasha Hardy (I just made that up)."
She picks up one of her magazines and looks through it. She finds an advert that caught her eye.
"Want the perfect body? If you do come to Dr King's marvelous pad. With a small fee of $50 you can have the perfect body. No strings attached. Just go to 63 Brime Drive Westchester."
At first Kitty couldn't believe what she was reading. Was there really someone who could do that?
She decided to go. She got her savings and went to the address enclosed in the advert.
She finds out that it's a large warehouse. She finds a door and knocks it.
Then someone on the other side opens the spy hole.
"What do you want?" he asked in a Spanish accent.
14222121.title: The perfect body

142221211.content:
"I'm here to see Dr King," replied Kitty.
"What for?" replied the Spannish man behind the door.
"For this perfect body thing."
He opens the door and Kitty walks inside.
"Oh you want to see Dr King I'll just go and get him."
The man walks away and in a few seconds he comes back with a man with long blue hair. He was in his early twenties.
"I am Dr John King," he said in an English accenct. "And this is my assisstant Manuel."
"You said ass," said Manuel.
"Shut up! Anyway what is your name young lady?"
"I'm Kitty Pryde."
"Ah a pleasure to meet you Kitty would you like a cuppa?"
"What?"
"A cuppa."
"What's a cuppa?"
"You know a cup of tea or coffee."
"Oh no thank you."
"Shame anyway to the proceedure. First things first. Do you have the $50?"
"Er yeah."
Kitty gives Dr King the $50.
"Ok now follow me."
She follows him to a chamber.
"Ok Kitty now you go inside this camber and we'll do the rest."
She takes his advice and goes into the chamber and closes the door behind her.
"Manuel get to your station."
Dr King and Manuel get to their stations.
"Manuel is the gas ready?"
"Que?" replied Manuel.
"Is the gas ready?"
"Oh si si."
"Release the gas."
Now we can go into the chamber where Kitty was. The chamber starts to fill up with a pinkish gas. After a few seconds the the vents sucked up the gas. Then she leaves the chamber. But to her horror she was still the same. She angrily walks up to Dr King.
"You idiot I'm still the same!" shouted Kitty.
"Wow calm down. Just give 5..4..3..2..1..0."
Suddenly Kitty felt a sudden serge in her body. Then she felt her ass and it was completely different. It was perfect. Then she felt another serge. This time her boobs grow slightly. It was pressing her chest but luckily they didn't grow big enough to break her t-shirt. Then she felt another serge but this time she grew. From her previous height of 5'4 she gained an extra ten inches to become a towering 6'2. Now she was even taller than Dr King. Even lucily for her her clothes grew with her.
"Hey it worked," siad Kitty.
"Of course it bloody worked I created it."
"Thanks your the best."
Kitty kisses Dr King on the forehead and leaves.
"Er Manuel," said Dr King.
"Yes Dr King."
"How much of the Pym Particle formula did you use?"
"Que?"
"How much of the Pym Particle Formula did you use?"
"Err 500ml."
"Really?"
"Yes."
"You frickin idiot. You're only supposed to use 50ml."
"What does that mean?"
"That young KItty Pryde is in BIG trouble."
142221211.title: The proceedure

choices: Kitty remembers she has a date with Spider-Man

"I've never looked this good even on picture day," said Kitty. "I should recommend that Dr King maybe Storm may want a body like mine. When I get my new clothes I'll have to get XX long."
Suddenly.....
1422212111.title: Recommend

14222121111.content:
Cyclops comes into Kitty's room. Then he sees that she's different.
"Wow since when have you been this tall?" asked Cyclops.
"Since midday," replied Kitty. "What do you want?"
"Magneto has got all the world leaders hostage in the U.N building. We have to stop him before he starts a war between humans and mutants."
"Alright just give me a minute."
Cyclops leaves Kitty's room. She gets out her X-Men costume. Fortunately because her costume was made of unstable molecules it stretched to fit her new body.
After that she goes with the other X-Men to New York where Magneto the Master Of Magnets was causing chaos with a capital K. Wait a minutes he's master of magnetism. And Chaos is spelt with a C. Oh who cares.
Anyway X-Men fought Magneto as they usually do. Ok I'm not very good at writing fight scenes so I'll give you a basic outline.
Magneto beating X-Men to a bloody pulp. Got it. Eventually only Kitty remained.
"Ha Shadowcat what chance do you have against the Master of Magnetism?" said Magneto.
"That Master of Magnetism is so old. Come up with something new."
In rage Magneto throws a large piece of metal at Kitty. She quickly phases through it just in the nick of time.
"Your phasing powers are very irritating. But how long can you keep it up for?"
He throws another piece of metal at her. But this time she can't phase through it in time and she goes down.
"How am I gonna beat this maniac?"
Suddenly Kitty felt a painful serge in her body.
"What happening to me?"
She starts to get to her feet. She sees that to her the everything around her seemed to get smaller. Then she realized that in fact she was getting bigger. Magneto watched helplessly as she got bigger and bigger and bigger. She stopped growing at an inch below 60 feet. (If you want to know why read the Ultimates every once in a while. If you don't then it will be explained shortly).
"My God I'm huge!"
14222121111.title: UnXpected Changes

142221211111.content:
Then a huge smile appears on Kitty's face.
"I can beat that Magneto creep," said Kitty.
"We'll see about that young Pryde," replied Magneto.
He then uses his powers to throw an enormous piece of metal at her. But Kitty phases right through it. She starts running at him. Magneto tries everything he could to stop her but she was too big and her phasing powers made it a pain in the back side.
Eventually she reaches him and she punches him to the ground.
142221211111.title: Size does matter

1422212111111.content:
Magneto fell to the ground and didn't move. Kitty picks him up.
"Looks like the Master Of Magnetism couldn't handle the new and improved Kitty Pryde," said Kitty. Then she looks down at the X-Men. She sees that they're all still unconscious but alive. "What am I gonna do now?"
Then suddenly a S.H.I.E.L.D chopper lands on the ground near Kitty. Then Nick Fury and a score of heavily armed troops come out of it.
"Congradulations young lady," said Nick. "You've just beaten one of the most powerful beings on the planet. Now down to business. How the hell did you get so big?"
"I don't know I went to a perfect body place. And now I'm big. Of course it was great at first then then this growth spurt happened."
"Where was this Perfect Body place?"
"A warehouse in Westchester."
"Your coming with us little Missy. We'll find you a cure and we'll treat the X-Men."
"How am I gonna get into that little thing."
"Your not just grab the X-Men and follow us back to base."
Kitty does what she is told. She picks up the X-Men and follows the chopper to S.H.I.E.L.D headquarters. She had to be extra careful walking through the streets of New York

What happens next?
1422212111111.title: How the Hell did you get so big?

14222121111111.content:
When Kitty reached S.H.I.E.L.D headquarters she was told to go inside. She was puzzled at first. But then she found an entrance used by the giant men. When she did come in everyone stared at her.
"Err where do I go now?" she asked.
Then she was approached by a S.H.I.E.L.D agent.
"Just put the X-Men down and follow me," he said.
"Ok." Kitty puts the X-Men on the ground. When she did several other agents took them to the medi-lab. She then followed the agent to a large white room. "What is this place?"
"For the time being this will be your new home."
"What?"
"You'll stay here until you'r cured and the X-men are fit to leave."
Kitty really couldn't complain. At least here she could stand up. "But why here?"
"Sorry higher orders. Now we'll bring some food in for you later."
He then walks out. Kitty just lies down and thinks over everything that has just happened.

There will be a break out soon. But who will it be?
14222121111111.title: Inside  S.H.I.E.L.D headquarters

142221211111112.content:
Then she was disturbed by the sound of an alarm. Then the room started to flash red. It seemed it was a red alert situation. Then the same agent from before ran into the room. He had a full loaded rifle with him.
"What's going on?" asked Kitty.
"Crap the Hulk's escaped," replied the Agent. "And he's tearing this place apart. I have my orders to take you to him. You're the only one here who can take him."
"Wait I may be big but I wouldn't stand a chance against the Hulk."
"But there's no one else. The Ultimates are dealing with a crisis in the Middle East right now."
"Ok take me to him."
the agent leads Kitty to the Hulk. She saw that he was taking out many of S.H.I.E.L.D's best agents. All they were really doing was making him even more angry. Eventually no one was standing and it was down to her.

What does Kitty do?
142221211111112.title: Hulk breakout

choices: ...Bah stupid girl not worth Hulk's time.
1422212111111121.content:
Kitty rushes at the Hulk and attempts to stop his rampage. The Hulk however, seems to be ignoring her and is much more concerned with the shield agent who keeps putting bullet holes into his signature plus sized purple pants. She raises one collosal foot over the Ol' Jade Jaws in an attempt to pin the mighty monster onto the ground.

"Ok Hulk, you've asked for this! Hyuh–....uh oh."

Her foot stops roughly eight feet, or one hulk length, from the ground.

"Stupid girl try to stomp on Hulk."

Using his massive muscles, the Hulk through Kitty through the air like an enormous rag doll, shield agents are barely able to scramble out of the way of her spandex clad form. One agent is bounced off the ground by the shockwave of her landing and ends up on her stomach. She sets him down before getting up.

"Okay, so maybe I am not as strong as I thought, but perhaps a little phasing will get the job done."

Kitty phases into intangibility and grabs onto the Hulk, she quickly shoves him an arm's length into the ground, which for her is quite a distance.

"Well that takes care of..." Boooooom!

The Hulk has managed to break free of his earthen prison, and he looks pissed.

"Giant girl try to bury Hulk, Hulk...
1422212111111121.title: Not the Brightest Idea

choices: Kitty puts Bruce back in his cell

Hulk stared at Kitty at first he was unsure of what to do. But then he had the perfect idea.
"Hulk smash giant girl!" he shouted. He then runs towards her.
"No I don't want to fight you," replied Kitty. Instead of fighting she sat down. "I want to talk."
The Hulk stopped dead in his tracks. he was confused. "Giant girl wants to talk?"
"Yes giant girl wants to talk." She then gently picks him up and rests him in the palm of her hand.
"What giant girl doing?"
"It's ok I'm just bringing you up to my level." She raised him up further. "That's better. Now why are you destroying everything?"
"These little people make Hulk mad."
"Then you need to stop getting angry. I know you're a good person but you can't keep getting angry and destroying everything."
"But destroying things is only thing Hulk good at."
"I know but deep down I know you really don't like destroying things. What would Betty think?"
"Betty?"
"Yes Betty she would like you better if you didn't destroy things."
"But Betty like Hulk."
"I know but she'd like you even more."
The Hulk relaxed. He then reverted back to Bruce Banner.

"Thank you Kitty," said Bruce. "You calmed the Hulk."
"Well I'm just glad you didn't hurt anyone else," replied Kitty.
Then Nick Fury and several other agents came rushing in. They were armed to the teeth. They were surprised to see Bruce in Kitty's hand.
"Well looks like you did it," said Nick. "You stopped him without destroying anything. Now lower him to us." Kitty lowers her hand with Bruce in it. Then Nick cuffs Banner. "You're going back into your cell."
"Please take me away," replied Bruce.
The agents take Bruce away. This just left Kitty and Nick.
"Well you did a pretty good job," said Nick. "To tell you the truth even if you did have to fight him my money would have been on you."
"Thanks," replied Kitty. "But what's gonna happen to me now?"
"Well you have a choice. We can even research you a cure forever. Or you can be what we call a half cure. We'll give you something that'll make you change your size whenever you want."

Which option does she take?
