Kitty thought for a second. The answer soon came to her. "I want the half-cure," she said. "Maybe these powers can benefit people."
"I wise choice," said Nick Fury. "Unfortunately with our best scientists it might take about a week to come up with the serum."
"That's okay I can wait."
Kitty has to spend the week in the large white room. She was happy to find out that the X-Men were expected to make a full recover after their fight with Magneto. But the week soon came and gone.
Now we see her in the white room and Nick Fury was there as well. He had a glass with a green serum in it. He hands it to her.
"Now drink up," he said.
"Will it work?"
"Yes it will."
Kitty drinks the serum. "Now what?"
"Think small."
Kitty does and she starts to shrink. But she accidentally goes too far and shrinks down to 6 inches.
"Oops."
"Not that small."
Kitty concentrates again and she grows to the same height as Nick.

Kitty takes her new powers out for a spin

"This is amazing," said Kitty. "I can become any size I want."
"Not exactly," replied Nick. "Like all super power they have limits. Except we don't exactly know the limits to your powers yet."
"One way to find out." Kitty then starts to shrink. She does so until she couldn't be seen. Nick waited for about two minutes. Then he saw her grow until she was normal size.

"I don't know. I think I was in the sub-molecular universe. I definitely shrank past all the atoms."

"Wow I'm huge," she said. "I think it's best if I shrank back to normal."
She then shrank back to normal. Then Nick came back in.
"So you can now surpass 60 feet."
"If I had more room I would have gotten even bigger. I think I can become any size either way."

What happens next?
1422212111111122121.title: From Sub-molecular to iinfinity

"Is it alright if I see my friends?" asked Kitty.
"Sure it is," replied Nick. "But just make sure that you don't start growing again."
"Will do."
Kitty followed Nick Fury to the medi-lab. There she saw the X-Men in beds. they had several bruises. But Wolverine was walking around. When he saw her he noticed something different.
"Hi Logan," she said. "Why aren't you in bed?"

"Sure the menu here isn't very good for a guy like me."
Kitty and Wolverine go to the Canteen to get themselves something to eat.

What do they talk about?
14222121111111221211.title: Seeing the X-Men

"So Nick told me you had some new powers," said Wolverine.
"Now I can grow and shrink it's kinda weird," replied Kitty.
"How big and small can you get?"
"Well I can shrink smaller than an atom. But I don't know how big I can get. Unfortunately the room wasn't big enough to grow to full size."
"Hmm looks like Chuck's gonna have to make some more Danger Room missions for you."
"Yeah but I think I can already control my powers." Then Kitty accidentally sneezed and shrank down to 6 inches. Wolverine laughed.
"You were saying?"

"Maybe you should try shrinking before you wreck anything else."

"Next time warn us if you're gonna sneeze."
142221211111112212112.title: Bugger and smaller while with Wolverine

1422212111111122121121.content:
A few weeks later the X-men have fully healed from their fight with Magneto. Everyone was back at the mansion.
We see Kitty in an empty danger room. None of the simulations were on. Professor X was in the control room.
"Ok Kitty this exercise will see the full extent of your new size changing powers," said Professor X. "Shout stop if you want the simulation to stop."
"Ok Professor," replied Kitty.
He then activated the simulation. Kitty saw that she was in New York City. All the streets were empty. Then she felt earthquakes. They were footsteps. In seconds she saw a 500 foot giant lizard like creature. Fear gripped her.
"Relax Kitty," said the Professor. "This is only an exercise."
Kitty then concentrated. She began to shoot up. In seconds she was able to look the monster square in the eye.

Who will win the fight?
1422212111111122121121.title: Danger Room exercise

14222121111111221211211.content:
The monster went to slash Kitty but she simply phased through it. Then she punched the monster square in the nose. It fell over and disappeared.
"Very good Kitty," said the Professor. "Now I'm gonna turn the threat level up."
Then three monsters turned up. They looked the same as the other one. Kitty knew she didn't have to grow anymore. She just needed to phase through them and take them by surprise.
Yet again the monsters didn't stand a chance. She would attack them from every angle. After she had finished them off she shrank down to almost her normal height.
"Well done. This training session is over." The danger room turned back to normal. "I'm proud to see you combine both of your powers. Both mutant and chemical."
"Thank you Professor," replied Kitty. "To tell you the truth I want to see just how big I can get."
14222121111111221211211.title: They didn't stand a chance

choices: The professor switches off the Danger Room
142221211111112212112111.content:
"Very well," said Professor X. He then pushed some buttons. Then Kitty found herself floating in what seemed to be the vacum of space. But there was still oxygen there. "Ok Kitty there's enough room for you to grow really big here."
"Ok Professor," replied Kitty.
She began to concentrate and she began to grow. The Danger Room readings were showing how tall she was becoming. At first it read at 100 feet tall but Kitty was still growing. Professor X was amazed to see her growing at such a fast race. he reached 600 feet in seconds but her body refused to stop growing. The next readying was 1,500 feet. “I’m never gonna get this right,” said Kitty.
“Don’t say that,” replied Wasp. “You can do it. You just have to put your mind to it.”
“I’m not like you. This power didn’t come to me because I was a mutant or I created it. It was an accident that I got these powers. I’m not ready.”
She then began to cry and she ran up to her room. Giant-Man wanted to stop her. But Wasp told him not to. She knew that it was for the best that Kitty blow off a little steam.
In her room kitty lay on her bed and she cried her heart out. She didn’t ask for these powers and there was no known cure for them. The only way she could get on with her life was if she practiced her powers like she was supposed to. This made her think a little more and she got off her bed.
“I can do it,” said Kitty. “Yeah if I can’t do it who else can?”

What does she do?
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: Giving up

1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.content:
Kitty remained the rest of the day in the Danger Room. She was still practicing with Giant-Man and the Wasp. She was getting the hang of size changing a little. But she got a little carried away from time to time. This made her grow and shrink to the slight extremes. But she soon gained control and she would return to normal.
“Ok Kitty that’s it for today,” said Giant-Man.
“Oh I was enjoying that,” replied Kitty.
“Don’t worry we’ll be back tomorrow. But you need to rest. If you’re tired tomorrow then it may put yours and others lives at risk.”
“Ok I’ll have some rest.”
“Good now we’ll see you tomorrow,” replied Wasp.
They then left to go back to the Ultimates. Kitty decided to go out onto the basketball court. She had gotten herself a ball and she was using her size changing powers to slam dunk the ball. She was having fun and she even grew tall enough to put the ball through the net without jumping or having to shoot.
But just then Bobby came out. He was making himself a pair of ice sunglasses. He saw Kitty.
“Hey Kitty,” he said.
“Hey there Bobby,” replied Kitty.
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: Gaining more control

choices: Kitty spends a little more time with Bobby
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.content:
"Fancy a game of one on one?" asked Kitty.
"No thanks you'd cream me," replied Bobby.
"I'll go easy on you." She then shrank to her normal height. "I won't use my powers."
"Ok then you're on."
The pair then began to play one on one basketball. Kitty remained with her promise and she didn't use her powers. She was just doing well for someone of her height. She was scoring against Bobby and he was scoring against her.
After a while the pair called it a tie. they sat down and had a nice drink. Bobby even made some ice cubes for the drinks.
"Wow Kitty nice moves," said Bobby. "Since when could you go toe to toe with me in B'Ball?"
"I don't know," replied Kitty. "Since I got these powers I can do lot's of things that I couldn't normally do."
"Like what?"
"Well the obvious. I can lose weight without trying and I can become the statue of Liberty for Halloween. And I mean life size."

What happens next?
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: Basketball kitty

1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.content:
The pair continued to play basketball for a little while longer. But Kitty just kept beating him in everyway possible. They thought that she should join the WNBA. Most teams would kill to have a player liket hat on their team. Someone who didn't have to jump to slam dunk a ball.
Over the next few days Giant-Man and Wasp continued to train Kitty. She was improving faster than anyone could have imagined. She was doing things that took them a while to learn. She was outgrowing Giant-Man and out shrinking Wasp. Eventually they decided that Kitty was in control of her powers.
We see Kitty and the Professor with giant-Man and Wasp. They were in Professor X’s office.
“Thank you for everything,” said Professor X.
“It was a pleasure,” replied Wasp. “Kitty’s very talented.”
“I will have the Blackbird prepped to take you back to S.H.I.E.L.D. One more thing when you go back send Nick my regards.”
The pair then left and they were taken back by the Blackbird. Kitty went to her room where her Lockheed stuffed toy was. She gave him a hug and she lay on her bed.
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: End training

choices: Kitty and Rogue have to go and save the world
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.content:
She smiled at the stuffed toy. Sometimes when she had troubles she would take to it. She knew that it was a little crazy but it made her feel better. Sometimes she felt that it was the only friend she had. Sometimes she even wanted Lockheed to be normal.
The next day we see Kitty doing some studying with Rogue. The two hadn't really gotten on that much. Rogue still remembered Kitty kissing Bobby when she was going out with him. And Kitty remembered when Rogue punched her knocking her unconscious (See Ultimate X-Men #50).
But times had changed they were getting on a little better. But they were learning world history and it was about the 1905 Russian Revolution. They found it really boring.
"Do we really have to learn about this?" asked Kitty. "Who needs to know about things that happened like a century ago?"
"Good point sugar," replied Rogue. "But the Professor says we have to keep up with our studies or else he'll kick us off the team."
"That's blackmail."
"Hey most schools use that on their teams."

Will anything happen?
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: Studying

1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.content:
"It's still blackmail," said Kitty. "I haven't seen Wolverine take a single test."
"Well he's about 30 so I guess school doesn’t count to him," replied Rogue. "Any where did the Tsar live at the Time of the Revolution?"
"Err is it Moscow?"
"No it's St Petersburg."
"Why can't I get a question right?"
"Hey keep trying an you'll get there eventually."
"Ok then let me try one on you. What was name of the document that Tsar Nicolas II signed?"
"It was the October something."
"October manifesto."
"That's it I would have gotten it."
"Yeah like in a million years."
"Hey you've been a lot cockier since you got those growing powers of yours."
"Well it does make me one hard person to kill."
Suddenly everything seemed to go dark. Kitty and Rogue looked around and they saw nothing.
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: Studying and darkness

1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.content:
“Hey Kitty what happened to the lights?” asked Rogue.
“I don’t know,” replied Kitty. “Is it something to do with your powers? Maybe you absorbed someone who had darkness powers.”
“No never absorbed anyone’s powers.”
Then suddenly they seemed to be in the middle of an arena. They noticed aliens around them and they were all cheering. Also the girls were in their costumes.
“Hey we weren’t wearing these before,” said Kitty.
“And we sure as hell weren’t in an arena before,” replied Rogue.
“Ladies and gentlemen from Planet Earth Rogue and Shadowcat!” said an announcer. The crowd then roared with anticipation.
Then the two X-Women disappeared and they reappeared in what seemed to be a bar. There was other aliens around them. They were all drinking but they all seemed muscular.
“What is this place?” asked Kitty.
“Some kind of alien planet maybe,” replied Rogue. “If I was a Star Trek fan I’d be in heaven.”
“Star Wars was better.”

What do the girls do?
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: The arena

1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.content:
The pair couldn't really see any point in trying to escape. If they did then they'd be lost somewhere in the Galaxy. And they wanted to take advantage that they could drink anything they wanted and there was no law to it.
The pair go to the bar and they begin to order their drinks. There was a bar maid behind the bar. She looked like a one eye monster but it was probably normal for her species.
"What can I get you ladies?" asked the Bar Maid.
"I'll have a Southern Comfort and Lemonade," replied Rogue.
"And I'll have some Vodka and Coke," added Kitty.
The bar maid then began to make the drinks. If they were home they'd have to wait until they were twenty one. But here it was all legal. The girls had their drinks and they quickly drank it.
But before they could order another one the fighters were told to go to the fighters' pit. There they would be instructed with what to do next. The girls were a little nervous and they just followed everyone else.
When they got there they saw a hairy man on stilts. He had dark glasses on and he looked at everyone.
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: Getting a drink

1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.content:
"Welcome everyone to the trial of champions," said the Man. "My name is Betta Ray Bill. You have been selected from your planets to battle for the ultimate trophy. We have made things a little different this year. Instead of one on one it'll now be tag team. One member of the team must remain in the box. The only time they can be released is if their partner takes their place."
Then Kitty put her hand up. "Err but what are we doing here?" she asked.
"Oh yeah you're the new planet. This is an annual event. Don't worry if you think your planet is in some kind of danger it's not. And if you get injured we have the best medical staff here." Then a board and a box appeared. The screen had 32 numbers on there and who was the numbers. Kitty and Rogue were number 21. "Now without further ado I give to you the President of The Kree."
Then another man came up and he was wearing royal robes and a servant next to him.
"Now brave warriors I shall pick out the numbers and they will fight each other to advance to the next round," he said.
He started to pick the numbers out. It took a few minutes until they picked out Kitty and Rogue's.

Which number do they face?
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: Drawing out the numbers

1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.content:
“Number 12 the girls from Earth are up against Number 6 the warriors of the planet Urania,” said the Announcer.
They continued to pull out the numbers until they had all of the numbers on the board to the fighters. Kitty and Rogue knew that they were in for a tough battle. But they weren’t to be underestimated either.
“The first match will begin in 15 minutes. Prepare yourself fighters.”
The fighters all went away. The fighters for the first match went down to arena where everyone was watching them. Kitty could tell that the arena was like the Thunderdome like in one of the Mad Max films.
There was a referee in the arena as well and he was making sure that things were within the rules.
When the bell rang one member of each team went to the box and the two fighters left went for each other. The two mighty warriors were similar in size and strength. This would be an interesting fight.
Kitty and Rogue watched as they ate their popcorn. They were looking at what they would be facing in a future round if they got there.
“Wow this is intense,” said Rogue.
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: So it starts

1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.content:
Kitty and Rogue saw the carnage and destruction the two sets of fighters were inflicting on each other. But when one team won the other showed them mercy and they were allowed to live.
Eventually it came up to Kitty and Rogue’s turn to fight. They went into the cage where the other fighters were. These were like barbarians and they had weapons. The girls just looked at them.
“These guys look tough,” whispered Kitty.
“Remember the plan,” replied Rogue. “You go in first and stay big. If you’re about to collapse tag me in and I’ll borrow your powers.”
“Ok.”
Kitty then went into the centre where the other fighter was she had to look up at him. He looked like a cross between a human and a pig. He laughed at her.
“You think you can take me little girl?” he asked.
“Oh believe me,” replied Kitty. She then grew up to 15 feet. She dwarfed the barbarian. “I’m not so little.”
The bell rung and the fight started. This would be tricky for both fighters. But Kitty was getting use to fighting super-sized.

Will they win?
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: Girls' turn

1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.content:
The bout started and Kitty was the first to be hit. These barbarians were stronger then she expected. She was able to pick herself up.
“You may have gotten a cheap shot,” said Kitty. “But let me show you how strong I can get.”
She then kicked the Barbarian and he went flying into the cage. She was quite proud with what she had done. But he got back up. He laughed at her.
“That was quite impressive,” said the Barbarian. “But you’ll have to grow a lot bigger than that to beat me.”
“Who said I couldn’t get bigger?”
Then Kitty concentrated again and she grew up again. This time she ripped the top of the cell off so she had room to grow. The crowd roared with excitement. She stopped at 50 feet and the Barbarian looked up at her.
“Is this big enough?” asked Kitty.
The Barbarian then went to his block and tagged his partner in. The other Barbarian didn’t want to go in either but he had no choice.
“Ok so you want a piece of,” said Kitty. “That’s alright because there’s plenty of me to go around.”
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: The tussle

choices: By stomping the hell out of them
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.content:
The Barbarian in the cage with Kitty had to think of something fast. He got one of his hammers and through it at Kitty’s head. But she simply phased through it and she laughed at him.
“Is that really the best you’ve got?” asked Kitty. “I’ve seen tougher guys on the back of cereal boxes.”
With the slight distraction the barbarian threw another hammer at her and it hit her on the head. She fell down unconscious. But her hand was in the box and Rogue tagged herself in. She looked around and tried to think of a way that she could fight. She tried picking up one of the weapons but it was way too heavy for her.
"Crap I’m gonna need strength for this," thought Rogue. She then looked at the giant unconscious Kitty. She had an idea. "Then I'll just have to borrow a little of yours."
Rogue then touched Kitty and she started to absorb her friend's growing and phasing powers. it went into her body like an electric current. She then began to grow as kitty shrank. Soon she was normal size but Rogue was the same size Kitty had been.
"Now I'm ready."

Who will Rogue win?
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: Kitty out Rogue in

1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.content:
It had been hard for the barbarians to take down one giantess. But now that they had to take down another would be almost impossible for them. They looked up at the now super sized Rogue. She gave them an evil smile.
“Now sugar if I was you I’d give up,” said Rogue. “But I’m hoping you fight because I need some action.” She then lifted her foot up. She was about to slam it onto the ground but the Barbarian began to run. “Hun the thing about being in a cage is that you don’t get out.” She then picked up the Barbarian. “Now this is for Kitty.” She then slammed the Barbarian on the ground.
The ground roared since the Barbarians had now officially lost. Rogue held her hand up high in celebration. But she saw Kitty unconscious on the ground. She picked her up and the cage door opened.
Just when the pair got out Rogue’s size changing powers wore off and she reverted to normal. She put Kitty on the ground first. Doctors had already gotten to them to check on Kitty.
The only injury Kitty had was a knock to the head. There was nothing serious. She was even able to regain consciousness.
“Did we win?” asked Kitty.
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: And the winner is

choices: The don't want to fight yet
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.content:
The girls got a well deserved rest after the fight. Kitty received some medical attention. Her injuries were only minor and she would recover. But she had a few more rounds to go with Rogue.
The girls sat in a room that had been made to be like one from Earth. It had a TV, refrigerator and a CD player. The TV had all the channels that they had on in Earth. Even ones from around the world.
“These aliens sure know how to make a gal feel comfortable,” said Rogue.
“I don’t know,” replied Kitty. “Things just don’t seem right.”
“Don’t worry about it it’s not like if we lose the Earth’s destroyed.”
“That wouldn’t surprise me if that happened. But still if we’re here we might as well try and enjoy it.”
The girls spent some more time in this room. They watched all of their faviourite shows. They watched a soap and it made them feel warm inside. But then an alien came in. he was no more then 3 feet tall and he looked at both of the girls.
"It is almost time for your next match," he said.
"Souldn't we have more rest from our first match?" replied Kitty.
"Rules are rules."

What happens?
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: Relaxing

1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.content:
The girls accepted that they didn't have any choice but to fight. They went down to where the fighters were and they saw their next opponents. These were Amazon women who were easily 9 feet tall. They tried to intimidate them but Kitty just grew until she towered above them. They then backed away and Kitty smiled.
"If they think this is my maximum size they've got another thing coming," said Kitty.
"Well they look tough but we're tougher," replied Rogue. "We can take them."
"Yeah no can beat an intangible size changeling and a power leech."
"What?"
"That's the technical name for our powers."
"Oh right."
The girls watched some of the other matches that were on and they saw some impressive performances. It would be unwise not to take a note or two.
Eventually it came to the turn of the girls. They went into a new arena. This one was a wide open space that seemed almost limitless.
"So this is where we fight?" asked Rogue.
"Sure looks like it."
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: Next round

1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.content:
The opponents came in to the arena. They looked like they were out for blood. Also in this round you didn't need to tag your partner in to get involved it was a two on two fight.
Kitty almost instantly grew to 50 feet for her own protection. Rogue was about to touch Kitty but then it would have put her out and she didn't want that to happen.
When the bell rang the amazons almost instantly went to Rogue. She was able to touch one of them and she grew to the same size and strength as the others.
"Not that's what I'm talking about," said Rogue.
The fight went on. Kitty was able to pick up both Amazons and throw them to one side. But she began to feel something. Her body was getting heavier and she fell to the ground. It happened to the others as well.
"What gives?" asked Kitty.
"Oh yeah one more rule," replied the Announcer. "The gravity randomly changes."
"Great I can't move."
Rogue could still stand up with her new found strength. But she couldn't beat both of the Amazons by herself. She needed to use Kitty's powers again. But in a different way.
"Kitty shrink until your the size of a doll," said Rogue.
"What why?"

Will her plan work?
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: The Amamzons

1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.content:
"You'll see just do it," said Rogue.
Kitty then shrank until she was the size of a Barbie doll. Rogue then picked her up and threw her into the air. She went near the Amazons and Kitty didn't know what Rogue was planning.
"Kitty grow!"
Kitty then knew what Rogue was talking about. She rapidly went from doll size to giant size. She landed on top of the Amazons. With the increased gravity her body was a lot heavier and the Amazons couldn't hold it. They were beaten and Kitty shrunk to normal.
The gravity went back to normal and she was able to stand up. She looked up at Rogue. This was one of the few times that it would happen. But then the Amazon strength in Rogue wore out and she shrank down to her normal size.
"I guess we win again," said Kitty.
"Thanks to a little thing called Teamwork," replied Rogue. "High five sugar."
The two girls then high fived each other as they left the arena. The Amazons were taken to receive some medical treatment. Never had the Amazons been defeated like that and they wanted revenge. But that couldn't happen until they had fully recovered from their injuries.
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: Winners

choices: Leave to prepare for their next match
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.content:
Kitty and Rogue were into the Semi-finals of the competition. They high fived each other in celebration. They even went to the Bookie's to see what their odds were of winning. But to their disbelief they were the least favourites.
"Come on the least favourites," said Kitty. "We've kicked everyone's asses in that arena period."
"Hey so has everyone else," replied the Bookie. "Now are you going to make a bet or not?"
This made Kitty and Rogue pretty mad. But they just walked away. "Come on Kitty," said Rogue. "We'll show him what we're made of."
But Kitty and Rogue's victories were drawing them some attention. They even found out that they had their own little fan club that was run by one of the aliens. It already had twenty members even though it was only a few hours old. The two girls even went to take a look at it and they were greeted by their fans.
"Welcome to your fan club," said the Alien in charge.
"Well it is mighty nice of you to set up a club about little old us," replied Rogue.
"Well you are going to win the tournament. We've already bet on it."
"Thank you."

What do they do next?
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: Fan club

1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.content:
The girls decided to stay at the fan club a little longer. It was nice that they had some popularity on this alien world. Also these aliens made them feel happy. Out of all of the competitors in the tournament they chose them to support.
But then they heard the sirens go off. It was time for their next match and everyone went to get ready. Kitty and Rogue went to the arena while the fans just went to get their seats and watch the match.
"Are you ready Rogue?" asked Kitty.
"Yeah whoever comes out there won't stand a chance against us," replied Rogue. "Bring them on."
"He who comes out will have their ass kicked."
Just then the competitors came out. Kitty and Rogue expected to have mighty warriors come to them. But instead they had little people. They were both men and the girls just looked down at them.
"This is who we're fighting the next round?" asked Kitty. "You might as well just finish the match now."
The bell rang and one of the little people grabbed Rogue's foot. To everyone's amazement he easily through her over
.
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: Next Round

1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.content:
"Wow these little guys are strong," said Rogue.
"Don't worry about them," replied Kitty. She then began to grow. "Leave these little men to me."
Eventually Kitty grew to 15 feet. She tried to stomp on the little men but her foot was stomped just a few feet above them.
"This is impossible." But then Kitty was thrown back. She didn't admit defeat instead she began to come up with a plan. "You want me to pick on someone my own size? I will do."
Kitty then shrank until she was the same height as the Men. But she noticed that they were slow. It seemed that power had taken away most of their speed. But Kitty was able to get in between each of them.
"Ok guys hit me baby one more time," she said.
The two men went to punch. Kitty but she simply phased through them. They punched each other and they fell unconscious. Kitty was pleased with herself.
"There we go nothing to it," said Kitty.
She then grew up to her normal size and the crowd was celebrating for their victory over super strong little men.

Who will they face in the next round?
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: Pick on someone your own size

1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.content:
The next round was going to be the semi-finals. In the arena Kitty and Rogue found out that their next opponents were going to be slime monsters. They had seen them take heavy blows but just regenerate from them. This would make them a formidable foe even under the best circumstances.
"These guys look tough," said Kitty.
"Don't worry we'll beat them somehow," replied Rogue. "But for now I need a drink."
"Yeah beating guys up can sure make a girl thirsty."
The pair go to get some refreshments. They were greeted by their fan club who bought drinks. This was nice of them and they were getting rested up. But eventually the call came for them to enter the arena. They were reluctant to go but they still did.
When kitty and Rogue entered the arena the crowd were still cheering. The announcer came on.
"Welcome males and females of all races," said the Announcer. "Welcome to the first of our semi-final matches. We have the blobs from Kentra against the surprised semi finalists Mutants from the Planet Earth."
The teams got ready to fight and eventually the bell rang and almost in seconds all hell broke loose.
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: Semi-final

1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.content:
Kitty almost immediately grew to giant size and she stomped on the blobs. At first she thought that they were beaten but then she saw them reforming. She stomped on them several more times but each time they simply got back together as if nothing had ever happened to them.
"Oh crap no matter how much I stomp on these guys they keep getting back together," said Kitty. "What are we going to do?"
"We need to come up with a plan," replied Rogue.
"What can we do against them?"
"You'll have to get back to you on that one."
"Crap."
Kitty stayed at giant size for her own protection. She then had an idea for what she was going to do. She looked at Rogue on the ground.
"Ok I have a plan. I need you to take some of my power. But I still need to be conscious. Can you do that?"
"Yeah sure." She then briefly touched Kitty and she absorbed her size changing powers. "Are you alright?"
"Yeah I'm fine."

Will Kitty's plan work?
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: Blobs

1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.content:
Then Rogue grew to giant sized as well. She looked over to her equally large friend and she was a puzzled a little.
"What now?" asked Rogue.
"Now we get them together," replied Kitty.
Each one of them grabbed one of the blobs. But they made them absorb each other. Now there was only one blob to worry about except he was a lot bigger then before. But now the fun was about to begin.
"Remember how to play catch?" asked Kitty.
"Yeah," replied Rogue.
"Then let's start playing."
The girls then threw the blobs to each other. They would sometimes either purposely not catch it or throw them too hard. This was causing damage for the blobs. They couldn't reform quick enough.
Eventually they were out and Kitty put them back on the ground. This as to show that they were victorious.
"Mutants 1 Blobs 0."
The girls then high fived each other.
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: Blob ball

1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.content:
Kitty and Rogue went to a small café to get something to eat. They wanted to recover a little from their match. But the next round would be the final. But they tried to put it in the back of their minds.
“I still can’t believe all this is happening,” said Kitty. “One minute we’re studying in the mansion the next we’re here.”
“Well if we win this we could be heroes throughout the galaxy,” replied Rogue. Kitty looked at her blankly. “Ok that might have been a little much.”
"But the final is going to be the toughest match yet. I'm not sure if we'll win this one. Who knows what'll happen if we lose."
"We could be saying Goodbye to Mother earth."
"Don't think like that."
But the girls were getting tired by now. The last match wasn't until the next day. They were taken to a room where they each had their own bed to sleep in. These were large beds so they would be liking this.
"These guys might be savage warriors," said Rogue. "But they're darn good hosts."
"I wonder if there's room service," replied Kitty.
"One way to find out."

What happens tomorrow?
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: Millenium

1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.content:
The next day everything was getting hyped up for the final. The bets were coming in. But the girls were still second in that. The bookies thought that their opponents were the most likely to win. The girls’ fan club already put their bets on the match. This made the girls a little nervous.
But it eventually came to the final. The arena was stacked up with people wanted to watch the match. They were anxious to see who won. Even for this round a man dressed in what seemed to be royal clothes sitting on a throne. He was watching what was about to transpire.
The girls were just outside the arena. They were almost ready to go into the arena to show everyone what they had.
"Well this is it," said Kitty. "The big one."
"Let's just show these aliens who us earth gals can really do," replied Rogue.
They high fived each other just before going into the arena. Their was a huge roar from the crowd. There was excitement everywhere. But Kitty and Rogue saw what seemed to be their opponents.
"They don't look too tough," said Rogue.
"Be careful they may be dangerous."
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: The final

1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.content:
Their opponents were little green men. They seemed to be small in stature but they had some weapons in their arms. Rogue didn’t see them as much of a threat. But they were soon going to find out why they became finalists.
"The final round is the Humans against the Skrulls," said the announcer. "The winners return to their home world victorious while the losers live a life of humiliation. Let the final round begin!"
Just when the bell rang the Skrulls transformed into winged beasts. This caught both of the girls by surprise.
"Crap their shape shifters," said Kitty.
"How do we fight something like that?" asked Rogue.
"We hit them until the break."
Kitty then grew in size until she was about 50 feet tall. But one of the Skrulls flew up to her face and went to slash it. But she easily phased through their attack. She then grabbed it and threw it to the ground.
"You'll have to do better then that to take me down."

Just then it transformed into a tiger.

What happens?

The Skrull attacked Kitty but she phased through the attack. She definitely had the advantage. But the other skrull was getting up from Kitty's attack. It was about to strike again. But Rogue grabbed him and absorbed his powers.
Kitty was doing quite well against the remaining skrull. But it could see that it wasn't going to win unless it changed tactics.
"You just stepped on your partner," said the Skrull.
Kitty panicked and she looked down at her foot. "Oh my God I'm so sorry I didn't meant to," said Kitty.
Just then the Skrull transformed into a huge alien monster and it attacked Kitty while she was distracted. It hit her with deadly accuracy. She fell to the ground and she reverted to her normal size. She had been defeated.
The other Skrull walked up to him and they were in celebration. But then it hit the Skrull sending him to the ground.
"You dare strike me!" he said. "You are a traitor to the Skrull empire."
"I would be," he replied. But then he transformed back into Rogue. "I'm not a skrull."
"The Human!"
"In the flesh."
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: One on one

"Your powers are no match against mine," said the Skrull.
"No our powers are pretty much equal," replied Rogue. "But it looks like I need to borrow some more." She then went over to Kitty and touched her forehead. She felt Kitty's power run from her body and she liked the feeling. She then grew up to 60 feet and she looked down at the tiny Skrull. "As Clint Eastwood said in Dirty Harry. Do you feel Lucky PUNK!"
"Your change in size does not scare me Earth creature."

Rogue then began to stomp away at the Skrull. But he simply grew wings and he tried to fly up to her. But she was ready and she grew some claws and she slashed him. She was getting use to the powers.
While the Skrull was falling to the ground Rogue lifted her huge foot and she stomped on him a little. But by the time she had finished he was defeated. He was still alive but he was defeated.
"Game, set and match,” said Rogue.
"Ladies and gentlemen we have new champions," said the Announcer. "The ladies from Earth Rouge and Shadowcat."
Rogue then turned her attentions to Kitty.

"Can someone come out here and see my friend here?" asked Rogue.
Just then some medical officers came out to Kitty's aid. It didn't help that she was still at giant size. This made things very difficult for them. But Rogue thought about something. She put her gloves on and she held onto Kitty's arm. She then concentrated and she made Kitty shrink down to normal size.
But when she let go Kitty grew back to giant size. So she did it again but this time she didn't let go. But she knew that she would lose Kitty's size changing powers within the next few minutes.
"Hurry up I don't know how long I can keep her at this size."
"We'll do all we can," replied the Medical Officer.
They quickly tended to Kitty's wounds. Thankfully she woke up and she looked at Rogue. She tried to smile.
"Hey there Rogue," said Kitty.
"Hey Kitty," replied Rogue.
"Did we win?"
"Oh yes we won."
"Good."

"Are we going home yet?" asked Kitty.
"I'm not sure I'll ask around," replied Rogue.
"Ok but please don't be too long."
"Don't worry I won't be."
Rogue then left Kitty and went to the guy in charge of the tournament. He was a little surprised to see her there. He was a little nervous.
"Oh hey there Earthling," said the Alien.
"I was just wondering when do we get to be send back home," replied Rogue. "We have been here a while."
"Home? Oh yes home. We'll send you home as soon as you've finished the ceremony."
"Wait what ceremony?"
"To celebrate your victory of course."
"How long does that last?"
"Only a few minutes."
"We'll do it."
"Oh yeah ask your friend to be giant sized when it happens. It will make the crowd more appreciate to you."

Will it last long?
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: Going home?

The celebrations went underway. As requested Kitty was giant size to make the crowd jump a little more. Rogue was next to her foot and she had to be careful that Kitty didn't step on her. Once or twice she nearly did.
"Hey watch it Kitty," said Rogue.
"Oh sorry," replied Kitty.
The King of the planet soon gave Kitty and Rogue their rewards. They were given medals and even a special bottle of potion. They both looked at it.
"What's this?" asked Rogue.
"That is a special potion hat grants the bearer a single wish," replied the King. "It can only grant wishes that do not involve others being harmed."
"Damn there goes my wish."
"What?"
"Only kidding."
"One more thing send my regards to your world leader."
Just then the girls were hit by a beam and they disappeared. the next thing they knew they were back in the mansion library. It was the exact time they had left and they looked around a little.
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: Celebration

"We're home?" asked Kitty.
"Same boring library," replied Rogue. "Same boring school. Yep we're definitely back on Earth."
"Thank God. If I had to face that many aliens again I would have gone mad."
Just then Scott came into the library. He was about to pick out a book until he felt two people hugging him. He looked and saw Kitty and Rogue.
"Are you alright girls?" asked Scott. He was a little suspicious.
"It's been so long," replied Kitty. "We thought that we'd never be back."

"Are you sure you girls are feeling aright?"
"Yes," replied Rogue and Kitty.
"Ok then. But you do have a training session in fifteen minutes. If I was you ladies I'd get ready."

The girls giggled at the thought of them knowing what happened and Scott having no idea.

When will there be trouble?

A few days later we see Kitty in the Danger Room. She was practicing both phasing and size changing powers. She was using them both to great effect. She didn't think that it was that much of a challenge.
Wolverine was in the control room. he was watching her and if she ran into any trouble he would pull the plug on the room. But he was impressed with what he was seeing. He never expected to see Kitty do so well.
"Hey Mr. Logan can you make this thing a little tougher?" asked Kitty. "This is way too easy."

"Yeah I can take whatever you give me."

He then pushed a button and the scenery in the Danger Room transformed. it had been a plain room but now it was in a dense jungle.

"That's fine."

Kitty then began to go through the dense jungle. Instead of dodging aroudn the thick trees and vines she simple phased her body through it. She was trying to think of a way to get past the Danger Room without changing size. She tried to think back to her trianing before she had these powers.
But eventually Kitty came up to a villain. It looked just like Ultimate Deadpool. She remembered that he had tried to kill her a while back. (See Ultimate Spider-Man 91-94) She wanted payback.
"Well look what the Kitty cat brought in," he said. He was clearly mocking her. ""What are you gonna do scratch me?"

"But you're the shortest X-Man right?"
"Well." She began to think about it and she realised that he was right. She was the shortest X-Man without her powers. "Shut up."
"I think I hit a nerve."
"You're going down."

Will she win?

"I knew the X-Men were slow but God Damn it you're slow," said Deadpool. "Even Rome was built faster then you."
"Shut up," replied Kitty.
Oh is the Kitty cat going to cry? Cry home to her Mommy."
This really hit something in kitty and she unwillingly grew to a giant size and she stomped onto Deadpool. But when she lifted her foot up she saw that it was the robot. The Danger Room then went back to normal.

choices: Professor X wants her to go on a mission with Wolverine
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.content:
Kitty picked up a vegetarian dish and she sat down next to Rogue. They were still giggling about their little adventure together. But it was going to be their little secret. It seemed that entire tournament had taken place within a few seconds. No one had noticed that they were gone.
"I wonder if we're going to be kidnapped by aliens again?" whispered Rogue.

When the lunch was over Kitty cleaned up her plate and she went up to her room. She had just put up a poster of the latest teen idol. She just sat and looked at it for a few minutes.
"Oh Chad," she said.
But then she heard a knocking on the door. This woke her up from her daydream and she got up and opened the door.
"Hi Kitty are you doing anything?" asked Professor X.

"He's going into Canada. But I fear that he might run into some trouble. If he gets into danger you help him out."

"Simple you shrink yourself so small that he can't pick up your scent."

A little later Kitty was in the jet that Wolverine was going to take. She shrank herself out of sight but just about the bacteria level. They were tiny to her and if any got too close to her she would stomp on them.
She then saw what seemed to eb a mountain sized Logan walking into the jet. She felt it start up and it went into the air.
"Well Kitty this should be fun," she said to herself. "But let's just hope nothing really bad happens."

Wolverine then began to fly the X-jet away from the X-Mansion. he put it on autpilot and then he got up and took off his gloves. He put it right next to Kitty. But he didn't know that she was there.
Kitty took the opportunity to hide on his glove. Although she couldn't really make herself that comfortable on there she shrank herself even further so that she could sit in th fabric of the glove.
"Wow I've never been this small before," she said to herself.
But then she saw Wolverine walk back to the controls. He took the auto-pilot off and he landed on the ground somewhere. Kitty didn't know where they were.
But the next thing Kitty knew Wolverine was putting his glove back on. She made sure that she was on a safe part of the glove. She felt proud of herself that she was able to hide herself from someone like Wolverine.
Then Kitty felt something really cold. It must have been the weather and she hadn't dressed for colder weather.
"Typical," she said.
But now she had to wait for the right time to reveal herself. Maybe when Wolverine was in trouble.

Where are they?

Wiolverine had landed in a wasteland in Canada. It was cold but he was able to keep it out and in the back of his mind. He had alredy put the camflage device on the X-Jet so no one would see it.

Just the Omega Red and Deadpool came out from other trees. They both wanted a peace of Wolverine.

"Oh sorry."

"Stay still," said Kitty.
But below Wolverine had to deal with both Wolverine and Omega Red. He was fighting a losing battle. But then a large yellow boot came down on top of Sabretooth. This flattened him instantly.

All that was left was Omega Red. But this wasn't going to be easy. Kitty had already thrown Lady Deathstrike as far as she could.
"And stay away," she said in triumpth.

"It's just you and me Omega Red," said Wolverine.
"No it's just me Logan," replied Omega Red. "After this day one shall stand. One shall fall."

The two then began to fight each other. Wolverine was cutting up Omega Red's tentacles. But he was growing them back fast. The tentacles were strong by themself. he was having difficulties getting close to him.
"What's wrong Logan," said Omega Red. "Not as confident as you were a minute ago comrade."

"Whatever."

Who will win?
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: Wolverine vs Omega Red

The pair then began to really fight. Omega Red started to wrap his tentacles around Wolverine. but he was cutting he way out of them. But he put one straight through his stomach. Wolverine fell to the ground clutching his stomach.
"Any normal person would have died from that," said Omega Red. "But you can just heal over you freak."
"Look who's talking," replied Wolverine.
Omega Red then kicked him in the jaw. "Stay down dog."
Wolverine then popped the claws in one of his hands and stabbed Omega red straight hin his stomach. Omega Red was screaming out in pain.
"Looks like you haven't got the stmach for this," said Wolverine.
"Damn you American!" shouted Omega Red.
"I'm not American. I'm Canadian."
"Same thing."
Omega Red then fell to the ground unconscious. But Wolverine slowly stood up. He held his stomach and he looked at his fallen foe. But then he went towards where Kitty was. She was still out of it.
"Ok wake up Pryde!"

Kitty was still giant size and she began to slowly open her eyes. She saw Wolverine and at first she thought that he had been shrunk.

"Omega Red."

"What are we going to do with him?"
"Well we can't give him to the authorities because he ain't done anything illegal."
"But we can't just leave him there."

A few hours later Omega red slowly woke up. He expected to feel cold. But instead he felt warmth. He then looked around and saw that he was on a tiny desert island.
"LOGAN!" he shouted.

What will Kitty be up to next?
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: Wake up

A few weeks past since Kitty went with Wolverine. She was still doing her usual things. She studied by day and went partying at night. She spent a lot of her with the other X-Men doing odd things.
She was also having a bit of fun with her powers. Some days she would make herself shorter then usual and sometimes she would amke herself taller. This annoyed some of her tema mates but they didn't mind that much.
But in New York City a girl was just going into a lab. She had been arrested and charged for multiple drug offences. But she was given the option to spend a long time behind bars or become a human test subject.
Inside the lab it was the type that anyone would expect to see in a science fiction movie. There were several professors around a machine that she was going to be tested on. But none of them really trusted her.
"Good afternoon Heather," said a Professor.
"Whatever," replied Heather. "Just get this thing over with already."
"As you wish."
She was then taken to the machine and she was strapped down onto it. She could hear it running.

"Well there are still tests to do."
"Screw the tests."
Just then she felt something in her arm. She looekd at saw another scientist injecting her with something.
"What the hell are you doing?" asked Heather.
"Just making this experience a little more pleasent."
But then the machine began to come on. The scientists got to a safe distance and they watched as a ray hit Heather. She felt pain all through her body. She screamed out and in seconds it was over. She lay there almost motionless.
"Is she dead?" asked a Scientist.
"I don't think so she's moving," replied another.
They then slowly went towards her.

What happens enxt?

but then there was a flash of light and Heather quickly opened her eyes. She raised her arm towards a scientist and bolts of lightning left her hand and it fried him instantly. He fell down dead.

But then heather got up from the machine and she started to throw lightning at everyone. They were all being fried and all she could do was laugh at them. She then blasted the door off of the building.
"Such power," she said. "I could beat the Ultimates with this."
meanwhile back at the X-Mansion Kitty was lying in the garden grounds trying to get a tan. She was enjoying ehrself and it also gave her a good reason to try out her new bikini. She tried to relax.
But then she could smell brimestone. She took her sun glasses off and she saw Nightcrawler.

A little later Kitty was writing in her diary in her room. She hadn’t written in it for a while and she was trying to catch up.
“Dear Diary,” she wrote. “The fight against Wolvie’s enemies is definitely an experience I won’t want to think about any time soon. But I actually had some fun fighting them. Even though that Omega Red guy knocked me out. He really got on my nerves. But what do I expect from a creepy guy.”
Just then Kitty heard someone knock at her door. She stopped writing for a minute and she looked at the door.
“Come in,” she said.
Just then no one entered. She waited for a few seconds and then she got up and put her hand on the door handle. It was extremely cold and her hand was stuck.

She could then hear him laughing and he walked away. Kitty was able to phase her hand out but she was more annoyed then before.
“Damn it,” she said. “He’s so childish. I wish he’d just grow up.” She sat on her bed and cross her arms. “Maybe I can teach him a lesson.”
She then began to think of a plan to get revenge on Bobby. It wouldn’t hurt him but it would be sweet revenge.

What does she do?

He didn't get an anser and he became a little more afraid. He then went to walk away. Kitty. Then went over to his lanb. She pressed it on and then hid again. She was giggling at the same time.

But then Kitty began to grow rapidly. She grew until she was beginning to fill up the room. She gave Bobby an evil look and it began to scare him.

She then put him in her mouth and went to swallow. But when he went falling down her throat she phased him right through. He though he would her stomach acid but he went straight through it.

When will heather strike?

Over the next week seemingly nothing happened. But eventually heather wanted to get herself some money. The only way she could get the amount she wanted was to steal it. But with all the super heroes out there she probably wouldn’t last that long. She had to be clever.
On the way to the bank Heather used her powers to cause a fire in a building. She could hear people screaming in pain but she just ignored them and she kept going. It took her a while but she reached the bank.
She waited in a line and it was eventually her turn to be served. There was a young female accountant behind the counter.

"How much would you like?"
"The entire vault."
"Is that a joke?"
Heather then used a lightning bolt to hit right next to the accountant. This was a warning shot.
"Does it look like I'm joking?"
1422212111111122121121112221212111112211.title: heather strikes

She then fired a thunderbolt at Kitty but she was able to phase through it quickly. She yawned a little.

Then Kitty started to grow again. This time she stopped when she was 300 feet tall.
