14222121112112111112211.title: Grew again

142221211121121111122111.content:
"Now lets see how this army does against the new and improved Kitty Pryde," said Kitty with Spider-Man still on her shoulder.


She kicks three of the monkeys and they go flying.

"Thirty-seven," said Spider-Man.

Then ten monkeys tried to jump onto her. But she phases right through them. Then she grabs one of them and uses him to knock out the other nine monkeys out.

"Twenty-seven."

Then the rest of them try to attack all at once. But Kitty phases through the ground. She pops back up behind them and grabs one and she uses him as a bowling ball to take all the other monkeys out.

"Zero," said Kitty. She walks over to Professor Cruel's warehouse and she grabs him. "Looks like your army wasn't unbeatable after all."

Curse you Kitty Pryde one day I will have my revenge!" shouted Professor Cruel.

"Stop that you're starting to sound like a Saturday Morning Cartoon villain." She takes him to Dr King's warehouse. There Dr King and Manuel were treating the X-Men. Fortunately no one was seriously hurt and they would recover soon.

After a few hours everyone was ready to leave but how would they get Kitty onto the Blackbird? Dr King reveals.

"Ok Kitty here's your cure," said Dr King. He throws her a jar with pills in it. She catches them easily.

"What are these?"

"They're what are gonna make you normal sized again. I've already told you that they're only temporary. There are a months worth of tablets there. Just take one a day and Dr King will stay far away."

She takes off the top and takes out one of the tablets. She puts it into her mouth and swallows it. then she shrinks down to 7'5.

"Hey wait I'm still huge."

"Unfortunately you won't get any smaller. So Kitty Pryde welcome to your new height."

"Oh well, it's better than being 300 feet tall."

A few minutes later the X-men and Spider-Man had left on the Blackbird. This left Dr King and Manuel inside the destroyed Warehouse.

"MANUEL get the vacuum!"
142221211121121111122111.title: The army defeated

choices: He gets her pills in time
He doesn't get her pills in time
1422212111211211111221111.content:
A few days later at the X-Mansion. Kitty was on the basketball court playing basketball (obviously) with Booby. Due to her being 2 feet taller than him she was wining hands down. Lets put it like this. Kitty had scored 50 baskets and Bobby hadn't scored any yet.
"Hey this isn't fair," said Bobby.
"It's every bit fair shrimp," replied Kitty. Then she scored a three pointer. "Now lets see. That's 136 points to me. And none to you."
"I never did like basketball."
"Hey you said you loved basketball."
"That was until I played you."
Kitty giggled. "Ok I'll give you a free shot. If you score you win. If not then I win. Deal?"
"Deal."
Kitty passes the ball to Bobby. He dribbles it to the basket. He has shot. It rolls around the ring of the basket. But it fell the wrong side. He missed.
"Ha you missed," said Kitty. "You loose."
"Yeah yeah don't rub it in."
Kitty continued to laugh. Then she noticed something. Her clothes were getting tighter. Then she realised she was growing.
"Crap Bobby get my pills."
"Where are they?"
"They're in my bag on the half way line." Bobby runs to Kitty's bag. He goes through it looking for the pills. She could hear her clothes beginning to rip. "Hurry!"
1422212111211211111221111.title: Basketball

14222121112112111112211111.content:
Bobby frantically searched through Kitty's bag. he found all sorts of weird things in there. but eventually he found her pills. But when he turned around Kitty was already over 10 feet tall. She was stark naked and she was still growing.
"God Bobby hurry up!" she shouted.
"Chill I have them here," replied Bobby. He goes over to her. She practically snatched them from his hand. She unscrewed the lid and took one of the pills out. By now she was 15 feet tall. Bobby couldn't help but stare at her naked body. She swallowed the one pill. To her relief she shrank back down to her almost normal height. She was still 7'5 and she was still naked.
"Stop looking," said Kitty.
"I can't help it it's so beautiful."
Then Kitty punched Bobby. "Now get lost." She runs back to her room. She goes into her wardrobe and puts on some new clothes. Well since she's only been 7'5 for t a few days she didn't have that many clothes her size. And it was impossible to shop for her. it was times like these she hated her new powers. But when it came to doing things with Bobby she loved them. What she didn't realise is that soon she really needed her powers to save the world.

What is this threat?
14222121112112111112211111.title: Only just

choices: A few days later at the X-Mansion
142221211121121111122111112.content:
Meanwhile inside a pyramid in Egypt the mutant known as Apocalypse was planning world domination. he was believed to be the first mutant. A few days earlier he had freed his servant Mr Sinister for S.H.I.E.L.D. He sat on his own throne.
"Come to me my servant," said Apocalpyse. Sinister walked forward. "Have you found me four mutants worthy of being one of my horseman?"
"Indeed I have. The Scarlet Witch of the Ultimates. Her ability to highten probability is unpredictable but very powerful. Magneto the mutant terrorist. His ability to control Magnetic fields will make him an execllent addition. Sunfire of Japan. his ability to produce fire will incinerate our enemies. And finally Kitty Pryde of the X-Men. She can phase her body through solid objects. But recently she has acquired the ability to increase her size to gigantic proportions. As yet she needs a daily pill to keep herself at a relatively normal size."
"Hmm your research has pleased me Sinister. bring them to me. Then you will receive the ultimate reward."
"Thank you my master."
"Now go."
142221211121121111122111112.title: Apocalypse

1422212111211211111221111121.content:
About a week later at the X-Mansion. Kitty was still trying to get used to being tall. Thankfully the Professor had ordered her some new clothes. Plus he told her that S.H.I.E.L.D was trying to make her clothes that would grow with her. But so far that title only went to her X-Men uniform.
Anyway she was in her room writing in her diary. When there was a sudden knock at the door.
"Come in," said Kitty.
The door opened and Colossus came in. He was in organic form and he was wearing his normal clothes.
"Hi kitty," said Piotr.
"Hey Pete what's up?"
"I was just wondering if you wanted to go to the mall with me. I would have asked Kurt. But after that little incident (See Ultimate X-Men Annual #2) he won't be coming. And I was wondering if you wanted to come."
"I'd love to Pete. But first I need to go somewhere. You can come if you want."
"Sure."
"Ok just get out for a minute I need to get changed."
Piotr left the room. Kitty then got changed into her X-Uniform. She put her other clothes in a bag. She then went back to Piotr.
"Kitty why do you have your uniform on?"
"Because it's the only clothes that grow with me silly."
"But why do you need to grow?"
"You'll see." They both go outside. When they did the pill's effects had worn off and Kitty grew back to 300 feet. She then picks up Piotr. "Now I just quickly have to see..."
1422212111211211111221111121.title: Going to the mall with Colossus

14222121112112111112211111212.content:
"But why?" replied Piotr.
"Well I feel bad for ripping off their roof. So I'm gonna go there and fix it for them. Plus there's a few things I need to ask him."
"Ok."
"And I promise we won't be long."
Kitty then walks towards the Warehouses. On the way people took pictures of them on their phones. She didn't mind. She found quite flattering.
After a few minutes they were there. She saw Dr King and Manuel outside. And at fist they didn't notice her. It looked like they were having another argument.
"Manuel how many times did I have to tell you," said Dr King. "Yellow paper goes in the filing cabinet and the junk mail goes in the shredder."
"I am sorry Dr King."
"Well get it right."
Then Kitty approaches them.
"You know you shouldn't treat him like that," she said.
"Oh hi Kitty. Err what are you here for? You tablets shouldn't have ran out."
"Oh I'm just here to help you fix your roof. And I bought a friend."
14222121112112111112211111212.title: Dr King's Warehouse

142221211121121111122111112121.content:
"Good," said Dr King. "We've been meaning to fix that roof for days."
Kitty puts Colossus on the ground. Then she picks up several materials. Then she started to fix the roof.
It took about an hour. But with everyone pulling their weight they were able to complete the work.
"Cheers Kitty and Piotr. We couldn't have done it without you."
"Now Dr King," said Kitty. "There's somethings I wanna ask you."
"Alright."
"I'm just worried that I'll get even bigger. Will I?"
"Well I have been researching. And I've found out that to make you even bigger you'll have to get mad. And I mean really mad. A bit like the Hulk."
"And how far do you think it is to the mall from here?"
"Only a fifteen minute walk. Why?"
"Because me and Piotr are going there now."
Piotr gets her bag. He zips it open and gets out the jar with Kitty's pills in them. he opens it and takes one out. She then lowers her hand. he puts the pill in her hand. Then she puts it in her mouth and swallows it. Then she shrinks back down to over 7 feet tall.
"I may not be normal size. But this'll do."
Then she gets her bag. She goes into the warehouse to get changed. When she came back out she was in her casual clothes. The her and Piotr leave for the mall.

When does Sinister strike?
142221211121121111122111112121.title: Fixing the roof

1422212111211211111221111121211.content:
Later kitty and Piotr reach the mall. They look around the shops. Namely clothes shops. Kitty felt nervous. this was the first time she had been clothes shopping after her little accidents. What really saddened her was that she couldn't find any clothes her size. The tallest she could find was clothes for women who were 6'4. She was a good foot and a bit too tall. All the shoes were too small for her feet. The rings weren't big enough for her fingers. Piotr saw this so they decided to take a break. They went to the food court. Piotr bought the food. But now Kitty was eating enough to feed a small family. She was a bit embarrassed about it.
"Sorry Piotr," she said. "Since I've started getting big I just can't stop eating. Luckily I don't seem to get fatter."
"It's Ok Kitty," replied Piotr. "That's understandable. When I was growing up I ate more than everyone else."
"I'm sorry I seem so distant. I just feel nervous. For the first time in my life I'm in a world where I can't go clothes shopping properly."
"I know how you feel. We'll get the Professor to order you some clothes when we get back to the mansion."
Then Kitty felt someone tap on her shoulder. She turned her head and saw Sinister with a Japanese man.
"Miss Pryde," said Sinister. "I'm afraid you have to come with me now."

Will Kitty escape?
1422212111211211111221111121211.title: Clothes shopping

14222121112112111112211111212112.content:
"Sinister?" asked Kitty.
"The one and only," replied Sinister. "Now we've got two ways of doing this. You can come with us willingly and save me a lot of hassle and no one will be hurt. Or you can put up a struggle and really piss me off."
"I think I'll struggle."
Kitty and Piotr stood up from the table. Piotr converted his skin into metal. The Japanese man made a ring of fire around them. Kitty held onto Piotr and she phased them through the ground.
When they went down a level there was more of Sinister's henchman. They weren't as powerful as Sinister and the Japanese man but they were still annoying.
Kitty and Piotr just started to beat the crap out of them. But then one of the henchman sprayed a gas in Kitty's face. This made her fall unconscious. Then they all grabbed her. Then they disappeared with her leaving Piotr behind.
He then got his phone and rung the mansion.
"Hello," he said. "Something just happened. Kitty has been taken by Sinister."
14222121112112111112211111212112.title: Taken

142221211121121111122111112121121.content:
A little later we see Kitty in a cage. It was huge. It was big enough to hold her if she grew to full size. She tried to phase through the cage. But there was something about the metal used to make the cage. She couldn't phase through it. She noticed she was in her x-costume. Then she saw someone approach her cage. It was Sinister.
"Sinster!" said Kitty.
"You will not speak unless Master Apocalypse gives you permission," replied Sinister.
Then she sees a man sitting on a throne. His skin was grey.
"Who is that?"
"That is the master Apocalypse."
Apocalypse stands up from his throne and walked to the cage.
"Hello Miss Pryde," said Apocalypse. "I've chosen you to become one of my four horseman."
"I don't wanna be one of your horseman."
"You don't have a choice. You will become War. And you have ten seconds."
"For what?" He didn't answer. then she felt the familiar feeling in her. She began to grow again. "I'm growing. Quick get me my pills."
"That is not necassary." He watched as Kitty grew all the way up to 300 feet. "Sinister get the device."
"Yes Master."

Will Kitty escape?`
142221211121121111122111112121121.title: Kitty comes face to face with Apocalypse

choices: A week later at the X-Mansion
1422212111211211111221111121211212.content:
A few minutes later Sinister returned with a small device. Kitty couldn't really see it but it sent a cold shiver down her spine.
"I have it my master," said Sinister.
"Very good," replied Apocalypse. "Now show my Newest Horseman what this device does. One more thing deactivate her mutant power while you begin the process."
Sinister pushed another button on the device. Then he walked into Kitty's cage. She tried to stomp on him but she felt a strange sensation through her body. She wanted to crush him but her body wouldn't.
"Please you can't do this to me," pleaded Kitty.
"But you will become more than a mere human or mutant," replied Sinister. "You will become a servant of the Lord Apocalypse. Now on your knees." Kitty unwillingly obeyed. Her body seemed to be possessed by another being. "Good now lift me up to the back of your neck." She grabs him gently and raises him to the back of her neck. A dart came out of the device and Sinister stuck it into the back of Kitty's neck.
Her skin turned grey, her eyes went red and her strength increased ten fold. She then puts Sinister on the ground.
"How do you feel Kitty?" asked Apocalypse.
"Kitty Pryde is dead," she replied. "I am War."
1422212111211211111221111121211212.title: Becoming War

14222121112112111112211111212112121.content:
One week past and Professor X was frantically searching for Kitty through cerebro. But she seemed to have just disappeared off the face of the planet. Colossus was the most worried. He felt guilty for not stopping Sinister. Also he found Kitty to be one of the few people that understood him. His previous friend Nightcrawler had gone insane when Colossus revealed that he was gay.
He was waiting in his room for word from Professor X. Within minutes he came in on his wheelchair. Peter stood up.
"Have you found her Professor?" he asked.
"Unfortunately there is no trace of her," replied Professor X.
"Is she?"
"Dead. I highly doubt it. If they wanted her dead they would have killed her at the mall instead of just capturing her."
"I should have stopped them it's my fault they got her."
"There was nothing you could have done. But I fear this little event is more than meets the eye. if they wanted to make an attack to us they would have contacted us by now."
Then suddenly they hear an alarm ringing.

Where is there trouble?
14222121112112111112211111212112121.title: Worried

142221211121121111122111112121121211.content:
Professor X went to his main computer in the sub-basement. The screen comes on and Nick Fury is seen on it.
"Charles we have a code red emergency," said Nick.
"What is it?" replied Professor X.
"The Triskelion is under attack by two mutants."
"Surely the Ultimates can handle something like this."
"That's a negative. These mutants are in their own class. I already have two Ultimates badly injured and the others are only just holding out."
"Who are these mutants?"
"One mutant has the ability to project fire. he's already done a number on Iron Man. But the other one seems very familiar with one of your students."
"Oh God which one?"
"Which one of your students is over 300 feet tall and can phase through solid objects?"
"I will gather the X-Men and we will come to your aid as soon as possible."
"Just hurry up before we're dead meat."
The screen goes off and Professor X goes back up to the ground floor. Within minutes the X-Men are in costume and ready to aid the Ultimates.
142221211121121111122111112121121211.title: The Triskelion is under attack

1422212111211211111221111121211212111.content:
The X-Men got into the X-Jet and made their way to The Triskelion. When they got there they saw a 300 foot grey skinned Kitty destroying the building. They also saw a man surrounded by fire with her. They also saw the giant men trying to fend off the building. they were 60 feet tall but Kitty was 300. She was easily powerful enough to beat them off.
They landed on the ground outside The Triskelion. They then saw Iron-Man starting to attack her. But then Sunfire took him out.
"Ok team," said Cyclops. "We need to repel the attack but we can't seriously hurt Kitty."
The X-Men then sprung into action. Colossus didn't want to fight his friend. The other X-Men couldn't believe how much stronger she had become.
They attack her from every angle. They were getting some help from the Ultimates but they were also trying to defeat Sunfire.
The Scarlet Witch flew up and began to throw Hex bolts at Kitty. She just grabbed her and then some sort of portal opened. Kitty and Sunfire quickly retreated. When they went through the portal disappeared.
The X-Men and the Ultimates were very confused. it was like they had gotten what they wanted.
1422212111211211111221111121211212111.title: X-Men and Ultimates together

14222121112112111112211111212112121112.content:
Meanwhile in an unknown location in Egypt we see Apocalypse on his throne. Mr Sinister is preparing something. There was a huge flash of light and Sunfire and Kitty appeared. The Scarlet Witch was in Kitty's hand but she couldn't break free.
"Ah War, Famine," said Apocalypse. "I see you have my latest Horseman."
"Yes my master," said Famine (Sunfire. "War did a great job of keeping the X-mena nd Ultimates occupied."
"Very good War. And how did you feel fighting your old friends?"
"I felt nothing," replied War (Kitty).
"Very pleasing." He then turns his head towards Sinister. Is the procedure ready Pestilence?"
"Of course my Lord," replied Sinister.
Apocalypse then looks at the Scarlet witch in War's hand. "And now I welcome you to immortality. You are one of the selected few who have the honour of becoming my Horseman."
War then put the Scarlet Witch next to Sinister. He grabbed her and started the transformation from Scarlet Witch to Pestilence.
14222121112112111112211111212112121112.title: New Horseman

142221211121121111122111112121121211121.content:
Meanwhile back at the X-Mansion everyone was still confused. Colossus was still worried about Kitty. He was thinking about what had happened to her. He knew that she wouldn't abuse her size like that under her own will.
The other X-Men were worried also. Sunfire was a powerful mutant and so was the Scarlet Witch. Shadowcat with her growth had also become a force to be reckoned with. The three of them together with the enhancements may be a little too much even for the X-Men. The only person they knew that was connected was Sinister. They weren't sure if he was acting alone out of his sanity. Or was he working for a higher power.
We now go to Antarctica to the Savage Land. magneto had set up base there and was preparing his new plan of terminating the human race. He had Longshot and Forge with him.
Magneto was admiring some painting by humans. he thought this was the only good thing to come out of humanity.
Then he heard something huge outside. At first he thought it was just a dinosaur. Then he saw that it had a human figure and it was too big to be a Sentinel. There were two normal sized beings flying by the head.

Do the Horseman of Apocalypse succeed in capturing Magneto?
142221211121121111122111112121121211121.title: Magneto next

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
Magneto, Forge and Longshot all saw the Horseman of Apocalypse come closer. It was only Magneto who fully recognised them.
"Who are they?" asked Longshot.
"As far as I can see its Sunfire," replied Magneto. "One of them is Xavier's students. And then there's..." He pauses for a moment. "Wanda?"
"What the Scarlet Witch?"
"Repel them. Nothing is too extreme."
Magneto then flew up through the roof. Forge got two of his high tech weapons and gives one to Longshot. They then make their way outside to confront the Horseman.
Magneto started to control the metals and he attacked War (Kitty) with them. He encased her body with metal but she just phased out of them.
Famine (Sunfire) started to make a fire wall in front of them. No one could see what the Horsemen were doing.
Pestilence (Scarlet Witch) then used her hex powers to deactivate Magneto's powers. Then War phased herself through the fire and she grabbed Magneto. The Horseman then retreated.
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: We have Magneto

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
We see Cyclops in the War Room. He was having some coffee and was trying to locate Shadowcat, SunFire and the Scarlet Witch. As of yet there was nothing.
But then he had an incoming transmission. When he went to the screen he was surprised to see that it was coming fro Antarctica. He punched it through and it was Forge.
"Forge?" asked Cyclops.
"I know we haven't exactly seen eye to eye but Magneto has been kidnapped," replied Forge.
"Impossible he's under S.H.I.E.L.D custody."
"That's not him. It's Mystique in disguise. Anyway these three guys came to our base of operation and kidnapped him. One of them was the X-Men."
"Which one?"
"Well it looked a little like Shadowcat. She had the X-Costume but her skin was grey and she was huge."
"Who were the other two?"
"One had fire powers and I'm sure the other one was the Scarlet Witch."
"Cyclops went silent for a moment. "Let’s just say Magneto's not their first victim."

Where do we go now?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Forge and Cyclops

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
We go back to Apocalypse's hide away. Magneto has been converted to a Horseman. All four of them were standing in front of him. He was pleased with them.
"I have my horseman," said Apocalypse. "Death the once known as Magneto. Your magnetic powers will help render all metal objects useless. Famine once known as Sunfire. Your fire will keep all those who stand against me at bay. Pestilence once known as Scarlet Witch. Your hex powers will help increase the probability of my success a thousand fold. And finally War once known as Shadowcat. You are my most powerful horseman. Your phasing abilities make you untouchable and your size gives you more strength and power than any other being on the planet."
The Horseman bow to their masters. They were still being controlled by him but they didn't know.
Sinister was always a loyal servant to Apocalypse. But Apocalypse himself had a master plan.
"My Horseman your first target is to capture the President of the United States. Bring him to me alive and I can over ride his mind and have him dedicated to my cause. The survival of the fittest. Now go my Horseman and don't disappoint me."
A portal appeared in front to of the Horseman and they walk through it.
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Get me the President

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
The Horseman appear just outside the White House. War (Shadowcat) punches one of the walls down so the other Horseman could get in. When she did this the White House went red alert and the other Horseman enter.
The agents in the White House didn't stand a chance against the Horseman since they all got killed in seconds.
Police weren't much good either. When any turned up War would take them out. If any of them fired at her she would simple phase through the bullets.
The F.B.I turned up but they weren't doing any better than the Police. But what seemed strange was that although War was attacking them no one was killed. Everyone knew that she could easily kill all of them. But they weren't sure why they weren't dead.
Meanwhile inside the other Horseman were making their way to the president's office. There was a titanium door blocking them. But Death (Magneto) easily removed it with his Magnetic powers. They saw the President cowering behind his desk.
"No," said the President.
"Lord Apocalypse requires you," replied Famine (Sunfire).

Who will come to the President's rescue?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Attack the White Hosue

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
Then suddenly Captain America came crashing through the window. He is connected to a cable and he grabs the President. The cable was connected to a helicopter and he was quickly pulled pout before the Horseman could react.
"He is fighting against the will of Master Apocalypse," said Pestilence (Scarlet Witch).
"They will not escape," replied Death (Magneto). "Sister War will prevent their escape."
Meanwhile outside War (Shadowcat) had seen what had happened. She was still being fired on but she simply phased through the bullets. She grabs the helicopter and phases both the President and Captain America out. She threw Captain America to one side and he was just able to get his parachute open before he landed on the ground.
The other Horseman flew to War and then the portal opened. They stepped through it and disappeared. Apocalypse had succeeded in his greatest triumph yet. he now had the most power political person in the world in his hands.
Captain America hated his failure but now his it involved a lot more than just the X-Men and Ultimates. What was about to happen would effect everyone on the face of the planet.
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Captain America fails

choices: Kitty does what she is told
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
Later we see the President in a cage. He was afraid and Apocalypse had appointed War to keep guard on him in the off chance that he escaped.
The President was given food and water but not that much to keep him alive. He tried to talk to War.
"Please release me," begged the President.
"No I have my orders from Master Apocalypse," replied War.
"But I recognise you as one of Xavier's students. You're a good person you're an X-Man."
"An X-Man? I'm starting to remember."
The Apocalypse and Sinister walked into the room. he could see War's talking.
"Having second thoughts Shadowcat?" asked Apocalypse.
"No not at all master. And my name no longer is Shadowcat. It has no meaning to me. I am War."
"And right you are. Now take the President to be processed."
"Yes Master."
War then phased her hand through the cage and picked out the President. He was shouting and begging for his release. But inside War signs of her former self were coming back.

What happens?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: War and the President

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
War took the President over to where Apocalypse wanted her to take him. She was trying to fight the control that he had over her body.
She saw that the President needed to be put into some pool that Apocalypse uses to create some of his Horseman. A tear came to her eye.
"Now War put the President into the pool," commanded Apocalypse.
War went to do it. The President was still begging. It was then something snapped in War. She quickly took him away from the pool. She then quickly opened the portal and threw the President through it.
Just then she felt a serge of electricity through her body and she fell unconscious. Apocalypse walked up to her and he was very angry.
"You just set my plans back," said Apocalypse. "But it looks like you need some rehabilitation."
Sinister then got Kitty's pills and made her swallow one of them. She then shrank down to her super tall self. He then carried her away to be brainwashed again. And this time they couldn't leave anything out.
Apocalypse knew that War would be out for at least 24 hours. But he was certain that she wasn’t needed for the next phase of her plan.
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: War rebels

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
The President had landed outside of a warehouse in New Mexico. He found a payphone and he contacted the Ultimates.
About half an hour alter a special force of S.H.I.E.L.D agents, Nick Fury and Captain America came and picked him up.
On the ship the President was given a blanket and a cup of coffee. Nick Fury sat by him and he wanted to know something very important.
"How did you get away from the Four Horseman?" asked Nick Fury.
"One of them released me," replied the President.
"Which one?"
"The giant woman who could phase through objects. I think she was called War. But Apocalypse called her Shadowcat."
"Looks like you were saved by one of Xavier's students. I'll have to contact him and tell him the news. But do you have any idea where you were?"
"Well everything looked Ancient Egyptian."
Nick Fury thought for a moment. He was wondering where the President had been taken. It sounded like the home base was somewhere in Egypt.
Suddenly there is an alarm going off meaning that there is an attack.

What's under attack?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Nick and the President

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
"What the hell's going on?" asked Nick Fury.
"The Baxter building is under attack by three of the Horseman," replied the Pilot.
"Get us to the Baxter Building immediately."
Meanwhile in Egypt Kitty was about to receive the brainwashing program again. But this time it would be irreversible. She was coming to consciousness when she saw Sinister operating the machine. She was strapped onto a huge table.
"Operations will commence in t minus one minute," said the Computer.
Kitty phased herself from the straps and she tried to sneak away. But she was seen by Sinister. He alerted Apocalypse and she then ran away.
She was soon confronted by Apocalypse. He had grown to match her size. He didn't look too happy with her. She also saw a portal behind him.
"So you tried to resist again," said Apocalypse. "And now you have become useless to me as a Horseman. And for that you will be eliminated."
Kitty then phased herself through him. "Not today bub." she said. She couldn't believe she said that. She was picking a thing or two up from Wolverine.
Kitty then ran to the portal and jumped through it.

Where does she end up?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Resisted

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
Kitty then found herself next to the Baxter Building. The Horseman were attacking it trying to get at the Fantastic Four's Technology. She climbed to the top and the Horseman thought that she was on their side.
"Sister War has returned to vanquish our foes," said Brother Famine.
"News Flash my mind is clear now," replied Kitty. She then punched Famine. The heat hurt her hand a little. "And my name is Kitty Pryde. Remember it."
The remaining Horsemen saw what Kitty had done and said. Now they saw that Kitty was on the side of good again.
"Sister War has turned her back on Master Apocalypse," said Death.
"She will no longer breathe with my diseases," replied Pestilence.
Just before she attacked the Fantastic Four came out and attacked the remaining Horseman. Kitty helped them defeat them and the Horseman went back through the portal back to their master.
The Fantastic Four were about to attack Kitty when she held out her hands.
"Hey guys I'm on your side," said Kitty. "Now I just need my pills."
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Outside the Baxter Building

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
Reed Richards was able to find the ingredients for Kitty's shrinking pills and he was easily able to make a new batch. She quickly swallowed one and she shrank down to her super tall height. Reed was also able to reverse the process that Apocalypse had done to her.
Kitty's body returned to its normal self and her strength was put down to normal. She even gave Reed a little hug and a kiss for what he had done for her.
While Reed was dealing with Kitty his girlfriend had contacted the X-Men and they were soon on their way.
When they got there Colossus was the first person to greet Kitty back. The two hugged each other and then the other X-Men came. They were all happy to see her.
"Are you alright Kitty?" asked Cyclops.
"I'm fine thanks to Dr Richards," replied Kitty.
The X-Men and Fantastic Four talked to Kitty about what Apocalypse was planning. But unfortunately she didn't know. Most of the time she had been brainwashed into being one of the Horsemen. But she was able to give some specific information on Apocalypse.

What was this?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Kitty cured

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
Kitty was able to remember the location where Apocalypse was operating his plan from.
"I know where Apocalypse is," said Kitty.
"Ok Kitty we need you to tell us where he is," replied Cyclops.
"He was in Egypt. Somewhere in the Valley of the Kings. That's all I know."
"Kitty you don't know how much help you've just been."
Cyclops then went and forwarded the information to Nick Fury. He was also pleased wit this since it was gonna limit the search to a specific area instead of a world wide search.
The X-Men took Kitty back ot the X-Mansion. They waited there for Fury to reply back with a positive location.
Eventually they get the answer and the X-men went on their way. They decided that Kitty should stay and Colossus stayed with her. He was her best friend right now. She appreciated this and she gave him a hug and a kiss.
The X-Men went on their way to Egypt and they prepared themselves for the fight of their lives.

What will Kitty do?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: A location is made

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
Kitty was getting very worried about the X-Men. She knew what Apocalypse was capable of and they didn't. She was dying of worry and she couldn't take it anymore. She went down to the hangar where there was a small two man jet that the X-Men would sue for emergencies. She went to get in when Colossus stopped her.
"What are you doing?" he asked.
"I'm going to help the X-Men," replied Kitty.
"But we have been told to stay here."
"And if I don't go the X-Men will be destroyed. I know what he can do. He’s merciless and he'll easily kill them. If I go then there's a chance I'll win. Please let me go."
"I still can not. Unless you take me with you."
"It's a deal."
They both get into the jet and Colossus flies it towards Egypt. He was the only one out of the two who could fly it. Kitty was just gonna fly and hope for the best.
After a while they see the Egyptian desert and Kitty directs him to the base of Apocalypse. But everything seemed different now that she was as close to her normal size as she would ever get.
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Kitty goes to Eygpt

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
Colossus could see the X-Jet on the ground and so he landed next to it. The Jet was empty so they figured that they had gone to fight Apocalypse and his remaining Horseman.
"Now Kitty where is the entrance?" asked Colossus.
"It's around here somewhere," replied Kitty. "It's on the ground somewhere."
The pair walk around a little and eventually Colossus's foot hit something metal. He rubbed some of the sand off the metal object and he saw that it was a door.
"Kitty come over here I have found something," he said.
She went over to it and she looked at it. "That's it you've found it."
"No to get it open."
"No need."
Kitty held Colossus's hand and she phased herself and him through the metal door and they floated to the ground. He was amazed with what had just happened.
"Since when could you float like that?" asked Colossus.
"I've been practicing. I just hope the others are alright."

What are the X-Men doing?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Doors

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
The pair begin to walk cautiously in the tunnels. They could hear a fight somewhere but they didn't know where it was. They thought that it was best to stick together. If anything happened then at least they could fight anything that came their way.
Eventually they see a fireball in one of the passages and they knew that was Sunfire's doing and so they went down the passage and they saw the X-Men fighting the Horseman. Apocalypse was sitting on his throne.
"Come on Peter," said Kitty. "We've gotta help them. Those guys are some of the most powerful mutants on the planet."
Colossus shifted to his metal form and the pair went into action. Unfortunately for Kitty her pill hadn't warn off yet so she couldn't be 300 feet tall.
The X-Men were surprised to see the pair there and they soon joined in the fight.
"What are you two doing here?" asked Cyclops. "You're supposed to be at the mansion."
"We're saving your ass," replied Kitty.
The X-Men fought against the Horseman and Apocalypse was stills at in his throne. Watching the fight was entertaining for him.
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Found the X-Men

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
Kitty wasn't really much use for the X-Men. All she could do was phase through an attack. But Kitty didn't have the strength to hurt any of the Horsemen. She knew that the cure for her size wouldn't run out for hours. But her main concern was Apocalypse. He was more powerful than the Horsemen put together.
Famine flew at Kitty. She saw him at the last second and she was able to phase through him. The Colossus punched him just after he went through Kitty. Now there were only two Horsemen left.
But then Kitty saw Colossus floating in the air. When she looked up it was Death using his Magnetic powers to hurt Colossus and he was also hurting Wolverine.
"Cyclops, Magneto's got Wolverine and Colossus," said Kitty.
Cyclops then blasted him with a powerful optic blast. This made him lose concentration and Jean was able to scramble his brain a little.
Pestilence was the only one left and she used her chaos powers to make anything happen. This also included the quickness of Kitty's cure wearing off. She grew back up to her 300 foot size and she held her foot over Pestilence.
"Fe Fi Fo &*^%$&% Fum!" said Kitty.

What happens next?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Taking out the Horsemen

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
She then stomped on Pestilence. When she raised her foot again she saw that Pestilence was badly injured but not dead. This was a slight relief to her. Colossus looked over at her.
"Language Kitty," he said.
"Hey I'm large and in charge," replied Kitty.
Then suddenly Apocalypse stood up from his throne. he grew until he was the same size as Kitty. She smiled at him.
"This is gonna be sweet revenge."
She then went to punch Apocalypse but he grabbed her hand.
"You really think that your size and petty powers can stop me?" asked Apocalypse.
"I was thinking that they could." She then phases through his hand and she hits him knocking him off balance.
Apocalypse then activated a device that kept a barrier between Kitty and the other X-Men. She tried to phase through it but she couldn't.
"Now X-Man see how good you can do against me."
"Oh you're just asking for it."
"You're nothing. I gave you power and you let it go."
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Kitty vs Apocalypse

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
"I am not nothing," said Kitty "I still have my size and my phasing abilities."
"And they will prove useless against me," replied Apocalypse.
She then went to punch Apocalypse but he was able to quickly counter attack. He punched her in the phase and she fell to the ground. She felt blood coming out of her nose.
"How could you? You hit a girl."
"You are no mere girl. You are worth the beating."
Apocalypse then converted his arm into and axe and he went to slash her. But she used her phasing abilities to go through it harmlessly. She then got up and was ready to fight.
"Now you'll see just what a bitch I cna be," said Kitty.
The X-Men watched in disbelief. They never even dreamed that kitty would go against Apocalypse one on one. They felt ashamed that they couldn't help her. But Jean tried to telepathically contact Kitty. But she couldn't get it through the forcefield.
"No use I can't get through to her," said Jean.
"Then unfortunately she's on her own."

Who will win?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Clash of giants

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
The X-Men watched as the fight between Kitty and Apocalypse became more and fiercer by the second. Their size and powers cancelled each other out. Kitty’s phasing abilities were keeping her out of harm’s way from Apocalypse’s attacks. But she didn’t quite have his strength so she had to rely on her brains to help her more than anything. She was getting some lucky shots and so was Apocalypse.
The two titans locked hands in a fierce test of strength. Apocalypse was starting to overpower her. Kitty shed a tear and she felt some of Apocalypse’s enhancements reactivate. She started to draw on the strength that he had given her and she started to show him just how powerful she was.
She was able to overpower him and then give him a bone breaking right fist. She gave him plenty of them and each one was more powerful than the last. He could see that there was no way her could defeat her so he used a device on his wrist to teleport himself away. He talked about survival of the fittest but he had proven that he was nothing more than a coward.
The force field disappeared and Kitty went back to the X-Men. She knelt down and gave them all a hug. She was just happy that Apocalypse had been defeated. She was easily big enough to give them all a hug at once.
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Kitty wins

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
A few minutes later the X-Men gathered some evidence of Apocalypse. If he were to ever return they would be ready for him this time. They also had a spare bottle of Kitty’s pills on the X-Jet in case of emergencies. She took one pill and swallowed it. She then shrank down to her tall height. For her it was better than being gigantic.
The team then went onto the X-Jet and went on their way back to the X-Mansion for a little ret and relaxation. Kitty went up to her room and she lay on her bed. It was still a little too small for her.
“Note to self tell the Professor to get me a new bed,” thought Kitty. “What a day I actually saved the world from Apocalypse. Oh well the Ultimates do it all the time.”
She then turned on her TV. She was hoping that she had gotten back in time for her favourite soap. To her delight it was on. She lay down as Duncan asked Jane to the dance. For her this was the life.
Then she got a telepathic message from jean to come down to the dining room. Kitty got off her bed and went down there. She saw that the X-Men were having a little party to celebrate their victory.
Kitty had a little sod as everyone had some excitement. Colossus gave her a little food that he had made and it tasted delicious.

Will anything happen at this party?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Party after

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
As the party went on nothing out of the ordinary happened. Everyone had a good time and quite a lot of alcohol was consumed by everyone. Even the ones that were under aged.
When the party was over Kitty helped tidy up a little and then she went to bed. She still couldn't believe everything that had happened that day and she still a little bit of fun.
So she shrank herself to the size of a doll. Then she lay on her bed and looked over how big everything seemed now. This made her smile a little and she even jumped on the mattress.
Eventually she grew back to her relative normal size. She made herself as tall as the doorframe. This made her giggle a little. She thought about all the things she could do at this height. She could probably play basketball or volleyball. That would be nice for her but she knew that she had to sue her powers responsibly. She didn't want to be like the Brotherhood who used their powers for their own advantages.
Kitty shrank down to her normal size and she got into her bed clothes. After that she went under the quilt and she slowly went to sleep. But there was more danger to come for our giantess super heroine.
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: In Kitty's room

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
A few weeks later Kitty went to see Dr King and Manuel a little more. Dr King told her that he was working on something that would help her increase her size at will so she didn’t have to depend on the pills. He was near completion and she helped rebuild his lab a little more.
Her relationship with Colossus had also gone from strength to strength. She knew that they couldn’t be a couple because he was the other way. But that didn’t stop them from being best friends. Kitty wasn’t a homophobic and Peter (Colossus) wasn’t a racist against the Jews.
The pair went to see a few movies together. But they had to sit at the backseats since they were both above average height. They didn't mind at least on the back row you have a full view of the screen and you didn't have to tilt your head.
Kitty had also been practicing more with her phasing powers. She was able to phase full the X-Jet and all the cargo on it. This would exhaust her but it showed that she was becoming more powerful.
We see Kitty downstairs in the main lobby. Xavier was expecting some new students to come and she had been assigned to meet them. She had handouts and she was to give them a tour of the mansion. Except the lower levels of course.

Does anything happen?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Guide

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
We see Kitty giving a tour of the mansion to the guests of the open. Day some of them had a little neck strain from having to look up at her all of the time. She just smiled at them.
“This is the dormitories,” said Kitty. “Each student has their own room which they can do with as they like. Each one has a TV, CD player and plenty of space for belongings.”
The visitors then took a quick look inside the dormitory and one even took a picture of it. Then the tour continued downstairs and out into the gardens.
“The school also has sports facilities,” said Kitty. “Students can play a whole range of games. Including, Football, Basketball, Baseball, Tennis, swimming, soccer and many other sports. They will have hours of fun out here playing with other students.”
Then suddenly everything seemed to go dark. It was like night time but it was only 2 o’clock in the afternoon. Kitty looked up and she couldn’t see the sun anymore.
“And that concludes our tour. We hope to be seeing you again soon.”
The guests then quickly left as she ran inside to see the other X-Men they were watching something on the news.
“What’s going on?”
“That’s what we want to find out,” replied Scott.
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Blackout

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
The X-Men watched the news as the reports of the sun block out was being televised everywhere. There was mass hysteria throughout the world. People were even starting to blame mutants for the blackout.
“I can’t believe that they’re blaming mutants for this,” said Kitty.
“Hush Kitty,” snapped Professor X.
They watched the TV but there was no word on how the sun was being blocked. So the X-Men went down to the Subbasement and they went onto their computers. They began to scan for anything in the local space of Earth.
They picked up what seemed to be a large dish. It seemed positioned to block out the sun’s light and heat. They didn’t know what to do next. They couldn’t travel that far into space.
“What can we do?” asked Cyclops.
“Nothing yet,” replied the Professor. “All we can do is wait for whoever put it there to contact the world.”
“Who could have put it there?”
“I’m not too sure.”
“Wait Professor I my know someone who can help,” replied Kitty.

Who is this friend?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Dish

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
"If you're talking about Dr King and Manuel you won't have much luck," said Wolverine. "Those guys turned you into a giant."
"Well it was a little my fault," replied Kitty. "But it was an accident. They've helped me before and I'm sure that they'll help us now."
"Ok we'll give them a shot," said Cyclops. "But if they can't help us Shadowcat then we'll have to take other measures."
"Yeah sure that should be fine."
The X-Men then got into the X-Jet and they went to the lab of Dr King. They were just playing on a soccer game on their games console when the X-Men came. They turned around and saw them.
"What are you doing here?" asked Dr King.
"Just look outside," replied Storm.
"Why is there a meteor coming to Earth or something. Or are the sea people coming to conquer the world?"
"No there's a giant dish blocking out the sun."
"Oh I knew that."
"Can you help us in anyway?"
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Dr King and Manuel

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
"Yeah I'm sure that we have something that can help," said Dr King. "It's around here somewhere. Now we just have to find it."
"What exactly is it that we need?” replied Kitty.
"I'm not too sure. I'll know it when I see it."
Dr King, Manuel and the X-Men went around looking for whatever it was that could help them. They kept showing things to Dr King that they thought was useful. But he shook his head at all of them.
But eventually they found what they were looking for. It seemed to be some sort of ray gun.
"That's it," said Dr King. "This'll help you."
"What is it?" asked Cyclops.
"It's a shrink ray."
"What you had a shrink ray this whole time? Why didn't you use it on Kitty?"
"Because it only works on Non-organic things. It would shrink her clothes but not Kitty herself."
"Ok that's alright as long as you're working on a permanent cure."
"There's something that I have to warn you about that thing. You have to get close to the dish to shrink it."
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Shrink ray

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
The X-Men went back to the Mansion to upgrade the X-Jet so it could achieve space travel. This would be difficult at best but they were able to upgrade the X-Jet. They took a look at the jet.
“So you think this thing can go into space?” asked Wolverine.
“Yes it should do but unfortunately we don’t have anytime to test it,” replied Cyclops. “The longer the suns out the more the people will panic. And chances are they’ll blame mutants.”
“That sucks we had nothing to do with it,” said Shadowcat.
“I know but they’ll use mutants as scapegoats.”
The X-Men soon boarded the X-Jet and they went into outer space. They turned on the artificial gravity so everyone stayed where they were suppose to be. They all looked outside and they couldn't believe that they were actually in outer space. This was almost too good to be true.
They soon reached the dish that was blocking out the sun's rays. They equipped the shrink ray into the X-Jet's cannons and they fired at the cannon. They were happy to see it shrink until it was the size of a toy. But something was bugging the X-Men. Who put it there?

When will they find out?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Shrink the dish

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
The X-Men decided to just go back to Earth while the going was good. They had averted what could have been a potential disaster. But they still were a little edgy about who put it there question.
But meanwhile in an alien ship not too far away they had seen the X-Men take out the dish. They were both surprised and curious. We can only see a screen the aliens are looking at it.
"Hmm those earthlings seemed to be able to take out our dish," said a voice. "Looks like there won't be an artic region for our zoo."
"But it wasn't a total loss," replied another voice.
"We can't afford another dish."
"But I think that we found some new attractions for our zoo. Send a team to pick these earthlings called the X-Men."
Back on Earth the X-Men had landed and were just getting a bite to eat. Kitty shrank to a few inches so she didn't take up much food. Plus it meant that there was enough cake to make her the happiest girl in the world. The X-men eventually lifted up a glass of soda.
"Here's to everyone for saving the world," said Cyclops.
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Zoo

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
The X-Men then began to drink their soda. It was sweet and everyone enjoyed it. But Kitty was a little uneasy. She just had a funny feeling inside and she didn't know where it was coming from. She was then approached by Colossus.
"Are you alright Katya?" asked Colossus.
"Not really I feel strange," replied Kitty.
"Is it anything to do with your powers?"
"No at least I don't think so. Who put that dish there?"
"I don't know Magneto. Maybe even Doctor Doom."
"But if it was one of them they would have said something about it. But no one did."
"Maybe it was just something to annoy us."
"Maybe."
"Now relax Katya and enjoy the celebration."
Kitty then stood up and started to celebrate with Colossus. She grew until she was eye level with him. This would make it easier.
But unknown to the X-Men there were alien ships coming down around the mansion. They had a cloaking device so they were completely undetectable. Now the X-Men will be in trouble.

Can the X-Men escape?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Kitty is uneasy

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
Then the lights went out. The X-Men didn’t know what happened at first but then they could hear some of the members cry out and then nothing. Storm used some small lightning to make some light. Cyclops, Jean Grey and Iceman were all gone.
“What the hell’s happening?” asked Kitty.
“Something just grabbed the others,” replied Storm.
Then Kitty increased her size to 8 feet. “Try taking us then.”
Just then they heard a cry from Colossus and he disappeared. Wolverine started to sniff around. He was picking up scents but none of them were human. Well except the ones belonging to the X-Men.
“What is it Logan?” asked Professor X.
“Whatever it is it ain’t human,” replied Wolverine.
Then they heard a cry from Rogue and she disappeared.
“Oh my God it’s picking us off one by one,” said Kitty.
Then she felt something hard hit the back of her head. She fell unconscious and she landed hard on the ground.
When kitty woke up she seemed to be in some sort of kitchen. She looked around and everything seemed to be normal. There was no ceiling. She looked up and saw alien faces looking down at her.
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Captured

choices: Kitty finds a weak spot in her cell
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
The aliens were huge and they had green skin. She had a collar around her neck. She tried to grow but it didn't work. She even tried to phase through the wall but it didn't work.
"Hmm seems that this animal desires to be free," said one of the aliens.
"Yes she will make a great exhibition," replied the other alien.
"Hey let me out of here you over grown monsters!" shouted Kitty.
"Oh we're not huge we just used your own powers to make you small. Now be good or else you won't be fed today."
"You can't do this I have rights."
"Not here. You're just an animal."
They then walked away. Kitty just sat down and was left alone with her thoughts. She cried a little and then she saw the aliens come back. They put some food through the top and she caught it all. It seemed to be Earth food and she quickly ate it all up.
Litty took a look out of her glass cell and she saw the other X-Men. They were all normal size and they had the same collars on as she did. They seemed to be trapped here forever.

What happens next?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Kitty in a tiny cell

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
Just then Kitty saw a family come. They were the same as the aliens but there was definitely a mother, father, son and daughter. They looked at Kitty inside and they had a form of camera inside.
"Wow look at the tiny Earth Creature Mom," said the Young boy.
"Thankfully it's the only tiny one," replied the Mother. "Now just take a picture of it and let's go."
They then took a picture of Kitty. The film came out as a moving picture and Kitty stared at it in amazement. She hadn't seen anything like this before.
The family then moved on and Kitty just sat in her cage. She was given some food and she ate it. Although it tasted like crap she was very hungry. She saw the other X-Men as well but like her none of them had their powers. She just sat there and cried a little. She didn't want to be in this cell any longer. But there seemed to be no way out.
"Come on Kitty think," she thought. "How can I get out of here? There’s gotta be some way. I'm not being trapped in here all of my life." She then saw what seemed to be another one of the aliens. But this one seemed to be the janitor. "There was a farmer who had a dog and Bingo was his name-o."
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Picture

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
Kitty then called over the Janitor by pretending to be starving. She was rolling around holding her stomach. She was happy that she got his attention and she still acted.
"What's wrong?" he asked.
"I wasn't given enough food and I'm starving," replied Kitty.
"I don't know I'm not suppose to feed the animals."
"But you don't want one of their star attractions to die on your shift."
"Ok you win just wait right here."
The Janitor then went away and Kitty sat there and waited for him to come back with the food. When he did he gave it to Kitty and she began to eat it. But she was feeling her collar.
"You know it's really uncomfortable eating this with my collar on," said Kitty. "You wouldn't mind just taking it off while I eat this?"
The Janitor then took off Kitty's collar with a tiny key. She then grew to 10 feet tall. She broke out of her cage and she knocked him unconscious she took the keys off him.
"Thank you for that now to free the others."

Will she be able to free the others?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Escape

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
The first X-man she went to was Colossus. She tried to break open his restraints but if he couldn't do it in metal form then there would be no chance of her doing it. Instead she phased Colossus out of the restraints. He was able to stand back up.
"Thanks you Katya," said Colossus.
"Can you help me free the others?" replied Kitty.
They both go around and free the other X-Men. Wolverine was in a cage that was also made out of Adamantium. He couldn't cut through it. But Kitty was able to use her phasing powers to get him out.
Eventually all the X-Men were free besides Professor X. But now that Cyclops was out he was telling the other X-Men what needed doing.
"Ok team we need to find the Professor before we can get out of here," said Cyclops. "We'll split into groups of two. Jean you're with me. Storm you go with Wolverine, Ice-Man you’re teaming up with Rogue and Shadowcat you look with Colossus."
The team then split up into their pairs. Kitty was happy that she was with Colossus.
"Ok where do we look first?" she asked.
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Freedom to the X-Men

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
"We need to go somewhere where the aliens would put the Professor," said Colossus.
"But where would that be?" replied Kitty.
"Somewhere that would block his powers and put him in view to the public."
