"See if you're like that he'll like you more." Kitty then felt a warmth feeling throughout her body. "Oh crap. She then sprouted up about 3 inches. She was thankful that it wasn't a big growth spurt. "I'm taller."
"You're getting worse."
"What am I suppose to do?

What does she do?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Lockheed likes Wolverine

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
Kitty then took a few deep breaths and she tried to relax herself a minute. She was fighting back tears.
"The worst thing I can do now is panic," said Kitty.
"You're right," replied Wolverine. "Panicking isn't going to make the situation any better. If anything it'll make it worse."
"So what do I do?"
"Well I can ask Chuck if there's anywhere we can go to help you. Maybe there's some kind of planet or something."
"Yes that's it."
Wolvrine then went to Professor X to see if there was anywhere to go so that they could find a cure for Kitty. Xavier went to one of the ship's computers and he began to type it into the computer. He got a result.
"Hmm seems there is a planet with technology great enough cure Kitty of her growing condition," said Professor X.
"So lets go," replied Wolverine.
"I'm afraid it's not that easy. The planet has had a civil war for centuries. They're extremely hostile to foreigners."
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Planet

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
"But if it can help Kitty then it's worth it," said Wolverine.
"Yes it is," replied Professor X. "But it might be extremely difficult to get the locals to agree to help us."
"If they don't help us willing." Wolverine then popped out his claws. "I know another way to convince them."
"No harm will come to them."
The ship then began to land on the planet. The X-Men were expecting the worst. But Kitty was just in her room having fun with Lockheed. He seemed to be very good at playing catch.
"That's a good Lockheed," said Kitty. "Who loves you?" He then pointed to her. "That's right I love you."
The pair then hugged but then Colossus came in. He had a small smile on his face and he was greeted with a hug from Kitty.
"What's up Pete?" asked Kitty.
"We've found a way to help you," replied Colossus.
"You have?"
"Yes."

What happens when they land?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Landing

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
The ship slowly came down to land on a field. The X-Men were about to get off the ship but then it was attacked. They were fired upon by some of the local species here. the X-Men didn't dare go outside or else they would be hit.
"What do we do Profesor?" asked Cyclops.
"Leave it to me," replied Professor X.
He then used his mind powers and all the attacks stayed still everyone was amazed with what had just happened.
"What did you do Professor?"
"I merely stopped them for now. but we msut hurry. Kitty's condition is getting worse by the moment.
The X-men went to the nearest settlement. They were being watched by the locals but none of them tried to do anything to them. But they saw a huge building right in the centre and they guessed that was where their leader was.
Lockheed was nervous and he stayed in Kitty's arms. He was too scared to leave her and he was stroked by her.
"Don't worry I won't let anything bad happen to you," said Kitty. She then saw someone staring at her.
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Attack

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
It seemed to be a boy staring at her. She tried to smile at him so that he didn't need to be nervous. But when she did he turned around and run away. She was a little sad that she had scared him away.
But eventually the X-Men entered the building. They were led by some guards to a special room. They saw someone sitting on a large chair. He seemed to be the person in charge of the planet.
"State your business here," he said.
"We have come here to seek a cure," replied Professor X.
"For what?"
"One of my students is suffering from irregular growth spurts due to an unknown contamination. We have reason to believe that you can help her."
"Why would I want to do that?"
"We will offer you anything you want."
"Anything you say. There is something in mind."
"May I remind you that I will not engage in anything can bring any of my students great harm."
"Don't it only involves your student who needs to cure."

What does he want?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Help

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
"Will any harm come to her?" asked Professor X.
"Hopefully not?" replied the Leader. "Bring her to me."
Kitty then stepped forward. he liked what he saw in her. He rubbed his hands a little in glee and he looked at her.
"State your name," he said.
"Kitty Pryde," replied Kitty.
"So Kitty Pryde tell me what is wrong with you?"
"I've been exposed to something and now I'm growing. I need your help before I get too big to fit onto the ship."
"And what will you give in exchange for a cure."
"Whatever you want."
"Your hand in marriage."
"What?" Kitty was a little off with what had just happened. "Did you say that you wanted to marry me?"
"Yes in exchange for a cure you will have to marry me. You can be normal and live in luxury. Or you can carry on growing until there isn't enough oxygen for you to breathe. Your choice."

What does she say?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: hand in marriage?

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
Kitty thought about it for a minute. She kept going over all of he possibilities in her head but she couldn't find any other way around it. She held out her hand to him as a sign of her agreement.
"I reluctantly accept," said Kitty.
"Good you have made a wise decision," replied the Leader. "We will be married tomorrow. Your friends are more then welcome to attend."
"That would be nice."
"Now my servants will help you pick out some nice clothes to wear."
"Do you think I sould be cured first?"
"What for?"
"Well whatever clothes they pick out for me I would have grown out of them by the morning."
"Hmm you have a point."
"So will I be cured?"
"Of course you will. I am a man of my word."
"Good."
"Now go with my servants."
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Accept

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
Kitty then went away with the servants. She was a little nervous but she hoped that the leader was a man of his word. But the next thing she knew she was in the lab. She made sure Lockheed was alright on her shoulders.
"Are you the King's future wife?" asked one of the Workers.
"I guess so," replied Kitty.
"Good we have been informed of your arrival. So can you just step inside this chamber please?" Kitty looked and saw a large chamber.
"Is that thing safe?"
"Sure it is."
"Well alright."
Kitty then put Lockheed on the ground and she walked into the chamber. She sat down and waited. Thsi reminded her of when she was first given the Pym particles and becoming a giant in the first place.
She then felt some radiation hit her body. She wasn't sure what to do. But she just sat there and hoped for the best.
"Well here goes everything," she said to herself. But then she began to feel very light headed.

What happens next?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Chamber

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
She then saw everything grow around her. She stood up and she saw herself shrink abck to normal size. She soon walked out of the chamber and everyone was looking at her. They didn't know what to say.
"I'm cured," said Kitty. She then concentrated and she grew a little. Then she concentrated again and she shrank. "I can still change my size."
"His highness will be pleased," replied a Doctor.
"Thank you for everything."
Meanwhile the X-Men were taken to some special guest rooms. Each one was fit for royalty. They couldn't get over what different items were in there. Each one must have been worth a fortune.
"If I was a thief I'd be in heaven," said Wolverine.
"Thankfully we're not here to steal anything," replied Professor X. "Besides if we did steal anything then we wouldn't be veyr good guests."
"I don't trust that guy."
"Logan you don't trust anyone," replied Rogue.
"I've got good reason not to. I've trusted people before and a vast majority of them have stabbed me in the back."
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Cured

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
Not too long ago in another room a few of the servants were getting Kitty fitted with a wedding dress. It was a green dress that only went to the upper part of her thighs and it was very revealing.
“What kind of wedding dress is this?” asked Kitty.
“Our traditional wedding dress,” replied a Servant.
“The ones on my home planet are a little less revealing.”
“Well this is what our leader has commanded.”
“Very well.”
A few minutes later Kitty looked at herself in the mirror. She did a little twirl and she liked what she saw.
“What do you think?” asked the Servant.
“It suits me,” replied Kitty.
“I knew it would.”
“When is the wedding?”
“Dawn tomorrow.”
“That’s a little early.”
“It’s a tradition.”

Will she go through with the wedding?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Preperations

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
Kitty was soon sent to a bedroom to rest up for the next morning. Lockheed was with her and they looked around. She was amazed by the size and the luxury of this one room. She lay on a huge double bed.
"This room is fit for a Queen," said Kitty. "Problem is that tomorrow I will be a Queen and I'll never be able to go back to Earth."
This saddened her a little and she shed a tear. But Lockheed flew into her arms and brushed himself on her.
"Nice try."
Just then the door opened and a servant came in. He had a tray with a glass of fine wine on it.
"This is for you," he said.
"What is it?" replied Kitty.
"A very fine wine."
"I don't drink. I'm too young."
"That does not matter."
"Well alright."
She then began to drink the wine.
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Fit for a Queen

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
The morning soon came and Kitty was woken up very early. She was still groggy from not getting too much sleep. She was woken by some servant and she snapped at them a little. She didn’t like getting up early.
“What the hell are you doing?” asked Kitty.
“We are sorry to wake you up like this,” replied the Servant. “But it’s almost time for your wedding.”
“Crap is it dawn already?”
“Yes our leader is eagerly awaiting you.”
“Ok I’m up.”
Kitty was soon up and the Servants began to wash her even though she could have easily done it herself. She then put on her wedding dress. She looked at herself in the mirror a little.
“Does this dress make my butt look big?” asked Kitty.
“Not at all your butt is a perfect size,” replied the Servant.
“You’re not just saying that?”
“No not at all you look fabulous.”
“Good.”

Is everyone else ready?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Morning wedding

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
An hour later everyone was seated waiting for the Bride to come. The Leader of the planet was waiting at some alien alter. He was waiting for his new bride to come down to him.
“She better show,” he said.
Just then he saw Kitty walking down the isle. Lockheed was following her and he was carrying the end of Kitty’s dress. Everyone thought that she looked very nice in the outfit. But she had butterflies in her stomach.
“I can do this I can do this,” she said to herself.
She eventually reached the Alter. There was a man standing behind it. He seemed to be some kind of Vicar.
“Ladies and Gentlemen we are here today to see the Bonding of this young couple,” he said with a loud voice.
“Hurry it up please,” said the Leader.
“Of course sir. Do you Kitty take this man to be your lawfully wedded husband? To care him in his times of need.”
“I I,” replied Kitty.
“Go on.”
“I…”
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Ready

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
“Spit it out,” said the Leader.
“I. I...” replied Kitty.
“If you’re not going to go through with this then I can easily.” He then stopped in mid-sentence. He felt a sharp pain in his chest and then he lost the feeling in the left side of his body. “Help me.”
He then fell to the ground and a few of the guests went to his aid. They tried to revive him but he wasn’t waking up. They performed CPR but nothing seemed to be working. They then stood up and looked at him.
“He’s dead,” said a guest.
“Oh my God,” replied Kitty.
“I guess the marriage is off.”
A few days later the X-Men were preparing to leave the planet. The inhabitants let them go since Kitty was going to keep her end of the bargain. They just let them go. Kitty was a little sad about what had happened. But she was also relieved that she didn’t have to marry him.
“Are you alright Kitty?” asked Colossus.
“Yeah I’ll be fine.”

Is hse?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Heart attack

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
But deep down Kitty was not fine. Although she was relieved that she had gotten out of the wedding she was still sad about her husband to be dying. She shed a tear for him before going on the ship.
In minutes the ship was up and it continued its route towards Earth. Kitty tried to make herself feel better by playing with Lockheed. He was flying through the ship and she tried to catch him. The rules were that she couldn’t use any of her powers. That meant she could phase through anything or change her size.
“I’m going to catch you,” she said.
As Lockheed flew Kitty almost grabbed him. But eventually he got to an area with a high ceiling and he flew up high. He went beyond Kitty’s reach and she looked up and frowned a little.
“Hey that’s cheating. Guess that means I can cheat.”
She then concentrated and she began to grow. She waited until she was big enough and she grabbed him. She gave him a smile.
“Got you.”
Kitty then slowly shrank down to her normal size and she gave him a little hug. Then she walked into her room.
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Not fine

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
“You always make me feel happier,” said Kitty. But then she gave out a sigh. “But right now I can’t help but feel sad.” Lockheed then began to rub his head on her in a sign of understanding. She stroked him back. “Although I really didn’t want to marry him I still feel bad. He didn’t deserve to die.”
“No he did not,” replied a Voice.
Kitty looked and saw Colossus at her doorway. He was standing and she was very surprised to see him.
“Colossus,” she said.
“I am sorry to ease drop you like that,” replied Colossus. “But you know I hate seeing you all upset.”
“I know but when people die it makes me sad.”
“I know. Most people do not deserve to die. But everyone does die. No one is immortal I’m afraid.”
“But he was young. He even helped me.”
“He forced you into something you didn’t want to do.”
“I admit his choices were a little off. But deep down I know he was a good person. I think I might have been happy with him.”

What will they do?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: I know I know

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
“Come on Kitty,” said Colossus. “Come with me I know something that’ll make you happy.” He had a little smile.
“What is it?” replied Kitty.
“It’s a surprise.”
Colossus then walked away and kitty followed him. They went into a room and he told her to stand in this large chamber. She was a little confused at first but she still went inside. No sooner had she done this she felt herself lift off the ground. There was no gravity and she was floating.
“Hey what’s happening?” she asked.
“It’s an anti gravity chamber I found,” replied Colossus.
“It’s wonderful.”
“I knew you’d enjoy it.”
“Come in.”
“I’ll be in a few minutes.”
Kitty floated for a few minutes. But then she felt herself fall to the ground. She could feel herself getting heavier.
“What’s happening?”
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Gravity of the situation

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
Kitty could feel herself getting heavier. She was struggling to move her body. She could tell that the gravity of the room was getting greater. She tried to lift her head but it was too heavy for her.
“What’s happening Colossus?” asked Kitty.
“The gravity is increasing in the room,” replied Colossus. “I’m doing everything I can to return it to normal.”
“Hurry before I’m crushed to death.”
“Phase yourself through the ground.”
“Oh yeah.” She then tried to phase herself through the ground. But she couldn’t until the gravity was restored to a safe level. “It’s not working.”
Colossus then saw a dial on a control pad. He turned it to the left and inside Kitty felt herself getting lighter. She slowly began to stand up and eventually she felt normal again. She gave out a sigh of relief.
“Thank God,” she said.
“Are you alright Kitty?” asked Colossus.
“Yes thank you.”
“Good.”

What does she do?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: back to normal

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
Kitty then slowly phased through the ground. She landed softly in what seemed to be a kitchen. She didn’t realise that the anti-gravity room had been directly above it. She then felt her stomach rumbling.
“Guess I didn’t know how hungry I was,” she said.
She then went into one of the cupboards and she picked out what seemed to cookies. She couldn’t believe that she had found them. She didn’t even know that aliens had cookies like these.
She opened the pack and she took out a few of them. She found them to be delicious and she couldn’t stop eating them.
“Hey Kitty you shouldn’t be eating all those,” said a female voice. Kitty turned around and saw Jean. “Those go straight to your thighs.”
“Hi Jean,” replied Kitty.
“Where did you get those from?”
“I found them.”
“Strange I looked in here earlier and I didn’t see those. Where exactly did you find those cookies?”
“In there.”
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Phases through the ground

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
“How far are we away from home?” asked Kitty.
“Still quite a way,” replied Jean.
“Oh.”
“Don’t worry hopefully it won’t be too long. Let’s just hope we don’t have to make anymore stops.”
“But it’s nice to see the universe.”
“I know but when you want to get home we can’t really stop. But I’m sure we’re going the right direction.”
“You mean we’ve been flying blind?”
“Of course not. But if we’re not careful we might go off course and end up in a solar system that we have no idea about.”
“Is there anyway we could pick up the pace?”
“We’re already going as fast as the ship can go safely. Any faster and we could risk exploding or ripping apart.”
“Too bad Magneto isn’t here.”
“Don’t say things like that.” Jean was horrified. “He’d probably try and kill us in a heartbeat.”

What happens?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Don't joke around

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
“You know Jean I was thinking the X-Men haven’t really sat down for a proper meal for a while,” said Kitty.
“Yes,” replied Jean.
“Maybe we should make a dinner and everyone sits down and eats it. It would be a nice change from fighting for our lives.”
“That sounds like a great idea. But who’s going to cook it all?”
“We could a Pryde and Grey accomplishment.”
“You’re making it sound like running a marathon.”
“Do you think we should do it?”
“Yes I would do it.”
“Then could you tell me what everyone would like to eat?”
“How?”
“With your telepathy of course.”
“Kitty you know I don’t go into people’s minds without permission. Maybe you should try the old fashion way and just ask them.”
“Yeah you’re right.” Kitty then began to walk away. “I’ll see you in a minute. But right now I’ve got work to do.”
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Idea

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
A few hours later the X-Men were called into a dining area. They weren’t sure what was happening. All they knew was that Jean had contacted them all and told them to come immediately. They thought there was trouble.
But when they got inside instead they saw a lot of food on the table. Most of them weren’t sure what was happening. But then they saw both Jean and Kitty smiling at them and they soon realised what this was all about.
“Dinner is served,” said Kitty.
The X-Men were surprised but they did sit down at the table and they began to eat their meals. It tasted good and they carried on eating. Lockheed flew onto Kitty shoulder and she gave him some food.
“There you go Lockheed.”
“This is delicious,” replied the Professor.
“Thanks Professor.”
“What did you put in this?”
“Something I found under the ship?”
“You’re lying Kitty.”
“Trade secret.”

is the secret ingredient disgusting?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Dinner

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
Kitty was thinking about the secret ingredient in her head. But she knew that Professor X wouldn’t mind probe her without permission. He would find that immoral. But the secret ingredient was a little salt. That was it.
When the meal was eaten the X-Men began to help wash it all up… This didn’t take long since it was a team effort. But then they heard an alarm go of. This made them all go to the bridge.
“What’s that alarm for?” asked Storm.
“For when we get close to anything dangerous,” replied Professor X.
“What’s the hell’s happening?” asked Wolverine.
“I’m not sure.”
“I think I know,” replied Jean.
They looked outside and they could see a black hole. The ship seemed to be going towards it at a fast speed.
“We need to turn this ship around and fast,” said Professor X.
They then got to the ship’s controls and they began to pull away. But the gravitational pull was very strong.
“We’re not going to make it,” said the Ice-Man.
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Trouble

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
“Yes we are,” said Wolverine.
“This ship has to have powerful engines to make it reach speeds,” replied Cyclops. “It has to be able to get us out of the gravitational pull.”
“Just shut up and do it Slim.”
The ship was moving at full speed away from the black hole. It seemed to be working since the ship seemed to be getting a little further away. But then Cyclops noticed that it was burning out the fuel at a dangerous rate.
“We need to break away and fast,” said Cyclops.
“Maybe there’s something I can do that can help,” replied Kitty.
“No offence but what can you do?”
“Just take me to the cargo hold.”
“Guess whatever you have in mind is worth a try.”
Kitty was quickly taken to the cargo bay where she grew as large as she could in the there. She then put her hands on the ground.
“Ok this might feel weird,” she said.
She then used her phasing powers. This made the entire ship and everything in it immune to the gravitational pull.

Has this done it?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Kitty's idea

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
The ship was phasing through the gravity pulling it towards the black hole. It began to fly away until it was at a safe distance. Kitty was getting a little tired at this point and she couldn’t keep it up for much longer.
When the ship was at a safe distance Kitty almost collapsed. She lay down on the ground and she quickly returned to her normal size. The X-Men quickly went into the cargo bay where she was. They now considered Kitty a true hero. She had saved their lives because none of them could surely have survived in a black hole. But she slowly picked herself back up.
“Did I do it?” asked Kitty.
“You sure did,” replied Jean. “You saved us all.”
“It was nothing.”
“It was more then nothing Kitty,” replied the Professor. “You have proven that you’re more then able to handle life or death situations. I am also grateful for you saving us. Maybe we could have a drink.”
“Alcohol?”
“Not until you’re 21.”
“Damn.”
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Heroine

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
Kitty then gave out a yawn. She didn’t realise how tired she was until she yawned. She looked at the X-Men.
“If you don’t mind I think I’ll go to bed early tonight,” said Kitty. “Saving you guys really pooped me out.”
“Sure Kitty,” replied Professor X.
“Thanks guys.”
Kitty then walked away and she went to her quarters. Lockheed followed her and landed on her shoulder. She gently stroked him and he cooed a little. This made Kitty smile and if she had the energy she would have hugged him.
“Guess you’ll be sleeping with me tonight,” she said. He then cooed a little more. “I guess you like that.”
Kitty then got into some nightclothes and she lay down on her bed. Lockheed flew onto the end of the bed. Kitty put a small blanket over him so that he would be warm if it got any colder.
“Goodnight Lockheed,” said Kitty.
She then lay down on the bed and she slowly went to sleep. She was nice and warm under her quilt.

Who will wake up first?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Tired

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
A few hours later Kitty was awoken by the sound a coo. She slowly opened her eyes and saw Lockheed right by her head. She smiled a little and she sat up. She stroked him a little and he cooed again.
“Hi Lockheed,” said Kitty. “You miss me?”
Lockheed then flew above her and did some tricks. This made her feel a little happier and she clapped her hands.
“Very good. I wonder how smart you are.”
Then Kitty got out of bed and Lockheed slowly landed on her shoulders. She stroked him again and she walked to her door. She yawned a little as she went to open it. but for some reason she couldn’t open it.
“Strange,” she thought.
She then phased through the door and she expected to see someone. But things were deadly quiet. She looked around a little.
“Guys?”
She looked around a little more but she couldn’t see anyone. She was beginning to get very worried.
“Guys?”
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Guys?

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
Kitty searched the entire ship for a while but she could still find no sign of the other X-Men. At first she thought it was a joke. But when she still couldn’t see them she began to get very worried.
“Guys where are you?” asked Kitty.
But there still didn’t seem to do anything. This made her feel a little scared. But she had to keep her fear under control. All she could do was hope that she would find her friends very soon.
“Lockheed can you see if you can find them?” asked Kitty.
“Coo,” replied Lockheed.
“Thank you.”
Lockheed then began to fly around looking for the X-Men. Kitty also continued her search. But no one seemed to be around at first. Every moment that the X-Men weren’t found made Kitty more and more worried.
Eventually Lockheed returned to Kitty and she hoped that he had found something of the missing X-Men.
“Found anything?” she asked. But he just shook his head and Kitty gave out a small sigh. She felt helpless.

Where are they?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: No sign

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
Kitty went to the ship’s computers. She began to type in a few things and she hoped that it would give her a few answers.
“Computer acknowledge,” said Kitty.
“What is the question?” replied the Computer.
“How where are the X-Men?”
“Does not compute. Try a different question.”
“Ok how many life forms are on this ship?”
“Computing.” She waited for a moment. “There are currently two life forms on this ship. Is there another question you’d like to ask?”
“Am I included in that list?”
“Yes you and another life form inside this room. Besides that this ship is completely empty.”
“How is that possible?”
“Does not compute?”
“Ok when did the life form list drop?”
“Roughly two hours ago.”
“Thank you.”
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Empty

choices: Goes out and tries to find them
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
“Great I’m on my own in this ship?” asked Kitty.
“Affirmative,” replied the Computer.
“And do you have any of them on a camera?”
“Negative the system had been shut down temporarily.”
“Who by?”
“An unauthorised user.”
“Who?”
“Does not compute.”
“Great!”
Kitty then walked away from the computer knowing that she couldn’t get anymore answers from it. She was a little disappointed about this. But Lockheed flew to her and landed on her shoulder.
“Guess we better look for them,” said Kitty.
She then went to the controls and they seemed very complex to her. She was a little confused about what to do.

What does Kitty do?
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Nothing

1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.content:
Kitty thought all she could. But she couldn’t seem to think of a way to find the X-Men. But then she began to get a little angry. She looked at the computer once more and she knew what she was going to do.
“Computer can you locate the X-Men outside the ship?” asked Kitty.
“Affirmative,” replied the Computer.
“Then show me where they are outside the ship.”
“Affirmative.” A few seconds past. “The X-Men are located one million miles away from the ship.”
“Can you take me to them?”
“Affirmative.”
“Then do it.”
“Affirmative.”
“Thank you.”
The ship then began to move very fast towards where the X-Men were located. She was almost overcome by the sheer speed of the ship. She was gripped in her seat by the G-forces.
“Slow down,” she said.
1422212111211211111221111121211212111211.title: Find them

1422212111212.content:
Before Spider-man could catch up with her Kitty walked away from the warehouse. She needed time to get her head straight. She walks down the street when something catches her eye. She could see a group of teenage boys beating up a weaker boy. Now we go from their point of view.
As of yet these boys didn't notice the almost 60 foot Kitty. The one being beaten up was one of those typical high school nerd. The other three were those types who would take out those who were weaker. The one wearing the cap seemed to be the ring leader.
"How does it feel to be a loser?" said the guy in the cap.
"Why are you doing this to me?" asked the Nerd.
"Because you're a nerd."
"Please someone help me."
"No one's coming."
Then Kitty picks up the guy in the red cap. She gives him an angry stare.
"There's nothing I hate more than a bully," said Kitty. "Why are you doing this to that poor boy?" The guy in the cap just stares at her. "Well answer me."
"Oh well you see. He's a nerd."
"So you're telling me you're picking on him because he's different."
"Yes that's basically it."
Kitty just stares a him thinking about what she was about to say. "Oh I think I'll just bash your head in because you're smaller than me. You'd like that wouldn't you?"
"No no please anything but that," he begged.
"Now you know how he feels." She turns her head to the other two boys. And that goes for the rest of you." She then puts him back on the ground. "Now beat it."
Faster than a speeding bullet the teenagers ran away. This left their victim still sitting on the floor staring at the colossal Kitty. She noticed this so she gently picked him up and he sat in the palm of her hand.
"Hello little guy," said Kitty. He just stares at her. "It's alright I won't hurt you."
"Thank you for saving me," he said.
"No biggie really. I'm just glad you're alright. Would you like a lift home?"

What does the teen say?
1422212111212.title: Kitty Hates Bullies

choices: I need to find a way to get small again

"Yes please," said the teenager.
"Ok where do you live?" asked Kitty.
He has a look to see if he could see his house.
"That one," he said pointing to his house.
"You mean the one over there," replied Kitty pointing to the same house.
"Yes that's the one."
"Ok I'll get you there in no time." She starts to walk towards the teen's house. "Oh yeah you haven't told me your name."
"Oh sorry. My name Charles."
"Strange I know someone else with the same name. I'm Kitty by the way."
"I thought I recognized you. You're one of the X-Men."
"What I'm famous or something?"
"Yeah I've seen you on TV you're dating Spider-Man."

"Wow I've been saved by a celebrity."

"Ok see ya."
Kitty walks away and goes out of the city. then she realises something.
14222121112121.title: Home

choices: Drives away as fast as he could
142221211121212.content:
"Hey what's wrong with being big?" thought Kitty. "I was an outcast anywhere slow now I'm no different. I can help a lot more people with my new size." Then she notices people starting to gather around her feet. "I've got to get out of the city before I hurt anyone."
Kitty makes her way out of the city and into a rural area where not many people lived. There she sat on a hill.
"So what do I do now? So Miss biggest person who ever lived what do you do with your new found power that will benefit people?" Then she notices a farmer trying to get his tractor out of a ditch. "That's perfect for now."
From the farmer's point of view. He was just doing his days work when he got his tractor stuck in a ditch.
"Who put that there?" he asked. He repeatedly tried to get his tractor out of the ditch but it was no use. "Oh crap what am I gonna tell the wife." Then he sees Kitty walking over to him. "Jesus Christ Pose." When she got to him she knelt down.
"Need any help getting you tractor out of that ditch?" asked Kitty.
"Well yeah," replied the farmer cautiously.
"Then let me help you." She effortlessly picks up the tractor with one hand. It seemed like a toy to her. She placed it back on the ground outside the ditch. "There you go."

What does the farmer do?
142221211121212.title: Ditch

1422212111212122.content:
The farmer turns his tractor in a 180 and went as fast as it could. The farmer was screaming in terror. This made Kitty sad. She just sat down and started to cry.
"Why did he run?" she asked herself. "I wasn't going to hurt him."
She continued to cry. After a few minutes she notices a man walking by her feet. He was a scruffy looking guy about average height
"Hey there Queen Kong," he said.
"Please no tall jokes."
"What's wrong?"
"I'm huge and everyone runs away from me even if I help them."
"Not everybody's run away from you. I'm not running away from you."
"Yeah why aren't you?"
"I know I'm in no danger. And it looks like you need someone to talk to."
Then Kitty picks up the man and brings him to her eye level.
"May I say you have beautiful brown eyes," he said.
"Thanks but you haven't told me your name," replied Kitty.
"My name is Duane. And I know you you're Kitty Pryde of the X-Men. Your code-name is Shadowcat"
"Yeah that's me. But they may as well call me Giant Girl now but they'd probably sue me for copyright."
1422212111212122.title: Copyright

Then suddenly Kitty noticed a little girl standing by her feet. This girl didn't look like any normal girl. She had blue skin and white hair.
"Hello," said Kitty.
The little blue girl just stood there and stared at her.
"Are you alright?" asked Duane.
The little girl still stood there. Then out of now where a gun appeared in her hand. The little girl fired at Duane and he disappeared. Then she shot Kitty. She tried to phase through it but there was something about it.
The next moment Kitty and Duane woke up they were in two seperate glass domes. It had been clear that they had been kidnapped. She tried to phase her way through the glass but she still couldn't. Then suddenly the little girl came up but to them she was huge.
"I am sorry that I had to do that," she said. "But I would not have done it if my reasons were dire."

"It is alright you shall become full size again once you leave the dome. But me and my planet needs your help."
"Why should I help you after you kidnapped me and Duane?"
"Please I beg you. You're the only one who can help us."
"Ok what's wrong?"
"My planet is..."

They go deep into the jungle

"Being invaded by the Sycorax," said the Little Girl. "They came to our peaceful planet and took over. Only a small few are left to fight them off. But we are out numbered and out gunned. They have technology greater than ours."
"Why do you need me?" asked Kitty.
"We needed two meta humans to help us."
"But I'm the only one with powers."

"What?"
"I like you am a mutant."
"What's your power?"
"I can absorb any type of radiation and turn it into waves of pure power."
"Why didn't you tell me?"
"You never asked."
Then suddenly the spaceship lands on a moon. There was a breathable atmosphere and only a quarter of Earth's gravity. There was water and vegetation there. The little girl took them both off the ship and breaks Duane's glass.He then returns to normal size. But Kitty was still in her's.
"Hey what about me?" asked Kitty.

What happens next?

The little girl led Duane and Kitty (Who was still in her dome) into a secret underground base. The ceiling was pretty high but there was no chance Kitty could have fitted in. The little girl took them to the command room where their leader was waiting for them.
"Ah Hitan I see you bought our guests," said the Leader.
"Yes I have like you commanded," replied Hitan.
He has a good look at Duane and then he sees that Kitty was still in her dome.
"Why is that Earth girl still in the dome?"
"We couldn't let her out she's 1,763 bycrons tall."

"9 zintis."
"Why did you ask that?" asked Kitty.
"If you're in there for too long you stay that size even if you're released."
"How long do I have?"
"Another 2 and a half zinits. To you that would be 1 Earth hour."

"If we're quick no."

Duane quickly took Kitty onto one of the ships and they went on their way to the planet. They journey nearly took an hour. Just as soon as they landed on the planet Duane got out with Kitty and smashed her dome on the ground. Kitty is free. And she waits to see if she would grow.
1422212111212122111.title: 1,765 bycrons tall

To Duane and Kitty's delight she started to grow. In a couple of seconds she was back to just under 60 feet tall.
"Wow that's better," said Kitty. "I thought I was going to be 3 inches tall for the rest of my life."

"Yeah but I'm glad to be out of that dome. I thought I was gonna suffocate."
"Just the way I feel when I'm in my Gran's car."

"Ok Kitty and Duane we want you to stay here," he said.
"What?" replied Kitty and Duane.

"Come on there's another reason as well isn't there?" said Duane
"Yes we don't want Kitty to step on any of our troops."
"Oh I haven't been more insulted in my entire life," said Kitty.

Then the army turn towards the power plant and start to march towards it. Then they see an army of Sycorax.

What happens to the good army?

The army marched towars the Sycorax. The Sycora had a very distinct appearence. They were the height of an average human. Excapt they had bone alround therir heads excpet where the eyes and mouth was. They were stronger than the average human. They were a race of warriors and were armed to the teeth.

1422212111212122111121121.content:
When Kitty opened her eyes she was in a strange room. It looked like a lab. She noticed she was chained to the ground. Also she had some strange collar around her neck. But most importantly she was stark naked.
"Hey where am I?" asked Kitty. "Where's Duane and where's my clothes?"
Then suddenly she is approached by a Sycorax scientist. He starts to talk to her. But she could understand him.
"I'm sorry I don't understand a word you're saying."
Then he walks to her ear and puts some sort of device in it.
"Now can you understand me?" he asked.
"Yes but how?"
"A simple translator device."
"Where am I"
"You're in our labs."
"Where's Duane?"
"That's none of your concern Earthling."
"And where's my clothes?"
"We needed them to help create the same fabric."
Why am I even talking to you? I can just phase myself free." She then tries to phase herself out of the chains but she couldn't. "What gives?"
"We found that little X-Gene in your body. That collar you're wearing is blocking out your petty powers. And if you try to remove it. It will explode and everyone else who's wearing a similar collar will also explode. And thanks to you. We are creating a super army. Using your D.N.A we are creating clones of you. They are ten times your size and each one could take out an entire army.
"If you have all this then why are you keeping me alive?"
"You won't make a good soldier so you'll make a good slave instead. Take her to the Wanto region."
Then she saw that she was on something with wheels. It went towards a ship. She went into the ship into a large roon. Then her chains came off by themselves. She then walked to the walls. She tried punching them but they were made of a metal similar to Adamantium. Then she notices a parachute, two large pieces of wood, two large straps and eight bolts. She realised that the Sycorax had left them for her to make clothes. She used the parachute to make a dress. But it barely able to covered her hips and breasts. She used the other things to make very basic sandal like shoes.

In 5 minutes the journey was over. When they handed the hangar door opened and a Sycorax entered.
"Get out," he ordered.

"No get out. Or do you want another shock?"
"Ok I'm leaving but when I'm free you're going to be the first person I'm going to crush."
She walked out of the hangar. She found herself in some sort of farming field. There were other slaves worked. But on the edge of the field was a great forest.

Kitty had no choice but to follow orders. All she could think of was finding Duane, defeating the Sycorax and finding a way back home. The trees were about 30 feet tall. They only came up to her hips. She tried to pull one out. It came out easily. She was surprised with her strength. By our proportions her strength was incalculable. She was possible stronger than the Hulk. She continued to pull out the trees until she heard a bell.

Kitty saw other slaves running into a building. She followed them but she was too big to fit in. She could smell food.
"Must be lunch time," said Kitty. "I'm so hungry I could eat a horse. Come to think about it I could probably could."
She sat down by the building. Eventually somebody came outside with ten meals for her. But she didn'trecognize the food. It was all slimy and disgusting. She had no choice but to eat it. After that she felt sick. But she was still hungry.
"Hey I need more food," she said.

"No I want more food."
"Have it your way." The Sycorax activates the collar and it electrocutes Kitty. After that she stood up.
"Ok I'm going."
She goes back to the edge of the field to pull out some more trees. At the rate she was pulling them out the forest would be gone in hours. But she kept thinking. What had happened to Duane?

Meanwhile back at the power station. Duane was just waking up from the stuff he had been injected with. He saw that he was in some sort of dome. But it was different from the other one. He stayed the same size. And it contained some sort of strange radiation. His body was absorbing it like a sponge. Then he saw a Sycorax.
"You alien b*****d!" shouted Duane. "Where am I?"

Then suddenly he saw in side a chamber. It opened. It was Kitty. Well a clone of Kitty. But she was normal sized. She was naked. When she stepped out of the chamber she then almost immediately grew to 600 feet tall.
"Where am I?" she asked.

Another SYcorax got a gun and shot the clone in the neck with some sort of mind control device. And with that the clone calmed down.
"That's better."

"This is not the Kitty Pryde you know. Merely a clone. The first of thousands."
"What an army."
"That and much more."

Back with Kitty she was still pulling out the trees. Then she saw that it was getting dark. Then there was the same ring as earlier.
"That's it for today," said a voice. "Everyone retire to their quarter."
Kitty was confused. She didn't have anywhere to go. There was nowhere big enough to house her. After a while a Sycorax approached her.
"Where am I gonna sleep?" she asked.
"Here," replied the Sycorax.
"But it's getting cold and I think it's gonna rain."

When the Sycorax left it started to rain. She shivered. But there was nothing she could do. She had to cry herself to sleep.
14222121112121221111211211111.title: Crying herself to sleep

The next morning Kitty had a rude awakening. She was woken by a Sycorax. As she was getting up she noticed something. There seemed to be someone standing behind him. But all she could see was a foot. A gigantic foot. Kitty stood up and looked up. To her horror it was one of her gigantic clones.
"What is that?" asked Kitty.
"Basically it's you," said the Sycorax. "But improved."
"But why is she here?"
"For added security my dear. If you somehow get out of your collar and go on a rampage there is no one here who could stop you until now."
Then Kitty's clone picks her up. Kitty is scared out of her mind. This is the first time she's felt really small to someone.
"So who would win?" asked the Sycorax. "The 60 foot original. Or the 600 foot clone with all the implants that makes her almost invincible?"
"You know your place little one," said the clone. "I suggest you stay there."
She lowered Kitty to a safe height and then threw her to the floor. This bruised her ribs badly.
"Now get back to work slave."
Kitty goes away to do her work.

What is her work?

Kitty had to go and help construct a building. Well it was more like another dormitry for the slaves. She had to be like a crane. But even when the building was complete it wouldn't be big enough to house her. She was being constantly watched by her clone.
"Ok what do I need to do?" asked Kitty.
The building was being made by slaves. Some of them had nearly fainted at the sight of her. But she assured them that she was a gentle giantess.
"We need you to lift some of the metal beams to the guys on top," replied one of the slaves.
She did what she was told. She liked working with slaves. These guys might not have been human. But they were a lot nicer that the Sycorax was to her. In there eyes Kitty was the best thing that could have happened for them. And they had a plan for her.

"Not quite you have to help us. Yeah we could free ourselves and cause a riot. But they'll just send in the army and crush us. But you. You can take out entire armies. And you're the only one who can take out your clone."
"But have you seen the size of her. I couldn't get that big even if I wanted to."
"We have taken that into consideration. But we...

Kitty stands up and looks around. In the darkness she was just able to see a tall building about 2 miles away. "Oh yeah I see it."

Kitty kept going through the idea in her head. She would target the command post. There she could shut it down and free the other slaves. But she knew that wouldn't be easy. When she got there the complex went into red alert. Cannons started to fire at her. But she just phased through them.
"Could you do my back?" she asked sarcastically. "I've been under a lot of stress lately."
The Sycorax saw their efforts were futile. They ran for their lives abandoning the command centre.

She climbed up the complex until she was at the main command post. There she phased her giant hand right through the control devices. With that all the collars around the slave's neck came off. They were free.
Then Kitty made sure that no one was in the building. Then she destroyed it.

The next morning at the dormitories the slaves were celebrating with Kitty.
"You freed us," one said.

Then suddenly her clone walked up to her and picked her up. She bought Kitty level with her eyes.

What does the clone say?

She raises Kitty to the back of her neck. When she got there she saw a small black dot on the back of the clone's neck. She figured that it was the device. She phased it out. Then her clone picks her up and brings her back to eye level.

"Yes and no really."

142221211121212211112112111111212121.title: Crush

1422212111212122111121121111112121211.content:
The journey to the main command centre of the Sycorax took many hours. For Kitty it would have taken her days but she was being carried by her clone who was ten times taller. So the journey only took a tenth of the time.
When they got there they saw the complex was bigger than the other. The security was upgraded. Kitty knew that it was going to be hard.
"What do we do now?" asked the Clone.
"It's best if we took out their power source first. They're nothing without power."
"Ok sounds like a plan."
"Where is the power source?"
"It's underground for defensive reasons. For normal people we would need to dig. But for us we just need to phase through the ground."
Kitty and her clone phased through the ground. They then travel to the generator room. But when they got there they were met by not very happy foes.

Who were they?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211.title: Phase through the ground

14222121112121221111211211111121212112.content:
Kitty and her clone were confronted by two more clones. Except these guys still had the mind control device implanted in their necks. They wore identical outfits to Kitty's good clone.
"The escaped prisoner has been located," said Clone 1. "Awaiting additional orders..... Acknowledged. Preparing to capture."
Clone 2 went to grab Kitty. But her good clone stopped Clone 2.
"You're not getting anywhere near her," said the Good Clone.
"Clone 156 has shown hostile activity," said Clone 2. "She will be terminated."
"God those guys are starting to sound like Sentinels," said Kitty.
Then both of Kitty's evil clones went for her good clone. She was forced to put Kitty on the ground.
"Run for your life!" shouted the Good Clone.
Kitty took these words and ran away. Then she came up to the main generators. They were only half her size
"Wow I'm here. I expected them to be bigger. No I'm still big. I've been spending too much time with my clone. She makes me feel small."
Kitty phased her body through the generators. This short circuited them. They practically died.
"That should do it."

Does it?
14222121112121221111211211111121212112.title: The generators

choices: He did it on his own free will
142221211121212211112112111111212121122.content:
Although the generators were down. There was still power in the complex.
"What?" said Kitty. "What's the big deal? There's gotta be back up generators somewhere around here but where?"
She phases up through the ceiling. She checked each floor to see if she could find the generators. Each floor had a 60 foot ceiling so she was fine. Eventually she came up to a floor. She recognised it as the lab that the Sycorax had bought her a couple of days before. She still had terrible memories from then. In rage she destroyed all the equipment so it would never harm anyone again. When she had finished she was terrified with her power. The machines were like small cardboard boxes to her.
She phased up another floor. There she saw a Sycorax.
"YOU! You made me a slave. Because of you this world is in peril. Because of you my friend is dead."
"On the contrary," said the Sycorax. "He is still alive and well."
"I don't believe you."
"See for yourself." Then Duane came out of the shadows. He had cables attached to him.
"Duane," said Kitty. She dropped to her knees "I thought you were dead." Then Duane tried to fire a bolt of energy at Kitty. But she phased through it in time. "What the hell do you think you're doing Duane?"
"I'm not Duane," he replied. "I am Omnipotent."

Why did he attack Kitty?
142221211121212211112112111111212121122.title: Duane found

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Omnipotent fires again at Kitty. But she phases through it.
"Stop that," said Kitty.
"Never," replied Omnipotent.
Kitty gets back on her feet. But when ever she came close he would always use a flash strike to blind her. Then he would hit her with his beams of power. She fell behind him. Then she saw the mind control device on the back of his neck.
"Oh my God you're being controlled." Then she saw her good clone through the window.
"Are you alright in their?" she asked.
"Nothing I can't handle." Then an idea pops into Kitty's head. "Get everyone out of the building."
"Why?"
"I have a plan."
Her clone saw the expression on her face. She went to get everyone out of the building. Then Omnipotent caught her off guard.
"Poor some sugar on me," he sang.
"Come on keep it coming short stuff."
"That insult will be your last." He fires at her again. But she phases through it.
"Is that all you have. I've met stronger people in old folks homes."
"Shut you over grown freak of nature." He tries to blast her again but she phases through it again.
Then her clone went back to the window.
"The building's clear," she said.
"Now get outta here," replied Kitty.
"But what about you?"
"I'll be fine I promise."
"Ok." Kitty's good clone went away from the building with the Sycorax and clones she had rescued from the building.
"Now Omnipotent give me your best shot you little squirt. You should be a red stain at the bottom of my sandal."
And with that Omnipotent let out one blast of power. Kitty was just able to phase through it. the blast completely destroyed the complex. He used all of his energy and he fell unconscious. Although Kitty was 600 feet up in the air she used her powers to slowly lower herself and Duane to the ground. She had him in the palm of her hand. When she reached the ground she phased the mind control device out of Duane's neck. Then she hugged him.
"You're safe now my little guy," said Kitty. "My special little guy." She then gives him a little kiss.
Just then she was approached by her clone.

What happens?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: The complex destroyed

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Then Kitty' clone fell over. Kitty had to phase through her so she didn't get hurt.
"What's wrong?" asked Kitty.
"I can tell you," said a voice. A Sycorax came out from behind her. "She's dying."
"Why is she dying. TELL ME OR I'LL KILL YOU WHERE YOU STAND."
"There's nothing you can do. This happened with previous clones. The process is only temporary. Every cell in her body is dying."
"How long does she have?"
"Seconds."
"Hey are you alright?" Kitty asked her clone.
"Yeah I'm fine I just feel a little weak," replied the Clone.
"You'll be fine." A tear start to develop in Kitty's eye. "You'll be fine."
Then her clone died. Then her body disintegrated. In rage she put the unconscious Duane to one side. Then she picked up the Sycorax and started to squeeze him.
"I'M GONNA KILL YOU."
"What will that solve? She isn't coming back."
Kitty continued to squeeze. Then she released her grip and she broke down and cried. Then out of the sky the rebel forces ship came down and landed on the ground. The leader left the ship with a medic. The medic rushed to Duane.
"Is he?" asked The Leader.
"Dead," replied the Medic. "No he's just tired."
Then the Leader went to Kitty.
"Are you alright?"
"No I'm not I just lost my friend."
"I'm sorry now give me the Sycorax." Kitty handed him the Sycorax. "Good job you'll be hailed as a heroine for all history."
"Thanks but can you just take me and Duane home?"
"Sure." He gets a device out of his pocket. "Now grab onto Duane." Kitty grabbed Duane. "Goodbye."
He fires a beam at them and Kitty and Duane disappear.

Where are they?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Dying

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content: Which is it?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Which is it?

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
The next moment Kitty found herself on some weird planet. She still had Duane unconscious in her hand. The atmosphere was breathable. There seemed to be everything there that they had on earth. Trees, grass, water that sort of stuff. but the trees had fruit that she didn't recgonise. The animals were of none sh had seen in reality or on TV. She was mythed. Then she heard something behind her. When she looked she saw two human sized aliens. They had red skin and yellow hair. They were riding what seemed to looked like horses.
"What is it?" asked one of the aliens.
"I don't know," replied the other. "It doesn't look like anything I've ever seen before. But could it be one of those monsters from the Sector 7 region."
"I'M NOT A MONSTER!" shouted Kitty.
"If not then what are you?"
"I'm a human. Well a mutant."
"A mutant eh? Are they all your size?"
"No just me. Wait you speak English?"
"We do not speak tis English."
"What then how? Oh wait a minute I'm sill wearing hat Sycorax translator device."
"Wait did you say the Sycorax?"
"Yes I defeated them."
"You defeated the Sycorax?"
"Yes I did with a little help from my little friend here." She then shows them Duane.

What do the Aliens do?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Alien Planet

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
"Wow it's another mutant but smaller," said the one alien.
"You know what we must do," replied the other alien.
"We must take them to the King."
"Follow us."
The aliens on their horse back rode in a certain direction. Kitty stood up and followed them. After a few miles she saw a palace. The doors and ceiling was big enough for her to fit in. She followed them into a throne room. there she saw a man sitting on the throne.
"What have you bought me my subjects," he said.
"We have found these two mutants," replied one of the aliens.
"What are mutants?"
"We do not know sire. That is what they called themselves."
"Very good now leave. You shall be rewarded later."
"Thank you sire."
The two aliens leave the throne room. The king stares at Kitty.
"Now tell me are you the male or female of your species?"
"Female definatly female," replied Kitty.
"And the other one?"
"He is a male. If you don't mind me asking. But what are you gonna do with us?"
"Simple really. You two will be tested in combat against two of my super-powered imperial guards."
"What if we refuse?"
"Then you shall be vaporised."
"Ok it looks like we'll have to do these trials."

Who is tried first?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: To the King

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
"The male will be tested first," said the King.
"But he's unconscious he can't fight," replied Kitty.
"Then wake him up."
"Ok I'll try." Kitty tried everything to wake Duane up from rubbing him to throwing him up and down. But then she realised there was one thing she hadn't tried. She kissed him on the lips (Well as best as a 60 foot giantess can on a normal sized man) That soon woke him up. But when he did he panicked.
"Where the hell am I?" asked Duane.
"Calm down Duane you're alright. And I don't know where we are."
"You are on Infet the jewel of the galaxy," replied the King.
"Who are you?" asked Duane.
"I am the King and it's time for your test."
"What test?"
"You have a test of combat," replied Kitty.
"What do you have one too?"
"Yes but I'm after you."
"Enough chit chat," said the King. "Now time for the trials." He pushed a button. Then they teleported to some sort of space age arena. All the seats were crowed by aliens. They were all shouting. "Bring out two of the Imperial Guards."
Then suddenly two men appeared. On of the had a blue and purple suit. He wore a visor. The other wore light blue and orange suit.
"Let the trial begin," said the King.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Waking Duane

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
"Male," said the King. "You shall battle against Impulse. Female you will face Titan later. Now tell the planet your names so we can engrave it on your grave stones.
"My name is Kitty Pryde," she replied.
"And I am Flash Gordon," replied Duane.
"Your name isn't Flash Gordon."
"Sush I'm in the moment."
"So Flash Gordon are you ready?" asked the King.
"Sure am."
Then the King, Kitty and Titan teleported away. Then the arena changed to an ashy plain. Kitty then found herself in some sort of cell. There was a screen where she could watch Duane.
Meanwhile Duane and Impulse prepared themselves for battle.
"So Flash Gordon are you prepared to die?" asked Impulse.
"Only if you do first."

Does Duane win?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Flash Gordon

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Impulse blasts a ray out of his visor. Duane was just able to dodge the attack.
"Give up Flash Gordon," said Visor. "You can not with stand my might."
"You wanna bet?" replied Duane.
He then fires a blast from his hand and it hits Impulse.
"Blast how'd you do that?"
"It's called mutant powers. And there's plenty more where they cam from." He tries to blast Impulse. But Impulse fires an optic beam from his visor to try and stop Duane's attack. The two were in a power battle. But Duane proved too powerful for Impulse. He took the hit but he wasn't down for the count. He tried to fire an optic blast but he didn't have any power left.
"Damn you to hell." He runs up to Duane and tries to punch him. But Duane ducks and Impulse misses. When he turned around Duane gave him a good old Stone Cold Stunner and that was it for Impulse.
"Game, set and match."
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Duane vs Impluse

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Then the wasteland turned back into the arena. All the aliens were cheering Duane. They chanted Flash. the King was in his private box. Then he pushed a button and Duane disappeared. He reappeared in another cell. He also had a screen so he could watch the next fight.
The King pushed another button and Kitty and the other Imperial Guard appeared in the arena.
"Te next fight will be the mutant named Kitty Pryde against the Imperial Guard Titan," said the King. "Now begin." He pushed another button and the arena turned into a damp swamp.
Kitty looked down at Titan. "Ok I don't want to hurt you," she said.
"That's funny," he replied. Then he grew until he was same height as Kitty. "Becuse I want to hurt you."
The two giants lock hands and try to over power each other.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Kitty vs Titan

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty saw the strain on Titan's face as he was trying to over power her. But she couldn't feel any of his strength.
"Are you even trying?" she asked. She saw the strain increasing in his face. "You are?" Then with only the slightest bit of force she was able to bring Titan to his knees. "I knew I was strong but I didn't know I was this strong."
"Please no more," begged Titan.
Kitty released her iron like grip on him. Meanwhile the King was furious with what he had seen. He then pushed another button. And before she could react a mountain fell on top of Kitty. Duane who was still in his cell was crying. But then the mountain began to move. Everyone stared in amazement as they saw Kitty lifting an entire mountain.
"I can barely feel the weight," said Kitty.
"What are you?" asked Titan.
"I'm just your average 60 foot girl." Then she threw the mountain to one side. "Do you know anywhere to eat? I'm starving."
Titan just stared in amazement. Then he shrank back to normal size. And the swamp turns back into the arena.

What happens next?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Lift a mountain

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
The King couldn't believe it. Never had anyone defeated one of his Imperial Guards. This made him mad. He stood up from his seat and pointed to Kitty.
"My Imperial guards kill her," he commanded. Then twenty Super powered Imperial Guards appeared.
Kitty didn't want to fight. her top priority was finding Duane. She phased through the ground. Then she found herself in the dungeons.
"Duane," she said. "Duane are you here?" There was no reply. She continued to search for him. Eventually she found him in the cell she had been in earlier. "There you are. You had me worried sick."
"Don't worry Kitty I'm fine," replied Duane. "Now can you bust me out of here."
"Sure." She then phases through the wall and grabs him. Then she phases herself back out. "Now we need to get off this crazy planet."
Then suddenly they saw one of the Imperial guards. he had blue skin and a mohican. his costume was mainly red.
"I am Gladiator," he said. "I am the leader of the Imperial Guards. And by orders of the King you must die."
"Well it looks like you won't be doing what the king wants."

Who will win
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Break out

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Gladiator flew at unthinkable speed and punched Kitty. But she didn't feel a thing. He tried several other punches but they all proved ineffective. Under Earth's gravity Gladiator can lift 100 tonnes. But this meant nothing to Kitty. When she punched him he went flying through all the walls. Then out of the building and he flew for miles.
"Wow I must be stronger than I thought," said Kitty.
"Is it me or is am getting sleepy?" asked Duane.
"Yeah I'm getting tired."
"I think I'll just have a lie down."
"That's for the best."
Kitty and Duane lie on the ground and go to sleep. Then several of the King's men go to them wearing gas masks.
"The gas worked," said one of them. "Take them away."

Where are Kitty and Duane taken to?

Kitty and Duane were taken to a lab to be tested on. They had several cables in their bodies that were connected to machines. The machine were doing al sorts of different tests on them.
"Subject name Flash Gordon," said the Computer. "Species Mutant. "Height 6' Weight 200 lbs. Intelligence level 2. Strenght level two. Subject shows large potenial for power rating. Next subject. name Kitty Pryde. Height 59 feet and 11 and 3/4 inches. Weight 74 tonnes and 1,500 lbs. Intellignece level 2. Strength incalculable. In excess of 1,000,000 tonnes. The subject's skeleton is only just able to support her body. Any larger and it would crumble. Analysis complete."
The scientist were amazed at the results.

Who wakes up first?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Analysis

choices: Somehow get on the kings good side
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Slowly Duane started to wake up. He saw Kitty lying beside him. He was strapped down and he started to struggle. The lab scientists tried to restrain him. He had one free hand and he gave Kitty a light blast in the head to wake her up. Fortunately it worked.
"Where am I?" she asked. Then she saw Duane being restrain. "Duane." With almost no effort what so ever Kitty broke out of her restraints. "Leave him alone."
The scientists knew better than to stay. They ran away and out of the lab. Kitty phased out all the cables from her body. Then she did the same for Duane.
"Are you alright?" asked Kitty.
"Yeah I'm fine," replied Duane. "I've just got a bit of a headache."
"Good." Then she grabs him and kisses him. "Because I don't know what I would do if you were killed."
"Well you'd probably tear this place apart in blind fury."
"Ah a little joker. No seriously how are we gonna get off this planet. We don't even know where this planet is."
"I think the only guy who can help us the King. The only problem is that he wants us dead."
"Yeah that's a bummer."
"Well you could use your extreme beauty to lead him into a false sense of security. Nah that'll never work."
"What did you mean use my extreme beauty?"
"Well you are the most desirable woman in the world."
"Thanks but nows not the time for compliments. I'll reward you later. I think we should...
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Freedom

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
"Somehow get on the King's good side," said Kitty.
"But how?" replied Duane. "The dude hates our guts."
"I don't know maybe something will come our way soon." Then she sees that Duane is shivering. "Are you OK?"
"No I'm freezing. I don't know why I just am."
"Here let me warm you up." Kitty then puts Duane in her enormous breasts. "Feeling any warmer?"
"Yes a lot warmer. Thank you."
"Good you should be fine. Just don't move really. Unless you need to."
"Ok."
"Now lets get out of this building. Should I phase through the walls or just knock them down?"
"Phase through them we don't want to be anymore trouble than we're already in."
"Ok that makes sense." Kitty then phases through all the until she was outside. Then she takes in a deep breath. "Argh fresh air."

How do Kitty and Duane get onto the King's good side?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Duane's freezing

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
"Yeah smells that little bit extra sweeter when you're between the breasts of a 60 foot hot chick," replied Duane.
Then suddenly the entire Imperial Guard including the King. They looked like they were ready for battle.
"Now my Imperial guards," said the King. "Kill them."
Then the Imperial guard started to attack Kitty. Duane would try and blast them away. But some got too close. The King stood by the wall. Although Kitty had the strength to move a planet against some of the Imperial guards her strength was as good as useless. The guards had telepaths who were crippling her mind.
Then Impulse fired an optic ray at her. She was just able to phase through it. But it hit the wall and it broke off a big chunk. The chunk was gonna fall on the King. With her last ounce of will power she catches the falling boulder. But the guards continued their attack.
"Stop! She will not be harmed." The guards stopped their attack as their King had commanded. "She saved my life. She and the male deserve to be free. And by law if you save the life of the King he can grant you one wish. It could be riches, power anything."
"Really?" asked Kitty.
"Yes my dear."
"Well I wish we were back home."
"And where is your home?"
"Earth your majesty."
Then he gets out his teleporter. "Then go home." he pushes the button and Kitty and Duane disappear.

Do they go to the right place?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: To save a King

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty and Duane landed on another planet. The planet was covered with forests. When she stood up she was as tall as the trees.
"It kinda looks like Earth," said Duane.
"Well I'm having my doubts," replied Kitty. Then she sees a little bear on the ground by her feet. He was only three feet tall and he had a spear and lever hat. She bends down to take a closer look. "Oh he looks so cute."
"What is he?"
"Ewok," said the bear.
"I think he said he was an Ewok," said Kitty.
"Ewok yes. Come with me."
"Why?"
"Others." he then runs off through the trees.
"I guess we're still in the wrong place. But we should follow him anyway."
Kitty follows the Ewok to a village. There there were many other Ewoks. When they saw Kitty they started to bow to her.
"The Goddess has returned," said the Priest.
"The Goddess," replied Kitty and Duane.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Ewoks

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
"After all this time she has returned to protect us," said the Ewok Priest.
"Wait you think I'm a Goddess?" replied Kitty.
"Not quite yet. You must pass three tests first. A test of Strength, a test of Courage and a test of intelligence."
"Ok you're making some sort of mistake. I may be huge but I'm no Goddess."
"You are like what they said."
"Like who said?"
"Like the father of our race. It is said he would send the Goddess to protect us. And after 5,000 years you have come."
"But I'm not a Goddess. I just wanna get home."
"You have no choice. Since we first saw you we have been preparing the tests."
"Ok I'll do them. As long as you help me and Duane get home."
"We will my Goddess."
"And for the record my name is Kitty."

Will Kitty be able to pass the tests?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Goddess

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
"Follow us Kitty," said the Priest Ewok. He starts to run through the forest. Kitty who was carrying Duane followed the Ewok. Eventually she reached the first test. There was several huge pieces of rock. There were several other Ewoks there. "Ok Kitty first is the test of strength. You must pick up all three of these rocks at the same time. Only the Goddess has the strength to do that."
"Ok replied Kitty. She gently put Duane on the ground. "Now don't get yourself hurt while I'm doing this." She then bends down and picks up the three rocks. The felt weightless to her. Each rock was about 20 feet tall and each weighing in excess of a thousand tons.
"She has lifted the stones of Yavin. Without breaking a sweat."
"If you think that's impressive watch this." She then starts to juggle the rocks. All the Ewoks cheered with excitement. Even the Priest was impressed. After a few minutes she caught the rocks and put them back on the ground. Then she picked up Duane and put him on her shoulder. "Wow that was easy."
"Wow that looked hard," replied Duane.
"Nah it was easy." Then she looks at the Priest Ewok. "Ok what's the next test?"
"The next test will be," said The Priest Ewok. "The test of..."
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Stones of Yavin

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
"Courage," said the Priest Ewok.
"Ok what do I have to do?" replied Kitty.
"First it's best to put your friend back on the ground." Kitty does so. But Duane had a funny feeling about all this. Then the Priest got out a small bottle containing a purple substance. "Now you must drink this."
She takes the bottle out of his hands. It was unbelievable small compared to her. She takes a good look at it. "What is it?"
"A little something that'll help you in your next test."
"Ok as long as it helps." Her fingers were too big to open the bottle so she just puts it in her mouth and swallows it. Then she had a funny feeling run through her body. Then she saw that the trees were getting higher. But then she realised she was sinking. She had lost control of her powers. Eventually she just phased through the ground.
But from everyone else's point of view she was rolling on the ground screaming and holding her head.
"What did you do to her?" asked Duane.
"We gave her our fear serum," replied the Priest Ewok.
"What is she seeing?"
"Who knows. She is facing her own fear. And only if her courage is strong enough she will win."

But will Kitty win?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Fear itself

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
With Kitty's point of view she was falling through the planet. She tried everything she could but she couldn't stop herself falling.
"Oh crap oh crap oh crap," she kept saying to herself. "No I have to be strong. I need to fight it. This isn't real this is all in my head. I'm not falling. I am not afraid." Then she saw that she was nearing the planet's core. "I am not afraid. I am not afraid." She closed her eyes. "I am not afraid. I am not afraid." When she opened her eyes she found herself back on the surface. The Ewoks were around her.
"Looks like you did it," said Duane.
"Did what?"
"You past the test of courage," replied the Priest Ewok. "You have fought and defeated your own fear. Only few beings can do that."
"Great and what was the next test again?"
"Now is the time for the test of Intelligence. Only those who's mind is as strong as their body. Are you ready?"
"Well I guess I am."
"Now you must answer these three question. If you get one wrong you fail the test."
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Kitty pulls through

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
"Ok fire away," said Kitty.
"What reflects but has no reflexion?" asked the Priest Ewok.
"So basically it's something that reflex but you can't see it?"
"Yes Kitty but what is it?"
She sits there for a minute. In her mind she goes to a memory of her and her mother went on a vacation to the alps. they were having fun listening to their echos. that was it.
"Echo. An echo reflex sound but you can't see it."
"Correct kitty. Now the next question. "When you say my name I am gone. What am I?"
"Hmm that's a tough one." She thinks long and hard. But the answer to her came suddenly. "Silence. If you say silence then silence isn't there anymore."
"Very good. Now for the final question. What has four legs in the morning. Two legs in the afternoon and three legs in the evening?"
This one really got her. It could have been an animal she had never heard of. But then it came to her like as ton of bricks. "Man. Four legs when he's a baby. Two when he's a fully grown man. And three when he's an old man. he needs a walking stick that acts as a third leg."
"That is correct." The Priest Ewok and all the other Ewoks bow again. "She has passed all three tests. The Goddess has truly returned. What is your first command O Goddess?"

What is her first command
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Riddles

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
"If you don't mind could you get me some food?" asked Kitty. "I haven't eaten for a while."
"If you want food then you'll get food," replied the Priest Ewok.
Many other Ewoks leave. Kitty puts Duane on her shoulder. A few minutes later the Ewoks were back with food and plenty of it.
"Hmm that looks delicious."
"Nothing is too good for our Goddess. Now eat. And if you need anymore just ask."
"Ok." Kitty started to take the bowls of food out of the Ewok's hands. She began to eat them. She gave a little to Duane. After a few minutes they both had had their fill. "Thank you Ewoks. And you will all be rewarded. Now line up." The Ewoks got in line single file. Then Kitty picked each up one by one and kissed them all. She said thank you to each of them. Funny they seemed more Ewoks than there should have been. Then she realised that some were getting back in line. She didn't mind she just found it humorous.

What is the first Disaster kiity has to try and stop?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Food for a Goddess

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
About a month past. Kitty was still the Ewok's Goddess. They treated her with respect and did everything she told them to do. They even made her a giant throne. She did help improve their quality of life. She built them schools and hospitals. She even introduced them to plays. Duane was still valued highly but he would help the Ewoks work with their daily life. All in all Kitty's arrival was a blessing.
One day she was sitting on her throne. Duane was on her shoulder and she was talking to the Priest Ewok.
"So you see Kitty," he said. "Since your arrival our lives have been getting better and better."
"That's good to hear?" replied Kitty. "And how's library coming along?"
Suddenly another Ewok came running in. it looked like he had just ran a marathon.
"Oh Goddess," said the Ewok.
"Yes what is it?"
"The dam it's about to burst. And if it goes everyone will drown."
Kitty then took Duane off of her shoulder and put him on her throne. "Right I'll be back in a minute."
kitty then picks up the Ewok and he shows her where the dam is. When they got there she saw that it was nearly bursting.

Can she stop it?"
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Dam burst

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty quickly ran to the dam and using very little strength she help it up. It was good for now but she needed a long term solution for the problem. She looked around and came up with an idea.
"Ok Ewoks I need you to cut down about four trees," said Kitty.
"But Goddess," replied an Ewok.
"This is not a matter of discussion. Do it or else I won't be able to move from here."
"Yes Goddess."
A few Ewoks got some saws and started to chop down four trees as Kitty had asked. With great difficulty the rolled it to her. Then she let go of the dam. But before it burst she put the four trees in as support.
"Ok that'll hold it for a minute but I need more trees." She quickly goes into the forrest and using her almost unlimited strength she pulled out many trees.
