She carried them to the dam and started to make a second wall. Many of the other Ewoks helped to fix them together. After a minute it was ready and the dam was secure. She wiped the sweat off her forehead. "Phew that was a close one."
Then the other Ewoks started to cheer. "The Goddess has saved us."
"Please it was nothing I couldn't have done it without you guys."
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Dam secured

choices: A new building in her honour
A crystal statue of her and the others
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Another two months past. Kitty was missing Earth but now she had accepted her new life on this planet. Now the Ewoks were helping her with beauty products. They helped her paint her finger and toe nails. Unfortunately they didn't have the right materials to make her some new clothes but she didn't mind. She liked her self-made dress and sandals. It really bought out her figure. Duane had become a kind of high Priest and the Ewoks respected him. But there was one area where they would not allow her to go yet. At first she was puzzled but she figured they had good reason. One other thing Kitty had done was change the law a little. Instead of a death penalty she changed it to banishment.
One day she was sitting on her throne discussing a new building scheme with the Ewok's chief builder. But then Duane comes in.
"Kitty you must come we have a surprise for you," said Duane.
"Ok," replied Kitty. She then looks at the builder Ewok. "We'll discuss this as soon as I come back I promise."
"Come on the others are waiting." Kitty followed Duane into the forest. When he got to a certain place he stopped. "Just before we keep going I need you to close your eyes."
At first she was unsure. "Ok." She shuts her eyes. "Like this?"
"You got it. Now walk forward ten paces."
"Ok." She walks forward ten paces.
"Ok now open your eyes."

What will Kitty see?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Two months later

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty saw a crystal statue of herself. It was actually size. Every little detail was added. They had crafted Duane onto her shoulder. It also had several Ewoks in her hands and around her feet. At the bottom it said "Kitty the Goddess. A blessing from the Stars." This bought a tear into her eye.
"You guys made this for me?" asked Kitty.
"We sure did," said an Ewok. "Do you like it."
"To tell you the truth no I don't like it." All the Ewoks looked disappointed at her. "I love it." They all began to smile. "You guys are the best. I don't know what to say." A tear ran down her face. It landed on an Ewok completely soaking it. "Oops sorry."
She then looks at the statue in the eye. "It looks just like me. How did you get it so perfect?"
"Well it wasn't easy," replied another Ewok.
"For this statue I declare tomorrow a public holiday. It will be an annual holiday."
"Oh thank you Goddess," said all the Ewoks.
"You're welcome. Now go home, put your feet up and relax."

What will happen next?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Statue

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Another month past. Kitty's popularity with the Ewoks was increasing by the day. She and Duane travelled the planet meeting other Ewoks. She ruled over them all but she wanted to keep in touch with her loyal subjects. She would cycle where she was.
But one day she was told terrible news. She was in the region of the planet where they had mined the crystals to make her statue. But while she was there she was approached by a high ranking officer of the Ewok army.
"Goddess I have terrible news," he said.
"What is it?" replied Kitty.
"The Empire has invaded the planet. They're currently in the Alpin region. They've already killed hundreds of innocent Ewoks."
Kitty feel silent for a few seconds. "Send a messenger. Tell them I want to talk to them."
"As you command ." He goes off again.
The next day Kitty was in the Alpin region of the planet. She had Duane o her shoulder. She saw the army of the Empire. They looked human. they also had walkers with them. Each was nearly as tall as her. But hence the word nearly.

Do the talks go well?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: The Empire Strikes

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Then a man climbed from the control room of the walker to the top of the head. he was a normal sized man.
"Ah you must be this so called Goddess of this planet," he said. "I am General Veers of the Empire."
"Now General Veers," replied Kitty. "I command you to leave this planet."
"Why should we leave. This planet has so much raw materials that it would be a crime not to stay."
"Staying here is a crime. And it is an act of war."
"But if we do have a war I think our army has better technology and fire power than your army."
Kitty was becoming more and more angry. "Leave now or else suffer the consequences."
"No I think we'll stay."
Kitty then turns around. "Goodbye General Veers. Because now there is war between us."
She then walks away. She keeps walking until she gets to an Ewok settlement. She sat down and talked to Duane.
"Was it really the best idea to go to war with them?" asked Duane.
"Those guys left me no choice. Anyway I would probably just phase through all their machinery. that'll shut them down and no one will die."
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Break down in talks

choices: We need to attack the Empire now
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
That night while Kitty and Duane were asleep some Empire troops had sneaked into the village. They had been ordered to capture a certain individual. They moved closer and closer to Kitty who was asleep in her throne. First they made rude jesters at her. Then they see their target in her hand. it was Duane.
They climbed the throne making sure not to wake the sleeping giantess. They went to her hand. Then they gassed Duane so he wouldn't wake up. They carefully opened Kitty's hand. It took all of them to do it but they did it. They grabbed onto Duane and started to take him away. One left a note for her.
The next morning Kitty woke up. Something felt odd. She looked at her hands and Duane was gone. At first she thought it was nothing serious.
"He's probably just getting an early breakfast," thought Kitty. Then she saw something. "What's this?" She sees that it's a letter. She picks it up and reads the small writing. Her eye sight had increased with her size.
It said "We have your friend. Surrender the planet or else he will be killed. You have 24 hours."
Kitty then started to fill up with rage. She stood up from her throne.
"Everyone come here now!" she shouted.
Then all the Ewoks came over to her.

What does she say?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: The Empire takes Duane

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
"Everyone listen now," said Kitty. "The Empire has taken Duane. We must get him back now. If we don't stop them now we can kiss this planet, your homes, your families goodbye. We strike now."
"What do you wish of us oh Goddess," said an Ewok.
"I'm gonna be the first line of attack. I'll take down all the big guns and heavy machinery. You take out the foot soldiers and I'll help you as much as I can. Now follow me."
Kitty walked towards the Empire, the Ewoks followed her as best as they could. The Empire was still stationed in the area they were before.Last time Kitty came here it was for peace. But now it was time for war.
The Ewoks stayed in a part of the woods where they were hidden. Kitty would give them a signal when it was time to strike.
She walked to the area where the Empire was. they could tell she wasn't here to talk so the began to attack her.

Who will win?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Time to strike

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Many of the Imperial walkers started to attack Kitty. She just ran up to them and either used her unlimited strength to take them down. Or she would phase her hand through them so that they would short circuit.
There was other machine walkers that were only 15 feet tall. She would kick them or phase through them. But before she attacked each one she would check if any of them had Duane in them.
Eventually she was left with one walker and a whole platoon of soldiers. She waved her hand in the air and the entire Ewok army emerged from the forest. Although their weapons were primitive compared to that of the Empire they soon got the upper hand.
Kitty went to the last walker and ripped off the top of it. She saw General Veers and an unconscious Duane. She began to panic. She took Duane in one hand and General Veers in another. She turned her head towards him. She was very angry.
"IF YOU'VE AS FAR AS HURT HIM IN ANYWAY" she shouted. "I SWEAR I WILL TAKE GREAT PLEASURE IN KILLING YOU!"
"He''s fine he's fine I surrender."

What does Kitty do with General Veers?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Attack of the 60 foot Kitty and 3 foot Ewoks

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Then Kitty saw several Ewoks gathering around her feet. They were all shouting at her. She could hear them say, "kill him."
"No," she replied. The Ewoks fell silent. "We are not murderers. General Veers I am offering you the chance for your freedom. As long as you never come back to this planet again. Do you uderstand?"
"Yes," he replied Timidly.
Kitty then put Duane back by the Ewoks. Then she picked up a relatively undamaged ship. It was small, only 10 feet long. She puts General Veers in it.
"Goodbye General. Don't come back any time soon."
She then throws it into the air and it was out of sight within seconds. Kitty couldn't believe her own strength. She didn't even throw him that hard.
Then she knelt down and picked up Duanre. She began to hug and kiss him. He began to wake up.
"Wow where am I?" he asked.
"You're safe My Special Little Guy>" Then she turns towards the Ewoks. "And for you guys we'll celebrate tonight.
All the Ewoks Cheered.

Will General Veers come back?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Goodbye General

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
An hour later we see General Veers on a huge ship. He is scared stiff because he needs to go to see his higher.
He goes into a room with a huge window. Waiting for him there was a very tall man wearing all black. He wore a black mask and his voice was disorted.
"You have failed to capture Endor," he said.
"Please Lord Vadar we had unusual resistance," replied General Veers.
"Nothing should stand up against the Empire."
"But the Ewoks have their own ruler. She looks like us except she's huge. And her strength."
"What about her strength?"
"They were off the scale. Also she past through our machines like a ghost. Please don't kill me Lord Vadar."
"Your information is very interesting. You may leave with your life. But we need to go back to Endor. I need to see this giantess of yours General."
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Vadar

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Meanwhile on Endor where Kitty and Duane were it was night. There was a huge celebration over the victory against the Empire. Everyone was singing and dancing. Everyone except Kitty. She was sitting on her throne, she felt that she was too big to dance. She was worried in case she stepped on anyone by mistake.
Duane on the other hand was having the time of his life. He was dancing with several of the Ewoks. But he went over to Kitty.
"Come on Kitty join in," he said.
"I can't."
"Why not?"
"I'll accidentally step on someone. And I don't want that to happen."
"Ok." He then walks in the middle of the dancing Ewoks. "Hey everyone make some space. Because Kitty will be dancing."
These words hit her like a ton of bricks. She watched as everyone made space for her. She saw Duane saying come on. Although she was annoyed, she hadn't danced for a while.
She stood up from her throne and took off her sandals. Then she walked forward and the band began to place music. Kitty then gracefully began to dance. Everyone was pleased with her dance and so she continued all night. The Ewoks began to dance around her face. but everyone was very careful.

When will Vadar strike?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Dance Dance

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
A month past and things were back to normal. Kitty had helped repair the damage done by the Empire. By now she was fully fitted into her Goddess role. She couldn't imagine herself being normal again. If anything had grown biggest it was her heart. Not in her organ but the fact that she cared.
She was just and she would regularly help out. She would only help when her size and phasing ability was the only way to help. Anything else she left to them. The Ewoks respected this and only asked her to help if they really needed it.
Her relationship had grown even stronger. They were now spending every second together and they wouldn't have it any other way. His status as a high Priest gave him respect from the Ewoks and he did not abuse his powers.
Kitty did feel a little homesick. But she knew that the Ewoks needed her a lot more then the X-Men ever did.
But on the edge of a forest in an uninhabited area an Empire ship came down. But only one person left it. That person was Darth Vadar.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Time passes

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Darth Vadar started got on a buggie and he started to drive it through the forest. He was able to dodge all the trees and his destination was the Goddess’' throne.
Meanwhile Kitty was sitting on her throne. Duane was busy doing his duties. She was being visited by child Ewoks. They had all come from a school that Kitty had recently helped built. In one of their classes they all had drew pictures of her. They gave them to her and she looked at them.
"Are these for me?" asked Kitty.
"Yes," replied the Children.
"Well I think they're beautiful. I'll put them on my wall and when I see them I'll always think of you guys."
Kitty then gave each of the children a kiss. But when they had left Darth Vadar came in on his buggie. When he stopped he got off. She could see some danger so she stood up and looked down at him.
"Who are you?" she asked.
"That does not concern you yet," replied Darth Vadar. "Now you're coming with me."
"You are in no position to threaten me little man."
"Are you sure?"

What does Darth Vadar do?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Pictures from children

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Vadar then grabbed one of the young Ewoks that had visited her. He had his hands around his neck like he was gonna snap it.
"HEY!" shouted Kitty. "LEAVE HIM ALONE!"
"I will but you must agree to come with me," replied Vadar.
She was starting to think about her options. She would never forgive herself if the child died because of her. But if she left would the Ewoks be alright? "Ok I'll come just put him down."
"As you wish."
Vadar put the child back and the child ran away. Vadar began to walk away and Kitty had no choice but to follow him. The Ewoks couldn't believe that their Goddess was leaving.
Eventually they get to Vadar's ship. It was big enough to house her. When she got inside they took off. She went to phase her way through the ship but she was already out to the atmosphere so she would have chocked to death.
All she could do was sit and wait for them to land and then she would almost be at the mercy of her captors. The only thing she could hope for was that the Ewoks would somehow rescue her like she had rescued them.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Vadar takes Kitty

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
The ship flies to a space station the size of a small moon. Kitty had never seen anything so huge in her life.
When they landed she was escorted out. She saw hundreds of Storm troopers. She knew that she could take them all out but if she tried anything she knew the Ewoks would pay for it.
She was lead into a room that had some sort of special weight lifting instrument on the ground. She was forced to go over to it.
"What is this?" asked Kitty.
"We are just about to test how strong you are," replied Darth Vadar. "Now lift it."
Kitty then lifted it up. It seemed weightless to her. One of the generals was increasing the weight. But still she felt nothing.
"Does it feel heavy?" asked Darth Vadar.
"No," replied Kitty.
"Increase the weight."
The general then increased the weight to that of a planet but yet she felt nothing. He went to the maximum of the weight of a sun. But she still didn't feel anything. Kitty had become stronger than anyone could imagine. She could move everything in the universe at once and not feel a thing. And she was getting stronger with every passing second.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: The strength of a Goddess

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Meanwhile back on Endor Duane was trying to make a speech to all the Ewoks. He was now the highest ranking person on the planet. But power was not what he wanted.
"Ewoks of Endor I need your attention please," said Duane. The Ewoks has gave him full attention. "Our Goddess has been kidnapped by the evil Empire. I erge you to aid her."
"But we can not help her," said an Ewok.
"Think about all the times she helped you people. She saved you from disatsters, she gave you education. She used her gentle heart to improve your way of life. Refusing to help her now is stabbing her in the back. Now tell me does anyone hate the Goddess Kitty enough to turn their back on her?"
"No," replied the Ewoks.
"Then I suggest we go up to their base and take back what is rightfully ours."
"But how do we do that?" asked another Ewok.
"Believe it or not Ewoks I have a cunning plan. And it involves each and every one of you."
The Ewoks all began to cheer as Duane told them his master plan of freeing his girlfriend and their Goddess.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: I have a cunning plan

choices: Sneak onto a large Empire ship
Find their way up to the Death  star and attack them
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Meanwhile on the Death Star Kitty's test had been completed. They tested her durability that was literally indestructible. Her intelligence was at the genius level. But she wanted to be free and back on Endor. But she knew that if she left the Death Starr she would suffocate instantly. Even a Goddess needs oxygen.
The Empire had even attached a neck device that took away her phasing powers and her impossible strength. They put her in a cell that was only 40 feet high. She was squished into it and for the first time since she had become to Goddess of the Ewoks she cried.
Kitty hoped for a miracle. But she knew that Duane and the Ewoks wouldn't just leave her there to rot. She knew that they would come to rescue her. But she didn't know when they would do. All she could do was sit and wait.
The Empire would let her out from time to time so she could stretch her legs. And with the collar on they were able to pierce her other wise indestructible skin and they took some blood samples. She remembered the last time she had blood taken from her and the results didn't go to her liking.

What is Duane's plan?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Cramped conditions

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Meanwhile on Endor Duane and the Ewoks were putting their plan into action. They sent a transmission to the Death Star offering his surrender. The Empire took the bait and a large ship came and took him away. Ten of the most skilled warrior Ewoks snuck onto the ship as they were flown up to the Death Star. Their objective was to release their Goddess.
Duane was just a decoy. With him in custody the Empire knew about his powers so there would be extra guards around him leaving Kitty's cage vulnerable.
When they got there they used stealth attacks to take out the guards. They took the keys off one of them and opened the cell door with great difficulty. Then they saw their Goddess in there. She was relieved to see them.
"You've come to rescue me," said Kitty.
"Yes my Goddess," replied an Ewok. "Now come we must free the high Priest."
"First can you take off this collar? With this thing on I don't even have the strength to lift you guys up."
The Ewok with the key climbed up Kitty's huge body up to her neck. He used to key to take off the collar and she felt her strength returning.
"Now let's show the Empire what happens when you piss off a Goddess," said Kitty.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Kitty's freedom

choices: They get to the ahngar safely
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty stood up and got out of the cell. She saw soldiers coming towards her. She just kicked them lightly away. But her strength made them go flying.
She picked up the Ewoks that had freed her and she walked towards some doors. She phased herself through them. But the other she ripped off. That’s what she did. One door was phase and the other door was ripping.
Eventually she found the room where they were holding Duane. He was hooked up to a machine and he was in pain.
Kitty was almost in tears at the sight of her boyfriend in pain. She made a huge hole in the room and she entered. The men inside were all unarmed and they were terrified.
"Get out of here before you all become red spots on the bottom of my sandal," commanded Kitty.
They didn't argue with her and they ran out. She then got to her knees and phased all the cables from Duane’s body. She then kissed him and the other Ewoks.
"Thanks you guys for rescuing me. But we need to get out of here."
"The hangar isn’t too far from here," replied the Ewok.
"Which way?"
"That way." He pointed to a certain direction.

What happens?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Escaping

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty picked up the Ewoks and then started her journey to the hangar. She expected it to be easy. But just before they got there Darth Vadar came. He stood on the ground next to Kitty's foot.
"You will not escape from here," said Darth Vadar. "You will die here."
Kitty then kicked him away. "Leave me alone you jerk!" shouted Kitty.
She then continued to the hangar. The Ewoks found a ship big enough to fit the 60 foot Goddess. When they did they then took off. One of the Ewoks knew how to fly a ship and they were soon on their way back to Endor.
Kitty kept thinking about the tests that the Empire had done on her. She couldn't believe how strong they said that she was. But she wanted to use her limitless strength to help people and Ewoks. But now she had a dislike to anyone who had anything to do with the Empire.
When they landed on Endor everyone celebrated as they saw Kitty come back. She sat down on the throne for a nice relaxing.
Through the night there were many celebrations and Kitty thanked the Ewoks for saving her. But soon the challenges would come.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Back on Endor

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
As the weeks rolled by Kitty enjoyed her birthday. The planet held a huge celebration for her and she was thankful to everyone.
She had started to do less for the Ewoks. She didn't do this to be mean but to see if the Ewoks could cope by themselves. If she went away for any reason she wanted to know that the Ewoks could do things for themselves.
The Ewoks respected her judgment and they were able to cope without her help. She still enforced the laws that she had made and she even created the planet's first police squad.
But a new twist was that leaders from other planets had come to do some trading work. The planet had many materials that other planets wanted and they were able to give Endor many things that they needed.
The Ewoks' standard of life had risen higher than anyone could have imagined. And they were all thankful to their Goddess Kitty for all her hard work that she had done.
Amongst the traded items were silk. This made some new clothes for her and the Ewoks. She needed enough to make another toga and she would give the rest to the Ewoks.

An X-Man will come to Endor but which one?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Weeks pass

choices: A tyrant has come to conquer Earth
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
One day in a part of the forest not to far from where Kitty was a portal opened and Cyclops the leader of the X-Men stepped through it. He had intended to come here and he looked around. He couldn't believe that the planet was one big forest.
Just then he was surrounded by Ewoks. They held their spears to him and he didn't attack them. Cyclops wanted to be allies with them rather than their enemy. He couldn't understand a word that they were saying.
The Ewoks were saying that he looked like the High Priest and their Goddess. They decided to take him to their Goddess and they led him to her.
Cyclops couldn't believe his eyes when he saw the 60 foot Kitty sitting on a throne. But she was really glad to see him.
"Scott," she said. She then picked him up and put him at level at her eye level. "It's so good to see you again after all these months."
"How did you get so huge Kitty?" he replied.
"Well I tried to get the perfect body. But as usual it all went wrong. How are the others?"
"Not so good."
"What's wrong with them?"

What's happening on Earth?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Cyclops on Endor

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
"Doctor Doom has launched another plan to take over the World," said Cyclops.
"Who was Doctor Doom now?" replied Kitty.
"He is the enemy of the Fantastic Four and he rules his own country."
"So an ego and megalomaniac."
"He's captured most of the Super-Heroes on Earth but there are a few of us that escaped. And we found that you were here. Please we need your help."
"I don't know Cyclops. I have my duties here. I'm their Goddess and I can't just abandon them."
"Wait you're a Goddess?"
"Yes I am the way off life on this planet has increased dramatically since I came to power."
"You can come back here after you've helped us defeat Doom. We shouldn’t be too long hopefully. This little guys will barely know you were gone."
"Ok Scott you've convinced me." She then stands up and picks up Duane. "Besides I've wanted some action lately." She then shows Cyclops Duane. "Scott this is Duane he's my boyfriend. He's a mutant like me and you and his powers are similar to your bother's."
"Great another Havok."
Kitty just giggled.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Doom's new plan

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty then stood up and she put Scott and Duane onto her shoulder. She faced forwards to the Ewoks.
"Ewoks your Goddess speaks," said Kitty. To herself she was speaking English but to Scott she was speaking the language of the Ewoks. "I deadly threat has arisen on my home planet. I must leave immediately and I will return shortly. But for then you have to get on by without me for a while. And if on the off chance I die then use everything I taught you to live on in peace."
The Ewoks cheered for her and she turned her head to Scott.
"Ok Scott how do we get back to Earth?" she asked.
"Thankfully the portal is a wrist device," replied Scott. He tapped in a few keys and a portal opened big enough for Kitty to walk through. She waved goodbye to her loyal followers and she stepped through it.
On the other side she saw that she was in some kind of underground base. It had some super-heroes that she recognised including some of her fellow X-Men. They were all happy to see her but soon they would have to start planning an attack on Doom. If they left it too long he would become too powerful to stop.

Who is in charge?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Leaving the Ewoks for now

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty saw that General Nick Fury was in charge of the forces against Doom. He was able to gather the heroes who hadn't been corrupted by Doctor Doom. He saw Kitty and he was amazed to see her there.
"Well Miss Pryde we thought you disappeared off the face of the planet," said Nick Fury.
"I did sir," replied Kitty. "And now I'm a Goddess for little intelligent teddy bears."
"That's nice but right now we have bigger things to worry about. Doctor Doom has unlocked the powers of the M'Kraan crystal. It's given him unlimited powers and he's using them to take over the world."
A Holographic image of Doom came up. He was still the same as ever and then a map of Latvaria appeared by him.
"We have located him in his castle in Latvaria. It's got some of the most advanced technology in the world. He could use any one of them."
"How do we get to Latvaria without Doom knowing?" asked Captain America.
"That's where Thor comes in." Nick turns to Thor. "Can you teleport us into his castle?"
"Yes that should be no problem whatsoever."
"Good. Ok team we've got a weapon of our own to fight him."
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Band of heroes

choices: She somehow gets a message to them
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Nick Fury then looked at Kitty. She could tell that he had an idea in his mind to use her for the mission.
"Shadowcat since you're too big to fit into the castle you instead will attack it directly," replied Nick Fury. "This will drive most of Doom's forces away from the heroes. Can you do that?"
"Yeah sure," replied Kitty. "I just hope that everything goes to plan."
"Good. Thor it's best that you teleport Kitty first and then in the confusion teleport the others."
"Yes sir," replied Thor.
He then grabbed Kitty's finger and he used his hammer to teleport her and Duane to Castle Doom. When they got there he teleported back to the others Kitty was a little nervous.
"Do you think this'll work?" asked Duane.
"Don't forget that I have the strength to move planets," replied Kitty. "This should be a piece of cake."
She went to punch the castle but there seemed to be a force field around it. Not even her mighty blows could break it.
"Oh no," she said. "This means he's expecting us. I need to warn the others."

How does she do it?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Castle Doom

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
"How do we do that they'll be inside any minute?" said Duane.
"Remember I am a mutant and like all mutants I have a special power," replied Kitty. She then began to phase her arms through the force field. "Like phasing through almost anything."
"I can't believe that I forgot that."
"Now they should be here any minute and when they come I'll warn them." She then saw a flash of light coming from another one of the rooms. "They're here."
Kitty then went to the outside of the room. She phased her entire body through the force field and she went and crouched down. She saw several of the heroes inside.
"Bad luck guys there was a force field and I couldn't distract them," said Kitty.
"Well that just makes things more fun," replied Wolverine.
The heroes went running through the door. Kitty just sat down and thought for a moment.
"You know I miss those little Ewoks," said Kitty.
"Yeah at first they were annoying but those little guys kinda grow on you," replied Duane.
And if we fail we'll never see them again."
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Warning the heroes

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
"Well in that case we're gonna make sure that the heroes don't lose," said Kitty.
"Got anything in mind?" asked Duane.
"Yeah I got one in particular. There's no point in doing stealth since Doctor Doom already knows that we're here."
"So what are you gonna do?"
Kitty then stood up and ripped off the roof of the castle and she threw it to one side. "Well first off I was going to use my limitless strength to rip off the roof." She then took a look inside. "And now I give the heroes a helping hand."
She saw several Doombots and she started to take them out so that it would be easier for the heroes to get to Doom. In fact she couldn't see Doom at all. She just figured that he was in a lower level that she couldn't get to.
"Let me go and help the others," said Duane. "You're too big to fit in the castle but I can get to them."
"Ok but if you get hurt I'll never live with myself."
Kitty then lowered Duane into the castle and he went away.

Will he get hurt?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: A new attack on the castle

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Duane ran down the stairs to get to where the other heroes were. He encountered many Doombots and he just blasted them. He kept going in hopes of finding the others.
Eventually he finds them. They were just about to go into Doom's throne room when he came. Captain America was the one who was most surprised to see him.
"What are you doing here?" asked Captain America.
"I'm here to help," replied Duane. "Me and Kitty did all that we could and now I'm free to help."
"Ok but be careful Doom is very powerful."
The heroes then burst into the throne room. They see Doom sitting on his throne. He smiled at them.
"It took you heroes long enough to get here," said Doctor Doom. "I've been waiting to send you to hell."
He then activates a device that sends a shockwave. This want through the heroes and they fell to the ground. they were all knocked out but it was very painful.
Kitty heard a scream of pain from Duane and she feared the worse. She stood up and she started to rip the castle apart.
"Doom if you've hurt Duane I swear you will die!" shouted Kitty.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Angry Kitty

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty then started to rip apart the castle. She didn't care what the costs were going to be. She just wanted to make sure Duane and the others were alright. Her unlimited strength made it easy for her to take the place apart. Eventually she sees where Doom and the others were. She saw Duane unconscious on the ground.
"Doom you're dead," said Kitty.
"How dare you disturb me when I am on the verge of becoming a God," replied Doom.
"Guess what on the planet where I live I AM A GODDESS!"
She then picked up Doom and started to tighten the grip in her hand. Doom knew that he wouldn't survive too long if her grip got any tighter. He then used his suit to electrocute Kitty. She dropped him but she was still conscious.
"You think a little electricity will hurt me?" She then put her foot over Doom. "Try it when you're flatter than a pancake."
She went to stomp him but Doom was able to get out of the way. Kitty's usual kind and gentle nature was now somewhere else. She now had vengeance in her heart and no force in the universe could stop her.
She was able to pick up doom again and she went to throw him onto to the ground.
"No stop," said a voice.

Who said that?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Kitty vs Doom

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Just then kitty saw Duane standing up. He was in bad shape but he was still alive. She looked over to him and she was a little confused.
"He is an evil man," said Kitty. "The world would be a lot safer place without him."
"If you truly believe that then kill him."
Kitty then went to throw Doom on the ground but something inside her wouldn't let her do it. She shed a tear and she put the badly beaten Doom on the ground and she cried.
"I can't do it," said Kitty. "I don't kill."
"You would if you truly had no choice," replied Duane. "But not a defeated man like that. You would have been no better than him."
Kitty then picked up Duane and she began to hug him like she never had done before. She was happy that he was alive and that the threat of Doom was over.
Some S.H.I.E.L.D agents then come and pick up Doom. They also tend to the injured super-heroes and they go to Kitty and Duane. It was Nick Fury that confronted them.
"Good work guys I knew that I needed an ace up my sleeve," said Nick Fury.
"Please can we just go back to Endor please?" asked Kitty.
"Sure we've already got the portal waiting for you."
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Kitty doesn't kill

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
A little later we see Kitty and Duane with the other superheroes. The portal back to Endor was open and they were just about to say their goodbyes to everyone. They wanted Doom to be locked up for good for his crimes. But because he was the leader of Latvaria he had diplomatic immunity. This was a little disappointing but the knowledge that he was defeated was good enough.
Kitty has Duane on her shoulder and Cyclops in her hand. She smiled at him and he smiled back.
“Are you sure you need to go Kitty?” asked Cyclops.
“Yes I’m sure,” replied Kitty. “Like Doom I’m a monarch myself. I need to return to Endor who knows what those guys have done in my absence. Send my love to everyone and if they want to visit they can as my honoured guests.”
“Goodbye Kitty.”
“Goodbye Scott.”
She gave him a little kiss and then she put him back on the ground. She then stood up and walked the portal back to Endor. The trip took a few seconds and she eventually landed back on Endor.
“Home sweet home,” said Kitty.

Are the Ewoks alright?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Goodbyes

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty and Duane could see all of the Ewoks. They were thankful none of them had been harmed since they were gone. But there were a few ships in the area. Kitty saw some humans that weren’t from Erath. They were wearing expensive clothes and there were a few of them. There were also other humanoid aliens. They walked over to her.
“Goddess of Endor we have been waiting for your arrival,” said one of the aliens.
“What do you want?” replied Kitty.
“We represent the United Planets. We are here to extend an invitation for you to join our organization. We can trade with you and you can trade with us. Also if your planet is invaded we will come to your aid as you will for us. What is your decision?”
“Well I won’t really be benefiting from anything. It will be the Ewoks that will be benefiting.” She then looks over at the Ewoks. “Ok Ewoks this is what we’ll do. We will have a public vote 7 days from now. It will be you who will decide whether we join this alliance or not. Spread the word.”
Several Ewoks then ran away to tell all the other Ewoks. Kitty then looked at the aliens again.
“I will have an answer for you in seven days.”
“Very well Goddess. We bid you farewell.”
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: United Planets

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Word started to spread about the vote. All adult Ewoks were allowed to vote and the others were allowed to express their views. They looked at both sides of the vote.
On the day of the votes all the Ewoks went to their polling stations in their local area. They were voting in their hundreds and they knew who they were voting for. The voting lasted all day and when it finished they had to be counted by hand (They didn't have computers)
A few days later we see Kitty on her throne she had been handed the official results. There were other Ewoks around her and they were waiting anxiously for the results on the voting. Kitty stood up and everyone still marvelled over her size.
"The results are in," said Kitty. "I will now make it official that the Planet of Endor will be joining the United Planets." The Ewoks then cheered. "Now we just have to contact them."
A few days later the leaders of the United Planets visited Endor. Kitty gave them the go ahead for joining them. The leaders were very pleased and so Kitty signed the paperwork and she knew that Endor would now be a safer place for everyone.
But there was a new threat in deep space that threatened Kitty and the inhabitants of Endor.

What is it?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Joining

choices: He's been run out of his village
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
A few weeks after joining the United Planets things improved even more. The Ewoks were introduced to new races of aliens. They were a little uneasy with them at first but they began to get along eventually.
Kitty relationship with Duane had grown from strength to strength. They were now practically a married couple. But they couldn’t quite have the wedding yet. They were both still a little too young for that kind of commitment.
Now we see Kitty at one of the lakes on Endor. She would sometimes come here and take a swim and it would seem like the burden of being the leader of an entire planet would just melt away. She liked to swim here in private. It wasn’t just because she was alone it was also because she was naked. But an Ewok came to her. He was only a young child. She normally would have been a little mad but because he was only a child she stayed happy.
“Hey there little guy,” said Kitty.
“The Goddess,” he replied. He then bowed down to her.
“Oh please stand up. I hate people bowing at me. Now tell me what do you want?”
“I have a problem.”
“What’s your problem?”

What is the problem?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Swimming

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
“I’m being bullied,” said the Ewok.
Kitty’s expression went from happy to angry. She hated bullies and she was more than willing to help this poor child.
“Who’s bullying you,” replied Kitty.
“He lives near me. He bullies me everyday. And I want it to stop.”
“Well don’t you worry. I’ll sort him out.”
Kitty then got out of the lake and she got changed back into her self made mini dress and sandals. She picked up the Ewok and he led her to where the bully was.
When they got there he was picking on another little Ewok. But he froze in fear as he saw Kitty. He got onto his knees and bowed to her.
“Stand up!” shouted Kitty. He got to his feet but he was shaking like a leaf. “Now I have reason to believe you’re being a bully to other Ewoks. Is this true? And you dare not lie to me.”
“Yes ma’am,” replied the Bully.
"Then you better have a good explanation why. Do you?"
"No ma'am."
"Then leave them alone. I hate bullies more than anything. And I really don't want to hate one of my people."
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Kitty still hates bullies

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
When the bullying issue was finished Kitty gave the Ewoks a little hug and then she went back to her throne. But the news she was going to get was dire.
“My Goddess there are problems at the village south of here,” said a Messenger.
“What is it?” asked Kitty. “And please call me Kitty. Goddess makes me sound like I’m full of myself.”
“Kitty there has been a riot. A small group of Ewoks believe that you shouldn’t rule us. They are attacking villages. Innocent Ewoks are dying Kitty.”
“What? Get the army. You have to stop these Ewoks. Bring them to me alive so they can face judgement for their crimes.”
“Yes Kitty. Right away.”
The messenger then left. Kitty just sat on her throne and she thought to herself. She couldn’t believe that there were actually Ewoks who wanted her out of power. She had never abused it and she always used it to help others.
Then Duane went to her. Kitty picked him up and he gave her a kiss. He was happy but he could tell that Kitty wasn’t.
“What’s wrong?” he asked.
“There’s been riots,” replied Kitty.

What happens?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Riots 100

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty's army went to where the riots were. The rebels were still there. They had weapons and they gave the army a good fight. There was a definite leader to the rebels and he was giving the orders.
Kitty's army almost instantly targeted him. They knew that if he was gone then the others would soon fall. They could only stun the rebels since Kitty had specifically said to keep them alive.
Eventually the leader of the rebels was captured and he was put in chains. he was then taken to Kitty and he spat on her foot when he got close enough.
"You're going to regret doing that," said Kitty.
"I don't care you alien scum," replied the Rebel Leader.
"Why do you hate me so much? Haven't I done everything in my power to make this planet a better place."
"We shouldn't be ruled by an off worlder. Especially a female."
"Sexism gets you no where. You're lucky that I'm kind. If I was a tyrant you would be dead. But instead I'm giving you a fair trial like anyone else. Now you better get yourself a good lawyer."
"You haven't seen the last of me."
"I know. I'll see you in court."
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Rebellion crushed

choices: The Prosecution get the upper hand
The defendant takes an early lead
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
A few days later we see the Rebel Ewok on trial. Kitty was present in the court but she wasn't the judge. As she said it was going to be a fair trial. The jury were Ewoks ho didn't know what had happened and the Judge was the Priest who determined that Kitty was a Goddess.
"The court is now in session," said the Priest Ewok and he slammed his hammer on the table. "First we hear the introduction from the Prosecution."
The Prosecutor stood up. "Thank you your honour. The defendant is here because of the murder of over 100 innocent Ewoks. He upraised against our Goddess who has made this planet a better place to live. This mass murderer doesn't deserve to be free."
"Thank you very much. Now for the defendant."
The Prosecution sat down and the Defendant’s lawyer stood up. "Your honour my client is as guilty as rain. He fought against the Goddess because she has done a terrible job of being our leader. She has accepted the invitation of aliens. She is alien herself and she abandoned us once. My client had every right to raise up against her and the 100 dead Ewoks were a necessary consequence."

What happens in this court?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: The trial

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
“I don’t know Lisa,” said the Doctor. “It’s some kind of dome.”
“What’s it doing out here?” replied Lisa.
“I don’t know but its best we investigate later tonight.”
“Why tonight Daddy?”
“It’ll be cooler and you won’t burn your hand again.”
“Ok daddy.” She then brushed her hair back a little and she walked back to Lisbon.
The journey took a while and Lisa was getting dehydrated. When she got there the Doctor gave her some water and it made her feel better. The pair went to the T.A.R.D.I.S and they relaxed a little.
Lisa took a well deserved bath. She was still amazed by bubbles. She was playing with them for a long time but she noticed her skin was becoming weird. She was worried and she soon got out of the bath. She dried herself off and went to the Doctor.
“Daddy my skin was all weird,” said Lisa.
“Where were you?” replied the Doctor.
“I was in the bath. Am I gonna die Daddy?”
“No you’re going to be fine. It just means that you’ve been in the bath for too long.”
Lisa then gave the Doctor the biggest hug that she could. “Thank you Daddy.”

What will ahppen when they go back?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Lisa's bath

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Sorry that chapter was suppose to be for another story. Here's th real cahpter. From the Doctor.

Both the lawyers provided evidence for and against the defendant. But there was a lot more convincing evidence against the Defendant. Kitty was happy with this. She had done no tampering and so she knew that this Ewok was guilty for treason.
The trial lasted a few days. Things didn’t seem to be going well for Ewok on trial and now it was time for the Jury to come with their decision.
“Have the Jury come to a decision?” asked the Judge.
“We have your honour,” replied one of the Jurors. He then stood up. “We have found the Defendant guilty on all charges.”
The judge then looked at the Ewok who was on trial. He lifted his gravel.
“I sentence you to Banishment from Endor,” said the Judge. “And if you return you will be killed by bounty hunters. You will be jetted off tomorrow.” He then banged his gravel. Court dismiss.
This was a good result for Kitty. She didn’t have to worry about him killing anyone. He was allowed his right of free speech. But when he came to action then he had to be taken down. But the Ewok wasn’t very happy about this.
“You over-grown bitch!” he shouted. “I swear I will have my revenge and I shall rule this planet!”
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Guilty

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
The Ewok was then loaded onto a rocket and was given food. The co-ordinates were set to another planet which had life on it so he would be alright. Everyone watched as the ship blasted off into space. Kitty was happy to see him go.
"Now that he's out of the way no more innocent Ewoks will be slaughtered," said Kitty. "Now let's relax a little.
A few days later we see Kitty with some children. It was a field trip and they were honored to see their Goddess. They couldn't believe how nice she was and power hadn't corrupted her.
She was standing up and she had the children in her hands and they were in the forests.
"Ok are there anything you want to ask me?" asked Kitty.
"Where did you come from?" replied one of the Children.
"I'm from the Planet Earth. It’s a beautiful planet and I miss it."
"Is everyone there as big as you?"
"No I'm the only one. I wanted a perfect body so I went to this scientist. Except I think he used too much of the things that made me bigger so it made me like this."
"Wow."

Will that Ewok be back?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Exiled

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
A little later we see Kitty about to tuck into some dinner. She had the best food on the entire planet. But she wanted everyone to have the food. But it was very rare and reserved for only the most important people on the planet. And unfortunately for her she was the most important person on Endor.
Meanwhile on a distant planet we see the outcasted Ewok on a desert planet. He was struggling to get water and he was close to collapsing. He blamed Kitty for all of his troubles. He wanted revenge on her so badly it nearly hurt him.
But then he saw a shadowed figure and a bony hand reached out to him.
“Come with me and you will live,” said the Voice.
The Ewok held onto the hand and he disappeared.
Back on Endor Kitty had just finished her meal and already Ewoks were taking her oversized plate away. She wanted to do it herself but they didn’t want her to.
“Really I can do it myself,” said Kitty.
“No your Highness you must stay seated,” replied One of the Priests.
“Ok but I feel bad you guys doing all the work and I’m just sitting here.”
“It is our pleasure.”
“Ok you win.”
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: He'll be back

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
A little later we see Kitty looking at the crystal statue the Ewoks had made for her. She looked at the writing on the bottom and it said "Actual size." She smiled a little and then she felt something tapping her giant foot. She looked down and saw Duane. She then bent down and picked him up.
"So Mighty Goddess," said Duane. "What are you doing out here?"
"I was just thinking," replied Kitty. "Once I watched an episode of Futurama. Bender the Robot became a God for these tiny people. He learned something about being a God."
"What's that?"
"If a God does too much then their worshippers are utterly dependent on him or her. But if they do too little then their worshipers lose faith in them. And I'm afraid that I'm doing too much. If I had to leave for a long time then what would they do? If they would be attacked they would be too reliant on my protection."
"Don't beat yourself up. They love you here you're like the greatest thing to come to them. I know you're no Super-Woman and you can't do everything."
"Sometimes they expect me to do everything for them."
"Well maybe you should give them training or something."

What does Kitty think about that idea?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: A Goddess with her thoughts

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
"You know Duane that's a great idea," said Kitty. "If we can train them to be able to hold off an entire army by themselves if I ever had to leave this planet at least I'll know that they're safe."
"When do you want to start it?" replied Duane.
"Well as soon as I can. But not too soon I want the Ewoks to be prepared for it. I can't just bring it on all of a sudden and expect them to go along with it quietly."
The next day we see Kitty sitting on her throne. She had all of the major Ewoks around her. This included Priests and military leaders. She began to tell them about her idea.
"Ok I’ve brought you all here today to bring in a new act," said Kitty. "I'm worried that if I was to go away for a given length of time I want to be sure that you guys can defend yourself. That's why I'm introducing the military act of 2008. One member of each family must be trained in the army for period of 3 months."
"Do you know what you ask?" asked one of the Generals.
"Yes I do it'll come into power as of the first day of next year. That'll give everyone enough time to prepare themselves."
"Very well your highness."
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Military act of 2008

choices: The rebel Ewok returns with an army
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
The three months came and went and the act came into power. A lot of Ewoks were forced to train in the army for a certain amount of time. Some Ewoks weren’t very happy but they knew that it had to be done and their Goddess meant well. She wanted the planet to be peaceful but she also wanted to make sure they could defend themselves if they were attacked by outside forces.
We see Kitty sitting on her throne. She was just having some lunch and she was also watching a military training exercise. She was happy with what she was seeing.
"Looks like everything's going well," said Kitty. "Seems that this was a good idea after all."
Kitty watched as the Ewoks had some spear work outs. The spears were blunt so no one could stab each other with it. They were learning how to use them if the points break off.
At the end of the session we see the soldiers bowing down to Kitty. She didn't really like this when it happened but she would accept it. She gave each of the soldiers a ring of leaves. For the Ewok soldiers this was a huge honour for them. They bowed again to Kitty and they left.
"Cute little bears."

What happens?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Training begins

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
But meanwhile in outer space the Ewok that was banished from Endor was coming back with a huge army. He was thinking about how he was going to kill Kitty and with all the fire power he had he just might do it.
Back on Endor Kitty was still with the Ewok soldiers. She gave them each a kiss because she knew how much a kiss from their Goddess would mean to them.
"Ok little guys you've been working very hard today so I think you all deserve a little rest," said Kitty.
"As you command Goddess," replied the Soldiers.
"Please it's just Kitty."
They correct themselves and then walk away. Another couple of Ewoks come and they brought her some food. She began to ate them and she gave some of it to the Ewoks that had brought them to her.
Then she saw Duane coming towards her. She picked him and gave him a kiss.
"Hey there little man."
"Oh hi Kitty is everything alright?" replied Duane.
"Yeah everything seems fine but I've got a bad feeling."
"Don't worry about it."
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: An army is coming

choices: Let them make the first move
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
The next day Kitty was just enjoying some lunch when a messenger came. He looked half dead and Kitty instantly picked him up and brought him up to her level. She looked worried.
"What's wrong?" she asked.
"There's an invading army landing in the south sector," replied the Messenger. "Ewoks are getting slaughtered."
"Oh my God. Do you know who's leading them?"
"No but they have a Vendetta against you."
The Messenger then collapsed on Kitty's hand. She brought him down and some other Ewoks took him off her hand.
"Get him to a hospital as soon as possible," she commanded. The Ewoks then took the Messenger away. "Send the spy to the south sector. I want to know what we're up against."
The Ewoks sent a spy to the south sector and what he reported back to Kitty was disturbing. They had more fire power and troops then any army ever assembled. Kitty knew that this was going to be one of the most difficult battles of her life and she wasn't sure if she'd come out on the winning end.

What does Kitty do?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Messenger of fear

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty began to think about what to do next. She couldn't let any more innocent Ewoks die. She looked at her military leaders in front of her. They knew that she meant business.
"Send a small army to fight them," said Kitty. "Use Guerilla warfare."
"What's that?"
"Basically you strike at them quickly. And then you retreat."
"But that's cowards warfare."
"Maybe it is. But I am not risking the lives of any soldiers. Follow my orders and we will win."
"Yes Goddess Kitty."
"One more thing. If things get too bad out there I'll help. Is that understood Commanders?"
"Yes ma'am," replied the Commanders.
"Good now go and defend your families."
The commanders got themselves a small army. They didn't really like Kitty's idea of warfare. But it was what the Vietcong used in the Vietnam war. And it helped win the war.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Guerilla warfare

choices: A creature as big as Kitty
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
The Ewoks got close to the opposing army. They had their orders from Kitty to do a quick attack and then run off before they had a chance to counter attack. They had never fought like this before and so they didn't know whether it worked or not.
"Ok remember attack then retreat," said the Commander.
Then the Ewok army came out before the enemy had a chance to react. They attacked killing a few of their forces. But before the enemy attacked the Ewoks had retreated and were gone.
"Wow that actually worked," said the Commander. "But the problem is that it'll take us a while to defeat them."
"The Goddess will be pleased," replied a Soldier.
"Indeed she will but the war isn't over yet."
Over the next few weeks the Ewok army continued to do hit and run tactics on the invaders. It was working well. While the invaders were losing troops fast the Ewoks were losing few. But each Ewok lost was another reason for Kitty do be upset. She didn't like going to war but she accepted that wart came to her and she didn't go to it. But unknown to her the enemy had a secret weapon that they were just waiting to use.

What is this weapon?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: It's working

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
The invading armies weren't doing very well. They had to bring in the big guns. The rebel Ewok was in a tent with one of his messengers. He was trying to think about what to do next.
"What are your orders sir?" asked the Messenger.
"Well this army seems to be led well by the Goddess," replied the Rebel Ewok. "We need something that can kill her. Without her their armies will fall like a pack of playing cards."
"But what can kill a Goddess?"
"Send in the Kraken."
"But sir isn't that an overkill?"
"I don't think it'll be kill enough."
"As you wish."
The messenger went away and made the orders clear.
A few days later Kitty was having a funeral for all the Ewoks who had fallen in battle. It was attended by thousands and she shed a tear for each one that had died.
"These brave Ewoks died in service of their planet," said Kitty.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: The Kraken

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Although their bodies will decay and turn to dust their names will never be forgotten," said Kitty. "For each one dead we will lay a rose in their memory."
The Ewok families lay down a rose for their fallen brother. There was a lot of crying and Kitty even cried a little. But she remembered that it wasn't her fault entirely. War had come to them.
Just then one of the Ewoks came to her. He was from the battlefield. He was in a state of panic. She picked him up and brought him to her eye level.
"What is it?" asked Kitty.
"They have sent the Kraken," replied the Messenger.
"A what?"
"The Kraken."
"What's the Kraken?"
"It is a beast with almost unlimited power. All who have fought it have been killed in horrible ways. Our forces can't take something like that on. If we did we'd lose thousands"
"So it's up to me to take this thing down."
"Yes mighty Goddess."
"Please don't call me that."

Will Kitty win?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: The Kraken is coming

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty went to where the mighty beast was. She stared at it and it stared back. But she got herself ready for a fight.
"You're not killing anymore innocent Ewoks," said Kitty.
The Kraken then charged at Kitty but it simply went through her like a ghost. She was still using her phasing powers. It looked at her a little and its body slightly changed. It then charged at her again and she phased. But it also phased and it collided into her.
"Crap it adapts."
It then grabbed her with its arms and threw her down the hill. But she was able to grab onto it so it went down with her. They both landed on the ground pretty hard.
They both slowly got up and the Kraken slashed her arm. She held it in pain and it went to attack again. But Kitty grabbed his head and got him into a headlock. Then with her almost unlimited strength she able to rip its head off with her free hand.
She then pushed it to the ground and dropped the head. There was some blood on her hand and she felt sickened. She just sat there and cried a little.
Eventually one of the Ewoks came to her. He was amazed to see the Kraken dead he was happy.
"You did it," he said with joy.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Power battle

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
"I can't be happy I killed it," said Kitty. "Even this monster had a right to live."
"But you saved us from being killed," replied the Ewok. "By killing it you have ensured that he rest of us will live."
"Please I just need a drink."
The Ewok then went away and got Kitty a barrel of wine. She drank it quickly and put it down to one side.
Meanwhile in the camp of the invaders a messenger was came into the hut of the Ewok who rebelled. He had dire news.
"Has the Kraken killed the Goddess?" asked the Ewok.
"No sir she killed him with some ease."
"Damn it even her powers shouldn't have won her the day." He then threw a cup onto the floor it smashed into a million pieces. "Why can't anything kill her?"
"She is a Goddess maybe she can't be killed."
"Don’t ever say that to me again or else you'll be without a head."
"Sorry sir."
"I should think so too. Now get out of here before I change my mind."
"Yes sir."

What does Kitty do?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Hollow victory

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
At the Ewoks village Kitty was trying to forget what had just happened. She had a drink and a little to eat. But she still felt really low inside. Even the beautiful Ewok music didn't seem to be working.
"Please Kitty tell us how we can cheer you up," said an Ewok.
"Can you turn back the hands of time?" replied Kitty.
"No we can't."
"Then there's nothing you can do to help me. Please leave I need sometime to myself thank you."
"As you wish."
The Ewoks then leave Kitty and she sits on her thrown with her own thoughts with her. She went over the events again and again. She tried to think of a way how she could have won without killing the Kraken.
Eventually Duane went to her. He was obviously concerned about her. He tapped her toe until she saw him.
"Hey there Kitty are you alright?" asked Duane.
"No I'm not alright," replied Kitty. "I just killed a living creature."
"What the Kraken?"
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Time alone

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
"Yes I killed it," said Kitty. "I had no right to take its life away from it."
"But I've heard that this Kraken was a vile creature," replied Duane. "It had killed hundreds and if you hadn't of stopped it hundreds more would have died."
Kitty just sat there. Her tears of sadness were soon turning into tears of anger. She rose up from her throne and looked at Duane. He was a little afraid. He hadn't seen Kitty this angry too often.
"I'm going now."
"Where are you going?"
"I'm going to stop this war once and for all!"
She then began to walk away. Duane tried to run after her. But she was walking too fast for him and he soon stopped because he knew that he wouldn't be able to catch up with her.
Kitty continued to walk closer to the enemy camp. She had one thing on her mind and that was to stop this war. Her mind was made up and there was no way she would change it for anybody.
She got there quickly and she was fired upon. But she simply phased through the bullets and kept walking.

Will she succeed?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: End this war

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty was able to see the army’s big destructive weapons. She picked them up and crushed them without using much strength. She just looked at the army and they had some fear.
“You know it wouldn’t be so difficult if you weren’t firing at me,” said Kitty. Her voice was full of anger. She was able to pick most of the weapons out and she easily destroyed them. “Now surrender.”
Just then the Ewok who Kitty had exiled came out of his tent. He stared up at her and then a huge hand grabbed him.
“Goddess,” said the Ewok.
“You have brought too much death to this planet. Now leave here and this time you won’t come back.”
She then put the Ewok on the ground and they fled on their ships. They wanted to get out of there or else they’d suffer the wrath of Kitty. She was possibly the most powerful being in the universe.
When everyone was gone Kitty walked back to her throne. She was a little tired from destroying the enemy guns. She had water brought to her and she drunk several hundred gallons.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: War is over

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Over the next couple of days the planet was in celebration. They were all happy that the war was over and that they were still free. But Kitty was the only one who wasn’t happy. She was sad for all those who had died and what she had done.
She had to destroy the weaponry for the safety of her own people. She just wished that she could have had a peaceful solution instead. The only thing that comforted her was that she hadn’t killed anyone. But she still didn’t truly feel that the planet was safe.
But then a messenger came to her. He had a little but Kitty couldn’t read the writing. It was way too small for her.
“What does it say?” asked Kitty.
“It is from the united planets,” replied the Messenger. “They request that you join the other leaders in a debate at the H.Q.”
“Ok but where is it?”
“It’s on the planet Percia. It is the Gem of the United Planets. They will welcome you with open arms.”
“Send them a reply to say that I’m coming. But I need transport.”
“As you wish.”
"God Speed."

What is the debate about?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Messege

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
A week past and Kitty arrived at the H.Q of the United Planets. It was huge and there was even enough head room for her to walk in normally. She was greeted by some assistants who took her to where she had to sit. There was a huge hall which was like the one in the U.N. There was a huge chair for her at the back and there was a notice on it saying Endor.
Some aliens were already there and they had their planet's name in front of them. This was going to be exciting for her.
Eventually everyone was seated and the meeting began. The topic was about getting peace throughout the galaxy. But there had been a few different wars recently and that was another topic.
"Settle down everyone," said the Chairman. "We need to bring peace throughout the Galaxy. Too many wars and too many have died. It must stop right here right now." Some of them cheered. "We would also like to introduce the latest member of the United Planets. The Planet of Endor and their leader Kitty Pryde. Is there anything you want to say about the matter?"
"Endor was invaded recently," replied Kitty. "I lost some of my people and I mourn for each one of them."
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Peace

choices: A leader of a hostile planet
A leader of a peaceful planet
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
“Well today we aim to stop any wars from ever happening again,” said the Chairman. “This meeting will either save countless lives or cost them. We must be careful everyone.”
As the meeting went by things seemed to be going quite well. There were some planets who didn’t particularly like each other. But then seemed to be getting over that and making peace with each other.
Kitty was starting to meet some of the leaders. She was thankful for the translating device in her ear or else she wouldn’t have been able to understand a word that anyone was saying.
Most of them hadn’t even heard of Endor. But they accepted that Kitty was very powerful but wise with what she used it on.
But eventually it came to lunch time. They all went to a hall where they sat down with food fit enough for royalty. They had every food imaginable and there was even some food that was recognisable to Kitty.
She sat down and began to eat her food. She had quite a lot due to her size but that was only natural.
“This place rocks,” she said to herself.

Who sits by her?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Progress

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Just then another World Leader sat next to kitty. They did look a little weird. But the same could be said for Kitty. She was basically in charge of a planet full of walking, talking teddy bears.
"Hello," said Kitty.
"Hello," replied the old leader.
"I'm Kitty of Endor."
"My name is Gundola leader of the peaceful planet of Sedge."
"My planet's peaceful most of the time. That was until it was invaded."
"Did you win?"
"Yeah but just barely. I lost a lot of my people. I'm still sad over them. I know how it feels."
After lunch all of the leaders went back into the main room for the discussion. But there was a performer first for everyone. It was just some entertainment for them and they had to admit they could sing like an angel.
But when all that was over it was back to business. They all sat down at their chairs and things went underway.
“Next on our agent is to reduce pollution in the universe,” said The Chairman.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: After lunch

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Eventually it was all over. The world leaders were able to come up with some agreements. They were still a little unsure on some certain subjects. But all in all things seemed to be getting better. Kitty was happy with what had happened. But she was also keen to get back to Endor.
As a gift she was given a royal space ship that had luxury. It was more then she could have ever hoped for. It did everything and it was easily big enough for her. There was a large bed for her to lie on. It was like being in a five star hotel. She just relaxed a little and some of the Ewok protectors went to her. They went to protect her but inside she lifted them up and put them on the bed.
“Relax a little,” said Kitty, “You deserve it.”
“But this is a royal bed,” replied an Ewok. “We are not worthy.”
“Yes you are. Just because your Ewoks doesn’t mean I treat you any different. To me you’re all a race of cute little teddy bears.”
“What’s a teddy bear?”
“It’s a compliment by the way.”
“Ok.” He then bounced on the bed. He went flying up into the air and Kitty caught him.
“Careful now.”

Will they get back to Endor safely?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Leaving for Endor

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
When Kitty returned to Endor she was happy to see that everything was still the same as she left it. There was even a big celebration for her return. This was something that she really didn’t expect. It was a nice surprise for her. But she really didn’t want that much effort on her.
After the celebrations were finished Kitty sat back on her throne and she had Duane in her hand. She was gentle stroking him and giving him a little hug and a kiss from time to time.
“Did you miss me?” asked Kitty.
“I sure did,” replied Duane. “We were all getting ready for your return. So how did it go?”
“It went well we made some progress.”
“Good what were the other leaders like?”
“Lets say they looked very similar to aliens you’d see in Star Wars or films like that. I miss Star Wars.”
"Well if we go back to Earth we can watch them."
"That would be nice. But sometimes I think what it would be like if we stayed on Earth. Would things have been better or worse."
"Probably worse."
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Return

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
“Think about it,” said Kitty. “If I was still on Earth I wouldn’t have anywhere to sleep. People would be afraid of me for my size. But here I’m accepted I might go back to Earth one day to see friends and family. But I don’t think I could ever truly return and stay there.”
“We might do one day,” replied Duane. “But for now we’re on this planet so just make the best of it.”
“Well I thought we were already doing that. But here’s a thought I’m thinking about going to bed early. You’re more then invited.”
“What are you talking about?” He was clueless for a moment. But then he put two and two together. “Oh.”
Kitty then smiled at him. “You know where I’ll be.”
Kitty then went away and Duane just stood there. He was amazed and excited at the same time. He didn’t know what to feel.
Eventually the time came and Duane went to where Kitty was sleeping. She was lying there waiting for him.
“I knew you’d come little man.”
"Well How could I refuse?"
"Now stay still."

What happens next?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Come around later

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
The two lovers began to kiss. Kitty had to be careful that she didn’t accidentally kill Duane with her size and strength. She was the most powerful being alive but she wasn’t a destroyer.
But then an Ewok came in. he was a messenger and he had some very important news. But he saw them making love.
“Kitty,” said the Ewok.
“Not now I’m busy,” replied Kitty.
“But it’s an emergency.”
“What is it?”
“The forest is on fire. It might spread to the entire planet.”
“What?”
Kitty quickly stopped making love and she got back up. She put Duane on the ground and she stood up. She began to see the fire.
“Get as much water as we can,” said Kitty. “We need to put out that fire.”
“How will that help?”
“Believe me it will.”
The Ewok then went away.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Fire

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
A few minutes later Kitty was standing right by the raging fire. She phases herself through the intense heat and she waited fall all the Ewoks to bring back some water. Without it even her size and strength wouldn’t be able to put it out. She was glad to see them when they finally came.
“Here’s the water you wanted,” said an Ewok.
“Thank you very much,” replied Kitty.
She then picked up the containers of the water and she drunk all of it. She had the water in her mouth and then she sprayed it on the fire. It was no match for her and it soon went out.
“There you go nothing to it,” said Kitty. All of the Ewoks cheered. “Now all you need to do is get yourself some more water.”
“But you don’t need anymore.”
“I don’t but you do.”
“Oh.”
Kitty giggled a little as she went back to where Duane was. She lay down besides him and she played with him a little with her finger.
“Miss me?”

Will they be interrupted this time?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Fire out

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
“I sure did,” said Duane. “Is there going to be any more interruptions?”
“No and this time I’m making sure of it,” replied Kitty. “Now let me show you what happens when I don’t have to worry about being a goddess and just a person who has special needs.”
“Needs like me?”
“Oh yes and I hope you enjoy this as much as I will.”
“I certainly hope so.”
They then began to get busy. Some Ewoks could hear them from the outside and they weren’t sure what was happening. They didn’t really want to interfere because it would make Kitty very angry and they didn’t want that to happen.
When it was all done they lay next to each other. They were out of breath and they had a very large duvet over them.
“That was amazing,” said Kitty.
“Thanks I didn’t know I had it in me,” replied Duane. “Do you want to do it again. Or do you have to get back to your duties.”
“Well my duties are important so we’ll do it tomorrow night.”
“Yeah sure.”
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Good time

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty then left the tent and she went back to her throne. She relaxed a little and she felt something in her back. But it was one of those itches that she just couldn't reach. She called one of the Ewoks.
"You called Kitty?" asked the Ewok.
"Yes I need a big favour off you," replied Kitty. She then turned her back to him. "I've got an itch on my back that I just can't scratch. Can you do it for me?"
"As you wish."
He then got a long rake like object to scratch her back. He started at the middle and he awaited further instructions.
"A little lower," said Kitty. He scratched lower. "Lower then that." He went a little lower and he was close to the spot. "A little more to the left." he did so and he got the itch. "There it is."
When the itch was gone the Ewok stopped scratching. He even got a little hug and Kiss off his Goddess.
"Thank you very much."
"It was my pleasure."
"I'll have to remember to ask you again if I get another itch."

How far forward do we go?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Itch

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
A month past since the fire. Kitty was still keeping everything in order. But she felt a little bored. She tried to think of some kind of event that would bring the planet together. She wanted it to be one that would happen every few years.
She began to think of an event and then it hit her like a dart in the neck. She remembered about the Olympic Games. She knew that would bring everyone together and it would also see who was best at certain events.
A few days later she was having a meeting with some of the Ewoks who had high authority on the planet. They were a little confused with what was about to happen.
“Ladies and Gentlemen you’re probably wondering why I’ve brought you here today,” said Kitty.
“Yes we are very eager to know,” replied an Ewok.
“Well you’re all obsolete and you need to leave the planet immediately.”
“What?”
Kitty giggled. “Just kidding I really need you.”
“Then why are we here?”
“Because I am announcing the first ever Endor Olympic Games.”
"What's an Olympic Game?"
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Olympics
