1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
“Well it’s a sports event,” said Kitty. “What sports do you have on this planet? Is there anything like throwing a javelin or racing?”
“Yeah there is,” replied an Ewok.
“Well we have a big sporting event once every few years where Ewoks representing their region can compete for medals.”
“Medals?”
“Yeah sure. Ok it’s not much of a cash prize but there’s prestige in it. It’ll be great.”
“How do you know?”
“We have it on my home planet.”
“We’ll give it a shot.”
“I say we have it this time next year so that we can prepare ourselves.”
“As you command.”
A few days later the announcement about the games came to the Ewoks. They weren’t sure what they were suppose to do. They didn’t whether it was good or going to make them feel low. But they knew Kitty wouldn’t do anything like that to them. She was very nice to them.
But for now they needed to decide what events there would be.

Will it go well?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: The games

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Most of the Ewoks were for these Olympic Games. They wanted some competition and they wanted to show off their skills. Besides Kitty had never disappointed them before in the past and she wouldn’t do it now.
A few weeks later construction started on a stadium. They had to cut down a few trees to make it. But each tree that was cut down Kitty commanded another one be planted in a different location.
In Kitty’s room she was just dealing with a few things before finally lying on her over sized bed. She felt her stomach and she was feeling a little hungry. She looked over to one of her person assistants.
“Can you get me something to eat please?” asked Kitty.
“What would you like?” he replied.
“Surprise me please.”
“As you command.”
“Oh yeah just before you get it could you send Duane in here please?”
“As you wish.”
“Thank you.”
He then left and Kitty sat back and she saw her personal assistant leave. She was looking forward to seeing Duane.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Preperations

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Eventually Duane did come and they were happy to see each other.
“These games are going to be great,” said Duane. “I can see it becoming a success. Just like the Olympic Games on Earth.”
“Well that’s why I introduced them here,” replied Kitty. “So that it feels a little more like home. But so it brings people together.”
“Ewoks.”
“I mean Ewoks together.”
“I can’t wait for them. What events are there going to be?”
“Well some of the Earth events. But also I we should some sports that are native to this planet. That’ll make everyone happy.”
“Well I guess you are use to making Ewoks happy.”
“Well I try my best. But I can’t please everyone.”
“Well you can please me.”
“Is that an advance?”
“Yes if you accept it.” She then gently picked him up.
“Accepted.”
She then brought him forward to her lips and she began to kiss him. She was still being very careful.

What happens next?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Great idea

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Just then a messenger came in and this distracted Kitty. She wasn’t too happy but her duties as a Goddess came first.
“What’s wrong?” asked Kitty.
“We have some important visitors,” replied the Messenger.
“I wasn’t expecting to come. Who are they?”
“They’re from the council.”
“Council? Right tell them I’ll be with them immediately.”
“As you command.”
He then went away ands Kitty looked at Duane. There was some sympathy in her eyes and she gave him a big hug.
“Sorry little guy but I really have to go now.”
“How long will you be?” replied Duane.
“I don’t know. But I’ll be back.”
Kitty then left her tent and went to where the council members were. She bowed to them like she should do and they bowed back to her.
“Greetings Kitty,” said the Council member.
“And greetings to you.”
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Council memebrs

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
"We have come to oversee this so called Olympic Games you are setting up," said a Council Member.
"Why would anyone want to be bothered with that?" replied Kitty.
"You seem to have done something right in bringing your subjects together like this. The other worlds were thinking about doing something similar."
"Well that's nice."
"Now tell me where did you get the idea from?"
"Well it's a sports event on my home planet. It takes place once every four years and it's a highly anticipated event."
"I see and why was it called the Olympic Games?"
"Well the original Olympic Games were in the city of Olympia in Ancient Greece. It's a long story."
"Hmm very interesting. Maybe we might visit this Olympia."
"Well I'd reccomend against that. My species have had some bad experience with aliens." (See Ultimates 7-13)
"Very well tell us about it."
"Well."
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Curious

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
"I don't know much really," said Kitty. "All I know about it was what I watched on the TV back home."
The Council members were a little confused. It seemed that something Kitty had said confused them.
"What's a TV?" asked one of the members.
"It's something that we have on Earth. It provides entertainment."
"Ok so that's what it is then?"
"Yeah that's it almost everyone has at least one."
"Interesting. Are the Olympic Games shown on the TV?"
"Yeah every time."
"Maybe it's not such a bad invention."
"Well it can make people too unheathy if they watch too much."
"I see."
Kitty continued to talk to the concilers and she enjoyed what they were telling her. She felt a little proud of herself and she thought that the Olymic Games was the best idea she had come up with.
"We best be leaving," said one of the council members.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: TV

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty and the council members talked for a while. They had gotten all the information they needed and now they needed to leave. Kitty made sure that they left without any interruptions. She even waved goodbye to them.
“Great they’re gone now,” she said to herself. “Now where was I?” She began to think a little more. “Oh yeah I was with Duane.” She then made her way back to the tent and Duane was still sitting on the table waiting for her. This made her smile a little and she picked him up and gave him a kiss.
“Sorry I took so long,” said Kitty. “But I’m glad that you didn’t leave.”
“I did think about it,” replied Duane. “But I couldn’t get off the table.”
“Oh yeah silly me.”
She then sat down on her bed and she gave him another little hug and a kiss. This made them both feel happier.
“Now what were we going to do before I left,” asked Kitty. She began to think a little more. “Who yeah now I remember.”
She then made sure that the tent could only be opened from the outside and she looked at Duane. She gave him a pleasant smile.
“Let’s do it.”

What happens?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Leaving

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty then kissed Duane again and she lay down on her oversized bed. She was going to enjoy herself. But then she stopped and she quickly poked her head outside. Duane was a little confused.
“What are you doing?” asked Duane.
“Just checking that we won’t be bothered again,” replied Kitty. She looked a little more and there was nothing. “Ok the coast is clear.”
Kitty then kissed Duane with more passion. She was glad that this time she wouldn’t be interrupted like before.
This lasted for a few hours but then the pair got tired. Kitty lay down on her bed with Duane in her arms. She was smiling down on him.
“That was great,” said Duane.
“I told you sex with a giant sized girlfriend is better.”
“Same time tomorrow?”
“Maybe not.”
“What why?”
“Well if we do it too often it isn’t special.”
“I get you.”
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: No interruptions

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
The next day Kitty was awoken by Ewoks bringing her some breakfast. There was a strict no meat diet for her. If she found anything that was meat she wouldn’t be too happy. But she felt like having a little fun today.
“Is this meat?” asked Kitty. She knew that there wasn’t any meat on there. “Do I need to repeat myself?”
“But Kitty,” replied an Ewok.
“That’s it OFF WITH HIS HEAD!”
“No!”
Kitty then giggled a little. “I’m only kidding. There’s no meat in this and I wouldn’t cut your head off anyway.”
“You gave me a scare.”
“Well here’s a little something for your troubles.” She then raised him up and gave him a kiss. “That’s for enduring my little prank.”
“Thank you.”
“You’re welcome.”
He then left Kitty to have her breakfast. She began to eat it and it was delicious. She did feel a little bad about the prank.

What happens today?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Off with his head

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
After breakfast Kitty felt a little fat so she decided to go for a walk to work off her breakfast. She had a few guards go with her at first. But she didn’t think it was necessary for them to come. They were also struggling to keep up with her so she picked them all up.
“I know you’re trying to protect me and all,” said Kitty. “But no offence you little guys are way too slow. So I’ll care you.”
“That is not necessary,” replied a Guard.
“Please I insist.”
Kitty then continued her walk. She also did this so that she could see around the planet a little more. She saw a few villages and she visited each one of them. But at one point she nearly tripped over a fallen tree but she was able to keep her balance and she didn’t fall.
“That was a close one,” she said.
“Are you alright?”
“Yeah I’m fine.”
“Is there anything you need?”
“No I’ll be fine.”
But just then she saw someone running towards her. He looked like a messenger.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Hike

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
When the messenger reached Kitty he was out of breath. He almost fell over but Kitty was able to stop him.
"Goddess," he said.
"Please just Kitty," replied Kitty.
"Kitty there's a disaster."
"What kind of disaster?"
"There's a large fire. If we don't put it out the planet could be in danger. Please I don't want to die."
"Don't worry no one is going to die. I will personally make sure of that. Now tell me where the fire is."
"Yes Kitty."
A few minutes later the fire had spread. But Kitty had gotten there in the nick of time. She began to get water from the nearby river to put it out. She quickly put it out and she was relieved that it was out.
"Ok from thsi day forward there'll be a fire brigade to deal with things like this. I might not be here forever."
This confused the Ewoks a little.

Will it go well?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Fire

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Not too long after this announcement several fire brigades were set up around the planet. They were being trained how to tackle certain types of fires. There had been one or two near misses but the fire brigades had dealt with these fires and Kitty wanted to congratulate them for it.
She visited each of the fire stations to see how the fireman Ewoks were getting along with the whole progress. She went to one in particular and she liked what she could see. She was followed by the Fire Chief.
“As you can see we’re almost up to full operational level,” said the Fire Chief. “We will be at maximum efficiency within the week.”
“Good and how are the Fire Ewoks.”
“They are taking in their training very well. Soon they will be fully trained to combat any type of fire.”
“That’s brilliant.”
“I must say this was a good idea for you. Until now we had no way to tackle fire. But you’ve helped us.”
“It’s what I do.”
“Well I thank you.”
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Fire Brigade

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Just then the fire alarm went off. Kitty knew what this meant and she looked down at the fire chief.
“Trouble in Paradise?” she asked.
“You know you’re right Goddess,” replied Kitty.
The Fire Ewoks got ready to fight the fire. Kitty decided to carry them towards the fire. She could see the smoke from where she was and she walked towards it. She made sure that she had all of the equipment as well. But when she got there she put them on the ground.
“Ok little guys show me what you’ve got,” said Kitty.
“Right,” replied the Fire Chief.
The Ewoks then got to work dealing with the fire. Kitty stood and watched as they went to work. She was happy with what she was seeing. They were protecting themselves from harm.
“You’re doing great guys.”
Within a few minutes the fire was out and everyone was celebrating their victory. Kitty clapped her hands.
“That was very good.”

What does she do?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Fire brigade in action

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
As time went by the fire brigade saved many Ewoks from dying in fire. They were hailed as heroes everywhere and Kitty knew that she had made the right call with this one. She even made an official holiday to celebrate.
But now Kitty had a problem. She couldn’t finance it forever. She knew that she would have to something that might make her unpopular.
A few days later in the newly constructed Government building Kitty was there with Ewok politicians. They were al anxious to hear what she was going to say. But Kitty was silent for a few minutes.
“I have gathered you here today for an important announcement,” said Kitty. “But everyone does realise that all the hospitals and fire stations can’t run themselves just like that.” She got some quiet chattering from the Ewoks.
“So what is your answer?” asked a Politician.
“We have to introduce a tax.”
“A tax!” There was an uproar.
“I know that might not seem too good for everyone. But it’s the only way we can keep them going for everyone.”
"I see."
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Taxes

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
“You do realise that when everyone hears of this tax your popularity will go down Kitty,” said One Ewok.
“I know it’ll make me less popular but I know it’s the right thing to do,” replied Kitty. “It’ll benefit everyone.”
“I guess you’re right on that.”
“I’ll announce it tomorrow.”
“As you wish.”
The next day there was a gathering of many Ewoks. They had come from a long way to see her. But she stood up and looked at them.
I thank you all for coming today,” said Kitty. “But there is something I must address to everyone here.”
The Ewoks then began to get ready for a big announcement. They were preparing for either good or bad news.
“I and the government have decided that to sustain the life we live in we must introduce a tax.”
This caused an uproar.
“Let her speak!” shouted an Ewok.

Will they riot?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Tax introduction

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
“Thank you,” said Kitty. “As I was saying there will be taxes so that we can maintain our way of life.”
“But what will it cost?” replied an Ewok.
“For now 10% of everything you earn.”
This caused another uproar and Kitty had to wait a minute or two for everyone to calm down a little.
“Now that everyone is calm I’m hoping that this is only temporary,” said Kitty. “But you will all see the benefit of this tax.”
Kitty then got up and walked away. She was followed by one of her advisors. He didn’t really like what he had heard.
“This tax is unpopular,” he said.
“I know it would be but it’s needed,” replied Kitty. “If we want what we get we must pay for it.”
“I know but.”
“There’s no way around it.”
“Ok I see.”
“Good.”
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Not too happy

choices: Kitty feels something in her stomach
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
A few weeks later the tax was finally introduced. The Ewoks at first didn’t like the idea of having to pay them. But they didn’t have much of a choice. But as the taxes went in they could see a positive change. Things seemed to be running smoothly on the planet.
In her throne room Kitty was sitting there talking to a few of her advisors. They seemed to be complimenting her.
“This tax was a great idea,” said an Advisor.
“You thought it was a terrible idea,” replied Kitty.
“At first yes but when I saw everything that’s been happening. This planet has never been so prosper able.”
“I’m happy to hear that.”
“How much are you saving for yourself?”
“What?”
“How much are you keeping for yourself?”
“Nothing. All the money that has been given in has been sent to where they should be. I don’t keep any for myself.”
"But all leaders do."
"Then let me be the first."

What happens next?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: I don't keep any

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty was annoyed with what she had been told but then she began to feel something in her stomach. At first it wasn't much. But then she felt a huge pain in her stomach. She keeled over onto the ground and she groaned in pain. The others crowded around her to see what was wrong.
"Are you alright Goddess?" asked her Advisor.
"Do I look alright?" snapped Kitty.
"What do you want us to do?"
"Isn't it obvious?"
"No."
"GET A DOCTOR!"
"A Doctor right."
The Advisor soon found a doctor and he went to Kitty. He began to examine her and he didn't seem to be too happy.
"Strange," he said.
"What is it?" repliedKitty.
"You're suffering from stomach poisoning."
"No shit."
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Ill

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty was instantly examined by the top doctor on the planet. She was still in pain and she seemed to be getting hot. Duane was there to comfort her but there wasn’t much that he could do.
“When did the pains start?” asked the Doctor Ewok.
“About half an hour ago,” replied Kitty.
“I see and what have you been eating today?”
“Same as I usually do. Berries and other fruits.”
“Any meat?”
“I’m a vegetarian.”
“Now here’s what I’m advising you. Get plenty of rest and make sure you don’t eat too much at once. You have bad indigestion “
“Is that it?”
“Also thank you for sending funds to my hospital. We were going to go under if it wasn’t for your help.”
“It was nothing really.”
Kitty eventually got up and sat back on the throne. She still had a bad stomach. But there wasn’t much she could do.

Will she be fine?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Examination

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
As the days went by Kitty was watching what she ate. She could still feel pains in her stomach. But they weren’t as bad as they had been. She was given some medication to try and stop the pain.
But on this day Kitty was expecting some more school children to come. She had been asked if she would like them to come. She happily accepted but this was before her problems. But she still couldn’t say no to them.
There were a little over two dozen of them and they came to kitty. She smiled at each of them and she even crouched down to them. She wanted them to feel welcome and safe around her.
“Hi everyone,” said Kitty.
“Hello Kitty,” replied the Child Ewoks.
“I’m so glad you were able to come today.”
“I thought you weren’t very well,” replied an Ewok.
“I’m getting better.”
“Well we all made you a card.”
A card was passed to Kitty. She saw that it was a get well soon card and it had been hand drawn by the children.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Visit

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
“Can I ask you a question?” asked one of the Children.
“Sure you can,” replied Kitty. “What is it?”
“What’s your home planet like?”
“My home planet?”
“Yeah tell us,” replied all of the children.
“Well ok. My planet is a little like this. There are great forests like this. But they’re a lot small. My planet has many different terrains. There’s mountains, oceans, deserts, grasslands allsorts.”
“What animals are there?”
“Oh so many species I couldn’t name them all. But I was really fond of the Dolphins. They were mammals that lived in the sea. They looked so beautiful how they swam in the water. Wish I could see another one.”
“Wow.”
“There are some others. Rabbits were cute.”
“What’s a rabbit?”
“They’re little creatures that have really long ears. They hop around a lot and they live in holes under the ground.”

Will they ask anything else?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: What's eart like?

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
"What else lives there?" asked the kids.
"Well they're dolphins there," replied Kitty. "They live in the water and they're beautiful animals. Too bad a lot of them are endangered."
"What does endangered mean?"
"It means that there's not a lot of them left. And when they all die out its called extinction. Its not a very nice thing to happen. Especially to a species as beautiful as dolphins."
"Oh."
"Well on a lighter note there are monkeys."
"Monkeys?"
"Yep they're funny animals. They live in trees and can swing from baranch to branch. I'm a distant relative."
"You swing from trees?"
"No I'm way too big for that."
Just then a teacher came. He went over to the children and then he looked up at Kitty. He was a little nervous.
"Are they bothering you?" asked the Teacher.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: More about Earth

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
"No not at alli," said Kitty. "I enjoyed their company."
"Good," replied the Teacher. "But now we have to go back to the school." All the kids then sighed.
"Don't worry one day I'll even come and visit your school."
This made the children cheer as they went away from Kitty. She was a little upset to see them go.But then she saw Duane come in. She picked him up and gave him a little hug and a kiss.
"You alright Kitty?" asked Duane.
"Yeah I'll be fine," replied Kitty.
"Come on don't lie to me. I know when you're upset and right now you're upset. I'm here for you."
"Well I know I'm a little young but I wouldn't mind having a kid. But I can't. I'm too damn big."
"Maybe there's a way you can get pregnant."
"There isn't."
"Don't think like that."
"I think facts."

What happens?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: I want a child

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
"There's no way I can naturally get pregnant and they don't have the technology here to use artificial incemination," said Kitty.
Just then they both saw a messenger run in. He was out of breath and Kitty quickly picked him up and rested him in her hand. He felt softness all around him in the form of her hand.
"I have reached you Kitty," he said.
"I know you have," replied Kitty. "You can rest now."
"Thank you but I bring a message of urgency."
"What is it?"
"The United Planets need your immediate arrival at the summet."
"Why?"
"They need to discuess something of great importance to you. They want you to go ASAP."
Kitty then sighed. "Fine." She looked at Duane. "Guess I'm leaving the planet for a while. Make sure nothing bad happens."
"Ok."
"Good now I'll see you later."
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: A messenger comes

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
The very next day Kitty was at the United Planets Headquarters. She didn’t know why she had been summoned there but she was about to find out as the chairman took his position in front of her.
“Are you Kitty leader of the forest planet Endor?” he asked.
“Yes,” replied Kitty.
“You are hereby on trial.”
“Why I haven’t done anything wrong.”
“But were shown standing and watching as your planet burned down and you did nothing to stop it.”
“What when?”
“You let your inhabitants put the blaze out.”
“Oh that.” Kitty was reminded of the time when the Fire Fighting Ewoks put out a blaze for her. “They were showing me that they could put out a fire.”
“That does not excuse your actions.”
“It should do.”
“But it won’t. Do you plead innocent or guilty for your ignorance?”
“Innocent.”

Will she be found guilty?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Trial

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
“As with any trial you have the right to an attorney,” said the Judge. “But since you can’t get one at this moment in time one will be appointed for you.”
“Whatever,” replied Kitty. “I still don’t think this is right.”
“Some things in life aren’t right. But you have to live with it. So you have to plea your case to us.”
Just then an attorney came to Kitty. She wasn’t too happy about this whole situation. But there was nothing much she could do for it. She didn’t want to make tensions any higher then they already were.
“I’m sure we can win this case,” said Kitty’s attorney.
“I hope we do,” replied Kitty. “I haven’t even done anything wrong. I just want to go back to Endor.”
“When you’re found innocent you can.”
“I will be found innocent right?”
“Sure you will.”
As the trial went on the prosecutors tried to make Kitty look like a terrible leader. The jury began to believe them as well. But Kitty had to prove that she was the leader that she had been.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Attorney

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
After a while the trial went down to the jury. They began to talk amongst themselves on whether they should make Kitty pay for her crime or see that she had been acting in the best interests of her planet.
A few hours later the jury came back. Kitty was very nervous and she held onto her attorney. A little too tight for his liking.
“Have the jury reached a decision?” asked the Leader of the UP.
“We have we find the defendant not guilty of all charges,” replied A Juror. This made Kitty very happy.
“So be it I hereby rule Kitty Pryde innocent on all charges.”
Kitty was jumping up and down with joy. She had won the trial and was now proved of being a good leader.
“Now is there anything you’d like to say Kitty?” asked the Leader of the UP.
“Yes I’d like to say that everything I did I did for the Ewoks. I try to improve their way of life and skills.”
“Very well. A ship will take you back to Endor.”
“Thank you.”
Kitty then gave out a sigh of relief.

Is there any hard feelings?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: innocent

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty then stood up from where she was. She began to walk out of the courtroom but she still couldn't believe that this had all happened. She didn't think she had been commiting any kind of crime. But at least she ahd been cleared of all charges. But for now she just wanted to go back to Endor.
"Kitty," said a Voice.
She then looked down to her foot and saw a man there. She looked at him for a moment before answering.
"Yes," replied Kitty.
"I'm with the Universal Times. Please tell me what you were put through in this trial. And are you glad you were found innocent."
"Not a reporter."
"Please tell."
"No comment."
"Please Kitty."
"I said no comment. I'll talk to you when I'm ready."
"Ok that's fine."
"Now please leave me alone."
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Reporter

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
"Whatever you say," said the Reporter.
He then began to back away from her. Kitty thought it was a little too easy. She turned around and saw someone else taking a picture of her. But the position he was in he could look up her mini dress tunic.
"Hey!" shouted Kitty.
The photographer then ran away. This annoyed Kitty but she just kept walking towards her ship. She went and sat on a seat that had specially been made for her. She crossed her arms.
"Stupid media," she thought.
"Food?" replied a Man. She looked down and she could see a humanoid creature. He had a tray.
"What do you have?"
"The foods that you like. We researched."
She then saw a hamburger on the tray. She didn't eat it and she looked at the waiter once more.
"Got anything that isn't meaty?" replied Kitty.
"Sure do."

Will he get her anything else?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Stupid media

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
A few seconds later he returned with chicken nuggets. She stared at him once more and he began to feel a little nervous. She then picked him up and brought him up to her own level. She hoped this wouldn’t scare him.
“Do you have anything that’s vegetarian?” asked Kitty.
“Yeah,” replied the Waiter.
“Good can you get me some of that please?”
“Sure but can you put me down please?”
“Ok.”
Kitty then put the waiter on the ground and he went away. He came back a few minutes later with a lot of vegetarian meals. Kitty thanked him and began to eat the food. She was enjoying it.
“Delicious,” she said.
She continued to eat for a while. But then she saw one of her Ewoks by her. She picked him up.
“Yes,” she said.
“Kitty I’m afraid we must leave soon,” replied the Ewok.
“Ok I won’t be long.”
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Try again

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
“But we can be as long as you wish,” said the Ewok.
“No if we need to leave soon then we’ll go,” replied Kitty. “Besides I want to get back to Endor soon.”
“As you wish.”
Kitty finished off eating her meal and then she went back to her ship. She had a little bit of difficulty getting in. But she was able to do it successfully and she tried to make herself a little more comfortable. Some of the Ewoks in the ship tried to make it a little bit better for her.
“Are you alright Kitty?” asked an Ewok.
“Yes I’m fine thank you,” replied Kitty.
“If there’s anything you need.”
“Well there is one thing.”
“Name it.”
“You wouldn’t mind just getting this itch on my back. It’s in a spot that I just can’t reach even with my long arms.”
“It would be an honour.”
Kitty then lay down and the Ewok tried to find the itch.

Will he get it?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Going back to Endor

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
As the days past since the trial Kitty just wanted to try and relax a little. But she knew as ruler of the planet she could never do this. All she could do was try and relax where ever and however she could.
Eventually she was on her chair and an Ewok came up to her. She didn’t recognise him but she still picked him up. He was a little nervous around her but she smiled to try and comfort him.
“Mighty Kitty,” he said.
“Just Kitty please,” replied Kitty.
“Ok Kitty I have an important message for you.”
“What is it?”
“The stadium has hit a wall.”
“What’s wrong?”
“There’s been bad weather and part of the stadium has already been damaged severely.” He seemed to be a little afraid.
“Can it be repaired?”
“Yes but it will take time.”
“Then do it.”
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: A little later

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Eventually Kitty reached the arena and she saw that a small part of it had been badly damaged. But her first concern was for the Ewoks. She was wondering if anyone had been injured at any point.
“Is everyone alright?” asked Kitty.
“Thankfully there were no injuries,” replied An Ewok.
“Oh thank God.”
“What are you talking about?”
“Don’t worry about it. But what caused this damage in the first place? Was in sabotage or a force of nature?”
“I just think we didn’t reinforce it enough.”
“Is the rest of it vulnerable?”
“For now yes but I’m having every little part of the building reinforced before we start any repair work.”
“Good.”
Kitty then began to look at the wreckage. She was careful not touch anything in case she caused anymore damage. She was amazed to see how much damage was done by not reinforcing the section.

Will anything bad happen?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Reinforce

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty supervised the Ewoks as they began to repair and reinforce the stadium. She was helping them out with any of the heavy lifting. Her strength had no limits so it was extremely easy for her.
Within days the works was completed and Kitty looked at the building. It seemed to be holding up well and she could see the reinforcements. She was happy with what she was seeing around.
“Good job everyone,” she said. “This stadium is nice and strong. I don’t think any wind will be blowing it over anytime soon.”
“Hurray,” replied the Ewoks.
“So what do we do now?”
“Err.”
“Well let’s prepare for the games.”
Over the next few weeks the games were being planned out. Kitty introduced some events from Earth. But the rest of it were Ewok games. She didn’t mind using them as long as it kept them happy.
“Ok people I can officially say let the games begin,” said Kitty.
“Yeah,” replied the Ewoks.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Let the games begin

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
The next moment Kitty found herself in some sort of vortex. She saw that Duane had regained consciousness. He saw that he was in Kitty's hand in a weird place.
