"Well I think they went up another size last night."
"Wow come and see Kitty and her Incredible Growing Breasts."
They both laughed at this joke. Lockheed gave a little sigh. Kitty responded by gently stroking him with her finger.
"Now Lockheed don't get jealous. I'll give you something a little later."
Lockheed was happier and so was Kitty and Duane. They spent the rest of the day relaxing in the fields. As usual their were anti-mutant protesters outside the Mansion gates. But if they tried anything she would put a stop to it.
Suddenly they heard the Mansion alarms go off. They knew that it meant a mission briefing in the War Room. Kitty quickly took Duane out of her breasts and put him on the ground. Then zapped her and she shrank into the dome.

Where is the problem?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Kitty and her Incredible Growing Breasts

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Duane carried Kitty and Lockheed followed him down to the War Room. All the other X-men were there and Professor X was ready to give a mission briefing.
"X-Men we have a crisis at hand," said Professor X. "A new Brotherhood of Evil Mutants are attempting to kidnap the Governor of California Robert Kelly."
"Do you think Magneto's behind this?" replied Cyclops.
"He is still under S.H.I.E.L.D custody. I contacted Nick Fury and he informs me that he hasn't escaped or had any visitors."
"So the Brotherhood are doing this by themselves?" asked Kitty.
"Most likely. They'll probably use him as a hostage until they release Magneto."
"So let's go over there and stop them."
"I have some concerns Kitty. We don’t want the public to have a panic attack over your size. You, Duane and Lockheed will stay on the X-Jet unless commanded to leave. Do you understand?"
"Yes Professor."
"Good does anyone have any questions about the mission?" No one answered. "Good luck my X-Men God speed."
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: War Room

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Duane got into his new X-Costume. It was black and gold like everyone else’s. Kitty didn't have a new one yet but it was coming.
The X-Men then got onto the X-Jet and started their journey to Los Angeles. Kitty didn't like being in her dome but it was the only way she could travel on the X-Jet without destroying it. But she had her best friends Duane and Lockheed to keep her company.
When they landed Cyclops informed them that they had to stay on the X-Jet unless they were needed. Duane was annoyed that the Professor wouldn't fully let him go onto a mission.
They watched the X-Men leave the X-Jet and go into battle against the Brotherhood. This time the Brotherhood had some new recruits. Now they had a mutant powerful enough to create earthquakes. They had one that could see into the future and another one who could project spikes from his body.
"Well looks like the freak show turned up," said Forge. "Get 'em boys."
The X-Men and Brotherhood engage in battle. They were equally matched but the X-Men had something that would give them a huge advantage.

Will they need Kitty, Duane and Lockheed's help?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: X-Men vs the Brotherhood

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
The X-Men and Brotherhood thought for about five minutes but neither team could take the upper hand. Cyclops knew if they didn’t' in soon then Governor Kelly would be kidnapped. He got his link to the X-Jet.
"Cyclops to Omnipotent," he said. "Cyclops to Omnipotent do you copy over?"
Duane quickly went to the link on the X-Jet. "Omnipotent here."
"Omnipotent we need you, Shadowcat and Lockheed immediately. Can you come?"
"That a positive sir."
"Good. Come on."
Duane switched off the link and looked at his shrunken girlfriend and her pet dragon. "Show time."
He carried them off the ship but when he did he was confronted by Blob.
"Well if it isn't the new recruit," he said. He then sees kitty in her dome. "And you're so small I could eat you up.
"Believe me you're in for a big surprise," replied Kitty.
Duane threw the dome onto the ground and it shattered. Blob then stared as the once tiny Kitty grew into her 60+ foot stature.
"Surprise little Blob."
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Show Time

choices: Has a little fun with him first
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Blob truly was surprised to see Kitty at such a size. But before he could react she kicked him like a soccer ball and he went flying. When the Brotherhood saw Blob flying over the horizon they stopped and stared at her.
This gave the X-Men a little edge over their evil opponents. Forge even got one of his guns and fired it at Kitty. She easily phased through it and then she picked up Forge himself. He dropped his guns and now the Brotherhood was becoming out numbered.
"I don't think you should have done that," said Kitty.
"Your size doesn't scare me," replied Forge.
"Not my size. But my strength. Even if the Hulk was my size I'd still be stronger than he is. Then there's my foot. You saw what it did to Blob. But the only difference is that you don't have super durability so I guess it'll hurt you a lot more."
Some of the Brotherhood tried to attack Kitty. But Duane and Lockheed fended them off easily. They were making a great team. Right now they were almost unbeatable.
In a few minutes the Brotherhood were defeated. Kitty still had Forge in her hand but she was wondering what to do with him.

What does she do to him?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Kitty vs the Brotherhood

choices: A session in the Danger Room (They have a date)
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty had a few things in mind that she wanted to do to Forge. But she still had a big heart and she couldn't do it. Instead like an X-Man would she gave him to the proper authorities. Although she didn't really want to do this she felt that it was the right thing to do.
Later back at the Mansion we see Kitty in her small dome in Professor X's office. She had Duane and Lockheed outside the dome with her and Professor X was at his desk.
"The other X-Men told me that you three have done very well," said Professor X. "If it wasn't for your assistance the Brotherhood might very well have successfully kidnapped Governor Kelly."
"It was nothing Professor," said Kitty.
"But your actions have prevented a war between humans and Mutants. And that would have cost countless lives. And as a reward you are now full members of the X-Men."
"Thanks Professor," replied Duane.
"Now if you want to you can either relax or have a session in the danger room."

Which one will they go for?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Professor X's office

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
"Fancy doing something in the Danger Room?" asked Duane.
"Well I have an idea for something," replied Kitty. "Take me to Storm and I'll see you in the Danger Room in ten minutes. And put on some nice clothes."
Duane takes Kitty's dome to Storm. Lockheed stays with her but she didn't mind.
He then went up to his room and got changed into his nicest clothes. He didn't know what Kitty was planning but he hoped that it would be nice.
When Duane stepped into the Danger Room he expected to see a war zone or a city being attacked. But instead he saw Kitty out of her dome and sitting at a giant table. They looked like they were in a giant sized restaurant and there was romantic music. He walked towards the candle lit table.
"Hey you're here," said Kitty.
"Yeah like you asked me to," replied Duane. "But what is all this?"
"Well Bobby and Rogue came in here for dates so I thought why don't we do the same?"
She then picked him up and put him at a normal sized table on top of the giant one. Lockheed was eating some food near him.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: The Date

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Duane's steaming hot meal was also on the table waiting for him to eat it. Kitty just smiled at him when he sat down.
"So tuck in before your food goes cold," said Kitty.
They began to eat their dinners. They were both delicious and the right size for the both of them.
After they had finished eating they looked at each other and then they began to talk.
"Wow who cooked all this?" asked Duane.
"I did with a Danger Room kitchen and a lot of food," replied Kitty. "Did you enjoy it my special little guy?"
"It was delicious. My complements to the chef."
Kitty giggled at him. "You know why you're a better boyfriend then Bobby and Peter was?"
"No why?"
"Because you're not a jerk like Bobby, and you can be with me unlike Peter was."
"And you're the best girlfriend I've ever had. But also you're the worst."
"So I'm the only girlfriend you've ever had."
"Yep pretty much."
They continued to talk for a few minutes. Kitty then picks up Duane and goes to kiss him.

What happens?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: A date with a giantess

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Just then the security alarm went off. This stopped Kitty from kissing Duane and she was very annoyed with it.
"Typical just when I plan the perfect evening there's a global crisis," said Kitty.
"We could do this later," replied Duane.
"Sure whatever just put me back in my dome so I can hear the briefing."
Duane then got out the dome gun and fired it at Kitty. She transported into the dome and Lockheed flew to Duane's shoulder.
The three of them go to the War Room where the X-Men were in a mission briefing. They could see the serious look on Professor X's face.
"My X-Men the Brotherhood are attacking a spot in New York now," said Professor X.
"Two places in one day?" asked Bobby. "Do these guys ever take a vacation?"
"Now is not the time for jokes Robert this is serious. We must stop them before they cause any damage. And we must find out what they're up to."
"How do we do that Professor X?" asked Scott.
"Question them and if necessary bring one of them here."
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Trouble again

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Within 15 minutes the X-Men arrived in New York. Now it was pitch black but the Brotherhood seemed to be ramdomly attacking people and buildings. This team was led by Juggernaut. He still had a bone to pick with Kitty after their last tussle.
The X-Men immediately went into action and Duane released Kitty from the dome and she grew back up to size. The Brotherhood began to attack them.
They each had their own opponent and Kitty was left with the unstoppable Juggernuat. He was happy with this.
"Hey you overgrown freak," said Juggernaut. "You're not gonna get me this time. I'm stronger and I'll kick your ass."
Kitty had heard enough and she stomped her food onto him and he was defeated. Although he didn't die he was buried in the ground and unconscious.
"Shut up," said Kitty.
The X-Men defeated the Brotherhood with ease. Longshot and Forge wasn't with them. But the X-Men expected better from Magneto. They thought that they were just easy and Magneto was loosing his touch. But Professor X had a sneaking suspicion. he knew Magneto was too clever to do something like that.

What do Kitty and Duane do when they get back?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Second attack

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
When the X-Men returned to the X-Mansion Kitty and Duane decided to go back to the Danger Room and resume their date.
The protocols were programmed but this time it was a giant bedroom perfect for Kitty's size. She sat on the bed and had Duane in her hand and Lockheed on her shoulder.
"So where were we?" asked Kitty.
"We were about to kiss," replied Duane.
"Oh yeah now hold still I don't want to accidentally swallow you."
Kitty then raised Duane to her lips and she kissed him for a few seconds. But after she stopped and rested him in her arms. She even gave Lockheed a little kiss so that he wouldn't feel left out.
She sat on the bed and rocked Duane and Lockheed in her arms. She felt a little like she was a mother. She just had a huge smile on her face.
But eventually they all got tired and Kitty lay back on the bed. She fell asleep seconds after her head hit the pillow.
Unfortunately Duane and Lockheed were trapped in her arms and they didn't have the strength to break free. But her arms were soft so they just lay there and went to sleep.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Finishing off the date

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
The next morning Kitty woke up bright and early. She was also hungry. She saw that Duane and Lockheed were still asleep so she put them on her bed. Unfortunately there was no food near her so she called for some assistance.
Thankfully Storm was awake and she bought them some breakfast. Kitty's eating woke up Duane and Lockheed. They were also hungry and they shared some of the food.
But everyone in the mansion felt a little weird. But it wasn't anything too serious so they just put it out of their mind.
Scott was in the War Room trying to find any evidence of the Brotherhood's whereabouts but to his frustration there was no trace of them. He knew that there was something more to this than the attacks. If Magneto would want the X-Men destroyed like that he would have sent them at the same time instead of two different waves.
Meanwhile back in the Danger Room Kitty was playing a little with Lockheed. She was saying how he was a good dragon. Duane was cutting his nails on a paper towel. He watched the gentle giantess playing with the Dragon. This made him smile.

What happens?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Day after

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
After Duane had finished doing his toenails he stepped towards Kitty's bed. At first she didn't see him but then she heard him and she picked him up and put him onto the bed.
"Hi Duane," said Kitty.
"You seem very happy today," replied Duane.
"I sure am and now I could just give you both a little cuddle." She then picked him up and she gave them both a hug.
Meanwhile in the Savage Land Magneto was happy with the Brotherhood's performance. He didn't expect them to defeat the X-Men he just wanted them to infect them.
He had planted microscopic metal shards on his brotherhood and they had transferred onto the X-Men. Now they were in trouble.
Back in the Danger Room kitty still cuddled her boyfriend and her dragon friend. She did seem extra cheerful today but they didn't mind.
When the hug stopped Kitty wanted to go outside and stretch her legs. So Duane put Kitty into her dome and he took her and Lockheed outside into the mansion gardens. He released her there and then and she began to do some exercises and breathe some fresh air.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Extra cheerful and gentle

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty began to stretch her huge body a little and she took a deep breath. Lockheed flew up to her shoulder.
"This is great," said Kitty. "Fresh air, The sun on my face and my best friends are here."
"That's great Kitty," replied Duane. "Now let's see how you can deal with me?"
At first Kitty was a little confused. Duane began to fire beams at her. She was able to dodge them and phase through them. She also noticed that one beam hit the wall and there was no damage. The beams weren't destructive they were more like a little exercise for her. She smiled at him.
"Oh you're good little man," she said. "But now let's see what I can do."
Before Duane could react his giant sized girlfriend picked him up. She brings him up to her eye level.
"Ok you win," he said.
"Oh I'm not finished with you yet little man."
She then began to kiss him and hug him. This lasted a few minutes and then she put him on her shoulder.
"That was fun," she said. "Too bad I'm not small like before. Then we could go on proper dates. Oh well its nice being big anyway."

What happens next?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Century

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Meanwhile in the Savage Land we see Magneto going to a machine which he had created with Forge. It was going to kill the X-Men like he had wanted it to. But it didn't specifically target them. While fighting the Brotherhood they had been exposed to tiny metal shards that were to be their downfall.
Magneto activated the machine and it started to work. He laughed as he though of his greatest foes being killed.
Meanwhile back in the Mansion gardens Kitty is still stretching her long body. She couldn't believe how energetic she was and she used most of the energy to give Duane and Lockheed little hugs. But then she began to feel pain throughout her entire body. She fell to the ground in pain. At first Duane was worried that she was going to have another growth spurt. But then he felt the same pain around his body.
Inside the X-Mansion they could hear the other X-Men in pain. But Lockheed seemed to be fine. He was able to see the tiny metal shards in kitty's skin. he used his fire breath to torch them. And they melted easily and Kitty didn't feel the pain. Then Lockheed did it to Duane.
"Hey I'm alright now," said Kitty.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: To kill an X-Man

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
"Maybe Lockheed's fire somehow cured us," said Duane. They could hear the other X-Men in pain. Kitty looked at Lockheed.
"Lockheed be a good dragon and fire all of the X-Men before they all get killed," said Kitty.
Lockheed then flew into the X-Mansion and one by one he found each of the X-Men he flamed them all and whatever was causing the horrific pain. The X-Men were fine after that. Lockheed flew back outside to Kitty's loving arms.
She kissed her little dragon. "You're a good dragon."
Lockheed enjoyed being with Kitty and Duane. They had grown a bond to each other which were almost unbreakable.
Inside the mansion one of the X-Men found one of the tiny shards of metal and Jean examined it for any clues.
She just used her telekinetic powers to remove the remaining ones and she studied them. There was only one person who could have pulled something like this off.
Outside Kitty was still in an extremely playful mood. She couldn't stop hugging her boyfriend and dragon.

What happens next?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Lockheed to the rescue

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Magneto was notified that his plan had failed. He wasn't too happy so he killed the messenger. He then sat on his throne and he couldn’t quite think what could have gone wrong. Professor X didn't suspect a thing. Then he began to think about the little dragon with the X-Men's giantess. He figured that he had some kind of immunity and he somehow gave it to the X-Men. This he would not tolerate. The small purple dragon was going to be killed.
A few hours later at the X-Mansion Kitty was giving Lockheed some treats for saving the lives of the X-Men she even let him get tested a little to see why he was immune. But he wouldn't leave her for too long.
When he was back from the tests she couldn't stop hugging him again. Duane also showed his appreciation to Lockheed. He also gave him some treats.
"Don't give him anymore," said Kitty. "We don't want him to fatten up. Now do we." She then continued to hug him. That was until Professor X came out. He smiled at them.
"Well Lockheed seems to be full of surprises," said Professor X.
"He sure is Professor and I wouldn't have him any other way."
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Lockheed the target

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty continued to cuddle Lockheed as Professor X rolled away in his chair. Kitty kept calling Lockheed a good little dragon. Lockheed like being in Kitty's loving arms.
Duane got Lockheed a piece of cake and he held it up to Kitty. She took it and gave it to Lockheed. She then stroked his head.
"You're a really good dragon," said Kitty.
A few days later in the Savage Land we see Magneto talking to his Brotherhood. He was telling them how they would seek revenge on Lockheed. But one of them was unfortunate enough to raise his hand.
"Err Magneto you're supposed to be taking over the world for mutants," he said. "Not get revenge on some dragon."
Then Magneto used his powers make the mutant's chair wrap around him. "He foiled my plans an in my law that is a capital offence and he will be put to death." he squeezes harder and the Mutant suffocates. "And questioning me is a capital offence." Then a picture of Lockheed in kitty's arms appeared. "The dragon known as Lockheed will be killed. But he’s being protected by Kitty Pryde. The most powerful of the X-Men. She is both powerful in size and strength. If we take he out the X-Men will surely fall."
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: The plan

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
That night at the X-Mansion we see Kitty in her room in the Danger Room. It still looked like her normal room except everything was bigger. She knew that noting it her room was real. Even the sunlight was artificial. But she didn't care. She still had Duane and Lockheed with her. Even thought the X-Men almost died that day she was still extremely playful. She put Duane and Lockheed on her bed and she sat in front of them.
"Ok how do you guys feel about a little game?" asked Kitty.
"Does it involve us getting hurt?" replied Duane.
"No I wouldn't do anything to hurt you guys. But this game is going to a lot of fun." She had a innocent smile on her face. They knew that she wouldn't hurt them.
"What game did you have in mind?"
Kitty could barely contain her excitement. "Hide and seek little guys." She then put them on the ground. "Now find somewhere to hide before I find you."
She then closed her eyes and she began to count. Duane went under the desk while Lockheed flew up to a shelf. No sooner had they finished hiding Kitty stopped counting and she stood up to her full height and she giggled.
"Ok little guys ready or not here I come."
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Hide n seek

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty hen looked around and she couldn't see her boyfriend or her pet dragon. This made it a lot more fun for her. She couldn't help but smile.
"Oh you little guys are good at this game," said Kitty. "But I'm even better."
She then began to have more of a thorough look. Duane was constantly moving from one place to another so that he wouldn't be discovered by the gentle giantess. He even mocked her a little by going right to her foot. But she didn't notice him but he had a good view from where he was.
In the end Kitty had an idea how she could get one of her victims out of hiding. She got one of Lockheed's favourite treats and she put it in her huge hand.
"Oh Lockheed," she said. "Mommy has strawberry chewy candy in her hand. And she knows that they're your favourite."
Meanwhile from his hiding place Lockheed could see the candy in Kitty's hand. He knew that he had to keep hiding. But the temptation of the candy was almost too great. The candy alone would probably not be enough but because it was in Kitty's soft hand and that she was calling him made it too much for him.
Lockheed then flew out of hiding and landed in Kitty's hand. He then began to eat the candy that was on her hand.

Will she find Duane?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: A way of getting Lockheed out of hiding

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
“One down and one more to go,” giggled Kitty. “But I know what Duane wants more than anything in the entire world. Oh Duane do you want to be lie in my breasts? I know that you like doing that and they’re right here for you.”
Meanwhile we see Duane in his hiding place. He was behind Kitty and he could see what she was doing. The promise of protection was almost driving him out. But he could not give in to temptation. But he was hoping that he could fight the temptation.
“Come on I know that you want them and they’re so big and soft,” said Kitty. Something seemed to have changed in her mind because she was never this playful before. But this was better then going on a rampage.
She then heard him panting behind her. She turned around and saw him in his hiding place.
“There you are little man.” She then bent down and picked him up. She put him on the same hand as Lockheed. “I must admit you two did very well. I had to resort to trickery. And for that you all get a big hug.”
Kitty then began to hug her friends. She was being watched by Professor X from a higher vantage point. He just smiled at her. He liked the fact that despite her size she was still decent inside and her size hadn’t corrupted her.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Finding Duane

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
In the Savage Land Magneto was with Forge creating a device. It was a special one that would kill Lockheed and anyone around him including the X-Men’s most powerful member.
They were working away. He had a smile on his face because he knew that his vengeance would be at hand.
Back at the X-Mansion we see Kitty outside in the Mansion gardens. She was still very playful and everyone was starting to like the new Kitty. She was a lot nicer than before. Well she was nice before but now she was possibly the nicest person on the planet. Her size made her the ultimate gentle giantess. Although she still wore the dress and sandals that she had when she was a slave for the Sycorax she didn’t really care. For her if it moved it got hugged. She also knew how strong she was so she was very careful.
She was playing another little game with Lockheed and Duane sat and watched. He liked seeing Kitty happy. But he told her that this time she couldn’t bribe him into coming to her. Lockheed was flying around and Kitty was meant to try and capture him.
“Come here Lockheed,” she said. “You’re making Mommy miss her soaps.” But Lockheed still didn’t come close to her. “Ok you asked for it little purple dino-dragon thing.”

What does Kitty do when she catches Lockheed?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Strange device

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty continued to try and catch Lockheed. Duane sat and watched her have her fun. She was like a little kid in a playground.
Lockheed was able to dodge Kitty’s every attempt to capture him. He was always seemingly able to slip through her large fingers. She found this humorous.
“Oh come on Lockheed give Mommy a little chance of getting you,” said Kitty barely able to contain her excitement. Lockheed just flew away. “Oh when I catch you I’m gonna give you the biggest hug you’ve ever had.”
Lockheed then turned around. The moment he did Kitty grabbed him and she began to hug him. He was on her huge soft breasts so it was the best hug in the world. She looked down and saw Duane. She then picked him up.
“I’m not gonna leave you out my Special Little Guy,” said Kitty. “You also get the world’s best hug.”
She also bought him close to her chest and she hugged him like she had done for Lockheed. He was also in ultimate comfort. Her breasts were so soft that you could possibly stay there your entire life. Her now even sweeter personality made the hug even more softer. But then Kitty was able to hear something. She looked over and saw what seemed to be a ship above them.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Hugs all around

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
The aircraft didn’t seem to have an engine and this made Kitty curious. She then felt a sharp pain hit her leg. She had been fired on by the aircraft. This made her angry.
“Hey that hurt,” said Kitty.
The aircraft continued to fire at her but she just phased right through the bullets. She then used her powers to walk on air up to the aircraft. She then phased her hand through the aircraft in hopes of short circuiting but it didn’t work.
“Hey there’s nothing electrical on this thing.”
Just then two metal pieces of rope came from the aircraft and it grabbed both Lockheed and Duane. It then bought them into the aircraft and it began to fly away. Kitty had hardly any time to react.
“Give them back. GIVE THEM BACK!”
She started to chase the aircraft but it was already too far away. Eventually she lost sight of it and this made her very upset. She punched the ground making a huge number of cracks and an earthquake. Kitty sat on the floor and cried her heart out. Professor X had seen the aircraft on the computers and he came out to Kitty.
“Kitty what’s wrong?” asked Professor X.
“They took Duane and Lockheed,” cried Kitty.

What happens next?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Kidnapping

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
“Who did?”
“I don’t know. They attacked me and they took them both. I couldn’t do anything to stop them. I should have done better.”
“Kitty you did all that you could.”
“But they’re gone and it’s all my fault.”
“Don’t beat yourself up.” He then pushed a button on his wheelchair. This was a microphone. “X-Men come to the War Room immediately.”
A little later we see the X-Men in the War Room. Kitty was too big to fit inside so she stayed outside. But she had been given a link so she could hear what was happening.
“My X-Men we have a personal crisis,” said Professor X. “Earlier today Lockheed and Omnipotent was kidnapped.”
“Who could have done such a thing?” replied Storm.
"I don't know but Kitty is especially distraut about this."
"Does she know who took them?"
"No she doesn't.And I dare not scan her mind. But maybe the computers can give us something."
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: War Room meeting

choices: On the outskirts of the savage land
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Professor X went through all of the evidence and he could only see that Magneto was the culprit. He could be the only one to fly like this. But getting Duane and Lockheed seemed to be a little beneath him. But then Lockheed did stop Magneto’s plans on killing the X-Men. So this must have been some sort of Vendetta.
The X-Men then loaded the X-Jet ready to go to the Savage Land. Unfortunately Duane had the device to put Kitty into her dome so they had to strap her to the X-Jet. It was able to take kitty there but it would make the journey last a little longer.
The journey started and Kitty felt the cold a little. But she was able to take the force of it for the sake of her friends. But right now she was more angry then gentle. She wanted to get her hands on Magneto and she wanted Duane and Lockheed back safe and sound. She had a radio in her ear so that she could communicate with her.
“Are you alright Kitty?” asked Scott.
“Well my friends have been taken hostage, it’s freezing cold up here and there’s a bird that keeps pecking my ass,” replied Kitty. “Yes I’m perfectly fine.”
“Please no sarcasm Kitty,” Said the Professor. “It’s not helping the situation.”
“Sorry Professor. I’m just a little edgy.”

Where do they land?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Travelling to the Savage Land

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
The X-Men soon landed on the Savage Land. Kitty phased her body through the chains that had attached her to the X-Jet. She was very angry, a lot angrier than she ever had been before. Angrier then when she faced the Sycorax, angrier then when her father walked out on her mother. The X-Men were having difficulties controlling her. In the end Professor X had to release a chemical in her brain that calmed people down. When she was calm everyone was relieved.
“Ok we need to get to Magneto’s base without Omnipotent and Lockheed get slaughtered,” said Professor X. “Kitty it’s best that you stay here. You would set the alarms off if they saw you.”
“I can’t stay here when my friends are in danger,” replied Kitty.
“I know that you’re stressed over this. But setting the alarms off won’t do us any favours. In fact it might seal Omnipotent and Lockheed’s fate.”
“Ok Professor.”
“Good now I will stay here with you and I’ll give the team tactics if needed.”
The other X-men then went through the jungles towards Magneto’s base. They had to be ready for anything. He had an army of followers. One wrong move and Duane and Lockheed would be surely dead.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Kitty can't go

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty sat and anxiously waited for the X-Men to return with Duane and Lockheed. The wait was literally killing her. She looked over to the Professor.
"Professor what if the X-Men fail?" asked Kitty.
"It's alright I know they won't fail," replied Professor X. "Especially since this means a lot to you."
"But can't I help them?"
"Only if they run into trouble. Then we'll call you into action."
"Ok Professor."
"Good now it's best for you to do something to occupy yourself while we wait."
Meanwhile the X-men used the jungle to cover themselves. It was very hard to be detected. But they had to move very carefully, there could be traps here set for intruders. This would be increasingly hard for the X-Men.
Storm created some mist so they could see any laser wires that would trip a trap. The X-Men were able to get past them and they were able to get to the wall.
Inside the radars had picked up the X-Men. Magneto and the other members of the Brotherhood were warned. And now there was going to be a showdown between the two teams of mutants.

Who will win?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Worried Kitty

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
The X-Men and brotherhood clashed. Last time the X-Men fought the Brotherhood they were on equal grounds. But now they were at Brotherhood HQ where there were hundreds of them. The X-Men knew that it was a losing battle.
Meanwhile in the underground parts of the HQ we see Duane and Lockheed. Duane was in a cell that repelled his attacks almost instantly. Lockheed was in a small cage. He wasn’t strong enough to break out.
Magneto was also there and he looked at them. He laughed a little and then one of the Brotherhood members came in.
“Lord Magneto the X-Men are attacking the base,” he said.
“Let them,” replied Magneto. “I want them here alive so they can witness the execution of Omnipotent and Lockheed.”
“Yes sir.” The Messenger then went away.
Lockheed went to breathe fire on Magneto. But he saw it coming. He shielded himself with metal. When Lockheed gave up magneto used the metal to wrap around Lockheed’s mouth, shutting it off.
“A feeble attempt,” said Magneto.
“You know Magneto I know one X-Man you’re making upset,” replied Duane. “And when she finds out what you’re doing she’ll be plenty mad.”
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: The Brotherhood base

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Meanwhile at the X-Jet Kitty sat there waiting. She was with the Professor and they were monitoring what was happening. Professor X was having telepathic contact with the other X-Men. He knew that the X-Men were outnumbered. The only way he could see victory was for Kitty to get involved.
"Ok Kitty you can go now," said Professor X. "Just be careful."
"Ok Professor," replied Kitty.
She then stood up to her full height and she started to run towards the base. Everyone could feel her footsteps. They were like an earthquake. But the X-men knew who was coming.
But Kitty was normally a gentle giantess. but since her friends were in trouble she had to throw her gentleness away for now. And she did it immediately when she reached the base.
There were several plasma shots at her but she simply phased through them harmlessly. She picked up many of the brotherhood and she threw them to one side with only the slightest use of her Hulk plus like strength. Then she saw the building itself and that was where Omnipotent and Lockheed were. She went over to it and looked at it.

What does she do?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Calling in the giantess

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty started to rip the wall apart. She thought that it would be easier than phasing through it. She couldn’t see where Duane or Lockheed were so she just started to rip and random parts. Then she felt a bolt of energy hit her body. She looked behind her and saw one of the Brotherhood. She glared at him.
“Do you wanna try that again?” asked Kitty. “Because if you do I’ll squash you like the bug you are.”
This sacred the mutant away and Kitty continued to search for her friends. But then she saw metal flying towards her. She wasn’t quick enough to dodge them but was able to harmlessly phase through them. Then she saw Magneto raising in front of her.
“Congratulations Shadowcat,” said Magneto. “No one has ever done this much damage to my base ever.”
“Give me back my friends now!” demanded Kitty. “Believe me you don’t want to see me angry.”
“Your rage can do nothing against my power. Now I give you this one chance to surrender and join me then your friends will be saved.”
“I’d rather die.”
“As you wish.”
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Ripping apart

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Magneto started to use every metal object around him to throw at the mighty Giantess. But when the metal got close to her she used her primary powers to phase through the metal harmlessly.
"Is that the best you've got?" asked Kitty. "I thought Big Bad Magneto had so much more power."
"Quiet girl you haven't seen anything yet."
He then got all of the metal and he started to create it into a giant humanoid creature that rivaled Kitty's size.
"Oh you need big metal monsters to take me down? That's stupid."
Kitty and the metal monster began to fight. Magneto had underestimated her sheer strength and she was ripping the monster apart limb from limb. But Magneto used his powers to repair it.
"Hey that's no fair."
"Life is not fair Shadowcat. I've seen my Family die because one country had a dictator in power."
"Some of my family died too because of him. But right now you're no better than him."
"I do what I do to protect mutant kind from Extinction!"

Who will win?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Metal monster

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty continued to fight Magneto’s metal monster. She was phasing through it’s attacks but it would sometimes get the better of her. She got hit once and her head was bleeding a little.
“Hey that hurt,” said Kitty. She then tore its head off but Magneto just replaced it. “I need to get him. That’s the only way I can win.”
She then phased through the monster and she started to go towards Magneto. He tried to stop her but nothing was stopping the mighty Giantess.
“You’ve killed thousands of people, you hurt my friends and you’ve hurt me. Now I’m here for justice.”
She then grabbed Magneto and she began to squeeze him. She was still being attacked by the metal monster but she simply phased through it. But eventually Magneto lost consciousness and the metal monster fell into the scrap metal that it was.
Kitty gave Magneto to the other X-men. Then she went back to the building and freed Duane and Lockheed she gave them both a big hug.
“Oh I missed you guys so much,” said Kitty.
“Thanks for saving us,” replied Duane.
“Any time little guy. Any time.”
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Kitty Victorious

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty couldn't stop hugging Duane and Lockheed. But eventually she knew that she had to. She needed to get back to the states. She went back to the X-men. They needed to get to the X-Jet but it was a bit of a walk. So Kitty just picked them up and she started to walk towards the Jet.
When she got there she put them down and she was put back into her dome. She didn't like the Dome that much but she accepted that it was the only way she would get around in normal vehicles.
When they got back to the mansion Kitty was released in the Danger Room the resembled her bedroom. She sat on her bed and Lockheed was on her huge shoulder. She stroked him carefully.
Duane was in the kitchen's getting some food. He was hungry since Magneto hadn't really fed them. Wolverine was there as well.
"I'm always happy when we beat old bucket head," said Wolverine.
"Do you think he's ever gonna come back?" replied Duane.
"Yeah probably but that's why we're here to stop him from any of his megalomaniac schemes."
"You're taking this well Wolverine."

What happens tomorrow?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Back to the mansion

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
"Well I've dealt with my fair share o psychos in my life," said Wolverine. "Too bad Chuck doesn't buy us any beer."
The next morning the Mansion had a surprise visitor. It was Kitty's mother Theresa. She had come form Deerfield Illinois to see her daughter. She was seen by the Professor.
"Theresa now this is a surprise," said the Professor. "Is there any reason for your visit besides visiting Kitty?"
"No this is just a visit," replied Theresa. "I expected to see her outside. But where is she?"
"Well we've been able to convert the Danger Room in her ideal room. Now please follow me."
The Professor then rolled to the lifts and Theresa followed. They went down to the Subbasement and to the Danger Room control Room. Theresa saw her giant sized daughter having fun with Duane and Lockheed.
"She looks so happy," said Theresa.
"Well she is," replied Professor X. "I must say she's developing into a fine young woman. You should be proud."
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Theresa comes to visit

choices: Tell Theresa about their latest battle against Magneto
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Professor X then switched the microphone on and he began to speak through it.
"Kitty you have a visitor," said Professor X. This had gotten Kitty's attention and she looked over to the control booth. Then the Professor handed the microphone to Theresa.
"Hi there Kitty," she said.
"Mom," replied Kitty.
"Yeah I'm here for you sweetie. I can see you're happy here."
"I know everyone's being supportive." She then looked at Duane and Lockheed. "If you guys don't mind I want some alone time with my Mom."
Duane and Lockheed agreed. Kitty lifted them to the control booth and put them in there. She took her mother out and the men with the dragon left them be. Kitty then sat on her bed with her mother in her hand.
"So Kitty what's it like being 60 feet tall?" asked Theresa.
"It's great I'm stronger then I ever was and I can defend myself," replied Kitty. "Plus everyone wants me on their team in basketball." She chuckled a little. "But I can only move around in a dome. I'm too big for the X-Jet or any car."
"Don't worry about that Kitty."

What does Kitty do?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Alone time

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
"I beat Magneto," said Kitty.
"Really when?" replied Theresa.
"Not too long ago there I was in the Savage Land. I was the only person standing in the way of Magneto from certain victory. He tried to use his little magnet powers but I still beat him and saved the X-Men."
"So you're still happy here?"
"Yeah no offence but these guys are like my family."
"None taken I'm happy to see that you're here. But seeing you wasn’t the only reason I came. You have a letter."
"Who from?"
"Your Father."
"What?"
Theresa showed her giant sized daughter the letter. But the writing was too small for Kitty to read.
"Mom I'm too big to read can you do it?" asked Kitty.
"Ok." Theresa put her reading glasses on and she began to read the letter that was written by Kitty's father.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: A letter

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Dear Kitty. I am sorry I have missed your childhood. I want to make it up to you as soon as possible. You have a stepmother and half-sister in Colorado. I want to see you at this Xavier's Institute for Gifted Youngsters your Mother sent you to. At least I know my daughter is gifted." From your Father, Carmen Pryde.
Kitty fell silent after her mother finished reading the letter. She was thinking about how her father would react when he found out that Kitty was 60 feet tall. She shed a tear.
"Is it real?" asked Kitty.
"Yes it's real," replied Theresa. "Even to the handwriting."
"So I'm finally going to see him?"
"Yes Kitty you'll be able to see your father again."
Kitty was mixed with happiness and sadness. She had always wanted to meet her father. But she didn't want him to think that she was some kind of freak. She looked at her mother a little.
"When did this come?" asked Kitty.
"A few days ago," replied Theresa.
"I don't have long to prepare then."

When will kitty's father come?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: A visit soon

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
A few days later Kitty had gotten herself already for her father to come. She had been waiting to see him for years and years and she couldn't believe that she was actually going to meet him. She had a lot of make up on.
She sat in her room with Duane and Lockheed sitting on her table. She was making some last minute preparations.
"Do I look alright?" asked Kitty.
"Yes you look fine," replied Duane.
"Does this dress make my ass look too big?"
"I've told you before no."
"Sorry I'm just nervous. I haven't seen him in so long. There's so much I want to ask him."
"There will be plenty of time for that. Stop worrying you look perfect."
"But what if he rejects me because of my size?"
"He's going to love you no matter what you look like. You're his little girl right."
"Not anymore."
"Ok I kinda walked into that one but just relax."
"I'll try."
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Getting ready

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Eventually Carman Pryde’s car pulled up onto the drive of Xavier’s school. He stepped out and was greeted by Professor X. the pair shook hands.
“So you’re the Professor Xavier that my ex-wife told me about,” he said.
“Welcome to the school Mr. Pryde I’m sure you want to see Kitty.”
“Yes I haven’t seen my daughter since she was five. I wonder how big she’s grown.”
“I’ll leave that to you.” He then started to roll away on his chair. “Please follow me Kitty has been preparing herself all day for your arrival.”
Professor X then led Carman to the Danger Room. The lights were out and he couldn’t see inside. At first he thought that the Professor was playing some kind of game.
“Is this some kind of trick?” he asked.
“I’m afraid not Mr. Pryde.”
“Where’s my Daughter?”
“She’s inside but I warn you’re in for a shock.” He then turned towards the Danger Room. “Are you ready Kitty?”
“I’m ready Professor,” replied Kitty.
Just then the lights came on. Carman saw his teenage daughter for the first time in ten years. He was in a state of shock and panic over her size.

What does Carman do/
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: meeting Kitty

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
"Oh my God what happened to you!" shouted Carman.
"Please calm down daddy," replied Kitty.
But then he fainted. But before he fell onto the ground Kitty was able to catch him so he didn't seriously hurt himself. She was sad by her father's reaction to her. But she felt some understanding. She would probably have done the same in his shoes.
A little later Carman slowly woke up. But he was in Kitty's hand. She was trying to comfort him as best as she could.
"Don't worry daddy I won't drop you," said Kitty.
"But what happened to you?" replied Carman.
"Well I wanted to get the perfect body but something went wrong so now I'm stuck at this size."
"That incredible."
"I know but don't freak out anymore. I'm sad when you do that."
"Well I don't want to hurt you now Princess. Well especially since you're 60 feet tall."
"Are you implying that I would hurt you?"
"No not at all."
"Good."
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Faint

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty spent some time with her father. He was still a little nervous because of her height. But she was still as gentle as ever. She made sure that she wasn't accidentally hurting him or anything like that.
"So how is Xavier's school?" asked Carman.
"It's very nice," replied Kitty. I have a boyfriend, other friends and there’s one in particular who wants to meet you." She then whistled. "Lockheed."
Then Lockheed went flying through the air and he went to Kitty. He landed on her hand next to Carman. This made him jump at first.
"What is that?" asked Carman.
"That is my very own pint sized fire breathing dragon." She then stroked him with her finger. "I called him Lockheed. GO on stroke him Daddy he's not going to bite."
Carman then carefully forwarded his hand and he gently stroked Lockheed. He liked and hummed to himself. This made Kitty smile.
"See he likes you," said Kitty.
"Well he is kinda cute," replied Carman.
"Do you want me to show you around the grounds?"
"Well..."
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Carman and Lockheed

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
"Alright then," said Carman. "It does sound interesting."
"Great but we have a slight problem," replied Kitty. "I need you to put me in my dome so I can get out of here. Unfortunately I'm a little too big to fit through the door."
"How do I do that?"
"Simple. She then went to her side and picked up the gun. "Just fire this at me an I'll go into this dome. To release me just break the dome and I'll be free."
"Ok then."
"But first I need to put you on the ground. I don't think you could survive a near 60 foot drop."
Kitty gave Carman the ray gun and she put him on the ground. She also told Lockheed to go to her father. When that was done Carman fired the ray gun at her and he watched his giant sized daughter disappear. Then he saw her appear in the dome.
"See nothing to it," said Kitty.
"But how do I get out of here?"
"Easy. Lockheed." Then Lockheed came to her dome. "Show Daddy the way out of here."
Lockheed then flew away and he indicated that he wanted to be followed.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Ok then

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Carman followed Lockheed to the outside. He was still a little uneasy with the small dragon but he saw Kitty smiling at him. Carman knew that the dragon meant him no harm. In fact he was beginning to think that Lockheed was pretty cute.
Eventually the reached the outside of the mansion. Carman broke the dome on the ground and he watched his daughter grow back up to giant size. She picked him up and Lockheed flew onto her shoulder.
"Well this is the mansion grounds Daddy," said Kitty.
"It looks beautiful from up here," replied Carman.
"I know that’s why I like coming out here. It puts my mind onto it's beauty and less on how much I stick out now."
"Couldn't you be cured or something?"
"At one point I was cured. But to save the planet I sacrificed it. But now I'm stuck like this. I'm never going to be my normal size again."
"Don't be sad."
"I'm not sad. With my size I've helped a lot of people on this planet and on another. I'm still getting use to have to eat a lot more then everyone else but I can live with that. As long as I don't get fat."

What happens next?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Fields

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
But then Lockheed began to feel something in the air. His senses were going wild and he knew that something bad was going to happen. He flew around Kitty’s huge head in some panic. She tried to calm him down.
“What’s wrong Lockheed?” asked Kitty. She was able to gently grab him. “Please calm down.”
“Is he always like this?” replied Carman.
“No he’s never acted like this. Well since I’ve had him. He’s always been calm around me.”
But then Kitty felt a sharp pain in her leg. She looked down and saw what seemed to be a needle in her leg. She tried to react fast but her leg went dead. She then felt a pain in her other leg and that became useless.
Kitty are you alright?” asked Carman.
“No I’m being attack,” replied Kitty. “Warn the others make sure they get out alright. Make sure Lockheed is safe.”
She then put him on the ground and no sooner had she done this she fell on the ground unconscious. The impact of the fall made a small earthquake that shook parts of the X-Mansion.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Attack

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
When Kitty woke up she didn’t know where she was. The last thing she remembered was that she had been attacked. She tried to break out of her bonds but even she didn’t have the strength to do it. This upset her. But then she tried to phase through them but she couldn’t even do that.
Bu then she saw what seemed to be scientists around her. She tried to get them away from her. But it wasn’t working. She saw a woman looking over her from a balcony.
“W-where am?” asked Kitty.
“That is none of your concern,” replied the Woman in a thick German accent. “Do not try to escape. Your powers are being blocked at those restrains are adamantium. Not even your incredible strength can break them.”
“But who are you?”
“I am Madam Hydra and you will become a newest member. I admit our reluctant newest member.”
“Let me go I just wanted to spend time with my Dad.”
“Life is cruel isn’t it? Well your life now belongs to us. Put her back to sleep.”
“No.”
Then the scientists began to try and stick needles into her arm.

What happens next?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Madam Hydra

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
The scientists tried but they couldn’t get through Kitty’s rock hard skin. They kept trying but nothing was happening. They looked over to Madam Hydra.
“Her skin is too thick,” said Scientist. “We can not penetrate it.”
“Get the adamantium needle,” replied Madam Hydra.
“Yes Ma’am. Hail Hydra.”
Then Kitty saw the adamantium needle being filled up with a serum. She began to panic a little and she tried to break out of her restraints. But even her great strength couldn’t break them no matter how hard she tried.
She was able to knock the scientists over with her elbow but that’s all she could do for now try and keep them away from her.
“Fools use shockers to keep her restrained,” said Madam Hydra.
Then some of the soldiers began to fire electric guns at her. This caused her some pain but she was still trying to get herself free.
“It is pointless Miss Pryde. We will get what we want.”
“No!” shouted Kitty.
She then trued to raise her hand and the floor under her restraints. She grabbed one of the soldiers and threw them to one side.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Thick skin

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
"She's trying to escape," said Madam Hydra. "Stop her!"
But by then Kitty was already getting herself out of her restraints. She was still bolted to them but she just brought the ground out underneath them. This was several layers of reinforced concrete. Everyone was impressed by her strength. But she was now seriously pissed off.
"How dare you kidnap me!" shouted Kitty. “Now you'll pay!"
She started to make her way towards one of the walls. She simply punched her way out of it like it was a cardboard cut out. She then smelled the fresh air. But wherever she was she was freezing. Her attire didn't help that much either.
It didn't look like she was in America anymore. It seemed to be more remote and a lot colder. She began to shiver a little. But then she began to hear some of the guards behind her and she began to run out in the snow.
But this would also put her at a disadvantage. Footprints of her size never go unnoticed no matter how much she wanted to.
"This is great," she thought. "I'm cold, lost and I've got crazy people trying to turn me into some kind of living weapon. Its official things can't get any worse. "She then heard a cracking noise. "Me and my big mouth."

What is it?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Escape

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
She quickly moved off the ground before it cracked under her weight.
Kitty was freezing her body off. But she tried to phase herself through the icy winds. It did help but it was still really cold. She had to find somewhere that she could stay warm and out of the weather.
She walked up to a hill and she began to look around. To her relief there was a town not too far away from her. She thought about going but she also thought how they would react when they saw her. They would either try to kill her or call the National Guard. But she had to take a chance.
Meanwhile not too far away from kitty Hydra soldiers were tracking the teenage giantess. She wasn’t too particularly hard to find since her footprints were clearly in the snow. They would reach her soon.
Kitty walked to the town. She saw that everything was in German and she hoped that someone there could speak English. If not then she would be in big trouble. Some of the townspeople began to see her.
“Please help me,” said kitty. “There’s some soldiers who want to turn me into some kind of weapon.”
But the townspeople cursed in German.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: help needed

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
Kitty saw that she wasn't getting anywhere with these people. She could hear the soldiers coming for her. All she could think about doing was phasing herself through the ground. It would give her some time to escape.
The townspeople were amazed to see her simply go through the ground. They thought she had been some kind of ghost and they ran away from where she had been.
Underground Kitty couldn't see or breathe anything. That was one thing about phasing through the ground. She just tried to walk away from where she had been. She just hoped that it was away from the soldiers.
When she was nearly out of breath she came up through the ground and she took a deep breath. She was just outside the town and she could see a payphone. It was like her prayers had been answered.
Kitty went to the phone and picked it up. She couldn't type the numbers in because she was too big. This really got her down. But eventually she saw a passing person. She stopped him and he was afraid.
"Please help me," said Kitty.
"What are you?" he asked.
"You speak English."

Will he help her?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Payphone

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
“Yes I have been taught English,” said the Man. He spoke in a thick German accent. There was also some fear in his voice.
“I need you to do me one favour,” replied Kitty. “I need you to call Xavier’s school for the gifted in America. I’m too big to use the phone but you’re the right size.”
“Ok but don’t hurt me.”
“I promise you I won’t Mr.”
“Helmut.”
“Helmut I promise I won’t hurt you.”
“Ok I’ll help you.”
Kitty then told Helmut the number for the mansion and he typed it into the mansion. He waited for someone to pick up the phone. It was answered by Nightcrawler.
“Hello,” said Kurt.
“Hello is this Xavier’s school for the gifted?” replied Helmut.
“Yes it is.”
“I’m with a Miss Kitty Pryde. She says that she’s a student here.”
“Yes she is. Where are you?”
“We’re in the alps.”
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Calling home

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.content:
“What is she doing there?” asked Nightcrawler.
“I don’t know,” replied Helmut. “She was just here and she told me to call this number. Can you help her?”
“We can be there within an hour. Tell her to stay put.”
Helmut then put the phone down and he looked up at Kitty. He was a little unsure how to tell her.
“Well what did they say?” asked Kitty.
“They told you to stay there for an hour until they arrived,” replied Helmut.
“An hour?” This had caught her by surprise. “In an hour these soldiers will be here to kill me or worse.”
“There maybe a way to hide you.”
“Well there’re not many places for people of my size.”
“I know one place.”
Helmut then led Kitty to an old barn. It would hide her but it was a little obvious to hide there.
“I can’t hide in there,” said Kitty.
“Got any better ideas,” replied Helmut.

What doe she do?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Within the hour

Kitty thought for a moment. But she soon realised that Helmut was right. She had to squeeze herself into the barn. Her phasing powers made it easy for her. But she couldn’t use them properly in case one of her limbs came out of the barn. She just hoped that the X-Jet would have the heat seekers on.
She sat there and waited for what seemed to be an eternity. Rain began to fall and Kitty felt the cold a little. She tried to make herself warm by rubbing her shoulders. But it was difficult.
But eventually she heard what seemed to a jet above her. She phased her head through the roof to take a look. She was happy to see the X-Jet in the sky. She was just hoping they could find her.
But the first thing that came down was Lockheed. He flew into the barn where Kitty was. He landed on her hand.
“Lockheed,” she said. “I was afraid that I’d never see you again.” He responded positively. “I can see that you missed me too.”
She was able to get out of the barn and the X-Jet had already landed on the ground. Kitty could see several X-Men inside. She gave them all a pleasant smile and she waited for to come out.
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Found

Lockheed enjoyed the hug thoroughly and wagged his tail in delight. She was definitely hitting the right buttons for him.
Then she felt something hitting her toe. She looked down and she saw Duane. She gently picked him up and she raised him up to her level. She smiled at him as well and he tried to smile back.
“I’m glad you’re back,” said Duane.
“I’m glad to be back,” replied Kitty. “You don’t know how scared I was there. I thought they were going to catch me and turn me into some kind of weapon. I really don’t want to hurt people.”
“I know you won’t.”

Is Kitty in the clear?
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Home

Back in America Kitty was just relaxing after her chaotic experience. Lockheed was playing in her hand and she would stroke him a little. She smiled at him.

"Kitty this is a little uncomfortable."

He then used one of his blasts on Kitty's hand.

Will he get out?

He began to run as fast as he could away from her. He hated to do it but she was screaming at him to leave.

A little later we see Kitty being airlifted away by S.H.I.E.L.D. They were keeping her sedated but her size meant that she needed a lot of sedatives and she was burning them off fast.
The X-Men were worried about their team mate. She was one of the most powerful beings on the planet and if anyone had hijacked her the world would be in danger.

Will she wake up?

What does Kitty do?

Where does she go?

choices: The chip in her brain fries

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: A giant robot

Will he follow her?

She then ebgan to walk away. Duane wanted to follow her so that he would be sure that she wasn't going to do anything that she would regret later on. But he understood that she had just been through a traumatic experience and needed some time to herself. All he could do was wait.

"What do you want?" asked Kitty. "Can't you guys just kill me already. I don't deserve to live."
"Now thoughts like that make the world a little worse," replied Nick Fury. "Now do you want to sit there sobbing all day or do you want to help your country and take revenge on the people who turned you into a monster."
"Yes."
"Then listen to me very clearly. I need you to follow this copter."

The copter then flew away and Kitty stod up. he began to follow it. She wasn't sure about this but she wanted to make up for everything she had done wrong. She didn't want to harm anyone else who was innocent.

1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Redemption

Kitty was eventually surrounded by S.H.I.E.L.D agents. She could see that they had high tech weapons and guessed that they didn’t fire bullets. They knew that they would be useless against her.
“At ease men,” said Nick Fury. He then walked through a couple of soldiers. “The chip in her head is deactivated.”
“Fury,” replied Kitty. “I’m so sorry for what I’ve done.”
“Don’t worry you’ve got a chance to set everything right. All you need to do is obviously rescue the President.”
“So I just go to Hydra base and take him?”
“It’s not that simple. Like us now they have the weapons to take you down. But you’re the only one who is able to do it?”
“Why not just send the Ultimates?”
“They are current AWOL and I can’t rely on them. But you were powerful enough to survive a direct attack on Hydra.”
“But my friend as hurt.”
“And thanks to us we’re given Xavier’s school the right equipment to help him. Not every girl has a pet dragon.”
1422212111212122111121121111112121211222.title: Go for it

“Ok Kitty,” said Nick Fury. “As we speak we are tracking down HYDRA. The President automatically has a tracking device. But HYDRA will probably remove it and then move on. That’s why we have to strike them fast. When we find the location of HYDRA I want agents to be there within ten minutes.” He then turned around to a man on the computer screen. “Got anything Computer Chip?”
“I’m picking a signal up about 50 miles northwest of here,” replied Computer Chip. “The President is there.”
“Good.” He then turned back to the agents and Kitty. “We know the tracking device is still operating because it requires the President’s body heat to power it and we’ve made it work to only his DNA. Ok move out.”
“But I can’t run 50 miles in ten minutes,” replied Kitty.
“Don’t worry we’ve got some transport for you.” He then pulled out the ray gun that put Kitty into her dome. “You can thank Xavier for this.” He then fired at Kitty and she disappeared. But seconds later she reappeared back into the dome and she seemed to be a little surprised.
“Well this would have been useful during my rampage.”
“Negative you would have phased right through.”
