1431111222.title: Sue toys with Reed

14312.content:
Reed gets up to answer the door. But first he asked the Baxter Computer to see who it was.
"Who's at the door?" asked Reed.
"A man I do not recognize," replied the Computer.
Reed cautiously opens the door. He is surprised to find out it was a guy holding a pizza box.
"I have a pizza for a Johnny Storm," said the Pizza Guy.
Then almost out of nowhere Johnny came running to the door.
"That's me," said Johnny.
"Ok that's $10 plus tip."
Johnny gives the pizza guy $15. "Here you go keep the change."
"See ya dude."
The pizza guy leaves and Johnny closes the door and opens his pizza box.
"Hey I ordered extra Anchovies."
He then goes back to his room. Sue was still sitting on the couch. Reed was still standing up. Then the phone starts to ring. Reed goes and picks it up.
"Hello...Yes Hank.....Ok.......thanks anyway.....Bye." He puts the phone down.
"Who was that?" asked Sue.
"That was Dr Pym he can't come. He's on an Avengers mission."
"So we're on our own."
"Basically yes."
Sue stands up.
"What are you doing?" asked Reed.
"I'm going somewhere where I can teach myself how to control these powers."
She storms out of the room and goes to a the biggest room in the Baxter building
14312.title: Pizza

choices: Take her new found powers out for a spin
143121.content:
Inside the biggest room Sue sat in the middle of it. There was no furniture or anything in there. There was only her.
"Ok Sue you can do it," she thought to herself. "Just remember what you felt when you were in Reed's lab." She tries to concentrate but she sees that she wasn't getting any bigger. "Why is it not working." She starts to silently sob. She puts her face into her hands. She cries for a few seconds. Then something hits her on the head. She looks to see what it was. Then she found out it was her head hitting the ceiling. She had to be about 70 feet tall.
"Hey I did it." She then shrinks down to 30 feet. Then she increases her height to 50 feet.
Sue practices her powers for about an hour. She kept ranging her height between 7 and 150 feet tall. But she felt she could get bigger, a lot bigger if she had enough space.
After she finished practicing she shrank down to a couple of inches above her normal height.
"This seems better."
She goes back to the lab where Reed was still researching the meteorite.
"Hey Reed I've done it I've taught myself to control these powers," said Sue.
"That's good to hear but I'm worried about this meteorite," replied Reed.
"Why what's happened?"
"Since that blast of energy affected you the meteorite has no energy signal anymore."
"So is that bad?"
"I'm not quite sure."
"If you don't mind I want to go out shopping to take my mind off what's just happened."
"Ok but when you come back I have to run some tests on you."
"Ok I'll see you later."
Sue goes outside the Baxter building. She was wondering how to get to the mall. With her old powers she would have just flew there using an invisible forcefield. But since they were gone she had to take another transport.

What does she do?
143121.title: Control

1431211.content:
"I may as well show the world my new powers," said Sue. "Anyway it would be almost impossible even for a super hero to get a cab at this hour."
She increases her size to 100 feet. She then starts to walk in the direction of the mall. She was careful not to step on anything. Many people on the ground just stood there and watched as she walked past them. Many took a picture. After a while new helicopters start to fly around her. No one was really panicking. They knew who it was and they knew they had nothing to fear.
Eventually she got to Times Square. She accidentally tripped over some construction work. Luckily everyone was able to escape in time or else they would have been flatter than a pancake. She fell onto her back. She didn't hurt herself.
"I'm such a Klutz," said Sue.
Then from the ground some lizard like arms grabbed her and pulled her down into the ground. Before she could react she was already half a mile in the ground.

choices: he brings out his giant monster
14312111.content:
The monster dragged her down until she was 2 miles below the streets of New York. The monster had taken her down to an underground cave that felt very familiar. After that the monster just left. She looks up at the hole she has just went down.
"I wonder if I can grow myself out of this?" thought Sue. "It looks like a two mile climb. I've never tried to grow anywhere near 2 miles but I may as well try."
She was just about to grow when suddenly the Moleman appeared.
"Hello again Sue Richards," he said.
"Moleman I should have known it was you."
"Why thank you my dear."
"Why have you bought me down here?"
"You will find out in all good time. Now attack her my minions."
Suddenly more 1,000 of the Moleman's creatures came up from the ground and started to attack Sue. But as everyone knows big things crush little things. The fight didn't last long.
"Is that the best you can come up with?"
"No it's just a test. The worst is yet to come."
14312111.title: Moleman

choices: She wakes up back on the surface
143121111.content:
"Come out my precious," said the Moleman.
Then the same giant monster that had dragged Sue down the ground appeared. Funny it looked a little bit cuddlier than she remembered.
"Not this guy again," replied Sue.
"Ths same now attack her."
The monster lashes out at Sue. But she grabs it's arm. Then she chops him and he splits in half easily. Too easily for that matter. Some strange gas started to come out of the monster. It engulfed Sue. She starts to cough.
"What is this stuff?" asked Sue.
"A little concoction created by your's truly. Nighty night Colossal Girl."
Sue fell over unconscious.

What happens next to our Giantess Heroine?
143121111.title: Is it a Monster

1431211111.content:
Sue wakes up and finds herself in a room. Judging by her surroundings she estimates herself to be about 10 feet tall.

About this time she starts to feel a slight burning feeling on the back of her neck, putting her hand there she can feel what seems to be stiches...

"What the..."

Suddenly Sue heard the voice of the Moleman...

"Ah I see you have woken up..."

"Where are you! Show yourself!"

"That won't be happening anytime dear... you see I am very safe at the moment... unlike the rest of the world will be..."

"What does that mean!"

"Dear... I have implanted a mind control device in the base of your skull... you will obey me, and only me..."

"No chance, no one controls ME!"

"I think you will find it quite dangerous to remove yourself... and yes it will grow and shrink with you... after all that is the purpose..."

Sue stops attempting to change her size after realizing she seems to no longer control the process

"I think you were trying to do this?"

Suddenly Sue started growing and was quickly filling up the room...

"You see, I have complete control over you, you will grow when I want you to, destroy what I want you to... you are mine..."

Sue now almost completely filled the room, still unable to stop her growth, not even slowing it down.

"What do you want from me?"

The growth suddenly stops.

"I want you to destroy the upper world, crush it, stomp it, eat it, whatever, I want them all dead, I want them gone... Then I will rule forever!"

"Never, I won't do it!"

"Oh really? I don't think you have a choice"

Sue starts growing again breaking through the room...

How big does she get?
1431211111.title: Mind Control

14312111111.content:
"No! I won't do evil!" Cried Sue. "Oh well my dear, Thats not your desicion to make!" Said the Moleman. He made sue stand up. She walked over to a building and knocked it down. "NO!!!!!!" Cried Sue. "I'll never kill anyone for you!!!"
"Oh well," Said Moleman. Sue tried to stop herself, but couldn't. She was destroying the whole city...
14312111111.title: 500 feet

143121111111.content:
Rex Harris was a Grammar School kid. At age 12, He was already a Super Hero, one of Sue's friends. Strong, Super fast, He had the ability of Phyclokenieses (The ability to move things with the mind and to levitate.) Rage fueled him when he found out that moleman was controlling Sue to kill people. He went to Molemans lair and beat moleman. Moleman was sent to Federal Prison. When Sue controlled her power down, She hugged and kissed Rex. Rex blushed, His Mother died, and his Father worked16 hours a day, so when Rex was on weekends, His life really stunk.
"Oh, thankyouthankyouthankyouthankyouthankyou!!!!!!" Sue Said. Rex simply replied with, "Your welcome..."
Sue brought him back to the Baxter building, Where they celebrated a victory party. But Rex gave up his life of heroism for something more personel. Rex's Father asked Sue if she would take care of Rex while he left for a big Job offer in Norway. Sue had to think about it. She liked Rex in a way, But didn't know if she could take care of him.
143121111111.title: Not for long...

choices: Hell no dog... bigger is better
14312111112.content:
Growing out of the room, and into the building, Sue realized the building was populated, she was crushing people in the building and trapping them inside with no hope of escape. Still she grew larger, she tried to stop the growth but could'nt, it only seemed to make her grow faster...

Sue grew out of the building, wreckage falling off of her and into the city below, bigger and bigger she became... Skyscrappers quickly were becoming only waist high...
14312111112.title: Bigger eh?

choices: A mile tall is good enough...
No... the mole man said exterminate... he means it!
143121111122.content:
"Lets see how about making you grow faster!"

"No, stop it! I'm hurting people I don't want to do this!"

"That's not for you to decide anymore... and come on... I know all that grow feels good for you, you like it... don't try to lie to me... I know what you are thinking... litterally..."

Sue's growth started accelerating more, growing several feet per second she was becoming a major threat to the city...

"Lets put this size to use shall we?"

Sue then began kicking over Skycrapers, she could do nothing but watch.

"No this can't be happening! I don't want to do this! Run people run! I am not in co.. con.. contro.. control.. of my..self... AHHHAHAHAHHHH!"

"Less lip from you little girl, I think I've given you enough freedom to speak... it's my turn..."

Sue was now completely out of control of her body, all she could do was watch, and think.

"Insects of Earth... this is your new God... I am speaking to you through my minion... you will all be terminated so that the Molepeople (I am guessing that's what they are) can rule this planet... you have ruled it long enough, and now it's our turn... prepare for extinction!"

Sue's growth went into over drive and she shot up into the sky like a bullet... her feet were too large for the streets causing the building to topple over. Larger still she became, crushing and destroying entire city blocks under her feet.
143121111122.title: Bigger it is...

1431211111222.content: Sue continued growing at her insane rate of speed, crushing and destroying everything she could reach...
1431211111222.title: So how big is "Extermination"

choices: The other members of the Fantastic Four
14312111112221.content:
Sue was now easily 2 miles tall. Everything was so tiny to her. Even the mighty Empire State Building now only seemed a foot tall to her. Unfortunately she still had no control over her body. She was being controlled by the Moleman.
"All bow down to me," he said through Sue. "All hail the king of Kings. Now bow or else my minion will destroy your puny city."
Almost instantly every man, woman and child got on their hands and knees and bowed to Sue. Then Moleman started to laugh. Then through Sue he saw something coming.

Who is it?
14312111112221.title: King of Kings

choices: Moleman decides to eleminate the Fantastic Four now.
143121111122211.content:
Sue recognized the Fantastic Four as well. She tried to talk but again found that her body was unable to do so.

"Moleman you do know they will find a way to stop me, don't think that just because I am big I am invincible."

"At the moment dear I don't see how they can stop you."

Richard shouted out "Sue can't you control your powers! Look what you have done! What's with this whole ordering people to bow to you? What's wrong?"

"HAHAHA! They can't figure out that I am in control of you Sue... this will work perfectly..."

"I can't control myself! It's like my powers have a mind of their own! I seem to have regained control for now..."

Sue then bent over picked up the other team members and placed them in her hand.

"Whoa... Sue you gotta warn us before you do that, it's scary!"

"Yes Sue you could of easily hurt or killed one of us doing that."

"Sorry, I just wanted to get you closer to me so I can hear you better."
143121111122211.title: The rest of the team shows up.

choices: Crush them in the palm of her hand
1431211111222111.content:
"You see Sue they are litterally in the palm of my hand... well I should say your hand... HAHAHA! Perpare to kill your... 'Family' if you call them that..."

"NOOOOOOO!"

"Lets see here... how to kill them how to kill them... an evil genuis never gets a chance to rest..."
1431211111222111.title: Doomed...

choices: Some random event plays in their favor to save them?
14312111112221112.content:
"I think the best thing to do is eat them..."

"WHAT! NOOO! I refuse!"

"sigh... we have been through this before... I am in control... your just the spectator... You see if I just crushed them in the palm of your hand they would most likely live... being that they are so small going up against such soft flesh... The thing would survive just because he is so durable... Stretchy would simply flatten himself out... and the little flame boy would get luck and fly off... I can't let that happen... so.. down the hatch..."

"Sue are you ok... do you hear what we said? Sue?" said Richard.

"Oh sorry, I was thinking about how to control these powers..."

"Well good! You better control them now!"

Richard could see a tear forming from her eyes.

"I did'nt mean to be so harsh Sue... It's ok... I understand..."

"The fool... he had no clue... Well Sue? Any last thoughts for your friends?"

"I hate you... I hate you I hate you I hate you!"

"Perfect..."

Sue then suddenly opened her mouth and sent the Fantastic Four into her mouth, and closed it shut. She then swallows.

"If I ever regain control of my body, I swear I will kill you Moleman... very slowly... very painfully..."

"Don't count on it dear, don't count on it"

So what is the fate of the team?
14312111112221112.title: Yummy Yummy?

143121111122211121.content:
"Now with them out of the way, lets get back to business shall we?"

"You do know that with the fantastic four gone, other heros will come, and they are far more powerful than I am now..."

"Ah yes I do! I counted on that, that's why your going to get some new powers"

"What? You can't just give someone new powers!"

"Oh.. yes I can, well not so much directly... You see I knew that meteorite had special properties... properties that could give those in contact with it the ability to change size."

"You are saying you set this up? You set me up to be nothing more than a weapon for you?"

"Exactly! And you also see, I know where projects are being worked that have given people other powers. You know the usuall... Invicibility, laser vision, super strength, etc. I plan to get you every power possible... you will be a juggernaught of destruction!"

"God NO!"

"Now lets start with getting you..."
143121111122211121.title: Dead fo' sure yo'

1431211111222111211.content:
"Lets make you invicible first... I can't have my precious getting beat to a pulp by a bug sized being"

Finally giving in to the fact that she no longer is in control of anything Sue just starts casually talking to the Moleman in her head.

"Fine then... were to..."

"The laboratory just a few miles north of here... at your size we will be there in seconds."

After a few short steps that plowed through sky scrapers, crushed entire city blocks, and killed thousands... Sue was at the lab.

"Ok Mr. Genius... How do I get these powers?"

Suddenly Sue shrunk down to 50 feet tall and ripped open the roof of the building. The people inside began running for their lives.

"Simple... you drink that vat of formula there..."

Sue then picks up a vat filled with a blue gel like liquid. Popping the cap off she began drinking it.

"Whoa... this feels weird... It's all tingly..."

"That's all of your cells being augmented... And look no more stitches..."

Feeling the back of her neck the wound was healed, the stitches simply fell out into her hand.

"Not only do you have invincibility, you also have incredible cellular regeneration now... fairly redundant... but it has a few interesting side effects."

"Oh yeah what's that?"

"For one, you will be able to grow much faster now, and two... lets just say you will be living for a very long time now..."

"Great... now I am an even better puppet for you right?

"Indeed, Now lets destroy this complex and move on to the next target."

Within seconds Sue grew to 10 miles in height.

"Whoa Whoa Whoa... Not so fast, it gives me a head rush"

"Don't worry dear... that was just a test, hopefully you will never have to do that again."

Raising her foot she slamed down on the lab and twisted her foot back and forth for good measure, stomping a few more times to make sure. Numerous buildings in the near by cities collapsed, people all over fell and triped onto the ground.

"Now, off to get you some..."
1431211111222111211.title: Invincible and...

14312111112221112111.content:
"Super Strength? Why do I need that, I'm 10 miles tall I can pick up mountains if I wanted to..."

"Indeed you can do that, but it's all depending on your size... try picking up a mountain when your 50 feet tall dear..."

Sue then turned to the south directly facing the city. She began walking toward it.

"Let me guess that power is located in the south, and your going to make me walk through the city at this size"

"Close, so very very close... but I am not going to have you walk through the city.."

"Oh? So we are going to step over it?"

"No No No No... we are going to run through it..."

Sue then went into a full out run.

If the world thought it knew destruction before... it was about to get a lesson. A 10 mile tall woman running at full speed does'nt exactly sit well on the richter scale...

Each footstep removed dozens of city blocks from the map, everything that was around the crater like footprints was blown over or destroyed by the resulting quakes and wind gusts. Everything else felt the full wrath of her back draft, considering she was running at several thousand miles per hour the gusts made everything seem like sand. Everything got blown up into the air and broke apart, allowing it to fall back to the earth from insane heights.

Much to Sue's releif she only made a couple steps in the city.

"Well I guess this is better for people than walking through the city..."

"Foolish woman! The earthquakes and wind gusts you are causing have completely destroyed the city."

"If you keep me destroying so much, there won't be much of a world for you to rule!"

"That's the point! I want it all gone! Wipe the surface dwellers off the face of the planet!"

After about a minute of running Sue slowed down to a jog and then finally stopped at another laboratory.

"So what is it we need here now?" thought Sue as she shrunk down to 12 feet tall.

"Third floor there is a lab... room 313. Activate the laser in there and absorb the energy."

Walking into the building people were running away from her. The first time she ever had people running from her, she could see the absolute fear in them. Going upstairs she found the lab as expected, the door was locked, but with her extra height she broke it down with little trouble.

Activating the laser she stepped into the path of the beam and absorbed the energy.

"Very good my dear, I don't have to control you as much anymore... your becoming very obediant.."

"Not like I have a choice, either you make me do it, or I do it myself... This ray is'nt making me feel any different."

"It's not supposed to... now turn it off."

Sue then walked around and turned the machine off. Suddenly she shrunk down to a quarter inch in size.

"What is the meaning of this?"

"To test your strength dear... pick up the machine and throw it through the wall."

Sue picked up the machine with great ease dispite her tiny size.

"Wow! It's as light as a feather..."

She then threw it with all her might. It went straight threw the building and kept going.

"Excellent! Time for us to continue dear..."

Sue then grew to 5 miles in height, bursting out of the building raining debrie down on the few remaining people that stuck around.
14312111112221112111.title: Bigger, Stronger, Better...

143121111122211121112.content:
The Moleman was commanding Sue to go to another lab to get some super powers. But just before she left a tiny man appeared in front of her eye. She couldn't tell at first who it was but then she made it out to be Dr Strange.
"It's that Dr Strange," said the Moleman. "Now to rid of him." Then Moleman switched the mind control device to let him talk through Sue. "Argh Dr Strange have you come to be eaten like the Fantastic Four?"
"No and release Sue from your control," replied Dr Strange.
"What are you gonna do little man? My puppet here has unlimited strength and she's invincible. I can make her grow to the size of the planet and she can destroy it. And I might make her grow as large as the universe. She'll survive in the empty vacuum of space."
"Talking about the Fantastic Four They'll be here right now."
Just then the other members of the Fantastic Four appeared in the Fantasti-Car next to Dr Strange.
"No that's impossible my puppet ate you. You should be digested."
"I saved them at the last moment. And now I will free Colossal Girl of your control."
143121111122211121112.title: Dr Strange

1431211111222111211121.content:
"You might have rescued the Fantastic Four," said the Moleman through Sue. "But Colossal Girl is still under my control."
"Not for long," replied Dr Strange. He started to mutter some magic words and his hands began to glow.
A few seconds later Sue felt her mind clearing. Moleman's voice seemed to have disappeared and it seemed like her body was responding to her will again.
The first thing Sue did was to shrink herself to 6 feet tall. The rest of the Fantastic Four and Dr Strange landed by her. She kept looking at herself and she was happy and confused.
"What did you do?" asked Sue.
"I simply removed the mind control device implanted in your neck," replied Dr Strange. "Since your were indestructible it would have been impossible to remove it through surgery."
"So I'm free from him?"
"Yes you are."
"Oh thank God the Nightmare's over. But I destroyed so much and so many people are dead."
"The city will rebuild itself. And Moleman will be punished by the law."
"Not if I get to him first."

What does Colossal Girl do?
1431211111222111211121.title: Free

14312111112221112111211.content:
"Oh no he won't," said Sue. "I'm gonna get to him first." She then grew to 50 feet tall.
"Err what are doing Sue?" asked Reed.
"I'm gonna show Moleman what happens when he makes me murder people."
Sue began to walk away to so she could go to where the Moleman had abducted her the first time. The huge hole was still there and she jumped down it.
The fall was high and if she wasn't indestructible she would have been killed. But instead she survived without a scratch. She could see down the tunnel and she knew that was where Moleman was.
"Moleman I'm coming to you and when I get there you're gonna wish you never heard my name."
She then began to walk down the tunnel. And she saw many of Moleman's minions coming. There were thousands if not millions of them.
When they got close enough Sue lifted up her foot and started to stomp on them. She grew even larger so that it would take less time and within a couple of minutes they were nothing more than dust.
"You'll have to do better than that Moleman. You of all people should know that thanks to you I'm unstoppable."
14312111112221112111211.title: Angry Sue

143121111122211121112111.content:
Sue continued her journey down the tunnels. Every monster she had to fight just made her more and more angry. The Moleman was in his control room trying to stop her everyway he could. But a simple tap with her finger could crack anything. He began to panic and he even sent his biggest monster to the surface to attack the city. He hoped that this would distract her enough to make an escape.
When the monster attacked the city Sue still had a heart and went up to the surface to protect the people. The monster was 500 feet tall and was causing some damage. Sue in return grew to a mile and held the monster in her hand.
"Moleman if you can hear me this is what's gonna happen to you when I get my hands on you." She then ever so slightly tightened her grip and the monster disintegrated. "Now I'm coming for you."
Just then she saw Doctor Strange by her eye again. She could hear him saying another spell and she began to feel sleepy.
She fell to the ground and while she was falling she was rapidly shrinking. By the time she hit the ground she was normal size. The Thing then picked her up and took her to the Baxter Building.

Where does she wake up?
143121111122211121112111.title: Stopped for now

1431211111222111211121111.content:
When Sue woke up she was in her front room on the couch. She was normal size and she felt surprisingly calm. She stood up and looked out of her window. She saw that the city was in construction after the damage she had accidentally caused. But she was certain that this didn't happen within hours. Then she saw her husband Reed come in with some coffee.
"Great you're awake," said Reed. "I bought coffee."
"What happened?" asked Sue. "Last thing I remember I was a mile high and after Moleman. And why am I so calm? I should be pissed."
"Well I've been giving you some things that would calm you down when you woke up."
"How long have I been asleep for?"
"Really I don't think that it's important."
Sue grew 3 feet right in front of him to make a point. "How long?"
"Two months."
"Oh God two months." She then shrank until she was eye level with Reed. "Why was I out for that long?"
"Dr Strange thought that it would be best for you to sleep while we hunted Moleman."
"Have you found him?"
"Well you're awake. Yeah S.H.I.E.L.D found him yesterday trying to come up with a new scheme."
1431211111222111211121111.title: Waking up

14312111112221112111211111.content:
“Does everyone hate me for killing and destroying many of them?” asked Sue. “They’ll want me dead.”
“I admit they were pretty mad at first,” replied Reed. “But S.H.I.EL.D cleared your name. They maybe a little uneasy but they know you’re not to blame.”
“But I feel bad. If I hadn’t gone out for that stupid walk the Moleman wouldn’t have captured me. Then I wouldn’t have killed all those people. I almost killed you.”
“We know you weren’t in control of your body so there’s no harm done. Now just sit back and relax a little. Watch some TV.”
Sue admitted defeat and she went and sat down. She put the TV on and she was amazed with what she was seeing. The new series of Lost she had been waiting for was already half way through.
“Crap I’ve missed a lot in two months,” said Sue. “Maybe that could be a good thing.”
She continued to flick through the channels until she got to the news. There was a report about Spider-Man fighting the Shocker. Like always he beat him but it was just a little something to take her mind off everything. She lay back a little more and gave a sigh of relief.

What happens next?
14312111112221112111211111.title: Missed a lot

143121111122211121112111111.content:
Sue came up to a report about the rebuilding of the city. There were even a few videos oh her destroying the city. There was even a poll.
“Yesterday we gave a poll to the surviving New York citizens to see their views on whether Sue Richards aka Colossal Girl should be charged murder,” said the Anchor woman. 35% said yes she should have to pay for the crimes. But 65% said no she shouldn’t be charged. What’s your view Burt?”
“Well my view is that she should be charged,” said the Anchorman. “She killed all of those people. If we didn’t charge her then people would think that it’s alright to commit genocide. But however on the other she was not in control of her body. She even tried to warn people. If she as in control of her body then I would say lock her up and throw away the key. But since she wasn’t we got to give her some sympathy.”
“Thank you Burt.”
Sue just sat there and cried. She shrank until she was a mere dot on the seat. She still cried because some people were still blaming her for what had happened. She want to shrink out of existence so she didn’t hurt anyone else. As she shrank smaller she saw all the germs around her. She wanted them to kill her she didn’t have to face the world she lived in anymore.
But then she hears something. It sounded like the phone. But it was near where she was.
143121111122211121112111111.title: Guilt trip

choices: Tells him she's going for a walk
1431211111222111211121111111.content:
Sue was amazed to hear the ring. She had to be as small as a gem yet it seemed to still be reaching her. But then she saw a phone by her foot. It was ringing and she picked it up. She had no idea who was going to be on the other end.
"Hello," said Sue.
"Hello," replied a Crackled Voice.
"Who is this?"
"You'll find out in good time. But shrinking yourself into nothing won't solve your problems."
"But look at all the pain and destruction I've caused. i can't be allowed to live. But this stupid invincibility powers won't let me die so this is the next best thing."
"Look just grow back to normal and meet me in Central park in an hour. I'll explain everything to you there."
"Ok."
The phone went dead. She still didn't know who it was. But she just grew back up to her normal size and she saw Reed. He had a microscope and he was looking at her.
"Honey you're back," said Reed. "I was worried that you shrank into a sub atomic universe."

What does she do?
1431211111222111211121111111.title: Phone

14312111112221112111211111112.content:
"No I'm fine," said Sue. "I just needed to get my head straight. I think I'm going to go on a walk."
"Do you want me to come?" replied Reed.
"No I'll be fine."
"Ok but be careful."
Sue then left the Baxter Building and started to go on a walk. She wore a raincoat so that people couldn't really see who she was. But all around she could see construction. The city was still trying to repair itself after Sue's reluctant mega rampage. She felt a gut feeling in her stomach.
But eventually she came to central park. She looked around but it seemed to be deserted. She thought that he wasn't here until she saw a man. He stopped in front of her and he smiled.
"Hello Colossal Girl," he said.
"Don't call me that," replied Sue. "I'm never using my size changing powers ever again."
"You might want to reconsider that."
"Who are you anyway?"
"Just call me a friend."
14312111112221112111211111112.title: Walk

143121111122211121112111111121.content:
"You're not going to use me as a weapon are you?" asked Sue.
"No not at all," replied the Man. "I'm here to help you. The last thing I want to do is cause you or anyone else any harm."
"Yeah I'm guessing if you were evil you would have tried something by now."
"Well there would be no point in attacking you. You've got unlimited strength, you're invulnerable and finally you can make yourself miles and miles tall. In fact I don't think you've found your limit yet."
"No I haven't that scares me a little. Sometimes I wonder just how big or small can I get. I've been miles tall or so small that I'm a speck on the world's most powerful microscope. But both times I felt I could go beyond."
"And that you will one day. But right now you feel down don't you?"
"Yeah. I would kill myself but I'm can't get killed."
"You're basically immortal now. You will live to the end of time. Never aging a single day."
"That scares me."
"Don't be. People dream of immortality. You are one of the few people who truly have it. You're gifted."
"Gift? What gift makes you watch people you love around you grow old and die?"

Who is this man?
143121111122211121112111111121.title: Immoratility

1431211111222111211121111111212.content:
"But you'll be able to help people throughout time," said the Man. "Think of all the good you can do."
"But what if someone takes over my mind again?" replied Sue. "I'll go onto some sort of rampage again."
"You're invincible. Nothing can pierce your skin. That means no mind control devices. Look here's my card." He then gave Sue a card. "Give me a call when you want to talk to me. I'll leave you in peace."
He then walked away and Sue looked at the card. It only had a number on it. There was no name on it just the number. She wasn't sure what to do. But for now she just sat on a bench and relaxed a little. She made sure that people couldn't recognise her. She knew that some blamed her for what had happened. Many lost loved ones and probably wanted her dead.
But eventually she got back up and went back to the Baxter Building. She went to some of the upper levels. Ben was there and he was just about to eat some pizza when he saw Sue.
"Hey there Suzie," said Ben.
"Hey Ben," replied Sue. “I just want to say that I'm sorry that I ate you."
1431211111222111211121111111212.title: Sorry

14312111112221112111211111112121.content:
"That's alright," said Ben. "I know that it was Moleman who wanted you to eat me. If it wasn't for him you wouldn't have done it."
"That doesn't excuse it," replied Sue. "Ben you're my best friend. You're like family to me and I ate you." She started to cry a little.
"Oh come here little Suzy." Ben then got up and gave Sue a hug. "Don't cry you know how much I hate seeing you upset."
"I know but I'm so sorry for everything I've done. I killed people I caused billions o dollars in damage."
"You might have been the vehicle but you weren't the driver. Moleman did all of those things. He just used you to do it. You're not to blame."
"I wish I could say that made me feel better. But right now I still feel empty inside. I even tried to make myself sub atomic so I didn't hurt anyone else."
"You didn't have to do a silly thing like that."
"I don't know. I just wanted to get away from the grief."
"Do you want to see a Doctor or something?"
"I think I should. But who will see me?"
"I know just the person."

Who is it?
14312111112221112111211111112121.title: Empty inside

143121111122211121112111111121211.content:
A few days later we see Sue sitting on a sofa. A man with long green hair and big muscles was sitting on the seat opposite her. He wore glasses and a lab coat. He had a pen and note pad in his hand.
"Ok Mrs. Richards tell me why do you feel empty inside," said Doc Sampson.
"Well as you know Moleman hijacked me and he made me go onto a rampage," replied Sue. "I ate my friends and caused death and destruction. I know I wouldn’t have done it normally. But that doesn't make the guilt go away."
"Interesting. So you feel guilty for the deaths of many people and countless building destructions."
"Yeah that's exactly it."
"Well you have a classic guilt trip. You did something that you know wasn't your fault. But you still feel guilty about it."
"Yeah how do I get rid of this guilt?"
"Well you can only do that yourself. I can recommend that you go out and see people. I know people don't blame you for what happened. If you were in any kind of trouble the police would have picked you up a long time ago."
"That makes me feel a little better."
143121111122211121112111111121211.title: Doc Sampson the shrink

1431211111222111211121111111212111.content:
Sue took Doc Sampson's advice and she went into the city. She went in casual wear. but people were still able to recognise her. Some were happy while others were either scared or angry. This made her feel a little sorry for them. She knew that she had something terrible to hurt them.
But eventually there was a girl in central park who had her cat stuck in a tree. She looked up at it and she knew what to do.
"Do you want your cat down from that tree?" asked Sue.
"Yes please," replied the Little Girl.
Sue then grew until she could easily reach the cat. She gently picked it up and she brought it to the girls' arms. She then shrank to normal size.
"Thank you Colossal Girl," said the Little Girl.
"You know who I am?" replied Sue.
"Sure you're my hero."
"But aren't you scared of me after what happened?"
"My Mommy told me that it was the mean Moleman that made you hurt people. But without him you're good again."
"Well I guess I am."

Has this made Sue feel better about herself?
1431211111222111211121111111212111.title: Cat

14312111112221112111211111112121111.content:
Sue then gave the little girl a smile. This had made her feel better about herself. She had made a little girl proud and this gave her a warm feeling inside. Her guilt wasn't away totally. It was just a nudge down.
When the girl went away Sue waved goodbye to her. She was a sweet little girl. But Sue couldn't exactly see where she was going. But she just turned around and walked away from the park.
A few weeks later Doc Sampson came back to the Baxter Building to see how Sue was getting on. They were in the front room. Again Sue was lying down on the sofa while Doc Sampson was in a normal comfy chair.
"How are you feeling now Mrs. Richards?" asked Doc Sampson.
"Well I think I'm better," replied Sue. "Just after you saw me last time I got a confidence boost."
"Tell me."
"Well I saw this little girl in the park. Her cat was stuck up the tree and I had to get ti down for her. She knew that I wasn't evil and she said I was a good person."
"Which you are Sue."
"I know. But I have my doubts."
14312111112221112111211111112121111.title: A few weeks later

choices: Sue has to save the city
143121111122211121112111111121211111.content:
"You really have to stop selling yourself short," said Doc Sampson. "It's really not helping you recover."
"But what else can I do? I'm a mass murderer."
"We've been over this. The Moleman is a mass murderer. You were just a puppet of his. You didn't have any free will."
"But I let myself get trapped. My new powers gave me some kind of new confidence that I never felt before. I was no longer little Sue Richards. i could make myself whatever size I wanted. It made me feel good inside. But after what happened the fun is gone and I'm not sure that it'll ever come back."
"I assure you Sue that it will be back. I know that you would use your powers safely and not misuse them. If it's any consolation Moleman is going to spent the rest of his natural life in a very bright cell."
This did bring some smile onto Sue's face. She was getting better but she still had some inner demons. But for now the session was over. Doc Sampson had to leave he would be back in a few weeks.
Sue just went into the kitchen to get herself something to eat. She had gotten sue to her new strength level so not many things were broken.

What happens tomorrow?
143121111122211121112111111121211111.title: Confidence

1431211111222111211121111111212111111.content:
The next day we see Sue taking her normal walk through the city. She wanted to get a little fresh air and see other people. She even wanted to do a little grocery shopping for the others.
She went into one of the shops and she picked a few things up. She placed them all in the bag and paid for them like any normal person. But then she began to hear what seemed to be explosions. She dropped her bags and ran outside.
A meteor had just crashed into the street. It had landed on a taxi and two people were killed instantly. But then it seemed that the meteor was growing arms and legs. Eventually it even got a head and it stood up. It was easily 50 feet tall.
“Great another alien trying to destroy the city,” said Sue. “Since there’s no one else around here I may as well deal with this.”
Sue went over to the alien. It was already starting to stomp away at the city. But she just stood in front of it. It roared at her. She grew up to 50 feet to match its size but she was stronger.
“Ok I know you probably don’t understand English but I’m giving you a chance to leave.”
The alien just roared at her again.
1431211111222111211121111111212111111.title: Sue has to save the city

choices: The other members of the Fantastic Four appear
14312111112221112111211111112121111111.content:
“I see that you’re going to do this the hard way,” said Sue. “Well that suits me just fine. I’ve been looking for a good fight.”
The alien then went to slash her with its claws. But this didn’t even leave a mark on her. She just looked at it and smiled.
“Oops looks like you can’t hurt me. Don’t worry I won’t hurt you. In fact I’m going to send you back home.”
Sue then picked the alien up and she started to get herself ready. Then using all of her strength she threw it into the air. It kept going up and up until she couldn’t see it anymore. She wiped the dust off of her hands.
“That’s to a job well done.”
She then shrank to her normal size while people gathered around her to cheer for her. But the first thing on her mind was tending to the injured. They were quite badly hurt but still alive.
A few minutes later ambulances were one the seen and there was even a reporter talking to Sue.
“So Colossal girl you’ve saved the city again,” said the Reporter. “How do you feel?”
“Wonderful.”

What happens next?
14312111112221112111211111112121111111.title: Throw

143121111122211121112111111121211111112.content:
While Sue was talking to the News Reporters she heard the Fantasti-Car come. She looked up and saw Reed, Ben and Johnny. She was happy to see them and she smiled. But they landed right next to her. Reed ran out to her and gave her a big hug.
"Are you alright?" asked Reed.
"Reed I'm indestructible of course I'm fine," replied Sue.
"No I mean mentally."
"Yeah let's just call this a confidence boost."
Sue eventually got into the Fantasti-Car and she flew back to the Baxter building. She was right her confidence had been boosted. She was even on the news for a good reason. She was even practicing her powers again.
But there was a slight problem. She couldn't just grew a few inches like before. She would grow several feet. Many times her head hit the ceiling.
"Ok this might take some time."
She practiced for a few hours. She was able to gain herself a few inches wit only the slightest bit of concentration. But when she did she looked at herself in a mirror. She was over 6 feet tall.
"Hello my beautiful body."
143121111122211121112111111121211111112.title: Confidence boost

1431211111222111211121111111212111111121.content:
She looked at herself a little more. But then the phone went and she picked it up. She didn't expect it to be anyone in particular.
"Hello," said Sue.
"Hello Sue," replied a Voice. She almost instantly recognised it as the man who she had met a few months before in central park.
"What do you want now?"
"You're needed."
"For what?"
"Your time has come."
"I'm going to die?"
"What of course not. I meant your time has come to help me."
"But how can I even trust you. You haven't even told me what your real name is."
"That will come in time. But I need you to meet me."
"Where?"
"Outside the main office of the Daily Bugle. Go there in an hour and everything will be revealed to you."
"Ok."

Will she go?

She was relieved to see the taxi stop right by her. She got into the cab. She noticed something a little strange about the driver. His hair was blue.
"Where to little Missy?" asked the Driver in an English accent.

The driver drives Sue. the journey was taking longer than she was hoping. Eventually they reach the mall but the driver carries on and passes the mall.
"Hey this is my stop."

"Let me out right now!"
"I'm sorry I can't do that." The driver automatically rolls up the windows and locks the doors. Then he releases a gas into the cab. it affected Sue and she fell asleep. But for some reason the driver wasn't affected. "Sorry about that love but I need you and so does the world."
1431212.title: In the cab

choices: No I'm getting out of here
14312121.content:
A little later Sue was starting to wake up. She was still on the back seat of the cab. She found out that the cab was inside an underground tunnel. She slowly got out of the car. Then she saw the Driver standing in front of him. But he was wearing a suit of armour that mimiced that of Jango Fett in Star Wars Episode II.
"Where do you think your going?" asked the Driver.
"Anywhere but here," replied Sue. She realises that there's not much room for her to grow since her head was practically only inches from the ceiling (The tunnel was very low). "Get out of my way."
"I can't I need your help."
"Why would I help you after you kidnapped me?"
"I'm sorry about that I didn't have a choice." Then he notices something strange about Sue. "Wait a minute you could have easily escaped. You could have turned invisible and just run off but you didn't. Why?"
"I've lost my invisibility powers."
"So your powerless?"
"No I have some new powers."
"Can you give me a demo?"
"I'm sorry but there's not much room here to show you."
"What's your new power then?"
"I can grow."
"How big can you get?"
"I don't know I've been able to get to 150 feet but I felt i could get bigger. What's your power then?"
"I don't sleep. But I have been able to create this suit. My name is Hysteria.
"Nice to meet you Hysteria I'm Colossal Girl. But why did you bring me down here?"
"I've been picking up some strange readings from down here."
"What kind of readings?"
"I'm not really sure. But I needed help searching down here just in case it was a global threat. I needed a super powered being to help me. And that was you. So please help me the world may be in danger."

What does Sue say?
14312121.title: Hysteria

143121211.content:
"Ok I'll help you but I don't think I'll be much good in these cramped spaces," replied Sue.
"It doesn't matter hopefully there are places where you have room to grow," replied Hysteria.
"One more thing. What's with the cab?"
"Well you know how you guys travel in the fantasti-car and the X-men travel in the X-Jet. Well I travel in that. It may not be high tech but it gets me from A to B."
"Good enough. Lets go you've got my help now just don't waste my time."
"Just give me a sec I've just got to find the energy signatures." He pushes some buttons on his arm. "I'm getting something. Make that somethings. I'm geting two different reading."
"What does that mean?"
"It means whatever's down there there's either two of them or two seperate groups."
"Is that good or bad?"
"Depends."
"On what?"
"If they're friendly or if they want to eliminate the human and Mutant and inhuman and wasp and....."
"Ok I get the picture."
"Well I suggest we go for the signature that is closest to us. And that's in that direction." Hysteria points to the tunnel where the energy signature was coming from.
"Ok lets go before its too late. Whatever's down there."
Hysteria and Colossal Girl follow the tunnel. It's very dark down there so Hysteria put on his light. Eventually they get to an area which must have had a 100 foot ceiling.
"Where are we?" asked Sue.
"I don't know this wasn't in the sewer plans," replied Hysteria.
Then they could hear what sounded like metalic footsteps. Then they turned around and saw an army of robots. These robots were about 7 feet tall. They were silver coloured and the had a C on their chests.
"More humans they will become like us," said the lead robot.
"What the hell are they?" asked Sue.
"Ok Colossal Girl, Cybermen. Cybermen, Colossal Girl. Now lets go."
He grabs Sue's arm and runs away from the Cybermen
143121211.title: Cybermen

1431212111.content:
After Sue and Hysteria had reached a safe distance from the Cybermen they stopped to catch their breath.
"What the hell were those things?" asked Sue.
"They're Cybermen," replied Hysteria. "Once those things were human. They still have human brains but they have a special chip in them so the loose all their emotions. They are obsessed with people becoming them. And anything that can't be converted they destroy. Or like what they say "DELETE"."
"How do we beat them?"
"Last time I shortfused the emotion chip. And they all went insane. But this time I don't have the right equipment."
"I think it's m=best if we went back to the Baxter Building to come up with a plan. And the others can help us."
"Ok we'll do that." They start to walk towards a door. "There's one thing I hate more than a Cyberman." He opens the door and behind it are hundreds of Daleks.
"<ETERMINATE>" shouted the Daleks.
And with that Hysteria closes the door.
"Them."
1431212111.title: Daleks

"Ok time out," said Sue. "What the hell are those?"
"They are Daleks," replied Hysteria. "Alien killing machines that won't stop until every human on Earth is well. Exterminated."
"This is just getting stupid now these aliens don't even make any sense. They're a mix between a Salt shaker, A plunger, a telescope and a whisk."
"Believe me they're a lot more terrifying then they look." Then the door blows open and several Daleks come through it.
"<One mutant and one Medahuman detected.>" said one of the Daleks.
"<They must be EXTERMINATED.>"
"<EXTERMINATE!>" shout the rest of the Daleks.

The Cybermen and the Daleks start to attack each other. Colossal Girl and Hysteria sneaked past them.

Four weeks past since Sue and Hysteria's battle with the Daleks ad Cybermen. She hadn't seen or heard of him since. She told the others about him. She assured reed that they were only friends.
She now had full control over her powers. So far the biggest she had become was one mile tall. But she felt like she could still get even bigger. She felt like she had no limit. Anyway one day she was watching the TV. he was watching the news.
