Then Sue heard something banging on the window. When she went there and undrew the curtain she was surprised to see Hysteria. He was in full armour. And using his jet to levitate.
"Oh Hysteria it's only you," said Sue.
"Hey Sue long time no see, replied Hysteria. "What you been up to?"
"Nothing really saved the world once or twice. Now why are you here?"
"There's a bank Robbery and everyone's occupied. Fancy coming?"
"Sure why not I need some excitement today." Then she quickly turned around. "Reed I'm going out for a while."
"Ok," shouted Reed.
Sue then opened the window Then she climbed out and Hysteria grabbed her so she didn't fall.
"So I'll be giving you a lift," said Hysteria.
"No in fact..." replied Sue. Then she grew two 200 feet tall. She was careful in where she was putting her feet. "I'll be giving you a lift."

Who is behind the disappearances
1431212111121111121.title: Four weeks later

14312121111211111211.content:
Sue and Hysteria were on their way to the bank robbery. But something caught Hysteria's eye. He thought he saw someone pulling something that looked like a Dalek into a building. he thought he was just seeing things. But he couldn't take it out of his mind.
"Hey Sue I think I just saw a Dalek," said Hysteria.
"A Dalek?" replied Sue. "We took care of them months ago."
"I know but I swear I just saw one."
"We'll check it out after we've taken care of the guys robbing the bank."
They continue to the bank. When they got there they found out the bank was being robbed by super-powered beings. One had the ability to melt things when he touched them. Another was super strength. The other guy's ability was to convert light into sound. And the final one was a woman. She had the ability to increase her height. They all had money bags. The cops were all around. Sue shrank back down to normal. She wanted to surprise them.
"Let us go and no one'll get hurt," said the one with super strength.
Then they see Sue and Hysteria walk up to them.
"Well look who turned up," said the one with light converting sound powers. "Clowns for us to beat. You better run. There's two of you and four of us."
"Some how I don't think so," replied Hysteria.

Who will win the fight?
14312121111211111211.title: Daleks and supervillains?

143121211112111112111.content:
"Well it looks like we've gotta teach these guys a lesson they'll never forget," said Their Leader.
"Sorry I left school years ago," replied Sue.
"Lets get'em."
The Villains drop the bags and start to attack. Hysteria easily took out the Super strength man with a simple tranquillizer. But the others would be tricky. Sue didn't let herself get touched by the one who could melt things. When he got close enough she kicked him in the mouth. he fell unconscious. This was the first time she had defeated a bad guy without using her powers.
Then they were deafened by the one who could make sound out of light. But Hysteria just turned off the microphones in his suit so he could hear anything. He then hit him with a paralyzing ray. This left the final woman who could grow. She grew to her maximum height of 50 feet. She picked up Sue and kicked Hysteria to one side.
"Time to die short stuff," she said. "Any last requests?"
"Yes just one," replied Sue. "Tell me do you think you're big?"
"Yes and I'm a lot bigger than you."
"Oh really?" Then Sue began to grow in the villainess' hand. She had no choice but to let go but Se continued to grow. The villainess watched her grow to her height. Then she was double then treble and a few seconds later she 1,000 feet tall. She was now 20 times taller than her. Sue picked her up and bought her up to her eyes. "One more question. "Who's the giantess here?"
"You are."
143121211112111112111.title: A 50 foot villainess vs a 1,000 foot Sue

choices: Go back to the Baxter Building
Investigate t he possible Dalek sighting
1431212111121111121111.content:
"Good," said Sue. "Now you're gonna go straight."
"Why?" replied the Villainess.
"Because if you don't every time you do a crime I'll be there to stop you and kick your butt. You and your friends have caused a lot of damage today."
"Ok I'll go straight just put me down I'm afraid of heights."
"Someone with your super powers is afraid of heights." Sue begins to laugh. Then she puts the Villainess back on the ground. Then they both shrank down to normal height.
Hysteria tied up the villains and they waited for the police to show up. When they did they left the scene.
"That was easy," said Sue.
"You kinda over did it with your powers there," replied Hysteria.
"I was only having a little fun. When you live with someone like Johnny he sets a very bad example."

What do they do next?
1431212111121111121111.title: Villains defeated

14312121111211111211112.content:
"Ok what do we do now?" asked Sue. "We've still got the whole night."
"I think we should investigate the Dalek sighting," replied Hysteria. "If it's another invasion we need to be prepared."
"Ok but where was it again?"
"I think it was only a mile from here."
Sue then grows to about 100 feet. Then they go back to the place where Hysteria thought he saw a Dalek. When they got there Sue rounded her height to just over 6 feet. They enter the building.
It seemed to be an illegal gambling bar. When they entered everyone stared at them.
"Look we don't want any trouble we were just looking for a possible sighting," said Sue.
"Of what," replied a random man.
"You wouldn't believe us even if we told you."
"Then get out of my bar," replied the Bar tender.
"We need to look in this place."
"Get out before I throw the both of you out."

What do Sue and Hysteria do?
14312121111211111211112.title: Searching for a Dalek

143121211112111112111122.content:
Sue and Hysteria thought it would be best to leave. They didn't want to cause anymore trouble. Also she doubted about Hysteria's statement. When they got outside they stopped in the street.
"Are you sure you saw a Dalek?" asked Sue.
"I'm positive," replied Hysteria. "I saw those guys take that thing in."
"Well it's gone now. I think it's best if we just go home now and wait for this Dalek to make the next move."
"Ok we'll do that. But if anything bad happens I did say."
"Err do you wanna lift to the Baxter Building?"
"No thanks my cabs only round the corner." He then gives her a walkie-talkie like device. "Now if you ever need to contact me use this."
"Ok."
"And if I need to speak to you. We'll do it through this."
"Ok thank you Hysteria. I'll see you later."
Hysteria then walks away towards his cab. Sue grows to about 200 feet so she could have a short walk to the Baxter Building.

How long will it be until the Dalek resurfaces itself?
143121211112111112111122.title: Leaving the bar

1431212111121111121111222.content:
Many weeks passed The Fantastic Four did their usual things, save the World for some sort of threat either human or alien. Sue had stopped thinking about the Daleks and continued to practice her abilities. As of yet she hadn't found their limits. She even grew so large that New York city looked like a model city someone would have in their attic.
We see Sue looking at some new clothes in a shop. She has her eye on a dress in particular but it seemed too big for her. But she still went into the changing rooms with it. When she tried it on it was way too big for her.
"This is a problem," she thought. Then she grew to 6'1 and the dress fitted perfectly. "Problem solved."
She took the dress off and put on her Fantastic Four costume and then she went to pay for the dress. After she did that she was happy with it and walked out of the shop.
When she got out she saw what seemed to be a Dalek going into an ally across the road. She tried to get closer but there was too many people blocking her way. In the end she is resorted to growing to 20 feet tall and crossing the road.

When she gets there what does she find?
1431212111121111121111222.title: Grow into new clothes

14312121111211111211112222.content:
But when she got to the alley she found nothing. The alley itself was a dead end. This took he completely by surprise.
"Where did it go?" she thought. Then she grew until she was twice as tall as the buildings around her. She could see all the surrounding alleys. But still she couldn't see it. "That's strange." Then she sees the people gathering around her feet. "I better shrink back down before I cause any trouble." She then shrinks down to 6 and a half feet and starts tom walk back to the Baxter Building.
She couldn't take her mind off the Dalek. How could something like that just simply vanish? She knew when she got back she had to contact Hysteria.
When she got to the Baxter Building she went to her room and got the device Hysteria had given her. It took her a minute or two to sort it out. But where there was a will there's a way.
"Come on pick up Hysteria," she said.
"Hello Sue," said Hysteria.
"Hysteria thank God I was able to get through to you. I saw a Dalek going into an alley. But when I looked it was gone. It was if it had simply vanished."
"Strange it was like that time a few weeks ago. Meet me in the..."
14312121111211111211112222.title: No Dalek?

143121211112111112111122221.content:
"The Front Lobby," said Hysteria. "I'll be there in ten minutes."
"Ok thank you very much," replied Sue. She then switches off the device and goes downstairs to the front lobby. She waited ten minutes until she saw a yellow cab pull up. She saw Hysteria walk out with all his armour on. He goes inside and walks up to her. "Thank you for coming on such short notice."
"No problem," replied Hysteria. "If it's anything to do with the Daleks or Cybermen then it's top priority. Now where did you see it?"
"It was by the mall. It just disappeared."
"Like it did in the bar. Come on lets check it out. I'll give you a race to the mall."
"Ok but you know I have to be careful with my powers."
"Yeah that's why I'll win."
"Oh we'll see about that."
They both go outside. Hysteria gets his jetpack ready and Sue grows to 50 feet tall.
"Now 3,2,1 go," said Hysteria.
They both start racing towards the mall.

Who gets there first?
143121211112111112111122221.title: In the Lobby

1431212111121111121111222212.content:
They raced through the busy streets of Manhattan. Sue was careful not to accidentally step on anyone or anything. Hysteria was a little afraid. Although he was winning she was catching up on him. He came up with an idea. He got one of his grenades out. "This should slow her down," thought Hysteria.
He through his grenade at Sue's foot and it went off. But it wasn't an explosion it was very strong glue. When she put her foot on the ground it was stuck and she couldn't move it.
"Hey I'm stuck," said Sue.
"See ya slow poke," replied Hysteria.
She could hear him laugh as he flew away. It took her three minutes to get her foot free and she continued to the mall.
By the time she got there Hysteria was already there. He was laughing at her.
"Hey what took you so bloody long?" asked Hysteria.
"You know why," replied Sue while she shrank down to 6 feet. "You cheated."
"Hey it ain't cheating unless you get caught."
"Ha ha ha very funny. Now let's just see if we can find anything."

Will they find anything?
1431212111121111121111222212.title: Hysteria wins

14312121111211111211112222121.content:
Sue and Hysteria looked around. Hysteria searched the ground while Sue increased her size so that she could get a bird's eye view. Some people were a little freaked out but she gave them no reason to be afraid.
After an hour they found nothing. Not a trace not even a spec.
"Now are you sure you saw it?" asked Hysteria as he flew up to Sue's shoulder.
"Yes I saw it," replied Sue. "I swear I did. You think I'm lying?"
"No Sue I don't think you're lying. I'm just thinking if a Dalek."
"Was a Dalek."
"Ok there was a Dalek here. But how did it disappear without leaving a single trace?"
"I don't know a teleporter or something like that." Then she came up with an idea. "Can that helmet see any energy sources?"
"Yeah sure. It can see heat, Electronic."
"Yeah yeah just put it on the energy vision or whatever."
"Ok."
Sue then picks Hysteria off her shoulder and puts him in her hand. He then switched onn his energy vision.

Will he see anything?
14312121111211111211112222121.title: Nothing yet

143121211112111112111122221211.content:
Hysteria started to see a strange trail of energy that seemed to go to a big sphere invisible to the naked eye.
"Hey Sue I see something," said Hysteria.
"What is it?" replied the Huge Sue.
"An energy trail. I think I might have just found out where our friend went."
Sue then put Hysteria on the ground and then she shrank herself to about 8 feet. "Ok where is it?"
Hysteria grabbed onto her arm. "This way."
He then led her down the trail to the large sphere. He couldn't believe what he was seeing and Sue couldn't see anything.
"What now?" asked Sue.
"Maybe my suit can manipulate the energy and reopen the portal."
"Do it."
He then pushed a few buttons on his arm and the portal reopened. He walked through it and so did Sue. Then they found themselves in some sort of stream. they were traveling through it at light speed. But in a few seconds they landed on the other side.

Where were they?
143121211112111112111122221211.title: Portal

1431212111121111121111222212112.content:
They seemed to be on a remote island. When they got there the portal disappeared. The two of them were very confused.
"Err where are we?" asked Sue.
"Checking," replied Hysteria. He types away on his arm. "According to this we're in the South Pacific."
"What would a Dalek do here?"
"I don't know. Maybe they have a secret hide out here."
"Maybe." She then grows to 60 feet to take a better look. But all she could see was open sea and nothing else. "There's nothing here."
"Well maybe they had some kind of spaceship and this was where hey picked him up or something."
"When we get back to the Baxter building we'll use the scans to see if we can find anything. I'll give the boys a call to pick us up."
Sue then contacted the rest of the Fantastic Four and in an hour they came and picked up Sue and Hysteria. When they got back to the Baxter building they began to scan the space near Earth. They hoped that they'd find something that would give them a clue to the Dalek's location,

Do they find anything?
1431212111121111121111222212112.title: The Island

14312121111211111211112222121121.content:
The Fantastic Four picked up a huge space ship in Earth's Orbit. Sue and Hysteria knew that it was the Daleks.
"Wow so those guys are real?" asked Johnny.
"I told you they were Johnny," replied Sue. "But now we need to figure out what they want."
"Hmm maybe they want something from Earth that's a great value to them," replied Reed. "It seems logical."
"Or they might be here for revenge," said Hysteria. "Me and Sue creamed them the last time we met them."
"Well if they here for revenge its clobbering time," replied Ben.
"What we need to do is to get onto the ship somehow," replied Reed. "I can add a cloaking device to the Fantast-car. And I'm sure there's enough room for Hysteria since he knows the most about these creatures."
"Believe me these creatures are bad news really bad news," said Hysteria. "Now we need to take them out as soon as we possible can."
14312121111211111211112222121121.title: Dalek ship found

143121211112111112111122221211211.content:
The Fantastic Four and Hysteria get into the Fantasti-car and are nearly ready to lift off. Reed goes through the procedures and tests the cloaking device. When they were complete the Fantasti-car then flew up into outta space.
When they got up there they saw the Dalek ship in the Earth's orbit. The cloaking device had made them invisible to both radar and vision.
They found a place to land the Fantasti-Car without alerting the Daleks. When they did land they got out of it and looked around a little.
"Impressive the Daleks have technology we can only dream of," said Reed.
"Reed honey now's not a good time."
"Of course sorry. Now we better keep ourselves hidden. If any of them see us then we'll have possible thousands of Daleks on us. Sue is there anything else you know about them?"
"Well they don't seem to be able to go up stairs since they're so low to the ground."
"And you Hysteria?"
"If you need to target anywhere go for the scope," replied Hysteria. "Take that out and then the Dalek is blind."
143121211112111112111122221211211.title: On the Dalek ship

choices: The shrinking wears off big time
Sue escapes and tells the others
1431212111121111121111222212112111.content:
The Fantastic Four and Hysteria split up and went in five different directions. Ben had difficulties hiding since he was a big orange rock. Reed could squeeze himself into small spaces. Johnny didn't use his fire powers. Hysteria used his own cloaking device. And finally Sue shrank herself to normal size. She couldn't get any smaller. She could only increase her size.
Hysteria was the first to see a Dalek. He knew that it would be unwise to attack them now or else he would give himself away. He would sneak past them and find a way of stopping the Dalek invasion.
Sue had found herself in them main control room. She saw the buttons but she understand what they meant. She then heard some Daleks coming. She began to panic a little. But this made her shrink to 3 inches. She didn't have time to react; all she did was run for cover. She then saw two Daleks go to the controls.
"<When do we begin the invasion of Earth?>" asked a Dalek.
"<This is not an invasion,>" replied the other Dalek. "<This is pest control>"

What happens to Sue?
1431212111121111121111222212112111.title: Searching the ship

14312121111211111211112222121121111.content:
"Oh my God they're gonna kill everyone," thought Sue. "Somehow I've gotta stop it."
But then Sue began to feel weird. Then her head hit the top of the thing she was hiding under. She was growing and fast. She needed to get into a clear space before she was crushed to death.
Sue ran into a part of the control room where was still hidden and there was open space. She grew until she was roughly 10 feet tall. She tried to shrink down to normal but she couldn't. She tried growing but she still couldn't do that. She was stuck at 10 feet until her powers started working again.
She waited for the Daleks to leave until she went to the controls. Her head was hitting the ceiling so this annoyed her but stills he tried to figure what the buttons did.
"Ok Sue think how can you stop this invasion," she thought. "You're brain's big now use it now use it."
She was still unsure what to do. She didn't want to push any buttons due to the fear of doing something that'll seal the Earth's fate.
She was thinking for several minutes. Until she heard something.
"Sue," said a Human voice.
She turns around.

Who is it?
14312121111211111211112222121121111.title: Attackk of the 10 foot Sue

143121211112111112111122221211211111.content:
It was Reed Richards her husband. He couldn't believe that Sue was still in her giant state.
"Sue shrink," he said.
"I can't yet my powers are out for now," replied Sue. "But I need your help to disable this ship. Before they kill everyone on Earth."
Reed goes over the controls and took a look at them. Sue also looked at them but she still couldn't understand them. But Reed could.
"Hmm this looks like extremely hi-tech," said Reed. "But it shouldn't be a problem for me. I just need a little time."
"How much time?"
"About ten minutes."
"How long?"
"Err five minutes."
"Good." Then Sue shrank down to her normal size. She gave out a sigh of relief. "Good my powers are working again. I'll make sure no Daleks come while you're working."
"Thanks Sue that'll be a big help to me."
Sue then goes over to the door and she looked down the corridor and she saw something.

Who is it?

1431212111121111121111222212112111111.content:
She saw a Dalek coming but thankfully it hadn't seen her yet. She quickly turned around to Reed.
"Reed hurry up there's a Dalek coming," said Sue.
"I'm working as fast as I can honey," replied Reed. "I just need a little more time."
Sue looked around to see if she could find something that'll give them a distraction for the Daleks. She saw a red button on the wall with a flame above it. She figure hat it was a fire alarm so she pushed it.
The fire alarm went off and the Dalek turned around and left. She gave a sigh of relief.
"Ok it's gone. But how long are you gonna be?"
"Just one more minute."
"I hope the others are alright."
"Knowing them honey they'll be fine. There's nothing they can't handle." He continues to type away. "There got it. Now let's get off this ship."
"First we'll have to find the others."
"I'll send them a message to meet us back at the ship."
Mr Fantastic and Colossal Girl then made their way through the ship and back to the Fantasti-Car. Ben was already there but Johnny and Hysteria were still on their way.
1431212111121111121111222212112111111.title: Fire alarm

choices: The Fantasic Four get away safely
14312121111211111211112222121121111111.content:
Then the pair saw Johnny and Ben running down the corridors. This was a relief for Sue and Reed until they saw Daleks right behind them.
Johnny was throwing fire balls at them but their shields were able to block his attack. They saw Hysteria running down another corridor with several Daleks behind him.
All three of them get to the Fantasti-car before the Daleks. But they had a slight problem. It would take a few seconds to lift off. The Daleks would be there way before then. It was official one of them had to stay and defend the Fantasti-Car.
Hysteria volunteered since he had a vendetta against the Daleks. Sue gave him a kiss for his heroism.
The Fantastic Four got into the Fantasti-Car and prepared for launch. Sue watched as Hysteria prepared himself for the Daleks. She could hear them saying Exterminate and she even cried a little.
Hysteria took off his helmet and got out his rocket launcher.
"Hey Daleks!" shouted Hysteria. He then got himself ready. "SAY HELLO TO MY LITTLE FRIEND!"
He then begins to fire just as the Fantastic Four lifted off. Sue couldn't bear to watch.

What happens next?
14312121111211111211112222121121111111.title: Say Hello to My Little Friend

143121211112111112111122221211211111111.content:
The Fantastic Four fly out of the ship and towards safety. They were all sad about Hysteria especially Sue. She didn't even know what his real name was. But she also didn't know what Reed had done at the controls.
He told them that he had changed the ship's course towards the sun. Sue dreaded the thought of Hysteria burning up in the sun's core. But she figured that he would have been dead anyway from the Daleks.
A few weeks later The Fantastic Four had bought a memorial bench for Hysteria and they put it in Central Park. Every time Sue went into Central Park she would sit on this bench and remember her lost friend. She just wanted to know what happened to him. Had Hysteria been killed by the Daleks? Had he fended them off and burned off in the sun? Or by a miracle had he found a way to escape the ship?
These were probably questions that she would never know the answer to. All she could do was pray that Hysteria was in a place far better than this one.
But Sue got on with her life. Now she was thought a lot more forward while on Fantastic Four Missions. She practiced her size changing abilities a lot more and the more she practiced the bigger she could become.
143121211112111112111122221211211111111.title: Escape

1431212111121111121111222212112111111111.content:
Sue was still very upset about the disappearance of Hysteria. Although she had the guys in the Fantastic Four she felt that Hysteria was different. They were friends and they weren't having any sexual relations. That's what she respected about him. He never asked for anything like that.
A little later we see Sue still in the park. She is wearing her casual clothes and she was walking to the bench that the Fantastic Four had put there in his honour. But when she got close she saw some Teenagers putting spray paint on it. This made her angry and she ran over to them.
"What the hell do you think you're doing?" asked Sue.
"We're improving this little bench," said One Teenager.
"This bench happens to be in memory of one of my good friends."
"Buzz off Blondie."
Sue then started to think big a little and she began to grow. The teenagers watched in fear as she gained more and more height. She gave them an angry stare.
"Oh crap its that chick from the Fantastic Four!" shouted one teen.
"Let's get the hell out of here!" shouted another teen.
The teenagers then began to run away. When they were gone Sue shrank down to a little above 6 feet.

What does she do?
1431212111121111121111222212112111111111.title: Troubled youths

1431212111121111121111222212112111111111.content:
"Look what they've done to this bench," thought Sue as she looked at it. It was covered in white paint. "Well I better clean it off before it dries."
She then got a hanky out of her her pocket and she started to wipe off the little areas that ahd any paint on it. She still couldn't believe that those teenagers would do a thing like that.
"Sue," said a voice.
She then stood up and looked around. She saw nothing and this made her feel a little uneasy. She swore that she heard someone call out her name but she couldn't see where it came from.
"Is someone there?"
"Sue."
She then grew a little so that she could have a higher vantage point. But she still saw nothing. She felt a little afraid as she shrank back.
Then she walked abck to the Baxter building. She couldn't stop thinking about the voice that called out to her. But the strange thing about it was that it seemed oddly familiar.

What does she do?
1431212111121111121111222212112111111111.title: Voices

1431212111121111121111222212112111111111.content:
Sue went around the Baxter Building looking for Reed. She found him in his lab doing some more harmless experiments. When he saw her he saw the worried look on her face. He knew that something must have been wrong.
“What’s wrong honey?” asked Reed.
“I heard something,” replied Sue.
“You heard what?”
“I heard someone call out my name. It sounded like Hysteria.”
“Are you sure it was him?”
“I’m positive I can recognize his accent anywhere.”
“Did you see him?”
“No I didn’t see anyone.”
“Well maybe you’re just hallucinating. I know that he was your friend but your mind must be making you think that you hear his voice. Its fairly common for that to happen when you lose someone you care about.”
“I wasn’t hallucinating I really heard him.”
“Ok well I have a test to see if you’re accounts are fact or just something you imagined.”
“I don’t imagine like that Reed.”
1431212111121111121111222212112111111111.title: Hallucinating?

1431212111121111121111222212112111111111.content:
A little later we see Sue under a brain scanner. Reed is at the computer operating it. He has goggles on and he is pushing the buttons away.
“Ok honey you may feel a little weird but it’s perfectly normal,” said Reed.
He then began the scanning into Sue’s brain. He was looking for any anomalies in her brain. The only odd thing that he found was the part of her brain that controlled her powers but that was it. Other than that it was a perfectly normal brain.
“So is there anything?” asked Sue.
“No not as far as I can see,” replied Reed.
“So I wasn’t hearing things.”
“For me that was both a sense of relief and a dread.”
“How come?”
“Well now I know that you’re not going crazy. But now we need to find out where that voice was coming from. Where did you first hear it?”
“In the park at the bench we put there for Hysteria.”
“Did you notice anything odd?”
“No.”

What happens next?
1431212111121111121111222212112111111111.title: No anomolies

1431212111121111121111222212112111111111.content:
Just then Johnny aka the Human Torch came into the lab. He had a basketball with him and he was bouncing it around a little. He had a big smile on his face.
“Yo sis there’s a big super powered basketball match downstairs,” said Johnny. “And we’re dying for you to play centre court.”
Sue frowned at her brother. “Johnny now is not the time!” she shouted. She didn’t notice that she was growing a little. “We’re in the middle of something very important!” By now she was 9 feet tall. “And I don’t play basketball!” Just then her head hit the ceiling of Reed’s lab. She was 20 feet tall.
“Wow sis I’m sorry.”
“That’s alright it should be me apologising.” She then slowly shrank to normal. “I’m just a little edgy.”
“What’s up?”
“I keep hearing Hysteria’s voice.”
“Wow wait I thought he was dead.”
“That’s what I thought.”
“But he did go with a classic line. Say hello to my little friend. That is so Scarface.”
“I’ve never seen that film.”
1431212111121111121111222212112111111111.title: Human torch

1431212111121111121111222212112111111111.content:
"Well you wouldn't really like it sis," said Johnny. "It's got l a lot of violence and swearing and there's hardly any romance."
"Don't stereotype me,” replied Sue.
"But it is true about you."
He then laughed and walked away. Sue had been slightly annoyed by Johnny and this made her grow a little. Reed told her to calm down a little and so she did.
"Well besides Johnny's rather unexpected visit everything is going well," said Reed. "If you take me to where you heard Hysteria's voice maybe I can find something."
"Thanks Reed. How do you want to get there? Fantasti-car or Sue airways?"
"As tempting as the Fantasi-car is it's being repaired by Ben."
"Sue airways it is then."
They both go outside and Sue grew to 50 feet tall. She then picked up Reed and she started to walk to Central Park. When she got there she put him on the floor by the bench and she then shrinks to 6 and a half feet tall.

"If he keeps this up thousands if not millions of people may die," replied Sue.
"We've gotta do something."
"Yeah but Reed's in South Africa talking to one of his friends and Johnny's in L.A with his new girlfriend. So it's just up to us two."
"That's the spirit. Shall we go to the Fantasti-car."
"No Reed took it with him."
"So how are we gonna get there?"
"I'll show you."
1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.title: Beginning of World War III?

1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.content:
Sue and Ben were making their way to the front door. But then someone rung the door bell. They both thought it was best that Ben should answer it. When he opened the it turned out to be Courtney their land lady and she had a piece of paper in her hand.
"Oh no what do you want?" asked Ben.
"I have come to give you this," replied Courtney. he shows Ben the notice for Eviction sheet. "Now I must speak with either Reed or Sue Richards."
"Oh come right in. She's inside."
Courtney walks inside. Then she sees the 15 foot Sue and nearly faints.
"Hi Courtney," said Sue. "What brings you here today."
"I have to give you this." Sue bends down and gets the notice for eviction. She tires to read it. But now it was very hard.
"You're evicting us?"
"Due to too many mishaps and complaints."
"Look can we deal with this later. We really have to go."
"Ok but don't think you're off the hook."
Courtney leaves. Ben and Sue struggle to get downstairs.

But what do they do when the get outside?
1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.title: Notice for Eviction

1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.content:
"Where to now then Suzie?" asked Ben.
"We're going to the port," replied Sue.
"Why what's there?"
"You'll see." She then only slightly grows. But she becomes 100 feet. "It's gonna take some getting used to." She then picks up Ben. "Next stop New York City Port."
Sue walked to the port. She was careful not to step on anyone or destroy any cars. In no time flat she was there.
"Ok what now?" asked Ben.
"Now first thing I do is step into the water," replied Sue. She did so and the water level was up to her upper thigh. "Now I just walk out a little bit." She walks for about a mile. By now the water was up to her boobs. "Now I grow a little more." She then grew until the water was only knee height. "And now I walk out a little more." She does so.
"So Sue what are we gonna do when we get there?"
"Well I think it's best we confront Doctor Doom." Then suddenly the water almost instantly got deeper. Sue fell in and started to plunge to the bottom. Without thinking she started to grow. Ben had fallen off her shoulder so she grabbed him while she was growing. The seabed was two miles down. In seconds she her feet touched the seabed. She kept growing until she was 10 miles tall. The water level now as below her knees. She then looks at her hand and sees an almost microscopic Ben Grimm. She immediately puts him in her eat.
"Wow what happened there?" he asked.
1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.title: Walking the sea

1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.content:
"Sorry about that Ben," replied Sue. "Reed told me when you get about 50 miles out to the ocean it suddenly becomes deeper. I had to compensate for the added depth."
"Yeah and now you're bigger than gigantic," said Ben.
"Hey at least you're safe. And if you feel like you're gonna fall out just grab one of my hairs. You should really see the view from up here. i can see everything. But now I've gotta be careful I don't accidentally cause a ship to sink or something like that. Plus I don't want to walk through any clouds. Those things get you wet."
"So how long do you think it'll take us to get to Latvaria?"
"I don't know. At this size only a couple of hours. But I'll have to shrink down when I reach shallower waters."
"Ok just be careful now."
"Hey I'm always careful."
The ten mile high Sue walked for several hours. When she reached shallower waters she shrank accordingly. Eventually she reaches land.

Which continent is it?
1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.title: 10 miles high

1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.content:
When Sue reached land she put Ben on the ground. Then she shrank down to 15 foot. But they noticed something odd.
"Seems a little warm to be Europe," said Ben.
"Yeah it should be no where near this hot," replied Sue. Then she saw some people not far away. They looked African. "Oh silly me we're in Africa. I must have made a wrong turn somewhere."
"Ok so just grow up again and we'll go to Europe."
"Alright just give me a second." She then grows to 70 feet tall.
"Man I never get tired of seeing that."
Sue then picks Ben up and puts him back on her shoulder. "Ok little man lets go."
She started to walk out to sea. When she got out far enough she changed direction and started to go north. She would grow and shrink accordingly to the water level. Sometimes she didn't need to be that big. But sometimes she had to become miles tall. She made sure everyone was safe including Ben. And eventually they reached Europe.
1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.title: Africa by mistake

1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.content:
"Ok now we're in Europe," said Sue. "But now we just gotta get to Latvaria. And i can't grow too big or else I'll kill thousands just by taking a short walk."
"So how big are you gonna be?" asked Ben.
"Well looks like I'll have to go to 50 feet maybe. You'll have to get out of my ear."
Ben then jumped down from Sue's ear onto her shoulder. If it wasn't for his super powers he would have easily died of high fall. But then Sue began to rapidly shrink. She was losing thousands of feet in mere seconds.
Eventually she reached her ideal 50 feet tall. She was big enough to make progress but she could still watch where she was putting her huge feet.
"Ok now I'm ready," said Sue.
She then began to walk she was watching where she was putting her feet. She made sure that she didn't accidentally destroy something or kill anyone. She didn't want someone's life on her conscience.
The walk took her a long time but eventually she reached the boarder to Latvaria. She shrunk to her smallest size of 15 feet and took Ben off her shoulder. They had gotten to one part where the boarder was open that side.
"Now let's see what Doom's up to."

Will they get to Castle Doom?
1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.title: Finally in Latvaria

1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.content:
Meanwhile in Castle Doom the villain Dr Doom was enjoying some fine wine. Then one of her loyal servant came in. He stopped drinking the win and he looked at him.
"What do you need to report?" asked Dr Doom.
"Lord Doom the Fantastic Four members The Thing and Colossal Girl have been spotted entering the boarder. What are your commands Lord Doom?"
"Hmm I could use Colossal Girl’s size to my advantage. If I had her in my army I would be unstoppable."
"I don't like to sound out of line but she wouldn't join your army. her mind has been tainted by the Americans."
"Don't you worry she join us given the right incentive. Now send an army to defend the castle. But I don't want them to make it too hard for the heroes to get through. Nor do I want too easy. I want them to believe that I'm trying to stop them from getting to the castle. Do I make myself clear?"
"Yes Lord Doom."
"Good now tell the others."
Back with Sue and Ben they were going through the tiny country of Latvaria. No one could stop them reaching the castle.
1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.title: Maybe some use

1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.content:
Sue and Ben were getting through Latvaria's defences with some difficulties. Sue was growing to thousands of feet to take out many of Doom's robots. The Thing was using all of his mighty strength to keep the Doombots at bay. Eventually there were none left.
"That's the best Doom can throw at us?" asked Ben. "This should be a walk in the park."
"Remember Doom isn't a push over," replied Sue.
"I know I can't wait to get my hands on old Doctor D."
Sue then picked up her good friend. "Now let's show Doctor Doom just how powerful we really are."
She then began to walk towards castle Doom. When she was close people could feel her footsteps as Earthquakes. Everyone was panicking except Doctor Doom. For him everything was going perfect.
"Come Colossus Girl," he said. "Come to Uncle Victor."
Eventually they got to Castle Doom. They called out Doctor Doom and he calmly walked out of his castle.
"You will pay for your crimes," said Sue.

When will Doctor Doom?
1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.title: To Castle Doom

1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.content:
Dr Doom then came out of his castle and confronted the pair. Colossal girl shrank to her minimum height of 15 feet. This was still an intimidating height though. But Doom just smiled.
"Well done you've gotten past my defenses," he said. "No one has ever gotten this far before."
"Doom surrender now so you can pay for your crimes," replied Sue. "We will take you by force if we have to."
"Please be reasonable we're all civilized adults. Now come inside I have much to show you."
He then turned around and walked away. Sue and Ben followed him but she was having difficulties getting through the doors. Still being big had it's disadvantages. But she was thankful that the ceilings were high enough for her to stand up straight in.
"Are you aware of what I'm doing?" asked Doom.
"You're invading land that doesn't belong to you," replied Sue. "That's why we're here to stop you."
"But what if I gave you a just cause?"
1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.title: Inside the castle

1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.content:
"What would be a just cause for slaughtering people?" asked Sue. "In my eyes you're a monster."
"Maybe in your eyes but to other's I'm an idol," replied Doctor Doom. "Some worship me as a God."
"You're not a God. You're a man."
"But you both will help me become a God."
"Now why would we do a thing like that?" replied Ben.
"Because I can do this."
A beam came out of Doom's hands and hit Sue. She shrank down to her normal height and she was slowly turning invisible.
"Hey I've got my old powers back," said Sue.
"You are now in my debt and I will see that you repay it."
"So that's your trick. If that's the case then take back the powers and give me back my size changing ones."
"But you'll be stuck as a 15 foot giantess forever. Even I won't be able to cure your condition and neither will your pitiful husband."
"I'd rather have that then being debt to you."

Will Doom give her the size changing powers back?
1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.title: Back to the Invisible woman?

1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.content:
"As you wish," said Dr Doom.
He then fired at Sue again. This time she turned fully visible and she grew back up to 15 feet tall. She looked at her body.
"That was easy," said Ben.
"Well she will be more useful to me we've these powers." He then clicked his fingers and the entire room filled up with Doombots. They began to attack the heroes. Sue grew until her head hit the ceiling and she started to stomp away at the Doombots.
But these Doombots were different from the others. They seemed to be trying to grab them with something. Ben was doing a good job keeping them away from him. But several were on Sue's back and they were climbing up it.
One of the Doombots reached her neck and they planted a device there. Sue began to scream out in pain and she fell onto her knees. Ben instantly noticed her agony.
"Suzie are you alright?" he asked.
Then Sue used her large hand to brush him away like he was some sort of insect. Doctor Doom laughed.
1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.title: Stage 2 of plan

choices: The Fantastic Four get there in time
Sue has already killed many soldiers
1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.content:
"Did you enjoy that Colossal Girl?" asked Dr Doom.
"Yes Lord Doom," replied Sue in an almost zombie like voice.
"Good the Thing was the first now for the US army."
Sue then shrank down to her minimum size and she left the castle with Dr Doom. But when she was outside she grew to about 60 feet and she picked up Dr Doom.
"Now my loyal Giantess show them what happens when you wage war against Dr Doom," he said.
"Yes Lord Doom."
She began to walk away. But Ben was able to get up after Sue's attack. He didn't think that she would do anything like that to him. he still had a communicator. But he opted not to contact Sue but instead to Reed.
He was still at the Baxter Building doing some research. He then picked up his communicator.
"Hello," said Reed.
"Hey Stretcho little Suzie's under some sort of mind control and she's helping Dr Doom," replied Ben.
"Stay where you are Johnny and I will be with you ASAP!"

What happens?
1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.title: Under Doom's control

1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.content:
Reed and Johnny got into the Fantasti-Car and they flew as fast as they could to Latvaria. It would take them roughly an hour but that would be too late for a l;ot of the troops.
Meanwhile back in Latvaria Sue was stomping away on tanks and troops. Normally she wouldn't do this but she was under Doom's control. He was there laughing harder with every death.
"Good Mrs Richards kill them all!" shouted Doom.
"Yes Lord Doom," replied Sue.
She saw a troop by her foot. She could see that he was terrified. She just raised her foot over him and brought it down ending his life. She looked over and saw other troops. Except these ones were retreating.
"You're making me proud Colossal Girl," said Dr Doom. "You make a much better killing machine then a heroine."
"Thank you Lord Doom," replied Sue.
"Now with them out of the way it is time to focus on your team mates."
Just then the Fantastic Four flew over her head towards Castle Doom. Johnny came out of the vehicle.
1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.title: Sue the killing machine

1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.content:
Johnny flew right into Sue's view and he stopped there.
"Please Sue stop I don't want to hurt you," he said.
"That's funny," replied Dr Doom. "Because my puppet wants to hurt you and your team mates. Colossal Girl kill him."
"Yes Lord Doom," said Sue.
She then tried to grab her younger brother but he flew out of the way. He threw a fireball at her but he made it not too hot. He didn't want to seriously injure her. But he wouldn't let her kill anymore people.
"Your performance is flattering Human torch," said Dr Doom. "If circumstances were different you would have had the honour of being my puppet. But now you must die."
Sue was then able to grab Johnny and she started to squeeze the life out of him. Death was almost certain but then she was hit in her neck by the Thing. Mr Fantastic was above in the Fantasti-Car.
"Ben try to remove the mind control device," said Reed.
"Where is it Stretcho?" replied Ben
"Chances are it's in the back of the neck."
"On it Stretcho."

Will the Thing succeed?
1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.title: Fantastic Four regrouped

1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.content:
Ben started to climb around Sue's neck. She was trying to swat him like a big but he was able to dodge out of the way. But the other members of the Fantastic Four were trying to keep her occupied.
Dr Doom didn't want to lose control of his puppet so he started doing everything he could to stop Ben from reaching the mind control device. He started to fire lightning at him from his hands.
"Give up Thing," said Dr Doom. "Colossal Girl is mine forever. She will take over the world for me and no force on Earth can stop someone who can make the Earth look like a mar ball."
"That's where you're wrong Doom," replied Ben.
"You expect to fight me?"
"No."
The Thing then ran away. But he wasn't being a coward. Instead he was trying to get to the Mind Control Device. If he removed it then Sue would be free and able to fight against Doom.
He eventually found it but Doom fired another lightning bolt at him and he fell to the ground on the neck.
1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.title: Colossal Girl is Mine!

1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.content:
“Face it Thing you’ve lost,” said Doom. “Give up and I might just spare you.”
“Not if your grandma’s life depended on it,” replied Ben.
“I knew you’d use such a low witted comment. Very well prepare to die.”
He then fired at Ben. But he moved out of the way and Doom hit the Mind Control device instead. This caused Sue some pain and the pair fell off her and onto the ground. For a normal person this would have been fatal. But for these guys they survived.
Sue continued to cry out in pain. She gave out one final scream and then it subsided. She looked over to Dr Doom and her eyes filled up with hatred. She stood up.
"DOOM!" shouted Sue. Her voice was deafening to anyone around her. "YOU MADE ME KILL!"
"It was a calculated Plan," replied Doom.
"I KNOW YOU WANTED TO SEE ME BIG! BUT NOW YOU'RE GONNA SEE JUST HOW BIG I CAN GET!"
Sue's body then shot up into the sky. Everyone watched as her huge shadow began to engulf everyone.

What does Sue do?
1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.title: Angry Sue

1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.content:
Sue went through a few clouds but she stopped at roughly 3 miles tall. She looked like a Goddess over a world of insects. But she stepped over Doom and walked away. Everyone was a little confused but then they saw her go to Castle Doom.
All of Doom's servants got out of the castle and ran for cover. Sue lifted up her mega sized foot and slammed it down on the castle completely destroying it. All of Doom technology was also gone.
"What has she done?" asked Doom.
"She's just stopped World War 3," replied Reed.
Then they saw Sue walking back. She was shrinking along the way and when she reached them she was about 50 feet tall. She grabbed Doom and brought him up to her level. he tried to fire at her with his armour but she ripped off the arms of the armour revealing his true arm.
"DOOM WAT YOU'VE DONE TO ME IS UNFORGIVABLE!" shouted Sue. Her voice was still deafening. "YOU WILL PAY FOR YOUR CRIMES!"
"I can't I have diplomatic immunity," replied Doom. "I can't be jailed or anything. Face it Colossal Girl you’ve lost."
"SOME HOW I DON'T THINK SO!"
1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.title: Stomp on Castle Doom

1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.content:
Sue then lifted Doom. She had fire in her eyes and she looked over the horizon.
"I'LL SHOW YOU HOW FAR SOMEONE AT MY SIZE CAN THROW SOMEONE LIKE YOU!" shouted Sue.
She then threw Dr Doom as far as she could throw. She watched him go over the horizon and he was cursing at her.
When she couldn't see him anymore she began to calm down and she shrank down to her smallest height of 15 feet. She went down onto her knees and she cried. She Reed come up to her. He hugged his giant sized wife.
"Sue are you alright?" asked Reed.
"Do I look alight?" replied Sue. "I've just killed hundreds of soldiers."
"Honey that wasn’t your fault you were controlled."
"I know but their remains are still on my feet. And some of them there isn't anything at all." She cried even more. "I hate Doom."
"We all do but you've destroyed his Castle. That will put him back for months, maybe even years if he comes back."
"Please Reed I just want to get home."
"Ok Honey."

What happens tomorrow?
1431212111121111121221112221111122112111.title: Bye bye Doom

152.content:
((Because there was no option for this and because there was already a catwoman arc, I made up my own))


Elektra roamed the streets of New York, a ghost of sorts. True, she had been resserected since her fatal battle against Bullseye, but she had lost her meaning in life and was trying to find it again.

Her life had become that of her job, taking down anyone that was in the contract. Dictators, politicians, all fell at her ninjitsu skills. It seemed like she had completed all the biggest tasks when a new assignment came in.

Tony Stark wanted her to investigate Kingpin, since he noticed that the crime lord has been doing a great deal of bioresearch that could become a great thorn in his corporation's side, not to mention put a lot of people in danger. True, he could take on any monster as Iron Man, but it seemed like a better idea to nip the problem before it got worse, and Elektra was the woman for the job.

Slipping in through the shadows of the biolabs, she searched through the records of everything that has been going on. It seemed like Kingpin has discovered a substitute for Pym Particles, very unstable materials based on interstellar ions.

"An army of giant criminals...sounds like him" she said to herself as she prepared a C4 to take out the entire project. She then heard someone enter the room. Turning, she was shocked to see....
152.title: Elektra, not Catwoman

1522.content:
As Elektra was getting prepared to destroy the biomachines, she quickly turned to see Punisher, armed with an M4. She gasped a bit, having no idea he would show up in a place like this.

"Turns out I'm not the only one back from the dead" he said as he lowered his weapon. He was referring to when he almost died at the hands of the Saint mob.

"I take it from the gun you're after Kingpin" she suggested, knowing the Punisher well for using lethal force on the deadliest of criminals.

"I was, but seeing you here I can just turn around and head back" he said, turning away. Elektra is an accomplished assassin, more refined than he is so he figured she'd be here to take down the Kingpin too.

"Sorry Frank, but I'm only here to take out the experiments. Kingpin is your job" she said, planting a charge on a machine.

"Let me guess....Stark" he asked rhetorically, knowing the reasons and motives Tony would have for sending her here. All of this was making sense. She gave a slight nod, grumbling because her cover was blown, but Frank wasn't the type to tattle. He grabbed a sphere like device and tossed it to her.

"Evidence, in case that behemoth gets away" he said as he cocked his gun and walked off. Spiderman, Daredevil, and Shield have failed to take down the Kingpin, and Punisher didn't think his chances were any better.

She looked at the sphere, seeing all the designs on it. Accidently pressing a button, a flash of light engulfed her, sending the experimental power coursing through her.

"What the..." Punisher asked, turning around and seeing her. Elektra could grow at any time due to the unstability of the machine, but at least her clothes and weapons will grow with her.

Someone heard the noise and came out...
1522.title: Elektra and Punisher

15222.content:
As they were about to leave, Kingpin entered the room, flanked by armed guards on both sides. He saw the two and gave out a laugh.

"My my, here I was expecting Daredevil or Spiderman, but instead a pair of no power corpses have broken in" he mighty Kingpin said.

"You're about to be the next corpse" Punisher said as he was about to fire, but Elektra grabbed his arm.

"If you shoot, none of us are leaving alive!" she shouted, trying to talk sense into him.

"What the hell are we gonna do, surrender?! That monster will kill us anyway!" Punisher shouted back at her.

"Such hostility. All I ask is that you disarm that bomb and leave. I'm much too busy to be bothered with you both, so I'm feeling gracious in sparing your lives" Kingpin said with mock sympathy.

"Bio-experiments ain't your style, Fisk. Either you are branching out, or you're working for someone higher. Who is it? Octavius? Magneto? Doom?" she asked, holding the growth device.

What happens first?
15222.title: Caught by the Kingpin

152222.content:
As soon as Punisher was about to fire off a few rounds, Elektra begins growing right before everyone's eyes. Bigger and bigger, higher and higher, until her head touched the ceiling.

"Dear god..." Punisher said, having seen nothing like this before.

"So it does work...brilliant! My research has flourished at last!" the Kingpin said with glee. Before Punisher could shoot, police helicopters could be heard.

"We'll settle this later..." Kingpin said as he walked into the shadows, disappearing into the night.

"Time to bail" Punisher suggested, not wanting to have to deal with the police yet again.

"I'm huge! Where am I going to go?!" Elektra shouted, a bit shocked by being so big.

"My base of operations is a warehouse not too far from here. I'm sure it'll be big enough" he said, showing a rare side of compassion.

"Thanks Frank...I owe you one" she replied with a smile, leaving the area with him as they try to get back to the warehouse.
152222.title: Fleeing the scene

1522221.content:
With some careful moves, the duo made it to what looked like an abandoned warehouse. Punisher had turned it into his own little base. Weapons were all over the place, everything from the small stuff to the real devastators. Elektra felt nervous, as she was used to blades and not guns.

"May not be much, but make yourself at home" he said, opening a bottle of Wild Turkey and downing a good portion of the bottle. Depression and anger still haunted the back of his mind.

Elektra nodded, feeling grateful. The ceilings were indeed high enough, but she didn't know if she would grow again or not. "This will take some getting used to" she said to herself, sitting down on the ground and putting away her now massive blades.

The phone rings. Who is on the other line?
1522221.title: Base of Operations

15222211.content:
The phone rang, and since Frank was finishing the bottle of whiskey and couldn't answer it, Elektra pressed the speaker phone button so she could take a message.

"Frank, I know you're there. Where's Elektra?" asked the voice of Tony Stark.

"I'm right here. How'd you get this number?" she asked, but knew that man had his ways, so wasn't expecting a response from him.

"Elektra? Your voice is louder...please don't tell me.." Stark groaned.

"Turns out this device you wanted me to destroy was a growth mechanism. You mind telling me whats going on here?!" she demanded, really wanting to know the whole story.

"Alright....that machine was funded by Fisk as a power enhancer to be sent to Latveria" he explained to her, making her gasp.

"Doom with an army of giants...sounds like Shield priority, not yours Tony" she said into the phone.

"Kingpin working for Doom and me working for Fury. Funny how this world is turning upside down. Besides, that was mine and Pym's work that was plagarized, so I had to have a hand in this" he said with a light laugh at the end.

"So what are my orders?" she asked, wondering how long this was going to take before things went back to normal.

"Lay low as best you can. I don't know if you'll keep growing or not, so be careful. I'd keep you in one of my shelters, but that would be the first place Doom would look for you. Oh, and keep Castle safe" he said to her, remembering he owed the guy a favor for helping him out during the raid at Stark Towers (from the videogame). She nodded and said her goodbye before hanging up. Castle was out like a light, collapsed on his bed.
15222211.title: Further orders

choices: "I think I need some help here!"
152222112.content:
Things seemed a bit too quiet around the warehouse, but suddenly a flash bomb went off. Frank quickly sobered up and shielded his eyes, grabbing a nearby shotgun. Elektra did the same, but got her sai ready.

"Surrender the growth device!" came the order from one of many doombots that entered the room.

"Screw you, tinhead!" Frank shouted as he fired a round. The bots were highly armored, and his shells weren't doing crap.

"Looks like I need the big guns...hold them off!" he said as he went to get his armor piercing rifle. Elektra's massive weapons were able to destroy the bots, and she actually was holding her own. Still, any help would have been nice.

He eventually did get his rifle loaded, firing round after round, tearing apart whatever bot he was aiming at. The duo had to have taken out about 20 of them when a laser round clipped Frank in the shoulder, making him drop the weapon and clench his arm in pain.

What does he say?
152222112.title: Attack of the Doombots!

choices: No I prefer to read something about Bat-Girl
153.content: Or shall we go with Firestar instead?
153.title: Firestar?

1531.content: Which Firestar would you like to grow?
1531.title: Which version

choices: She flies back to Spider-Man and Ice-Man
15312.content:
We start our tale in New York City with Spider-Man and his Amazing Friends Iceman and Firestar. But they were out of costume and enjoying a night out around the town. They were chilling out in their favourite bar.
"Crime in the city seems to be down lately," said Angelica.
"Yeah it's a bummer we've got no bad guys to beat," replied Bobby.
"Maybe the low crime rate is a sign we're doing our jobs," said Peter.
Then suddenly they see a costumed man fly right past the bar. He was holding a case. He was being chased by the police.
"That's our cue."
They run out of the bar and go into an alley. There they get on their costumes and become Spider-Man, Ice-Man and Firestar. Then they give chase to the flying man.
The police lost him. But the Amazing Friends were right on his tail. Eventually he landed on a roof and the Amazing Friends followed. He saw them.
"You!" he shouted. "Behold the power of the Commander."
He fires a beam of energy from his hand. Fortuneatly it missed and Ice-Man freezed the Commander's body. Only his head remaind unfrozen. But Ice-Man's Ice had also knocked the case off the building. It landed on the floor and opened. A large piece of meteorite came out.
"I'll get it," said Firestar. She flies down to the bottom and grabs the meteorite. But when she did her molecules felt like they were on fire. Her hands spasmed and she could let go of the meteorite. Bout a minute later she dropped it.

What happened next?
15312.title: The Comander

153122.content:
Firestar fell to the floor and went unconscious. Spider-Man had seen this from the top of the building. He turned to Ice-Man.
"Ice-Man you take the Commander to the police station," said Spider-Man. "I need to go and help Firestar. I'll meet you at H.Q in 5 minutes."
"Ok Spidey," replied Ice-Man.
He picks up the Commander and used his ice slide to take him away. Spider-Man web slinged to the bottom of the building. When he got down there he picked up the meteor. Nothing happened all the energy from it was gone. Then he picked up Firestar and web-slinged back to their room. He placed her on the sofa.
About 5 minutes later she woke up. She saw Peter and Bobby out of costume.
"W-what happened?" she asked.
"You fainted don't you remember?" replied Peter.
"I remember grabbing the meteorite. Then there was a sharp pain. Everything else is a blur."
"I think it's best if you relaxed for a while."
"No I feel fine." She get up. But when she did she saw that she was about 2 inches taller than Peter and Bobby. "Hey since when have I been taller than you?"
"Oh dear."
153122.title: Oh dear

1531221.content:
"You're growing Angelica," said Peter.
"Don't be silly I'm not growing," replied Angelica. Then she grows about 3 inches right in front of them. "Ok maybe I am growing. What do I do?"
"Well now there's only one person who can help us right now."
"Who's that?"
"Dr Connors."
"You mean Lizardman?"
"Yes."
"Ok but I'm a little scared if he becomes the Lizard again."
"We should be fine," said Bobby. "Besides if he does then you can use your giant feet to squash him."
"That's not funny."
"It is to me." He starts to laugh. Firestar just stares at him.
"Knock it off you two," said Spider-Man. "Lets costume up and get on our way."
They all costume up and start their journey to Dr Connor's lab. It takes a few minutes but they eventually get there.

Has Firestar grown any more on the journey?
1531221.title: Go see Dr Connors

15312211.content:
When they landed on the roof of the building they noticed that Firestar was now just under 7 feet tall. She towered both Spider-man and Ice-Man.
"I grew again," she said. "I could feel it while I was flying."
"It's ok," replied Spider-Man. "Dr Connors will cure you."
"And in the meantime I heard that the ladies super basketball tam was looking for new players," laughed Ice-Man.
"Ha ha laugh it off now," replied Firestar. "Because if I just keep growing I don't know what I'm gonna do to you."
"Oh I'm so scared."
Firestar just ignored him. They go into the lab where they saw Dr Connors working on something.
"The Amazing Friends what are you doing here?" he asked.
"Well Doc we've got a problem that keeps getting bigger," replied Spider-Man.
"What's that?" then he sees the nearly 7 foot Firestar. then she grew another couple of inches. "Oh I see the problem."
"You've gotta help me before I become too big," said Firestar.
"Ok I'm gonna start with a..."
15312211.title: At the lab

choices: Firestar has a mega growth spurt
153122112.content:
"X-Ray," said Dr Connors. "I need to see if your skeleton is being affected by your growth."
"Ok Doc," replied Firestar. "I hope it can help me."
Dr Connors takes her to the x-ray. Spider-Man and Ice-Man also come. They were worried about her.
She went under the ray and there was a screen that showed her skeleton.
"Hmm interesting," said Dr Connors. "There seems to be no lengthening or thickening of any of her bones. Her body isn't getting taller. It's getting bigger. And to this each part of her body grows at the same proportion. Spider-Man what caused her growth."
"Well I'm not quite sure," replied Spider-Man. "I think she grabbed some sort of meteorite and then she started growing."
"A meteorite?"
"Yes I have it with me." He gets the meteorite out of the webbing he had created. Dr Connors look at it. "It seems harmless now. If it did affect me I would have started growing by now."
"You're right Spider-Man it seems that what ever energy this meteorite was producing its gone now. And I think it was absorbed into Firestar.

What happens next?
153122112.title: X-Ray

1531221122.content:
Then suddenly they hear an alarm go off from outside. Spider-Man runs to the window and takes a look outside. He sees the Green Goblin robbing a bank.
"Green Goblin's robbing a bank," he said. "We've gotta get down there before someone gets hurt."
"Well I suggest Firestar stays here," replied Dr Connors. "You and Ice-Man deal with him and if you need Firestar you'll have to leave some sort of sign."
"Ok." Spider-Man and Ice-Man leave. Firestar waves goodbye.
"I hope they'll be alright," she said. Then she grew another couple of inches. "And I hope I'll stop growing."
"I'll work around the clock to make a cure," replied Dr Connors. "They'll be able to deal with the Green Goblin."
"I hope so. I hope so."

Do they need Firestar?
1531221122.title: The Green Goblin strikes

15312211222.content:
We now go to the bank where Norman Osborn aka the Green Goblin was robbing the bank. He had everyone at his mercy.
"This is too easy," he said. "But I've gotta be fast before those annoying Amazing Friends show up."
"I'm sorry but they're already here," said Spider-man as he and Ice-Man came in.
"Prepared to get your butt handed to you on a silver plate," replied Ice-Man.
"Wait there's only two of you," said Green Goblin. "Maybe my chances aren't so bleak after all."
He got some pumpkin bombs from his bag and started to throw them at Spider-Man and Ice-Man. They were just able to dodge them. But while they were distracted the Green Goblin made his escape. He flew right past them and into the air. They gave chase. But he threw bombs at them and they hit. But just before they went down Ice-Man shot up an giant sized ice F.
This had been seen by Firestar in Dr Connors building. By now she was over 8 feet tall.
"I've gotta go they need me," said Firestar.
She then jumps out of the window and starts to flying towards the Green Goblin.
15312211222.title: Bombs away

153122112221.content:
Firestar flew towards the Green Goblin. Throughout the whole journey she could feel herself getting taller and taller. She saw him landing at his hideout. When she landed by it she saw that she was just under 10 feet tall. She thought her growing would never end. But she had to put it out of her mind. When she tried to get through the door she was too tall to go through normally. She had to really bend over to get through. But when she got in and stood upright her head hit the ceiling.
"This is getting very annoying," thought Firestar. "But I've gotta find the Green Goblin."
She walks down to the lab where she sees the Green Goblin with all the money.
"Firestar?" said Green Goblin. "How did you find me?"
"You know you should really invent something that makes you invisible."
"And it looks like you've been gaining several inches since we lat met. Or should I say several feet?" He begins to laugh. This made Firestar angry. She grows some more. Now she was about 10'6.
"Oh laugh at me. Now you've made me mad."
"Oh I'm so scared. What's the big old Firestar gonna do?"
This made her even more angry.

What does she do?
153122112221.title: Getting Firetsar Mad

1531221122212.content:
She then started to set all of the Green Goblin's weapons. She was careful that nothing exploded. All the Green Goblin could do was watch.
"What are you doing you over grown freak," said the Green Goblin. "You're destroying my beautiful weapons."
"Oh I'm so sorry," replied Firestar sarcastically. "But I figured that you don't put up much of a fight without your weapons."
Eventually all the weapons were destroyed. By then Firetsar was had grown an extra foot. She was now way too tall for the room.
"Now just before we start I think I should make some more head room," said Firestar. She then melts the entire roof. After that she stood up straight. "Now that feels better."
The Green Goblin noticed that she had missed his glider. He activated it by using a wrist device. It goes to it. He then jumps on it and starts to fly away.
"So long Firestar." He laughs as he flies away.
"Hey you can't get away from me that easily."

Will she be able to catch him?
1531221122212.title: Melt everything

15312211222121.content:
Firestar began to fly after him. Now that she was bigger (and getting bigger all the time) she was faster than she normally would be. She easily caught up with the Green Goblin. When she reached him she melted the jets on his glider. When he started to fall to the ground she caught him. But the glider went down to the ground.
"Hey put me down," said the Green Goblin.
"I will do when I find a suitable jail for you," replied Firestar.
She flew to the police station. She gave the Green Goblin over to the authorities. But before they could say anything to her she flew away.
Firestar went back to Spider-Man and Ice-Man. they were still getting up. But when she landed on the ground she saw that she was about 14 feet tall.
"Are you guys alright?" she asked.
"Well that old Goblin will have to dish out more than that to beat us," replied Spider-Man.
"What are we gonna do now about my growth?"
"It's best we go back to Dr Connors. Hopefully he's come up with something by now."
15312211222121.title: Firestar catches the Green Goblin

153122112221211.content:
The Amazing Friends flew, slided and web-slinged back to the lab of Dr Connors. When they got there Dr Connors was amazed to see how much she had grown in such a short time.
"You've grown even more," he said.
"I know but because of my growth I was able to beat the Green Goblin," replied Firestar.
"Hey we weakened him first," snapped Ice-Man.
"Sure you did. Anyway have you found anything?"
"I have found somethings. As of yet I have found no way of stopping your growth. Not even slow it down."
"No."
"It's getting late. i think it's best you stayed here for the night for observation."
"Will I grow while I'm asleep?"
"A little but you won't grow as much. You need to be fully awake for you to grow fast. But asleep it goes at a slower rate."
"But wait she grew quite fast when she fell unconscious," replied Spider-Man.
"Well in the five minutes she gained around ten inches. But within the hour she's almost trebled her normal size."
"Don't worry guys I'll be fine here," said Firestar.
"Ok," replied Spider-Man. "We'll be back here first thing in the morning."
"Goodnight guys."
She then bends over and gives Spider-Man and Ice-Man a hug. Then they left. Dr Connors took her to a bed he had made for her. She gets in it and goes to sleep.

How much will she have grown by the next morning?
153122112221211.title: Back at Dr Connors' lab

1531221122212111.content:
The next morning Firestar woke up feeling like a million bucks. When she got out of bed she stood up. To her relief she hadn't grown that much over night. Only ten inches.
But in the kingdom of Asgard Firestar was being watched by wicked eyes. Loki the God of Evil was watching her. he was devising a sinister plan.
"Argh Firestar," he thought. "I remember when her and her pitiful friends came to Asgard and foiled my plans to take revenge on Thor. She seems to be growing at an amazing rate. She might even become more powerful than Thor. Yes when the time is right when Firestar is big enough I will take her under my control. Then I will use her to destroy Thor and take over Asgard. Then no one will dare challenge me with an ever-growing super-being. Ha ha ha."
1531221122212111.title: Wicked Eyes

choices: Show the city her new size
15312211222121111.content:
Meanwhile back at the lab Dr Connors was still working on the now 16 foot Firestar. her growth wasn't stopping. But it wasn't gradually but in little spurts of inches at a time.
She had to ring in sick at college and Peter said he would pick up all her work for her. She would also watch TV in between tests. By now she was so tall she even sitting down her head hit the ceiling. She watched the news and saw a section about her and the Green Goblin. She thought the videos they had of her made her look fat.
Then she grew another couple of inches making her head more uncomfortable with the ceiling. In the end she crawled out and back into the lab. But the ceiling of the lab was getting very close. Dr Connors was still looking at some of the results when he saw her.
"Dr Connors can I go outside?" she asked. "I'm feeling too cramped here."
"Ok but don't be too long," replied Dr Connors.
"Thanks."
She then went to the large window and opened it. Then she flies out of it.

What does she do?
15312211222121111.title: Cramped

153122112221211112.content:
Firestar thought she might as well have fun with her new size. She would fly all around the top of the skyscrapers. People looking on the ground couldn't tell that she was gigantic. But then she would fly very close to the ground. It was then when everyone saw her new size. Some were a little uneasy with the min-giantess. But others were happy to see her.
She landed on the ground and people started to gather around her. She even used her powers to put on a show for everyone. Then they saw her grow another few inches. They stared in amazement.
"Oh yeah I'm still growing," said Firestar. "Now the Incredible Growing Firestar must go."
Then she flew away. The crowd started to walk away. But one person was still watching her. This person was the evil God Loki in disguise. He was pleased with what he had just seen.
"Yes she's almost perfect," he said. "But there is one problem. She's growing too slowly. At her size Thor would defeat her easily. But that's nothing my power can't fix." He then clicked his fingers.
Firestar felt a shiver run down her spine. She thought it was nothing and flew back to Dr Connors.

How much faster will she grow?
153122112221211112.title: A show for the people

1531221122212111122.content:
When Firestar got back to the lab she realised something very strange. For almost no reason thinkable her body was growing even faster. She was inching up every few seconds.
"What's happening to me?" asked Firestar. She then grew another few inches.
"I don't know the tests didn't say your growth would speed up so fast in such a short time," replied Dr Connors.
"Please stop it somehow." She then grew another few inches. Her head was hitting the labs 20 foot ceiling.
"I wish I could but this is an all new twist."
"What am I gonna do?" She then grew another few inches.
"It's best you leave the lab until I've figured something out."
"Ok." She the grew another couple of inches.
She then flies out of the window. She flies down to the ground and goes into an alley. Yet again every few seconds she would gain a few inches. By now she was 23 feet tall.
She sat down in the alley and began to cry. A few minutes after that she saw a man wearing a coat approach her.

Who is he?
1531221122212111122.title: Times 10

15312211222121111222.content:
The man was Loki in disguise. He calmly walked to the still growing Firestar. He put on the kindest smile he could.
"My my dear what ever is the matter?" asked Loki.
"Isn't it obvious?" replied Firestar. "I'm huge and now I'm growing faster and faster."
"Don't worry for I am a scientist."
"You are?"
"Yes and my special field is the miniaturization of matter." Loki knew by now Firestar was in a state where she would believe anything.
"Can you shrink me back to my normal size?" Every time she said a sentence she would grow a little more. But the inches were turning into feet.
"My dear I would accomplish it with ease."
Firestar stands up but now she is 35 feet tall and still growing. "Please you have to help me."
"Oh I will and much much more. Just hold my hand."
Loki raises his hand and up to her. Firestar bends over and grabs it. Then they both disappear.

Where did they go?
15312211222121111222.title: Loki a Scientist?

153122112221211112221.content:
The next moment Firestar saw that she was no longer in the alley but in some kind of viking room. She was confused.
"Where am I?" she asked.
Then Loki removed his disguise to reveal himself. "You're in my domain," he said. "And you will become my slave."
"I don't think so."
"Too late. Look into my eyes."
Firestar tried to avert her eyes but it was too late. She couldn't help staring into her hypnotic eyes.
"Good very good," said Loki. "Now Firestar tell me who is your master?"
"My one and only master is Loki," replied Firestar in a zombie like way. By ow she had grown to 40 feet tall.
"This is excellent. Although my puppet isn't quite big enough to defeat Odin and Thor we can have a start and she'll grow along the way."
"What do you wish of me oh master."
"I want you to destroy Odin and Thor. And I'll watch and enjoy."
Loki clicks his fingers and they both disappear again.
153122112221211112221.title: Firestar the giant puppet of Loki

1531221122212111122211.content:
Firestar and Loki appear outside the walls of Asgard. Loki has a huge evil smile on his face.
"Now my puppet attack the city and bring me Odin," commanded Loki.
"Yes my master," replied Firestar.
She then used her powers to melt the wall. Then she calmly walked into the city of Asgard. When she was inside the soldiers were amazed at her size. But they had taken down giants much bigger than her. But no giant had her power. Plus they weren't growing once every couple of seconds.
The soldiers fought hard but they couldn't match up to Firestar'sfire powers. Their weapons were melted instantly. Plus by now she was getting close to being the ever popular 50 feet tall.
When the soldiers were defeated she saw a huge building in the centre of Asgard. This was where the immortal Odin. She started to make her way to him and was growing taller and taller along the way.

Will Odin be able to defeat the huge controlled Firestar?
1531221122212111122211.title: At the walls of Asgard

15312211222121111222112.content:
We see Odin in his throne room enjoying a horn of beer. But then a soldier came running into the room. Odin could tell that something was wrong.
"Oh Mighty Odin," said the Soldier. "Asgard is under attack."
"What?" replied Odin. He stood up from his throne in fury. "Who would dare attack the Kingdom of Asgard?"
"We believe that the evil Loki is behind the attack."
"Loki! I should have known."
"But he has a giant with him."
"It is far within my power to take down a single giant."
"Oh Mighty Odin this giant is different. She is not from the giant race. She is from Earth and she has fire powers. But above all she is still growing."
"Then I must face this abomination before it is too late."
Odin teleports himself outside and he saw the 60 foot Firestar coming towards him.
"I recognise her. She came with that Spider and Ice Man. She is good so she must be under Loki's spell.
When she had reached him. She stopped for a moment. Then Loki teleported onto her shoulder.
"Now my puppet," said Loki. "Destroy Odin."
15312211222121111222112.title: Mighty Odin

choices: We see what Spider-Man and Ice-Man are up to
153122112221211112221121.content:
"Yes Master," replied Firestar.
Loki teleported off her shoulder and then she created a wall of fire round Odin. But he uses his almost limitless power to extinguish the flames.
"You think fire can defeat me," said Odin. He watched as Firestar grew another couple of feet. "I pity you Firestar. You are but a puppet for the evil Loki."
The Firestar projected a flamethrower at Odin. He is able to block it but Firestar increases the flames and also she was still growing. Odin had never fought any fire this intense and it was getting more and more powerful by the second.
By now Firestar's height had gone past 70 feet. Loki watched with great enjoyment as the mighty Odin was being bought to his knees.
Odin had no choice but to flee. He quickly teleported away. Loki couldn't sense his presence anymore. He teleported back onto her shoulder.
"You did it my puppet," said Loki. "For now I rule Asgard. But my half Brother Thor is still out there. And he will not stand up to your power."

What happens next?
153122112221211112221121.title: Firestar vs Odin

1531221122212111122211212.content:
