Meanwhile back on Earth we see Spider-Man and Ice-Man traveling to Dr Connors lab. they were excited to see Firestar again. But when they got there they were surprised to see her gone. They saw Dr Connors working.
"Hey Doc where's Firestar?" asked Spider-Man.
"I'm not sure," replied Dr Connors. "She began to grow faster and so she left before she ran out of room."
"When was that?"
"I while ago. She should have been back by now."
Just then we see a Flash. A second later the Mighty Thor appeared.
"Thor," said Ice-Man. "What beings you here?"
"Do not fear I come in peace," said Thor. "You're friend Firestar attacked Asgard and overthrew my Father Odin."
"Why would she do such a thing like that?"
"Fear not she is merely the puppet of my evil Half Brother Loki."
"I was wondering when he'd show up again," replied Spider-Man.
"Hold my hand and I'll teleport us to Asgard."
They both hold onto Thor's hand. Then he swings Mjolnir and they disappear.
1531221122212111122211212.title: Spider-Man and Ice-Man meet Thor again

15312211222121111222112121.content:
They appear next to a melted wall. Spider-Man and Ice-Man knew only one person could have done such damage.
"Firestar's here alright," said Spider-man. "Only she could melt an entire wall."
"Yes the giantess is here," replied Thor. "But she is invincible under Loki's spell."
"So we just kick Loki's butt and get Firestar back," said Ice-Man.
"It won't be that easy. He'll use Firestar as protection and she was powerful enough to defeat the mighty Odin. By now she will be even bigger and more powerful."
"Well there's three of us and only two of them."
"Numbers don't mean everything young Ice-Man."
"He's right Bobby," replied Spider-Man. "We need to defeat Loki. But we can't seriously injure Firestar as well."
"It is our safety you should be more worried about Spider-Man," said Thor. "But for now we must find them."
"Ok we'll split up. I take the North, Ice-man you take South and Thor you take West. If we still can't find them we'll search the east."
They then split up looking for Loki and the Ever Growing Firestar.

Will they find them?
15312211222121111222112121.title: Outside the walls of Asgard

choices: Ice-Man and Thor to the rescue
He is able to break the spell over Firestar
153122112221211112221121211.content:
Spider-Man searched his area. He didn't realise that the palace was in his area. When he had looked everywhere else he went down there.
When he went outside at first he didn't see anyone. But the moment he got into the throne room he saw Loki on the throne. Before he could react a circle of fire appeared around him. Then he saw the 80 foot Firestar. Her head was inches from the ceiling. "So Spider-Man you thought you could end my rein of terror," said Loki.
"Release Firestar now," replied Spider-Man.
"Well I'm helping your friend. As you can see I've stopped her growth for now. But I can just as easily start it again and faster than before."
"Firestar snap out of it. It's me Spider-Man."
"Oh she can't hear you. She's too busy thinking of a way to kill you in the most painful way possible."
"She won't. I know that she won't hurt me. Come on Firestar you have to remember."
The Circle of fire became taller. Spider-Man felt heat that he didn't think were possible.
"See she's under my complete control. Now Firestar destroy Spider-Man."

How will Spidey get out of this?
153122112221211112221121211.title: Confrontation

1531221122212111122211212111.content:
Just then there was a huge flash of light and Thor and Ice-Man appeared. Loki was very surprised to see them.
"Thor we meet again," said Loki.
"Loki cease this pointless violence before you hurt anyone else," replied Thor.
"Oh but now I have you and Firestar's amazingly annoying Friends here in one room. This is perfect I can destroy you all at once. Saves time."
"Not today Norse reject," replied Ice-Man.
"I was afraid you'd say that. Firestar destroy them all."
"Yes master," replied Firestar.
She then extinguished the fire circle around Spider-Man and instead put a huge one around all three of them. She then walked through the flames harmlessly and went towards them.
"Ok we need to attack but we can't seriously hurt her," said Spider-Man.
"Try saying that to her," replied Ice-Man.
"What we need to do is to break Loki's spell on her," said Thor. "And I know just how."

How do they do it?
1531221122212111122211212111.title: Together

15312211222121111222112121111.content:
"Spider-Man, Ice-Man you two keep Firestar occupied," said Thor. "I will deal with Loki."
Using Mjolnir Thor was able to make a hole in the fire so he could get closer to Loki. Spider-Man and Ice-Man were on their own against their huge friend.
"So it's just me and you now Loki."
"You know I'm far from defenceless oh brother. Even without Firestar I still have more than enough power to destroy you."
"Maybe so but this madness stops now."
The two clash. Loki was trying trickery to get the upperhand on the Mighty Thor. But it didn't seem to work.
Spider-Man and Ice-Man couldn't see what was happening. They were too busy fighting for their lives against Firestar. If they weren't gonna get burnt to death they would have been stomped instead.
Thor and Loki were equally matched. Loki was trying every trick in the book to destroy Thor. But Thor would repel his most powerful attacks.
"This ends now," said Thor.
He held Mjolnir up in the air and lightning came from it. One hit Loki and he fell down.
"You may have won this time but I will destroy you," said Loki. He then teleported away.

What about Firestar?
15312211222121111222112121111.title: Loki defeated

153122112221211112221121211112.content:
Firestar fell to her knees holding her head. She was in some pain. Spider-Man and Ice-man slowly walked towards their giant friend.
The pain lasted a few seconds. When it had subsided she looked around clearly confused. She saw her friends.
"Where am I?" she asked.
"We're in Asgard Firestar," replied Spider-Man. "Loki had you under a spell."
"You guys have shrunk."
"No we haven't shrank. You've gotten even bigger."
"I was afraid you were gonna say that."
"I can have Odin try and cure you," said Thor.
"You'd do that for me?"
"Yes young maiden. You have helped me once and now I shall help you."
"Thank you Thor."
"But before we see mighty Odin," said Ice-Man. "I justed wanted to know. What's the weather like up there?"
"If I was you I would cut back on the insults."

Will Odin be able to cure Firestar?
153122112221211112221121211112.title: Free

1531221122212111122211212111122.content:
Firestar then grew a little more. It seemed that Loki's spell to stop her growth had failed. But the one that made her grow faster had also been removed. She was growing at the same rate as before.
Thor used his hammer to teleport away. A minute later he returned with Odin. They both stared up at Firestar and they began to think.
"Hopefully my magic will cure the giantess of her gigantism," said Odin. He then began to chant a spell. Everyone stood back so that they didn't accidentally get in the way. But it wasn't working. Odin stopped and thought for a moment. "Seems that Firestar's immune to certain magic."
"What magic?" asked Spider-Man.
"Because Loki used a spell to make her grow faster and one to stop her growth her body has become immune to size changing magic. Most likely due to what you call the mutant gene."
"That's not what I wanted to hear," said Firestar.
"Possible the only thing that can help you is what you call science. That made you a giantess and it'll make you normal again."
"Thanks for trying anyway. She then picked up Spider-Man, Ice-Man and Thor. "And thank you guys for releasing me. "She then gave them a kiss.
1531221122212111122211212111122.title: Firestar is immune to size changing magic

15312211222121111222112121111221.content:
Thor then used his hammer to transport the Amazing Friends back to Earth. it was a strain for him because he had to take Firestar in her increased size. But he was able to get there but hew as tired. He dropped them off in central park. he figured that this would be safer than any of the streets.
"I must leave you now for I am required elsewhere," said Thor.
"Thanks for everything Thor," replied Firestar.
Then they saw Thor fly away in the sky. When he was out of sight the Amazing Friends looked at Firestar. Now they had another slight problem.
"Ok Angelica you're too big too possible fit in Dr Connors' lab," said Spider-Man. Firestar then had another small growth spurt. This one was only a few feet. "And you're still growing."
"What's going to happen to me?" asked Firestar. "Am I just going to grow off the face of the planet?"
"Don't think of it like that we'll find a cure."
"Besides that'll take forever and we'll find something like a cure by then," replied Ice-Man.
"I don't know if that was some kind of joke or a confidence builder," said Firestar.

What do they do?
15312211222121111222112121111221.title: Back in NY

153122112221211112221121211112211.content:
But now they had another problem with Firestar. She was way too big to fit into any of the normal buildings so they had to think about somewhere that would hold her. They also needed it to have space for her to grow.
"Where can we put you while we find a cure?" asked Spider-Man. "There's no way you can fit in our apartment anymore."
"Hey remember those warehouses at the docks?" replied Ice-Man. "They've been abandoned for years. I'm sure Angelica will be able to fit inside."
"That's a good idea. How does that sound to you Firestar?"
"Well it looks like our only option," replied Firestar. Spider-Man and Ice-Man went to travel to the warehouse but Firestar grabbed them instead. "I think it'll be faster if I flew you there."
Firestar then used her powers to fly into the air. She flew to the abandoned warehouses and she landed softly on the ground. They all took a look at it.
"So Hot stuff what do you think?" asked Ice-Man.
"Well it does need a woman's touch," replied Firestar. But other than that it looks fine."
"So now you have somewhere to stay."
153122112221211112221121211112211.title: Need a place to stay

1531221122212111122211212111122111.content:
Firestar then got into the warehouse. She had to get onto her hands and knees and crawl in. There was a lot of old junk in there but she just melted it. Spider-man and Ice-Man then went to her.
"Are you comfy Firestar?" asked Spider-Man.
"Not really," replied Firestar. She then gained an extra few feet. "But this growth is more annoying."
"Don't worry we'll get you cured in no time."
"Face it if Odin couldn't cure me what can?"
"Well we still have science that'll surely help us."
"I hope or I might just get a role in the Amazing Colossal Super heroine."
"Why not attack of the 50 foot Super Heroine?" asked Ice-Man.
"I'm way bigger than 50 foot by now. Guys if you don’t mind I just want to get some sleep. My growth slows down when I'm asleep."
"Ok Firestar we'll see you in the morning."
Spider-Man and Ice-Man then went away. Firestar tried to get herself comfy on the ground but it was really uneven. It was still uncomfortable but she was able to get to sleep.

What happens?
1531221122212111122211212111122111.title: Getting comfy

15312211222121111222112121111221111.content:
That night while Firestar was sleeping. She bean to have a dream. She was still super-sized and she was trying to save someone from falling off a building. But just when she went to catch him she felt her body shoot up again. But this time it was serious and she couldn't stop.
"Someone please help me," she cried. "I can't stop growing."
But no one listened and she watched as skyscrapers became head level, then eye level, then they were hip and then knee level. She could hear people screaming below her. She couldn't stop apologising and she was still growing. She felt her head go through several clouds and then she saw blackness.
Firestar soon realised that she had grown out of the Earth's atmosphere. She was crying for help as she watched as the World got smaller and smaller.
"For the Love of God someone help me!"
Then she heard a voice saying Firestar. She didn't know where it was coming from. Then she woke up from the dream and she saw Spider-Man and Ice-Man on the ground next to her. The warehouse around her was completely destroyed.
"What happened?" asked Firestar.
"It should be us that's asking that question," replied Spider-Man.
15312211222121111222112121111221111.title: Firestar's growing nightmare

choices: Have a little fly around New York
153122112221211112221121211112211111.content:
Firestar looked around a little more. She realised just how badly destroyed everything was. It was a combination of fire and just sheer force. She realised that it was her that had done this damage.
"I had a nightmare last night," said Firestar.
"What about?" replied Spider-Man.
"Well I was growing. And I mean faster than this. I grew off the planet and I crushed everyone I held dear to me."
"Don't worry angel it was only a dream," replied ice-Man.
"But how long until it become reality. I'm not getting any smaller and I'm getting a lot bigger."
"Calm down Angelica."
"When I'm in costume don't call me Angelica please."
"Ok my lips are sealed."
Firestar then stood up to her full height. She was easily 65 feet tall. This scared her and she saw just how small Spider-Man and Ice-Man looked compared to her. He picked them up in her hand and looked at them.
"You guys are like little dolls to me."

What does she do now?
153122112221211112221121211112211111.title: Bigger Firestar

1531221122212111122211212111122111111.content:
"Guys it'll be faster if I fly us there," said Firestar.
But before Spider-Man or Ice-Man could react she had already taken off and she was flying high in the air. She wanted to get to a certain height so people below didn't realise just how big she was.
Firestar could see just Dr Connors' lab and went to do a safe landing. She was able to land softly on the ground and she put Spider-Man and Ice-Man through the window and Dr Connors was there.
"What are you guys doing back here?" asked Dr Connors'. "Is Firestar alright?"
"No she's bigger," replied Spider-Man. "We really don't want to sound like we're forcing you but do you have anything that can help."
"Well I might have something. I've been in close contact with Hank Pym. He's a specialist in size changing. If anyone could find out what could be done it would be him."
"Where is he now?"
"At his lab at the edge of town I can give you a map if you want to."
"Thanks that’ll save us time."
"Hey guys," said Firestar from the outside. "I grew again."
1531221122212111122211212111122111111.title: To Dr Connors

15312211222121111222112121111221111111.content:
Dr Connors gave Spider-Man and Ice-Man a map and the Firestar picked them up. She Then began to fly up into the air and she looked down.
“Ok guys where does Dr Pym live?” asked Firestar.
“He lives just on the edge of town,” replied Spider-Man. “I’ve got it on the map.”
“How far do I have to go?”
“A few miles but it shouldn’t take too long to get there.”
She then began to fly in the right direction. If she went off course Spider-Man and Ice-Man showed her the right way.
They got there even faster than they expected. She landed on the ground and they saw a large building.
“Hmm looks like the right place,” said Firestar.
“And we should see if anyone’s in,” replied Ice-Man.
The two heroes were put on the ground and they knocked the door. It was answered by a tall blonde man.
“Can I help you?” he asked.
“Yes my friend has a big problem.”
“What kind of problem?”

Who will Pym react when he sees Firestar?
15312211222121111222112121111221111111.title: Flyiong to Pym's

153122112221211112221121211112211111112.content:
“I literally mean a big problem,” said Ice-Man.
He then points over to Firestar. Dr Pym looked at her and he seemed to be unmoved. They were expecting him to freak out or something but he was taking it extremely well.
“I can see your friend’s problem,” said Dr Pym. “Maybe I ca help.”
“We know Dr Connors told us to come here.”
“Well if Dr Connors sent you to me then it must be important. Let my wife take care of your friend.”
Then a woman came out. She was Dr Pym’s wife Janet. Everyone watched a she shrank to a few inches and she grew wings. She flew up to Firestar’s eye.
“Ok follow me,” said Janet.
Janet then flew to the back of the lab and Firestar followed her. Dr Pym took Spider-Man and Iceman into the lab. They saw all kinds of things that were either bigger or smaller than they should be. They knew that Dr Pym could very likely help Firestar.
“Ok first I need to do a few tests on your friend,” said Dr Pym.
“What kind of tests?”
“Just general tests for her health and if there’s any anomalies in her growth. It shouldn’t take me too long.”
153122112221211112221121211112211111112.title: Calmer than usual

1531221122212111122211212111122111111121.content:
Firestar couldn't stop looking at the tiny Woman in front of her. She was big and the woman was small so the size difference was like Godzilla.
"If you don't mind me asking how did you get so small?" asked Firestar.
"Oh it's just Hank's Pym Particles," replied the Woman. "And now I'm Wasp the Tiny sized Crime fighter."
"Can you become big?"
"I haven't really tried. And I really don't want to. Hank says it's very dangerous to go up. At 60 feet your skeleton basically crumbles."
"What about me I must be well over 60 feet by now?"
"That surprises me. But hopefully Hank will figure something out. he stopped me from shrinking into nothing."
"But I've had one of the most powerful beings in the universe to try and stop my growth but nothing seems to work."
"Don't worry in shrinking Hank is an expert."
Inside we Spider-Man and Iceman looking at some of the machines that Hank had in his lab.
"Be careful those machines are very dangerous," said Hank.

What happens?
1531221122212111122211212111122111111121.title: Wasp and Firestar

1531221122212111122211212111122111111121.content:
Outside Firestar felt a shiver run down her spine. She then saw that the Wasp was seemingly getting smaller. That’s what she hoped but when she saw that everything else was shrinking too she soon realised that she was growing.
The lab previously was at knee height but now instead of having small growth spurts of a few feet they were big spurts that double her present size and that’s what happens. She became 170 feet tall easily. She looked at Wasp but she couldn’t see her anymore.
But Wasp just flew onto Firestar’s hand and she grew back up to her normal size. But it was like a doll compared to one of the world’s tallest little girls.
“Are you aright?” asked Wasp. “Do you feel any strains?”
“No I feel fine. Except a lot bigger.”
“Good your body is almost impossible.”
Meanwhile inside the men had seen Firestar’s latest growth spurt. This worried Dr Pym a little and he looked over to Spider-Man and Iceman.
“Ok this may be a little more difficult than I expected,” said Dr Pym.
“Can you still help her?” replied Spider-Man.
“Yes I think I can. But it might take me a while. And I fear that your friend will be a lot bigger by then.”
1531221122212111122211212111122111111121.title: Firestar's grows again

choices: i said I wanted Lois Lane and I'll stick with Lois Lane
155.content: Or maybe a giantess who comes to Metropolis?
155.title: Myabe another giantess

1551.content:
It was a normal day in Metropolis for Super-Man the man of Steel. He stopped another bank robbery and was now back at the Daily Planet writing his reports. His wife Lois was working on another story. He would use his super speed to write the articles in seconds. This made Perry White (His editor) very pleased about this.
An hour later it was time for Lunch. Lois and Clark left the Daily Planet to go to a small cafe not too far away. They sat down in their favourite spot, right in the window.
"You haven't fought any super villains for a long time," said Lois.
"Don't jinx it," replied Clark. It's been nice not having to fight any megalomaniacs for a while."
"But stopping that bank robbery earlier has gotten you first page news again."
"Lets just order lunch before our break ends."
A waitress comes over and takes their orders. Later she brings it back to them. They give her a tip and then start eating their meals.
No more than two minutes later they felt what seemed like earthquakes. The ground shook, but it didn't seem like an earthquake. Rather like giant footsteps.
"You have to go now," said Lois.
"Right," replied Clark.
He stands up and leaves the cafe. He goes to a back alley and puts on his Super-Man costume. Then he flies above the city to see if he could find what was causing the earthquakes.
To his surprise he sees a 60 foot giantess rampaging the city. She had brown hair and brown eyes and wore very basic clothes.
"WHERE IS HE?!" she shouted.

What are her intentions?
1551.title: A day in Metropolis

15511.content:
Super-Man flew down to her. He wanted to know what she was looking for. in seconds he hovered at her eye level.
"Calm down ma'am what are you looking for?" he asked.
The Giantess didn't reply. She just knocked him away with her hand like an insect. He went flying into a building. He thought that she was attacking. When he next saw her she was ripping off roofs and looking inside the buildings. She had to climb most of them. Supoer-Man flew back to her. By now she was on the ground.
"I'm not gonna ask you again."
This time the Giantess smacked him to the ground. Then she lifted her foot which had very basic shoe and stomped on him. Super-man was able to counter by lifting up her foot. Then he flew up and gave her a strong uppercut. She staggered back and fell onto a derelict building.
He thought she was unconscious, but then he noticed something. She seemed to be getting bigger. he watched as the Giantess grew from 60 feet to a colossal 200 feet tall. She stood back up and she looked really angry.

Who will win the fight?
15511.title: No use trying to talk to her

155112.content:
Super-man knew that this wasn't gonna be an easy fight to win. She had super strength before but with her added growth spurt she might even be stronger than him.
She went to punch him but he was able to dodge at the last moment.But then she punched him while he was off guard. He falls to the ground. He expected the giantess to finish him off but instead she just walked away.
"WHERE IS HE?!" she shouted again.
Super-Man was able to get up. But he also sees to men doing some electrical wiring. They had hundreds of feet of cable. This gave him an idea. He flew over to the men. they were surprised to see him.
"Wow it's Super-Man," said the one Man.
"If you don't mind I just need to borrow that cabling for a few minutes," replied Super-Man.
"Sure whatever."
"Thanks."
He grabs the cable and flies towards the Giantess. Now that she had grown she didn't need to climb up so many buildings. He then flew at supersonic speeds and wrapped the cable around the Giantess's leg. She struggled but she fell over. She hits her head on a building and this knocked her unconscious. Super-man was victorious again.
155112.title: A wrap of cable

1551121.content:
Later we see the Giantess chained down to the ground in an underground base. She is still unconscious. Gathered around her are several scientists, the General and Super-Man.
"How is she doing?" asked Super-Man.
"So far her readings are normal," replied the General.
"If she's fine why haven't you woken her up yet?"
"We have considered it. We've been giving her sedatives. The chains that pin her down are made out of a new titanium metal that even you would struggle to break out from. Also we don't want her to start destroying things again."
"I want to ask her some questions."
"Ok but if anything happens she goes back under." The General gave the signal and the scientists stopped her feed of sedatives.
Very slowly she began to wake up. She moved slightly but she couldn't break free. She turned her head towards Super-man and the General as she opened her eyes.

Is she...?
1551121.title: Underground

15511212.content:
When her vision was back she looked around.
"Where am I?" she asked. She then sees Super-Man and the General. "Super-man? Where am I?"
"You're in an underground base," replied Super-Man.
"Oh God don't tell me I went on a rampage."
"I'm afraid you did."
"No. How many people died?"
"Thankfully no one died."
"Oh thank God." Then she looks at her body. "I'm bigger."
"Yes you had a growth spurt when we fought."
"I fought you?"
"Yes you did. I must admit you did pretty good."
"I'm sorry I did that. I wouldn't really want to hurt you. In fact I'm a fan of yours."
"What's your name?"
"Lucy."
"Ok Lucy while you were destroying the city you were shouted "Where is he". Who were you looking for?"
"My Boyfriend Doctor George Starr."
"You mean the one that went missing months ago?" asked the General.
"Yes that one. He was researching the growth in human cells. I volunteered as a human guinea pig. His serum worked I became a towering giant. My physical body became enhanced. But I have anger issues. If i get to a certain level of anger I go into a blind rage."
"Like you did earlier?"
"Yes. Then at another point of anger I have another growth spurt. When I got too big me and George went to a deserted island. And yesterday he..."
15511212.title: Lucy the Gentle Giantess

155112122.content:
"Got Kidnapped," said Lucy. "I left him on the beach on our island. I only went to go and get ourselves some food. But when I came back I saw two men putting him in a helicopter. Before I could stop them they flew away. And then after that I got angry and went on a mindless rampaging search."
"Do you remember anything from the helicopter?" asked Super-Man.
"Yes I remember seeing the letter L and the word Metropolis on the side."
Super-Man thought for a moment he had seen a helicopter like that before. "When you go into a rage is there a way to calm you down?"
"There is one. But only George can do it. He sings me "Lucy In the Sky With Diamonds" by the Beatles. No matter how mad I am it always calms me down. It's helped me out of a few situations. Do you know who could have taken him?"
"I have one suspect in mind."
"Who is it?"
"I can't say. But I'll give him a little visit."
"Then take me with you."
"I can't. You're still too much of a risk."
"I will be a risk if you don't let me go right now."

Will she go with him?
155112122.title: Lucy In The Sky With Diamonds

1551121222.content:
"Ok Lucy I know you're a little upset," said Super-Man. "But it would be better for me if I go alone."
"I can't I'll worry to much about him," replied Lucy.
"Wait here a moment." Super-Man then flies away. He comes back a minute later. But this time he had two huge boulders with him. "You can still move your hands?"
"Yes."
"Ok these are stress balls if you feel stressed, angry or worried start grinding these things with your hand." He then puts both boulders in Lucy's one hand. Funny they were exactly the right size for her. "Now I must go and talk to someone."
He then flies away again. As soon as he left Lucy began to grind the balls.
Super-Man flew to the one person he thought could do something like this. In seconds he reached the main building of the company Lex Corp. He flies to the roof and sees the same helicopter that Lucy had described. He then hovered down to the window to Lex Luthor's office.

Is he there?
1551121222.title: Stress balls

15511212221.content:
Super-Man saw Lex Luthor sitting at his desk. He was looking at some paper work. He then turns around nd sees Super-Man. He pushes a button that opened a window. Then Super-Man flew inside.
"Ah Super-Man what brings you to my building?" asked Lex.
"Well Lex you know what happened downtown earlier today," replied Super-Man.
"Yes that giant woman attacked. I watched it from my office. And I must admit you took care of her very well."
"Well we have her contained now. Have you hear of a man named Dr George Starr?"
"Yes he was a scientist who used to work for me. I admired the man he was the only one who was able to create a working serum for his growth formula."
"That woman was looking for him."
"I thought I recognised her. She was the one Dr Starr experimented on."
"I have reason to believe that you are connected with his kidnap."
"Oh why do you suspect me? I didn't even know he had been kidnapped."
Super-Man then walks to the window. "if you do have him be afraid. Not of me but of Lucy."
He then flies away.
15511212221.title: Lex Luthor

155112122211.content:
Lex stood up from his desk and left his office. he went to the elevator and went down to the sub basement. There we see a young man tied to a chair. he has brown hair and blue eyes. He looks to be in his mid 20s.
"So Dr Starr are you ready to tell me the growth formula?" asked Lex.
"No I still won't tell you," replied George.
"Well I have news for you. Your girlfriend Lucy came into the city looking for you."
"She did?"
"Yes she's caused quite a lot damage. And she's had another growth spurt."
"Oh God."
"And if you tell me the formula I might find a cure for her condition. So what's it gonna be keep the formula from me and let your girlfriend keep growing and growing until she grows right out of the Earth's atmosphere? or tell me and save her from a life of suffering."
"Ok Luthor you win. I'll tell you."
155112122211.title: Lex Luthor and Dr George Starr

1551121222111.content:
When Super-Man got back he saw that Lucy was still grinding the stress balls. He saw the relief on her face when he landed.
"Super-Man," she said. "Oh thank God you're back. Did you find him?"
"No I haven't found him yet," replied Super-Man. "But I believe Lex Luthor has him."
"That's it, it all makes sense to me now. That was Lex's helicopter. He's been after the serum for ages. I have to rescue George."
"I'm afraid you can't go."
"Well I'm not gonna lie here while my boyfriend is in danger." She tries to move out of her chains.
"Please Lucy don't make this difficult."
"I'M NOT MAKING THIS DIFFICULT! I'M SAVING SOMEONE!"
"Oh God," said the General. "She's going into another fit of rage. Quick sedate her again."
The scientists started to pump sedatives back into Lucy's body. By now the chains were nearly at their breaking point. But they did their job. She began to relax and go back to sleep."
"I'm sorry we had to do that Lucy," said Super-Man. "But you're no use if you're destroying the city again."

Who will she escape?
1551121222111.title: Sedated again

15511212221112.content:
A few days later and we see that Lucy is still sedated. They didn't want to risk waking her up until they found Dr Starr.
At the Metropolis power station we see a janitor cleaning up some floors by the main controls. He put a small bucket of water on the controls so he could wipe them down. But while he was doing this he accidentally knocked over the bucket onto the controls. The controls started to short circuit. Then all electricity was down in Metropolis.
In the underground area they had felt the affects since all the electrical devices were down.
"Oh this is great," said the General sarcastically.
"Err sir if the electricity's off," replied a Scientist. "What's keeping the sedatives flowing?"
When the General looked at Lucy he was horrified to see that she was waking up. He was out of luck since it would take a few minutes for the back up generators to kick in.
By now Lucy was fully awake and remembering everything. She started to pull on her chains and they were giving way. They broke off and there was nothing anyone could do. The complex had a 60 foot ceiling so when she stood up she hit the ceiling almost immediately. But she easily broke through it and up to the ground. She was just outside Metropolis.
"LUTHOR!"
15511212221112.title: Broken Free

155112122211121.content:
Super-Man was relaxing in his apartment. He had just finished a 10 hour shift at the Daily Planet. Even today was really hard for him. But he had to worry about finding Dr George Starr.
Suddenly he felt the room shake. He feared the worse as he began to look out of his window. To his horror he sees Lucy in the city. But this time she wasn't ripping off any buildings. She was heading towards the Lex Corp building.
He quickly got into his costume and flew out to her. He knew that this wouldn't be easy. Last time he took her by the element of surprise. But now she may even be stronger than him. He flew to her face.
"Lucy stop," he commanded.
"YOU ARE NOT KEEPING ME AWAY FROM GEORGE ANY LONGER!" shouted Lucy. "NOW YOU EITHER MOVE OR I'LL MOVE YOU!"
"I'm sorry Lucy but I can't let you do that."
She then punches him. "I WARNED YOU SUPER-MAN. I PLAYED BY YOUR RULES NOW I'M PLAYING BY MY OWN."
SUper-Man then flies up and gives her a good uppercut. She falls on her ass.
"IT'S ON NOW SUPER-MAN!"

Who will win this clash of the Titans?
155112122211121.title: Confrontation

1551121222111212.content:
Lucy quickly got back to her feet and then she slapped Super_man down to the ground. Then she raised her foot and began to stomp on the Man of Steel. Any normal person would have been crushed immediately. But Suprer-Man was something more than normal.
Lucy then picked him up and slammed him to the ground. He was almost knocked out.
"NOW THAT YOU'RE OUT OF THE WAY NO ONE CAN STOP ME FROM GETTING MY LOVE!" shouted Lucy.
She then continued her journey towards the Lex Corp building. Just after she left Super-Man was just able to get to his feet. He looked as the 200 foot giantess make her way to the Lex Corp building. He was too weak to try and stop her. But he had one last idea. He then flew as fast as his battered body could take him and he got to the Lex Corp building several minutes before Lucy got there.
He went to Lex's lab where he saw him working on some sort of ray gun. He was surprised to see him.
"Super-Man what the hell are you doing here?" asked Lex.
"I've come to save you," replied Suer-Man.
"From what?"
"Lucy is on her way here and she's gonna destroy this building looking for Dr Starr."

Will Lex leave?
1551121222111212.title: Beaten

15511212221112122.content:
"You expect me to believe that?" said Lex. "You really do insult my intelligence."
Then the building started to shake.
"Do you feel that?" asked Super-Man. "That's Lucy climbing the building."
"She doesn't scare me." He then holds up his ray gun. "I have my own weapon against her."
He then goes to a balcony. Super-Man follows him. Lex sees Lucy climbing up the building. He points the ray gun at at her and fires. A red beam comes out of it and hits her. She then began to shrink smaller and smaller. Her clothes also shrank with her. She keeps shrinking until she shrinks to her normal size. She looses her gripping and then she begins to fall.
"Problem solved," said Lex.
Super-Man quickly flies and catches her.
"There you go Lucy," said Super-Man.
"Oh Super-Man," replied Lucy. "I'm so sorry. Did I hurt you?"
"A little but nothing worse than I've already had."
He then flies Lucy back up to the balcony where Lex was standing there.
"So you're the rampaging giant," said Lex. "Not much of a giant now."
"Where is George?" asked Lucy.
15511212221112122.title: Lucy back to normal size

155112122211121221.content:
"He's not here Lucy," said Lex. "So you destroyed part of the city and damaged part of this city for nothing."
Then Lucy began to cry. Super-Man tried to comfort her.
"That's enough Lex," replied Super-Man. "Can't you see that she's been through enough already."
"I apologise. But now I would like you to leave."
Super-Man then flies off with Lucy. They go back to the military base. Everyone was surprised to see Lucy at normal size.
"My God what happened?" asked the General.
"Luthor shrunk her down to her normal size. I wonder how he did it."
"He's got George I know it," said Lucy.
"Unfortunately we have no evidence."
"I know he does. When I first grew George tried every shrink ray in the world but none of them worked on me. He told me that the formula that made me grow was very complex. He said only the only way to shrink me was to get the complete opposite of that formula. Only George knew that formula."
"And yet Lex created a gun which had the opposite to the growth formula."
"We have to go back."

What does Super-Man say?
155112122211121221.title: Opposite to the growth formula

1551121222111212212.content:
"No Lucy enough has been done today," said Super-Man.
"What I just can't stay here while that Madman has my boyfriend," replied Lucy.
"We don't even know that 100%. Just get some rest you're tired."
"I'm not tired I'm right."
"Please I assure you we will find him but what you have to do is relax. There is nothing you can do. Beside these guys will get you new clothes and everything."
"Ok." She gave out a sigh of disappointment. "Where am I gonna sleep tonight."
"I know someone who can help."
She grabs onto her arm and they fly away. They go to Super-Man's apartment where he lived with his wife.
"Who lives here?" asked Lucy.
"Two of my good friends Lois and Clark. They'll let you stay here until we find George. Now I think Lois is home."
They fly inside where Lois was. She knew not to call him by his real name while he was with anyone who didn't know his identity.
"Super-Man?" asked Lois.
"Lois I need you to me a big favour. This is Lucy. She was the giant who was in Metropolis a few days ago. We need to keep her here for now."
"Ok she's safe here."
"Good." Then he flies away. Lois then goes to Lucy.
"I better take you to the spare room."
1551121222111212212.title: Staying at Lois and Clark's

15511212221112122122.content:
That night Lucy was still wide awake in the bed. She got up and put on her self made sandals and quietly made her way out of the room. She made sure that Lois and Clark were asleep.
She opened the front door and sneaked out. Clark heard a little something and woke up. He used his X-Ray vision to see into the Spare room. To his horror Lucy was gone. He figured that she would be going back to the Lex Corp building.
Lucy hitch hiked a ride to the Lex Corp building. When she was younger she used to do gymnastics. But she gave it up for her career with Dr Starr. She was able to slip past all the cameras and she made her way into the building.
She knew from her time in Lex building she knew he had some secret cells in the lower basement. She also knew that you needed a special card to operate the elevators so she used the stairs.
When she got to the sub basement she easily found the cells. She looked through the spy hole for all of them and then she eventually found Dr Starr.
"George," she said. "Oh thank God I found you."
"I beg to differ," replied a voice.
When she turned around she saw Lex Luthor with his ray gun. He shoots it at her and she began to shrink.

How small will she become?
15511212221112122122.title: Escape to Lex Corp Building

choices: She gets hit by the enlargement beam
155112122211121221222.content:
Lucy continued to dwindle until she was a mere two inches tall. Now she knew how it felt for everyone when she was 200 feet tall. Now she was terrified.
"I'm tiny," she said.
"Yes very true my dear," replied Lex. She began to run away but he easily caught her. "You didn't think I would let you off that easily."
"What are you gonna do with me and George?"
"Your George is gonna help me create an army powerful enough to destroy Super-Man. And if he refuses I'll blast you with this again and then its bye bye Lucy."
Lex then got a small cage and put Lucy in it. He then opens the cell door and puts the cage inside. He then closes it and leaves.
George ran over to the cage to see his shrunken girlfriend. There was a padlock on the cage so he couldn't open. He was just glad to see her again.
"Lucy thank God you're fine," said George. "But you've shrunk."
"Well since the last time you've seen me I grew again and shrunk twice. I was once a glorious giant and now I'm only 2 inches tall. But now at least I have you to make me feel better."

How will Lucy become a Giantess again?
155112122211121221222.title: Together again

1551121222111212212222.content:
Over the next few days George was making several devices for Lex Luthor. The only reason he was doing this was so Lex wouldn't shrink Lucy into nothing. She was stuck in her cage. What she wished was that she was big enough to escape.
Super-Man made a number of visits trying to find them. But Lex would always kept them away. Also he would threaten him with legal action.
On the third day we see George in the lab making robots. Lucy was in her cage hanging up on the wall. Then Lex walked in. he wasn't too happy.
"Come you lazy worm work faster," he ordered.
"I'm working as fast as I can."
"Well that isn't good enough. If you don't hurry up you can say goodbye to Lucy."
"Don't you hurt her."
"I wouldn't dream of it. I would let the bacteria do it for me."
"You monster."
He jumps at Lex and then there was a struggle. Each one was equally matched. The ray gun falls out of Lex's pocket. George dazes Lex for an instant and reaches for the gun. He switches it from shrink to grow. Then he fires it at Lucy.
The cage explodes as Lucy grows out of it.

How big will she become?
1551121222111212212222.title: Struggle

15511212221112122122222.content:
Dr George Starr and Lex Luthor watched as Lucy grew bigger and bigger. In seconds her head was hitting the ceiling and her growth had no signs of stopping. They both weren't stupid and they began to escape from the building. When everyone else inside began to feel vibrations they also went outside.
When George got outside he saw a 50 foot Lucy break out through a wall and she jumped onto the ground. But he could see that she was still growing.
In seconds she as back up to 200 feet. He hoped that she would stop growing there. But he was horrified to see her body still getting bigger and bigger. She had an evil smile on her face when she saw Lex on the ground.
Her growth stopped at a staggering 600 feet tall. She was now taller than all the buildings in Metropolis. Even the mighty Daily Planet buildng.
Then she bent down and picked Lex Luthor out of the crowd. She then bought him near to her mouth.
"LEX!" she shouted. "YOU SHRANK ME AND PUT ME IN A CAGE. BUT THE WORST THING YOU DID WAS HURTING MY BOYFRIEND AND NOW YOU WILL DIE!"

How will Lex get out of this one?
15511212221112122122222.title: Bigger then she should be

155112122211121221222222.content:
Lucy began to squeeze Lex. He was loosing his breath and Lucy just gave him an evil smile. On the ground Dr Starr could see that she was in her unstoppable rage. He knew normally she wouldn't do that.
To his relief he sees Super-Man fly up to her. He was just as surprised to see her huge never mind even bigger.
"Lucy put him down," commanded Super-Man.
"STAY OUT OF THIS BUG MAN!" shouted Lucy.
Super-Man didn't want to fight her. There were too many innocent people around. Plus she had Lex in her hand. He kept thinking about a way to calm her down. Then he remembered something.
He scanned the ground looking for Dr Starr. When he found him he flew down an picked him up.
"What the hell are you doing?" asked Dr Starr. "I haven't done anything wrong."
"I know you haven't but I need your help," replied Super-Man.
"What could I possible do against her?"
"Sing."
"Sing what?"
"Lucy in the Sky With Diamonds. Do it now."
Super-Man saw that Lex was totally at the mercy of Lucy. He flew George to her ear.

Picture yourself in a boat on a river,
With tangerine trees and marmalade skies
Somebody calls you, you answer quite slowly,
A girl with kaleidoscope eyes.

Cellophane flowers of yellow and green,
Towering over your head.
Look for the girl with the sun in her eyes,
And she's gone.

Lucy in the sky with diamonds.
Lucy in the sky with diamonds.
Lucy in the sky with diamonds.
Ah... Ah...

Does it work?
155112122211121221222222.title: Sing

1551121222111212212222221.content:
Super-Man was relieved to see that Lucy was calming down. Dr Starr continued to sing the song and Lucy was loosening her grip around Lex Luthor. She looks at her hand.
"Oh my God what am I doing?" she asked.
Then Super-Man (who was still carrying Dr Starr) flew down to her hand. He puts Dr Starr on Lucy's soft hand and he picks up the nearly unconscious Lex Luthor.
"Don't worry Lucy you're fine now," said Super-Man. "I'll take Lex to the authorities. I'll be back in a minute."
"Ok." Super-Man then flies away. Lucy looks at Dr Starr in her hand. When she fully realised that it was him she gave him a hug. But she was very careful with how much of her strength she used. She didn't crush him. Instead he felt warmth and safety in her arms.
After the hug she bought him to her level.
"Well you found me," said Dr Starr. "Thank you for saving me."
"No its me who should be thanking you. If it wasn't for you I would still be 2 inches tall. And we're..."
1551121222111212212222221.title: Calmer

15511212221112122122222212.content:
"Getting Married," said Lucy.
"What?" replied Dr Starr.
"I love you George. We nearly died in this whole experience. I was thinking I was gonna die without getting married. If we do get killed I want to know that I married the man I love."
"Ok Lucy we'll marry before we leave. But how are we gonna get all the things we need."
"We'll have the minimum. Rings, a vicar and two people watching. And I know just where to find them."
Then she saw Super-Man fly to her. he had dropped Lex Luthor off at a jail.
"Are you ready to leave now?" asked Super-Man.
"Not yet," replied Lucy. She then gives George to Super-Man. "Find me a vicar and bring your friend Lois Lane and meet me at the Uptown Mall in fifteen minutes."
"Err ok."
Super-man flies away.
Fifteen minutes later onto of the Uptown Mall we see that Super-Man has bought the vicar and Lois Lane. Dr Starr had explained Lucy's plan and they didn't find any wrong with it. Then they see Lucy walking to the building. The building was only half her height but it was the perfect size for her.
15511212221112122122222212.title: Going to get married

choices: Have another adventure with Lucy and Dr Starr
155112122211121221222222121.content:
Everyone got ready for the wedding. The Vicar got out his Bible and Super-Man had bought two seats for him and Lois. George held onto Lucy's huge hand. Sh looked down and smiled at him.
First off they exchanged the rings. George's ring was normal. Lucy's was a huge collection of metal that she had made herself. After that they were ready for the service.
"Do you Dr George Starr take this woman to be your lawfully wedded wife?" asked the Vicar.
"I do," replied George.
"And do you Lucy Carmen take this man to be your lawfully wedded husband?"
"I do," replied Lucy.
"Then by the power invested in me, the father, The Son, and the Holy Spirit I now pronounce you husband and wife. You may kiss the bride."
Lucy then lifts George up to her lips and then they kiss. Lois cried her heart out.
"So Mrs Starr what do we do now?" asked George.
"Let's go home," replied Lucy.
Super-Man and Lois watch Lucy and George walk away back to the ocean. They were wondering if they would ever see them again. But Super-Man knew it wasn't the last that he would see them.
155112122211121221222222121.title: Happily married

1551121222111212212222221211.content:
A week later we see Dr Starr and Lucy back on their island. They were having fun with each other on the beach. She would build a giant sandcastle and he would pretend that he was a king.
Lucy still felt a little weird. She had become ten times bigger since the last time she was on this island.
"I can't believe it," said Lucy.
"Can't believe what honey?" replied George.
"A few months ago I was normal. Then I became as big as that giant oman in that corny centerfold film from the 90s. And now I'm bigger than Godzilla."
"If you think that's gonna make me love you less then you're wrong. I love every inch of you. Not matter how big or small you are."
"I know that silly. But what if I get really angry again and have another growth spurt. I'll be like a mile high."
"Then you'll just have to not get mad. And if you do I'll do everything I can to make you smile."
Lucy then smiled at him. "You already have." She then picks him up and kisses him. "You like my outfit."
"Yeah kinda do."
"Admit it this outfit makes me look like a slave girl. And that's just the way you like it."

Who will come to the Island?
1551121222111212212222221211.title: New life on the Island

15511212221112122122222212111.content:
Then suddenly Lucy saw a little man flying in front of her. She instantly recognised him as Super-Man. She picked up George and bought him to her eye level so he could see Super-Man.
"Super-Man," said Lucy. "What's wrong is there trouble somewhere?"
"No this is a casual visit," replied Super-Man. "I just wanted to give the newlyweds a present from the people of Metropolis."
He handed George a small box in wrapping paper. He opened it and there was a very large pearl necklace that Lucy could use as a ring and a portable CD player with solar power and some CDs.
"Wow these are incredible," said George.
"I'm glad you liked them," replied Super-Man.
"Err would you like a coconut or something like that?"
"Sorry I don't really like coconut that much."
"Pity."
"Thank you for the pearls," said Lucy. "Thank everyone in Metropolis. And tell them we might come over for a visit."
"I'm sure they would like that," said Super-Man. "But I'll have to clear it out with the mayor."
"No problem."
15511212221112122122222212111.title: A presnt for Lucy and George

155112122211121221222222121111.content:
Super-Man flew away and George helped Lucy put her pearls around her finger. Then he puts on his radio and the CD Sgt Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band by the Beatles. He put it on track three and that was Lucy In The Sky With Diamonds.
"Hey it's your song Lucy," said George.
"It's the only one I know with my name in it," replied Lucy. "Now let's have a swim."
Lucy then takes off her sandals and walked with George into the water. The put the CD player on the beach and she had to walk out quite far.
When Lucy had gotten out far enough she put George into the water and then she dived under. He couldn't see her until she came up and grabbed him. When she did she kissed him.
Just then Lucy saw something over the Horizon. They looked like war ships. She put George back into the water and then she went down until only her nose was above the water. George kept a look out to see what the ships were doing.
Eventually they disappeared and Lucy came back up. She picked up George and put him on her shoulder.
"Ok now let's get back to the island."
She then starts to walk back to the island.

But what do they find there?
155112122211121221222222121111.title: Warships?

1551121222111212212222221211111.content:
When Lucy and George got close to the island they see what looked like people on the beach. They also saw a lifeboat on the beach so they figured that they were shipwrecked.
The closer Lucy walked towards the island the more that the people could see her. They began to panic and run away. Some of them tried to get back into the lifeboat while others ran into the jungles of the island.
By the time Lucy did get to the island there was only one man there. He was frozen with fear. But she just knelt down and picked him up. When she bought him up to her level he really panicked. But she just smiled at him.
"Please don’t hurt me," begged the Man.
"Don't worry I'm not gonna hurt you," replied Lucy in a soft voice.
"How can I trust you?"
"You see this man on my shoulder?"
The man looks and sees George on her shoulder. "Yeah."
"Well he's my husband. And he made me this size but I don't hate him for it. Now tell me why are you and the others on this island?"
"The ship we were on sank."

Why did it sink?
1551121222111212212222221211111.title: Shipwrecked

15511212221112122122222212111112.content:
"My Gosh had did it happen?" asked Lucy.
"Were attacked by Super-Man," replied the Man. "But he looked a little different."
"How was he different?"
"His skin was grey and he looked almost like a zombie."
"Strange." Lucy then thought for a moment. "If you call your friends here I'll give you all a lift to Metropolis."
"Yeah anything's better than this God forsaken island."
"This island is my home."
"Oh sorry please don't kill me for that."
"Don't worry I won't harm you."
The man called out for the others. They all slowly came out of hiding and they saw that Lucy was offering them a lift back to civilization. The offer was too good to pass. They climbed onto her hands and Lucy began to journey.
The people were still a little afraid of her but they saw that she was only concentrating on their safety.
She walked through the water. When she was 60 feet tall the ocean floor was very far away. But now she was 600 feet her feet touched the seabed and the water was up to her hips.
15511212221112122122222212111112.title: Taking them to Metropolis

choices: Part of an evil super team
155112122211121221222222121111121.content:
After a few hours of walking Lucy reaches Metropolis with George and the survivors still safe in her hand. She goes to the docks and puts the people down safely.
"Ok this is the last stop on the Lucy Starr airways I hope you enjoyed your flight and I will be pleased to see you again," joked Lucy.
The people were happy with her little joke. But they stopped laughing when they saw Super-Man come. At first they were afraid a little but they calmed down when they saw him confronting Lucy.
"What happened to these people?" asked Super-Man.
"Their ship was sunk earlier," replied Lucy. "They came to my island so I bought them here."
"What was the cause?"
"They said that you did it. But your skin was grey."
Super-Man's heart sank. He knew who was behind it. "It's Bizarro again."
"Who?"
"Let's just say he's my evil clone. Not too particularly bright. But his muscles compensate for it. If he's behind this we've got trouble. And if he's working with someone else. Then this is a problem on a global scale."
"Well if anything does happen you have help."

What is Bizarro doing?
155112122211121221222222121111121.title: At Metropolis

1551121222111212212222221211111212.content:
In a secret location in a secret part of the planet we see the Headquarters of the Legion of Doom. Every super-villain no matter how big or small was there. They were about to make their master plan but they had to wait for Bizarro to come. Lex Luthor was becoming very impatient.
"Where is he?" asked Lex. "He was supposed to be here an hour ago."
Just then Bizarro flew into the building. He went to his seat around the table.
"Sorry Bizarro is late," he said.
"Shut up and let's get on with the meeting."
Meanwhile back at Metropolis Lucy had gotten the cruise ship from the sea floor and she pulled it to the dock (hey she's big but she's not big enough to carry it).
Super-Man examined the fatal hole in the ship and it went in one way and out the other. Lucy also looked at it and George had a few ideas.
"Seems like the passengers' statement is true," said George.
"The holes fit Bizarro's height and weight perfectly," replied Super-Man.
"And now the people can get their stuff back," said Lucy with an innocent smile.
1551121222111212212222221211111212.title: Legion of Doom

15511212221112122122222212111112121.content:
The people indeed went back onto the ship and took their stuff off. But after they were finished Super-Man, Lucy and George continued to look at the ship. The more they did the more they were convinced that Bizarro was behind it.
We see the three of them on the docks. Lucy is sitting down with her feet in the water. Super-Man and George were in the gentle giantess's hand.
"So what do we do?" asked Lucy.
"Well we don't know where Bizarro is. Until he pops up again all we can do is wait," replied Super-Man.
"Isn't that a little dangerous? If what you said about his is true, he's very dangerous."
"I am well aware of that but for now we have no other choice."
"Maybe there's some way of tracking him down," replied George. "If we find any clue to his location that would help us out."
"Ok I'll see if I can find anything."
Super-Man then flies back onto the ship. Lucy and George talk about what was happening. He told her that if she had to fight Bizarro, don't get angry. He didn't want his wife to get any bigger than she already was.

Will Super-Man find anything?
15511212221112122122222212111112121.title: Discussion

155112122211121221222222121111121211.content:
Super-Man was able to find a small piece of Bizarro's costume. He flew it over to George. He took it and had a look at it.
"Great a piece of his cloth," said George. "I have a friend who has a tracking device. All I needed was a sample of his DNA and now we've got it." He then turns to Lucy. "Lucy dear."
"Yes George," replied Lucy.
"I need you to take me to the edge of Metropolis to the home of Arnold Lister."
"Right away sir." She answered as if she was in the army. The three of them had a small giggle over this.
But after that Lucy carried her husband to the location. Super-Man flew after them. he didn't know who this person was but if George said that he could help then he would.
People took pictures of Lucy as she traveled. Some of them had even noticed that the gentle giantess wasn't wearing any bra or panties. A picture of her would fetch a high price on EBay.
Eventually they reach the house. It seemed very small even by George and Super-Man's view. But Lucy knelt down near it and put George on the ground. He goes to the door and cautiously knocks it.

Is anyone home?
155112122211121221222222121111121211.title: Arnold Lister

1551121222111212212222221211111212111.content:
A man answered the door. He was average height and he looked Jamaican. He had dreadlocks and sunglasses. He saw that it was George and he looked happy.
"George long time no see," said Arnold. "What brings you here?"
"I need your help locating someone," replied George. "You still have that tracking device?"
"Sure I do. Don't expect anything less from me. What you been up to lately?"
"I got married."
"Who's the lucky lady?"
"Oh she's outside."
Arnold takes a look and sees the 600 foot Lucy squatting down. She smiled at him and waved. He nearly fainted.
"Wow she's big and beautiful." He then looks harder. And is that Super-Man?"
"Sure is. Now I need to borrow your tracking device for a while. I promise to bring it back."
"Ok just wait here."
Arnold goes into the house and gets his tracking device that he invented.
"There you go."
"Thank you. We really should go out for a drink every once in a while."
Lucy then picks up George and she stands up. She walks away from the house.
1551121222111212212222221211111212111.title: The tracking device

15511212221112122122222212111112121111.content:
George put the piece of Bizarro's costume into tracking device. He started to get a result and Super-Man and Lucy tried to take a look. Super-Man could see it but Lucy was now so big that she couldn't see it properly.
"So where is he?" asked Lucy.
"It looks like he's in the Amazon Rainforest," replied George.
"But that's miles away even for me."
"That's where the Legion of Doom Headquarters are," replied Super-Man.
"Are they bad news?"
"Just imagine every super-villain in the world in one place and they're led by your old friend Lex Luthor."
Lucy frowned at him. "Don't you say that name to me again."
"Ok I won't. But now we should start our journey to the Amazon Rainforest."
"That might take me a while and I don't want to get any bigger."
"Well I can go at your pace. But when we get there we'll have to call in for reinforcements. The Legion of Doom aren't to be taken lightly."

Does anything happen on the journey?
15511212221112122122222212111112121111.title: He's in the Amazon

155112122211121221222222121111121211111.content:
Lucy began the long journey south. She decided to stay away from populated so not to cause any hysteria or damage. Super-Man even decided to have a lift from the gentle giantess. He figured that flying wasn't going to get him there any faster if he had to keep up with her. Also she wouldn't feel his weight on her shoulder.
The journey was taking a long time. They went through many states and she was met several times by the army. But Super-Man explained to them about the situation and so they let them through.
But just before they reached the boarders of Brazil Lucy really wanted to take a bath. The men didn't mind. It would only take 20 minutes of the journey that was taking days.
When she finished it was night and everyone was too tired to continue, especially Lucy. She had walked a good thousand miles or more. She kept George and Super-Man close to her so that they wouldn't get cold.
The men had never known such comfort before and they were nice and warm. People did come and see Lucy asleep on the ground. Some even took pictures of her to put in Latin American newspapers. Thankfully Lucy didn't wake up because they were taking pictures of indecent places.
155112122211121221222222121111121211111.title: The journey to the rainforest

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
In the morning when Lucy did wake up she saw the photographers taking pictures of her. One of them was even taking a picture of up her skirt. And she didn't have any panties on.
When she sat up the photographers started to walk back. Then she noticed the one take the indecent picture. She picked him up with her hand and she stared at him.
"You little pervert!" she shouted. This woke Super-Man and George. She then took the camera out of the photographers hand and she crushed it. "Oops did I just do that?" The photographer started to shout at her in Spanish. "Sorry I can't understand a word you're saying." She then put him on the ground. "Now go before I decide to eat you." She then slammed her huge foot onto the ground. This made the photographer run away.
George didn't much approve to Lucy's method. Nor did Super-Man.
"Lucy you didn't have to do that," said George.
"Well he deserved it. He took pictures of my ass. And if I wasn't so nice I would have hurt him."
"Ok Lucy just calm down," replied Super-Man. "You know what happens when you get angry."
"I know I know."

What do they do next?
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: You little pervert

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
"But before we continue I'm a little hungry," said Lucy. "I could do with some food."
"Ok," replied Super-Man. "I guess we all could do with something to eat."
Lucy then went to some trees. Although the trees didn't even come up to her ankles there was plenty of food on it for Super-Man and George. It would take quite a few more for Lucy.
When everyone had had their fill Lucy began the trek down to the Brazilian rainforest. She still had someway to go but the thought of her being able to help the planet made it all worth it.
Another day of walking past and Lucy was just outside the rainforest. The tracking device located Bizarro near the centre.
"Ok what now?" asked George.
"It's best that I have a quick bird's eye view of the headquarters," replied Super-Man. "If I'm not back in ten minutes use this communicator to contact the Justice League."
Super-man then gave George a communication device. Then he flew away towards the rainforest.
"Good luck," said Lucy.
"He'll be fine," replied George.
"I hope so."

What happens?
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Breakfast

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
Meanwhile in the Headquarters of the Legion of Doom Super-Man was being monitored. Lex Luthor still remembered how he had, had a hand in his defeat at the hands of Lucy. He didn't care that he had saved his life. To him it was the ultimate insult.
Lex sat in his chair as he watched the screen. Soon Bizarro came to him.
"Ah Bizarro I need you to do me a job," said Lex. "Super-Man is on his way. Slow him down until I get some of the other villains to take him out."
"Bizarro will do as you want," replied Bizarro.
He then flew right out of the roof. Much to Lex's anger.
"And next time use the door like everyone else."
Bizarro flew and intercepted Supper-Man in the air. There was no time for words as the tow squared off.
Super-Man had the upper hand against Bizarro. But in a matter of minutes three other villains joined the fight. These included Giganta, Professor Zoom and Scarecrow. It took them a while but they were able to defeat the Man of Steel.
They used Kryptonite to weaken him as they took him away to be held prisoner. He felt powerless as he was taken away.
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Ambush

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
About half an hour later we see George and Lucy still waiting for Super-Man to return. They felt a little nervous since he had been gone for a very long time.
"Something's wrong," said George. "We better call the Justice League." He went to type the buttons but the Lucy gently stopped him. "What are you doing?"
"We don't need the Justice League we could do it ourselves," replied Lucy.
"Are you insane it's us against almost every super villain in the world?"
"I know terrible odds. But we make it look difficult. Come on let's face it I'm 600 feet tall there is nothing I can't handle."
"The answer is still no."
"Oh please." She began to put on the puppy dog eyes that she knew that he couldn't resist. She even hugged him and he was in ultimate comfort.
"Ok we'll do it your way. But if anything happens we're calling the Justice League."
"Thank you George." She then lifted him up and gave him a little kiss. "Now let's go beat the crap out of some bad guys."
Lucy begins to walk towards the Legion of Doom headquarters.

Does everything go well?
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Let's go

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
At the Headquarters of the Legion of Doom they could see Lucy on her way to the base. They were a little nervous. But they thought that they would easily repel her. They knew that her weakness was George and so they would target him.
Lucy was walking through the rain forret. The trees were easily 300 feet tall but that wasn't even up to her hips. She couldn't see her feet and the animals would run away from her.
George was safe on ehr shoulder for now. He was her main concern. She didn't want him hurt and she figured that on her shoulder no one would be able to reach her.
A few minutes later Lucy hit her foot on something metal. She was in pain for a few minutes and she even feared that her toe was bleeding.
When she moved the trees away she saw that it was the headquarters of the Legion of Doom. he then saw several super villains come out. One of these villains was Giganta and she increased her size to 100 feet. But Lucy just picked her up like she was a toy.
"Hey George I found myself a little dolly," said Lucy.
"Don't mess about too much or else they'll pull a fast one on you."
"Oh yeah sorry."
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Giganta a giant sized dolly

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
Lucy didn't want to give up Giganta so she kept her in her right hand. Giganta decided to shrink down to her normal size but that meant she was truly tiny compared to the mega giantess.
The other villains began to attack Lucy. She could barely feel their attacks and she concentrated on the villains who had mind powers. She knew that this was the most fragile part of her body.
She then decided to rip the roof off of the headquarters and she saw Super-Man in his cage. She also saw several other villains around him.
"Oh a Super-Man I always wanted one of those," said Lucy with an almost childlike voice. "Don't mind if I do."
Lucy then picks up the Kryptonite cage and she shatters it. She throws all the pieces to one side and he got his strength back.
"Ok Lucy now we call for reinforcements," said George.
He then contacted the Justice League and they began to send the reinforcements. These included Batman, Wonder Woman, the Flash, Green Lantern, Hawkman and many others. Now the Legion of Doom had to fight against the entire Justice League roaster.
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Freeing Super-Man

choices: Lucy and George go abck to their island
Super-Man offes Lucy a place in the Justice League
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
The battle was off the scale. Never had so many super-powered beings fought in one place. They seemed to be very evenly matched.
Lucy was in the middle of all this. but her main concern was keeping George safe. She put him in her breasts where it was safe and if she got hit there the soft flesh would cushion the impact.
Several of the super-villains attacked her. She was able to repel them with her huge hand. She still had Giganta in her hand but by now she had given up trying to escape.
Many of the villains were injured and many others fled. The super-heroes were victorious but they still had casualties. Although no one was killed several people were injured. They started to gather the villains that they had captured and they took them to prisons for super beings.
Lucy sat down and took George out of her breasts. She hugged him without crushing him and then gave him a kiss.
"That was exciting," said Lucy. Then she held up her hand with Giganta in it. "And I still have my doll."
"You know you can put her down now."

What happens next?
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Good vs evil

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
Lucy then put Giganta back on the ground but by the time she did all the superheroes surrounded her and she gave up.
Lucy continued to hug George and then she began to walk away. The superheroes let her go. But Super-Man flew to her and he sat on her shoulder.
"Lucy where are you going?" he asked.
"We're going back to our island," replied Lucy. "It was nice being away from it for a while. But I'm too much of a threat to stay on solid land like this. Besides that island's kinda grown on us."
"Well all I can do is wish you good luck." He then flew off her shoulder and they continued the long journey.
It took Lucy over a day to get back to the island where her and George lived. When she got there she began to collect food for herself and her husband. After that she sat on the beach and they began to eat the food.
"What a day," said Lucy.
"It was nice but I don't want it to happen everyday."
"You're telling me." She then picked him up and kissed him. "I love you."
"And I love you too."
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Back to the Island

choices: Lucy goes to another part of the island to cool down
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
A year past since the pair got married. They were still madly in love with each other. But Lucy was planning something very special for their anniversary.
She spent a little time away from George as she started to make the preparations. She went back to Metropolis to see if she could get a special dress. They were able to make her a dress but she had to work in the city a month to afford it.
But the night of their anniversary Lucy has made a table with food on it. She made something for herself to sit on and she was able to get a chair from a second hand store for George. She also wore a beautiful white dress that fit her like it was made for her (It was made for her).
She then took George to the table and she sat him in his chair and she sat the opposite side to him. He didn't know what was going on.
"Honey do you remember what today is?" asked Lucy.
"No," replied George.
"Come on darling you should know." She was getting a little worried.
"Is this the day that Lex hired you."
"NO!" Her voice was loud and scary. She slammed her fist on the table. "TODAY IS OUR FIRST ANNIVERSARY!"

What happens next?
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Forgetful George

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
"Is it?" asked George in a timid voice.
"YES IT IS!" shouted Lucy. This was the first time that George was afraid of his wife. "I SPENT WEEKS PLANNING ALL OF THIS AND YOU DO THIS TO ME!" She then stood up. "I'M GOING SOMEWHERE ELSE TO COOL DOWN AND DON'T FOLLOW ME!"
Lucy then walked away but George was stuck on the table. He couldn't get down without help from Lucy and it might be a while before she came back.
But to George's delight he sees Super-Man in the sky. He landed next to George and he had a present.
"Hi George happy anniversary," said Super-Man.
"I'm an idiot," replied George.
"Why would you say that?"
"I forgot it was our anniversary. Lucy prepared the perfect evening and I ruined it by forgetting one day that was important to us."
"Where is she?"
"She’s gone somewhere to cool down. She’s never been this angry with me before. I was afraid in case she would go on a rampage or something."
"Let me talk to her maybe I can get through to her."
"Just before you go and you get me off this table please?"
Super-Man then put George back on the ground. Then he flew towards Lucy.
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Cooling off

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
In a matter of seconds Super-Man found Lucy sitting on the opposite side of the island to where George was. She was grabbing huge boulders and she was throwing them into the water. He flew in front of her face and she had tears in her eyes.
"What do you want?" she asked.
"I'm here to talk to you," replied Super-Man.
"I don't want to talk to anyone right now."
"But it'll get it off your chest."
"How can I when the man I love can't even remember one day that's special to us. I wouldn't mind him forgetting his birthday or even Christmas. But our anniversary. Please I just need sometime alone."
Super-Man respected her wish and he flew back to George. He was waiting for Super-Man to come back and he was glad to see him.
"So how is she?" asked George.
"She's very upset," replied Super-Man. "She sounded a little aggressive so I didn't talk to her any further. She just needs a little time to cool down and maybe a gift."
"But what can I get her here?"
"Come with me then."
Super-Man grabs him and flies off.

Where do they go?
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Talking to Lucy

Super-Man flew George to Gotham. George had never been here before and he was a little impressed with the buildings. This place even had their own costumed crime fighter.
They landed at the mansion of Bruce Wayne. He was Gotham's richest resident and he was a good friend of Super-Man.
He knocked the front door and Alfred the Butler answered the door.
"Good evening Super-Man," said Alfred. "What brings you here?"
"I need to ask him a favour," replied Super-Man.
"Very well Master Wayne will be with you shortly. But for now take a seat."
Super-Man and George go inside and take a seat in the lounge. Eventually Bruce came and he was in an expensive business suit.
"Argh Super-Man," said Bruce. "Pleasure to see you."
"The pleasure's mine," replied Super-Man. "I need a favour. My friend here has had a falling out with his wife and he needs to fid a way to make it up to her."
"What's she like?"
"Well she kind generous," replied George. "Super model body and 600 feet tall."

"600 feet?" asked Bruce. "Was she the one who was in Metropolis last year?"
"Yeah that's her," replied George. "A little hard to miss."
"And why aren't you together?"
"Well I forgot our anniversary and she's really upset. She won't even talk to me."
"Well it's not uncommon."
"I need to find something that'll make it up to her."
"I might have just the thing."
Bruce then went away and a few minutes later he came back with a ring and some sort of device.
"What's that?" asked George.
"This is a ring and this ray can change the size of inanimate objects," replied Bruce.
"So you're planning on making a ring big enough for her," said Super-Man.
"That's exactly what I'm saying. But I'm afraid the ring isn't cheap. I'll do you a deal. The enlarged ring is yours if you work for my company for five days."
"Really?"
"That's the deal."

Will George accept?

"Ok I'll do it," said George. "But what do I tell Lucy? She is gonna notice that I'm gone for almost a week."
"I can come up with something," replied Super-Man. "Leave her to me."
Super-Man then left the mansion and went back to the island where Lucy was. He found her looking for George. She saw him coming and she signaled him over.
"Super-Man oh thank Go you're here," said Lucy.
"What's wrong?"
"I can't find George anywhere."
"Well I took him away."
"You what?"
"He's going to be gone for a few days he got a message from his mother to visit him. Now don't be mad he'll be back and hopefully this thing will all straighten out."
"I hope so I can't believe I got so angry at him. It’s easy to lose track of the days here. I just hoped that he remembered our special day."
"Well after today I don't think he'll forget."
"It is going to feel strange going to bed by myself tonight. The place won't be the same."
"He'll be back and he'll probably be wanting you."

Meanwhile back in Gotham Bruce Wayne had given George a room to stay in while he worked for him. Thankfully it was Sunday and he would start the next day and finish on Friday.
As the week went by George worked long and hard for Bruce. He had to create some new devices that would help the world. He felt a lot better creating this stuff rather than the things he created for Lex Corp.
When the week was over Super-Man came back. He picked up George and the giant ring and he flew back to the island. He easily found Lucy relaxing and he left George with her and then he flew away.
George was in the palm of Lucy's hand and she wasn't too happy with him.

At first he didn't know what she was talking about. But he figured that Super-Man had made something up. "I did get you a little something."

What will Lucy do when George shows her the ring?

George tried to hold up the giant ring that he had but he didn't have the strength. Instead Lucy noticed it and she picked it up instead and she took a better look at it.
"What's this?" asked Lucy.
"It's just a little present from me to you," replied George. "So what do you think?"
"It's beautiful." She then raised him to her lips and she kissed him for a few seconds. After that she rested him in her hand.
"Honey I would put it on your finger but I just don't have the strength to do it."

George held onto the ring and Lucy pick him and the ring in her one hand. She then extends her Ring finger. Then she pick got the ring and George. She then helped him put the ring on her finger. She took all the weight off of the ring and George just had to go along with is wife.
When the ring was on she looked at it for a few seconds and then she looks at George.
"A perfect fit," said Lucy
"For the perfect wife," replied George.
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: The ring
