A few days later we see the married couple on their island still. Lucy was going into the sea looking for food. They were running out of food on their island so they had to turn to the sea.
There were several small islands around this area and each of them could sustain the pair for about two months. So they came up with an idea. Every two months they would go from one island to the other in their search for food. They would do this on a cycle so when they came back to a certain island the food was back.
We see them sitting at a beach and Lucy was cuddling her tiny husband and she even gave him a kiss.
“So is this how you imagined married life?” asked George.
“Not really no,” replied Lucy. “I imagined a house and having kids.”
“We can still have children if you wanted to.”
“How do you plan on doing that?”
“Well we will do when I’ve found a cure.”
“Stop trying there is no cure. I’m way too big to be cured now. Besides it is fun being bigger than everyone else.”
“Then we’ll have giant sized babies.”

What do they do/
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: To the future

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
Lucy then looked at her husband and she had an idea. But she didn’t know if he would want to do it.
“George I was just wondering would you like to go out for a swim?” asked Lucy. “We both need the exercise.”
“Yeah sure I’m a little bored,” replied George.
“Great.” She then stood up and took off her sandals. She then began to walk into the ocean. She had to keep walking until she found a depth big enough to swim in.
But on the way she felt her foot touch something that seemed to be wood. She got a splinter in her toe and it was very painful.
“Ouch what the hell was that?” asked Lucy. She then bent down a little and she picked out what seemed to be a ship wreck. It was old it had all sea life on it. She took a closer look and she was astonished.
“Wow a shipwreck. This ship must be hundreds of years old.”
“Let me take a look inside,” replied George.
Lucy then put her normal sized husband onto the boat. He couldn’t believe what he was seeing and he went into the lower decks. Down there he found a chest. It was heavy and he took it back up to Lucy.
“What’s that?” she asked.
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Shipwreck

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
"It's some sort of chest," said George. "Ok Lucy it's best that you put the ship back under the water and then take us back to our island."
"With pleasure little man," replied Lucy.
She then carefully put the ship back into the water and she walked back to island. She sat down at the beach and she opened her palm. She had George in there with the chest. She looked at him and smiled.
"Are you having trouble opening that chest?" asked Lucy.
"Only a little. But I can do it. I'm strong enough."
He continued to try and open the chest but he didn't have the strength. It was like it was sealed and no one could get in. He tried for a good 10 minutes and he soon admitted defeat. He then looked over at Lucy.
"Ok Lucy you try opening this," replied George.
She then got the chest with her free hand. And then with a movement of her finger she was easily able to open the chest. She then passed it down to her normal sized husband.
"That's one of the advantages for having a wife who's 100 times taller than she should be," said Lucy.

What's in the chest?
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Opening the chest

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
George then took a look inside the chest and he saw gold coins. He jumped with joy and Lucy was a little confused.
"What's inside?" asked Lucy.
"Gold," replied George. "Hundreds of gold coins. We're rich."
"Rich?"
"We can go back to civilization, build a house for a person such as your size and we can live relatively normal lives."
"But isn't there some kind of law against taking treasure like this. Won't some country try to take it from us?"
"No these are international waters no one owns it."
"So the money's ours."
"Every penny."
Lucy then stood up and hugged her husband. She used only enough strength to give him a comforting hug. He was safe in her soft breasts. But if she had used anymore of her strength he would be crushed.
"What do we do now?" asked Lucy.
"We go to land," replied George.
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: We're rich

Lucy giggled and she began to walk into the water. She didn’t have to swim so much since she was 600 feet tall. Most of the journey the water only came up to her waist. She kept her husband on her shoulder as she walked through the water.
Eventually the pair get to Metropolis. Super-Man had seen them coming and he went to them. He was surprised that they came and they were causing a bit of panic.
“George, Lucy what are you doing here?” asked Super-Man.
“Well we’re rich,” replied George. He then showed Super-Man the chest of gold coins. “We found them while out for a swim. And it was in International waters so they’re ours.”
Super-Man smiled. “So something has finally gone your way. What are you going to do with the money?”
“Well we were talking about it on the way. First we were going to build a house big enough for Lucy and get ourselves on our feet. Then we were going to invest it a little so that we had a little money for the rest of our lives. Then we’d give the rest away to charity.”
“Sounds like a plan.”
“Now where do we take these so we can get the money?”

Where do they get the money?
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: At metropolis

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
"Well I know a few museums that would pay big bucks for these," said Super-Man. "I could take you to them."
"Thanks Super-Man you're the greatest," replied Lucy. She then gently grabbed him and gave him a little kiss.
"Hopefully my wife doesn't see this."
The group laugh a little at this joke and then Super-man flies towards a museum. Lucy followed them and she was careful with where she put her foot. The streets were very busy so it was very difficult for her to do this. More than once she nearly stepped on someone or something.
Eventually they reach the first museum. An expert took a closer look at the coins to see if they were real or just fake. But to everyone's delight they were revealed to be real.
The first one took about one hundred gold coins and gave the couple just under a million for them.
Then it was onto the next one. Like before they prayed a million for one hundred gold coins. But there was still roughly four hundred left in the chest. The more they made the happier George and Lucy got.
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Museum

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
A few weeks later we see builders building a giant sized house for Lucy. She was still wearing her basic clothes. She liked them and she didn't really want to take them off. They felt comfortable.
George had sold most of the coins but he kept a few for his own collection. He also had a few letters from people claiming to be long lost relatives but he just ignored them.
Lucy was happy. She was glad to be back on the mainland rather than being stuck on an island that could barely sustain her colossal size. She was seeing her relatives and they marvelled over her size. Her parents were a little disappointed that she married so soon. But if it was with the man she truly loved they would support her.
She even used her size to help people. She did charity work a number of different charities that did different things. She donated quite a bit of money like they promised and she would do charity events. She once did a ride around Metropolis for money. The money went to charity.
But she would also go to a children's orphanage and she would spend a little time with them.

Will she need her size to fight evil anytime soon?
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Lucy the charity worker

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
Right now we see Lucy at the Metropolis Orphanage. She came to see the children and she was happy to see them. They were also happy to see her. She brought them all a little toy and this made them extremely happy.
“Mrs Starr how did you get so big?” asked a Child. Then all the children began to ask. Lucy just smiled back at them.
“You guys really want to know?” replied Lucy.
“Yeah please tell us.”
“Well it started a while ago. I was just a normal high school drop out who needed money. So I went to LexCorp. There I met Dr George Starr. He was researching in making things bigger and I was the test subject. It worked but I shrank back down after a few seconds. They found this really annoying so they made one that was permanent. Like wise it worked and I became a 60 foot giantess.”
“You’re 60 feet tall?”
“No I’m a lot bigger than 60 feet now. But whenever I lost my temper I would go mindless and if I really lost it I would grow. I’ve had a fight or two with the Man of Steel himself. First time he beat me but the second time he let me win.”
“You fought Super-Man?”
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Lucy and the orphans

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
"Yeah I thought the guy in blue tights," said Lucy. You know he's one of the kindest men I've ever met. He really helped me."
"Wow you must be strong if you fought him," replied one of the children.
"Well being 600 feet tall does give one more strength then the average person."
"Also we were wondering. What's the view like up there?"
"If you let me I'll show you."
She then put her hand on the ground and all of the children climbed onto it. She made sure that everyone was on properly and that they were safe.
After that Lucy stood up to her full height and brought her hand up to eye level. The children marveled over the sights they were seeing.
"Wow I can see the sea from here," said One random child.
"I can see the mall," added another child.
"That's all you can see?" replied Lucy. "I can see way further than you guys. I can see the forest and even a campsite."
"Wow your eyes must be as good as Super-Man's."
"I admit they're good. But his are definitely better than mine. I can't see through anything."

Does Lucy leave now?
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: The greatest view

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
Then Lucy put the Orphans back on the ground. She smiled at them and they smiled back at her.
"Sorry guys I have to go now," said Lucy.
"Can you stay just a little longer Mrs Starr?" asked One of the Orphans.
"I wish I could but I've got something else that needs doing. But I promise that I'll be back next week to see you all. Bye everyone."
"Bye Mrs Starr," replied the Orphans.
She then stood back up and she began to walk away. She waved goodbye to the Orphans. She could hear some of them crying because she was leaving and this made her feel a little sad as well. But she couldn't stay there forever.
Eventually she got back to George. He was just looking at the giant sized house as it was nearly being completed. He saw his giantess for a wife and he smiled at her.
"Hey honey how were the orphans?" asked George.
"Oh they were such cute little angels," replied Lucy. "I just want to adopt them all."
"Don't worry when this house is ready we'll adopt as many as you want."
"Thanks little man."
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Lucy has to go

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
The house was taking a while to be built. Lucy was getting a little impatient and she began to help the builders. She worked almost as hard as they did but eventually the house was complete. The electrics were installed and specially made equipment for Lucy.
Eventually Lucy went inside with George in her hand. She looked around and was amazed to see that everything seemed normal. She even went up to the bed room that had a giant sized double bed that made her happy.
"This house is perfect," said Lucy. "I've never felt so normal in here."
"Well that's why we've built it for you honey," replied George. "To make you feel like a normal woman."
"I'll have to remember to give you an extra special treat tonight."
"And tomorrow night we've got the house warming party."
"Who have you invited."
"Well I've invited the orphans, a few friends and collogues. Also I even got an invitation to Superman himself."
"Oh this is going to be such a nice party. Do we have the food for it?"
"That and more."

What happens at the party?
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: New house

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
That night the guests began to come to the house party. Everyone she invited came even Metropolis's favourite son Superman. Lucy was happy that he was able to come. He landed on her large hand and she smiled.
"Superman so nice for you to come," said Lucy.
"It's nice to be here," replied Superman. "But you know i can't stay for long I need to protect the city."
"Ok but while you're here just enjoy yourself as much as you can."
Superman then flew away to get a little food. But then Lucy saw the orphans come in. She squatted down to them and she was happy to see them.
"Oh you all came," said Lucy. All the orphans were dressed really smart. "And look how smart you look in your clothes."
The Orphans waved at her and said hello. Lucy had hired a clown for them so it would keep them occupied while the adults had some alone time.
But outside a group of villains were there. They were several members of the Legion of Doom and they wanted revenge on what Lucy had done to them especially Giganta. No one had ever made her feel like a doll and now they were ready to strike.
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Party time

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
The party was going without anything going wrong. Everyone seemed happy until the lights went on. At first Lucy thought that the electricians had done a bad job rewiring the house. But then she could hear some glass smashing. She knew that there was trouble. But before she could react she felt a huge fist hit her. She fell onto the ground unconscious.
Meanwhile Superman could see what was happening. He saw villains coming in. But he saw Giganta as big as Lucy. He knew tat she couldn’t get that big surely. But his first concern wasn’t stopping the bad guys but to get everyone out. He opened the door.
"Ok everyone get out now," he commanded.
But the villains were already kidnapping some of the guests including a few of the kids. Superman knew that if Lucy was still conscious she would have helped. But she was blocking some people from getting to safety.
Superman was flying around and picking up guests and taking them to safety. But the villains were making this extremely difficult for him. Some were firing at him while he was trying to save people. He just considered them as cowards who preyed on the weak.

What happens when Lucy wakes up?
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Attacked

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
Lucy woke up a few hours later. She saw George right next to her and she tried to get up. But her head was hurting and she looked at her normal sized husband. She went to pick him up.
"Ow my head," said Lucy. "What happened?"
"We were attacked by the Legion of Doom," replied George.
"Are the kids alright?" She got no responce from him. "Are the kids alright?" She was getting more agitated.
"They were taken."
"You're kidding right?"
"No they've all been taken. Superman tried his best to stop them but they used Kryptonite on him. The poor guy didn't stand a chance."
"Never mind him what about our children. They could be killed by now. I want them abck now!" She was getting angry.
"Lucy darling if they wanted them dead they would have killed them here but they were taken instead. I strongly think that they're alive."
"They are." This calmed her down a little.
"And I'm sure the Justice League will find them."
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: They're gone

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
"But what if they don't?" asked Lucy. "I know those kids aren't really mine but I love them nonetheless."
"I know. But I think we should be careful."
"Why?"
"Well if you noticed Giganta was bigger then ever before. In the past she was never able to get to that size. Remember when you last fought her she was like a doll compared to you. But now she can match your size. Her strength is higher then yours if you were both at the same size."
"Just because she's stronger doesn't mean that she's better."
"I know honey but maybe like I said be more cautious. Do you understand what I'm telling you?"
"Yes."
"Good now I think you should just rest."
"Alright I will."
"One more thing."
"What?"
"I love you."

What does Lucy do?
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Be Cautious

The next morning Lucy wasn’t any easier with the loss of the children. She was still shaking and crying a lot. Not even George was cheering her up. But she eventually had a visit from Superman, the Green Lantern and Wonder Woman. She was happy to see them all.
“Have you got any good news?” asked Lucy.
“I’m afraid not Lucy,” replied Superman.
“Oh.” She shed a tear.
“We are trying our best.”
“Well your best isn’t good enough.” She paused for a moment. “I’m sorry I’m just so stressed.”
“I know but I think we’re making some progress.”
“Are you?” Her hope had gone up.
“Yes we have a few possible locations. We’re sending scouts to take a look at each one of them.”
“Is that good?”
“Yes that’s very good.”
“Great.”
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: News

“Can I help in anyway?” asked Lucy.
“Well the Legion of Doom seem to be stronger then ever,” replied Wonder Woman. “We may need you.”
“I’ll do anything to get them back.”
“I’m sure that you will. But for now we’ll keep in touch.”
The heroes then left and Lucy just stood there. She shed a tear and then walked towards where George was. He was working on a new device but he stopped when he heard his wife.
“Hey honey,” said George.
“Hi,” replied Lucy.
“Are you alright?”
“No I’m not.”
“Don’t worry they’ll turn up I promise you. That’s why I’m creating this.” Lucy took a better look at the device he was making.
What’s that?”
“It’ll help us find our children.”
“How does it work?”
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: New device

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
“This device can track down the kids using their DNA,” replied George. “I can give you an example. Could I have a strand of your beautiful hair please?” He gave her a comforting smile.
“Yeah sure,” replied Lucy. She then pulled out a piece of her hair and gave it to him. It was a little long for him. “Is that alright.”
“That’s fine honey.” He then put it into the machine. “Here we go.” She then saw a hologram of the world and there was a dot on where they were.
“What’s this?”
“This is how we find them. The signature is direct onto your DNA. I can zoom in for a more accurate location.” He then began to zoom it in.
“Wow that’s amazing.”
“All we need is the DNA of one of the kids.”
“I think I know where to find some. Be back in a minute.” She then walked to the oversized bathroom and she picked up a tiny comb. He brought it back to her normal sized husband. “Is this good enough?”
“Yes its fine.”
"Then try it out."
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: DNA

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
George then picked a piece of hair from the comb and he put it in his device. the device instantly got rid of Lucy's DNA and replaced it with this one. the results were almost instant.
"Here we go," said George.
Then a hologram of the planet and it started to spin slowly. There was a spot in Europe and Lucy stared at it.
"They're in Europe," asked Lucy.
"It looks that way."
"Where in Eruope?"
"Let's zoom in." He then typed a few things on the machine and it zoomed in. It looked like they were in the south of France."
"Where?"
"One minute." he typed away again. "They're near Nice."
"We better contact the Justice League."
"I think you're right."
George then looked around and there didn't seem to be any normal sized phones around so Lucy made the call.

Will anyone pick up?

“There’s no one there,” she said.
“Then we’ll have to wait for them to respond,” replied George.
“No that’ll take too long.”
“Then what do you suggest we do?”
“I say we go and get them back ourselves.”
“But that’s suicide. Look what happened to you last time.”

“Ok you win.”

“It’s still stealing.”

“You’re actually complimenting him?”
“Well you have to admit I admire his intelligence. But not the way he uses it. He tires to use it as a weapon.”

Will he get it?

He got another device from out of his pocket and he pushed a button or two. He liked the results.

She then began to walk away.

Who will win?

“You took my children from me,” said Lucy. “What gives you the right to do that to me? Go on tell me.”
“You’re not their mother,” replied Giganta. “You’re just someone who wants them because you know that there’s no way in hell you can have brats of your own. I sympathise you.”

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
That one was another of my stupid mistakes. Probably won't happen again.

The Flash then grabbed Batman and the Green Lantern. He then raced to the secret entrance that he had found. He reached it faster then the speed of light. He was a little tired when he got there.
“Here’stheentrance,” said the Flash.
“Good,” replied Batman. “We need to stay low and out of sight. The last thing we want is everyone to know that we’re here.”
“Icandothatnoproblem.”
“Don’t say it and just do it.”
“Gotitbatsy.”
They then saw someone coming and they quickly ducked and they saw the villain walk past. It was the Mirror Master.
“HeyitsMirrorMaster,” whispered the Flash.
“Sush,” replied the Green Lantern.
“What was that?” asked Mirror Master.
“Crap.”
Before Mirror Master could react a green energy fist hit him and knocked him out could. He fell like a sack of potatoes.
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Continue

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
“Greathedidn’talertanyone,” said the Flash.
“But now we’ve got to hide him,” replied Batman.
“Icandothatinananosecond.”
In a flash the Flash picked up Mirror Master and he put him in a place where no one could see him. He soon came back to Batman and the Green Lantern.
“Did you do it?” asked the Green Lantern.
“Yeshe’ssafeandsound.”
“Good now we have to be quiet.”
They then walked down the corridors carefully. They would take out any cameras that they saw. But it was going to be difficult to get through to anywhere. They still didn’t want to be seen.
But then Batman went through a door. He saw Lucy in there. She was chained down to the ground and still unconscious.
“I’ve found her,” said Batman through a communicator.
“Its best to release her,” replied Superman.
“It’ll be a little difficult.”
“Then get Lucy to help you.”

Will he wake her up?
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: I found her

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
Batman then saw the machine that was keeping Lucy sedated. He quickly pressed the off switch and he took a step back from where he was. He could see Lucy moving about a little. She eventually opened her eyes and she saw him standing there. At first her vision was blurry.
"Is that you George?" asked Lucy.
"No its Batman," he replied.
"Where's George?"
"He's safe."
"I want to see him and my children."
"That might have to wait a while."
"No I want them now!"
Her voice had become loud and sharp. This began to alert everyone that she was awake. That wasn't a good idea.
"Please keep it down," said Batman.
"No not until I have my husband and children back."
"We need to get you free first."
"I can do that."
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Waking up Lucy

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
Lucy then began to pull at the chains. Using all of her strength she was able to break out of them. But she could hear people shouting. She looked down at Batman and she seemed to be worried.
"They're coming," said Lucy.
"Hurry up," replied Batman.
"I'm trying."
When the last of her restraints came off she went to stnad up. But there was no way she could stand up in the room. She could only lie down. It was times like this Lucy wished she could shrink herself like all of the giant heroes and heroines.
Just then the door burst open. The first villain inside was Kiler Croc. He instantly saw Batman. But before he could do anything Lucy knocked him away with one huge flick of her hand.
"Get away," said Lucy.
"Great we have get out of here," replied Batman.
"Then I suggest we go straight up."
She then grabbed onto Superman and she began to stand up. Her head hit the ceiling and she pushed against it.

Will she get out this way?
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Flick

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
Lucy pushed at the ceiling with all of her might. It was reinforced and it was taking up all of her strength. But she could see that Batman was going to be in trouble if she did get the ceiling up. There was bound to be falling plaster and concrete. He might be a super hero but he wasn’t invincible like Superman and some of the others. She quickly grabbed him with her right hand.
“What are you doing?” asked Batman.
“Making sure you’re not crushed with the ceiling goes through,” replied Lucy. “Now I’m going to need my hand for this. Don’t tell George I did this.” She then put him in her breasts so that he was safe.
Lucy then continued to push against the ceiling. She could hear it cracking. It was a good sign and she kept pushing.
“You’re alone right?” asked Lucy.
“No the Flash and green lantern came with me,” replied Batman.
“Will they be fine?”
“Sure they can take care of themselves.”
As she pushed the cracks became larger and larger. The ceiling was crumbling away above her and she was standing up more.
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Going through

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
As Lucy stood up she could feel the sunlight on her face and the fresh air. She had never been this pleased to feel these things. But she was still standing up. She hadn’t reached her full height yet.
When she got to her full height she stretched her body. She made sure that Batman was safe in her hand.
“Oh that feels so much better,” she said.
“Are you alright?” asked Batman.
“Yeah I’m fine.”
“Not for long,” replied a Voice.
Lucy then turned around and saw Giganta. But before she could react she felt her fist hit her face. This made her take a step back. The force would be enough to crumble a mountain but she just took it.
“Didn’t think you’d get out that easily?” asked Giganta.
“Actually I did,” replied Lucy.
“Then you’re a bigger idiot then I thought.”
“You’re a bigger idiot literally.”
“Don’t mock me.”

Who will win this time?
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Confrontation

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
"I do what I want when I want to whom ever I want," said Lucy. She then gave Giganta a thunderous punch to the gut. This winded the evil giantess.
"You little bitch," replied Giganta gasping for breath.
"You like that? Well here's another." She then punched her in the face. With Giganta distracted she put Batman on the ground. "Run."
Batman didn't argue. he ran away. But strange enough he didn't run to safety. He ran into the Legion of Doom HQ.
But Giganta was recovering from the onslaught. She began to make herself bigger. She stared down at Lucy.
"Don't forget I can become bigger then you," said Giganta.
"I didn't but that's what I was hoping for."
Lucy then uppercutted Giganta. Since she was growing she was knocked off her feet and she landed on the ground hard. This knocked her out and Lucy was very happy with herself.
"Take that bitch."
She then began to look in the headquarters for her children. But she couldn't seem to find them.
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Lucy wins

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
"Where are they?" she said. She began to rip the base apart. "Where are my Angels?" She was searching frantically.
But there was still no sign of them. She was becoming more and mroe worried. She didn't know what to do. She had practically ripped the entire base up to find them. But there was still nothing. She didn't even find any bodies. This indicated that they weren't in the headquarters when she came out of them.
"Where are they?"
She eventually saw Superman fly in front of her. She stared at him for a few seconds and then she went abck to work.
"Where are my children?" asked Lucy.
"Not here," replied Superman.
"What?"
"Seems that Luthor moved them somewhere else."
"LUTHOR!"
"Calm down Lucy we're doing everything we can."
"Well it isn't good enough."
"We need you to relax."

What does she do?
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Not here

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
"NO!" shouted Lucy. "Not while they're in danger. I would be a bad mother if I didn't do everything I could."
"You've done everything you could," replied Superman.
"No I haven't. I don't care what you say to me or what you do I'm going to find my children."
"I understand but right now we need to relocate them."
"Then use George's DNA machine."
"His what?"
"It can track down people's DNA. That's how we found out the kids were here. that would be the easiest way."
"Good where is it?"
"He should have it with him."
"Great he's with the others."
"Where are the others?"
"Follow me."
Superman then began to fly away. Lucy quickly followed him and she was hoping that he still had it.
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Find them

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
It took seconds for them to reach the others. George was still with them and he was happy to see his wife. he an to her and hugged the bottom of her foot. She responded by picking him up and giving him a bigger hug.
"Oh hoeny you're alright," said George.
"I'm perfectly safe," replied Lucy.
"I was so worried about you."
"But I still haven't found the kids. Yous till have that DNA locating device on you?" She tried to smile.
"Yes."
"We need it to find them."
"Ok."
He then got the device from his pocket and he pushed the button. A large hologram map came up. It still pointed to the HQ of the Legion of Doom.
"They're there," said George.
"But I searched that place," replied Lucy.
"Did you look under?"
"No."

Are they down there?
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: They're still there

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
“If they’re there then I’ll find them,” said Lucy.
“Good now can I go along with you?” replied George.
“This time no. It might be too dangerous for you. I would be worrying about you while I’m finding the kids.”
“Oh.”
“If it’s me you’re worried about I’ll be fine I’m a big girl now.”
“It’s not just that. I want to see them again. Like you I want them back more then anything. But I don’t have any super powers.”
“Neither do I. I’m just really big.”
“Now’s not the time for jokes.”
“Ok I’ll leave you here with the others and I’ll be back before you know it.”
“Good luck honey.”
“Thanks.”
Lucy then began to walk back to the headquarters. She was followed by Superman and the Flash. She was glad that they came because she needed all of the help she could get. But she didn’t like being without her kids.
“I’m coming,” she said.
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: You can't come

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
As Lucy and the others made it to the now ruined Headquarters of the Legion of Doom They could see that Giganta was still unconscious. Lucy wanted to beat her up a little more. But her first concern was getting to her kids. She wouldn’t be happy until they were back in her arms.
She then began to put her fists into the ground and she pulled up the dirt and rubble. Quite a lot of it was going under her finger nails but she couldn’t worry about that now. She could only keep digging.
“Wait I think I’ve found something,” said Lucy.
“What is it?” replied Superman.
“I think it’s a way in.” Indeed there was. There was a small hole and Lucy tried to put her hand through it. “My hand is too big.”
“Don’t worry we’ll deal with it,” replied Superman. “You just stay out here and make sure that Giganta doesn’t wake up.”
“You promise you’ll get them out safely?”
“We promise.”
“Ok.”
The heroes then went into the small hole Lucy had discovered.

Will there be any trouble?
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Searching

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
"Good luck," said Lucy as the heroes flew into the hole. "Make sure they're alright." She then shed a tear.
As the heroes went down they didn't realise just how far down the hole went. It was getting dark but the Green Lantern used his ring to light the way so that everyone could see where they were going.
"Thanks Hal," said Superman.
"No problem," replied the Green Lantern.
As they went deeper Superman began to hear something. It seemed to be the cries of the children that were down there. He alerted everyone else and they went down faster. They eventually did reach the bottom.
But when they got down there they saw the kids were tied up. Superman went closer to release them. butt hen he felt a ray hit him. he looked and saw a cannon on the wall. The ray had Kryptonite in it.
"No," he said.
"It's kryptonie," replied Wonder Woman.
"Someone get me out of here."
"Sure."
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Trouble

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
Wonder Woman hen grabbed Superman and she took him away from it. This left just the Green Lantern and the Flash. But they thought that they could handle things by themselves.
“Whatnow?” asked the Flash.
“Find the kids and get them out of here,” replied the Green Lantern. “I’ll deal with our little friend.”
“Surenoproblem.”
He then began to run a super speed. The Green Lantern went towards where the kryptonite shot had come from. But he saw a wooden spear come towards him. At first he didn’t know it was wood and he put up a shield. But the spear went straight through the shield and into his shoulder.
“Damn it!” he shouted.
He then saw Lex Luthor coming towards him. He was laughing his head off while he walked. He was very happy.
“Your ring is one of the most powerful weapons in the universe,” said Lex. “But its useless against wood.”
“Luthor.”

What happens?
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Wood

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
"Its easy to beat super beings when you know their weaknesses," said Lex. "Superman could survive a nuclear blast. But on tiny fragment of kryptonite and he's as helpless as a newborn."
"Where are the kids Luthor?" replied the green lantern.
"I think your friend has already found them."
Meanwhile the Flash had gotten himself to a room. he found the kids there. They seemed to be scared and they were afraid when they saw the Flash.
"Don'tworrykidsI'mheretosaveyou," said the Flash.
He then picked two of them up under his arm and he ran away. But he ran up the wall and to the hole where Lucy was waiting. She had the two kids in her hand and she was happy.
"Mommy," said one of the Children.
"Kids," replied Lucy.
She then gave them a hug.
The Flash then ran dback down. But the Instant he got down there he felt a fist hit him. It was lex Luthor and the Flash tried to run after him. But his feet were stuck on the ground. he couldn't move them.
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Flash returns

choices: Try and get her kids back
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
“I’m prepared for all of you,” said Lex. “There’s not one member of the Justice League that I can’t defeat.”
“Try a none member,” replied a Voice.
Just then a huge hand came down and grabbed Lex. It was Lucy and she raised him out of the ground. She wasn’t too happy when she saw him. He didn’t fear her at all. He seemed to be pleased.
“Luthor,” she said.
“Hello there Lucy,” replied Lex. “My how you’ve grown.”
“Don’t mock me.”
“I was merely complimenting you my dear.”
“It was because of you I became like this.”
“No it was your husband. And if you’re not careful he maybe your late husband if you catch my drift.”
“You’re in no position to threaten the man I love.”
“He’s the man who turned you into the freak you are.”
“Be careful Lex you’re making me angry.”
“Oh am I?”

What will Lucy do?
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: face to face

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
Lucy then began to tighten her grip around him. She knew that she could snap him like a twig. But she didn't want to kill him. Although she knew that he was evil she still couldn't kill him.
"Go on kill me," he said.
"You're playing a dangerous game here," replied Lucy.
"Go on do it."
Lucy went to crush him. But something inside her stopped her. She couldn't do it whatsoever.
"I can't do it," she said.
"Just as I thought. You heroes are weak."
"I may not like killing you. But I can do everything in between. Now tell me where are my Little Angels?"
"In your hand."
"The rest of them?"
"In the bunker underground but I seriously doubt you can get down there. You're above the size limit. Too bad you're not like Giganta and control your size. That would make your life a lot easier.
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Where are they?

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
"SHUT UP!" shouted Lucy. "The onyl words I want to hear from your mouth is where my children are."
"Are you their mother?" replied Lex.
"What?"
"Its a simple yes or no question are you their mother?"
"No I'm not."
"Then they're not your children."
"Legally I am."
"But did you give birht to them and take care of them as babies?"
"No."
"Then you are no less their mother."
"Shut up now."
"Lucy," said a Voice. She turned around and saw Wonder Woman. "Lucy give him to me."
"I want my children back."
"And you'll get them back."
"I want them now!"

Will she get them all?
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: You're not their mother

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
“Lucy give me Luthor,” said Wonder Woman.
“I want my angels back,” replied Lucy.
“I know you do. We know where they are and we are going to save them. But give me Luthor so I can take him to the authorities.”
“Ok.”
She then gave Wonder Woman Lex Luthor and she flew away with him. Lucy put her two children on the ground and she went to put her hand down the ole. But then she saw the Green Lantern come up with all the kids. They were on a platform powered by his ring. He could see Lucy’s face lighten up.
“I believe these belong to you,” he said.
“My angels,” replied Lucy.
She then picked them all up and she gave them all a big hug. She began to cry a little with tears of joy.
“Mommy,” they replied.
“Don’t worry you’re safe now.”
“We were scared.”
“I know but everything’s fine now.”
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Reunited

1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.content:
Lucy couldn't stop hugging the children. She was even crying with tears of joy. She was extremely relieved to get them abck into the safety of her arms. But then she felt someone on her shoulder. She looked and saw George on there. She was surprised at first.
"George how did you get there?" asked Lucy.
"Superman helped me," replied George.
"Good now we're a family again."
She put him in her hands with the kids. He was happy to see them and he began to hug them. He looked up at Lucy and she was happy.
"You're right we're one big happy family now," said George.
"Can we go home now?" asked One of the children.
"Sure let's go home," said Lucy.
Lucy then got up from the ground and she began to walk away. She was happy to have her kids back. But then she remembered that she couldn't just walk home. She was still in the South of France.
"Ok maybe we need to get transport," said Lucy.
"We'll fly," replied George.

How much time passes?
1551121222111212212222221211111212111111.title: Let's go home

1551121222111212212222221212.content:
We set the clock back by one year. Lucy was still living alone in her apartment in Central Metropolis. She was 5'2 and was a sweet and gentle woman (As you all know). Unfortunately she didn't do so well in school. Her grades were lower than average. But she was able to find a job.
She left her apartment and went to her small car. She drove to the Lex Corp building where she worked. But she wasn't a scientist.
She went up to the main lab and got changed int her work clothes that simply consisted of a thin cotton suit that completely covered her from the neck down. In the lab there were many scientist and her employer. The brains behind the operation was Dr George Starr. Lucy had a crush on him. Her employer was Lex Luthor.
Lex Corp was testing a new formula that increased the mass and strength of living being. The animal tests were successful so Lex gave the go ahead for human trials.
The lab had a 100 foot ceiling and was surrounded by lights. Lucy stood in the centre of the lab. Dr Starr walked up to her with a ray gun that had the formula in it. The other scientists had kept their distances.
"Are you ready?" asked Dr Starr.
"Yeah I'm ready," replied Lucy.
Dr Starr then fired the ray at Lucy and then he ran for cover.

Does Lucy grow?
1551121222111212212222221212.title: The first part of Lucy's Origin

15511212221112122122222212121.content:
All the scientist watched as Lucy's body began to grow. She was tearing out of her work clothes and they watched as she grew bigger and bigger. Dr Starr was worried in case she would grow too big and her body couldn't take the strain.
While she was growing she covered her private parts. She was thankful for the high ceiling. If not for that she would be extremely uncomfortable. She stopped growing at a height of a little under 60 feet.
"Wow that was weird," said Lucy.
Lex then goes to Dr Starr and shakes his hand. "You're a genius Dr Starr you'll make this company billions," he said.
Then everyone noticed something else. Literally seconds after growing Lucy began to shrink down smaller and smaller. She stopped when she was her normal height. When she had stopped someone quickly took off their lab coat and gave it to her. She put it on immediately.
"Looks like your formula still has a few flaws," said Lex.
"Sorry sir," replied George.
"You better get that formula right or else you're out of a job."
15511212221112122122222212121.title: Up up up and then back down again

155112122211121221222222121211.content:
As the months went by Dr Starr had upgraded his formula several times. Each time Lucy was tested she stayed 60 feet tall for a little longer. But she would always revert back to normal. Lex was getting very impatient with him. Dr Starr was under a lot of strain.
One day Lucy came into work and everyone was ready for the next test. She prepared herself and everyone got ready.
When she was zapped like usual she began to grow. When she reached a little below 60 feet everyone expected her to shrink. They waited a few minutes but nothing happened. Everyone started to celebrate.
"Well it took a while but we've finally done it," said Lex. "What's her height?"
"59'11 sir," replied a Scientist.
"Let's try for 61 feet."
"No Lex," replied Dr Starr. "Her body won't be able to take the strain."
"Bull. I make the decisions and I say go for 61 feet."
Another scientist zapped her with a lower dose. She began to grow slightly again. But she felt her body go on fire. She fell to the floor in pain. Lex ordered her to be shrunk immediately. The scientists zapped her with the antidote and she slowly shrank down to normal size.
155112122211121221222222121211.title: Got it right

1551121222111212212222221212111.content:
A little later on we see everyone in the dining hall. Dr Starr is sitting at a table by himself eating his meal. A few minutes later Lucy sits down at the same table. She has her normal clothes on now. She had a smile on her face.
"Hello Dr Starr," she said.
"Hello Lucy," replied Dr Starr.
"It was awfully sweet of you to try and stop Lex like that."
"But I didn't stop him."
"I know but you tried and that's more than anyone else has done for me. And I was just wondering."
"Yes."
"Would you like to go out for a drink with me tonight?"
"Err I have work to do I have to perfect the formula. Lex told me I have to make you go through the 60 foot glass ceiling."
"Oh." Dr Starr saw the disappointment on her face.
"But I'm sure it won't take me all night. I'll still go out with you."
"Great pick me up at my place at eight."
"Sure, wait where is your place?"

What happens on the date?
1551121222111212212222221212111.title: Asking out

choices: The next day in at Lex Corp
15511212221112122122222212121112.content:
Later that night we see Dr Starr is still working on his formula. He was trying to make it so that whoever had it could exceed 60 feet and go beyond.
When he had finished perfecting the formula he got washed and changed. Then he went to his car and drove to Lucy's apartment. He then got out and knocked the door.
Lucy opened it and George saw that she was wearing her normal clothes. But she had put on some make up.
"Ah you're here," said Lucy.
"Just like you asked me to," replied George.
Lucy then gently grabbed his hand. "Now let's go somewhere where a gal can have some fun."
A little later we see the both of them on the karaoke singing along to the Beatles. Everyone was cheering and Lucy had a little too much to drink. George didn't drink, he was driving so he didn't want to take the risk.
After that they went back to George's place. Lucy was too drunk to be able to get home so she slept on the sofa.
They had both enjoyed their night out and promised to do it again some time.
15511212221112122122222212121112.title: Night out

155112122211121221222222121211121.content:
The next day we see Lucy in the middle of the lab again. All the scientists and Lex Luthor were there also. They were preparing for the next test.
Dr Starr made sure that she was ready. When she was ready he zapped her with the ray gun that contained his upgraded formula. He then backed off.
Lucy then began to grow again. A computer recorded her size. It was reading 10'5 but she was still growing. Lucy and Dr Starr was a little nervous. If it was wrong she would surely die.
The next reading was 40'2 and she was still growing steadily. Everyone celebrated when she reached past the 60 foot mark. The test had been a success but she was still growing. The reading was 83'8.
Lex was liking the results. There was no strain on her body and she still grew. They were all a little worried when her head hit the 100 foot ceiling. She was having to bend down. She still grew and even bending down she hit the ceiling so she sat down. Her growth finished at 200'0. Everyone was over the moon.
"We've done it ladies and gentlemen," said Lex. "Expect to get a bonus in this month's paycheck."
Dr Starr then slowly bought Lucy back down to normal size.
155112122211121221222222121211121.title: Success

choices: She has an argument with Dr Starr
1551121222111212212222221212111212.content:
Over the next month Lucy had many other experiments on her. Some enhanced her strength and durability. But it was the growing one they worked on the most. Dr Starr had created her some very basic clothes and shoes that grew with her so when she did grow she wasn't naked.
Lucy and Dr Starr had dated a lot more often. Now they were officially a couple. He would even give her a ride to work. But he had noticed something new in her since the experiments. Lucy seemed to go into some kind of rage when she got angry. It was nearly impossible to stop her. But one time he decided to sing Lucy in the Sky With Diamonds by the Beatles. For some reason it worked.
Now we see them both at work. Dr Starr was working in his office and Lucy was with him. She wore her basic clothes that barely covered her breasts and hip. And also some one strap sandals. She didn't mind wearing it. As long as it wasn't in public. Dr Starr had been working on another one that would cover her body.
She liked the basic one. It showed off her figure and it made her feel a little like Tarzan.

In the next chapter Lucy will grow but why?
1551121222111212212222221212111212.title: Over the month

15511212221112122122222212121112122.content:
One day we see George and Lucy in his office. They were having a love and a kiss away from the others. Lucy was wearing her work clothes. They were then disturbed Lex Luthor. He had a briefcase with him.
"Oh I hope I'm not interrupting a pasionate moment here," said Lex.
"What do you want?" replied George.
"Well Dr Starr it looks like your services are no longer needed. I have everything I need."
Lucy was angry about this. She walked up to him and looked up at him. "You can't just fire him just like that."
"But I can and I will. You're formula is now officially property of Lex Corp so now pack your things and get out."
"If he goes I go."
"You know you can't leave. We have your contracts and your body belongs to us."
Lucy was now at a high level of anger. She was angrier than she'd ever been. But then she noticed that she was the same height as Lex. Then she was looking down at him. Then she felt her head hit the ceiling.
She realised that she was growing. Lex ran away, but George stayed. She tried to shield him from the falling rubble.
15511212221112122122222212121112122.title: Fired

155112122211121221222222121211121221.content:
Lucy continued to grow. She burst her way out of the office and into the lab where she had been experimented on. She took Dr Starr with her and made sure that he was safe.
When her growth came to an end she was 60 feet tall. This was the first time she had been afraid when she was huge.
"Oh my God what happened to me?" she asked.
"I guess that your body absorbed the formula and now you don't need a dose to grow. It grows when you get really angry," replied Dr Starr.
She then puts him on the ground. "Please fix it."
George then quickly got the shrink ray. He turned it on and fired. But nothing happened. He set it to a higher power and fired again but still Lucy's body didn't shrink.
"What's wrong?" asked Lucy.
"I've made the growth way more powerful than the shrinking."
"Meaning?"
"Meaning that none of the shrink rays will work on you."

What does Lucy do?
155112122211121221222222121211121221.title: Attempt to shrink

choices: Tries to find a way out without the public seeing her
1551121222111212212222221212111212211.content:
"No it can't be," said Lucy. "Please make me small again." By now tears ran down her face.
"I'm sorry but I've tried everything," replied George. "But I'm afraid I can't shrink you."
Lucy then dropped to her knees in tears. She narrowly missed her lover. But she just cried her heart out.
George then went to her and hugged her arm. He felt her sadness.
"I'm so sorry for I've done to you."
"I'm a miserable giant now. I won't ever be normal again."
"Hey it's sometimes good not to be normal."
"Like who?"
"Super-Man isn't normal yet everyone loves him."
"But at least he can walk in the streets alright. Me I'll have the National Guard on me." She then cries even more.
George had to think of a way to cheer her up. But she seemed so depressed now. But then he came up with an idea.
"Hey Lucy did you have dolls when you were younger?"
"Yeah sure I did."
"Well think about it. Now I'm a Ken doll to you and you can play with me."
"You're a little small to be a Ken doll."

What does Lucy do next?
1551121222111212212222221212111212211.title: Crying her heart out

15511212221112122122222212121112122112.content:
"But now we have a big problem," said Lucy. "How am I gonna get out without the public seeing me? And by now Lex's probably called the National Guard or something."
"I think there was a secret tunnel under the building that leads to the coast," replied George. "We can get out through there."
"Then what are we waiting for let's go?"
"Not quite yet I still have some unfinished business."
He then runs over to a computer and types some buttons. After he had finished he picked up a case full of chemicals. At first Lucy was a little puzzled with what she was doing.
"What are you doing?" she asked.
"Well I just wiped my formula off the Lex Corp database. So he can't get it without me. And this case will hopefully help me find a powerful enough cure for you."
She then picks him up and kisses him. "That's sweet of you. And where is this tunnel?"
"A few floors down."
"Ok hold on tight we're going down."
She then stands up and starts to stomp the floor. Eventually it falls through and she begins her decent down.
15511212221112122122222212121112122112.title: Secret tunnel

155112122211121221222222121211121221121.content:
Thankfully the building had been evacuated so there was no one on the lower floors. If there was they would have been crushed almost immediately.
Lucy's decent continued and she kept George close to her so that he would be safe. Eventually they get to the very bottom level and Lucy had gotten herself into the tunnel. It was surprisingly big, she could stand up fully.
"So who far does this thing go?" asked Lucy.
"I'm not sure," replied George. "But it's best to start now the sooner we get out the better."
Lucy then started to walk down the tunnel. She didn't want to run because she had a history of being clumsy. She didn't want to accidentally crush her boyfriend.
The tunnel itself was lit up so they could see which way they were going. But it seemed to go for miles and miles. Lucy was loosing hope but George kept her spirits up.
Eventually they get to an exit. When Lucy walked through she found themselves in an hidden cavern. It was on the coast and no one could see her.
"Ok what now?"
"Now you swim for your life."
Lucy jumps into the water and swims away carrying George.

When do they find the Island?
155112122211121221222222121211121221121.title: Through the Tunnel

1551121222111212212222221212111212211211.content:
Lucy started to swim faster than a speeding bullet through the water. George had to hold on for dear life and he was careful not to accidentally loose his equipment.
She swam for hours and hours. George nearly fell asleep until he saw land straight ahead of them. It looked large and uninhabited.
"Lucy swim to that island," said George.
"Right Captain," replied Lucy with a smile.
She then changed course and went towards the island. It took her seconds to reach it. When she did she got out of the water and found that the trees only came up to her waist.
This island seemed to have plenty of food on it. There didn't seem to be any dangerous animals and there was no one on the island. It was perfect.
"Hey we discovered an island," said Lucy. "Shall we name it?"
"Not quite yet love," replied George. "Just relax a bit you must be tired after that swim."
"No I'm not tired at all. In fact I could do it again."
"Best not to."
1551121222111212212222221212111212211211.title: The Island

choices: Continue to the last chapter of Lucy's origin
1551121222111212212222221212111212211211.content:
Over the next few weeks Lucy helped George to build a little hut for himself. She didn't mind sleeping outside. In fact she found it very calming.
There was more food than they could eat here and they were taking advantage. There was a large lake in the centre of the island where they would fish, drink and take baths.
The island was tropical so it had a lot of sunshine and ran. The hut was good shelter and Lucy took this time to get herself a drink.
When it was sunny she would do exercises and test her strength. As of yet there was nothing on the island she could lift.
But she enjoyed her moments with George. He would work in the day to find a cure. But at night they spent some quality time with each other.
They were becoming closer and closer to each other. In fact some nights he would sleep in her breasts. They were the ultimate comfort for him.
She did get mad sometimes but George would always sing Lucy In the Sky With Diamonds and that would calm her down before she would have a growth spurt.
1551121222111212212222221212111212211211.title: Life on the island

1551121222111212212222221212111212211211.content:
We see Lucy and George on the beach. They are kissing each other. She came up with an idea so she put him back on the ground.
"Stay here lover I'll be back in a minute," said Lucy.
George stayed where he was and Lucy started to make her way into the jungle. She was starting to collect some food so she could prepare a beautiful meal.
"Now let's see. Oranges, mangoes water melons."
Suddenly she heard what sounded like a helicopter landing on the island. Then she heard George's cries for help.
"Oh my God George!"
She instantly dropped the food and started to run to where she left George. She saw the helicopter about to fly away. She just about got there but it took off and flew away. She could see him in the copter but she couldn't get to him. She saw the helicopter was blue and had the words Metropolis on the side.
"Metropolis? METROPOLIS!"
She then dived into the sea and started her swim towards her former home in hopes of finding the man she loved.
1551121222111212212222221212111212211211.title: Kidnapped

choices: A scientific experiment of some kind
One of Lex Luthor's sinister devices

info.brief_description: Making comic-book super-heroines or villainesses grow into giantesses!
info.description:
You can choose your favorite superheroine from DC or Marvel comics and make her huge! You can also choose a villainess, such as the Enchantress.

Choose from:

Batgirl, Elektra, Enchantress, Firestar, Giganta, Hellcat, Jubilee, Kitty Pryde, Mary Marvel, Poison Ivy, Raven, Rogue, Starfire, Stature, Storm, Supergirl, Susan Storm, Wasp, Wondergirl

And many others!

There is one RULE: No sex or nudity allowed! Some authors have an anything goes policy regarding sex, but I don't. Any chapters with inappropriate content will be deleted. My stories are aimed at teenagers and preteens, please keep that in mind!
